analyzed: jñātā śrotā tathā mantā vaktā vaktavyam eva ca

original: sarvaḥ sarvātmako devo bhuktimuktikaraḥ paraḥ // GarP_1,2.44 //
analyzed: sarvaḥ sarva ātmakaḥ devaḥ bhukti mukti karaḥ paraḥ
dhyānam pūjā upahāraḥ haṃ maṇḍalāni aham eva ca
itihāsāni aham rudra
sarva vedāḥ hi aham śiva
sarva jñānāni aham śambho
brahma ātmā aham aham śiva

original: ahaṃ brahmā sarvalokaḥ sarvadevātmako hyaham // GarP_1,2.46 //
analyzed: aham brahmā sarva lokaḥ sarva deva ātmakaḥ hi aham
aham sākṣāt sat ācāraḥ dharmaḥ ham vaiṣṇavaḥ hi aham
varṇa āśramāḥ tathā ca aham tad dharmaḥ ham purātanaḥ
yamaḥ ham niyamaḥ rudra
vratāni vividhāni ca

original: ahaṃ sūryastathā candro maṅgalādīnyahaṃ tathā // GarP_1,2.48 //
analyzed: aham sūryaḥ tathā candraḥ maṅgala ādīni aham tathā
purā mām garuḍaḥ pakṣī tapasā ārādhayat bhuvi

original: tuṣṭa ūce varaṃ brūhi matto vavre varaṃ sa tu // GarP_1,2.49 //
analyzed: tuṣṭaḥ ūce varam brūhi mattaḥ vavre varam sa tu
garuḍaḥ uvāca

original: mama mātā ca vinatā nāgairdāsīkṛtā hare /
analyzed: mama mātā ca vinatā nāgaiḥ dāsīkṛtā hare

original: yathāhaṃ deva tāñjitvā cāmṛtaṃ hyānayāmi tat // GarP_1,2.50 //
analyzed: yathā aham deva tān jitvā ca amṛtam hi ānayāmi tat
dāsyāt vimokṣayiṣyāmi yathā aham vāhanaḥ tava
purāṇa saṃhitā kartā yathā aham syām tathā kurum
viṣṇuḥ uvāca

original: yathā tvayoktaṃ garuḍa tathā sarvaṃ bhaviṣyati // GarP_1,2.52 //
analyzed: yathā tvayā uktam garuḍa tathā sarvam bhaviṣyati
nāga dāsyāt mātaram tvam vinatām mokṣayiṣyasi
deva ādīn sakalān jitvā ca amṛtam hi ānayiṣyasi
mahā balaḥ vāhanaḥ tvam bhaviṣyasi viṣa ardanaḥ
purāṇam mad prasādāt ca mama māhātmya vācakam
yat uktam mad sva rūpam ca tava ca āvirbhaviṣyati

original: gāruḍaṃ tava nāmnā talloke khyātiṃ gamiṣyati // GarP_1,2.55 //
analyzed: gāruḍam tava nāmnā tat loke khyātim gamiṣyati
yathā aham deva devānām śrīḥ khyātaḥ vinatā suta

original: tathā khyātiṃ purāṇeṣu gāruḍaṃ gāruḍaiṣyati // GarP_1,2.56 //
analyzed: tathā khyātim purāṇeṣu gāruḍam gāruḍa eṣyati
yathā aham tathā tvam garuḍa ātmanā

original: māṃ dhyātvā pakṣimukhyedaṃ purāṇaṃ gada gāruḍam // GarP_1,2.57 //
analyzed: mām dhyātvā pakṣi mukhya idam purāṇam gada gāruḍam
iti uktaḥ garuḍaḥ rudra
kaśyapāya āha pṛcchate

original: kaśyapo gāruḍaṃ śrutvā vṛkṣaṃ dagdhamajīvayat // GarP_1,2.58 //
analyzed: kaśyapaḥ gāruḍam śrutvā vṛkṣam dagdham ajīvayat
svayam ca anya manāḥ bhūtvā jīvayat
yakṣi om uṃ svāhā jāpī gāruḍī parā
garuḍa uktam gāruḍam hi śṛṇu rudra
mad ātmakam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇotpattinirūpaṇaṃ nāma dvitīyo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇotpattinirūpaṇam nāma dvitīyaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
sūtaḥ uvāca

original: iti rudrābjajo viṣṇoḥ śuśrāva brahmaṇo muniḥ /
analyzed: iti rudra abjajaḥ viṣṇoḥ śuśrāva brahmaṇaḥ muniḥ

original: vyāso vyāsādahaṃ vakṣyehaṃ te śaunaka naimiṣe // GarP_1,3.1 //
analyzed: vyāsaḥ vyāsāt aham vakṣyā iham te śaunaka naimiṣe
munīnām śṛṇvatām madhye sarga ādyam deva pūjanam
tīrtham bhuvana kośam ca manvantaram iha ucyate
varṇa āśrama ādi dharmāḥ ca dāna rāja ādi dharmakāḥ

original: vyavahāro vrataṃ vaṃśā vaidyakaṃ sanidānakam // GarP_1,3.3 //
analyzed: vyavahāraḥ vratam vaṃśāḥ vaidyakam sa nidānakam
aṅgāni pralayaḥ dharma kāma artha jñānam uttamam
sa prapañcam niṣprapañcam kṛtam viṣṇoḥ nigadyate
purāṇe gāruḍe sarvam garuḍaḥ bhagavān atha
vāsudeva prasādena sāmarthya atiśayaiḥ yutaḥ

original: bhutvā harervāhanaṃ ca sargādīnāṃ ca kāraṇam /
analyzed: bhutvā hareḥ vāhanam ca sarga ādīnām ca kāraṇam
devān vijitya garuḍaḥ hi amṛtā haraṇam tathā

original: cakre kṣudhā hṛtaṃ yasya brahmāṇḍamudare hareḥ /
analyzed: cakre kṣudhā hṛtam yasya brahmāṇḍam udare hareḥ

original: yaṃ dṛṣṭvā smṛtamātreṇa nāgāndīnāṃ ca saṃkṣayaḥ // GarP_1,3.7 //
analyzed: yam dṛṣṭvā smṛta mātreṇa nāgāndīnām ca saṃkṣayaḥ
kaśyapaḥ gāruḍāt vṛkṣam dagdham ca ajīvayat yatas

original: garuḍaḥ sa haristena proktaṃ śrīkaśyapāya ca // GarP_1,3.8 //
analyzed: garuḍaḥ sa hariḥ tena proktam śrī kaśyapāya ca
tat śrīmat rāruḍam puṇyam sarva dam paṭhataḥ tava

original: vakṣye vyāsaṃ namaskṛtya śṛṇu śaunaka tadyathā // GarP_1,3.9 //
analyzed: vakṣye vyāsam namaskṛtya śṛṇu śaunaka tat yathā

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe viṣayanirūpaṇaṃ nāma tṛtīyo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe viṣayanirūpaṇam nāma tṛtīyaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
rudraḥ uvāca
sargaḥ ca pratisargaḥ ca vaṃśaḥ manvantarāṇi ca

original: vaṃśānucaritaṃ caiva etad brūhi janārdana // GarP_1,4.1 //
analyzed: vaṃśānucaritam ca eva etat brūhi janārdana
hariḥ uvāca
śṛṇu rudra pravakṣyāmi sarga ādīn pāpa nāśanām

original: sargasthitilayāntāṃ tāṃ viṣṇoḥ krīḍāṃ purātanīm // GarP_1,4.2 //
analyzed: sarga sthiti laya antām tām viṣṇoḥ krīḍām purātanīm
tat etat sarvam eva etat dyakta avyakta sva rūpavat

original: tathā puruṣarūpeṇa kālarūpeṇa ca sthitam // GarP_1,4.4 //
analyzed: tathā puruṣa rūpeṇa kāla rūpeṇa ca sthitam

original: vyaktaṃ viṣṇustathāvyaktaṃ puruṣaḥ kāla eva ca /
analyzed: vyaktam viṣṇuḥ tathā avyaktam puruṣaḥ kālaḥ eva ca
krīḍataḥ bālakasya iva ceṣṭāḥ tasya niśāmaya
an ādi nidhanaḥ dhātā tu anantaḥ puruṣottamaḥ
tasmāt bhavati ca avyaktam tasmāt ātmā api jāyate
tasmāt āhuddhiḥ manaḥ tasmāt tatas kham pavanaḥ tatas
tasmāt tejaḥ tatas tu āpaḥ tatas bhūmiḥ tatas bhavat

original: aṇḍo hiraṇmayo rudra tasyāntaḥ svayameva hi /
analyzed: aṇḍaḥ hiraṇmayaḥ rudra tasya antar svayam eva hi

original: śarīragrahaṇaṃ pūrvaṃ sṛṣṭyarthaṃ kurute prabhuḥ // GarP_1,4.8 //
analyzed: śarīra grahaṇam pūrvam sṛṣṭi artham kurute prabhuḥ
brahmā catur mukhaḥ bhūtvā rajaḥ mātra adhikaḥ sadā
śarīra grahaṇam kṛtvā sṛjat etat carācaram
aṇḍasya antar jagat sarvam sa deva asura mānuṣam

original: sraṣṭā sṛjati cātmānaṃ viṣṇuḥ pālyaṃ ca pāti ca // GarP_1,4.10 //
analyzed: sraṣṭā sṛjati ca ātmānam viṣṇuḥ pālyam ca pāti ca

original: apasaṃhriyate cānte saṃhartā ca svayaṃ hara /
analyzed: apasaṃhriyate ca ante saṃhartā ca svayam hara
brahmā bhūtvā sṛjat viṣṇuḥ jagat pāti hariḥ svayam
rudra rūpī ca kalpa ante jagat saṃharate khilam
brahmā tu sṛṣṭi kāle smiñja madhya gatām mahīm
daṃṣṭūya uddharati jñātvā vāra hīm āsthitaḥ tanūm
deva ādi sargān vakṣye haṃ saṃkṣepāt śṛṇu śaṅkara
mahataḥ sargaḥ virūpaḥ brahmaṇaḥ tu saḥ

original: (2) nanmātrāṇāṃ dvitīyastu bhūtasargo hi sa smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,4.14 //
analyzed: nanmātrāṇām dvitīyaḥ tu bhūta sargaḥ hi sa smṛtaḥ
sargaḥ tu aindriyakaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: ityeṣa prākṛtaḥ sargaḥ sambhūto buddhipūrvakaḥ // GarP_1,4.15 //
analyzed: iti eṣa prākṛtaḥ sargaḥ sambhūtaḥ buddhi pūrvakaḥ
mukhyāḥ vai sthāvarāḥ smṛtāḥ
yaḥ proktaḥ tiryagyonyaḥ saḥ ucyate
tat ūrdhva stotasām ṣaṣṭhaḥ deva sargaḥ tu sa smṛtaḥ

original: (7) tator'vāksrotasāṃ sargaḥ saptamaḥ sa tu mā nuṣaḥ // GarP_1,4.17 //
analyzed: tatas urvāksrotasām sargaḥ saptamaḥ sa tu mā
nugrahaḥ sargaḥ sāttvikaḥ tāmasaḥ tu saḥ

original: pañcaite vaikṛtāḥ sargāḥ prākṛtāstu trayaḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,4.18 //
analyzed: pañca ete vaikṛtāḥ sargāḥ prākṛtāḥ tu trayaḥ smṛtāḥ
prākṛtaḥ vaikṛtaḥ ca api
kaumāraḥ navamaḥ smṛtaḥ
sthāvara antāḥ sura ādyāḥ tu prajāḥ rudra
caturvidhāḥ

original: brahmaṇaḥ kurvataḥ sṛṣṭiṃ jajñire mānasāḥ sutāḥ /
analyzed: brahmaṇaḥ kurvataḥ sṛṣṭim jajñire mānasāḥ sutāḥ
tatas deva asura pitṝn mānuṣān ca catuṣṭayam
sisṛkṣuḥ ambhāṃsi etāni svam ātmānam ayūyujat
vyakta ātmanaḥ tamaḥ mātrāt udriktāḥ tat prajāpateḥ
sisṛkṣeḥ jaghanāt pūrvam asurāḥ jajñire tatas

original: utsasarja tatastāṃ tu tamomātrātmikāṃ tanūm // GarP_1,4.22 //
analyzed: utsasarja tatas tām tu tamaḥ mātra ātmikām tanūm
tamaḥ mātrā tanuḥ tyaktā śaṅkara abhūt vibhāvarī
yakṣa upakṣāṃsi tad dehe prītim āpuḥ tatas surāḥ
sattva udriktāḥ tu mukhataḥ saṃbhūtāḥ brahmaṇaḥ hara
sattva prāyā tanuḥ tena san tyaktā sā api abhūt dinam

original: tato hi balino rātrāvasurā devatā divā /
analyzed: tatas hi balinaḥ rātrau asurāḥ devatāḥ divā

original: sattvamātrāṃ tanuṃ gṛhya pitaraśca tato 'bhavan // GarP_1,4.25 //
analyzed: sattva mātrām tanum gṛhya pitaraḥ ca tatas bhavan
sā ca utsṛṣṭā abhavat sandhyā dina nakta antara sthitiḥ
rajaḥ mātrām tanum gṛhya manuṣyāḥ tu abhavan tatas
sā tyaktā ca abhavat jyotsnā prāc sandhyā yā abhidhīyate

original: jyotsnā rātryahanī sandhyā śarīrāṇi tu tasya vai // GarP_1,4.27 //
analyzed: jyotsnā rātri ahanī sandhyā śarīrāṇi tu tasya vai

original: rajomātrāṃ tanu gṛhya kṣudabhūtkopa eva ca /
analyzed: rajaḥ mātrām tanu gṛhya kṣudh abhūt kopaḥ eva ca

original: kṣuttṛṭkṣāmā amṛgbhakṣā rākṣasā rakṣaṇācca ye // GarP_1,4.28 //
analyzed: kṣudh tṛṣ kṣāmāḥ rākṣasāḥ rakṣaṇāt ca ye
yakṣa ākhyāḥ jakṣaṇāt jñeyāḥ sarpāḥ vai keśa sarpaṇāt

original: jātāḥ kopena bhūtāste gandharvā jajñire tataḥ // GarP_1,4.29 //
analyzed: jātāḥ kopena bhūtāḥ te gandharvāḥ jajñire tatas
gāyantaḥ jajñire vācam gandharva apsarasaḥ ca ye

original: svargaṃ dyaurvakṣasaścakre sukhato 'jāḥ sa muṣṭavān // GarP_1,4.30 //
analyzed: svargam dyauḥ vakṣasaḥ cakre sukhataḥ jāḥ sa
sṛṣṭavān udarāt rāj ca pārśvābhyām ca prajāpatiḥ
ca eva antya mātaṅgān mahiṣa uṣṭra avikān tathā
opadhyaḥ phala mūlinyaḥ romabhyaḥ tasya jajñire
gauḥ ajaḥ puruṣaḥ medhyaḥ hi aśva aśvatara gardabhāḥ
etān grāmyān paśūn prāhuḥ āraṇyān ca nibodha me
śvāpadam dvi khuram hasti vānarāḥ pakṣi pañcamāḥ
audakāḥ paśavaḥ ṣaṣṭhāḥ saptamāḥ ca sarīsṛpāḥ
pūrva ādibhyaḥ mukhebhyaḥ tu ṛgveda ādyāḥ prajajñire

original: āsyādvai brāhmaṇā jātā bāhubhyāṃ kṣattriyāḥ smṛtāḥ /
analyzed: āsyāt vai brāhmaṇāḥ jātāḥ bāhubhyām kṣattriyāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: ūrubhyāṃ tu viśaḥ sṛṣṭāḥ śūdraḥ padybhāma jāyata // GarP_1,4.35 //
analyzed: ūrubhyām tu viśaḥ sṛṣṭāḥ śūdraḥ padi bhāma jāyata
brahma lokaḥ brāhmaṇānām śākraḥ kṣattriya janmanām

original: mārutaṃ ca viśāṃ sthānaṃ gāndharvaṃ śūdrajanmanām // GarP_1,4.36 //
analyzed: mārutam ca viśām sthānam gāndharvam śūdra janmanām
brahmacāri vrata sthānām brahma lokaḥ prajāyate
prājāpatyam gṛhasthānām yathā vihita kāriṇām
sthānam sapta ṛṣīṇām ca tathā eva vanavāsinām
yatīnām akṣayam sthānam yadṛcchā gāminām sadā

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe sṛṣṭivarṇanaṃ nāma caturtho 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe sṛṣṭivarṇanam nāma caturthaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
iriḥ uvāca
kṛtvā iha amutra saṃsthānam prajā sargam tu mānasam
atha amṛjat prajā kartṝn bhānasān tanayān prabhuḥ

original: dharmaṃ rudraṃ manuṃ caiva sanakaṃ ca sanātanam /
analyzed: dharmam rudram manum ca eva sanakam ca sanātanam

original: bhṛguṃ sanatkumāraṃ ca ruciṃ śraddhāṃ tathaiva ca // GarP_1,5.2 //
analyzed: bhṛgum sanatkumāram ca rucim śraddhām tathā eva ca
marīcim atri aṅgirasau pulastyam pulaham kratum
vasiṣṭham nāradam ca eva pitṝn barhiṣadaḥ tathā
agniṣvāttān ca kavya ādān ājyapān ca sukālinaḥ
upahūtān tathā dīpyām prā
strīn ca mūrti vivarjitān
caturaḥ mūrti yuktān ca aṅguṣṭhāt dakṣam īśvaram
vāmām guṣṭhāt tasya bhāryām asṛjat padmasambhavaḥ

original: tasyāṃ tu janayāmāsa dakṣo duhitaraḥ śubhāḥ /
analyzed: tasyām tu janayāmāsa dakṣaḥ duhitaraḥ śubhāḥ

original: dadau tā brahmaputrebhyaḥ satīṃ rudrāya dattavān // GarP_1,5.6 //
analyzed: dadau tāḥ brahma putrebhyaḥ satīm rudrāya dattavān
rudra putrāḥ babhūvurhi asaṃkhyātāḥ mahā balāḥ

original: bhṛgave ca dadau khyātiṃ rūpeṇāpratimāṃ śubhām // GarP_1,5.7 //
analyzed: bhṛgave ca dadau khyātim rūpeṇa apratimām śubhām
bhṛgoḥ dhātāvidhātārau janayāmāsa sā śubhā

original: śriyaṃ ca janayāmāsa patnī nārāyaṇasya yā // GarP_1,5.8 //
analyzed: śriyam ca janayāmāsa patnī nārāyaṇasya yā

original: tasyāṃ vai janayāmāsa balonmādau hariḥ svayam /
analyzed: tasyām vai janayāmāsa bala unmādau hariḥ svayam
āyatiḥ niyatiḥ ca eva manoḥ kanye mahātmanaḥ
dhātāvidhātroḥ te bhārye tayoḥ jātau sutau ubhau
prāṇaḥ ca eva mṛkaṇḍuḥ ca mārkaṇḍeyaḥ mṛkaṇḍutaḥ
patni marīceḥ sambhūtiḥ paurṇamāsam asūyata

original: virajāḥ sarvagaścaiva tasya putrau mahātmanaḥ // GarP_1,5.11 //
analyzed: virajāḥ sarvagaḥ ca eva tasya putrau mahātmanaḥ
smṛteḥ ca aṃṅgirasaḥ putrāḥ prasūtāḥ kanyakāḥ tathā
sinīvālī kuhūḥ ca eva rākā ca anumatiḥ tathā
anasūyā tathā eva atreḥ jajñe putrān akalmaṣān

original: somaṃ durvāsasaṃ caiva dattātreyaṃ ca yoginam // GarP_1,5.13 //
analyzed: somam durvāsasam ca eva dattātreyam ca yoginam
prītyām pulastya bhāryāyām dattoliḥ tad sutaḥ bhavat
karṃmaśaḥ ca arthavīraḥ ca sahiṣṇuḥ ca suta trayam

original: kṣamā tu suṣuve bhāryā pulahasya prijāpateḥ /
analyzed: kṣamā tu suṣuve bhāryā pulahasya
kratoḥ ca sumatiḥ bhāryā bālakhilyā anasūyata
ṣaṣṭiḥ yāni sahasrāṇi ṛṣīṇām ūrdharetasām
aṅguṣṭha parva mātrāṇām jvalat bhāskara varcasām

original: ūrjāyāṃ tu vasiṣṭasya saptājāyanta vai sutāḥ /
analyzed: ūrjāyām tu vasiṣṭasya sapta ajāyanta vai sutāḥ
rajogātra ūrdhabāhuḥ ca śaraṇaḥ ca anaghaḥ tathā
sutapāḥ śukraḥ iti ete sarve sapta ṛṣayaḥ malāḥ

original: svāhāṃ prādātsa dakṣo 'pi śaśarīrāya vahnaye // GarP_1,5.18 //
analyzed: svāhām prādāt sa dakṣaḥ u pi śaśarīrāya vahnaye
tasmāt svāhā sutān lebhe trīn udāra ojasaḥ hara

original: phāvakaṃ pavamānaṃ ca śuciṃ cāpi jalāśinaḥ // GarP_1,5.19 //
analyzed: phāvakam pavamānam ca śucim ca api jala āśinaḥ

original: pitṛbhyaśca svadhā jajñe menāṃ vaitaraṇīṃ tathā /
analyzed: pitṛbhyaḥ ca svadhā jajñe menām vaitaraṇīm tathā

original: te ubhe brahmavādinyau menāyāṃ tu himācalaḥ // GarP_1,5.20 //
analyzed: te ubhe brahma vādinyau menāyām tu himācalaḥ

original: mainākaṃ janayāmāsa gaurīṃ pūrvaṃ tu yā satī /
analyzed: mainākam janayāmāsa gaurīm pūrvam tu yā satī

original: tato brahmātmasambhūtaṃ pūrvaṃ svāyaṃbhuvaṃ prabhuḥ // GarP_1,5.21 //
analyzed: tatas brahma ātma sambhūtam pūrvam svāyaṃbhuvam prabhuḥ
ātmānam eva kṛtavān prajāpālyam manum hara

original: śatarūpāṃ ca tāṃ nārīṃ taponihatakalmaṣām // GarP_1,5.22 //
analyzed: śatarūpām ca tām nārīm tapaḥ nihata kalmaṣām
svāyambhuvaḥ manuḥ devaḥ jagṛhe vibhuḥ
tasmāt ca puruṣāt devī śatarūpā vyajāyata
priyavrata uttānapādau prasūti ākūti saṃjñā ite

original: devahūtiṃ manustāsu ākūtiṃ rucaye dadau // GarP_1,5.24 //
analyzed: deva hūtim manuḥ tāsu ākūtim rucaye dadau

original: prasūtiṃ caiva dakṣāya davahūtiṃ ca kardame /
analyzed: prasūtim ca eva dakṣāya davahūtim ca kardame
ruceḥ yajñaḥ dakṣiṇā abhūt dakṣiṇāyām ca yajñataḥ
abhavan dvādaśa sutāḥ yāmāḥ nāma mahā balāḥ
sṛṣṭavān dakṣaḥ uttamāḥ

original: śraddhā calā dhṛtistuṣṭiḥ puṣṭirmedhā kriyā tathā /
analyzed: śraddhā calā dhṛtiḥ tuṣṭiḥ puṣṭiḥ medhā kriyā tathā
buddhiḥ lajjā vapuḥ śāntiḥ ṛddhiḥ kīrtiḥ tnayodaśī
patnī artham pratijagrāha dharmaḥ dākṣāyaṇī prabhuḥ

original: khyatiḥ satyatha sambhūtiḥ smṛtiḥ prītiḥ kṣamā tathā // GarP_1,5.28 //
analyzed: khyatiḥ satī atha sambhūtiḥ smṛtiḥ prītiḥ kṣamā tathā

original: sannatiścānasūyā ca ūrjā svāhā svadhā tathā /
analyzed: sannatiḥ ca anasūyā ca ūrjā svāhā svadhā tathā

original: bhṛghurbhavo marīciśca tathā caivāṅgirā muniḥ // GarP_1,5.29 //
analyzed: marīciḥ ca tathā ca eva aṅgirāḥ muniḥ
pulastyaḥ pulahaḥ ca eva kratuḥ ca ṛṣi varaḥ tathā
ā atriḥ vasiṣṭhaḥ vahniḥ ca pitaraḥ ca yathākramam
khyāti ādyāḥ jagṛhuḥ kanyāḥ munayaḥ muni sattamāḥ

original: śraddhā kāmaṃ calā darpaṃ niyamaṃ dhṛtirātmajam // GarP_1,5.31 //
analyzed: śraddhā kāmam calā darpam niyamam dhṛtiḥ ātmajam
santoṣam ca tathā tuṣṭiḥ lobham puṣṭiḥ asūyata

original: medhā śrutaṃ kriyā daṇḍaṃ layaṃ vinayameva ca // GarP_1,5.32 //
analyzed: medhā śrutam kriyā daṇḍam layam vinayam eva ca
bodham buddhiḥ tathā lajjā vinayam vapuḥ ātmajam

original: vyavasāyaṃ prajajñe vai kṣemaṃ śāntirasūyata // GarP_1,5.33 //
analyzed: vyavasāyam prajajñe vai kṣemam śāntiḥ asūyata
sukham ṛddhiḥ yaśaḥ kīrtiḥ iti ete dharma sūnavaḥ

original: kāmasya ca ratirbhāryā tatputro harṣa ucyate // GarP_1,5.34 //
analyzed: kāmasya ca ratiḥ bhāryā tad putraḥ harṣaḥ ucyate
īje kadācid yajñena hayamedhena dakṣakaḥ

original: tasya jāmātaraḥ sarve yajñaṃ jagmurnimantritāḥ // GarP_1,5.35 //
analyzed: tasya jāmātaraḥ sarve yajñam jagmuḥ nimantritāḥ

original: bhāryabhiḥ sahitāḥ sarve rudraṃ devīṃ satīṃ vinā /
analyzed: bhāryabhiḥ sahitāḥ sarve rudram devīm satīm vinā
anāhūtā satī prāptā dakṣeṇa eva avamānitā

original: tyaktā dehaṃ punarjātā menāyāṃ tu himālayāt /
analyzed: tyaktā deham punar jātā menāyām tu himālayāt
śambhoḥ bhāryā bhavat raurī tasyām jajñe vināyakaḥ
kumāraḥ ca eva bhṛṅgīśaḥ kruddhaḥ rudraḥ pratāpavān

original: vidhvaṃsya yajñaṃ dakṣaṃ tu taṃ śaśāpa pinākadhṛk /
analyzed: vidhvaṃsya yajñam dakṣam tu tam śaśāpa pinākadhṛk
dhruvasya anvaya sambhūtaḥ manuṣyaḥ tvam bhaviṣyasi

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe prajākartrādisṛṣṭirnāma pañcamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe prajākartrādisṛṣṭiḥ nāma pañcamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
hariḥ uvāca
uttānapādāt abhavat surucyām uttamaḥ sutaḥ

original: sunītyāṃ tu dhruvaḥ putraḥ sa lebhe sthānamuttamam // GarP_1,6.1 //
analyzed: sunītyām tu dhruvaḥ putraḥ sa lebhe sthānam uttamam
muni prasādāt ārādhya devadevam janārdanam
dhruvasya tanayaḥ śliṣṭiḥ mahā bala parākramaḥ
tasya prācīnavarhiḥ tu putraḥ tasya api udāra dhīḥ

original: divañjayastasya sutastasya putro ripuḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,6.3 //
analyzed: divañjayaḥ tasya sutaḥ tasya putraḥ ripuḥ smṛtaḥ
ripoḥ putraḥ tathā śrīmān cākṣuṣaḥ kīrtitaḥ manuḥ
ruruḥ tasya sutaḥ śrīmān aṅgaḥ tasya api ca ātmajaḥ
aṅgasya veṇaḥ putraḥ tu nāstikaḥ dharma varjitaḥ
a dharṃma kārī
munibhiḥ ca kuśaiḥ hataḥ
ūrum mamanthuḥ putra arthe tatas sya tanayaḥ bhavat
hrasvaḥ timātraḥ kṛṣṇa aṅgaḥ niṣīda iti tatas bruvan
niṣādaḥ tena vai jātaḥ bindhya śaila nivāsakaḥ

original: tato 'sya dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇiṃ mamanthuḥ sahasā dvijāḥ // GarP_1,6.7 //
analyzed: tatas sya dakṣiṇam pāṇim mamanthuḥ sahasā dvijāḥ
tasmāt tasya sutaḥ jātaḥ viṣṇoḥ mānasa rūpadhṛk

original: puthurityevanāmā sa veṇaputro divaṃ yayau // GarP_1,6.8 //
analyzed: sa veṇa putraḥ divam yayau

original: dudoha pṛthivīṃ rājā prajānāṃ jīvanāya hi /
analyzed: dudoha pṛthivīm rājā prajānām jīvanāya hi
antardhānaḥ pṛthoḥ putraḥ tahavirdhānaḥ tad ātmajaḥ
prācīnavahaḥ te putraḥ pṛthivyām ekarāj babhau

original: upayeme samudrasya lavaṇasya sa vai sutām // GarP_1,6.10 //
analyzed: upayeme samudrasya lavaṇasya sa vai sutām
tasmāt suṣāva sāmudrī daśa prācīnabarhiṣaḥ

original: sarve prācetasā nāma dhanurvedasya pāragāḥ // GarP_1,6.11 //
analyzed: sarve prācetasāḥ nāma dhanurvedasya pāragāḥ
apṛthak a dharṃma caraṇāḥ te tapyanta mahat tapaḥ
daśa varṣa sahasrāṇi samudrasalileśayāḥ

original: prajāpatitvaṃ saṃprāpya bhāryā teṣāṃ ca māriṣa /
analyzed: prajāpati tvam saṃprāpya bhāryā teṣām ca māriṣa
abhavat hava śāpena tasyām dakṣaḥ bhavat tatas
asṛjat manasā dakṣaḥ prajāḥ pūrvam catur vodhāḥ

original: nāvardhanta ca tāstasya apadhyātā hareṇa tu // GarP_1,6.14 //
analyzed: na avardhanta ca tāḥ tasya apadhyātāḥ hareṇa tu
maithunena tatas sṛṣṭim kartum aicchat prajāpatiḥ
asikrīm āvahat bhāryām vīraṇasya prajāpateḥ
tasya putra sahasram tu vairaṇyām samapadyata

original: nāradoktā bhuvaścāntaṃ gatā jñātuṃ ca nāgatāḥ // GarP_1,6.16 //
analyzed: nārada uktāḥ bhuvaḥ ca antam gatāḥ jñātum ca nā āgatāḥ
dakṣa putra sahasram ca teṣu naṣṭeṣu sṛṣṭavān

original: śavalāśvāste 'pi gatā bhrātṝṇāṃ padavīṃ hara / // GarP_1,6.17 //
analyzed: śavalāśvāḥ te gatāḥ bhrātṝṇām padavīm hara

original: dakṣaḥ kruddhaḥ śaśāpātha nāradaṃ janma cāpsyasi /
analyzed: dakṣaḥ kruddhaḥ śaśāpa atha nāradam janma ca āpsyasi

original: nārado hyabhavatputraḥ kaśyapasya muneḥ punaḥ // GarP_1,6.18 //
analyzed: nāradaḥ hi abhavat putraḥ kaśyapasya muneḥ punar
yajñe dhvaste tha śaśāpra ugram maheśvaram
stutvā tvām upacāraiḥ ca pūjayiṣyanti śaṅkara
janmāntare pi vaireṇa te vinaśyanti śaṅkara
tasmāt vairam na kartavyam kadācid api kenacid
asiknyām mahiṣyām
janayāmāsa dakṣaḥ duhitaraḥ hi atha

original: ṣaṣṭiṃ kanyā rūpayutā dve caivāṅgirase dadau /
analyzed: ṣaṣṭim kanyāḥ rūpa yutāḥ dve ca eva aṅgirase dadau

original: dve prādātsa kṛśāśvāya daśa dharṃmāya cāpyatha // GarP_1,6.21 //
analyzed: dve prādāt sa kṛśāśvāya daśa dharṃmāya ca api atha
caturdaśa kaśyapāya aṣṭāviṃśā atimindave

original: pradadau bahuputrāya suprabhāṃ bhāminīṃ tathā // GarP_1,6.22 //
analyzed: pradadau bahuputrāya suprabhām bhāminīm tathā
manoramām bhānumatīm viśālām bahudām atha
dakṣaḥ prādāt mahādeva
catasraḥ riṣṭanemaye ne

original: sa kṛśāśvāya ca prādātsuprajāṃ ca tathā jayām /
analyzed: sa kṛśāśvāya ca prādāt suprajām ca tathā jayām
arundhatī vasuryā ṛjā
mī lambā bhānuḥ marudvatī

original: saṅkalpā ca muhūrtā ca sādhyā viśvā ca tā daśa /
analyzed: saṅkalpā ca muhūrtā ca sādhyā viśvā ca tāḥ daśa
dharṃma patnyaḥ samākhyātāḥ kaśyapasya vadāmi aham
aditiḥ ditiḥ danuḥ kālā hi anāyuḥ siṃhikā muniḥ

original: kadrūḥ sādhyā harā krodhā vinatā surabhiḥ khagā // GarP_1,6.26 //

analyzed: viśvedevāḥ tu viśvāyāḥ sādhyā sādhyān vyajāyata
marutvatyām marutvantaḥ vasoḥ tu vasavaḥ tathā
bhānoḥ tu bhānavaḥ rudra
muhūrtāt ca muhūrta jāḥ

original: lambāyāścaiva ghoṣo 'tha nāgavīthistu yā (jā) mitaḥ // GarP_1,6.28 //
analyzed: nāgavīthiḥ tu yā mitaḥ
pṛthivī viṣayam sarva marutvatyām vyajāyata

original: saṅkalpāyāstu sarvātmā jajñe saṃkalpa eva hi // GarP_1,6.29 //
analyzed: saṅkalpāyāḥ tu sarvātmā jajñe saṃkalpaḥ eva hi
āpaḥ dhruvaḥ ca somaḥ ca dharaḥ ca eva anilaḥ nalaḥ

original: pratyūṣaśca prabhāsaśca vasavo nāmabhiḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,6.30 //
analyzed: pratyūṣaḥ ca prabhāsaḥ ca vasavaḥ nāmabhiḥ smṛtāḥ
āpasya putraḥ vetuṇḍiḥ ṇḍaḥ
śramaḥ śrāntaḥ dhvaniḥ tathā
dhruvasya putraḥ bhagavān kālaḥ loka prakālanaḥ
somasya bhagavān varcāḥ varcasvī yena jāyate
dharasya putraḥ druhiṇaḥ hutahavyavahaḥ tathā
manoharāyām śiśiraḥ ramaṇaḥ tathā

original: anilasya śivā bhāryā tasyāḥ putraḥ pulomajaḥ // GarP_1,6.33 //
analyzed: anilasya śivā bhāryā tasyāḥ putraḥ pulomajaḥ
avijñātagatiḥ ca eva dvau putrau anilasya tu
agni putraḥ kumāraḥ tu śara stambe vyajāyat
tasya śākhaḥ viśākhaḥ ca naigameyaḥ ca pṛṣṭajaḥ

original: apatyaṃ kṛttikānāṃ tu kārtikeya iti smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,6.35 //
analyzed: apatyam kṛttikānām tu kārtikeyaḥ iti smṛtaḥ

original: pratyuṣasya viduḥ putramṛṣiṃ nāmnā tu devalam /
analyzed: pratyuṣasya viduḥ putram ṛṣim nāmnā tu devalam
viśvakarṃmā prabhāsasya vikhyātaḥ devavardhakiḥ
ajaikapād ahirbudhnyaḥ tvaṣṭā rudraḥ ca vīryavān
tvaṣṭuḥ ca api ātmajaḥ putraḥ viśvarūpaḥ mahā tapāḥ
haraḥ ca bahurūpaḥ ca tryambakaḥ ca aparājitaḥ
vṛṣākapiḥ ca śambhuḥ ca kaparde raivataḥ tathā
mṛgavyādhaḥ ca śarvaḥ ca kapālī ca mahā mune
ekādaśā ete kathitāḥ rudrāḥ tribhuvana īśvarāḥ
adityām kaśyapāt ca eva sūryāḥ dvādaśa jajñire

original: viṣṇuḥ śakror'yyamā dhātā tvaṣṭā pūṣā tathaiva ca // GarP_1,6.40 //
analyzed: viṣṇuḥ śakroḥ yamā dhātā tvaṣṭā pūṣā tathā eva ca

original: vivasvānsavitā caiva mitro varuṇa eva ca /
analyzed: vivasvān savitā ca eva mitraḥ varuṇaḥ eva ca

original: aśumāṃśca bhagaścaiva ādityā dvādaśa smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,6.41 //
analyzed: aśumān ca bhagaḥ ca eva ādityāḥ dvādaśa smṛtāḥ
saptaviṃśatiḥ somasya patnyaḥ nakṣatra saṃjñitāḥ
hiraṇyakaśipuḥ dityām hiraṇyākṣaḥ bhavat tadā
siṃhikā ca abhavat kanyā vipracitti parigrahā
hiraṇyakaśipoḥ putrāḥ catvāraḥ pṛthula ojasaḥ
anuhrādaḥ ca hrādaḥ ca prahrādaḥ ca eva vīryavān
saṃhrādaḥ ca avamaḥ teṣām prahrādaḥ viṣṇu tatparaḥ
saṃhrāda putraḥ āyuṣmān śibiḥ vāṣkalaḥ eva ca
virocanaḥ ca prāhrādiḥ baliḥ jajñe virocanāt
baleḥ putra śatam tu āsīt vāṇa jyeṣṭham vṛṣadhvaja
hiraṇyākṣa sutāḥ ca āsan sarve eva mahā balāḥ
utkuraḥ śakuniḥ ca eva bhūtasantāpanaḥ tathā
mahānāgaḥ mahābāhuḥ kālanābhaḥ tathā aparaḥ
abhavan danu putrāḥ ca dvimūrdhā śaṅkaraḥ tathā
ayomukhaḥ śaṅkuśirāḥ kapilaḥ śambaraḥ tathā
ekacakraḥ mahā bāhuḥ tārakaḥ ca mahā balaḥ

original: svarbhānurvṛṣaparvā ca pulomā ca mahāsuraḥ // GarP_1,6.49 //
analyzed: svarbhānuḥ vṛṣaparvā ca pulomā ca mahā asuraḥ

original: ete danoḥ sutāḥ khyātā vipracittiśca vīryavān /
analyzed: ete danoḥ sutāḥ khyātāḥ vipracittiḥ ca vīryavān

original: svarbhānoḥ suprabhā kanyā śarmiṣṭhā vārṣaparvaṇī // GarP_1,6.50 //
analyzed: svarbhānoḥ suprabhā kanyā śarmiṣṭhā vārṣaparvaṇī
upadānavī hayaśirāḥ prakhyātāḥ vara kanyakāḥ

original: vaiśvānarasute cobhe pulomā kālakā tathā // GarP_1,6.51 //
analyzed: vaiśvānara sute ca ubhe pulomā kālakā tathā

original: ubhe te tu mahābhāge mārīcestu parigrahaḥ /
analyzed: ubhe te tu mahābhāge mārīceḥ tu parigrahaḥ
tābhyām putra sahasrāṇi ṣaṣṭiḥ dānava sattamāḥ
paulomāḥ kālakañjāḥ ca mārīca tanayāḥ smṛtāḥ
siṃhikāyām samutpannāḥ vipracitti sutāḥ tathā
vyaṃśaḥ śalyaḥ ca balavān nabhaḥ ca eva mahā balaḥ
vātāpiḥ namuciḥ ca eva ilvalaḥ khasṛmān tathā

original: añja (nta) ko narakaścaiva kāla nābhastathaiva ca /
analyzed: narakaḥ ca eva kāla nābhaḥ tathā eva ca
nivāta kavacāḥ daityāḥ prahrādasya kule bhavan
ṣaṭ sutāḥ ca mahā sattvāḥ tāmrāyāḥ parikīrtitāḥ

original: śukī śyenī ca bhāsī ca sugrīvī śucigṛdhrike // GarP_1,6.56 //
analyzed: śukī śyenī ca bhāsī ca sugrīvī śuci gṛdhrike
śukī śukān ajanayat ulūkī pratyalūkakān

original: śyenī śyenāṃstathā bhāsī bhāsān gṛdhrāṃśca gṛdhryapi // GarP_1,6.57 //
analyzed: śyenī śyenān tathā bhāsī bhāsān gṛdhrān ca gṛdhrī api
śukī audakān pakṣi gaṇān sugrīvī tu vyajāyata
aśvān uṣṭān gardabhān ca tāmrā vaṃśaḥ prakīrtitaḥ
vinatāyāḥ tu putrau dvau vikhyātau garuḍa aruṇau
surasāyāḥ sahasram tu sarpāṇām amita ojasām
kādraveyāḥ ca phaṇinaḥ sahasram amita ojasaḥ
teṣā prādhānāḥ bhūteśa
śeṣa vāsuki takṣakāḥ
śaṅkhaḥ śvetaḥ mahāpadmaḥ śaṅkhaḥ
kambala aśvatarau tathā
elāpatraḥ tathā nāgaḥ karkoṭaka dhanañjayau

original: gaṇaṃ krodhavaśaṃ viddhi te ca sarve ca daṃṣṭriṇaḥ /
analyzed: gaṇam krodha vaśam viddhi te ca sarve ca daṃṣṭriṇaḥ

original: krodhā tu janayāmāsa piśācāṃśca mahābalān // GarP_1,6.62 //
analyzed: krodhā tu janayāmāsa piśācān ca mahā balān
gāḥ tu vai janayāmāsa surabhiḥ mahiṣān tathā
irā vṛkṣa latā ballīḥ tṛṇa jātīḥ ca sarvaśas
khagā ca yakṣa rakṣāṃsi muniḥ apsarasaḥ tathā
ariṣṭā tu mahā sattvān gandharvān samajījanat
devāḥ ekonapañcāśat marutaḥ hi abhavan iti
ekajyotiḥ ca dvirjyoti caturjyotiḥ tathā eva ca
ekaśukraḥ dviśukraḥ ca triśukraḥ ca mahā balaḥ

original: īdṛk sadṛk tathānyādṛk tataḥ pratisadṛk tathā // GarP_1,6.66 //
analyzed: īdṛś sadṛś tathā anyādṛś tatas pratisadṛś tathā
mitaḥ ca samitaḥ ca eva sumitaḥ ca mahā balaḥ
ṛtajit satyajit ca eva suṣeṇaḥ senajit tathā
atimitraḥ pyamitraḥ ca dūramitraḥ jitaḥ tathā

original: ṛtaśca ṛtadharṃmā ca vihartā varuṇo (camaso) dhruvaḥ // GarP_1,6.68 //
analyzed: ṛta ca ṛta dharṃmā ca vihartā varuṇaḥ camasaḥ dhruvaḥ
vidhāraṇaḥ ca durmedhāḥ ayam eka gaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ
īdṛśaḥ ca sadṛkṣaḥ ca etādṛkṣaḥ mitāśanaḥ
prasadṛkṣaḥ ca surataḥ ca mahā tapāḥ
hetumān prasavaḥ tadvat surabhaḥ ca mahā yaśāḥ
nādiḥ ugraḥ dhvaniḥ bhāsaḥ bimuktaḥ vikṣipaḥ sahaḥ

original: dyutirvasuranādhṛṣyo lābha kāmo jayī virāṭ // GarP_1,6.71 //
analyzed: dyutiḥ vasuḥ anādhṛṣyaḥ lābha kāmaḥ jayī virāj

original: udveṣaṇo gaṇo nāma vāyuskandhe tu saptame /
analyzed: udveṣaṇaḥ gaṇaḥ nāma vāyu skandhe tu saptame

original: etatsarvaṃ hare rūpaṃ rājāno dānavāḥ surāḥ // GarP_1,6.72 //
analyzed: etat sarvam hare rūpam rājānaḥ dānavāḥ surāḥ

original: sūryādi parivāreṇa manvādyā ījire harim // GarP_1,6.73 //

hariḥ uvāca
bhūmiṣṭhe maṇḍape snātvā maṇḍale viṣṇum arcayet
ṣoḍaśaiḥ koṣṭhakaiḥ tatra saṃmitam rudra kārayet
caturtha pañca koṇeṣu sūtra pātam tu kārayet
koṇa sūtrāt ubhayatas koṇāḥ ye tatra saṃsthitāḥ

original: teṣu caiva prakurvīta sūtrapātaṃ vicakṣaṇaḥ // GarP_1,8.3 //
analyzed: teṣu ca eva prakurvīta sūtra pātam vicakṣaṇaḥ
tad anantara koṇeṣu evam eva hi kārayet
prathamā nābhiḥ uddiṣṭā madhye rekhā prasaṃgame

original: antareṣu ca sarveṣu aṣṭau caiva tunābhayaḥ /
analyzed: antareṣu ca sarveṣu aṣṭau ca eva tunābhayaḥ

original: pūrvamadhyamanābhi bhyāmathaṃ sūtraṃ tu bhrāmayet // GarP_1,8.5 //
analyzed: pūrva madhyama nābhi bhyāmatham sūtram tu bhrāmayet
antarā sa dvijaśreṣṭhaḥ pāda ūnam bhrāmayet hara
anena nābhi sūtrasya karṇikām bhrāmayet śiva
karṇikāyāḥ dvi bhāgena kesarāṇi vicakṣaṇaḥ
tad agreṇa sadā vidvān dalāni eva samālikhet
sarveṣu mānena anena suvrata

original: padmāni tāni kurvīta deśikaḥ para mārthavit // GarP_1,8.8 //
analyzed: padmāni tāni kurvīta deśikaḥ para mārtha vid
ādi sūtra vibhāgena dvārāṇi parikalpayet

original: dvāraśobhāṃ tathā tatra tadardhena tu kalpayet // GarP_1,8.9 //
analyzed: dvāra śobhām tathā tatra tad ardhena tu kalpayet
karṇikām pīta varṇena sita rakta ādi kesaraiḥ

original: antaraṃ nīlavarṇena dalāni asitena ca // GarP_1,8.10 //
analyzed: antaram nīla varṇena dalāni asitena ca
kṛṣṇa varṇena rajasā caturaśram prapūrayet

original: dvārāṇi śuklavarṇena rekhāḥ pañca ca maṇḍale // GarP_1,8.11 //
analyzed: dvārāṇi śukla varṇena rekhāḥ pañca ca maṇḍale

original: sitā raktā tathā pītā kṛṣṇā caiva yathākramam /
analyzed: sitā raktā tathā pītā kṛṣṇā ca eva yathākramam
kṛtvā eva maṇḍalam ca ādau nyāsam kṛtvā arcayet harim

original: hṛnmadhye tu nyasedviṣṇuṃ kaṇṭhe saṅkarṣaṇaṃ tathā /
analyzed: hṛd madhye tu nyaset viṣṇum kaṇṭhe saṅkarṣaṇam tathā
pradyumnam śirasi nyasya śikhāyām aniruddhakam
brahmāṇam sarva gātreṣu karayoḥ śrīdharam tathā

original: ahaṃ viṣṇuriti dhyātvā karṇikāyāṃ nyaseddharim // GarP_1,8.14 //
analyzed: aham viṣṇuḥ iti dhyātvā karṇikāyām nyaset harim
nyaset saṅkarṣaṇam pūrve pradyumnam ca eva dakṣiṇe

original: aniruddhaṃ paścime ca brihmāṇaṃ cottare nyaset // GarP_1,8.15 //
analyzed: aniruddham paścime ca brihmāṇam ca uttare nyaset
śrīdharam rudra koṇeṣu indra ādīn dikṣu vinyaset

original: tato 'bhyarcya ca gandhādyaiḥ prāpnuyātparamaṃ padam // GarP_1,8.16 //
analyzed: tatas bhyarcya ca gandha ādyaiḥ prāpnuyāt paramam padam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe viṣṇupūjopayogivajranābhamaṇḍalanirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe viṣṇupūjopayogivajranābhamaṇḍalanirūpaṇam nāma aṣṭamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
hariḥ uvāca
samaye yā dīkṣitaḥ śiṣyaḥ baddha netraḥ tu vāsasā
aṣṭa āhuti śatam tasya mūlamantreṇa homayet

original: dviguṇaṃ putrake homaṃ triguṇaṃ sādhake matam /
analyzed: dviguṇam putrake homam triguṇam sādhake matam
nirvāṇa deśike rudra
caturguṇam udāhṛtam
guru viṣṇu dvija strīṇām hantā badhyaḥ tvaḥ ca dīkṣitaiḥ
atha dīkṣām pravakṣyāmi dharma adharma kṣayaṅkarīm
upaveśya bahis śiṣyān dhāraṇam teṣu kārayet
vāyavyā kalayā rudra śoṣyamāṇān vicintayet
āgreyyāḥ dahyamānān ca plāvitān ambhasā punar
tejaḥ teja asi tam jīvam ekīkṛtya samākṣipet
cintayet dyomni śarīre nyattu kāraṇam

original: ekaikaṃ yo jayettatra kṣetrajñaṃ dehakāraṇāt // GarP_1,9.6 //
analyzed: ekaikam yaḥ jayet tatra kṣetrajñam deha kāraṇāt
utpādya yojayet paścāt ekaikam vṛṣabhadhvaja
maṇḍala ādiṣu aśaktaḥ tu kalpayitvā arcayet harim
catur dvāram bhavet tat ca brahmatīrthāt anukramāt

original: hastaṃ padmaṃ samākhyātaṃ patrāṇyaṅgulayaḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,9.8 //
analyzed: hastam padmam samākhyātam patrāṇi aṅgulayaḥ smṛtāḥ
karṇikā talahaḥ tantu nakhāni asya tu kesarāḥ
tatra arcayet harim dhyātvā ca

original: taṃ hastaṃ pātayenmūrdhni śiṣyasya tu samāhitaḥ /
analyzed: tam hastam pātayet mūrdhni śiṣyasya tu samāhitaḥ
haste viṣṇuḥ sthitaḥ yasmāt viṣṇu hastaḥ tatas tu ayam
naśyanti sparśanāt tasya pātakāni akhilāni ca

original: guruḥ śiṣyaṃ samabhyarcya netre baddhe tu vāsasā /
analyzed: guruḥ śiṣyam samabhyarcya netre baddhe tu vāsasā
devasya pramukham kṛtvā puṣpam eva arpayet tatas

original: puṣpaṃ nipatitaṃ yatra mūrdhno devasya śārṅgiṇaḥ // GarP_1,9.11 //
analyzed: puṣpam nipatitam yatra mūrdhnaḥ devasya śārṅgiṇaḥ
tad nāma kārayet tasya strīṇām nāma aṅkitam svayam
śūdrāṇām dāsa saṃyuktam kārayet tu vicakṣaṇaḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe viṣṇudīkṣānidṛ nāma navamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe nāma navamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

R sthaṇḍila ādiṣu siddhaye
śrīṃ hrīṃ mahālakṣmyai namaḥ

original: śrāṃ śrīṃ śrūṃ śraiṃ śrauṃ śraḥ kramāddhṛdayaṃ ca śiraḥ śikhām /
analyzed: śrāṃ śrīṃ śrūṃ śraiṃ śrauṃ śraḥ kramāt hṛdayam ca śiraḥ śikhām

original: kavacaṃ netramastraṃ ca āsanaṃ mūrtimarcayet // GarP_1,10.1 //
analyzed: kavacam netram astram ca āsanam mūrtim arcayet
maṇḍale padma garbhe ca catur dvāri rajaḥ nvite

original: catuḥ ṣaṣṭyantamaṣṭādi khākṣe khākṣyādi maṇḍalam // GarP_1,10.2 //
analyzed: catuḥ ṣaṣṭi antam aṣṭa ādi kha akṣe kha akṣi ādi maṇḍalam
kha akṣi indu sūrya gam sarvam kha ādi veda indu vartanāt

original: lakṣmīmaṅgāni caikasminkoṇe durgāṃ gaṇaṃ gurum // GarP_1,10.3 //
analyzed: lakṣmīm aṅgāni ca ekasmin koṇe durgām gaṇam gurum
kṣetrapālam atha agni ādau homān juhāva kāma bhāj

original: oṃ ghaṃ ṭaṃ ḍaṃ haṃ śrīmahālakṣmyai namaḥ // GarP_1,10.4 //
analyzed: om ghaṃ ṭaṃ ḍaṃ haṃ śrī mahālakṣmyai namaḥ
anena pūjayet lakṣmīm pūrva ukta parivārakaiḥ
om saiṃ sarasvatyai namaḥ

original: oṃ hrīṃ saiṃ sarasvatyai namaḥ // GarP_1,10.5 //
analyzed: om hrīṃ saiṃ sarasvatyai namaḥ

original: oṃ hrīṃ vadavadavāgvādinisvāhā oṃ hrīṃ sarasvatyai namaḥ // GarP_1,10.6 //
analyzed: om   om   sarasvatyai namaḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe lakṣmyarcananirūpaṇaṃ nāma daśamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe lakṣmyarcananirūpaṇam nāma daśamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
hariḥ uvāca
navavyūha arcanam vakṣye yat uktam kaśyapāya hi
jīvam utkṣipya mūrdhanyam nābhyām vyomni niveśayet
bījena dahet bhūta ātmakam vapuḥ

original: yamityanena bījena tacca sarva vināśayet // GarP_1,11.2 //
analyzed: yaṃ iti anena bījena tat ca sarva vināśayet
lam iti anena bījena plāvayet sacarācaram
vam iti anena bījena cintayet amṛtam tatas
tatas budvuda madhye tu pīta vāsāḥ catur bhujaḥ
aham mataḥ tathā ātmānam dhyānena paricintayet
mantra nyāsam tatas kuryāt trividham kara dehayoḥ
dvādaśa akṣara bījena ukta bījaiḥ anantaram
ṣaḍaṅgena tatas kuryāt sākṣāt yena hariḥ bhavet
dakṣiṇa aṅguṣṭham ārabhya madhya aṅguṣṭha ndale nyaset

original: madhye bījadvayaṃ nyasya nyasedaṅge tataḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: madhye bīja dvayam nyasya nyaset aṅge tatas punar
hṛd śirasi
bāhvoḥ ca karayoḥ jānvoḥ pādayoḥ ca api vinyaset

original: padmākārau karau kṛtvā madhye 'ṅguṣṭhaṃ niveśayet // GarP_1,11.8 //
analyzed: padma ākārau karau kṛtvā madhye ṅguṣṭham niveśayet
cintayet tatra sarva īśam param tattvam anāmayam

original: kramāccaitāni bījāni tarjanyādiṣu vinya set // GarP_1,11.9 //
analyzed: kramāt ca etāni bījāni tarjanī ādiṣu vinyaset

original: tato mūrdhākṣivakkreṣu kaṇṭhe ca hṛdaye tathā /
analyzed: tatas mūrdha akṣi vakkreṣu kaṇṭhe ca hṛdaye tathā

original: nābhau guhye tathā jānvoḥ pādayorvinyasetkramāt // GarP_1,11.10 //
analyzed: nābhau guhye tathā jānvoḥ pādayoḥ vinyaset kramāt

original: pāṇyoḥ ṣaḍaṅgabījāni nyasya kāye tato nyaset /
analyzed: pāṇyoḥ ṣaḍaṅga bījāni nyasya kāye tatas nyaset
aṅguṣṭha ādi kaniṣṭhā antam vinyaset vīja pañcakam

original: hṛdaye hṛdayaṃ nyasya śiraḥ śirasi vinyaset // GarP_1,11.12 //
analyzed: hṛdaye hṛdayam nyasya śiraḥ śirasi vinyaset

original: śikhāyāṃ tu śikhāṃ nyasya kavacaṃ sarvatastanau /
analyzed: śikhāyām tu śikhām nyasya kavacam sarvatas tanau
netram netre vidhātavyam astram ca karayoḥ dvayoḥ

original: tenaiva ca diśo baddhā pūjā vidhimathācaret /
analyzed: tena eva ca diśaḥ baddhā pūjāḥ vidhim atha ācaret
hṛdaye cintayet pūrvam yogapīṭham samāhitaḥ

original: dharma jñanaṃ ca vairāgyamaiśvaryaṃ ca yathākramam /
analyzed: dharma jñanam ca vairāgyam aiśvaryam ca yathākramam
āgneya ādau ca pūrva ādau adharma ādīn ca vinyaset
ebhiḥ paricchanna tanum pīṭha bhūtam tad ātmakam
anantam vinset paścāt pūrva kāya unnatam sthitam
tatas vidyāt saraḥ jātam dala aṣṭa sama diś dalam
sita abjam śata patra āḍhyam
dhyātvā vedādinā paścāt sūrya soma anala ātmanām
maṇḍalāni kramāt evam upari upari cintayet
tatas pūrva ādi diś saṃsthāḥ śaktīḥ keśava gocarāḥ
vimalā ādyāḥ nyaset aṣṭau navamīm karṇikā gatām
evam dhyātvā samabhyarcya yogapīṭham anantaram

original: manasāvāhya tatreśaṃ hariṃ śārṅgaṃ nyasetpunaḥ // GarP_1,11.20 //
analyzed: manasā āvāhya tatra īśam harim śārṅgam nyaset punar

original: madhye netraṃ tu koṇeṣu astramantraṃ nyasettataḥ // GarP_1,11.21 //
analyzed: madhye netram tu koṇeṣu astramantram nyaset tatas
saṅkarṣaṇa ādi bījāni pūrva ādi krama yogataḥ

original: dvāri pūrve pare caiva vainateyaṃ tu vinyaset // GarP_1,11.22 //
analyzed: dvāri pūrve pare ca eva vainateyam tu vinyaset
sudarśanam sahasra aram dakṣiṇe dvāri vinyaset
śriyam dakṣiṇatas nyasya lakṣmīm uttaratas tathā

original: dvāryattare gadāṃ nyasya śaṅkhaṃ koṇeṣu vinyaset /
analyzed: dvāri attare gadām nyasya śaṅkham koṇeṣu vinyaset

original: devadakṣiṇataḥ śārṅgaṃ vāme caiva sudhīrnyaset // GarP_1,11.24 //
analyzed: deva dakṣiṇatas śārṅgam vāme ca eva sudhīḥ nyaset
tadvat khaṅgam tathā cakram nyaset pārśva dvayoḥ dvayam
tatas ntar lokapālān ca sva diś bhedena vinyaset
vajra ādīni āyudhāni eva tathā eva viniveśayet
ūrghvam tathā anantam adhas ca paricintayet
sarvam dhyātvā iti saṃpūjya mudrāḥ sandarśayet tatas

original: añjaliḥ prathamā mudrā kṣipraṃ devaprasādhanī // GarP_1,11.27 //
analyzed: añjaliḥ prathamā mudrā kṣipram deva prasādhanī
vandanī hṛdaya āsaktāt sārdham
vāma muṣṭiḥ dakṣiṇa aṅguṣṭha bandhanaḥ

original: savyasya tasya cāṅguṣṭho yaḥ sa uddhaḥ prakīrtitaḥ /
analyzed: savyasya tasya ca aṅguṣṭhaḥ yaḥ saḥ prakīrtitaḥ

original: tisraḥ sādhāraṇā hyetā mūrtibhedena kalpitāḥ // GarP_1,11.29 //
analyzed: tisraḥ sādhāraṇāḥ hi etāḥ mūrti bhedena kalpitāḥ
kaniṣṭhā ādi pramokeṇa aṣṭau mudrāḥ yathākramam
aṣṭānām pūrva bījānām kramaśas tu avadhārayet
aṅguṣṭhena kaniṣṭhā antam nāmayitvā aṅguli trayam

original: mudreyaṃ narasiṃhasya nyubjaṃ kṛtvā karadvayam // GarP_1,11.31 //
analyzed: mudrā iyam narasiṃhasya nyubjam kṛtvā kara dvayam
savya hastam tathā uttānam bhrāmayet śanais

original: navamīyaṃ smṛtā mudrā varāhābhimatā sadā // GarP_1,11.32 //
analyzed: navamī iyam smṛtā mudrā varāha abhimatā sadā
muṣṭi dvayam atha uttānam ṛjvā ekaikena mocayet
utkuñcayet sarva muktā aṅgamudrā iyam ucyate
muṣṭi dvayam atho baddhā evam eva anupūrvaśas
daśānām lokapālānām mudrāḥ ca krama yogataḥ
suram ādyam dvitīyam ca upāntyam ca antyam eva ca

original: vāsudevo balaḥ kāmo hyaniruddho yathākramam // GarP_1,11.35 //
analyzed: vāsudevaḥ balaḥ kāmaḥ hi aniruddhaḥ yathākramam
praṇavaḥ tat sat iti etat hum kṣaiṃ bhūḥ iti mantrakāḥ

original: nārāyaṇastathā brahmā viṣṇuḥ siṃho varāharāṭ // GarP_1,11.36 //
analyzed: nārāyaṇaḥ tathā brahmā viṣṇuḥ siṃhaḥ varāha rāj
sita aruṇa haridrā ābhāḥ nīla śyāma lohitāḥ
varṇataḥ nava nāmakāḥ

original: kaṃ ṭaṃ paṃ śaṃ garutmānsyājjaṃ khaṃ vaṃ ca sudarśanam /
analyzed: kaṃ ṭaṃ paṃ śam garutmān syāt jaṃ khaṃ vaṃ ca sudarśanam

original: ṣaṃ caṃ phaṃ ṣaṃ gadādevī vaṃ laṃ maṃ kṣaṃ ca śaṅkhakam // GarP_1,11.38 //
analyzed: ṣaṃ caṃ phaṃ ṣaṃ gadā devī vaṃ laṃ maṃ kṣaṃ ca śaṅkhakam

original: ghaṃ ḍhaṃ bhaṃ haṃ bhavecchrīśca gaṃ jaṃ vaṃ śaṃ ca puṣṭikā /
analyzed: ghaṃ ḍhaṃ bhaṃ haṃ bhavet śrīḥ ca gaṃ jaṃ vaṃ śam ca puṣṭikā

original: ghaṃ vaṃ ca vanamālā syācchrī vatsaṃ daṃ saṃ bhavet // GarP_1,11.39 //
analyzed: ghaṃ vaṃ ca vanamālā syāt śrī vatsam daṃ sam bhavet

original: chaṃ ḍaṃ paṃ yaṃ kaustubhaḥ proktaścānanto hyahameva ca /
analyzed: chaṃ ḍaṃ paṃ yaṃ kaustubhaḥ proktaḥ ca anantaḥ hi aham eva ca
iti aṅgāni yathāyogam devadevasya vai daśā
garuḍaḥ mbuja saṃkāśaḥ gadā ca eva asita ākṛtiḥ
puṣṭiḥ śirīṣa puṣpa ābhā lakṣmīḥ kāñcana sannibhā
pūrṇa candra nibhaḥ śaṅkhaḥ kaustubhaḥ tu aruṇa dyutiḥ
cakram sūrya sahasra ābham śrīvatsaḥ kunda sannibhaḥ
pañca varṇa nibhā mālā hi anantaḥ megha sannibhaḥ

original: vidyudrūpāṇi cāstrāṇi yāni noktāni varṇataḥ // GarP_1,11.43 //
analyzed: vidyut rūpāṇi ca astrāṇi yāni na uktāni varṇataḥ
arghya pādya ādi vai dadyāt puṇḍarīkākṣa vidyayā

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe navavyūhārcanaṃ nāmaikādaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe navavyūhārcanam nāma ekādaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
hariḥ uvāca
pūjā anukrama siddhi artham pūjā anukramaḥ ucyate

original: oṃ nama ityādau saṃsmṛtiḥ paramātmanaḥ // GarP_1,12.1 //
analyzed: om namaḥ ityādau saṃsmṛtiḥ paramātmanaḥ
yaṃ raṃ vaṃ lam iti kāya śuddhiḥ
om namaḥ iti caturbhuja ātma nirmāṇam
tatas trividhaḥ kara kāya nyāsaḥ

original: kṣaiṃ narasiṃhāya bhūrvarāhya kaṃ vainateyāya jaṃ khaṃ vaṃ sudarśanāya khaṃ caṃ phaṃ
analyzed: kṣaiṃ narasiṃhāya bhūḥ varāhya kaṃ vainateyāya jaṃ khaṃ vaṃ sudarśanāya khaṃ caṃ phaṃ

original: ṣaṃ gadāyai vaṃ laṃ maṃ kṣaṃ pāñcajanyāya ghaṃ ḍhaṃ bhaṃ haṃ śriyai gaṃ ḍaṃ vaṃ śaṃ
analyzed: ṣaṃ gadāyai vaṃ laṃ maṃ   pāñcajanyāya ghaṃ ḍhaṃ bhaṃ haṃ śriyai gaṃ ḍaṃ vaṃ śaṃ

original: puṣṭyai dhaṃ vaṃ vanamālāyai daṃ śaṃ śrīvatsāya chaṃ ḍaṃ yaṃ kaustubhāya śaṃ śārṅgāya
analyzed: puṣṭyai dhaṃ vaṃ vanamālāyai daṃ śam śrīvatsāya chaṃ ḍaṃ yaṃ kaustubhāya śam śārṅgāya

original: iṃ iṣudhibhyāṃ caṃ carmaṇe khaṃ khaḍgāya indrāya surāya partaye agnaye tejodhipatayeyamāyadharmādhipatayekṣaṃnairṛtāyarakṣodhipataye
analyzed: iṃ iṣudhibhyām caṃ carmaṇe khaṃ khaḍgāya indrāya surāya agnaye tejaḥ dhipataye yamāya dharma adhipataye ikṣam nairṛtāya rakṣaḥ dhipataye

original: varuṇāya jalādhipataye yoṃ vāyave prāṇādhipataye dhāṃ dhanadāya dhanādhipataye hāṃ
analyzed: varuṇāya jala adhipataye yoṃ vāyave prāṇa adhipataye dhām dhanadāya dhana adhipataye hām

original: īśānāya vidyādhipataye oṃ vajrāya śaktyai oṃ daṇḍāya khaṅgāya oṃ pāśāya dhvajāya
analyzed: īśānāya vidyā adhipataye om vajrāya śaktyai om daṇḍāya khaṅgāya om pāśāya dhvajāya

original: gadāyai triśūlāya laṃ anantāya pātālādhipataye khaṃ brahmaṇe sarvalokādhipataye oṃ
analyzed: gadāyai triśūlāya laṃ anantāya pātāla adhipataye khaṃ brahmaṇe sarva loka adhipataye om
namaḥ bhagavate vāsudevāya namaḥ
om om namaḥ
om naṃ namaḥ

om nāṃ namaḥ

om yaṃ namaḥ

original: oṃ naṃnoṃ bhagavateṃ vāṃsuṃdevāyaṃ oṃ namo nārāyaṇāya namaḥ /
analyzed: om naṃ noṃ bhagavateṃ om namaḥ nārāyaṇāya namaḥ
om puruṣottamāya namaḥ
namaḥ te puṇḍarīkākṣa namaḥ te viśvabhāvana
subrahmaṇya namaḥ te stu mahāpuruṣa pūrvaja
ca eteṣām svāhā antam upakalpayet

original: evaṃ japtvā vidhānena śatamaṣṭottaraṃ tathā // GarP_1,12.5 //
analyzed: evam japtvā vidhānena śatam aṣṭa uttaram tathā

original: arghaṃ dattvā jitaṃ tena praṇāmaṃ ca punaḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: argham dattvā jitam tena praṇāmam ca punar punar

original: tato 'gnāvapi sampūjyaṃ taṃ yajeta yathāvidhi // GarP_1,12.6 //
analyzed: tatas gnau api sampūjyam tam yajeta yathāvidhi
devadevam sva bījena aṅga ādibhiḥ atha acyutam

original: pūrvamullikhya cābhyukṣya praṇavena tu mantravit // GarP_1,12.7 //
analyzed: pūrvam ullikhya ca abhyukṣya praṇavena tu mantra vid
bhrāmayitvā analam kuṇḍe pūjayet ca śubhaiḥ phalaiḥ

original: pūrvaṃ tatsakalaṃ dhyātvā maṇḍale manasā nyaset // GarP_1,12.8 //
analyzed: pūrvam tat sakalam dhyātvā maṇḍale manasā nyaset
vāsudeva ākhya tattvena hutvā ca aṣṭa uttaram śatam
saṃkarṣaṇa ādi bījena yajet ṣaṭkam tathā eva ca
trayan trayam tathā aṅgānām eka ekān dikpatīn tathā
pūrṇāhutim tathā eva ante dadyāt samyak upasthitaḥ

original: vāgatīte pare tattve ātmānaṃ ca layaṃ nayet /
analyzed: vāc atīte pare tattve ātmānam ca layam nayet
upaviśya punar mudrām darśayitvā namet punar
nityam evaṃvidham homam naimitte dviguṇam bhavet

original: gacchagaccha paraṃ sthānaṃ yatra devo nirañjanaḥ // GarP_1,12.12 //
analyzed: gaccha gaccha param sthānam yatra devaḥ nirañjanaḥ
gacchantu devatāḥ sarvāḥ sva sthāna sthiti hetave

original: sudarśanaḥ śrīhariśca acyutaḥ sa trivikramaḥ // GarP_1,12.13 //
analyzed: sudarśanaḥ śrī hariḥ ca acyutaḥ sa trivikramaḥ

original: caturbhujo vāsudevaḥ ṣaṣṭhaḥ pradyumna eva ca /
analyzed: caturbhujaḥ vāsudevaḥ ṣaṣṭhaḥ pradyumnaḥ eva ca
saṃkarṣaṇaḥ navavyūhaḥ daśa ātmakaḥ
aniruddhaḥ dvādaśa ātmā atha ūrdham anantakaḥ
ete eka ādibhiḥ cakraiḥ vijñeyāḥ lakṣitāḥ surāḥ
cakra aṅkitaiḥ pūjitaḥ rakṣet sadā naraiḥ
om cakrāya svāhā
om vicakrāya svāhā
om sucakrāya svāhā
om mahācakrāya svāhā

original: oṃ mahācakrāya asurāntakṛt huṃ phaṭ oṃ huṃ sahasrāra huṃ phaṭ // GarP_1,12.16 //
analyzed: om mahācakrāya asura anta kṛt hum phaṭ om hum sahasrāra hum phaṭ
dvārakā cakra pūjā iyam gṛhe rakṣā karī śubhā

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe pūjānukramanirūpaṇaṃ nāma dvādaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe pūjānukramanirūpaṇam nāma dvādaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
hariḥ uvāca
pravakṣyāmi adhunā hi etat vaiṣṇavam pañjaram śubham

original: namonamaste movidaṃ cakraṃ gṛhya sudarśanam // GarP_1,13.1 //
analyzed: namaḥ namaḥ te cakram gṛhya sudarśanam
prācyām rakṣasva mām viṣṇo
tvām aham śaraṇam gataḥ

original: gadāṃ kaumodakīṃ gṛhṇa padmanābha namo 'sta te // GarP_1,13.2 //
analyzed: gadām kaumodakīm gṛhṇa padmanābha namaḥ sta te
yāmyām rakṣasva mām viṣṇo
tvām aham śaraṇam gataḥ
halam ādāya saunande namaḥ te puruṣottama
pratīcyām rakṣa mām viṣṇo
tvām aha śaraṇam gataḥ

original: musalaṃ śātanaṃ gṛhya puṇḍarīkākṣa rakṣa mām // GarP_1,13.4 //
analyzed: musalam śātanam gṛhya puṇḍarīkākṣa rakṣa mām
uttarasyām jagannātha
bhavantam śaraṇam gataḥ
khaḍgam ādāya astra śāstra ādikam hare
namaḥ te rakṣa rakṣaḥ ghna
aiśānyām śaraṇam gataḥ
pāñcajanyam mahā śaṅkham anughoṣyam ca paṅkajam

original: pragṛhya rakṣa māṃ viṣṇo āgnyeyyāṃ rakṣa sūkara /
analyzed: pragṛhya rakṣa mām viṣṇo āgnyeyyām rakṣa sūkara

original: candrasūryaṃ samāgṛhya khaḍgaṃ cāndramasaṃ tathā // GarP_1,13.7 //
analyzed: candra sūryam samāgṛhya khaḍgam cāndramasam tathā

original: nairṛtyāṃ māṃ ca rakṣasva divyamūrte nṛkesarin /
analyzed: nairṛtyām mām ca rakṣasva divya mūrte nṛ kesarin
vaijayantīm sma pragṛhya śrīvatsam kaṇṭha bhūṣaṇam

original: vāyavyāṃ rakṣa māṃ deva hayagrīva namo 'stu te /
analyzed: vāyavyām rakṣa mām deva hayagrīva namaḥ stu te
vainateyam samāruhya tu antarikṣe janārdana
mām rakṣasva ajita sadā namaḥ te stu aparājita

original: viśālākṣaṃ samāruhya rakṣa māṃ tvaṃ rasātale // GarP_1,13.10 //
analyzed: viśāla akṣam samāruhya rakṣa mām tvam rasātale
akūpāra namaḥ tubhyam mahā mīna namaḥ stu pte
kara śīrṣa ādi aṅgulīṣu satya tvam bāhu pañjaram

original: kṛtvā rakṣasva māṃ viṣṇo namaste puruṣottama /
analyzed: kṛtvā rakṣasva mām viṣṇo namaḥ te puruṣottama

original: etaduktaṃ śaṅkarāya vaiṣṇavaṃ pañjaraṃ mahat // GarP_1,13.12 //
analyzed: etat uktam śaṅkarāya vaiṣṇavam pañjaram mahat
purā rakṣā artham īśānyāḥ kātyāyanyāḥ vṛṣadhvaja
sā yena ca amarān mahiṣa asuram
dānavam raktabījam ca anyān ca sura kaṇṭakān
etat japan naraḥ bhaktyā śatrūn vijayate sadā

original: iti śrīgāruḍe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe viṣṇupañjarastotraṃ nāma trayodaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe viṣṇupañjarastotram nāma trayodaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
hariḥ uvāca
atha yogam pravakṣyāmi bhukti mukti karam param

original: dhyāyibhiḥ procyate dhyeyo dhyānena harirīśvaraḥ // GarP_1,14.1 //
analyzed: dhyāyibhiḥ procyate dhyeyaḥ dhyānena hariḥ īśvaraḥ
tat śṛṇuṣva maheśāna sarva pāpa vināśanam
viṣṇuḥ sarva īśvaraḥ nantaḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ bhū parivarjitaḥ
vāsudevaḥ jagannāthaḥ brahmā ātmā asmi aham eva hi
dehi deha sthitaḥ nityaḥ sarva deha vivarjitaḥ
deha dharṃma vihīnaḥ ca kṣara akṣara vivarjitaḥ

original: ṣaḍvidheṣu sthito draṣṭā śrotā ghrātā hyatīndriyaḥ // GarP_1,14.4 //
analyzed: ṣaḍvidheṣu sthitaḥ draṣṭā śrotā ghrātā hi atīndriyaḥ
tad harṃma rahitaḥ sraṣṭā nāma gotra vivarjitaḥ

original: mantā manaḥ sthito devo manasā parivarjitaḥ // GarP_1,14.5 //
analyzed: mantā manaḥ sthitaḥ devaḥ manasā parivarjitaḥ
manaḥ dharṃma vihīnaḥ ca vijñānam jñānam eva ca

original: boddhā buddhisthitaḥ sākṣī sarvajño buddhivarjitaḥ // GarP_1,14.6 //
analyzed: boddhā buddhi sthitaḥ sākṣī sarva jñaḥ buddhi varjitaḥ
buddhi dharṃma vihīnaḥ ca sarvaḥ sarva gataḥ manaḥ
sarva prāṇi vinirmuktaḥ prāṇa dharṃma vivarjitaḥ
prāṇa prāṇaḥ mahā śāntaḥ bhayena parivarjitaḥ
ahaṅkāra ādi hīnaḥ ca tad harṃma parivarjitaḥ
jāgrat svapna suṣupti sthaḥ tad sākṣī tad vivarjitaḥ
turīyaḥ paramaḥ dhātā dṛś rūpaḥ guṇa varjitaḥ

original: mukto buddho 'jaro vyāpī satya ātmāsmyahaṃ śivaḥ // GarP_1,14.10 //
analyzed: muktaḥ buddhaḥ jaraḥ vyāpī satyaḥ ātmā asmi aham śivaḥ

original: evaṃ ye mānavā vijñā dhyāyantīśaṃ paraṃ padam /
analyzed: evam ye mānavāḥ vijñāḥ dhyāyanti īśam param padam

original: prāpnuyuste ca tadrūpaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,14.11 //
analyzed: prāpnuyuḥ te ca tad rūpam na atra kāryā vicāraṇā

original: iti dhyānaṃ samākhyātaṃ tava śaṅkara suvrata /
analyzed: iti dhyānam samākhyātam tava śaṅkara suvrata

sa visargam tṛtīyam syāt mṛtyu dāridraya mardanam
īśa viṣṇava ṛka devī ādi kavacam sarva sādhakam
amṛta īśam pūjanam samam
japanāt mṛtyu hīnāḥ syuḥ sarva pāpa vivarjitāḥ
śata japyāt veda phalam yajña tīrtha phalam labhet
aṣṭottaraśatāt jāpya atrisandhyam
dhyāyet ca sita padma stham vara dam ca abhayam kare
dvābhyām ca amṛta kumbham tu cintayet amṛta īśvaram
tasya eva aṅga gatām devīm amṛta amṛta bhāṣiṇī vini

original: kalaśaṃ dakṣiṇe haste vāmahaste saroruham // GarP_1,18.6 //
analyzed: kalaśam dakṣiṇe haste vāma haste saroruham
japet aṣṭa sahasram vai trisandhyam māsam ekatas
āhvānam sthāpanam rodham sannidhānam niveśanam
pādyam ā camanam snānam arghyam sraj anulepanam
dīpa aṃbaram bhūṣaṇam ca naivadyam pāna vījanam
mātrā mudrā japa dhyānam dakṣiṇā ca āhutiḥ stutiḥ

original: vādyaṃ gatiṃ ca nṛtyaṃ ca nyāsayogaṃ pradakṣiṇam /
analyzed: vādyam gatim ca nṛtyam ca nyāsa yogam pradakṣiṇam

original: praṇatirmantraśayyā ca vandanaṃ ca visarjanam // GarP_1,18.10 //
analyzed: praṇatiḥ mantra śayyā ca vandanam ca visarjanam
ṣaḍaṅga ādi prakāreṇa pūjanam tu krama uditam

original: parameśamukhodrītaṃ yo jānāti sa pūjakaḥ // GarP_1,18.11 //

analyzed: arghya pātra arcanam ca ādau astreṇa eva tu tāḍanam
śodhanam kavacena eva amṛtīkaraṇam tatas
pūjā ca ādhāra śakti ādeḥ prāṇāyāmam tathā āsane
pīṭha suddhim tatas kuryāt śoṣaṇa ādyaiḥ tatas smaret
ātmānam deva rūpam ca kara aṅga nyāsakam caret
ātmānam pūjayet paścāt hṛd abjataḥ

original: mūrtau vā sthaṇḍile vāpi kṣipetpuṣpaṃ tu bhāsvaram /
analyzed: mūrtau vā sthaṇḍile vā api kṣipet puṣpam tu bhāsvaram
āhvāna dvāra pūjā artham pūjā ca ādhāra śaktitaḥ
sānnidhya karaṇam deve parivārasya pūjanam

original: aṅgaṣaṭkasya pūjā vai kartavyā ca vipaścitaiḥ // GarP_1,18.16 //
analyzed: aṅga ṣaṭkasya pūjā vai kartavyā ca vipaścitaiḥ
dharma ādayaḥ ca śakra ādyāḥ sa āyudhāḥ parivārakāḥ
yuga veda muhūrtāḥ ca pūjā iyam bhukti mukti kṛt
mātṛkāḥ ca gaṇān ca ādau nandi gaṅge ca pūjayet

original: mahākālaṃ ca yamanāṃ dehalyāṃ pūjayetpurā // GarP_1,18.18 //
analyzed: mahākālam ca yamanām dehalyām pūjayet purā
om amṛta īśvara om bhairavāya namaḥ

original: evaṃ oṃ juṃ haṃsaḥ sūryāya namaḥ // GarP_1,18.19 //
analyzed: evam om juṃ haṃsaḥ sūryāya namaḥ

original: evaṃ śivāya kṛṣṇāya brahmaṇe ca gaṇāya ca /
analyzed: evam śivāya kṛṣṇāya brahmaṇe ca gaṇāya ca
caṇḍikāyai sarasvatyai mahā lakṣma ādi pūjayet

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśāvye ācārakāṇḍe 'mṛteśamṛtyuñjayapūjanaṃ nāmāṣṭādaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa āvye ācāra kāṇḍe mṛteśamṛtyuñjayapūjanam nāma aṣṭādaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
sūtaḥ uvāca
prāṇeśvaram gāruḍam ca śiva uktam pravadāmi aham

original: sthānānyādau pravakṣyāmi nāgadaṣṭo na jīvati // GarP_1,19.1 //
analyzed: sthānāni ādau pravakṣyāmi nāga daṣṭaḥ na jīvati
citā valmīka śaila ādau ca vivare taroḥ

original: daṃśe rekhātrayaṃ yasya pracchannaṃ sa na jīvati // GarP_1,19.2 //
analyzed: daṃśe rekhā trayam yasya pracchannam sa na jīvati
ṣaṣṭhyām ca karkaṭe meṣe mūla āśleṣā maghā ādiṣu

original: bāhau ca vakkre grīvāyāṃ daṣṭāyāṃ na hi jīvati // GarP_1,19.4 //
analyzed: bāhau ca vakkre grīvāyām daṣṭāyām na hi jīvati
pūrvam dinapatiḥ bhuṅkte ardha yāmam pare

original: śeṣā grahāḥ pratidinaṃ ṣaṭsaṃkhyā parivartanaiḥ // GarP_1,19.5 //
analyzed: śeṣāḥ grahāḥ pratidinam ṣaṣ saṃkhyā parivartanaiḥ
nāgabhogaḥ kramāt jñeyaḥ rātrau bāṇa vivartanaiḥ
śeṣa ūrkaḥ phaṇipaḥ candraḥ takṣakaḥ bhaumaḥ īritaḥ

original: karkoṭo jño guruḥ padmo mahāpadmaśca bhārgavaḥ /
analyzed: karkoṭaḥ jñaḥ guruḥ padmaḥ mahāpadmaḥ ca bhārgavaḥ

original: śaṅkhaḥ śanaiścaro rāhuḥ kulikaścāhayo grahāḥ // GarP_1,19.7 //
analyzed: śaṅkhaḥ śanaiścaraḥ rāhuḥ kulikaḥ ca ahayaḥ grahāḥ

original: paṅgoḥ kāle divā rāhuḥ kulikena saha sthitaḥ // GarP_1,19.8 //
analyzed: paṅgoḥ kāle divā rāhuḥ kulikena saha sthitaḥ
yāma ardha sandhi saṃsthām ca velām kālavatīm caret
bāṇa dvi ṣaṣ vahni vāji yuga bhūḥ eka bhāgataḥ
divā

original: pādāṅguṣṭhe pādapṛṣṭhe pādapṛṣṭhe gulphe jānuni liṅgake // GarP_1,19.10 //
analyzed: pādāṅguṣṭhe pāda pṛṣṭhe pāda pṛṣṭhe gulphe jānuni liṅgake

original: karṇayośca bhruvoḥ śaṅkhe mastake pratipatkramāt // GarP_1,19.11 //
analyzed: karṇayoḥ ca bhruvoḥ śaṅkhe mastake pratipad kramāt

original: kāyasya vāmabhāge tu striyā vāyuvahātkarāt // GarP_1,19.12 //
analyzed: kāyasya vāma bhāge tu striyāḥ vāyu vahāt karāt

original: ātmanaḥ paramaṃ bījaṃ haṃsākhyaṃ sphaṭikāmalam // GarP_1,19.13 //
analyzed: ātmanaḥ paramam bījam haṃsa ākhyam sphaṭika amalam
dātavyam viṣa pāpa ghnam bījam tasya caturvidham
vindu pañca svara yutam ādyam uktam dvitīyakam
ṣaṣṭha ārūḍham tṛtīyam syāt sa visargam caturthakam
om kuru kule svāhā
vidyā trailokya rakṣā artham garuḍena dhṛtā purā

original: gale kuru nyaseddhīmānkule ca gulphayoḥ smṛtaḥ /

original: svāhā pādayuge caiva yugahā nyāsa īritaḥ // GarP_1,19.16 //

original: gṛhe vivikhitā yatra tannāgāḥ saṃtyajanti ca /

original: sahasramantraṃ japtvā tu karṇe sūtraṃ dhṛtaṃ tathā // GarP_1,19.17 //

original: saptalakṣasya japyāddhi siddhiḥ prāptā surāsuraiḥ // GarP_1,19.18 //
analyzed: sapta lakṣasya japyāt hi siddhiḥ prāptā sura asuraiḥ

om pakṣi svāhā

ruṇḍāyai svāhā

garuḍaḥ ham iti dhyātvā kuryāt viṣa harām rīṃ kriyām

original: sa vāyunā samākṛṣya daṣṭānāṃ garalaṃ haret /
analyzed: sa vāyunā samākṛṣya daṣṭānām garalam haret
tanau nyaset daṣṭakasya nīlakaṇṭha ādi saṃsmaret
punarnavā phalinīnām mūlam vakkra jam īdṛśam
mūlam śukla bṛhatyāḥ tu karkoṭyāḥ gairika ṛṇikam

original: viṣamṛddhiṃ na vrajecca uṣṇaṃ pibati yo ghṛtam /

analyzed: pañcāṅgam tu śirīṣasya mūlam gṛñjana jam tathā

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe sarpaviṣaharopāya(prāṇeśvaravidyā)

analyzed: śatam aṣṭa uttaram ca api japtvā hi atha samarpayet
tatas muhūrtam ekantu dhyāyet devam hṛdi sthitam
śuddha sphaṭika saṃkāśam sūrya koṭi sama prabham
prasanna vadanam saumyam sphurat makara kuṇḍalam
kirīṭinam udāra aṅgam vanamālā samanvitam
para brahma svarūpam ca śrīdharam cintayet sudhīḥ

original: anena caiva stotreṇa stuvīta parameśvaram // GarP_1,30.14 //
analyzed: anena ca eva stotreṇa stuvīta parameśvaram
śrīnivāsāya devāya namaḥ śrīpataye namaḥ
śrīdharāya sa śārṅgāya śrī pradāya namaḥ namaḥ
śrī vallabhāya śāntāya śrīmate ca namaḥ namaḥ
śrīparvata nivāsāya namaḥ śreyaskarāya ca
śreyasām pataye ca eva hi āśramāya namaḥ namaḥ

original: namaḥ śreyaḥ svarūpāya śrīkarāya namonamaḥ // GarP_1,30.17 //
analyzed: namaḥ śreyaḥ svarūpāya śrīkarāya namaḥ namaḥ
śaraṇyāya vareṇyāya namaḥ bhūyas namaḥ namaḥ

original: stotraṃ kṛtvā namaskṛtya devadevaṃ visarjayet // GarP_1,30.18 //
analyzed: stotram kṛtvā namaskṛtya devadevam visarjayet
iti rudra samākhyātā pūjā viṣṇoḥ mahātmanaḥ

original: yaḥ karoti mahābhaktyā sa yāti paramaṃ padam // GarP_1,30.19 //
analyzed: yaḥ karoti mahā bhaktyā sa yāti paramam padam
iṃ yaḥ paṭhate dhyāyam viṣṇu pūjā prakāśakam

original: sa vidhūyeha pāpāni yāti viṣṇoḥ paraṃ padam // GarP_1,30.20 //
analyzed: sa vidhūya iha pāpāni yāti viṣṇoḥ param padam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe śrīdharā (viṣṇvar)
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe śrīdharāḥ
canavidhiḥ nāma triṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahā purāṇam
rudraḥ uvāca

original: bhūya evaṃ jagannātha pūjāṃ kathaya me prabho /
analyzed: bhūyas evam jagannātha pūjām kathaya me prabho
yayā tareyam saṃsāra sāgaram hi ati dustaram
hariḥ uvāca
arcanam viṣṇu devasya vakṣyāmi vṛṣabhadhvaja
tat śṛṇuṣva mahābhāga bhukti mukti pradam śubham

original: kṛtvā snānaṃ tataḥ sandhyāṃ tato yāgagṛhaṃ vrajet /
analyzed: kṛtvā snānam tatas sandhyām tatas yāga gṛham vrajet

original: prakṣālya pāṇī pādau ca ācamya ca viśeṣataḥ // GarP_1,31.3 //
analyzed: prakṣālya pāṇī pādau ca ācamya ca viśeṣataḥ
mūlamantram samastam tu hastayoḥ vyāpakam nyaset

original: mūlamantraṃ ca devasya śṛṇu rudra vadāmi te // GarP_1,31.4 //
analyzed: mūlamantram ca devasya śṛṇu rudra vadāmi te

original: oṃ śrīṃ hrīṃ śrīdharāya viṣṇave namaḥ /
analyzed: om śrīṃ   śrīdharāya viṣṇave namaḥ

original: ayaṃ mantraḥ sureśasya viṣṇorīśasya vācakaḥ // GarP_1,31.5 //
analyzed: ayam mantraḥ sureśasya viṣṇoḥ īśasya vācakaḥ
sarva vyādhi haraḥ ca eva sarva graha haraḥ tathā
sarva pāpa haraḥ ca eva bukti mukti pradāyakaḥ
aṅganyāsam tatas kuyyāt debhiḥ mantrauḥ vicakṣaṇaḥ
om hāṃ hṛdayāya namaḥ
om hīṃ śirase svāhā
om   śikhāyai vaṣaṭ
om haiṃ kavacāya hum
om   netratrayāya vauṣaṭ
om haḥ astrāya phaṭ

original: iti mantraḥ samākhyāto mayā te prabhaviṣṇunā /
analyzed: iti mantraḥ samākhyātaḥ mayā te prabhaviṣṇunā
nyāsam kṛtvā ātmanaḥ mudrām darśayet vijita ātmavān
tatas dhyāyet param viṣṇu tdṛt koṭara samāśritam
śaṅkha cakra samāyuktam kunda indu dhavalam harim
śrīvatsa kaustubha yutam vanamālā samanvitam
ratna hāra kirīṭena saṃyuktam parameśvaram

original: ahaṃ viṣṇuriti dhyātvā kṛtvā vai śodhanādikam /
analyzed: aham viṣṇuḥ iti dhyātvā kṛtvā vai śodhana ādikam

original: yaṃ kṣaiṃ ramiti bījaiśca kaṭhinī kṛtya nāmabhiḥ // GarP_1,31.11 //
analyzed: yaṃ kṣaiṃ ram iti bījaiḥ ca kaṭhinī kṛtya nāmabhiḥ
aṇḍam utpādya ca tatas praṇavena eva bhedayet

original: tatra pūrvoktarūpaṃ tu bhāvayitvā vṛṣadhvaja // GarP_1,31.12 //
analyzed: tatra pūrva ukta rūpam tu bhāvayitvā vṛṣadhvaja
ātma pūjām tatas kuryāt randha puṣpa ādibhiḥ śubhaiḥ

original: āvāhya pūjayetsarvā devatā āsanasya yāḥ // GarP_1,31.13 //
analyzed: āvāhya pūjayet sarvāḥ devatāḥ āsanasya yāḥ
mantraiḥ ebhiḥ mahādeva tat mantram śṛṇu śaṅkara
viṣṇo āsana devatāḥ āgacchata

āvāhya maṇḍale rudra pūjayet pa rameśvaram

original: anena vidhinā rudra sarvapāpaharaṃ param // GarP_1,31.17 //
analyzed: anena vidhinā rudra sarva pāpa haram param

original: yathātmani tathā deve nyāsaṃ kurvīta cāditaḥ /
analyzed: yathā ātmani tathā deve nyāsam kurvīta ca āditas
mudrām pradarśayet paścāt arghya ādīn arpayet tatas
snānām kuryāt tatas vastram dadyāt ācamanam tatas

original: gandhapuṣpaṃ tathā dhūpaṃ dīpaṃ dadyāccaruṃ tataḥ // GarP_1,31.19 //
analyzed: gandha puṣpam tathā dhūpam dīpam dadyāt carum tatas
pradakṣiṇam tatas japyam tatas tasmin sarpayet

original: aṅgādīnāṃ svamantraiśca pūjāṃ kurvīta sādhakaḥ // GarP_1,31.20 //
analyzed: aṅga ādīnām sva mantraiḥ ca pūjām kurvīta sādhakaḥ
devasya mūlamantreṇa iti evam viddhi vṛṣadhvaja
mantrān śṛṇu trinetra tvam kathyamānān mayā adhunā

ebhiḥ mantraiḥ mahādeva pūjyāḥ aṅga ādayaḥ naraiḥ
pūjayitvā mahātmānam viṣṇum brahma svarūpiṇam
stuvīta ca anayā stutyā paramātmānam avyayam

original: viṣṇave devadevāya namo vai prabhaviṣṇave // GarP_1,31.24 //
analyzed: viṣṇave devadevāya namaḥ vai prabhaviṣṇave
viṣṇave vāsudevāya namaḥ sthiti karāya ca
grasiṣṇave namaḥ ca eva namaḥ pralaya śāyine

original: devānāṃ prabhave caiva yajñānāṃ prabhave namaḥ /
analyzed: devānām prabhave ca eva yajñānām prabhave namaḥ

original: munīnāṃ prabhave nityaṃ yakṣāṇāṃ prabhaviṣṇave // GarP_1,31.26 //
analyzed: munīnām prabhave nityam yakṣāṇām prabhaviṣṇave
jiṣṇave sarva devānām sarvagāya mahātmane
brahma indra rudra vandyāya sarva īśāya namaḥ namaḥ
sarvaloka hita arthāya loka adhyakṣāya vai namaḥ
sarva goptre sarva kartre sarva duṣṭa vināśine
vara pradāya śāntāya vareṇyāya namaḥ namaḥ
śaraṇyāya surūpāya dharma kāma artha dāyine
stutvā dhyāyet sva hṛdaye brahma rūpiṇam avyayam

original: elaṃ tu pūjayedviṣṇuṃ mūlamantreṇa śaṅkara // GarP_1,31.30 //
analyzed: elam tu pūjayet viṣṇum mūlamantreṇa śaṅkara

original: mūlamantraṃ japedvāpi yaḥ sa yāti naro harim /
analyzed: mūlamantram japet vā api yaḥ sa yāti naraḥ harim
etat te kathitam rudra viṣṇoḥ arcanam uttamam
rahasyam paramam guhyam bhukti mukti pradam param
etat yaḥ ca paṭhet vidvān viṣṇu bhaktaḥ pumān hara
śṛṇuyāt śrāvayet vā api viṣṇu lokam sa gacchati

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe viṣṇupūjāvidhirnāmaikatriṃśodhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe viṣṇupūjāvidhiḥ nāma ekatriṃśaḥ adhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
maheśvaraḥ uvāca
pañcatattva arcanam brūhi śaṅkha cakra gadā dhara

original: yena vijñānamātreṇa naro yāti paraṃ padam // GarP_1,32.1 //
analyzed: yena vijñāna mātreṇa naraḥ yāti param padam
hariḥ uvāca
pañcatattva arcanam vakṣye tava śaṅkara suvrata

original: maṅgalyaṃ maṅgalaṃ divyaṃ rahasyaṃ kāmadaṃ param // GarP_1,32.2 //
analyzed: maṅgalyam maṅgalam divyam rahasyam kāma dam param
tat śṛṇuṣva mahādeva pavitram kali nāśanam

original: eka evāvyayaḥ śāntaḥ paramātmā sanātanaḥ // GarP_1,32.3 //
analyzed: ekaḥ eva avyayaḥ śāntaḥ paramātmā sanātanaḥ

original: sa eva māyāyā deva pañcadhā saṃsthito hariḥ // GarP_1,32.4 //
analyzed: saḥ eva māyāyāḥ deva pañcadhā saṃsthitaḥ hariḥ
vāsudeva sva rūpeṇa tathā saṅkarṣaṇena ca
tathā pradyumna rūpeṇa aniruddha ākhyena ca sthitaḥ
nārāyaṇa sva rūpeṇa pañcadhā hi advayaḥ sthitaḥ
eteṣām vācakān mantrān etān śṛṇu vṛṣadhvaja
om aṃ vāsudevāya namaḥ
om āṃ saṃkarṣaṇāya namaḥ
om aṃ pradyumnāya namaḥ
om aniruddhāya namaḥ
om om nārāyaṇāya namaḥ
pañca mantrāḥ samākhyātāḥ devānām vācakāḥ tava
sarva pāpa harāḥ puṇyāḥ sarva roga vināśanāḥ
adhunā saṃpravakṣyāmi pañcatattva arcanam śubham

original: vidhinā yena kartavyaṃ yairvā mantraiśca śaṅkara / // GarP_1,32.9 //
analyzed: vidhinā yena kartavyam yaiḥ vā mantraiḥ ca śaṅkara

original: ādau snānaṃ prakurvīta snātvā sandhyāṃ samācaret /
analyzed: ādau snānam prakurvīta snātvā sandhyām samācaret
arcana āgāram āsādya prakṣālya ārṅghya ādikam tathā
ācamya upaviśet prājñaḥ baddha āsanam abhīpsitam

original: śoṣaṇādi tataḥ kuryād aṃ kṣaiṃ ramiti mantrakaiḥ // GarP_1,32.11 //
analyzed: śoṣaṇa ādi tatas kuryāt aṃ   raṃ iti mantrakaiḥ
sāmānyam kaṭhinīkṛtya ca aṇḍam utpādayet tatas
vibhidya aṇḍam tatas hi aṇḍe bhāvayet parameśvaram
vāsudevam jagannātham pītakauśeyavāsasam
sahasra āditya saṅkāśam sphurat makara kuṇḍalam

original: ātmano hṛdi padme tu dhyāyettu parameśvaram /
analyzed: ātmanaḥ hṛdi padme tu dhyāyet tu parameśvaram
tatas saṃkarṣaṇam devam ātmānam cintayet prabhum
pradyumnam aniruddham ca śrīmat nārāyaṇam tatas
indra ādīn ca surān tasmāt devadevāt samutthitān
cintayet ca tatas nyāsam kārayoḥ dvayoḥ

original: vyāpakaṃ mūlamantreṇa cāṅganyāsaṃ tataḥ param // GarP_1,32.16 //
analyzed: vyāpakam mūlamantreṇa ca aṅganyāsam tatas param
aṅgamantraiḥ mahādeva
tān mantrān śṛṇu suvrata

analyzed: pūjā ca eva prakartavyā maṇḍale svastika ādike
om padmāya namaḥ

original: aṅganyāsaṃ ca kṛtvā tu mudrāḥ sarvāḥ pradaśayat /
analyzed: aṅganyāsam ca kṛtvā tu mudrāḥ sarvāḥ

original: ātmānaṃ vāsudevaṃ ca dhyātvā caiva pareśvaram // GarP_1,32.20 //
analyzed: ātmānam vāsudevam ca dhyātvā ca eva para īśvaram
āsanam pūjayet paścāt āvāhya vidhivat naraḥ

original: dvāre dhāturvidhātuśca pūjā kāryā vṛṣadhvaja // GarP_1,32.21 //
analyzed: dvāre dhātuḥ vidhātuḥ ca pūjā kāryā vṛṣadhvaja
garuḍam pūjayet agre vāsudevasya śaṅkara
śaṅkha ādi padma paryantam madhya deśe prapūjayet
dharmam jñānam ca vairāgyam aiśvaryam pūrva deśataḥ
āgneya ādiṣu arcayet vai adharma ādi catuṣṭayam
maṇḍala traya madhye tu kīrtitā hi asana sthitiḥ
pūrva ādi padma patreṣu pūjyāḥ saṃkarṣaṇa ādayaḥ
karṇikāyām vāsudevam pūjayet parameśvaram
pāñcajanya ādayaḥ pūjyāḥ aiśānī ādiṣu saṃsthitāḥ
śaktayaḥ ca eva pūrva ādau devadevasya śaṅkara

original: indrādayo lokapālāḥ pūjyāḥ pūrvādiṣu sthitāḥ // GarP_1,32.26 //
analyzed: indra ādayaḥ lokapālāḥ pūjyāḥ pūrva ādiṣu sthitāḥ

original: adho nāga tadūddhva tu brahmāṇaṃ pūjayetsudhīḥ /
analyzed: adhas nāga tu brahmāṇam pūjayet sudhīḥ

original: iti sthānakramo jñeyo maṇḍale śaṅkara tvayā // GarP_1,32.27 //
analyzed: iti sthāna kramaḥ jñeyaḥ maṇḍale śaṅkara tvayā

original: āvāhya maṇḍale devaṃ kṛtvā nyāsaṃ tu tasya ca /
analyzed: āvāhya maṇḍale devam kṛtvā nyāsam tu tasya ca
mudrām pradarśya pādya dīn dadyāt mūlena śaṅkara

original: snānaṃ vastraṃ tathācāmaṃ gandhaṃ puṣpaṃ ca dhūpakam /
analyzed: snānam vastram tathā ācāmam gandham puṣpam ca dhūpakam
dīpam naivedyam ācāmam namaskāram pradakṣiṇam

original: kuryācchaṅkara mūlena japaṃ cāpi samarpayet // GarP_1,32.29 //
analyzed: kuryāt śaṅkara mūlena japam ca api samarpayet
stotram japet paścāt vāsudevam anusmaran

original: oṃ namo vāsudevāya namaḥ sakarṣaṇāya ca // GarP_1,32.30 //
analyzed: om namaḥ vāsudevāya namaḥ sakarṣaṇāya ca
pradyumnāya ādidevāya aniruddhāya namaḥ namaḥ

original: namo nārāyaṇāyaiva narāyaṇāṃ pataye namaḥ // GarP_1,32.31 //
analyzed: namaḥ nārāyaṇāya eva pataye namaḥ
nara pūjyāya kīrtyāya stutyāya vara dāya ca
an ādi nidhanāya eva purāṇāya namaḥ namaḥ
sṛṣṭi saṃhāra kartre ca brahmaṇaḥ pataye namaḥ

original: mano vai vedavedyāya śaṅkhacakradharāya ca // GarP_1,32.33 //
analyzed: manaḥ vai veda vedyāya śaṅkha cakra dharāya ca
kali kalmaṣa hartre ca sureśāya namaḥ namaḥ
saṃkāra vṛkṣa chetre ca māyā bhetre namaḥ namaḥ
vahu rūpāya tīrthāya triguṇāya aguṇāya ca
mokṣa dāya namaḥ namaḥ
mokṣadvārāya dharmāya nirmāṇāya namaḥ namaḥ
sarva kāma pradāya eva para brahma svarūpiṇe
saṃsāra sāgare ghore nimagnam mām samuddhara

original: tvadanyo nāsti deveśa nāsti trātā jagatprabho // GarP_1,32.37 //
analyzed: tvad anyaḥ nā asti deveśa nā asti trātā jagatprabho

original: tvāmava sarvagaṃ viṣṇuṃ gato 'haṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
analyzed: tvām ava sarvagam viṣṇum gataḥ ham śaraṇam gataḥ
jñāna dīpa pradānena tamaḥ muktam prakāśaya
evam stuvīta deveśam sarva kleśa vināśanam

original: anyaiścavādakeḥ stātraiḥ stutvā vai nīlalohita // GarP_1,32.39 //
analyzed: stātraiḥ stutvā vai nīlalohita
pañcatattva samāyuktam dhyāyot viṣṇum naraḥ hṛdi
devam iti pūjā prakīrtitā
sarva kāma pradā śreṣṭhā vāsudevasya śaṅkara
etad pūjana mātreṇa kṛtakṛtyaḥ bhavet naraḥ

original: idaṃ ca yaḥ paṭhedrudra pañcatattvārcanaṃ naraḥ /
analyzed: idam ca yaḥ paṭhet rudra pañcatattva arcanam naraḥ
śṛṇuyāt śravāyet vā api viṣṇu lokam sa gacchati

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe pañcatattvā(viṣṇavar)
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe
ca navidhiḥ nāma dvātriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
rudraḥ uvāca
sudarśanasya pūjām me vada śaṅkha gadā dhara

original: graharogādikaṃ sarvaṃ yatkṛtvā nāśameti vai // GarP_1,33.1 //
analyzed: graha roga ādikam sarvam yat kṛtvā nāśam eti vai
hariḥ uvāca
sudarśanasya cakrasya śṛṇu pūjām vṛṣadhvaja

original: snānamādau prakurvīta pūjayecca hariṃ tata // GarP_1,33.2 //
analyzed: snānam ādau prakurvīta pūjayet ca harim tata
mūlamantreṇa vai nyāsam mūlamantram śṛṇuṣva ca

original: sahasrāraṃ huṃ phaṭ namo mantraḥ praṇavapūrvakaḥ // GarP_1,33.3 //
analyzed: sahasrāram hum phaṭ namaḥ mantraḥ praṇava pūrvakaḥ
kathitaḥ sarva duṣṭānām nāśakaḥ mantra bhedakaḥ

original: dhyāyetmudarśanaṃ devaṃ hṛdi padme 'male śubhe // GarP_1,33.4 //
analyzed: dhyāyet mudarśanam devam hṛdi padme male śubhe
śaṅka cakra gadā padma dharam saumyam kirīṭinam

original: āvāhya maṇḍale devaṃ pūrvoktavidhinā hara // GarP_1,33.5 //
analyzed: āvāhya maṇḍale devam pūrva ukta vidhinā hara
pūjayet randha puṣpa ādyaiḥ upacāraiḥ maheśvara
pūjayitvā japet mantram śatam aṣṭa uttaram naraḥ
evam yaḥ kurute rudra
cakrasya arcanam uttamam
sarva roga vinirmuktaḥ viṣṇu lokam samāpnuyāt
etat stotram japet paścāt sarva vyādhi vināśanam
namaḥ sudarśanāya eva sahasra āditya varcase
jvālā mālā pradīptāya sahasra ārāya cakṣuṣe
sarva duṣṭa vināśāya sarva pātaka mardine
su cakrāya vicakrāya sarva mantra vibhedine
prasavitre jagat dhātre jagat vidhvaṃsine namaḥ
pālana arthāya lokānām duṣṭa asura vināśine

original: ugrāya caiva saumyāya caṇḍāya ca namonamaḥ // GarP_1,33.11 //
analyzed: ugrāya ca eva saumyāya caṇḍāya ca namaḥ namaḥ
namaḥ cakṣuḥ kva rūpāya saṃsāra bhaya bhedine

original: māyāpañjarabhetre ca śivāya ca namonamaḥ // GarP_1,33.12 //
analyzed: māyā pañjara bhetre ca śivāya ca namaḥ namaḥ
graha ati graha rūpāya grahāṇām pateya namaḥ

original: kālāya mṛtyave caiva bhīmāya ca namonamaḥ // GarP_1,33.13 //
analyzed: kālāya mṛtyave ca eva bhīmāya ca namaḥ namaḥ
bhakta anugraha dātre ca bhakta goptre namaḥ namaḥ

original: viṣṇurūpāya śāntāya cāyudhānāṃ dharāya ca // GarP_1,33.14 //
analyzed: viṣṇu rūpāya śāntāya ca āyudhānām dharāya ca
viṣṇu śastrāya cakrāya namaḥ bhūyas namaḥ namaḥ

original: iti stotraṃ mahāpuṇyaṃ cakrasya tava kīrtitam // GarP_1,33.15 //
analyzed: iti stotram mahā puṇyam cakrasya tava kīrtitam

original: yaḥ paṭhetparayā bhaktyā viṣṇulokaṃ sa gacchati /
analyzed: yaḥ paṭhet parayā bhaktyā viṣṇu lokam sa gacchati
cakra pūjā vidhim yaḥ ca paṭhet rudra jita undriyaḥ

original: sa pāpaṃ bhasmasātkṛtvā viṣṇulokāya kalpate // GarP_1,33.16 //
analyzed: sa pāpam bhasmasātkṛtvā viṣṇu lokāya kalpate

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe sudarśanapūjāvidhirnāma trayastriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe sudarśanapūjāvidhiḥ nāma trayastriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
rudraḥ uvāca
punar deva arcanam brūhi hṛṣīkeśa gadādhara

original: śṛṇvato nāsti tṛptirme gadatastava pūjanam // GarP_1,34.1 //
analyzed: śṛṇvataḥ nā asti tṛptiḥ me gadataḥ tava pūjanam
hariḥ uvāca
hayagrīvasya devasya pūjanam kathayāmi te

original: tacchṛṇuṣva jagannātho yena viṣṇuḥ pratuṣyati // GarP_1,34.2 //
analyzed: tat śṛṇuṣva jagannāthaḥ yena viṣṇuḥ pratuṣyati
mūlamantram mahādeva hayagrīvasya vācakam

original: pravakṣyāmi paraṃ puṇyaṃ tadādau śṛṇu śaṅkara // GarP_1,34.3 //
analyzed: pravakṣyāmi param puṇyam tat ādau śṛṇu śaṅkara

original: oṃ saiṃ kṣaiṃ śirase namaḥ iti praṇavasaṃyutaḥ /
analyzed: om saiṃ   śirase namaḥ iti praṇava saṃyutaḥ
ayam nava akṣaraḥ mantraḥ sarva vidyā pradāyakaḥ
asya aṅgāni mahādeva tān śṛṇuṣva vṛṣadhvaja
om kṣāṃ hṛdayāya namaḥ

original: oṃ kṣīṃ śirase svāhāśiraḥ proktaṃ kṣūṃ vaṣaṭ tathā // GarP_1,34.5 //
analyzed: om   śirase svāhā śiraḥ proktam   vaṣaṭ tathā

original: oṃ kārayuktā devasya śikhā jñeyā vṛṣadhvaja /
analyzed: om kāra yuktā devasya śikhā jñeyā vṛṣadhvaja

original: oṃ kṣaiṃ kavacāya huṃ vai kavacaṃ parikīrtitam // GarP_1,34.6 //
analyzed: om kṣaiṃ kavacāya hum vai kavacam parikīrtitam

original: oṃ kṣaiṃ netratrayāya vauṣaṭ netraṃ devasya kīrtitam /
analyzed: om   netratrayāya vauṣaṭ netram devasya kīrtitam

original: oṃ haḥ astrāya phaṭ astraṃ devasya kīrtitam // GarP_1,34.7 //
analyzed: om haḥ astrāya phaṭ astram devasya kīrtitam

original: pūjāvidhiṃ pravakṣyāmi nanme nigadataḥ śṛṇu ādau snātvā tathācamya tato yāgagṛhaṃ vrajet // GarP_1,34.8 //
analyzed: pūjā vidhim pravakṣyāmi nat me nigadataḥ śṛṇu ādau snātvā tathā ācamya tatas yāga gṛham vrajet
tatas praviśya vidhivat śoṣaṇa ādikam

original: yaṃ kṣaiṃ ramiti bījaiśca kaṭhinīkṛtya lamiti // GarP_1,34.9 //
analyzed: yaṃ kṣaiṃ ram iti bījaiḥ ca kaṭhinīkṛtya lam iti

original: aṇḍamutpādya ca tataḥ oṃ kāreṇaiva bhedayet /
analyzed: aṇḍam utpādya ca tatas om kāreṇa eva bhedayet
aṇḍa madhye hayagrīvam ātmānam paricintayet
śaṅkha kunda indu dhavalam mṛṇāla rajata prabham
go kṣīra sadṛśam tadvat sūrya koṭi samagra bham

original: śaṅkhaṃ cakraṃ gadāṃ padmaṃ dhārayantaṃ caturbhujam // GarP_1,34.11 //
analyzed: śaṅkham cakram gadām padmam dhārayantam caturbhujam
kirīṭinam kuṇḍalinam vanamālā samaṃnvitam

original: sucakraṃ sukapolaṃ ca ṣītāmbaradharaṃ vibhum // GarP_1,34.12 //
analyzed: su cakram su kapolam ca ṣīta ambara dharam vibhum
bhāvayitvā mahātmānam sarva devaiḥ samanvitam

original: aṅgamantraistato nyāsaṃ mūlamantreṇa vai tathā // GarP_1,34.13 //
analyzed: aṅgamantraiḥ tatas nyāsam mūlamantreṇa vai tathā
tatas ca darśayet mudrām śaṅkhapadma ādikām śubhām
dhyāyet dhyātvā arcayet viṣṇum mūlamantreṇa śaṅkara
tatas ca āvāhayet rudra devatāḥ āsanasya yāḥ

original: oṃ hayagrīvāsanasya āgacchata ca devatāḥ // GarP_1,34.15 //
analyzed: om hayagrīva āsanasya āgacchata ca devatāḥ
āvāhya maṇḍale tāḥ tu pūjayet svastika ādike

original: dvāre dhāturvidhātuśca pūjā kāryā vṛṣadhvaja // GarP_1,34.16 //
analyzed: dvāre dhātuḥ vidhātuḥ ca pūjā kāryā vṛṣadhvaja
samasta parivārāya acyutāya namaḥ iti

original: asya madhyer'canaṃ kāryaṃ dvāre gaṅgāñca pūjayet // GarP_1,34.17 //
analyzed: asya madhya īrcanam kāryam dvāre gaṅgām ca pūjayet
yamunām ca mahā devīm śaṅkha padma nidhī tathā

original: garuḍaṃ pūjayedagre madhye śaktiñca pūjayet // GarP_1,34.18 //
analyzed: garuḍam pūjayet agre madhye śaktiñca pūjayet
ādhāra ākhyām mahādeva tatas kūrmam samarcayet
anantam pṛthivīm paścāt dharma jñānenau
cayet
vairāgyam atha ca aiśvaryam āgneya ādiṣu pūjayet
adharma ajñāna avairāgya anaiśrargya ādīn tu pūrvatas
sattvam rajaḥ tamaḥ ca eva madhyadeśe pūjayet

original: kandaṃ nālaṃ ca padmaṃ ca madhye caiva prapūjayet // GarP_1,34.21 //
analyzed: kandam nālam ca padmam ca madhye ca eva prapūjayet
arka soma agni saṃjñānām maṇḍalānām hi pūjanam
madhyadeśe prakartavyam iti rudra prakīrtitam

original: prahvī satyā tatheśānānugrahau śaktayo hyamūḥ // GarP_1,34.23 //
analyzed: prahvī satyā tathā īśānā anugrahau śaktayaḥ hi amūḥ
pūrva ādiṣu ca patreṣu pūjyāḥ ca vimalā ādayaḥ
anugrahā karṇikāyām pūjyā śreyaḥ rthibhiḥ naraiḥ
praṇava ādyaiḥ namaḥ ntaiḥ ca caturthī antaiḥ ca nāmabhiḥ
mantraiḥ ebhiḥ mahādevaḥ āsanam paripūjayet
snāna gandha pradānena puṣpa dhūpa pradānataḥ
dīpa naivedya dānena āsanasya arcanam śubham

original: kartavyaṃ vidhinānena iti te hara kīrtitam /
analyzed: kartavyam vidhinā anena iti te hara kīrtitam
tatas ca āvāhayet devam hayagrīvam sureśvaram
vāma nāsā puṭena eva āgacchantam vicintayet
āgacchataḥ prayogeṇa mūlamantreṇa śaṅkara
āvāhanam prakartavyam devadevasya śaṅkhinaḥ
āvāhya maṇḍale tasya nyāsam kuryāt atandritaḥ
nyāsam kṛtvā ca tatrastham cintayet parameśvaram
hayagrīvam mahādevam sura asura namaskṛtam
indra ādi lokapālaiḥ ca saṃyuktam viṣṇum avyayam
pradarśayet mudrāḥ śaṅkha cakra ādikāḥ śubhāḥ
pādya arghya ācamanīyāni tatas dadyāt ca viṣṇave
snāpayet ca tatas devam padmanābham anāmayam
devam saṃsthāpya vidhivat vastram dadyāt vṛṣadhvaja

original: tato hyācamanaṃ dadyādupavītaṃ tataḥ śubham // GarP_1,34.33 //
analyzed: tatas hi ācamanam dadyāt upavītam tatas śubham
tatas ca maṇḍale rudra dhyāyet devam para īśvaram

original: dhyātvā pādyādikaṃ bhūyo dadyāddevāya śaṅkara // GarP_1,34.34 //
analyzed: dhyātvā pādya ādikam bhūyas dadyāt devāya śaṅkara
dadyāt bhairava devāya mūlamantreṇa śaṅkara

original: oṃ kṣāṃ hṛdayāya namaḥ anena hṛdayaṃ yajet // GarP_1,34.35 //
analyzed: om kṣāṃ hṛdayāya namaḥ anena hṛdayam yajet

original: oṃ kṣīṃ śirase namaśca śirasaḥ pūjanaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: om kṣīṃ śirase namaḥ ca śirasaḥ pūjanam bhavet

original: oṃ kṣūṃ śikhāyai namaśca śikhāmetena pūjayet // GarP_1,34.36 //
analyzed: om kṣūṃ śikhāyai namaḥ ca śikhām etena pūjayet

original: oṃ kṣaiṃ kavacāya namaḥ kavacaṃ paripūjayet /
analyzed: om kṣaiṃ kavacāya namaḥ kavacam paripūjayet

original: oṃ kṣaiṃ netrāya namaśca netraṃ cānena pūjayet // GarP_1,34.37 //
analyzed: om kṣaiṃ netrāya namaḥ ca netram ca anena pūjayet

original: oṃ kṣaḥ astrāya nama iti astraṃ cānena pūjayet /
analyzed: om kṣaḥ astrāya namaḥ iti astram ca anena pūjayet

original: hṛdayaṃ ca śiraścaiva śikhāṃ ca kavacaṃ tathā // GarP_1,34.38 //
analyzed: hṛdayam ca śiraḥ ca eva śikhām ca kavacam tathā
pūrva ādiṣu pradeśeṣu hi etāḥ tu paripūjayet

original: koṇeṣvastraṃ yajedrudra netraṃ madhyai prapūjayet // GarP_1,34.39 //
analyzed: koṇeṣu astram yajet rudra netram madhyai prapūjayet
pūjayet paramām devīm lakṣmīm lakṣmī pradām śubhām

original: śaṅkhaṃ padmaṃ tathā cakraṃ gadāṃ pūrvāditor'cayet // GarP_1,34.40 //
analyzed: śaṅkham padmam tathā cakram gadām pūrva āditas urcayet

original: khaḍgaṃ ca musalaṃ pāśamaṅkuśaṃ saśaraṃ dhanuḥ /
analyzed: khaḍgam ca musalam pāśam aṅkuśam sa śaram dhanuḥ
pūjayet pūrvatas rudraḥ ebhiḥ mantraiḥ sva nāmakaiḥ

original: śrīvatsaṃ kaustubhaṃ mālāṃ tathā pītāmbaraṃ śubham /
analyzed: śrīvatsam kaustubham mālām tathā pīta ambaram śubham
pūjayet pūrvatas rudra śaṅkha cakra gadā dharam

original: brahmāṇaṃ nāradaṃ siddhaṃ guruṃ paraguruṃ tathā /
analyzed: brahmāṇam nāradam siddham gurum para gurum tathā
guroḥ ca pāduke tadvat paramasya guroḥ tathā
indram sa vāhanam ca atha parivāra yutam tathā

original: agniṃ yamaṃ nirṛtiṃ ca varuṇaṃ vāyumeva ca // GarP_1,34.44 //
analyzed: agnim yamam nirṛtim ca varuṇam vāyum eva ca
somam īśānam evam vai brahmāṇam paripūjayet
pūrva ādika ūrdhva paryantam pūjayet vṛṣabhadhvaja

original: vajraṃ śaktiṃ tathā daṇḍaṃ khaṅgaṃ pāśaṃ dhvajaṃ gadām /
analyzed: vajram śaktim tathā daṇḍam khaṅgam pāśam dhvajam gadām

original: triśūlaṃ cakrapadme ca āyudhānyatha pūjayet // GarP_1,34.46 //
analyzed: triśūlam cakra padme ca āyudhāni atha pūjayet
viṣvaksenam tatas devam aiśānyām diśi pūjayet
ebhiḥ mantraiḥ namaḥ ntaiḥ ca praṇava ādyaiḥ vṛṣadhvaja
pūjā kāryā mahādeva hi anantasya vṛṣadhvaja

original: devasya mūlamantreṇa pūjā kāryā vṛṣadhvaja // GarP_1,34.48 //
analyzed: devasya mūlamantreṇa pūjā kāryā vṛṣadhvaja

original: gandhaṃ puṣpaṃ tathā dhūpaṃ dīpaṃ naivedyameva ca /
analyzed: gandham puṣpam tathā dhūpam dīpam naivedyam eva ca

original: pradakṣiṇaṃ namaskāraṃ japyaṃ tasmai samarpayet // GarP_1,34.49 //
analyzed: pradakṣiṇam namaskāram japyam tasmai samarpayet
stuvīta ca anyā stutyā praṇava ādyaiḥ vṛṣadhvaja

original: oṃ namo hayaśirase vidyādhyakṣāya vai namaḥ // GarP_1,34.50 //
analyzed: om namaḥ haya śirase vidyā adhyakṣāya vai namaḥ
namaḥ vidyā svarūpāya vidyā dātre namaḥ namaḥ

original: namaḥ śāntāya devāya triguṇāyātmane namaḥ // GarP_1,34.51 //
analyzed: namaḥ śāntāya devāya triguṇāya ātmane namaḥ
sura asura nihantre ca sarva duṣṭa vināśine
sarva loka adhipataye brahma rūpāya vai namaḥ
namaḥ ca īśvara vandyāya śaṅka cakra dhāraya ca

original: nama ādyāya dāntāya sarvasattvahitāya ca // GarP_1,34.53 //
analyzed: namaḥ ādyāya dāntāya sarva sattva hitāya ca
triguṇāya aguṇāya eva brahma viṣṇu svarūpiṇe

original: kartre hartre sureśāya sarvagāya namonamaḥ // GarP_1,34.54 //
analyzed: kartre hartre sureśāya sarvagāya namaḥ namaḥ
iti evam saṃstavam kṛtvā devadevam vicintayet
hṛd padme vimale rudra śaṅkha cakra gadā dharam
sūrya koṭi pratīkāśam sarva avayava sundaram
hayagrīvaḥ mahī īśa īśam paramātmānam avyayam

original: iti te kathitā pūjā hayagrīvasya śaṅkara /
analyzed: iti te kathitā pūjā hayagrīvasya śaṅkara

original: yaḥ paṭhetparayā bhaktyā sa gacchetparamaṃ padam // GarP_1,34.57 //
analyzed: yaḥ paṭhet parayā bhaktyā sa gacchet paramam padam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe hayagrīvapūjāvidhirnāma catustriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ

original: rakṣa māṃ nijabhūtebhyo valiṃ gṛhṇa namo 'stu te // GarP_1,38.16 //
