original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe durgājapapūjābalimantranirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭatriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe durgājapapūjābalimantranirūpaṇam nāma aṣṭatriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
rudraḥ uvāca
punar deva arcanam brūhi saṃkṣepeṇa janārdana
vāsudevaḥ uvāca

original: śṛṇu sūryasya rudra tvaṃ punarvakṣyāmi pūjanam /
analyzed: śṛṇu sūryasya rudra tvam punar vakṣyāmi pūjanam

original: oṃ uccaiḥ śravase namaḥ oṃ aruṇāya namaḥ /
analyzed: om uccais śravase namaḥ om aruṇāya namaḥ
om daṇḍine namaḥ
om piṅgalāya namaḥ

original: ete dvāre prapūjyā vai epirmantrairvṛṣadhvaja // GarP_1,39.2 //
analyzed: ete dvāre prapūjyāḥ vai epiḥ mantraiḥ vṛṣadhvaja
om aṃ prabhūtāya namaḥ
imam tu pūjayet madhye prabhūtāmala saṃjñakam
om aṃ vimalāya namaḥ
om aṃ sārāya namaḥ
om aṃ ādhārāya namaḥ
om aṃ parama mukhāya namaḥ
iti āgneya ādi koṇeṣu pūjyāḥ vai vimalā ādayaḥ
om padmāya namaḥ
om karṇikāyai namaḥ

original: maghye tu pūjayedrudra pūrvādiṣu tathaiva ca /
analyzed: maghye tu pūjayet rudra pūrva ādiṣu tathā eva ca
dīptā ādyāḥ pūjayet madhye pūjayet sarvatomukhīḥ
om vām rāṃ dīptāyai namaḥ
om vīṃ rīṃ sūkṣmāyai namaḥ
om vūṃ rūṃ bhadrāyai namaḥ
om vaiṃ raiṃ
jayāyai namaḥ
om vauṃ rauṃ
vibūtyai namaḥ
om vaṃ raṃ adhorāyai namaḥ
om vaṃ raṃ vaidyutāyai namaḥ
om vaḥ raḥ vijayāyai namaḥ
om ro sarvatomukhyai namaḥ
om arka āsanāya namaḥ
om hrāṃ sūrya mūrtaye namaḥ
etāḥ tu pūjayet madhye hrat mantrān śṛṇu śaṅkara

original: oṃ haṃ saṃ khaṃ khakholkāya krāṃ krīṃ saḥ svāhā sūryamūrtaye namaḥ /
analyzed: om haṃ sam khaṃ khakholkāya krāṃ krīṃ saḥ svāhā sūrya mūrtaye namaḥ
anena āvāhanam kuryāt sthāpanam sannidhāpanam
sanniropana mantreṇa sakalīkaraṇam tathā

original: mudrāyā darśanaṃ rudra mūlamantreṇa vā hara /
analyzed: mudrāyāḥ darśanam rudra mūlamantreṇa vā hara
tejaḥ rūpam rakta varṇam sita padma upari sthitam
eka cakra ratha ārūḍham dvi bāhum dhṛta paṅkajam

original: evaṃ dhyāyetsadā sūryaṃ mūlamantraṃ śṛṇuṣva ca /
analyzed: evam dhyāyet sadā sūryam mūlamantram śṛṇuṣva ca

original: oṃ hrāṃ hrīṃ saḥ sūryāya namaḥ // GarP_1,39.7 //
analyzed: om hrāṃ hrīṃ saḥ sūryāya namaḥ
vāra trayam padma mudrām bimba mudrām ca darśayet
om āṃ hṛdayāya namaḥ
om arkāya śirase svāhā

original: oṃ aḥ bhūrbhuvaḥ svaḥ jvālini śikhāyai vaṣaṭ /
analyzed: om aḥ bhūḥ bhuvaḥ svar jvālini śikhāyai vaṣaṭ
om hum kavacāya hum
om bhām netrābhyām vauṣaṭ
om vaḥ astrāya phaṭ iti
āgneyyām atha vaiśānyām nairṛtyām arcayet hara

original: tdṛyadayādi hi vāyavyāṃ netraṃ cāntaḥ prapūjayet // GarP_1,39.9 //
analyzed: hi vāyavyām netram ca antar prapūjayet
pūjayet rudra somam tu śveta varṇakam
dale pūrvā īrcayet rudra budham cāmīkara prabham
dakṣiṇe pūjayet rudra pati varṇam gurum yajet

original: paścime caiva bhūteśaṃ uttare bhārgavaṃ sitam // GarP_1,39.11 //
analyzed: paścime ca eva bhūteśam uttare bhārgavam sitam
raktam aṅgārakam ca eva āgneye pūjayet hara

original: śanaiścaraṃ kṛṣṇavarṇaṃ nairṛtyāṃ diśi pūjayet // GarP_1,39.12 //
analyzed: śanaiścaram kṛṣṇa varṇam nairṛtyām diśi pūjayet
rāhum vāyavya deśe tu nandyāvarta nibhim hara

original: aiśānyāṃ dhūmravarṇaṃ tu ketuṃ saṃ paripūjayet // GarP_1,39.13 //
analyzed: aiśānyām dhūmra varṇam tu ketum sam paripūjayet
ebhiḥ mantraiḥ mahādeva tat śṛṇuṣva ca śaṅkara
om soṃ somāya namaḥ
om buṃ budhāya namaḥ
om bṛṃ bṛhaspataye namaḥ
om bhaṃ bhārgavāya namaḥ
om aṃ aṅgārakāya namaḥ
om śam śanaiścarāya namaḥ
om raṃ rāhave namaḥ

original: oṃ kaṃ ketave nama iti // GarP_1,39.15 //
analyzed: om kaṃ ketave namaḥ iti
pādya ādīn mūlamantreṇa dattvā sūryāya śaṅkara
naivedya ante dhenumudrām darśayet sādhaka uttamaḥ

original: japtvā cāṣṭasahasraṃ tu tacca tasmai samarpayet /
analyzed: japtvā ca aṣṭa sahasram tu tat ca tasmai samarpayet

original: aiśānyāṃ diśi bhūteśa tejaścaṇḍaṃ tu pūjayet // GarP_1,39.17 //
analyzed: aiśānyām diśi bhūteśa tejaḥ caṇḍam tu pūjayet

original: oṃ tejaścaṃṇḍāya huṃ phaṭ svadhā svāhā pauṣaṭ /
analyzed: om tejaścaṇḍāya hum phaṭ svadhā svāhā pauṣaṭ

original: nirmālyaṃ cārpayettasmai hyarghyaṃ dadyāttato hara // GarP_1,39.18 //
analyzed: nirmālyam ca arpayet tasmai hi arghyam dadyāt tatas hara
tila taṇḍula saṃyuktam raktacandana carcitam
gandha udakena saṃmiśram puṣpa dhūpa samanvitam
kṛtvā śirasi tat pātram jānubhyām avanim gataḥ

original: darghyaṃ tu sūryāya tdṛnmantreṇa vṛṣadhvaja // GarP_1,39.20 //
analyzed: darghyam tu sūryāya vṛṣadhvaja
gaṇam gurūn prapūjya atha sarvān devān an prapūjayet
om gaṃ gaṇapataye namaḥ
om aṃ gurubhyaḥ namaḥ

original: sūryasya kathitā pūjā kṛtvaitāṃ viṣṇulokabhāk // GarP_1,39.22 //
analyzed: sūryasya kathitā pūjā kṛtvā etām viṣṇu loka bhāj

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe sūryārcanaprakāro nāmaikonacatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe sūryārcanaprakāraḥ nāma ekonacatvāriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
śaṅkaraḥ uvāca

analyzed: yām jñātvā mānavāḥ siddhim gacchanti parameśvara

āvāhanam sthāpanam sannidhānam ca śaṅkara
sannirodham tathā kuryāt sakalīkaraṇam tathā

original: tattvanyāsaṃ ca mudrāyā darśanaṃ dyānameva ca /
analyzed: tattva nyāsam ca mudrāyāḥ darśanam ca
pādyam ācamanam hi arghyam puṣpāṇi abhyaṅga dānakam
tatas udvartanam snānam su gandham ca anulepanam

original: vastrālaṃ kārabhogāṃśca hyaṅganyāsaṃ ca dhūpakam // GarP_1,40.16 //
analyzed: vastra alam kāra bhogān ca hi aṅganyāsam ca dhūpakam
dīpam naivedya dānam ca hasta udvartanam eva ca
pādya arghya ācamanam gandham tāmbūlam gīta vādanam

original: nṛtyaṃ chatrā dikaraṇaṃ mudrāṇāṃ darśanaṃ tatā /
analyzed: nṛtyam chatrāḥ ādi karaṇam mudrāṇām darśanam

original: rūpaṃ dhyānaṃ japañcātha ekavadbhāva eva ca // GarP_1,40.18 //
analyzed: rūpam dhyānam japan ca atha eka vat bhāvaḥ eva ca
mūlamantreṇa vai kuryāt japa pūjā samarpaṇam

original: māheśī kathitā pūjā rudra pāpavināsinī // GarP_1,40.19 //
analyzed: māheśī kathitā pūjā rudra pāpa vināsinī

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe maheśvarapūjāvidhirnāma catvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe maheśvarapūjāvidhiḥ nāma catvāriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
vāsudevaḥ uvāca

original: oṃ viśvāvasurnāma gandharvaḥ kanyānāmadhipatirlabhāmi te kanyāṃ samutpādya tasmai viśvavāsave svāhā /
analyzed: om viśvāvasuḥ nāma gandharvaḥ kanyānām adhipatiḥ labhāmi te kanyām samutpādya tasmai viśva vāsave svāhā
strī lābhaḥ mantra jāpyāt ca kālarātrim vadāmi aham

original: oṃ namo bhagavati ṛkṣakarṇi caturbhuje ūrdhvakeśi trinayane kālarātri mānuṣāṇāṃ vasārudhirabhojane
analyzed: om namaḥ bhagavati ṛkṣa karṇi catur bhuje ūrdhva keśi tri nayane kālarātri mānuṣāṇām vasā rudhira bhojane

original: amukasya prāptakālasya mṛtyuprade huṃ phaṭ hanahana dahadaha māṃsarudhiraṃ pacapaca ṛkṣapatni svāhā /
analyzed: amukasya prāpta kālasya mṛtyu prade hum phaṭ hana hana daha daha māṃsa rudhiram paca paca ṛkṣa patni svāhā

original: na tithirna ca nakṣatraṃ nopavāso vidhīyate // GarP_1,41.2 //
analyzed: na tithiḥ na ca nakṣatram na upavāsaḥ vidhīyate

original: kruddho raktena saṃmārjya karau tābhyāṃ pragṛhya ca /
analyzed: kruddhaḥ raktena saṃmārjya karau tābhyām pragṛhya ca
pradoṣe saṃjapet liṅgam āma pātram ca mārayet

original: oṃ namaḥ sarvatoyantrāṇyetadyathā jambhani mohani sarvaśatruvidāriṇi rakṣarakṣa māmamukaṃ sarvabhayopadravebhyaḥ svāhā /
analyzed: om namaḥ sarvatas yantrāṇi etat yathā jambhani mohani sarva śatru vidāriṇi rakṣa rakṣa mām amukam sarva bhaya upadravebhyaḥ svāhā

original: śukre naṣṭe mahādeva vakṣye 'haṃ dvijapādiha // GarP_1,41.3 //
analyzed: śukre naṣṭe mahādeva vakṣye haṃ dvi japāt iha

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vaśyādisādhikamantranirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikacatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe vaśyādisādhikamantranirūpaṇam nāma ekacatvāriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
hariḥ uvāca

original: ācāryaḥ sādhakaḥ kuryātputrakaḥ samayī hara // GarP_1,42.1 //
analyzed: ācāryaḥ sādhakaḥ kuryāt putrakaḥ samayī hara
saṃvatsara kṛtām pūjām vighneśaḥ harate nyathā

original: āṣāḍhe śrāvaṇe māghe kuryādbhādrapade 'pi vā // GarP_1,42.2 //
analyzed: āṣāḍhe śrāvaṇe māghe kuryāt bhādrapade vā
sauvarṇa raupya tāmram ca sūtram kārpāsikam kramāt

original: jñeyaṃ kujādau saṃgrāhyaṃ kanyayā kartitaṃ ca yat // GarP_1,42.3 //
analyzed: jñeyam kuja ādau saṃgrāhyam kanyayā kartitam ca yat
triguṇam triguṇīkṛtya tatas kuryāt pavitrakam
granthayaḥ vāmadevena satyena kṣālayet śiva
aghoreṇa tu saṃśodhya baddhaḥ tatpuruṣāt bhavet
dhūpayet īśamantreṇa tantudevāḥ iti me smṛtāḥ
om kāraḥ candramāḥ vahniḥ brahnā nāgaḥ śikhidhvajaḥ

original: ravirviṣṇuḥ śivaḥ proktaḥ kramāttantuṣu devatāḥ // GarP_1,42.6 //
analyzed: raviḥ viṣṇuḥ śivaḥ proktaḥ kramāt tantuṣu devatāḥ
aṣṭottaraśatam kuryāt pañcāśat pañcaviṃśatim

original: rudro 'ttamādi vijñeyaṃ mānaṃ ca granthayo daśa // GarP_1,42.7 //
analyzed: vijñeyam mānam ca granthayaḥ daśa
catur aṅgula antarāḥ syuḥ granthi nāmāni ca kramāt

original: prakṛtiḥ pauruṣī vīrā caturtho cāparājitā // GarP_1,42.8 //
analyzed: prakṛtiḥ pauruṣī vīrā ca aparājitā

original: jayā ca vijayā rudrā ajitā ca sadāśivā /
analyzed: jayā ca vijayā rudrā ajitā ca sadāśivā
rañjayet kuṅkuma ādyaiḥ tu kuryāt randhaiḥ pavitrakam

original: saptamyāṃ vā trayodaśyāṃ śuklapakṣe tathetare // GarP_1,42.10 //
analyzed: saptamyām vā trayodaśyām śukla pakṣe tathā itare
kṣīra ādibhiḥ ca saṃsnāpya liṅgam gandha ādibhiḥ yajet

original: dadyādrandhapavitraṃ tu ātmane brahmaṇe hara // GarP_1,42.11 //
analyzed: dadyāt randha pavitram tu ātmane brahmaṇe hara
puṣpam gandha yutam dadyāt mūlena īśāna gocare

original: pūrve ca daṇḍakāṣṭhaṃ tu uttare cāmalakīphalam // GarP_1,42.12 //
analyzed: pūrve ca daṇḍa kāṣṭham tu uttare ca āmalakī phalam
mṛttikām paścime dadyāt dakṣiṇe bhasma bhūtayaḥ
dadyāt śikhāmantreṇa mantra vid
vāyavyām sarṣapam dadyāt kavacena vṛṣadhvaja
gṛham saṃveṣṭya sūtreṇa dadyāt randha pavitrakam

original: homaṃ kṛtvā gneya dattvā dadyādbhūtabaliṃ tathā /
analyzed: homam kṛtvā gneya dattvā dadyāt bhūta balim tathā

original: āmantrito 'si deveśa gaṇaiḥ sārdhaṃ maheśvara // GarP_1,42.15 //
analyzed: āmantritaḥ si deveśa gaṇaiḥ sārdham maheśvara

original: nimantryānena tiṣṭhettu kurvan gītādikaṃ niśi // GarP_1,42.16 //
analyzed: nimantrya anena tiṣṭhet tu kurvan gīta ādikam niśi

original: snātvādityaṃ caturdaśyāṃ prāgrudraṃ ca prapūjayet // GarP_1,42.17 //
analyzed: snātvā ādityam caturdaśyām prāk rudram ca prapūjayet

saṃhitā mantritāni eva dhūpitāni samarpayet
śiva tattva ātmakam ca ādau vidyā tattva ātmakam tatas

om hauṃ hauṃ śivatattvāya namaḥ
om hīṃhīḥ vidyā tattvāya namaḥ
om hāṃ hauḥ ātma tattvāya namaḥ

original: oṃ hāṃ hīṃ hūṃ kṣaiṃ sarvatattvāya namaḥ /
analyzed: om hāṃ hīṃ     sarva tattvāya namaḥ

original: kālātmanā tvayā deva yaddṛṣṭaṃ māmake vidhau // GarP_1,42.21 //
analyzed: kāla ātmanā tvayā deva yat dṛṣṭam māmake vidhau

original: kṛtaṃ kliṣṭaṃ samutsṛṣṭaṃ hutaṃ gupta ca yatkṛtam /
analyzed: kṛtam kliṣṭam samutsṛṣṭam hutam ca yat kṛtam
sarva ātmanā ātmanā śambho pavitreṇa tvad icchayā

original: pūrayapūraya makhavrataṃ tanniyameśvarāya sarvatattvātmakāya sarvakāraṇapālitāya oṃ hāṃ hīṃ hūṃ haiṃ hauṃ śivāya namaḥ // GarP_1,42.23 //
analyzed: pūraya pūraya makha vratam tat niyama īśvarāya sarva tattva ātmakāya sarva kāraṇa pālitāya om hāṃ hīṃ hūm haiṃ haum śivāya namaḥ
pūrvaiḥ anena yaḥ dadyāt pavitrāṇām catuṣṭayam
dattvā vahneḥ vare

analyzed: pavitram ca gurave dakṣiṇām diśet

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe śivapavitrāropaṇaṃ nāma dvicatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ

hariḥ uvāca

analyzed: purā devāsure yuddhe brahma ādyāḥ śaraṇam yayuḥ

original: viṣṇuśca teṣāṃ devānāṃ dhvajaṃ graiveyakaṃ dadau /

etau dṛṣṭvā vinaṅkṣyanti dānavān abravīt hariḥ

original: vṛṇīta ca vapitrākhyaṃ varaṃ cedaṃ vṛṣadhvaja // GarP_1,43.3 //

analyzed: iti ukte tena te devāḥ tad nāmnā tad varam viduḥ

original: prāvṛṭkāle tu ye martyā nārciṣyanti pavitrakaiḥ /
analyzed: prāvṛṣ kāle tu ye martyāḥ na arciṣyanti pavitrakaiḥ

original: teṣāṃ sāṃvatsarī pūjā viphalā ca bhaviṣyati // GarP_1,43.5 //
analyzed: teṣām sāṃvatsarī pūjā viphalā ca bhaviṣyati
tasmāt sarveṣu deveṣu pavitra āropaṇam kramāt

original: dvādaśyāṃ viṣṇave kāryaṃ śukle kṛṣṇe 'tha vā hara /
analyzed: dvādaśyām viṣṇave kāryam śukle kṛṣṇe vā hara
vyatīpāte yane ca eva candara sūrya grahe śiva
viṣṇave vṛddhi kārye ca guroḥ āgamane tathā

original: kauśeyaṃ paṭṭasūtraṃ vā kārpāsaṃ kṣaumameva vā /
analyzed: kauśeyam paṭṭasūtram vā kārpāsam kṣaumam eva vā
kuśa sūtra dvijānām syāt rājñā kauśeya paṭṭakam
vaiśyānām cīraṇam kṣaumam śūdrāṇām śaṇa valka jam

original: kārpāsaṃ padmajaṃ caiva sarveṣāṃ śastamīśvara // GarP_1,43.10 //
analyzed: kārpāsam padma jam ca eva sarveṣām śastam īśvara

original: oṃ kāro 'tha śivaḥ somo hyagnirbrahyā phaṇī raviḥ // GarP_1,43.11 //
analyzed: śivaḥ somaḥ hi agniḥ brahyā phaṇī raviḥ

original: brahmā viṣṇuśca rudraśca trisūtre devatāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,43.12 //
analyzed: brahmā viṣṇuḥ ca rudraḥ ca tri sūtre devatāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: sauvarṇe rājate tāmre vaiṇave mṛnmaye nyaset /
analyzed: sauvarṇe rājate tāmre vaiṇave mṛd maye nyaset

original: aṅguṣṭhena catuḥ ṣaṣṭiḥ śreṣṭhaṃ madhyaṃ tadardhataḥ // GarP_1,43.13 //
analyzed: aṅguṣṭhena catuḥ ṣaṣṭiḥ śreṣṭham madhyam tad ardhataḥ
tad ardhā tu kaniṣṭhā syāt sūtram aṣṭa uttaram śatam

original: uttamaṃ madhyamaṃ caiva kanyasaṃ pūrvavatkramāt // GarP_1,43.14 //
analyzed: uttamam madhyamam ca eva kanyasam pūrvavat kramāt
uttama uṃguṣṭha mānena madhyamaḥ madhyamena tu

original: kanyase ca kaniṣṭhena aṅgulyā granthayaḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,43.15 //
analyzed: kanyase ca kaniṣṭhena aṅgulyā granthayaḥ smṛtāḥ
vimāne sthaṇḍile ca eva etat sāmānya lakṣaṇam

original: śivoddhṛtaṃ pavitraṃ tu pratimāyāṃ ca kārayet // GarP_1,43.16 //
analyzed: śiva uddhṛtam pavitram tu pratimāyām ca kārayet
hṛd nābhiḥ ūru
rumāne ca jānubhyām avalambinī
aṣṭottarasahasreṇa catvāraḥ granthayaḥ smṛtāḥ
ṣaṭtriṃś viṃ
śat ca caturviśat dvādaśa granthayaḥ
uttama ādiṣu vijñeyāḥ parvabhiḥ vā pavitrakam
carcitam kuṅkumena eva haridrā candanena vā
sa upavāsaḥ pavitram tu pātra stham adhivāsayet
aśvattha patra puṭake aṣṭa dikṣu niveśitam

original: daṇḍakāṣṭhaṃ kuśāgraṃ ca pūrve saṅkarṣaṇena tu // GarP_1,43.20 //
analyzed: daṇḍa kāṣṭham kuśa agram ca pūrve saṅkarṣaṇena tu
pradyumnena tu dakṣiṇe
phala siddhi artham aniruddhena paścime
candanam nīla yuktam ca tila bhasma akṣatam tathā

original: āgneyādiṣu koṇeṣur śyādīnāṃ tu kramānnyaset // GarP_1,43.22 //
analyzed: āgneya ādiṣu koṇa iṣuḥ śyā ādīnām tu kramāt nyaset

original: dṛṣṭvā punaḥ prapūjyātha vastreṇācchādya yatnataḥ // GarP_1,43.23 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā punar prapūjya atha vastreṇa ācchādya yatnataḥ

original: paścime dakṣiṇe caiva uttare pūrvavatkramāt // GarP_1,43.24 //
analyzed: paścime dakṣiṇe ca eva uttare pūrvavat kramāt

original: astreṇa maṇḍalaṃ kṛtvā naivedyañca samarpayet // GarP_1,43.25 //
analyzed: astreṇa maṇḍalam kṛtvā naivedyam ca samarpayet

original: adhivāsya pavitraṃ tu trisūtreṇa navena vā (ca) /
analyzed: adhivāsya pavitram tu tri sūtreṇa navena vā ca

analyzed: vedikām veṣṭayitvā tu kalaśam ghṛtam

original: agnikuṇḍaṃ vimānaṃ ca maṇḍapaṃ gṛhameva ca /
analyzed: agni kuṇḍam vimānam ca maṇḍapam gṛham eva ca

original: sūtramekaṃ tu saṃgṛhya dadyāddevasya mṛrdhāni // GarP_1,43.27 //
analyzed: sūtram ekam tu saṃgṛhya dadyāt devasya
dattvā paṭhet imam mantram pūjayitvā maheśvaram
āvāhitaḥ si deveśa pūjā artham parameśvara
tat prabhātā īrcayiṣyāmi sāmagyāḥ sannidhau bhava

original: ekarātraṃ trirātraṃ vā adhivāsya pavitrakam // GarP_1,43.29 //
analyzed: eka rātram tri rātram vā adhivāsya pavitrakam

original: rātrau jāgaraṇaṃ kṛtvā prātaḥ saṃpūjya keśavam /
analyzed: rātrau jāgaraṇam kṛtvā prātar saṃpūjya keśavam
āropayet krameṇa eva jyeṣṭha madhya kanīyasam
dhūpayitvā pavitram tu mantreṇa eva abhimantrayet
prajapta granthikam ca eva pūjayet kusuma ādibhiḥ

original: gāyattryā cārcitaṃ tena devaṃ saṃpūjya dāpayet /
analyzed: gāyattryā ca arcitam tena devam saṃpūjya dāpayet

original: samaṃ putrakalatrādyaiḥ sūtrapucchaṃ tu dhārayet // GarP_1,43.32 //
analyzed: samam putra kalatra ādyaiḥ sūtra puccham tu dhārayet
viśuddha granthikam ramyam mahāpātaka nāśanam
sarva pāpa kṣayam deva tava agre dhārayāmi aham
evam dhūpa ādinā abhyarcya madhyama ādīn samarpayet
pavitram vaiṣṇavam tejaḥ sarva pātaka nāśanam
dharma kāma artha siddhi artham sva kaṇṭhe dhārayāmi aham

original: vanamālāṃ samabhyarcya svena mantreṇa dāpayet // GarP_1,43.35 //
analyzed: vanamālām samabhyarcya svena mantreṇa dāpayet
naivedyam vividham dattvā kusuma ādeḥ balim haret
agnim saṃtarpya tatra api dvādaśa aṅgula mānataḥ

original: ādau dattvārghyamāditye tatra caikaṃ pavitrakam // GarP_1,43.37 //
analyzed: ādau dattvā arghyam āditye tatra ca ekam pavitrakam
viṣvaksenam tatas prārcya surum arghya ādibhiḥ hara
devasya agre paṭhet mantram kṛtāñjali puṭaḥ sthitaḥ
jñānataḥ jñānataḥ vā api pūjana ādi kṛtam mayā
tat sarvam pūrṇam eva astu tvad prasādāt sureśvara
maṇi vidruma mālabhiḥ mandāra kusuma ādibhiḥ

original: iyaṃ sāṃvatsarī pūjā tavāstu garuḍadhvaja // GarP_1,43.40 //
analyzed: iyam sāṃvatsarī pūjā tava astu garuḍadhvaja

original: vanamālā yathā deva kaustubhaṃ satataṃ hṛdi /
analyzed: vanamālā yathā deva kaustubham satatam hṛdi

original: tadvatpavitraṃ tantūnāṃ mālāṃ tvaṃ hṛdaye dhara // GarP_1,43.41 //
analyzed: tadvat pavitram tantūnām mālām tvam hṛdaye dhara

original: evaṃ prārthya dvijān bhojya dattvā tebhyaśca dakṣiṇām /
analyzed: evam prārthya dvijān bhojya dattvā tebhyaḥ ca dakṣiṇām
visarjayet tu tena eva sāyāhne tu apare hani
sāṃvatsarīm imām pūjām sampādya vidhivat mayā
vrajeḥ pavitraka idānīm viṣṇu lekam visarjitaḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe viṣṇupavitrāropaṇaṃ nāma tricatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe viṣṇupavitrāropaṇam nāma tricatvāriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
hariḥ uvāca
pūjayitvā pavitra ādyaiḥ brahma dhyātvā hariḥ bhavet
brahma dhyānam pravakṣyāmi māyā yantra pramardakam
yacchet vāc manasam prājñaḥ tam yajet jñānam ātmani
jñānam mahati saṃyacchet yaḥ icchet jñānam ātmāni
deha indriya manaḥ buddhi prāṇa ahaṅkara āvarjitam
varjitam bhūta tanmātraiḥ guṇa janma aśana ādibhiḥ
sva prakāśam nirākāram sa dānam damana ādi yat
nityam śuddham buddham ṛddham satyam ānandam advayam
turīyam akṣaram brahma aham asmi param padam
aham brahma iti avasthānam samādhiḥ api r iti gīyate

original: ātmānaṃ rathinaṃ viddhi śarīraṃ rathameva tu /
analyzed: ātmānam rathinam viddhi śarīram ratham eva tu

original: buddhiṃ ca sārathiṃ viddhi manaḥ pragrahameva ca /
analyzed: buddhim ca sārathim viddhi manaḥ pragraham eva ca
indriyāṇi hayān āhuḥ viṣayāḥ teṣu gocarāḥ
ātma indriya manaḥ yuktaḥ bhoktā iti ārmanīṣiṇaḥ

original: yastu vijñāna bāhmena yuktena manasā sadā // GarP_1,44.7 //
analyzed: yaḥ tu vijñāna bāhmena yuktena manasā sadā

original: sa tu tatpadamāpnoti sa hi bhūyo na jāyate /

vijñāna sārathiḥ yaḥ tu manaḥ pragrahavān naraḥ
svardhunyāḥ pāram āpnoti tat viṣṇoḥ paramam padam
ahiṃsā ādiḥ yamaḥ proktaḥ śauca ādiḥ niyamaḥ smṛtaḥ
āsanam padmaka ādi uktam prāṇāyāmaḥ marut jayaḥ

original: pratyāhā ro jayaḥ prokto dhyānamīśvaracintanam // GarP_1,44.10 //

analyzed: manaḥ dhṛtiḥ dhāraṇā sthāt samādhiḥ brahmaṇi sthitiḥ

original: pūrvaṃ cetaḥ sthiraṃ na syāttatomūrtiṃ vicintayet // GarP_1,44.11 //
analyzed: pūrvam cetaḥ sthiram na syāt tatas mūrtim vicintayet

original: ātmāhaṃ paramaṃ brahma paramaṃ jyotireva tu // GarP_1,44.13 //

analyzed: dvārakā ādi śilā saṃsthaḥ dhyeyaḥ pūjyaḥ aham ca saḥ
manasaḥ bhīpsitam prāpya devaḥ vaimānikaḥ bhavet
niṣkāmaḥ muktim āpnoti mūrtim

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe brahmamūrtidhyānanirūpaṇaṃ nāma catuścatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe brahmamūrtidhyānanirūpaṇam nāma catuścatvāriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

analyzed: kṛṣṇaḥ sa vartula āvartaḥ pātu vaḥ nata pṛṣṭhakaḥ

macakraḥ sureśvaraḥ
nānā varṇaḥ neka mūrtiḥ nāga bhogī tu anantakaḥ
sthūlaḥ dāmodaraḥ
saṃkīrṇa dvārakaḥ saḥ brahmā su lohitaḥ
sa dīrgha rekhaḥ suṣiraḥ eka cakra ambujaḥ pṛthuḥ
pṛthu chidraḥ sthūla cakraḥ kṛṣṇaḥ
viṣṇuḥ ca bilva vat
hayagrīvaḥ ṅkuśa ākāraḥ pañca rekhaḥ sa kaustubhaḥ
matsyaḥ dīrghaḥ mbuja ākāraḥ dvāra rekhaḥ ca pātu vaḥ

original: śālagrāme dvārakāyāṃ sthitāya gadina namaḥ // GarP_1,45.25 //
analyzed: śālagrāme dvārakāyām sthitāya gadina namaḥ
eka dvāraḥ catur cakraḥ vanamālā vibhūṣitaḥ
svarṇa rekhā samāyuktaḥ goṣpadena virājitaḥ
kadamba kusuma ākāraḥ lakṣmī nārāyaṇaḥ vatu
ekena lakṣitaḥ sudarśanaḥ
lakṣmī nārāyaṇaḥ
dvābhyām tribhiḥ mūrtiḥ trivikramaḥ
caturbhiḥ ca catur vyūhaḥ
vāsudevaḥ ca
pañcabhiḥ
pradyumnaḥ
ṣaḍūbhiḥ eva syāt saṃkarṣaṇaḥ itas tatas
puruṣottamaḥ
ṣṭabhiḥ syāt nava vyūhaḥ
nava aṅkitaḥ
daśa avatāraḥ
daśabhiḥ aniruddhaḥ vatāt atha
dvādaśa ātmā
dvādaśa birataḥ ūrdhvam anantakaḥ

original: viṣṇormūrtimayaṃ stotraṃ yaḥ paṭhetsa divaṃ vrajet /
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ mūrti mayam stotram yaḥ paṭhet sa divam vrajet
brahmā caturmukhaḥ daṇḍī kamaṇḍalu yuga anvitaḥ

original: yathāyudhastathā gaurī caṇḍikā ca sarasvatī // GarP_1,45.32 //
analyzed: yathā āyudhaḥ tathā gaurī caṇḍikā ca sarasvatī
mahā lakṣmīḥ mātaraḥ ca padma hastaḥ divākaraḥ

original: gajāsyaśca gaṇaḥ skandaḥ ṣaṇmukhonekadhā guṇāḥ // GarP_1,45.33 //
analyzed: gaja āsyaḥ ca gaṇaḥ skandaḥ ṣaṣ mukhaḥ na ekadhā guṇāḥ
ete rcitāḥ sthāpitāḥ ca prāsāde vāstu pūjite
dharma artha kāma mokṣa ādyāḥ prāpyante puruṣeṇa ca

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe śālagrāmamūrtilakṣaṇaṃ nāma pañcacatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe śālagrāmamūrtilakṣaṇam nāma pañcacatvāriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
hariḥ uvāca
vāstum saṃkṣepataḥ vakṣye gṛha ādau vighna nāśanam
īsāna koṇāt ārabhya hi ekāśīti pade yajet

original: īśāne ca śiraḥ pādau nairṛte 'gnyanile karau /
analyzed: īśāne ca śiraḥ pādau nairṛte gni anile karau
āvāsa vāsa veśma ādau pure grāme vaṇikpathe
prāsāda ārāma durgeṣu devālaya maṭheṣu ca
dvāviṃśati surān bāhye tad antar ca trayodaśa
īśaḥ ca eva atha parjanyaḥ jayantaḥ kuliśa āyudhaḥ

original: sūryaḥ satyo bhṛguścaiva ākāśo vāyureva ca // GarP_1,46.4 //
analyzed: sūryaḥ satyaḥ bhṛguḥ ca eva ākāśaḥ vāyuḥ eva ca
pūṣā ca vitathaḥ ca eva graha kṣetra yamau ubhau
gandharvaḥ bhṛgurājaḥ tu mṛgaḥ pitṛ gaṇaḥ tathā
dauvārikaḥ tha sugrīvaḥ puṣpadantaḥ gaṇādhipaḥ
asuraḥ śeṣa pāpau ca
ḍahi mukha khyaḥ eva ca
bhallāṭaḥ soma sarpau ca aditiḥ ca ditiḥ tathā
bahis dvātriṃśat ete tu tad antar caturaḥ śṛṇu
īśāna ādi catuṣkoṇa saṃsthitān pūjayet hudhas

original: āpaścaivātha sāvitrī jayo rudrastathaiva ca // GarP_1,46.8 //
analyzed: āpaḥ ca eva atha sāvitrī jayaḥ rudraḥ tathā eva ca

original: madhye navapade brahmā tasyāṣṭhau ca samīpagān /
analyzed: madhye nava pade brahmā ca samīpa gān
devān eka uttarān etān pūrva ādau nāmataḥ śṛṇu
aryamā savitā ca eva vivasvān vibudha adhipaḥ

original: mitro 'tha rājayakṣmā ca tathā pṛthvīdharaḥ kramāt // GarP_1,46.10 //
analyzed: rājayakṣmā ca tathā pṛthvīdharaḥ kramāt
aṣṭamaḥ ca āpavatsaḥ ca paritas brahmaṇaḥ smṛtāḥ
īśāna koṇāt ārabhya durge ca r jñeyaḥ
vaṃśaḥ ucyate
āgneya koṇāt ārabhya vaṃśaḥ bhavati durdharaḥ

original: aditiṃ himavantaṃ ca jayantaṃ ca idaṃ trayam // GarP_1,46.12 //
analyzed: aditim himavantam ca jayantam ca idam trayam
nāyikā kālikā nāma punar
vāstu devān pūjayitvā gṛha prāsāda kṛt bhavet
surejyaḥ puratas kāryaḥ yasya āgneyyām mahānasam
kapi nirgamane ṇī
yena pūrvatas satra maṇḍapam
gandha puṣpa gṛham kāryam aiśānyām paṭṭa saṃyutam

original: bhāṇḍāgāraṃ ca kauberyāṃ goṣṭhāgāraṃ ca vāyave // GarP_1,46.15 //
analyzed: bhāṇḍāgāram ca kauberyām goṣṭha āgāram ca vāyave
udak āśrayam ca vāruṇyām vātāyana samanvitam
samidh kuśa indhana sthānam āyudhānām ca nairṛte
abhyāgata ālayam
toya agni dīpa sat bhṛtyaiḥ yuktam dakṣiṇatas bhavet
gṛha antarāṇi sarvāṇi sa jalaiḥ kadalī gṛhaiḥ
pañca varṇaiḥ ca kusumaiḥ śobhitāni prakalpayet
prākāram tad vahis dadyāt pañca hasta pramāṇataḥ
evam viṣṇu āśramam kuryāt vanaiḥ ca upavanaiḥ yutam
catuḥ ṣaṣṭi padaḥ vāstuḥ prāsāda ādau prapūjitaḥ

original: madhye catuṣpado brahmā dvipa dāstvaryamādayaḥ // GarP_1,46.20 //
analyzed: madhye catuṣpadaḥ brahmā dvipa dāstu aryama ādayaḥ
karṇe ca eva atha śikhi ādyāḥ tathā devāḥ prakīrtitāḥ

original: tebhyo hyubhayataḥ sārdhādanye 'pi dvipadāḥ surāḥ // GarP_1,46.21 //
analyzed: tebhyaḥ hi ubhayatas sārdhāt anye dvipadāḥ surāḥ
catuḥ ṣaṣṭi padāḥ devāḥ iti evam parikīrtitāḥ

original: carakī ca vidārī ca pūtanā pāparākṣasī // GarP_1,46.22 //
analyzed: carakī ca vidārī ca pūtanā pāpa rākṣasī
īśāna ādyāḥ tatas bāhye deva ādyāḥ hetuka ādayaḥ
haitukaḥ tripura antar ca agni vetālakau yamaḥ
agnijihvaḥ kālakaḥ ca karālaḥ
aiśānyām bhīma rūpaḥ tu pātāle preta nāyakaḥ
ākāśe gandhamālī syāt kṣetrapālān tatas yajet

original: vistārābhihataṃ dairghyaṃ rāśiṃ vāstostu kārayet // GarP_1,46.25 //
analyzed: vistāra abhihatam dairghyam rāśim vāstoḥ tu kārayet

original: kṛtvā ca vasubhirbhāgaṃ śeṣaṃ baddhā yamādiśet /
analyzed: kṛtvā ca vasubhiḥ bhāgam śeṣam baddhā yam ādiśet
punar guṇitam aṣṭābhiḥ ṛ bhāgam tu bhājayet
yat śeṣam tat bhavet ṛkṣam bhāgaiḥ hṛtvā avyayam bhavet
ṛkṣam caturguṇam kṛtvā navabhiḥ bhāga hāritam
śeṣam aṃśam vijānīyāt devalasya matam yathā
aṣṭābhiḥ guṇitam piṇḍam ṣaṣṭibhiḥ bhāgāharitam
yat śeṣam tat bhavet jīvam maraṇam

original: vāstukroḍe gṛhaṃ kuryānna pṛṣṭhe mānavaḥ sadā // GarP_1,46.29 //
analyzed: vāstu kroḍe gṛham kuryāt na pṛṣṭhe mānavaḥ sadā
vāma pārśvena na atra kāryā vicāraṇā
siṃha kanyā tulāyām ca dvāram śudhyet atha uttaram
evam ca vṛścika ādau syāt pūrva dakṣiṇa paścimam

original: dvāraṃ dīrghārdhavistāraṃ dvārāṇyaṣṭau smṛtāni ca // GarP_1,46.31 //
analyzed: dvāram dīrgha ardha vistāram dvārāṇi aṣṭau smṛtāni ca
santāna preṣya nīca tvam sva yānam svarṇa bhūṣaṇam

original: sutahīnaṃ tu raudreṇa vīryaghnaṃ dakṣiṇe tathā // GarP_1,46.32 //
analyzed: suta hīnam tu raudreṇa vīrya ghnam dakṣiṇe tathā
vahnau badhaḥ ca āyuḥ vṛddhiṃ puttra lābha su tṛpti daḥ
dhanade nṛpa pīḍā dam artha ghnam roga dam jale
nṛpa bhī hi anapatyam na vaira dam

original: arthadaṃ cārthahānyai ca doṣadaṃ putramṛtyudam // GarP_1,46.34 //
analyzed: artha dam ca artha hānyai ca doṣa dam putra mṛtyu dam
dvārāṇi uttara saṃjñāni pūrva dvārāṇi vacmi aham
agni bhītiḥ bahu kanyā dhana saṃmāna kopa dam
rāja ghnam kopa dam pūrve phalataḥ dvāram īritam
īśāna ādau bhavet pūrvam agneyī ādau tu dakṣiṇam
nairṛtya ādau paścimam syāt vāyavī ādau tu ca uttaram

original: aṣṭabhāge kṛte bhāge dvārāṇāṃ ca phalāphalam // GarP_1,46.37 //
analyzed: aṣṭa bhāge kṛte bhāge dvārāṇām ca phala aphalam
aśvattha plakṣa nyagrodhāḥ pūrva ādau syāt udumbaraḥ

original: gṛhasya śobhanaḥ prokta īśāne caiva sālmaliḥ /
analyzed: gṛhasya śobhanaḥ proktaḥ īśāne ca eva sālmaliḥ

original: pūjito vignahārī syātprāsādasya gṛhasya ca // GarP_1,46.38 //
analyzed: pūjitaḥ vigna hārī syāt prāsādasya gṛhasya ca

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vāstumānalakṣaṇaṃ nāma ṣaṭcatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe vāstumānalakṣaṇam nāma ṣaṭcatvāriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
sūtaḥ uvāca

original: prāsādānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ ca vakṣye śaunaka tacchṛṇu /
analyzed: prāsādānām lakṣaṇam ca vakṣye śaunaka tat śṛṇu
catuḥ ṣaṣṭi padam kṛtvā diś vidikṣu upalakṣitam
catuṣkoṇam caturbhiḥ ca dvārāṇi sūrya saṃkhyayā
bhittīnām kalpanā bhavet
ūrdhva kṣetra samā jaṅghā jaṅghā ardha dviguṇam bhavet
garbha vistāra vistīrṇaḥ śuka aṅghriḥ ca vidhīyate
tad tri bhāgena kartavyaḥ pañca bhāgena vā punar
nirgamaḥ tu śuka aṅghreḥ ca ucchrāyaḥ śikhara ardha gaḥ
caturdhā śikharam kṛtvā tri bhāge vedi bandhanam
caturthe punar asya eva kaṇṭham ā mūla sādhanam

original: atha vāpi samaṃ vāstuṃ kṛtvā ṣoḍaśabhāgikam /
analyzed: atha vā api samam vāstum kṛtvā ṣoḍaśa bhāgikam

original: tasya madhye caturbhāgamādau garbhaṃ tu kārayet // GarP_1,47.6 //
analyzed: tasya madhye catur bhāgam ādau garbham tu kārayet
catur bhāgena bhittīnām ucchrāyaḥ syāt pramāṇataḥ
dviguṇaḥ śikhara ucchrāyaḥ bhitti ucchāyāt ca mānataḥ
śikhara ardhasya vidheyāḥ tu pradakṣiṇāḥ

original: caturdikṣu tathā jñeyo nirgamastuḥ tathā budhaiḥ /
analyzed: catur dikṣu tathā jñeyaḥ tathā budhaiḥ
pañca bhāgena saṃbhajya garbha mānam vicakṣaṇaḥ
bhāgam ekam gṛhītvā tu nirgamam klapayet punar
garbha sūtra samaḥ bhāgāt agratas mukhamaṇḍapaḥ
etat sāmānyam uddiṣṭam prāsādasya hi lakṣaṇam

original: liṅgamānamatho vakṣye pīṭho liṅgasamo bhavet // GarP_1,47.11 //
analyzed: liṅga mānam atho vakṣye pīṭhaḥ liṅga samaḥ bhavet
dviguṇena bhavet rarbhaḥ samantāt śaunaka dhruvam
tat dvidhā ca bhavet bhītiḥ jaṅghā tad vistara ardha gā
dviguṇam śikharam proktam jaṅghāyāḥ ca eva śaunaka
pīṭha garbha avaram karma tad mānena śuka aṅghrikam

original: nir gamastu samākhyātaḥ śeṣaṃ pūrvavadeva tu /
analyzed: niḥ gamaḥ tu samākhyātaḥ śeṣam pūrvavat eva tu
liṅga mānam smṛtam hi etat dvāra mānam atha ucyate
kara agram veda vat kṛtvā dvāram bhāga aṣṭamam bhavet
vistareṇa samākhyātam dviguṇam sva icchayā bhavet
dvāra vat pīṭha madhye tu śeṣam suṣirakam bhavet
pādikam śeṣikam bhittiḥ dvāra ardhena parigrahāt
tad vistāra samā jaṅghā sikharam dviguṇam bhavet
śuka aṅghriḥ pūrva vat jñeyā nirgama ucchrāyakam bhavet
maṇḍape mānam etat tu svarūpam ca aparam vade

original: traivedaṃ kārayetkṣetraṃ yatra tiṣṭhanti devatāḥ // GarP_1,47.18 //
analyzed: kārayet kṣetram yatra tiṣṭhanti devatāḥ
ittham kṛtena mānena bāhya bhāga vinirgatam

original: nemiḥ pādena vistīrṇā prāsādasya samantataḥ // GarP_1,47.19 //
analyzed: nemiḥ pādena vistīrṇā prāsādasya samantataḥ

original: garbhaṃ tu dviguṇaṃ kuryānnemyā mānaṃ bhavediha /
analyzed: garbham tu dviguṇam kuryāt nemyāḥ mānam bhavet iha

original: sa eva bhitterutsedho śikharo dviguṇo mataḥ // GarP_1,47.20 //
analyzed: saḥ eva bhitteḥ utsedhaḥ śikharaḥ dviguṇaḥ mataḥ

original: prāsādānāṃ ca vakṣyāmi mānaṃ yoniṃ ca mānataḥ /
analyzed: prāsādānām ca vakṣyāmi mānam yonim ca mānataḥ
vairājaḥ puṣpaka ākhyaḥ ca kailāsaḥ mālikā āhvayaḥ
triviṣṭapam ca pañca ete prāsādāḥ sarva yonayaḥ
prathamaḥ caturaśraḥ hi dvitīyaḥ tu tad āyataḥ
vṛttaḥ vṛttāyataḥ ca anyaḥ ṣṭāśraḥ ca iha ca pañcamaḥ

original: etebhya eva sambhūtāḥ prāsādāḥ sumanoharāḥ // GarP_1,47.23 //
analyzed: etebhyaḥ eva sambhūtāḥ prāsādāḥ su manoharāḥ
sarva prakṛti bhūtebhyaḥ catvāriṃśat tathā eva ca
meruḥ ca mandaraḥ ca eva vimānaḥ ca tathā aparaḥ
nandivardhana saṃjñaḥ ca śrīvatsaḥ ca navā iti amī
caturaśrāḥ samudbhūtāḥ vairājāt iti gamyatām

original: valabhī gṛharājaśca śā lāgṛhaṃ ca mandiram // GarP_1,47.26 //
analyzed: valabhī gṛha rājaḥ ca śā lāgṛham ca mandiram

original: vimānaṃ ca tathā brahmamandiraṃ bhavanaṃ tathā /
analyzed: vimānam ca tathā brahma mandiram bhavanam tathā

original: uttambhaṃ śibikā veśma navaite puṣpakodbhavāḥ // GarP_1,47.27 //
analyzed: uttambham śibikā veśma navā ete puṣpaka udbhavāḥ
valayaḥ dundubhiḥ padmaḥ mahāpadmaḥ tathā aparaḥ

original: mukulī cāsya uṣṇīṣī śaṅkhaśca kalaśastathā // GarP_1,47.28 //
analyzed: mukulī ca asya uṣṇīṣī śaṅkhaḥ ca kalaśaḥ tathā
guvāvṛkṣaḥ tathā anyaḥ ca vṛttāḥ kailāsa sambhavāḥ

original: gajo 'tha vṛṣabho haṃso garuḍaḥ siṃhanāmakaḥ // GarP_1,47.29 //
analyzed: vṛṣabhaḥ haṃsaḥ garuḍaḥ siṃha nāmakaḥ
bhūmukhaḥ bhūdharaḥ ca eva śrījayaḥ pṛthivīdharaḥ
vṛtta āyatāḥ samudbhūtāḥ navā ete maṇika āhvayāt
vajram cakram tathā anyat ca muṣṭikam vabhru saṃjñitam

original: vakraḥ svastikakhaḍgau ca gadā śrīvṛkṣa eva ca // GarP_1,47.31 //
analyzed: vakraḥ svastika khaḍgau ca gadā śrīvṛkṣaḥ eva ca
vijayaḥ nāmataḥ śvetaḥ triviṣṭipa samudbhavāḥ
trikoṇam padmam ardhenduḥ catuṣkoṇam dvis aṣṭakam

original: yatra tatra vidhātavyaṃ saṃsthānaṃ maṇḍapasya tu /
analyzed: yatra tatra vidhātavyam saṃsthānam maṇḍapasya tu

original: rājyaṃ ca vibhavaścaivaḥ hyāyurvardvanameva ca // GarP_1,47.33 //
analyzed: rājyam ca vibhavaḥ ca eva hi āyuḥ vardvanam eva ca
putra lābhaḥ striyaḥ puṣṭiḥ trikoṇa ādi kramāt bhavet
kuryāt haja ādikam khyāta dvāri garbhagṛham tathā
maṇāḍapaḥ sama saṃkhyābhiḥ guṇitaḥ sūtrakaḥ tathā
maṇḍapasya caturtha aṃśāt bhadraḥ kāryaḥ vijānatā
vā bhavet
sārdha bhitti pramāṇena bhiti mānena vā punar
bhitteḥ dvaiguṇyataḥ vā api kartavyāḥ maṇḍapāḥ kracid

original: prāsāde mañcarī kāryā citrā viṣamabhūmikā // GarP_1,47.37 //
analyzed: prāsāde mañcarī kāryā citrā viṣama bhūmikā
parimāṇa virodhena rekhā vaiṣamya bhūṣitā
ādhāraḥ tu catur dhāraḥ catur maṇḍapa śobhitaḥ
śata śṛṅga samāyuktaḥ meruḥ prāsādaḥ uttamaḥ
maṇḍapāḥ tasya kartavyāḥ bhadraiḥ tribhiḥ alaṅkṛtāḥ
gha cana akāra mānānām bhinna abhinnāḥ bhavanti te

original: kiyanto yeṣu cādhārā nirādhārāśca kecana // GarP_1,47.40 //
analyzed: kiyantaḥ yeṣu ca ādhārāḥ nirādhārāḥ ca kecana
praticchandaka bhedena prāsādāḥ sambhavanti te
anyonya asaṃkarāḥ teṣām ghaṭanānām abhedataḥ
devatānām viśeṣāya prāsādāḥ bahavaḥ smṛtāḥ

original: prāsāde niyamo nāsti devatānāṃ svayambhuvām // GarP_1,47.42 //
analyzed: prāsāde niyamaḥ na asti devatānām svayambhuvām
tān eva devatānām ca pūrva mānena kārayet
caturaśra āyatāḥ tattra catuṣkoṇa samanvitāḥ
candraśālā anvitā kāryā bherī śikhara saṃyutā
puratas vāhanānām ca kartavyā
maṇḍapāḥ
nāṭya śālā ca kartavyā dvāra deśa samāśrayā

original: prasāde devatānāṃ ca kāryā dikṣu vidikṣvapi // GarP_1,47.45 //
analyzed: prasāde devatānām ca kāryā dikṣu vidikṣu api
dvārapālāḥ ca kartavyāḥ mukhyāḥ gatvā pṛthak pṛthak
kiñcid adūrataḥ kāryāḥ maṭhāḥ tatra upajīvinām
prāvṛtā jagatī kāryā phala puṣpa jala anvitā
prasādeṣu surān sthāpya pūjābhiḥ pūjayet naraḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśe ācārakāṇḍe prāsādaliṅgamaṇḍapādilakṣaṇanirūpaṇaṃnāma saptacatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśe ācāra kāṇḍe prāsādaliṅgamaṇḍapādilakṣaṇanirūpaṇam nāma saptacatvāriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
sūtaḥ uvāca
pratiṣṭhām sarva devānām saṃkṣepeṇa vadāmi aham

original: sutithyādau suramyāṃ ca pratiṣṭhāṃ kārayedguruḥ // GarP_1,48.1 //
analyzed: su tithi ādau su ramyām ca pratiṣṭhām kārayet guruḥ
ṛtvigbhiḥ saha ca ācāryam varayet madhyadeśa gam

original: svaśākhoktavidhānena atha vā praṇavena tu // GarP_1,48.2 //
analyzed: sva śākhā ukta vidhānena atha vā praṇavena tu
pañcabhiḥ bahubhiḥ vā atha kuryāt pādya arghyam eva ca
mudrikābhiḥ tathā vastraiḥ gandha mālya anulepanaiḥ

original: mantranyāsaṃ guruḥ kṛtvā tataḥ karma samārabhet /
analyzed: mantra nyāsam guruḥ kṛtvā tatas karma samārabhet
prāsādasya agratas kuryāt maṇḍapam daśa hastakam
kuryāt dvādaśa hastam vā stambhaiḥ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ yutam

original: dhvajāṣṭakaiścaturhastāṃ madhye vediṃ ca kārayet // GarP_1,48.5 //
analyzed: dhvaja aṣṭakaiḥ catur hastām madhye vedim ca kārayet
vālukām tatra dāpayet
caturaśram kārmuka ābham vartulam kamala ākṛti
pūrva āditaḥ samārabhya kartavyam kuṇḍa pañcakam
athavā caturaśrāṇi sarvāṇi etāni kārayet
sarva kāma artha siddhaye

original: śiraḥ sthāne tu devasya ācāryo homamācaret // GarP_1,48.8 //
analyzed: śiraḥ sthāne tu devasya ācāryaḥ homam ācaret
aiśānyām kecid icchanti upalipya avanim śubhām

original: dvārāṇi caiva catvāri kṛtvā vai toraṇāntike // GarP_1,48.9 //
analyzed: dvārāṇi ca eva catvāri kṛtvā vai toraṇa antike
nyagrodha udumbara aśvattha bailva pālāśa khādirāḥ
toraṇāḥ pañca hastāḥ ca vastra puṣpa ādi alaṅkṛtāḥ
nikhanet hastam ekakam catvāraḥ caturaḥ diśaḥ

original: pūrvadvāre mṛgendraṃ tu hayarājaṃ tu dakṣiṇe // GarP_1,48.11 //
analyzed: pūrva dvāre mṛga indram tu haya rājam tu dakṣiṇe
paścime gopatiḥ nāma sura śārdūlam uttare

original: agnimīleti hi mantreṇa prathamaṃ pūrvato nyaset // GarP_1,48.12 //
analyzed: agnimīlā iti hi mantreṇa prathamam pūrvatas nyaset
mantreṇa dakṣiṇasyām dvitīyakam
agnāyāhi mantreṇa paścimasyām tṛtīyakam
śannodevī iti mantreṇa uttarasyām caturthakam
pūrve ambuda vat kāryā āgnoyyām dhūma rūpiṇī

original: yāmyāṃ vai kṛṣṇarūpā tu nairṛtyā śyāmalā (dhūsarā) bhavet /
analyzed: yāmyām vai kṛṣṇa rūpā tu śyāmalā dhūsarā bhavet

original: vāruṇyāṃ pāṇḍurā jñeyā vāyavyāṃ pītavarṇikā // GarP_1,48.15 //
analyzed: vāruṇyām pāṇḍurā jñeyā vāyavyām pīta varṇikā

original: uttare raktavarṇā tu śukleśī ca patākikā /
analyzed: uttare rakta varṇā tu śukla īśī ca patākikā

original: bahurūpā tathā madhye indravidyeti pūrvake // GarP_1,48.16 //
analyzed: bahu rūpā tathā madhye indra vidyā iti pūrvake
ā agnim saṃsupti mantreṇa yamaḥ nāga iti dakṣiṇe

original: pūjyā rakṣohanoveti paścime uttare 'pi ca // GarP_1,48.17 //
analyzed: pūjyā rakṣaḥ hanaḥ vā iti paścime uttare pi ca
vātaḥ iti abhiṣicya atha āpyāyasva iti ca uttare
tam īśānam atas ca eva viṣṇoḥ nukā iti madhyame

original: kalaśau tu tato dvaudvau niveśyau toraṇāntike /
analyzed: kalaśau tu tatas dvau dvau niveśyau toraṇa antike
vastra yugma samāyuktāḥ candana ādyaiḥ su alaṅkṛtāḥ
puṣpaiḥ vitānaiḥ bahulaiḥ ādi varṇa abhimantritāḥ

original: dikpālāśca tataḥ pūjyāḥ śāstradṛṣṭena karmaṇā // GarP_1,48.20 //
analyzed: dikpālāḥ ca tatas pūjyāḥ śāstra dṛṣṭena karmaṇā
trātāram indra bhantreṇa agniḥ mūrdhā iti ca apare

original: asminvṛkṣa itaṃ caiva pracārīti parā smṛtā // GarP_1,48.21 //
analyzed: asmin vṛkṣe ca eva pracārī iti parā smṛtā
kiñca id adhātu ca saptamī
imāḥ rudra iti dikyālān pūjayitvā vicakṣaṇaḥ
homa dravyāṇi vāyavye kuryāt sa upaskarāṇi ca
śaṅkhān śāstra uditān śvetān netrābhyām vinyaset guruḥ

original: ālokanena dravyāṇi śuddhiṃ yānti na saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: ālokanena dravyāṇi śuddhim yānti na saṃśayaḥ
tdṛdaya ādīni ca aṅgāni vyāhṛti praṇavena ca
astram ca eva samastānām nyāsaḥ yam sarvakāmikaḥ
akṣatān viṣṭaram ca eva astreṇa eva abhimantritān
viṣṭareṇa spṛśet duvyān yāga maṇḍapa saṃbhṛtān
akṣatān vikiret paścāt astra pūtān samantataḥ
diśam atha ārabhya yāvat īśāna gocaram
avakīrya akṣatān saṃvān lepayet maṇḍapam tatas
gandha ādyaiḥ arghya pātre ca mantra grāmam nyaset guruḥ
tena arghya pātra toyena prokṣayet yāga maṇḍapam

original: pratiṣṭhā yasya devasya tadākhyaṃ kalaśaṃ nyaset /
analyzed: pratiṣṭhā yasya devasya tad ākhyam kalaśam nyaset

original: aiśānyāṃ pūjayedyāmye astreṇaiva ca bardhanīm // GarP_1,48.29 //
analyzed: aiśānyām pūjayet yāmye astreṇa eva ca bardhanīm
kalaśam vardhanīm ca eva grahān vāsttoṣpatim tathā
āsana itāni sarvāṇi praṇava ākhyam japet guruḥ
sūtra grīvam ratna garbham vastra yugmena veṣṭitam
sarva oṣadhī gandha liptam pūjayet kalaśam guruḥ
devaḥ tu kalaśe pūjyaḥ vardhanyā vastram uttamam

original: vardhanyā tu samāyuktaṃ kalaśaṃ bhrāmayedanu // GarP_1,48.32 //
analyzed: vardhanyā tu samāyuktam kalaśam bhrāmayet anu
vardhanī dhārayā siñcan agratas dhārayet tatas
abhyarcya vardhanī kumbham sthaṇḍile devam arcayet

original: ghaṭaṃ cāvāhya vāyavyāṃ gaṇānāṃ tveti sadgaṇam /
analyzed: ghaṭam ca āvāhya vāyavyām gaṇānām tvā iti sat gaṇam
devam īśāna koṇe tu japet vāstoṣpatim budhaḥ
vāstoṣpatī iti mantreṇa vāstu doṣa upaśāntaye

original: kumbhasya pūrvato bhūtaṃ gaṇadevaṃ baliṃ haret // GarP_1,48.35 //
analyzed: kumbhasya pūrvatas bhūtam gaṇa devam balim haret
paṭhet iti ca vidyāḥ ca kuryāt ālambhanam budhaḥ
yoge yoga iti mantreṇa āstaraṇam śādvalaiḥ kuśaiḥ
ṛtvigbhiḥ sārdham ācāryaḥ snāna pīṭhe guruḥ tadā
vividhaiḥ brahma ghoṣaiḥ ca puṇya aha jaya maṅgalaiḥ

original: kṛtvā brahmarathe devaṃ pratiṣṭhanti tato dvijāḥ /
analyzed: kṛtvā brahma rathe devam pratiṣṭhanti tatas dvijāḥ
aiśānyām ānayet pīṭha maṇḍape vinyaset guruḥ
snātvā sūtra valkala jena tu
saṃsnāpya lakṣaṇa uddhāram kuryāt tūrya ādi dūra abhi
vādanaiḥ
akṣiṇī ca añjayet ca asya suvarṇasya śalākayā
agniḥ jyotiḥ iti mantreṇa tu kārayet

original: lakṣaṇe kriyamāṇe tu nāmaikaṃ sthāpako va(da) det // GarP_1,48.41 //
analyzed: lakṣaṇe kriyamāṇe tu nāma ekam sthāpakaḥ vada det
netrayoḥ śītala kriyā
agniḥ mūrdhā iti mantreṇa dadyāt valmīka mṛttikām
bilva udumbaram aśvattham vaṭam pālāśam eva ca
yajñāyajña iti mantreṇa dadyāt pañca kaṣāyakam
pañcagavyam snāpayet ca sahadevī ādi bhiḥ tatas

original: sahadevī balā caiva śatamūlī śatāvarī // GarP_1,48.44 //
analyzed: sahadevī balā ca eva śatamūlī śatāvarī

original: kumārī ca guḍūcī ca siṃhī vyāghrī tathaiva ca /
analyzed: kumārī ca guḍūcī ca siṃhī vyāghrī tathā eva ca
yāḥ oṣadhī iti mantreṇa snānam oṣadhimat jalaiḥ
yāḥ phalinī iti mantreṇa phala snānam vidhīyate
drupadāt iva iti mantreṇa kāryam udvartanam budhaiḥ
kalaśeṣu ca vinyasya uttara ādiṣu anukramāt

original: ratnāni caiva dhānyāni oṣadhīṃ śatapuṣpikām // GarP_1,48.47 //
analyzed: ratnāni ca eva dhānyāni oṣadhīm śatapuṣpikām
samudrān ca eva vinyasya caturaḥ caturaḥ diśaḥ

original: kṣīraṃ dadhi kṣīrodasya ghṛtodasyeti vā punaḥ // GarP_1,48.48 //
analyzed: kṣīram dadhi kṣīrodasya ghṛtodasya iti vā punar
āpyāyasva dadhikrāvṇaḥ yāḥ auṣadhīḥ iti iti ca

original: tejo 'sīti ca mantraiśca kumbhaṃ caivābhimantrayet // GarP_1,48.49 //
analyzed: tejaḥ si iti ca mantraiḥ ca kumbham ca eva abhimantrayet
samudra ākhyaiḥ caturbhiḥ ca snāpayet kalaśaiḥ punar

original: snātaścaiva suveṣaśca dhūpo deyaśca gugguluḥ // GarP_1,48.50 //
analyzed: snātaḥ ca eva su veṣaḥ ca dhūpaḥ deyaḥ ca gugguluḥ
abhiṣekāya kumbheṣu tat tat tīrthāni vinyaset

original: pṛthivyāṃ yāni tīrthāni saritaḥ sāgarāstathā // GarP_1,48.51 //
analyzed: pṛthivyām yāni tīrthāni saritaḥ sāgarāḥ tathā
yāḥ oṣadhī iti mantreṇa kumbham ca eva abhimantrayet

original: tena toyena yaḥ snāyātsa mucyetsarvapātakaiḥ // GarP_1,48.52 //
analyzed: tena toyena yaḥ snāyāt sa mucyet sarva pātakaiḥ
abhiṣicya samudraiḥ ca tu arghyam dadyāt tatas punar

original: gandhadvāreti gandhaṃ ca nyāsaṃ vai vedamantrakaiḥ // GarP_1,48.53 //
analyzed: gandha dvāra iti gandham ca nyāsam vai veda mantrakaiḥ
sva śāstra vihitaiḥ prāptaiḥ yuvaṃvastra iti vastrakam
mantreṇa ānayet maṇḍapam śubham
śambhavāya iti mantreṇa śayyāyām viniveśayet
viśvatas cakṣuḥ mantreṇa kuryāt sakala niṣkalam

original: sthitvā caiva pare tattve mantranyāsaṃ tu kārayet /
analyzed: sthitvā ca eva pare tattve mantra nyāsam tu kārayet
sva śāstra vihitaḥ mantraḥ nyāsaḥ tasmin tathā uditaḥ
vastreṇa ācchādayitvā tu pūjanīyaḥ svabhāvataḥ

original: yathāśāstraṃ nivedyāni pādamūle tu dāpayet // GarP_1,48.57 //
analyzed: yathāśāstram nivedyāni pāda mūle tu dāpayet
atha praṇava saṃyuktam vastra yugmena veṣṭitam

original: kalaśaṃ sahiraṇyaṃ ca śiraḥ sthāne nivedayet // GarP_1,48.58 //
analyzed: kalaśam sa hiraṇyam ca śiraḥ sthāne nivedayet
sthitvā kuṇḍa samīpe agneḥ sthāpanam ācaret
sva śāstra vihitaiḥ mantraiḥ veda uktaiḥ vā atha vā guruḥ
śrīsūktam pāvamānyam ca

original: vṛṣākapiṃ ca mitraṃ bahvacaḥ pūrvato japet // GarP_1,48.60 //
analyzed: vṛṣākapim ca mitram bahu a caḥ pūrvatas japet

original: rudraṃ puruṣasūktaṃ ca ślokādhyāyaṃ ca śukriyam /
analyzed: rudram puruṣasūktam ca śloka adhyāyam ca śukriyam

original: brahmāṇaṃ pitṛmaitraṃ ca adhvaryurdakṣiṇe japet // GarP_1,48.61 //
analyzed: brahmāṇam pitṛ maitram ca adhvaryuḥ dakṣiṇe japet
vedavratam vāmadevyam jyeṣṭhasāma rathantaram

original: bheruṇḍāni ca sāmāni chandogaḥ paścime japet // GarP_1,48.62 //
analyzed: bheruṇḍāni ca sāmāni chandogaḥ paścime japet
atharvaśirasam ca eva kumbhasūktam atharvaṇaḥ

original: nīlarudrāṃśca maitraṃ ca atharvaścottare japet // GarP_1,48.63 //
analyzed: nīlarudrān ca maitram ca atharvaḥ ca uttare japet
kuṇḍam ca astreṇa saṃprokṣya ācāryaḥ tu viśeṣataḥ

original: tāmrapātre śarāve vā yathāvibhavato 'pi vā // GarP_1,48.64 //
analyzed: tāmra pātre śarāve vā vā
jātavedasam ānīya agratas tam niveśayet

original: astreṇa jvālayedvahniṃ kavacena tu veṣṭayet // GarP_1,48.65 //
analyzed: astreṇa jvālayet vahnim kavacena tu veṣṭayet
amṛtīkṛtya tam paścāt mantraiḥ sarvaiḥ ca deśikaḥ

original: pātraṃ gṛhya karābhyāṃ ca kuṇḍaṃ bhrāmya tataḥ punaḥ // GarP_1,48.66 //
analyzed: pātram gṛhya karābhyām ca kuṇḍam bhrāmya tatas punar

original: vaiṣṇavena tu yogena paraṃ tejastu niḥ kṣipet /
analyzed: vaiṣṇavena tu yogena param tejaḥ tu niḥ kṣipet
dakṣiṇe sthāpayet brahma praṇītān ca uttareṇa tu
sādhāraṇena mantreṇa sva sūtra vihitena vā

original: dikṣudikṣu tato dadyātparidhiṃ viṣṭaraiḥ saha // GarP_1,48.68 //
analyzed: dikṣu dikṣu tatas dadyāt paridhim viṣṭaraiḥ saha
brahma viṣṇu hara īśānāḥ pūjyāḥ sādhāraṇena tu
darbheṣu sthāpayet vahnim darbhaiḥ ca pariveṣṭitam
darbha toyena saṃspṛṣṭaḥ mantra hīnaḥ śudhyati
prāc agraiḥ udak agraiḥ ca pratyak agraiḥ akhaṇḍitaiḥ
vitataiḥ veṣṭitaḥ vahniḥ svayam sānnidhyam āvrajet

original: agnestu rakṣaṇārthāya yaduktaṃ karma ntravit // GarP_1,48.71 //
analyzed: agneḥ tu rakṣaṇa arthāya yat uktam karma
ācāryāḥ kecid icchanti jātakarma ādi anantaram

original: pavitraṃ tu tataḥ kṛtvā kuryādājyasya saṃskṛtim // GarP_1,48.72 //
analyzed: pavitram tu tatas kṛtvā kuryāt ājyasya saṃskṛtim
nirīkṣya api nīrājyam abhimantritam
ājyabhāga abhighāra antam avekṣeta ājya siddhaye
pañca pañca āhutīḥ hutvā ājyena tad anantaram
garbhādhāna āditas tāvat yāvat gaudānikam bhavet
sva śāstra vihitaiḥ mantraiḥ praṇavena atha homayet
tatas pūrṇāhutim dattvā pūrṇāt pūrṇam an ārethaḥ
evam utpāditaḥ vahniḥ sarva karmasu siddhi daḥ

original: pūjayitvā tato vahniṃ kuṇḍeṣu viharettathā // GarP_1,48.76 //
analyzed: pūjayitvā tatas vahnim kuṇḍeṣu viharet tathā
indra ādīnām sva mantraiḥ ca tathā āhuti śatam śatam

original: purṇāhutiṃ śatasyānte sarveṣāṃ caiva homayet // GarP_1,48.77 //
analyzed: purṇāhutim śatasya ante sarveṣām ca eva homayet
svām āhutim atha ājyeṣu hotā tad kalaśe nyaset
devatāḥ ca eva mantrān ca tathā eva jātavedasam
ātmānam ekatas kṛtvā tatas pūrṇām pradāpayet

original: niṣkṛṣya bahirācāryo dikpālānāṃ baliṃ haret // GarP_1,48.79 //
analyzed: niṣkṛṣya bahis ācāryaḥ dikpālānām balim haret

original: bhūtānāṃ caiva devānāṃ nāgānāṃ ca prayogataḥ /
analyzed: bhūtānām ca eva devānām nāgānām ca prayogataḥ

original: tilāśca samidhaścaiva homadravyaṃ dvayaṃ smṛtam // GarP_1,48.80 //
analyzed: tilāḥ ca samidhaḥ ca eva homa dravyam dvayam smṛtam
ājyam tayoḥ sahakāri tat pradhānam yat aṅka kṣayoḥ

original: paruṣasuktaṃ pūrveṇaiva rudracaiva tu dakṣiṇe // GarP_1,48.81 //
analyzed: pūrveṇa eva tu dakṣiṇe
jyeṣṭhasāma ca bhāruṇḍam tat nayāmi iti paścime
nīlarudraḥ mahā mantraḥ kumbhasūktam atharvaṇaḥ
hutvā sahasram ekaikam devam śirasi kalpayet

original: evaṃ madhye tathā pāde pūrṇāhutyā tathā punaḥ // GarP_1,48.83 //
analyzed: evam madhye tathā pāde pūrṇāhutyā tathā punar
śiraḥ sthāneṣu juhuyāt āviśet ca api anukramāt
vedānām ādi mantraiḥ vā mantraiḥ vā deva nāmabhiḥ
sva śāstra vihitaiḥ vā api gāyattryā vā atha te dvijāḥ
gāyattryā vā athavā ācāryaḥ vyāhṛti praṇavena tu
evam homa vidhim kṛtvā nyaset mantrān tu deśikaḥ

original: caraṇāvagnimīḷe tu iṣetvo gulphayoḥ sthitāḥ // GarP_1,48.86 //
analyzed: caraṇau agnim īḍe tu gulphayoḥ sthitāḥ

original: agna āyāhi jaṅghe dve śannodevīti jānunī /
analyzed: agne āyāhi jaṅghe dve śannodevī iti jānunī
bṛhat rathantare ūrū udareṣu ātilaḥ svātinaḥ nyaset
dīrgha āyuḥ tvāya hṛdaye śrīḥ ca te galake nyaset
trātāram indram urasi netrābhyām tu triyambakam
tathā mūrdhni ālagnāt homam ācaret
utthāpayet tatas devam uttiṣṭha brahmaṇaspate
veda puṇya aha śabdena prāsādānām pradakṣiṇam
piṇḍikā ālaṃbhanam kṛtvā devasya tvā iti mantra vid
dikpāḥ lān saha ratnaiḥ ca dhātūn oṣadhayaḥ tathā

original: lauhabījāni siddhāni paścāddevaṃ tu vinyaset // GarP_1,48.91 //
analyzed: lauha bījāni siddhāni paścāt devam tu vinyaset

original: na garbhe sthāpayeddevaṃ na garbhaṃ tu parityajet /
analyzed: na garbhe sthāpayet devam na garbham tu parityajet

original: īṣanmadhyaṃ parityajya tato doṣāpahaṃ tu tat // GarP_1,48.92 //
analyzed: īṣat madhyam parityajya tatas doṣa apaham tu tat
tilasya tuṣa mātram tu uttaram kiñcid ānayet

original: oṃ sthiro bhava śivo bhava prajābhyaśca namonamaḥ // GarP_1,48.93 //
analyzed: om sthiraḥ bhava śivaḥ bhava prajābhyaḥ ca namaḥ namaḥ

original: devasya tvā saviturvaḥ ṣaḍbhyo vai vinyasedguruḥ /
analyzed: devasya tvā savituḥ vaḥ ṣaḍbhyaḥ vai vinyaset guruḥ
tattva varṇa kalā mātram prajāni bhuvana ātmaje
ṣaḍbhyaḥ vinyasya siddhārtham dhruva arthaiḥ abhimantrayet
sampāta kalaśena eva snāpayet su pratiṣṭhitam
dīpa dhūpa su gandhaiḥ ca naivedyaiḥ ca prapūjayet

original: arghyaṃ dattvā namaskṛtya tato devaṃ kṣamāpayet // GarP_1,48.96 //
analyzed: arghyam dattvā namaskṛtya tatas devam kṣamāpayet
pātram vastra yugam chatram tathā divya aṅgulīyakam

original: ṛttvigbhyaśca pradātavyā dakṣiṇā caiva śaktitaḥ // GarP_1,48.97 //
analyzed: ṛttvigbhyaḥ ca pradātavyā dakṣiṇā ca eva śaktitas
caturthau juhuyāt paścāt yajamānaḥ samāhitaḥ

original: āhutīnāṃ śataṃ hutvā tataḥ pūrṇāṃ pradāpayet // GarP_1,48.98 //
analyzed: āhutīnām śatam hutvā tatas pūrṇām pradāpayet
niṣkramya bahis ācāryaḥ dikpālānām balim haret
ācāryaḥ puṣpa hastaḥ tu kṣamasva iti visarjayet
yāga ante kapilām dadyāt ācāryāya ca cāmaram

original: mukuṭaṃ kuṇḍalaṃ chatraṃ keyūraṃ kaṭisūtrakam // GarP_1,48.100 //
analyzed: mukuṭam kuṇḍalam chatram keyūram kaṭi sūtrakam
vyajanam grāma vastra ādīn sa upaskāram su maṇḍapam
bhojanam ca mahāt kuryāt kṛtakṛtyaḥ ca jāyate
yajamānaḥ vimuktaḥ syāt sthāpakasya prasādataḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe devapratiṣṭhādinirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭacatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe devapratiṣṭhādinirūpaṇam nāma aṣṭacatvāriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
iti pratiṣṭhā prakaraṇam samāptam
brahmā uvāca
sarga ādi kṛt hariḥ ca eva pūjyaḥ svāyambhuva ādibhiḥ

original: viprādyaiḥ svena dharmeṇa taddharmaṃ vyāsa / vai śṛṇu // GarP_1,49.1 //
analyzed: vipra ādyaiḥ svena dharmeṇa tad dharmam vyāsa vai śṛṇu
yajanam yājanam dānam brāhmaṇasya pratigrahaḥ
adhyāpanam ca adhyayanam ṣaḍ karmāṇi dvijottame
dānam adhyayanam yajñaḥ dharmaḥ kṣattriya vaiśyayoḥ
daṇḍaḥ tasya kṛṣiḥ vaiśyasya śasyate
śuśrūṣā eva dvijātīnām śūdrāṇām dharma sādhanam
kāru karma pākayajñaḥ pi dharmataḥ

original: bhikṣācaryātha śuśrūṣā guroḥ svādhyāya eva ca /
analyzed: bhikṣā caryā atha śuśrūṣā guroḥ svādhyāyaḥ eva ca
sandhyā karma agni kāryam ca dharmaḥ yam brahmacāriṇaḥ
sarveṣām āśramāṇām ca dvaividhyam tu caturvidham
yaḥ dhītya vidhivat vedān gṛhastha āśramam āvrajet
upakurvāṇakaḥ jñeyaḥ naiṣṭhikaḥ maraṇa antikaḥ
tithi śuśrūṣā yajñaḥ dānam sura arcanam
gṛhasthasya samāsena dharmaḥ yam dvijasattama
udāsīnaḥ sādhakaḥ ca gṛhasthaḥ dvividhaḥ bhavet

original: kuṭumbabharaṇe yuktaḥ sādhako 'sau gṛhī bhavet // GarP_1,49.9 //
analyzed: kuṭumba bharaṇe yuktaḥ sau gṛhī bhavet
ṛṇāni trīṇi apākṛtya tyaktvā bhāryā dhana ādikam

original: ekākī yastu vicaredudāsīnaḥ sa maukṣikaḥ // GarP_1,49.10 //
analyzed: ekākī yaḥ tu vicaret udāsīnaḥ sa maukṣikaḥ
bhūmau mūla phala āśi tvam svādhyāyaḥ tapaḥ eva ca
saṃvibhāgaḥ yathānyāyam dharmaḥ yam vanavāsinaḥ
tapaḥ tapyati yaḥ raṇye yajet devān juhoti ca
svādhyāye ca eva nirataḥ vanasthaḥ tāpasa uttamaḥ
tapasā karśitaḥ tyartham yaḥ tu dhyāna paraḥ bhavet

original: sanyāsī sa hi vijñeyo vānaprasthāśrame sthitaḥ // GarP_1,49.13 //
analyzed: sa nyāsī sa hi vijñeyaḥ vānaprastha āśrame sthitaḥ
yoga abhyāsa rataḥ nityam ārurukṣuḥ jita indriyaḥ

original: jñānāya vartate bhukṣuḥ procyate pārameṣṭhikaḥ // GarP_1,49.14 //
analyzed: jñānāya vartate bhukṣuḥ procyate pārameṣṭhikaḥ
yaḥ tu ātma ratiḥ eva syāt nitya tṛptaḥ mahā muniḥ

original: samyak ca damasampannaḥ sa yogī bhikṣurucyate // GarP_1,49.15 //
analyzed: samyak ca dama sampannaḥ sa yogī bhikṣuḥ ucyate

original: bhaikṣyaṃ śrutaṃ ca maunitvaṃ tapo dhyānaṃ viśeṣataḥ /
analyzed: bhaikṣyam śrutam ca mauni tvam tapaḥ dhyānam viśeṣataḥ

original: samyak ca jñānavairāgyaṃ dharmo 'yaṃ bhikṣuke mataḥ // GarP_1,49.16 //
analyzed: samyak ca jñāna vairāgyam dharmaḥ yam bhikṣuke mataḥ
jñāna sanyāsinaḥ kecid veda sanyāsinaḥ pare
karma sanyāsinaḥ kecid trividhaḥ pārameṣṭhikaḥ

original: yogī ca trividho jñeyo bhautikaḥ kṣattra evaca /
analyzed: yogī ca trividhaḥ jñeyaḥ bhautikaḥ kṣattraḥ eva ca
tṛtīyaḥ ntyāśramī proktaḥ yoga mūrtim samāsthitaḥ

original: prathamā bhāvanā pūrve mokṣe tvakṣa(duṣka) rabhāvanā /
analyzed: prathamā bhāvanā pūrve mokṣe tvakṣa duṣka ra bhāvanā

original: tṛtīye cāntimā proktā bhāvanā pārameśvarī // GarP_1,49.19 //
analyzed: tṛtīye ca antimā proktā bhāvanā pārameśvarī
dharmāt saṃjāyate mokṣaḥ hi arthāt kāmaḥ bhijāyate

original: pravṛttiśca nivṛttiśca dvividhaṃ karma vaidikam // GarP_1,49.20 //
analyzed: pravṛttiḥ ca nivṛttiḥ ca dvividham karma vaidikam
jñānam pūrvam nivṛttam syāt pravṛttam ca agni deva kṛt
kṣamā damaḥ dayā dānam alobhāḥ bho
bhyāsaḥ eva ca
ārjavam ca ansūyā ca tīrtha anusaraṇam tathā

original: satyaṃ saṃtoṣa āstikyaṃ tathā cendriyanigrahaḥ // GarP_1,49.22 //
analyzed: satyam saṃtoṣaḥ āstikyam tathā ca indriya nigrahaḥ
devatā abhyarcanam pūjā brāhmaṇānām viśeṣataḥ
ahiṃsā priya vādi tvam apaiśunyam arūkṣa tā
ete āśramikāḥ dharmāḥ caturvarṇyam

original: prājāpatyaṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ smṛtaṃ sthānaṃ kriyāvatām // GarP_1,49.24 //
analyzed: prājāpatyam brāhmaṇānām smṛtam sthānam kriyāvatām
sthānam aindram kṣattriyāṇām saṃgrāmeṣu apalāyinām
vaiśyānām mārutam sthānam
gāndharvam śūdra jātīnām paricāre ca vartatām
aṣṭāśīti sahasrāṇām ṛṣīṇām ūrdhvaretasām

original: smṛtaṃ teṣāṃ tu yatsthānaṃ tadeva vana (guru) vāsinām /
analyzed: smṛtam teṣām tu yat sthānam tat eva vana guru vāsinām

original: saptarṣīṇāṃ tu yatsthānaṃ sthānaṃ tadvai vanaukasām // GarP_1,49.27 //
analyzed: saptarṣīṇām tu yat sthānam sthānam tat vai vanaukasām
yatīnām yata cittānām nyāsinām ūrdhvaretasām

original: ānandaṃ brahma tatsthānaṃ yasmānnāvartate muniḥ // GarP_1,49.28 //
analyzed: ānandam brahma tat sthānam yasmāt na āvartate muniḥ
yoginām amṛta sthānam vyoma ākhyam parama akṣaram
ānandam aiśvaram yasmāt muktaḥ na āvartate naraḥ
muktiḥ aṣṭa aṅga vijñānāt saṃkṣepāt tat vade śṛṇu

original: yamāḥ pañca tvahiṃsādyā ahiṃsā prāṇyahiṃsanam // GarP_1,49.30 //
analyzed: yamāḥ pañca tu ahiṃsā ādyāḥ ahiṃsā prāṇi ahiṃsanam
satyam bhūta hitam vākyam asteyam sva agraham param
a maithunam brahmacaryam sarva tyāgaḥ parigrahaḥ
niyamāḥ pañca satya ādyāḥ bāhmam ābhyantaram dvidhā
śaucam tuṣṭiḥ ca santoṣaḥ tapaḥ ca indriya nigrahaḥ
svādhyāyaḥ syāt mantra jāpaḥ praṇidhānam hareḥ yajiḥ
āsanam padmaka ādi uktam prāṇāyāmaḥ marut jayaḥ
garbhaḥ viparītaḥ hi agarbhakaḥ

original: evaṃ dvidhā tridhāpyuktaṃ puraṇātpūrakaḥ sa ca // GarP_1,49.34 //
analyzed: evam dvidhā tridhā api uktam puraṇāt pūrakaḥ sa ca
kumbhakaḥ niścala tvāt ca recanāt recakaḥ tridhā
laghuḥ dvādaśa mātraḥ syāt caturviṃśatikaḥ paraḥ
ṣaṭtriṃśat mātrikaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ pratyāhāraḥ ca rodhanam

original: brahmātmacintā dhyānaṃ syāddhāraṇā manaso dhṛtiḥ // GarP_1,49.36 //
analyzed: brahma ātma cintā dhyānam syāt dhāraṇā manasaḥ dhṛtiḥ
aham brahma iti avasthānam samādhiḥ brahmaṇaḥ sthitiḥ

original: ahamātmā paraṃ brahma satyaṃ jñānamanantakam // GarP_1,49.37 //
analyzed: aham ātmā param brahma satyam jñānam anantakam
brahma vijñānam ānandaḥ sa tat tvam asi kevalam
aham brahma asmi aham brahma aśarīram an indriyam
aham manaḥ buddhi mahat ahaṅkāra ādi varjitam
jāgrat svapna suṣupti ādi yukta jyotiḥ tadīyakam
nityam śuddham buddham uktam satyam ānandam advayam
saḥ āditya puruṣaḥ saḥ saḥ aham akhaṇḍitam
iti dhyāyan vimucyet brāhmaṇaḥ bhava bandhanāt

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe varṇāśramadharmanirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikonapañcāśattamodhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe varṇāśramadharmanirūpaṇam nāma ekonapañcāśattamaḥ adhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
brahmā uvāca
ahani ahani yaḥ kuryāt kriyām sa jñānam āpnuyāt

original: brāhme muhūrte cotthāya dharmamarthaṃ ca cintayet // GarP_1,50.1 //
analyzed: brāhme muhūrte ca utthāya dharmam artham ca cintayet
cintayet hṛdi padma stham ānandam ajaram harim

original: uṣaḥ kāle tu saṃprāpte kṛtvā cāvaśyakaṃ budhaḥ // GarP_1,50.2 //
analyzed: uṣaḥ kāle tu saṃprāpte kṛtvā ca āvaśyakam budhaḥ
strāyāt nadīṣu śuddhāsu śaucam kṛtvā yathāvidhi

original: prataḥ snānena pūyante ye 'pi pāpakṛto janāḥ // GarP_1,50.3 //
analyzed: pratas snānena pūyante ye pi pāpa kṛtaḥ janāḥ
tasmāt sarva prayatnena prātar snānam samācaret

original: prātaḥ snānaṃ praśaṃsanti dṛṣṭādṛṣṭaṣṭakaraṃ hi tat // GarP_1,50.4 //
analyzed: prātar snānam praśaṃsanti hi tat
sukhāt suptasya satatam lālā ādyāḥ saṃstravanti hi
atas nā eva ācaret karmāṇi a kṛtvā snānam āditas

original: alakṣmīḥ kālakarṇo ca duḥ svapnaṃ durvicintitam /
analyzed: alakṣmīḥ kālakarṇo ca dus svapnam durvicintitam

original: prataḥ snānena pāpāni dhūyante nātra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,50.6 //
analyzed: pratas snānena pāpāni dhūyante na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: na ca snānaṃ vinā puṃsāṃ prāśastyaṃ karma saṃsmṛtam /
analyzed: na ca snānam vinā puṃsām prāśastyam karma saṃsmṛtam

original: home japye viśeṣeṇa tasmātsnānaṃ samācaret // GarP_1,50.7 //
analyzed: home japye viśeṣeṇa tasmāt snānam samācaret
aśaktau aśiraskam tu snānam asya vidhīyate

original: ārdreṇa vāsasā vāpi mārjanaṃ kāyikaṃ smṛtam // GarP_1,50.8 //
analyzed: ārdreṇa vāsasā vā api mārjanam kāyikam smṛtam
brāhmam āgneyam uddiṣṭam vāyavyam divyam eva ca
vāruṇam yaugikam tadvat ṣaṣ aṅgam snānam ācaret

original: brāhmaṃ tu mārjanaṃ mantraiḥ kuśaiḥ sodakabindubhiḥ /
analyzed: brāhmam tu mārjanam mantraiḥ kuśaiḥ sa udaka bindubhiḥ
āgreyam bhasmanā ā pāda mastakāt deha dhūnanam

original: gavāṃ hi rajasā proktaṃ vāyavyaṃ snānamuttamam /
analyzed: gavām hi rajasā proktam vāyavyam snānam uttamam
yat tu sa ātapa varṣeṇa snānam tat divyam ucyate
vāruṇam ca avagāham ca tu ātma vedanam
yaugikam snānam ākhyātam yogena hari cintanam
ātmatīrtham iti khyātam sevitam brahma vādibhiḥ
kṣīravṛkṣa samudbhūtam mālatī sambhavam śubham

original: apāmārgaṃ ca vilvaṃ ca karavīraṃ ca dhāvane /
analyzed: apāmārgam ca vilvam ca karavīram ca dhāvane
udak mukhaḥ prāc mukhaḥ vā bhakṣayet dantadhāvanam
prakṣālya bhuktvā tat jahyāt śucau deśe samāhitaḥ
snātvā santarpayet devān ṛṣīn pitṛ gaṇān tathā
ācamya vidhivat nityam punar ācamya vāgyataḥ

original: saṃmārjya mantrai rātmānaṃ kuśaiḥ sodakabindubhaiḥ // GarP_1,50.16 //
analyzed: saṃmārjya mantraiḥ rātmānam kuśaiḥ sa udaka bindubhaiḥ
āpohiṣṭhā vyāhṛtibhiḥ sāvitryā vāruṇaiḥ śubhaiḥ
oṅkāra vyāhṛti yutām gāyattrīm vedamātaram
japtvā jala añjalim dadyāt bhāraskaram prati tad manāḥ

original: prākkūleṣu tataḥ sthitvā darbheṣu susamāhitaḥ // GarP_1,50.18 //
analyzed: prāc kūleṣu tatas sthitvā darbheṣu su samāhitaḥ
prāṇāyāmam tatas kṛtvā dhyāyet sandhyām iti śrutiḥ

original: yā sandhyā sā jagatsūtirmāyātītā hi niṣkalā // GarP_1,50.19 //
analyzed: yā sandhyā sā jagat sūtiḥ māyā atītā hi niṣkalā
aiśvarī kevalā śaktiḥ tattva traya samudbhavā

original: dhyātvā raktāṃ sitāṃ kṛṣṇāṃ gāyattrīṃ vai japedvudhaḥ // GarP_1,50.20 //
analyzed: dhyātvā raktām sitām kṛṣṇām gāyattrīm vai japet vudhaḥ
prāc mukhaḥ satatam vipraḥ sandhyā upāsanam ācaret
śuciḥ nityam anarhaḥ sarva karmasu
yat anyat kurute kiñcid na tasya phala bhāj bhavet
an anya cetasaḥ santaḥ brāhmaṇāḥ vedapāragāḥ
upāsya vidhivat sandhyām prāptāḥ pūrva parām gatim

original: yo 'nyatra kurute yatnaṃ dharma kārye dvijottamaḥ // GarP_1,50.23 //
analyzed: yaḥ nyatra kurute yatnam dharma kārye dvijottamaḥ
vihāya sandhyā praṇatim sa yāti naraka ayutam
tasmāt sarva prayatnena sandhyā upāsanam ācaret
upāsitaḥ bhavet tena devaḥ yoga tanuḥ paraḥ
sahasra paramām nityām śata madhyām daśa avarām
gāyattrīm vai japet vidvān prāc mukhaḥ prayataḥ śuciḥ
atha upatiṣṭhet ādityam udaya stham samāhitaḥ
mantraiḥ tu vividhaiḥ sauraiḥ ṛk yajuḥ sāma saṃjñitaiḥ
upasthāya mahā yogam devadevam divākaram
kurvīta praṇatim bhūmau mūrdhānam abhimantritaḥ
om khakholkāya śāntāya kāraṇa traya hetave
nivedayāmi ca ātmānam namaḥ te jñāna rūpiṇe

original: tvameva brahma paramamāpo jyotī raso 'mṛtam // GarP_1,50.29 //
analyzed: tvam eva brahma paramam āpaḥ jyotiḥ rasaḥ mṛtam
bhūḥ bhuvaḥ svar tvam oṅkāraḥ sarvaḥ rudraḥ sanātanaḥ
etat vai sūryahṛdayam japtvā stavanam uttamam
prātar kāle ca madhyāhne namaskuryāt divākaram
atha āgamya gṛham vipraḥ paścāt
samācamya yathāvidhi
prajvālya vahnim vidhivat juhuyāt jātavedasam

original: ṛtvik putro 'tha patnī vā śiṣyo vāpi sahodaraḥ // GarP_1,50.32 //
analyzed: ṛtvij patnī vā śiṣyaḥ vā api sahodaraḥ
prāpya anujñām viśeṣeṇa juhuyāt vā yathāvidhi

original: vinā ma (ta) ntreṇa yatkarma nāmutreha phalapradam // GarP_1,50.33 //
analyzed: vinā ma ta ntreṇa yat karma na amutra iha phala pradam
daivatāni namaskuryāt upahārān nivedayet

original: guruṃ caivāpyupāsīta hitaṃ cāsya samācaret // GarP_1,50.34 //
analyzed: gurum ca eva api upāsīta hitam ca asya samācaret
veda abhyāsam tatas kuryāt prayatnāt śaktitaḥ dvijaḥ
japet vā adhyāpayet śiṣyān dhārayet vai vicārayet
avekṣeta ca śāstrāṇi dharma ādīni dvijottamaḥ
vaidikān ca eva nigamān vedāṅgāni ca sarvaśas
upayāt īśvaram ca eva yogakṣema prāsiddhaye
sādhayet vividhān arthān kuṭumba artham tatas dvijaḥ
tatas madhyāhna samaye snāna artham mṛdam āharet
puṣpa akṣatān tila kuśān gomayam śuddham eva ca

original: nadīṣu devakhāteṣu taḍāgeṣu saraḥ su ca /
analyzed: nadīṣu devakhāteṣu taḍāgeṣu saraḥ su ca
snānam samācaret na eva parakīye kadācana
pañca piṇḍān an uddhṛtya snānam duṣyanti nityaśas

original: mṛdaikayā śiraḥ kṣālyaṃ dvābhyāṃ nābhestathopari // GarP_1,50.40 //
analyzed: mṛdā ekayā śiraḥ kṣālyam dvābhyām nābheḥ tathā upari

original: adhaśca tisṛbhiḥ kṣālyaṃ pādau ṣaṭbhistathaiva ca /
analyzed: adhas ca tisṛbhiḥ kṣālyam pādau ṣaṭbhiḥ tathā eva ca
mṛttikā ca samuddiṣṭā
gomayasya pramāṇam tu tena aṅgam lepayet tatas
prakṣālya ācamya vidhivat tatas snāyāt samāhitaḥ
lepayitvā tu tīra sthaḥ tad liṅgaiḥ eva mantrataḥ
abhimantrya jalam mantraiḥ āliṅgaiḥ vāruṇaiḥ śubhaiḥ
smaret viṣṇamā apaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ yatas
prekṣya oṅkāram ādityam tris nimajjet jalāśaye
ācāntaḥ punar ācāmet mantreṇa anena mantra vid
antar carasi bhūteṣu guhāyām viśvatomukhaḥ

original: tvaṃ yajñastvaṃ vaṣaṭkāra āpo jyotī raso 'mṛtam /
analyzed: tvam yajñaḥ tvam vaṣaṭkāraḥ āpaḥ jyotiḥ rasaḥ mṛtam
drupadām vā tris abhyasyet dyāhṛti praṇava anvitām
sāvitrīm vā jape dvidvān tathā ca eva aghamarṣaṇam
tatas saṃmārjanam kuryāt āpohiṣṭhā mayobhuvaḥ
idam āpaḥ pravahata vyāhṛtibhiḥ tathā eva ca
tatas hi ṣṭhā ādi mantrakaiḥ
antar jalam avāk magnaḥ japet tris aghamarṣaṇam

original: drupadāṃ vātha sāvitrariṃ tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam // GarP_1,50.49 //
analyzed: drupadām vā atha sāvitrarim tat viṣṇoḥ paramam padam
āvartayet vā praṇavam devadevam ramaret harim

original: apaḥ pāṇau samādāya japtvā vai mārjane kṛte // GarP_1,50.50 //
analyzed: apaḥ pāṇau samādāya japtvā vai mārjane kṛte
vinyasya mūrdhni tat toyam mucyate sarva pātakaiḥ
sandhyām upāsya ca ācamya saṃsmaret nityam īśvaram
atha upatiṣṭhet ādityam ūrdhva puṣpa anvita añjalim
prakṣipya ālokayet devam udayantam na śakyate
udutyam citram iti evam tat cakṣuḥ iti mantrataḥ

original: haṃsaḥ śuciṣadetena sāvitryā ca viśeṣataḥ // GarP_1,50.53 //
analyzed: haṃsaḥ śuciṣad etena sāvitryā ca viśeṣataḥ

original: anyaiḥ saurairvaidikaiśca gāyattrīṃ ca tato japet /
analyzed: anyaiḥ sauraiḥ vaidikaiḥ ca gāyattrīm ca tatas japet
mantrān ca vividhān paścāt prāc kūle ca
tiṣṭhan ca vīkṣyamāṇa ūrkam japam kuryāt samāhitaḥ
sphaṭika abja akṣa rudrākṣaiḥ putrajīva samudbhavaiḥ

original: kartavyā tvakṣālā syādantarā tatra sā smṛtā /
analyzed: kartavyā syāt antarā tatra sā smṛtā
yadi syāt klinna vāsāḥ vai vāri madhya gataḥ caret

original: anyathā ca śucau bhūmyāṃ darbheṣu ca samāhitaḥ /
analyzed: anyathā ca śucau bhūmyām darbheṣu ca samāhitaḥ

original: pradakṣiṇaṃ samāvṛtya namaskṛtya tataḥ kṣitau // GarP_1,50.57 //
analyzed: pradakṣiṇam samāvṛtya namaskṛtya tatas kṣitau
ācamya ca yathāśāstram śaktyā svādhyāyam ācaret
tatas santarpayet devān ṛṣīn pitṛ gaṇān tathā
ādau oṅkāram uccārya namaḥ nte tarpayāmi ca
devān brahma ṛṣīn ca eva tarpayet akṣata udakaiḥ
pitṝn devān munīn bhaktyā sva sūtra ukta vidhānataḥ
deva ṛṣoṃ tarpayet dhīmān udaka añjalibhiḥ
yajña upavītī devānām nivītī ṛṣi tarpaṇe

original: prācīnāvītī pitrye tu tena tīrthena bhārata /
analyzed: prācīnāvītī pitrye tu tena tīrthena bhārata

original: niṣpīḍya snānavastraṃ vai samācamya ca vāgyataḥ // GarP_1,50.62 //
analyzed: niṣpīḍya snāna vastram vai samācamya ca vāgyataḥ
svaiḥ mantraiḥ arcayet devān puṣpaiḥ patraiḥ tathā ambubhiḥ

original: brahmāṇaṃ śaṅkaraṃ sūryaṃ tathaiva madhusūdanam // GarP_1,50.63 //
analyzed: brahmāṇam śaṅkaram sūryam tathā eva madhusūdanam
anyān ca abhimatān devān bhaktyā ca akrodhanaḥ hara

original: pradadyādvātha puṣpādi sūktena puruṣeṇa tu // GarP_1,50.64 //
analyzed: pradadyāt vā atha puṣpa ādi sūktena puruṣeṇa tu

original: āpo vā devatāḥ sarvāstena samyak samarcitāḥ /
analyzed: āpaḥ vā devatāḥ sarvāḥ tena samyak samarcitāḥ

original: dhyātvā praṇavapūrvaṃ vai devaṃ vārisamāhitaḥ // GarP_1,50.65 //
analyzed: dhyātvā praṇava pūrvam vai devam vāri samāhitaḥ
namaskāreṇa puṣāpāṇi vinyaset vai pṛthak pṛthak

original: narte hyārādhanātpuṇyaṃ vidyate karma vaidikam // GarP_1,50.66 //
analyzed: na ṛte hi ārādhanāt puṇyam vidyate karma vaidikam
tasmāt tatra ādi madhya ante cetasā dhārayet harim

original: tadviṣṇoriti mantreṇa sūktena puruṣeṇa tu // GarP_1,50.67 //
analyzed: tat viṣṇoḥ iti mantreṇa sūktena puruṣeṇa tu
nivedayet ca ātmānam viṣṇave mala tejase
tadā adhyātma manāḥ śāntaḥ tat viṣṇoḥ iti mantrataḥ
a prete sa śirāḥ vā iti yajet vā puṣpake harim
deva yajñam pitṛ yajñam tathā eva ca

original: mānuṣaṃ brahmayajñaṃ ca pañca yajñānsamācaret // GarP_1,50.69 //
analyzed: mānuṣam brahmayajñam ca pañca yajñān samācaret
yadi syāt tarpaṇāt arvāk brahma yajñam kutas bhavet

original: kṛtvā manuṣyayajñaṃ vai tataḥ svādhyāyamācaret // GarP_1,50.70 //
analyzed: kṛtvā manuṣyayajñam vai tatas svādhyāyam ācaret

original: vaiśvadevastu kartavyo devayajñaḥ sa tu smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: vaiśvadevaḥ tu kartavyaḥ deva yajñaḥ sa tu smṛtaḥ

original: bhūtayajñaḥṛ sa vai jñeyo bhūtebhyo yastvayaṃ baliḥ // GarP_1,50.71 //
analyzed: bhūtayajñaḥ sa vai jñeyaḥ bhūtebhyaḥ yaḥ tu ayam baliḥ
śvabhyaḥ ca śvapacebhyaḥ ca patita ādibhyaḥ eva ca
dadyāt bhūmau bahis tu annam pakṣibhyaḥ ca dvijottamaḥ
ekam tu bhojayet vipram pitṝn uddiśya sattamāḥ
nitya śrāddham tat uddiśya pitṛ yajñaḥ gati pradaḥ
uddhṛtya vā yathāśakti kiñcid annam samāhitaḥ
veda tattva artha viduṣe dvijāya eva upapādayet
pūjayet atithim nityam namasyet arcayot dvijam

original: manovākkarmabhiḥ śāntaṃ svāgataiḥ svagṛhaṃ tataḥ // GarP_1,50.75 //
analyzed: śāntam svāgataiḥ sva gṛham tatas
bhikṣām āhuḥ grāsa mātram annam tat syāt caturguṇam
puṣkalam hantakāram tu tat caturguṇam ucyate
godoha mātra kālam vai pratīkṣyaḥ hi atithiḥ svayam
abhyāgatān yathāśakti pūjayet atithim tathā
bhikṣām vai bhikṣave dadyāt vidhivat brahyacāriṇe
dadyāt annam yathāśakti arthibhyaḥ lobha varjitaḥ
bhuñjati bandhubhiḥ sārdham vāgyataḥ nnam akutsayan

original: akṛtvā tu dvijaḥ pañca mahāyajñān dvijottamaḥ // GarP_1,50.79 //
analyzed: a kṛtvā tu dvijaḥ pañca mahāyajñān dvijottamaḥ

original: bhuñjate cetsa mūḍhātmā tiryagyoniṃ ca gacchati /
analyzed: bhuñjate ced sa mūḍha ātmā tiryagyonim ca gacchati
veda abhyāsaḥ nu aham śaktyā mahāyajña kriyā kṣamāḥ
nāśayanti āśu pāpāni devānām arcanam tathā
yaḥ mohāt atha vā ālasyāt a kṛtvā devatā arcanam
bhuṅkte sa yāti narakān sūṃkareṣu eva jāyate

original: aśaucaṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi aśuciḥ pātakī sadā // GarP_1,50.82 //
analyzed: aśaucam saṃpravakṣyāmi aśuciḥ pātakī sadā
aśaucam ca eva saṃsargāt śuddhiḥ saṃsarga varjanāt
daśa aham prāhuḥ āśaucam sarve viprāḥ vipaścitaḥ
mṛteṣu vā atha jāteṣu brāhmaṇānām dvijottama
ā danta jananāt sadyas ācūḍāt eka rātrakam
tri rātram aupanayanāt daśa rātram atas param
kṣattriyaḥ dvādaśahena daśabhiḥ pañcabhiḥ viśaḥ

original: śudhyenmāsena vai śūdro yatīnāṃ nāsti pātakam /
analyzed: śudhyet māsena vai śūdraḥ yatīnām na asti pātakam
rātribhiḥ māsa tulyābhiḥ garbha strāveṣu śaucakam

original: iti gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe nityakarmāśaucayornirūpaṇaṃ nāma pañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe nityakarmāśaucayornirūpaṇam nāma pañcāśattamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
brahmā uvāca
atha atas saṃpravakṣyāmi dāna dharmam anuttamam
arthānām ucite pātre śraddhayā pratipādanam
dānam tu kathitam tad jñaiḥ bhukti mukti phala pradam
nyāyena upārjayet vittam dāna bhoga phalam ca tat
adhyāpanam yājanam ca vṛttam āhuḥ pratigraham
kusīdam kṛṣi vāṇijyam varjayet
yat dīyate tu pātrebhyaḥ tat dānam parikīrtitam

original: nityaṃ naimittikaṃ kāmyaṃ vimalaṃ dānamīritam // GarP_1,51.4 //
analyzed: nityam naimittikam kāmyam vimalam dānam īritam
ahani ahani yat kiñcid dīyate n upakāriṇe

original: anuddiśya phalaṃ tasmādbrāhmaṇāya tu nityaśaḥ // GarP_1,51.5 //
analyzed: an uddiśya phalam tasmāt brāhmaṇāya tu nityaśas

original: yattu pāpopaśāntyai ca dīyate vidupāṃ kare /
analyzed: yat tu pāpa upaśāntyai ca dīyate vidupām kare
naimittikam tat uddiṣṭan dānam sadbhiḥ anuṣṭhitam
apatya vijaya aiśvarya svarga artham yat pradīyate
dānam tat kāmyam ākhyātam ṛṣibhiḥ dharma acintakaiḥ
īśvara prīṇana arthāya

original: cetasā sattvayuktena dānaṃ tadvimalaṃ śivam // GarP_1,51.8 //
analyzed: cetasā sattva yuktena dānam tat vimalam śivam
ikṣubhiḥ santatām bhumim yava godhūma śālinīm

original: dadāti vedaviduṣe sa na bhūyo 'bhijāyate // GarP_1,51.9 //
analyzed: dadāti veda viduṣe sa na bhūyas bhijāyate

original: bhūmidānātparaṃ dānaṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: bhūmi dānāt param dānam na bhūtam na bhaviṣyati

original: vidyāṃ dattvā brāhmaṇāya brahmaloke mahīyate // GarP_1,51.10 //
analyzed: vidyām dattvā brāhmaṇāya brahma loke mahīyate
dadyāt aharahar tāḥ tu śraddhayā brahmacāriṇe
sarva pāpa vinirmuktaḥ brahma sthānam avāpnuyāt

original: vaiśākhyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ tu brāhmaṇānsapta pañca ca /
analyzed: vaiśākhyām paurṇamāsyām tu brāhmaṇān sapta pañca ca
upoṣya abhyarcayet vidvān madhunā tila sarpiṣā
gandha ādibhiḥ samabhyarcya vācayet vā svayam vadet

original: prīyatāṃ dharmarājeti yathā manasi vartate // GarP_1,51.13 //
analyzed: prīyatām dharmarājā iti yathā manasi vartate
yāvajjīvam kṛtam pāpam tad kṣaṇāt eva naśyati
kṛṣṇājine tilān kṛtvā hiraṇya madhu sarpiṣā

original: dadāti yastu viprāya sarvaṃ tarati duṣkṛtam /
analyzed: dadāti yaḥ tu viprāya sarvam tarati duṣkṛtam

original: ghṛtānnamudakaṃ caiva vaiśākhyāṃ ca viśeṣataḥ // GarP_1,51.15 //
analyzed: ghṛta annam udakam ca eva vaiśākhyām ca viśeṣataḥ
nirdiśya dharmarājāya viprebhyaḥ mucyate bhayāt
dvādaśyām arcayet viṣṇum upoṣya agha praṇāśanam
sarva pāpa vinirmuktaḥ naraḥ bhavati niścitam

original: yo hi yāṃ devatāmicchetsamārādhayituṃ naraḥ // GarP_1,51.17 //
analyzed: yaḥ hi yām devatām icchet samārādhayitum naraḥ
brāhmaṇān pūjayet datnāt bhojayet yoṣitaḥ surān
santāna kāmaḥ satatam pūjayet vai purandaram
brahmavarcasa kāmaḥ tu brāhmaṇān brahma niścayāt
ārogya kāmaḥ tha ravim dhana kāmaḥ hutāśanam
karmaṇām siddhi kāmaḥ tu pūjayet vai vināyakam

original: bhogakāmo hi śaśinaṃ balakāmaḥ samīraṇam // GarP_1,51.20 //
analyzed: bhoga kāmaḥ hi śaśinam bala kāmaḥ samīraṇam
mumukṣuḥ sarva saṃsārāt prayatnena arcayet harim

original: akāmaḥ sarvakāmo vā pūjayettu gadādharam // GarP_1,51.21 //
analyzed: akāmaḥ sarva kāmaḥ vā pūjayet tu gadādharam
vāri daḥ tṛptim āpnoti sukham akṣayyam anna daḥ
tila pradaḥ prajām iṣṭām dīpa daḥ cakṣuḥ uttamam
bhūmi daḥ sarvam āpnoti dīrgham āyuḥ hiraṇya daḥ
gṛha daḥ gryāṇi veśmāni rūpya daḥ rūpam uttamam
vāsaḥ daḥ cāndra sālokyam aśvi sālokyam aśva daḥ

original: anaḍuddaḥ śriyaṃ puṣṭāṃ godo bradhnasya viṣṭapam // GarP_1,51.24 //
analyzed: anaḍuh daḥ śriyam puṣṭām go daḥ bradhnasya viṣṭapam
yāna śayyā pradaḥ bhāryām aiśvaryam abhaya pradaḥ

original: dhānyadaḥ śāvataṃ saukhyaṃ brahmado brahma śāśvatam // GarP_1,51.25 //
analyzed: dhānya daḥ śāvatam saukhyam brahma daḥ brahma śāśvatam
veda vitsu dadat jñānam svarga loke mahīyate
gavām ghāsa pradānena sarva pāpaiḥ pramucyate
indhanānām pradānena dīpta agniḥ jāyate naraḥ
auṣadham sneham āhāram rogi roga praśāntaye
dadānaḥ roga rahitaḥ sukhī dīrgha āyuḥ eva ca
asipatravanam mārgam kṣura dhārā samanvitam
tīkṣṇā tapam ca tarati chatra upānah pradaḥ naraḥ

original: yadyadiṣṭatamaṃ loke yaccāsya dayitaṃ gṛhe // GarP_1,51.29 //
analyzed: yat yat iṣṭatamam loke yat ca asya dayitam gṛhe
tat tat guṇavate deyam tat eva akṣayam icchatā

original: ayena viṣuve caiva grahaṇe candrasūryayoḥ // GarP_1,51.30 //
analyzed: ayena viṣuve ca eva grahaṇe candra sūryayoḥ
saṃkrānti ādiṣu kāleṣu dattam bhavati ca akṣayam

original: prayāgādiṣu tīrtheṣu gayāyāṃ ca viśeṣataḥ // GarP_1,51.31 //
analyzed: prayāga ādiṣu tīrtheṣu gayāyām ca viśeṣataḥ
dāna dharmāt paraḥ dharmaḥ bhūtānām na he vidyate
svarga āyuḥ bhūti kāmena dānam pāpa upaśāntaye
dīyamānam tu yaḥ mohāt go vipra agni sureṣu ca
nivārayati pāpa ātmā tiryagyonim vrajet naraḥ
yaḥ tu durbhikṣa velāyām annādyam na prayacchati

original: mriyamāṇeṣu vipreṣu brahmahā sa tu garhitaḥ // GarP_1,51.34 //
analyzed: mriyamāṇeṣu vipreṣu brahma hā sa tu garhitaḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe dānadharmanirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikapañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe dānadharmanirūpaṇam nāma ekapañcāśattamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
brahmā uvāca
atas param pravakṣyāmi prāyaścitta vidhim dvijāḥ

original: brahmahā ca surāpaśca steyī ca gurutalpagaḥ // GarP_1,52.1 //
analyzed: brahma hā ca surāpaḥ ca steyī ca gurutalpa gaḥ
pañca pātakinaḥ tu ete tad saṃyogī ca pañcamaḥ
upapāpāni gohatyā prabhṛtīni surāḥ jaguḥ

original: brahmahā dvādaśābdāni kuṭīṃ kṛtvā vane vaset /
analyzed: brahma hā dvādaśa abdāni kuṭīm kṛtvā vane vaset

original: kuryādanaśanaṃ vātha bhṛgoḥ patanameva ca // GarP_1,52.3 //
analyzed: kuryāt anaśanam vā atha bhṛgoḥ patanam eva ca

original: jvalantaṃ vā viśedagniṃ jalaṃ vā praviśetsvayam /
analyzed: jvalantam vā viśet agnim jalam vā praviśet svayam

original: brāhmaṇārthe gavārthe vā samyak prāṇānparityajet // GarP_1,52.4 //
analyzed: brāhmaṇa arthe gavā arthe vā samyak prāṇān parityajet

original: dattvā cānnaṃ ca viduṣe brahmahatyāṃ vyapohati /
analyzed: dattvā ca annam ca viduṣe brahmahatyām vyapohati

original: aśvamedhāvabhṛthake snātvā vā mucyate dvijaḥ // GarP_1,52.5 //
analyzed: aśvamedha avabhṛthake snātvā vā mucyate dvijaḥ
sarva svam vā veda vide brāhmaṇāya pradāpayet
sarasvatyāḥ taraṅgiṇyāḥ saṅgame loka viśrute
śuddhe triṣavaṇa snātaḥ tri rātra upoṣitaḥ dvijaḥ

original: setubandhe naraḥ snātvā mucyate brahmahatyayā // GarP_1,52.7 //
analyzed: setubandhe naraḥ snātvā mucyate brahma hatyayā
kapālamocane snātvā vārāṇasyām tathā eva ca

original: surāpastu surāṃ pītvā agnivarṇāṃ dvijottamaḥ // GarP_1,52.8 //
analyzed: surāpaḥ tu surām pītvā agni varṇām dvijottamaḥ
payaḥ ghṛtam vā go mūtram tasmāt pāpāt pramucyate

original: suvarṇasteyī muktaḥ syānmusalena hato nṛpaiḥ // GarP_1,52.9 //
analyzed: suvarṇa steyī muktaḥ syāt musalena hataḥ nṛpaiḥ
cīra vāsāḥ dvijaḥ raṇye caret brahma haṇa vratam
guru bhāryām samāruhya brāhmaṇaḥ kāma mohitaḥ
avagūhet striyam taptām dīptām kārṣṇāyasīm kṛtām
guru aṅganā gāminaḥ ca careyuḥ bahma ha vratam

original: cāndrāyaṇāni vā kuryātpañca catvāri vā punaḥ /
analyzed: cāndrāyaṇāni vā kuryāt pañca catvāri vā punar

original: patitena ca saṃsargaṃ kurute yastu vai dvijaḥ // GarP_1,52.12 //
analyzed: patitena ca saṃsargam kurute yaḥ tu vai dvijaḥ
sa tad pāpa apanoda artham tasya eva vratam ācaret
taptakṛcchram caret vā atha saṃvatsaram atandritaḥ

original: cāndrāyaṇaṃ ca vidhinā kṛtaṃ caivātikṛcchrakam // GarP_1,52.14 //
analyzed: cāndrāyaṇam ca vidhinā kṛtam ca eva atikṛcchrakam
puṇya kṣetre gayā ādau ca gamanam pāpa nāśanam

original: amāvasyāṃ tithiṃ prāpya yaḥ samārādhayedbhavam // GarP_1,52.15 //
analyzed: amāvasyām tithim prāpya yaḥ samārādhayet bhavam
brāhmaṇān bhojayitvā tu sarva pāpaiḥ pramucyate
upoṣitaḥ caturdaśyām kṛṣṇa pakṣe samāhitaḥ
yamāya dharmarājāya mṛtyave ca antakāya ca
vaivasvatāya kālāya sarva bhūta kṣayāya ca
pratyekam tila saṃyuktān dadyāt sapta jala añjalīn

original: snātvā nadyāṃ tu pūrvāhne mucyate sarvapātakaiḥ // GarP_1,52.18 //
analyzed: snātvā nadyām tu pūrvāhne mucyate sarva pātakaiḥ
brahmacaryam adhas śayyām upavāsam dvija arcanam
vrateṣu eteṣu kurvīta śāntaḥ saṃyata mānasaḥ
paṣṭhyām upoṣitaḥ devam śukla pakṣe samāhitaḥ
saptamyām arcayet bhānum mucyate sarva pātakaiḥ
ekādaśyām nirāhāraḥ samabhyarcya janārdanam
dvādaśyām śukla pakṣasya mahā pāpaiḥ pramucyate
tapaḥ japaḥ tīrtha sevā deva brāhmaṇa pūjanam
grahaṇa ādiṣu kāleṣu mahāpātaka nāśanam
yaḥ sarva pāpa yuktaḥ puṇya tīrtheṣu mānavaḥ
niyamena tyajet prāṇān mucyate sarva pātakaiḥ
brahma ghnam vā kṛtaghnam vā mahāpātaka dūṣitam
bhartāram uddharet nārī praviṣṭā saha pāvakam

original: pativratā tu yā nārī bhartuḥ śuśrūṣaṇotsukā /
analyzed: pativratā tu yā nārī bhartuḥ śuśrūṣaṇa utsukā

original: na tasyā vidyate pāpamiha loke paratra ca // GarP_1,52.25 //
analyzed: na tasyāḥ vidyate pāpam iha loke paratra ca
tathā rāmasya subhagā sītā trailokya viśrutā
patnī dāśaratheḥ devī vijigye rākṣaseśvaram
labhet

original: ityāha bhagavānviṣṇuḥ purā mama yatavratāḥ // GarP_1,52.27 //
analyzed: iti āha bhagavān viṣṇuḥ purā mama yata vratāḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe prāyaścittanirūpaṇaṃ nāma dvipañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe prāyaścittanirūpaṇam nāma dvipañcāśattamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
sūtaḥ uvāca
evam brahmā abravīt śrutvā hareḥ aṣṭa nidhīn tathā
tatra padma mahāpadmau tathā makara kacchapau
mukundakuna
ndau nīlaḥ ca śaṅkhaḥ ca eva aparaḥ nidhiḥ
satyām ṛddhau bhavanti ete svarūpam kathayāmi aham
padmena lakṣitaḥ ca eva sāttvikaḥ jāyate naraḥ
dākṣiṇya sāraḥ puruṣaḥ suvarṇa ādika saṃgraham
rupya ādi kuryāt dadyāt tu yati daiva ādi yajvanām
mahāpadma aṅkitaḥ dadyāt dhana ādyam dhārmikāya ca
nīdhī padma mahāpadmau sāttvikau puruṣau smṛtī
makareṇa aṅkitaḥ khaḍga bāṇa kunta ādi saṃgrahī

original: dadyācchrutāya maitrīṃ ca yāti nityaṃ ca rājabhiḥ /
analyzed: dadyāt śrutāya maitrīm ca yāti nityam ca rājabhiḥ

original: dravyārthaṃ śatruṇā nāśaṃ saṃgrāme cāpi saṃvrajet // GarP_1,53.6 //
analyzed: dravya artham śatruṇā nāśam saṃgrāme ca api saṃvrajet

original: makaraḥ kacchapaścaiva tāmasau tu nidhī smṛtau /
analyzed: makaraḥ kacchapaḥ ca eva tāmasau tu nidhī smṛtau
kacchapī viśvaset nā eva na
dadāti ca
nidhānam urvyām kurute nidhiḥ saḥ api eka pūruṣaḥ
rājasena mukundena lakṣitā rājya saṃgrahī
bhukta bhogaḥ gāyanebhyaḥ dadyāt veśyā ādikāsu ca

original: rajastamomayo nandī ādhāraḥ syātkulasya ca // GarP_1,53.9 //

original: stutaḥ prīto bhavati vai bahubhāryā bhavanti ca /

original: pūrvamitreṣu śaithilyaṃ prītimanyaiḥ karoti ca // GarP_1,53.10 //

ca aṅkitaḥ sattva tejasā saṃyutaḥ bhavet
vastra dhānya ādi saṃgrāhī taḍāga ādi karoti ca
tri pūpau ruṣaḥ nidhiḥ ca eva āmra ārāma ādi kārayet

original: ekasya syānnidhiḥ śaṅkhaḥ svayaṃ bhuṅkte dhanādi(nta)kam // GarP_1,53.12 //
analyzed: ekasya syāt nidhiḥ śaṅkhaḥ svayam bhuṅkte dhanādintakam
kadanna bhuj parijanaḥ na ca
sva poṣaṇa paraḥ śaṅkhī dadyāt para nare vṛthā
miśra avalokanāt miśra svabhāva phala dāyinaḥ
nidhīnām rūpam uktam tu hariṇā api hara ādike
hariḥ bhuvana kośa ādi yathā uvāca tathā vade

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe navanidhivarṇanaṃ nāma tripañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ

hariḥ uvāca
agnīdhraḥ ca agnibāhuḥ ca bapuṣmān dhyutimān tathā

original: medhāmedhātithirbhavyaḥ śabalaḥ putra eva ca // GarP_1,54.1 //
analyzed: medhāḥ medhātithiḥ bhavyaḥ śabalaḥ putraḥ eva ca
jyotiṣmān daśamaḥ jātaḥ putrāḥ hi ete priyavratāt
medha agnibāhu putrāḥ tu trayaḥ yoga parāyaṇāḥ
jātismarāḥ mahābhāgāḥ nairājyāya

original: vibhajya sapta dvīpāni saptānāṃ pradadau nṛpaḥ // GarP_1,54.3 //
analyzed: vibhajya sapta dvīpāni saptānām pradadau nṛpaḥ
yojanānām pramāṇena pañcāśat koṭiḥ āplutā

original: jalopari mahī yātā maurivāste sarijjale // GarP_1,54.4 //
analyzed: jala upari mahī yātā maurivā āste sarit jale
