original: kuśaḥ krauñcastathā śākaḥ puṣkaraścaiva saptamaḥ // GarP_1,54.5 //
analyzed: kuśaḥ krauñcaḥ tathā śākaḥ puṣkaraḥ ca eva saptamaḥ
ete dvīpāḥ samudraiḥ tu sapta saptabhiḥ āvṛtāḥ
dvīpāt tu dviguṇaḥ dvīpaḥ samudraḥ ca vṛṣadhvaja
jambūdvīpe sthitaḥ meruḥ lakṣa yojana vistṛtaḥ
caturaśīti sāhasraiḥ yojanaiḥ asya ca ucchrayaḥ
praviṣṭaḥ ṣoḍaśa adhastāt dvatriṃśat mūrdhni vistṛtaḥ
adhas ṣoḍaśa sāhasraḥ karṇikā ākāra saṃsyitaḥ
himavān hemakūṭaḥ ca niṣadhaḥ ca asya dakṣiṇe

original: nīlaḥ śvetaśca śṛṅgī ca uttare varṣaparvatāḥ /
analyzed: nīlaḥ śvetaḥ ca śṛṅgī ca uttare varṣaparvatāḥ

original: plakṣādiṣu narā rudra ye vasanti sanātanāḥ // GarP_1,54.10 //
analyzed: plakṣa ādiṣu narāḥ rudra ye vasanti sanātanāḥ
śaṅkara atha na teṣu asti yuga avasthā kathañcana
jambūdvīpa īśvarāt putrāḥ hi agrīdhnāt abhavat nava
nābhiḥ kiṃpuruṣaḥ ca eva harivarṣam ilā vṛtaḥ

original: ramyo hiraṇmayākhyaśca kururbhadrāśva eva ca // GarP_1,54.12 //
analyzed: ramyaḥ hiraṇmaya ākhyaḥ ca kuruḥ bhadrāśvaḥ eva ca
ketumālaḥ nṛpaḥ tebhyaḥ tad saṃjñān khaṇḍakān dadau

original: nābhestu merudevyāṃ tu putro 'bhūdṛṣabho hara // GarP_1,54.13 //
analyzed: nābheḥ tu merudevyām tu putraḥ bhūt ṛṣabhaḥ hara

original: tatputro bharato nāma śālagrāme sthito vratī /
analyzed: tad putraḥ bharataḥ nāma śālagrāme sthitaḥ vratī
sumatiḥ bharatasya abhūt tad putraḥ taijasaḥ bhavat
indradyumnaḥ ca tad putraḥ parameṣṭhī tatas smṛtaḥ
pratīhāraḥ ca tad putraḥ pratihartā tad ātmajaḥ
sutaḥ tasmāt athai jātaḥ prastāraḥ tad sutaḥ vibhuḥ

original: pṛthuśca tatsuto nakto naktasyāpi gayaḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,54.16 //
analyzed: pṛthuḥ ca tad sutaḥ naktaḥ naktasya api gayaḥ smṛtaḥ
naraḥ gayasya tanayaḥ tad putraḥ bhudvirāj agataḥ
tatas dhīmān mahā tejāḥ bhauvanaḥ tasya ca ātmajaḥ
tvaṣṭā tvaṣṭuḥ ca virajāḥ rajaḥ tasya api abhūt sutaḥ
śatajit rajasaḥ tasya viṣvagjyotiḥ sutaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: iti śrāgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bhuvanakośavarṇanopayogipriyavratavaṃśanirūpaṇaṃ nāma catuḥ pañcaśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ

varṣaḥ hiraṇvān vṛṣabhadhvaja
tatas kimpuruṣaḥ varṣaḥ meroḥ dakṣiṇatas smṛtaḥ
bhārataḥ dakṣiṇe proktaḥ hariḥ dakṣiṇa pāścime

uttare ca kuroḥ varṣaḥ kalpavṛkṣa samāvṛtaḥ

varjayitvā tu bhāratam
indradvīpaḥ kaśerumān tāmravarṇaḥ
nāgadvīpaḥ kaṭāhaḥ ca siṃhalaḥ vāruṇaḥ tathā
ayam tu navamaḥ teṣām dvīpaḥ sāgara saṃvṛtaḥ

original: aṇḍaṃ daśaguṇaṃ vyāptaṃ nārāyaṇaḥ sthitaḥ // GarP_1,57.10 //
analyzed: aṇḍam daśaguṇam vyāptam nārāyaṇaḥ sthitaḥ

original: iti gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bhuvanakośagatāpātalanarakādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptapañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe bhuvanakośagatāpātalanarakādinirūpaṇam nāma saptapañcāśattamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
hariḥ uvāca
vakṣye pramāṇa saṃsthāne sūrya ādīnām śṛṇuṣva me

original: yojānānāṃ sahasrāṇi bhāskarasya ratho nava // GarP_1,58.1 //
analyzed: yojānānām sahasrāṇi bhāskarasya rathaḥ nava
īṣā daṇḍaḥ tathā eva asya dviguṇaḥ vṛṣabhadhvaja
sārdha koṭiḥ tathā sapta niyutāni adhikāni ca
yojanānām tu tasya akṣaḥ tatra cakram pratiṣṭhitam
tri nābhimati pañca āre ṣaṣ nemini akṣaya ātmake
saṃvatsara maye kṛtsnam kālacakram pratiṣṭhitam
catvāriṃśat sahasrāṇi dvitīyaḥ kṣaḥ vivasvataḥ
pañca anyāni tu sārdhāni syandanasya vṛṣadhvaja
akṣa pramāṇam ubhayoḥ pramāṇam tu yuga ardhayoḥ
hrasvaḥ kṣaḥ tad yuga ardhena dhruva ādhāre rathasya vai

original: dvitīye 'kṣe tu taccakraṃ saṃsthitaṃ mānasācale // GarP_1,58.6 //
analyzed: dvitīye kṣe tu tat cakram saṃsthitam mānasa acale
gāyattrī sa bṛhatī uṣṇih jagatī triṣṭubh eva ca
anuṣṭubh paṅktiḥ iti uktāḥ chandāṃsi harayaḥ raveḥ
dhātā kratusthalā ca eva pulastyaḥ vāsukiḥ tathā
rathakṛt grāmaṇīḥ hetiḥ tumburuḥ caitra māsake
aryamā pulahaḥ ca eva rathojāḥ puñjikasthalā
prahetiḥ kacchanīraḥ ca nāradaḥ ca eva mādhave
rakṣaḥ menakā

original: hāhā rathasvanaścaiva jyeṣṭhe bhāno rathe sthitāḥ // GarP_1,58.10 //
analyzed: hāhā rathasvanaḥ ca eva jyeṣṭhe bhānoḥ rathe sthitāḥ
varuṇaḥ vasiṣṭhaḥ rambhā sahajanyā kuhūḥ budhaḥ
rathacitraḥ tathā śukraḥ vasanti āṣāḍha saṃjñite
indraḥ viśvāvasuḥ srota śrotra
elāpatraḥ tathā aṅgirāḥ

original: pramlocā ca nabhasyete sarpāścārke tu santi vai // GarP_1,58.12 //
analyzed: pramlocā ca nabhasi ete sarpāḥ ca arke tu santi vai
vivasvān ugrasenaḥ ca bhṛguḥ āpūraṇaḥ tathā
anumlocā śaṅkhapālau vyāghraḥ bhādrapade
pūṣā ca suruciḥ dhātā gautamaḥ tha dhanañjayaḥ

original: suṣeṇo 'nyo dhṛtācī ca vasantyāśvayuje ravau // GarP_1,58.14 //
analyzed: suṣeṇaḥ nyaḥ dhṛtācī ca vasanti āśvayuje ravau
viśvāvasuḥ bharadvājaḥ parjanya airāvatau tadā
viśvācī senajit cāpaḥ pi
kārtike ca adhikāriṇaḥ
aṃśuḥ ca kāśyapaḥ tārkṣyaḥ mahāpadmaḥ tathā urvaśī
citrasenaḥ tathā vidyut mārgaśīrṣa adhikāriṇaḥ
kratuḥ bhargaḥ tathā ūrṇāyuḥ sphūrjaḥ karkoṭakaḥ tathā
ariṣṭanemiḥ ca eva anyā
pauṣa māse vasanti ete sapta bhāskara maṇḍale
tvaṣṭā atha jamadagniḥ ca tilottamā
brahmāpetaḥ u tha ṛtajit dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ ca saptamaḥ
māgha māse vasanti ete sapta bhāskara maṇḍale
viṣṇuḥ aśvataraḥ rambhā sūryavarcāḥ ca satyajit

original: viśvāmitrastathā rakṣo yajñāpeto hi phālgune // GarP_1,58.19 //
analyzed: viśvāmitraḥ tathā rakṣaḥ yajñāpetaḥ hi phālgune
savituḥ maṇḍale brahman viṣṇu śakti upabṛṃhitāḥ

original: stuvanti munayaḥ sūryaṃ gandharvairgoyate puraḥ // GarP_1,58.20 //
analyzed: stuvanti munayaḥ sūryam gandharvaiḥ goyate puras
nṛtyantyaḥ u psarasaḥ yānti sūryasya anu niśācarāḥ
vahanti pannagāḥ yakṣaiḥ kriyate bhīṣu saṃgrahaḥ
bālakhilyāḥ tathā eva enam parivārya samāsate
rathaḥ tri cakraḥ somasya kunda ābhāḥ tasya vājinaḥ
vāma dakṣiṇataḥ yuktāḥ daśa tena carati asau
rathaḥ candrasutasya ca
piśaṅgeḥ turagaiḥ yuktaḥ saḥ ṣṭābhiḥ vāyu vegibhiḥ
sa varūthaḥ sa anukarṣaḥ yuktaḥ bhūmi bhavaiḥ hayaiḥ
sa upāsaṃga patākaḥ tu śukrasya api rathaḥ mahān
rathaḥ bhūmisutasya api tapta kāñcana sannibhaḥ

original: aṣṭāśvaḥ kāñcanaḥ śrīmān bhaumasyāpi ratho mahān // GarP_1,58.26 //
analyzed: aṣṭa aśvaḥ kāñcanaḥ śrīmān bhaumasya api rathaḥ mahān
padmarāga aruṇaiḥ aśvaiḥ saṃyuktaḥ vahni saṃbhavaiḥ
aṣṭābhiḥ pāṇḍaraiḥ yuktaiḥ vājibhiḥ kāñcane rathe
tiṣṭhan tiṣṭhati varṣam vai rāśau rāśau bṛhaspatiḥ
ākāśa sambhavaiḥ aśvaiḥ śavalaiḥ syandanam yutam
samāruhya śanais yāti manda gāmī śanaiścaraḥ

original: svarbhānosturagā hyaṣṭau bhṛṅgābhā dhūsaraṃ ratham // GarP_1,58.29 //
analyzed: svarbhānoḥ turagāḥ hi aṣṭau bhṛṅga ābhāḥ dhūsaram ratham
sakṛt yaktāḥ tu bhūteśa bahanti aviratam śiva

original: tathā keturathasyāśvā aṣṭau te vātaraṃhasaḥ // GarP_1,58.30 //
analyzed: tathā ketu rathasya aśvāḥ aṣṭau te vāta raṃhasaḥ
palāla dhūma varṇa ābhāḥ lākṣā rasa nibha aruṇāḥ
dvīpa nadī adrayu danvantaḥ bhuvanāni hareḥ tanuḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bhuvanakośanirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭapañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe bhuvanakośanirūpaṇam nāma aṣṭapañcāśattamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
atha jyotiḥ śāstram
sūtaḥ uvāca
jyotiḥ cakram bhuvaḥ mānam uktvā provāca keśavaḥ

original: caturlakṣaṃ jyotiṣasya sāraṃ rudrāya sarvadaḥ // GarP_1,59.1 //
analyzed: catur lakṣam jyotiṣasya sāram rudrāya sarva daḥ
hariḥ uvāca
kṛttikāḥ tu agni devatyāḥ rohiṇyaḥ brahmaṇaḥ smṛtāḥ
ilvalāḥ soma devatyāḥ raudram ca ārdram udāhṛtam
punarvasuḥ tathā ādityaḥ tiṣyaḥ ca gurudaivataḥ
aśleṣāḥ sarpa devatyāḥ maghāḥ ca pitṛ devatāḥ
bhāgyāḥ ca pūrva phalgunyaḥ aryamā ca tathā uttaraḥ

original: sāvitraśca tathā hastā citrā tvaṣṭā prakīrtitaḥ // GarP_1,59.4 //
analyzed: sāvitraḥ ca tathā hastā citrā tvaṣṭā prakīrtitaḥ
svātī ca vāyu devatyā nakṣatram parikīrtitam
indra agni devatā proktā viśākhā vṛṣabhadhvaja
maitram ṛkṣam anūrādhā jyeṣṭhā śākram prakīrtitam
tathā nirṛti devatyaḥ mūlaḥ tad jñaiḥ udāhṛtaḥ
āpyāḥ tu āṣāṭha pūrvāḥ tu uttarāḥ vaiśvadevatāḥ
brāhmaḥ ca eva abhijit proktaḥ śravaṇāḥ vaiṣṇavaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: vāsavastu tathā ṛkṣaṃ dhaniṣṭhā procyate budhaiḥ /
analyzed: vāsavaḥ tu tathā ṛkṣam dhaniṣṭhā procyate budhaiḥ

original: tathā śatabhiṣā proktaṃ nakṣatraṃ vāruṇaṃ śiva // GarP_1,59.8 //
analyzed: tathā śatabhiṣā proktam nakṣatram vāruṇam śiva
ājam bhādrapadā pūrvā ahirbrudhnyaḥ tathā uttarā
pauṣṇam ca revatī ṛkṣam aśvayuj ca aśva daivatam
bharaṇī ṛkṣam tathā yāmyam proktāḥ te ṛkṣa devatāḥ
brahmāṇī saṃsthitā pūrve
māheśvarī ca uttare ca dvitīyā daśāmī tithau

original: pañcamyāṃ ca trayodaśyāṃ vārāhī dakṣiṇe sthitā // GarP_1,59.11 //
analyzed: pañcamyām ca trayodaśyām vārāhī dakṣiṇe sthitā
ṣaṣṭhyām ca eva caturdaśyām indrāṇī paścime sthitā

original: saptamyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ ca cāmuṇḍā vāyugocare // GarP_1,59.12 //
analyzed: saptamyām paurṇamāsyām ca cāmuṇḍāḥ vāyugocare
aṣṭamī amāvāsyā yoge mahālakṣmīśa gocare
ekādaśyām tṛtīyāyām agnikoṇe tu vaiṣṇavī

original: dvādaśyāṃ ca caturthyāṃ tu kaumārī nairṛte tathā /
analyzed: dvādaśyām ca caturthyām tu kaumārī nairṛte tathā
yoginī suṃmukhena eva gamana ādi na kārayet
aśvinī maitrarevatyaḥ mṛga mūla punarvasu

original: puṣyā hastā tathā jyeṣṭhā prasthāne śreṣṭhamucyate // GarP_1,59.15 //
analyzed: puṣyā hastā tathā jyeṣṭhā prasthāne śreṣṭham ucyate
hasta ādi pañca ṛkṣāṇi uttarā trayam eva ca

original: aśvinī rohiṇī puṣyā dhaniṣṭhā ca punarvasū // GarP_1,59.16 //
analyzed: aśvinī rohiṇī puṣyā dhaniṣṭhā ca punarvasū
vastra prāvaraṇe śreṣṭhaḥ nakṣatrāṇām gaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ
kṛttikā bharaṇī aśleṣāḥ maghāḥ mūla viśākhayoḥ
tathā ca eva adhovakrāḥ prakīrtitāḥ
eṣu vāpī taḍāga ādi kūpa bhūmi tṛṇāni ca
devāgārasya khananam nidhāna khananam tathā
gaṇitam jyotiṣā ārambham khani bila praveśanam
kuryāt adhas gatāni eva anyāni ca vṛṣadhvaja

original: revatī cāśvinī citrā svātī hastā punarvasū // GarP_1,59.20 //
analyzed: revatī ca aśvinī citrā svātī hastā punarvasū

original: anurādhā mṛgo jyeṣṭhā ete pārśvamukhāḥ smṛtāḥ /
analyzed: anurādhā mṛgaḥ jyeṣṭhāḥ ete pārśvamukhāḥ smṛtāḥ
gaja uṣṭra aśva balīvarda damanam mahiṣasya ca
bījānām vapanam kuryāt gamana āgamana ādikam
cakra yantra rathānām ca nāvā ādīnām pravāhaṇam
pārśveṣu yāni karmāṇi kuryāt eteṣu tāni api

original: rohiṇyārdrāṃ tathā puṣyā dhaniṣṭhā cottarātrayam // GarP_1,59.23 //
analyzed: rohiṇī ārdrām tathā puṣyā dhaniṣṭhā ca uttarā trayam

original: vāruṇaṃ śravaṇaṃ caiva nava cordhvamukhāḥ smṛtāḥ /
analyzed: vāruṇam śravaṇam ca eva nava ca ūrdhva mukhāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: eṣu rājyābhiṣekaṃ ca paṭṭabandhaṃ ca kārayet // GarP_1,59.24 //
analyzed: eṣu rājya abhiṣekam ca paṭṭabandham ca kārayet
ūrdhva mukhyāni ucchritāni sarvāṇi eteṣu kārayet

original: caturtho cāśubhā ṣaṣṭhī aṣṭamī navamī tathā // GarP_1,59.25 //
analyzed: ca aśubhā ṣaṣṭhī aṣṭamī navamī tathā

original: amāvāsyā pūrṇimā ca tadvādaśī ca caturdaśī /
analyzed: amāvāsyā pūrṇimā ca tad dvādaśī ca caturdaśī

original: aśuklā pratipacchreṣṭhā dvitīyā candra sūnunā // GarP_1,59.26 //
analyzed: aśuklā pratipad śreṣṭhā dvitīyā candra sūnunā
tṛtīyā bhūmiputreṇa caturthā ca śanaiścare
gurau śubhā pañcamī syāt ṣaṣṭī maṅgala śukrayoḥ
saptamī somaputreṇa aṣṭamī kuja bhāskarau
navamī candra vāsau

original: reṇa daśamī tu gurau śubhā // GarP_1,59.28 //
analyzed: reṇa daśamī tu gurau śubhā
ekādaśyāḥ guru śukrau dvādaśyām ca punar budhaḥ

original: trayodaśī śukrabhaumau śanau śreṣṭhā caturdaśī // GarP_1,59.29 //
analyzed: trayodaśī śukra bhaumau śanau śreṣṭhā caturdaśī
paurṇamāsī api amāvāsyā śreṣṭhā syāt ca bṛhaspatau

original: dvādaśīṃ dahate bhānuḥ śaśī caikādaśīṃ dahet // GarP_1,59.30 //
analyzed: dvādaśīm dahate bhānuḥ śaśī ca ekādaśīm dahet

original: kujo dahecca daśāmīṃ navamīṃ ca budho dahet /
analyzed: kujaḥ dahet ca daśāmīm navamīm ca budhaḥ dahet

original: aṣṭamīṃ dahate jīvaḥ saptamīṃ bhārgavo dahet // GarP_1,59.31 //
analyzed: aṣṭamīm dahate jīvaḥ saptamīm bhārgavaḥ dahet
sūryaputraḥ dahet ṣaṣṭhīm gamana ādyāsu nā asti vai
pratipad navamīṣu eva caturdaśī aṣṭamīṣu ca
budhavāreṇa prasthānam dūratas parivarjayet

original: meṣe karkaṭake ṣaṣṭhī kanyāyāṃ mithune 'ṣṭamī // GarP_1,59.33 //
analyzed: meṣe karkaṭake ṣaṣṭhī kanyāyām mithune ṣṭamī

original: vṛṣe kumbhe caturtho ca dvādaśī makare tule /
analyzed: vṛṣe kumbhe caturthā ca dvādaśī makare tule

original: daśamī vṛścike siṃhe dhanurmone caturdaśī // GarP_1,59.34 //
analyzed: daśamī vṛścike siṃhe dhanuḥ mone caturdaśī

original: etā dagdhā na gantavyaṃ pīḍādiḥ kila mānavaiḥ /
analyzed: etāḥ dagdhāḥ na gantavyam pīḍā ādiḥ kila mānavaiḥ
viśākhā trayam āditye pūrvāṣāḍhā traye śaśī
dhaniṣṭhā tritayam bhaume budhe vai revatī trayam

original: rohiṇyāditrayaṃ jīve śukre puṣyātrayaṃ śiva // GarP_1,59.36 //

analyzed: śanivāre varjayet ca uttarā phalgunī trayam
eṣu yogeṣu ca utpāta mṛtyu roga ādikam bhavet
mūla irkaḥ śravaṇe candraḥ proṣṭhapadī uttare kujaḥ

original: kṛttikāsu budhaścaiva gurau rudra punarvasuḥ // GarP_1,59.38 //
analyzed: kṛttikāsu budhaḥ ca eva gurau rudra punarvasuḥ
pūrva phalgunī śukre ca svātiḥ ca eva śanaiśvare
etaiḥ ca amṛta yogāḥ syuḥ sarva kārya prasādhakāḥ
kālam
śakti dā
na iṣṭamanda
parva ādiḥ tu jñeyaḥ kālaḥ kāla viśāradaiḥ
ekīkṛtya akṣarāt mātram nāmnoḥ strīpuṃsayoḥ tribhiḥ

original: bhāge dviśeṣe strīnāśaḥ pusaḥ syādekaśūnyayoḥ // GarP_1,59.41 //
analyzed: bhāge dvi śeṣe strī nāśaḥ pusaḥ syāt eka śūnyayoḥ

original: viṣkambhe ghaṭikāḥ pañca śūle sapta prakīrtitāḥ /
analyzed: viṣkambhe ghaṭikāḥ pañca śūle sapta prakīrtitāḥ

original: ṣaḍgaṇḍe cātigaṇḍe ca nava vyāghātavajrayoḥ // GarP_1,59.42 //
analyzed: ṣaḍgaṇḍe ca atigaṇḍe ca nava vyāghāta vajrayoḥ

original: vyatīpāte ca parighe vaidhṛte ca dinedine /
analyzed: vyatīpāte ca parighe vaidhṛte ca dine dine

original: etai mṛtyuyutā hyeṣu sarvakarmāṇi varjayet // GarP_1,59.43 //
analyzed: etaiḥ mṛtyu yutā hi eṣu sarva karmāṇi varjayet

original: haster'kaśca guruḥ puṣye anurādhā budhe śubhā /
analyzed: hasta īrkaḥ ca guruḥ puṣye anurādhā budhe śubhā

original: rohiṇī ca śanau śreṣṭhā saumaṃ somena vai śubham // GarP_1,59.44 //
analyzed: rohiṇī ca śanau śreṣṭhā saumam somena vai śubham

original: śukre ca revatī śreṣṭhā aśvinī maṅgale śubhā /
analyzed: śukre ca revatī śreṣṭhā aśvinī maṅgale śubhā
eteṣu siddhi yogāḥ vai sarva doṣa vināśanāḥ

original: bhārgave bhaparaṇī caiva some citrā vṛṣadhvaja / /
analyzed: bhārgave bhaparaṇī ca eva some citrā vṛṣadhvaja

original: bhaume cai vottarāṣāḍhā dhaniṣṭhā ca budhe hara / // GarP_1,59.46 //
analyzed: bhaume ca e vā uttarāṣāḍhā dhaniṣṭhā ca budhe hara
garau śata bhiṣāḥ rudra
śukre vai rohiṇī tathā
śanau ca revatī śambho
viṣa yogāḥ prakīrtitāḥ
puṣyaḥ punarvasuḥ ca eva revatī citrayā saha

original: śravaṇaṃ ca dhaniṣṭhā ca hastāśvanīmṛgāstathā // GarP_1,59.48 //
analyzed: śravaṇam ca dhaniṣṭhā ca hasta aśvanīmṛgāḥ tathā
kuryāt śatabhiṣāyām ca jātakarma ādi mānavaḥ
viśākhā ca uttarā trīṇi maghā ārdrā bharaṇī tathā
āśleṣā kṛttikā rudra
prasthāne maraṇa pradāḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe jyotiḥ śāstre nakṣatrataddevatādagdhayogādinirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikonaṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe jyotiḥ śāstre nakṣatrataddevatādagdhayogādinirūpaṇam nāma ekonaṣaṣṭitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
hariḥ uvāca

original: ṣaḍāditye daśā jñeyā some pañcadaśa smṛtāḥ /
analyzed: ṣaṣ āditye daśā jñeyā some pañcadaśa smṛtāḥ

original: aṣṭāvaṅgārake cava budhai spatadaśa smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,60.1 //
analyzed: aṣṭau aṅgārake budhaiḥ spatadaśa smṛtāḥ
śanaiścare daśa jñeyāḥ guroḥ ekonaviṃśatiḥ
rāhoḥ dvādaśa varṣāṇi ekaviṃśatiḥ bhārgave
raveḥ daśā duḥ kha dā syāt udvega nṛpa nāśa kṛt
vibhūti dā soma daśā sukham iṣṭa anna dā tathā
duḥ kha pradā kuja daśā rājya ādeḥ syāt vināśinī
divya strī dā budha daśā rājya dā kośa vṛddhi dā
śaneḥ daśā rājya nāśa bandhu duḥkha karī bhavet
guroḥ daśā rājya dā syāt sukha dharma ādi dāyinī
rāhoḥ daśā rājya nāśa vyādhi dā duḥ kha dā bhavet
hasti aśva dā śukra daśā rājya strī lābha dā bhavet
meṣa aṅgāraka kṣetram vṛṣaḥ śukrasya kīrtitaḥ

original: mithunasya budho jñeyaḥ somaḥ karkaṭakasya ca // GarP_1,60.7 //
analyzed: mithunasya budhaḥ jñeyaḥ somaḥ karkaṭakasya ca

original: sūryakṣetraṃ bhavetsiṃhaḥ kanyā kṣetraṃ budhasya ca /
analyzed: sūrya kṣetram bhavet siṃhaḥ kanyā kṣetram budhasya ca

original: bhārgavasya tulā kṣetraṃ vṛścikoṅgārakasya ca // GarP_1,60.8 //
analyzed: bhārgavasya tulā kṣetram vṛścika uṅgārakasya ca
dhanuḥ sura guroḥ ca eva śaneḥ makara kumbhakau
mīnaḥ suraguroḥ ca eva graha kṣetram prakīrtitam
paurṇamāsyāḥ dvayam tatra pūrvāṣāḍhā dvayam bhavet

original: dvirāṣāḍhaḥ sa vijñeyo viṣṇuḥ svapiti karkaṭe // GarP_1,60.10 //
analyzed: dvirāṣāḍhaḥ sa vijñeyaḥ viṣṇuḥ svapiti karkaṭe
aśvinī revatī citrā dhaniṣṭhā syāt alaṅkṛtau
mṛga ahi kapi mārjāra śvānaḥ sūkara pakṣiṇaḥ
nakulaḥ mūṣakaḥ ca eva yātrāyām dakṣiṇe śubhaḥ
vipra kanyā śivā eṣām śaṅkha bherī vasundharāḥ
veṇu strī pūrṇa kumbhāḥ ca yātrāyām darśanam śubham
jambūka uṣṭra khara ādyāḥ ca yātrāyām vāmake śubhāḥ
kārpāsa oṣadhi tailam ca pakra aṅgāra bhujaṅgamāḥ
mukta keśī rakta mālya nagna ādya śubham īkṣitam
lakṣaṇam vakṣye labhat pūrve mahā phalam
āgneye śoka santāpau dakṣiṇe hānim āpnuyāt
nairṛtya śoka santāpau miṣṭānnam ca eva paścime

original: artha prāpnoti vāyavye uttare kalahobhavet // GarP_1,60.16 //
analyzed: artha prāpnoti vāyavye uttare kalahaḥ bhavet
īśāne maraṇam proktam hikkāyāḥ ca phala aphalam

original: vilikhya ravicakraṃ tu bhāskaro narasannibhaḥ // GarP_1,60.17 //
analyzed: vilikhya ravicakram tu bhāskaraḥ nara sannibhaḥ
yasmin ṛkṣe trīṇi mastake
trayam vakre pradātavyam ekaikam skandhayoḥ nyaset
ekaikam bāhu yugme tu ekaika hastayoḥ dvayoḥ

original: hṛdaye pañca ṛkṣāṇi ekaṃ nābhau pradāpayet // GarP_1,60.19 //
analyzed: hṛdaye pañca ṛkṣāṇi ekam nābhau pradāpayet
ṛkṣam ekam nyaset guhye ekaikam jānuke nyaset

original: nakṣatrāṇi ca śeṣāṇi ravipāde niyojayet // GarP_1,60.20 //
analyzed: nakṣatrāṇi ca śeṣāṇi ravi pāde niyojayet
caraṇasyena ṛkṣeṇa alpa āyuḥ jāyate naraḥ
vidaśa gamanam jānau guhya sthe para dāravān
nābhi sthena alpa santuṣṭaḥ hṛd sthena syāt maheśvaraḥ
pāṇi sthena bhavet cauraḥ sthāna bhraṣṭaḥ
skandha sthite dhanapatiḥ mukhe miṣṭānnam āpnuyāt

original: mastake padṛvastraṃ syānnakṣatraṃ yadi sthitam // GarP_1,60.23 //
analyzed: mastake syāt nakṣatram yadi sthitam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍaṃ prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe jyotiḥ śāstre grahadaśādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍam prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe jyotiḥ śāstre grahadaśādinirūpaṇam nāma ṣaṣṭitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
hariḥ uvāca
saptama upacaya ādya sthaḥ candraḥ sarvatra śobhanaḥ
śukla pakṣe dvitīyaḥ tu pañcamaḥ navamaḥ tathā
saṃpūjyamānaḥ lokaiḥ tu guru vat dṛśyate śaśī

original: candrasya dvādaśāvasthā bhavanti śṛṇu tā api // GarP_1,61.2 //
analyzed: candrasya dvādaśa avasthāḥ bhavanti śṛṇu tāḥ api
triṣu triṣu ca ṛkṣeṣu aśvinī ādi vadāmi aham
pravāsa stham punar dṛṣṭam mṛta avastham jaya āvaham
hāsya avastham nata ākrīḍā
pramoda avastham eva ca
viṣāda avasthā bhoga sthe jvara avastham vyavasthitam
sukha avastham dvādaśa avastha gam bhavet

original: pravāso hānimṛnyṛ ca jayo hāseratiḥ sukham // GarP_1,61.5 //
analyzed: pravāsaḥ ca jayaḥ hāseratiḥ sukham

original: śoko bhogo jvaraḥ kampaḥ sukhaṃ ceti kramātphalam /
analyzed: śokaḥ bhogaḥ jvaraḥ kampaḥ sukham ca iti kramāt phalam

original: janmasthaḥ kurute tuṣṭiṃ dvitīye nāsti nirvṛtiḥ // GarP_1,61.6 //
analyzed: janma sthaḥ kurute tuṣṭim dvitīye nā asti nirvṛtiḥ
tṛtīye rāja sanmānam caturthe kalaha āgamaḥ

original: pañcamena mṛgāṅkena strīlābho vai tathā bhavet // GarP_1,61.7 //
analyzed: pañcamena mṛgāṅkena strī lābhaḥ vai tathā bhavet

original: ghanadhānyāgamaḥ ṣaṣṭhe ratiḥ pūjā ca saptame /
analyzed: ghana dhānya āgamaḥ ṣaṣṭhe ratiḥ pūjā ca saptame
aṣṭame prāṇa sandehaḥ navame kośa sañcayaḥ
daśame kārya niṣpatti dhruvam ekādaśe jayaḥ

original: dvādaśena śaśāṅkena mṛtyureva na saṃkhayaḥ // GarP_1,61.9 //
analyzed: dvādaśena śaśāṅkena mṛtyuḥ eva na saṃkhayaḥ

original: kṛttikādau ca pūrveṇa saptarkṣāṇi ca vai vrajet /
analyzed: kṛttikā ādau ca pūrveṇa sapta ṛkṣāṇi ca vai vrajet
maghā ādau dakṣiṇe gacchet anurādhā ādi paścime
praśastā ca uttara yātrā dhaniṣṭhā ādiṣu saptasu

original: aśvinī revatī citrā dhaniṣṭhā samalaṅkṛtau // GarP_1,61.11 //
analyzed: aśvinī revatī citrā dhaniṣṭhā samalaṅkṛtau
mṛga aśvi citrā puṣyāḥ ca mūlāḥ hastā śubhāḥ sadā
kanyā pradāne yātrāyām pratiṣṭhā ādiṣu karmasu

original: śukracandrau hi janmasthau śubhadau ca dvitīyake /
analyzed: śukra candrau hi janma sthau śubha dau ca dvitīyake

original: śaśijñaśukrajīvāśca rāśau rāśau cātha tṛtīyake // GarP_1,61.13 //
analyzed: śaśi jña śukra jīvāḥ ca rāśau rāśau ca atha tṛtīyake
bhauma manda śaśāṅka arkāḥ budhaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ caturthake
śukra jīvau pañcame ca candra ketu samāhitau

original: mandākārai ca kujaḥ ṣaṣṭhe gurucandrau ca saptame /
analyzed: ca kujaḥ ṣaṣṭhe guru candrau ca saptame

original: jñaśukrāvaṣṭame śreṣṭhau navamastho guruḥ śubhaḥ // GarP_1,61.15 //
analyzed: jña śukrau aṣṭame śreṣṭhau navama sthaḥ guruḥ śubhaḥ
arka ārki candrāḥ daśame grahāḥ ekādaśe khilāḥ

original: budho 'tha dvādaśe caiva bhārgavaḥ sukhado bhavet // GarP_1,61.16 //
analyzed: dvādaśe ca eva bhārgavaḥ sukha daḥ bhavet

original: siṃhena makaraḥ śreṣṭhaḥ kanyayā meṣa uttamaḥ /
analyzed: siṃhena makaraḥ śreṣṭhaḥ kanyayā meṣaḥ uttamaḥ

original: tulayā saha mīnastu kumbhena sahakarkaṭaḥ // GarP_1,61.17 //
analyzed: tulayā saha mīnaḥ tu kumbhena saha karkaṭaḥ

original: dhanuṣā vṛṣabhaḥ śreṣṭho mithunena ca vṛścikaḥ /
analyzed: dhanuṣā vṛṣabhaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ mithunena ca vṛścikaḥ
etat ṣaṣ aṣṭakam
prītyai bhavati eva na saṃśayaḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe jyotiḥ śāstre grahāṇāṃ śubhāśubhasthānādinirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikapaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe jyotiḥ śāstre grahāṇām śubhāśubhasthānādinirūpaṇam nāma ekapaṣṭitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe jyotiḥ śāstre lagnaghaṭikā pramāṇādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma dviṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe jyotiḥ śāstre lagnaghaṭikā pramāṇādinirūpaṇam nāma dviṣaṣṭitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

hariḥ uvāca
nara strī lakṣaṇam vakṣye saṃkṣapāt śṛṇu śaṅkara
asvedinau mṛdu talau kamala udara sannibhau
śliṣṭa aṅgulī tāmra nakhau su gulphau śirayā ujjhitau

original: kūrmonnatau ca caraṇau syātāṃ nṛpavarasya hi // GarP_1,63.2 //
analyzed: kūrma unnatau ca caraṇau syātām nṛpa varasya hi
virūkṣa pāṇḍura nakhau vakrau ca eva śira ānatau

original: sūrpākārau ca caraṇau saṃkhuṣkau viralāṅgulī // GarP_1,63.3 //
analyzed: sūrpa ākārau ca caraṇau saṃkhuṣkau virala aṅgulī

original: duḥ khadāridyadau syātā nātra kāryāṃ vicāraṇā /
analyzed: duḥ kha dāridya dau syātā na atra kāryām vicāraṇā
alpa roma yutā śreṣṭhā jaṅghā hasti kara upamā
roma ekaikam kūpake syāt bhūpānām tu mahātmanām

original: dvedve romṇī paṇḍitānāṃ śrotriyāṇāṃ tathaiva ca // GarP_1,63.5 //
analyzed: dve dve romṇī paṇḍitānām śrotriyāṇām tathā eva ca
roma trayam daridrāṇām rogī nirmāṃsa jānukaḥ
alpa liṅgī ca dhanavān syāt ca putra ādi varjitaḥ
sthūla liṅgaḥ daridraḥ syāt dukhī eka vṛṣṇiḥ bhavet

original: viṣamestrīcañcalo vai nṛpaḥ syādvṛṣaṇe same // GarP_1,63.7 //
analyzed: viṣame strī cañcalaḥ vai nṛpaḥ syāt vṛṣaṇe same
pralamba vṛṣaṇaḥ lpa āyuḥ nirdravyaḥ kumaṇiḥ bhavet
pāṇḍuraiḥ malinaiḥ ca eva maṇibhiḥ ca sukhī naraḥ
niḥ svāḥ sa śabda mūtrāḥ syuḥ nṛpāḥ niḥśabda dhārayā

original: bhogāḍhyāḥ samajaṭharā niḥ svāḥ syurghaṭasannibhāḥ // GarP_1,63.9 //
analyzed: bhoga āḍhyāḥ sama jaṭharāḥ niḥ svāḥ syuḥ ghaṭa sannibhāḥ
sarpa udarāḥ daridrāḥ syuḥ rekhābhiḥ ca āyuḥ ucyate

original: lalāṭe yasya dṛśyante tisro rekhāḥ samāhitāḥ // GarP_1,63.10 //
analyzed: lalāṭe yasya dṛśyante tisraḥ rekhāḥ samāhitāḥ

original: sukhī putrasamāyuktaḥ sa ṣaṣṭiṃ jīvate naraḥ /
analyzed: sukhī putra samāyuktaḥ sa ṣaṣṭim jīvate naraḥ
catvāriṃśat ca varṣāṇi dvi rekhā darśanāt naraḥ
viṃśati abdam tu eka rekhāḥ ā karṇa antāḥ śata āyuṣaḥ
saptati āyuḥ dvi rekhā tu ṣaṣṭi āyuḥ tisṛbhiḥ bhavet
vyakta avyaktābhiḥ rekhābhiḥ viṃśati āyūḥ bhavet naraḥ
catvāriṃśat ca varṣāṇi hīna rekhaḥ tu jīvati
bhinnābhiḥ ca eva rekhābhiḥ apamṛtyuḥ narasya hi

original: triśūlaṃ paṭṭiśaṃ vāpi lalāṭe yasya dṛśyate /
analyzed: triśūlam paṭṭiśam vā api lalāṭe yasya dṛśyate

original: dhanaputra samāyuktaḥ sa jīveccharadaḥ śatam // GarP_1,63.15 //
analyzed: dhana putra samāyuktaḥ sa jīvet śaradaḥ śatam
tarjanyāḥ madhyamā aṅgulyāḥ āyūrekhā tu madhyataḥ
saṃprāptā yā bhavet rudra
sa jīvet śaradaḥ śatam
prathamā jñāna rekhā tu hi aṅguṣṭhāt anuvartate

original: madhyamāmūlagā rekhā āyūrekhā ataḥ param // GarP_1,63.17 //
analyzed: madhyamā ā mūla gā rekhā āyūrekhā atas param
kaniṣṭhikām samāśritya āyūrekhā samāviśet

original: acchinnā vā vibhaktā vā sa jīveccharadaḥ śatam // GarP_1,63.18 //
analyzed: a chinnā vā vibhaktā vā sa jīvet śaradaḥ śatam
yasya pāṇi tale rekhā āyuḥ tasya prakāśayet
śata varṣāṇi jīvet ca bhogī rudra
na saṃśayaḥ
kaniṣṭhikām samāśritya madhyamāyām upāgatā
kuryāt āyūrekhā tu mānavam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe jyotiḥ śāstre sāmudrike puṃllakṣaṇanirūpaṇaṃ nāma triṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe jyotiḥ śāstre sāmudrike puṃllakṣaṇanirūpaṇam nāma triṣaṣṭitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
hariḥ uvāca

original: yasyāstu kuñcitāḥ keśā mukhaṃ ca parimaṇḍalam /
analyzed: yasyāḥ tu kuñcitāḥ keśāḥ mukham ca parimaṇḍalam

original: nābhiśca dakṣiṇāvartā sā kanyā kulavardhinī // GarP_1,64.1 //
analyzed: nābhiḥ ca dakṣiṇa āvartā sā kanyā kula vardhinī
yā ca kāñcana varṇa ābhā rakta hasta saroruhā

original: sahasrāṇāṃ tu nārīṇāṃ bhavetsāpi pativratā // GarP_1,64.2 //
analyzed: sahasrāṇām tu nārīṇām bhavet sā api pativratā

original: vakrakeśā ca yā kanyā maṇḍalākṣī ca yā bhavet /
analyzed: vakra keśā ca yā kanyā maṇḍala akṣī ca yā bhavet

original: bhartā ca mriyate tasyā niyataṃ duḥ khabhāginī // GarP_1,64.3 //
analyzed: bhartā ca mriyate tasyāḥ niyatam duḥ kha bhāginī
pūrṇa candra mukhī kanyā bāla sūrya sama prabhā

original: viśālanetrā bimboṣṭhī sā kanyā labhate sukham // GarP_1,64.4 //
analyzed: viśāla netrā bimboṣṭhī sā kanyā labhate sukham
rekhābhiḥ bahubhiḥ kleśam su alpābhiḥ dhana hīna tā
raktābhiḥ sukham āpnoti kṛṣṇābhiḥ preṣya tām vrajet
kārye ca mantrī sat strī syāt satī khī
syāt karaṇeṣu ca

original: streheṣu bhāryā mātā syādveśyā ca śayane śubhā // GarP_1,64.6 //
analyzed: bhāryā mātā syāt veśyā ca śayane śubhā

original: aṅkuśaṃ kuṇḍalaṃ cakraṃ yasyāḥ pāṇitale bhavet /
analyzed: aṅkuśam kuṇḍalam cakram yasyāḥ pāṇi tale bhavet

original: putraṃ prasūyate nārī narendraṃ labhate patim // GarP_1,64.7 //
analyzed: putram prasūyate nārī narendram labhate patim

original: yasyāstu romaśau pārśvau romaśau ca payodharau /
analyzed: yasyāḥ tu romaśau pārśvau romaśau ca payodharau

original: annatau cādharoṣṭhau ca kṣipraṃ mārayate patim // GarP_1,64.8 //
analyzed: annatau ca adharoṣṭhau ca kṣipram mārayate patim
yasyāḥ pāṇi tale rekhā prākāraḥ toraṇam bhavet
api dāsa kule jātā rājñī tvam upagacchati
udvṛttā kapilā yasya romarājī nirantaram
api rāja kule jātā dāsī tvam upagacchati
yasyāḥ anāmikā aṅguṣṭhau pṛthivyām na eva tiṣṭhataḥ

original: patiṃ mārayate kṣipraṃ svecchācāreṇa vartate // GarP_1,64.11 //
analyzed: patim mārayate kṣipram sva icchā ācāreṇa vartate
yasyāḥ gamana mātreṇa bhūmi kampaḥ prajāyate

original: patiṃ mārayate kṣipraṃ svecchācāreṇa vartate // GarP_1,64.12 //
analyzed: patim mārayate kṣipram sva icchā ācāreṇa vartate
cakṣuḥ snehena saubhāgyam danta snehena bhojanam

original: tvacaḥ snehena śāyyāṃ ca pādasnehena vāhanam // GarP_1,64.13 //
analyzed: tvacaḥ snehena śāyyām ca pāda snehena vāhanam
snigdha unnatau tāmra nakhau nāryāḥ ca caraṇau śubhau
matsya aṅkuśa abja cihnau ca cakra lāṅgala lakṣitau
asvedinau mūdu talau praśastau caraṇau striyāḥ

original: śubhe jaṅghe virome ca ūrū hastikaropamau // GarP_1,64.15 //
analyzed: śubhe jaṅghe virome ca ūrū hasti kara upamau
aśvattha patra sadṛśam vipulam guhyam uttamam

original: aromā trivalī nāryā hṛtstanau romavarjitau // GarP_1,64.16 //
analyzed: aromā trivalī nāryāḥ hṛd stanau roma varjitau

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe jyotiḥ śāstre sāmudrike strīlakṣaṇanirūpaṇaṃ nāma catuḥ ṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe jyotiḥ śāstre sāmudrike strīlakṣaṇanirūpaṇam nāma catuḥ ṣaṣṭitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

hariḥ uvāca
samudra uktam pravakṣyāmi nara strī lakṣaṇam śubham

asvedinau mṛdu talau kamala udara sannibhau
śleṣṭa aṅgulī tāmra nakhau pāda āviṣṇau śira ujjhitau

original: śū(sar) pākārau virūkṣau ca vakrau pādau śirālakau // GarP_1,65.3 //
analyzed: śūsar pākārau virūkṣau ca vakrau pādau śirālakau
saṃśuṣkau pāṇḍura nakhau niḥ svasya virala aṅgulī
mārgāya utkaṇṭakau pādau kaṣāya sadṛśau tathā

original: vicchittidau ca vaṃśasya brahmanghau śaṅku (pakra) sannibhau /
analyzed: vicchitti dau ca vaṃśasya brahmanghau śaṅku pakra sannibhau
agamyā gamane prītau jaṅghā virala romikā
mṛdu romā samā jaṅghā tathā kari kara prabhā
ūravaḥ jānavaḥ tulyāḥ nṛpasya upacitāḥ smṛtāḥ
niḥ svasya sṛgāla jaṅghāḥ rauma ekaikam ca kūpake

original: nṛpāṇāṃ śrotriyāṇāṃ ca dvedve śriye ca dhīmatām // GarP_1,65.7 //
analyzed: nṛpāṇām śrotriyāṇām ca dve dve śriye ca dhīmatām

original: tryādyairniḥ svā mānavāḥ syurduḥ svabhājaśca ninditāḥ /
analyzed: tri ādyaiḥ niḥ svāḥ mānavāḥ syuḥ duḥ svabhājaḥ ca ninditāḥ

original: keśāśca vai kuñcitāśca pravāse mriyate naraḥ // GarP_1,65.8 //
analyzed: keśāḥ ca vai kuñcitāḥ ca pravāse mriyate naraḥ
nirmāṃsa jānuḥ saubhāgyam alpaiḥ nimnaiḥ ratiḥ striyāḥ

original: vikaṭaiśca daridrāḥ syuḥ samāṃsai rājyameva ca // GarP_1,65.9 //
analyzed: vikaṭaiḥ ca daridrāḥ syuḥ sa māṃsaiḥ rājyam eva ca
mahadbhiḥ āyuḥ ākhyātam hi alpa liṅgaḥ dhanī naraḥ
apatya rahitaḥ ca eva sthūla liṅgaḥ ghana ujjhitaḥ
meḍhe vāma nate ca eva suta artha rahitaḥ bhavet
vakre nyathā putravān syāt dāridrayam
alpe tu a tanayaḥ sukhī naraḥ
sthūla granthi yute liṅge bhavet putra ādi saṃyutaḥ
kośa gūḍhe dīrghaiḥ bhugnaiḥ ca dhana varjitaḥ

original: balavānyuddhaśīlaśca laghuśektaḥ sa eva ca // GarP_1,65.13 //
analyzed: balavān yuddha śīlaḥ ca saḥ eva ca
durbalaḥ tu eka vṛṣaṇaḥ viṣama ābhyām añcalaḥ striyām

original: samābhyāṃ kṣitipaḥ proktaḥ pralambena śatābdavān // GarP_1,65.14 //
analyzed: samābhyām kṣitipaḥ proktaḥ pralambena śata abdavān
tābhyām ca bahu āyuḥ rūkṣaiḥ maṇibhiḥ īśvaraḥ
pāṇḍaraiḥ maṇibhiḥ niḥ svāḥ malinaiḥ sukha bhāginaḥ
sa śabdaniḥ śabda mūtrāḥ syuḥ aṃridrāḥ ca mānavāḥ
eka dvi tri catuḥ pañca ṣaḍbhiḥ dhārābhiḥ eva ca
dakṣiṇa āvarta calita mūtrāḥ bhiḥ ca nṛpāḥ smṛtāḥ
vikīrṇa mūtrāḥ svāḥ ca pradhāna sukha dāyikāḥ
eka dhārāḥ ca vanitāḥ snigdhaiḥ maṇibhiḥ unnataiḥ

original: samaiḥ strīratnadhanino madhye nimnaiśca kanyakāḥ // GarP_1,65.18 //
analyzed: samaiḥ strī ratna dhaninaḥ madhye nimnaiḥ ca kanyakāḥ
śuṣkaiḥ niśvāḥ viśuṣkaiḥ ca durbhagāḥ parikīrtitāḥ

original: puṣpagandhe nṛpāḥ śukre madhugandhe dhanaṃ bahuḥ // GarP_1,65.19 //
analyzed: puṣpa gandhe nṛpāḥ śukre madhu gandhe dhanam bahuḥ

original: putrāḥ śukre matsyagandhe tanuśukre ca kanyakāḥ /
analyzed: putrāḥ śukre matsya gandhe tanu śukre ca kanyakāḥ
mahā bhogī māṃsa gandhe yajvā syāt mada gandhini
daridraḥ kṣāra gandhe ca dīrgha āyuḥ śīghra maithunī
aśīghra maithunī alpa āyuḥ sthūla sphic syāt dhana ujjhitaḥ

original: māṃsalasphik sukhī syācca siṃhasphik bhūpatiḥ smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: māṃsala sphic sukhī syāt ca siṃha sphic bhūpatiḥ smṛtaḥ

original: bhavetsiṃhakaṭī rājā niḥ svaḥ kapikaṭirnaraḥ // GarP_1,65.22 //
analyzed: bhavet siṃha kaṭī rājā niḥ svaḥ kapi kaṭiḥ naraḥ

original: sarpodarā daridrāḥ syuḥ piṭharaiśca ghaṭaiḥ samaiḥ /
analyzed: sarpa udarāḥ daridrāḥ syuḥ piṭharaiḥ ca ghaṭaiḥ samaiḥ

original: dhanino vipulaiḥ pārśvairniḥ svā raktaiśca nimnagaiḥ // GarP_1,65.23 //
analyzed: dhaninaḥ vipulaiḥ pārśvaiḥ niḥ svāḥ raktaiḥ ca nimna gaiḥ
sama kakṣāḥ ca bhoga āḍhyāḥ nimna kakṣāḥ dhana ujjhitāḥ
nṛpāḥ ca unnata kakṣāḥ syuḥ jihnāḥ viṣama kakṣakāḥ
matsya udarāḥ bahu dhanāḥ nābhibhiḥ sukhinaḥ smṛtāḥ
vistīrṇābhiḥ bahulābhiḥ nimnābhiḥ kleśa bhāginaḥ
bali madhya gatā nābhiḥ śūla bādhām karoti hi

original: vāmāvartaśca sādhyaṃ vai medhāṃ dakṣiṇatastathā // GarP_1,65.26 //
analyzed: vāma āvartaḥ ca sādhyam vai medhām dakṣiṇatas tathā
pārśva āyatā cira āyuḥ dā tu upaviṣṭā dhaneśvaram

original: adho gavāḍhyaṃ kuryācca nṛpatvaṃ padmakarṇikā // GarP_1,65.27 //
analyzed: adhas gavā āḍhyam kuryāt ca nṛpa tvam padma karṇikā
eka baliḥ śata āyuḥ syāt śrī bhogī dvi valiḥ smṛtaḥ

original: trivaliḥ kṣmāpa ācārya ṛjubhirvālibhiḥ sukhī // GarP_1,65.28 //
analyzed: tri valiḥ kṣmāpaḥ ācāryaḥ sukhī
agamyā gāmī jihma baliḥ bhūpāḥ pārśvaiḥ ca māṃsalaiḥ
mṛdubhiḥ su samaiḥ ca eva dakṣiṇa āvarta romabhiḥ
viparītaiḥ para preṣyāḥ nirdravyāḥ sukha varjitāḥ
anuddhataiḥ cūcukaiḥ ca bhavanti subhagāḥ narāḥ
nirdhanāḥ viṣamaiḥ derghaiḥ pīta upacitakaiḥ nṛpāḥ

original: samonnataṃ ca hṛdayamakampaṃ māṃsalaṃ pṛthu // GarP_1,65.31 //
analyzed: sama unnatam ca hṛdayam akampam māṃsalam pṛthu
nṛpāṇām adhamānām ca khara roma śirālakam
arthavān sama vakṣāḥ syāt pīnaiḥ vakṣobhiḥ ūrjitaḥ
vakṣobhiḥ viṣamaiḥ niḥ svar
viṣamaiḥ jatrubhiḥ niḥ svāḥ asthi naddhaiḥ ca mānavāḥ
unnataiḥ bhoginaḥ nimnaiḥ niḥ svāḥ pīnaiḥ dhana anvitāḥ
niḥ svaḥ cipiṭa kaṇṭhaḥ syāt sirā śuṣka galaḥ sukhī
śūraḥ syāt mahiṣa grīvaḥ śāstra āttaḥ mṛga kaṇṭhakaḥ
kambu grīvaḥ ca nṛpatiḥ lamba kaṇṭhaḥ ti bhakṣakaḥ
aromaśāḥ bhugna pṛṣṭham śubham ca aśubham anyathā
kakṣā aśvattha dalā śreṣṭhā sugandhiḥ mṛga romikā
anyathā tu artha hīnānām dāridrayasya ca kāraṇam

original: saṃmāsau caiva bhugnālpau śliṣṭau ca vipulau śubhau // GarP_1,65.37 //
analyzed: ca eva bhugna alpau śliṣṭau ca vipulau śubhau
ājānu lambitau bāhū vṛttau pīnau nṛpa īśvare

original: niḥ svānāṃ romaśau hrasvau śreṣṭhau karikara prabhau // GarP_1,65.38 //
analyzed: niḥ svānām romaśau hrasvau śreṣṭhau kari kara prabhau
hasta aṅgulayaḥ eva syuḥ vāyu dvāra yutāḥ śubhāḥ

original: medhāvināṃ ca sūkṣmāḥ syurbhṛtyānāṃ cipiṭāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,65.39 //
analyzed: medhāvinām ca sūkṣmāḥ syuḥ bhṛtyānām cipiṭāḥ smṛtāḥ
sthūla aṅgulībhiḥ niḥ svāḥ syuḥ natāḥ syuḥ su kṛśaiḥ tadā
kapi tulya karāḥ niḥ svāḥ vyāghra tulya karaiḥ balam
pitṛ vitta vināśaḥ ca nimnāt kara talāt narāḥ
maṇibandhaiḥ nigūḍhaiḥ ca su śliṣṭaiḥ śubha gandhibhiḥ
nṛpāḥ hīnāḥ kara chaidaiḥ sa śabdaiḥ dhana varjitāḥ
saṃvṛtaiḥ ca eva nimnaiḥ ca dhaninaḥ parikīrtitāḥ
prottānaka ra dātāraḥ viṣamaiḥ viṣamāḥ narāḥ
karaiḥ kara talaiḥ ca eva lākṣā ābhaiḥ īśvarāḥ talaiḥ
para dāra ratāḥ pītaiḥ ūkṣaiḥ niḥ svāḥ narāḥ matāḥ
tuṣa tulya nakhāḥ klībāḥ kuṭilaiḥ sphuṭitaiḥ narāḥ
niḥ svāḥ ca kunakhaiḥ tadvat vivarṇaiḥ paratarkakāḥ
tāmraiḥ bhūpāḥ dhana āḍhyāḥ ca aṅguṣṭhaiḥ sa yavaiḥ tathā
aṅguṣṭha mūla jaiḥ putrī syāt dīrgha aṅguli parvakaḥ
dīrgha āyuḥ subhagaḥ ca eva nirdhanaḥ virala aṅguliḥ
ghana aṅguliḥ ca sa dhanaḥ tisraḥ rekhāḥ cayasya vai
nṛpateḥ kara tala gāḥ maṇibandhāt samutthitāḥ
yuga mīna aṅkita naraḥ bhavet satra pradaḥ naraḥ
vajra ākārāḥ ca dhaninām matsya puccha nibhāḥ budhe
śaṅkha ātapatra śivikā gaja padma upamāḥ nṛpe
kumbha aṅkuśa patākā ābhāḥ mṛṇāla ābhāḥ nidhi īśvare
dāma ābhāḥ ca gavāḍhyānām svastika ābhāḥ nṛpa īśvare
cakra asi tomara dhanuḥ kunta ābhāḥ nṛpateḥ kare
alu ukhala ābhāḥ yajña āḍhyāḥ vedī bhā ca agnihotriṇi
vāpī deva kulyā ābhāḥ trikoṇa ābhāḥ ca dhārmike
aṅguṣṭha mūla gāḥ rekhāḥ putrāḥ sūkṣmāḥ ca dārikāḥ
pradeśinī gatā rekhā kaniṣṭhā mūla gāminī

original: śatāyuṣaṃ ca kurute chinnayā taruto bhayam /
analyzed: śata āyuṣam ca kurute chinnayā tarutaḥ bhayam

original: niḥ svāśca bahurekhāḥ syunirdravyāścibukaiḥ kṛśaiḥ // GarP_1,65.53 //
analyzed: niḥ svāḥ ca bahu rekhāḥ syuḥ nirdravyāḥ cibukaiḥ kṛśaiḥ
māṃsalaiḥ ca dhana upetāḥ āraktaiḥ adharaiḥ nṛpāḥ
bimba upamaiḥ ca sphuṭitaiḥ oṣṭhaiḥ ūkṣaiḥ cakaṇḍitaiḥ
viṣamaiḥ dhana hīnāḥ ca dantāḥ snigdhāḥ ghanāḥ śubhāḥ

original: tīkṣṇā dantāḥ samāḥ śreṣṭhā jihvā raktā samā śubhā // GarP_1,65.55 //
analyzed: tīkṣṇāḥ dantāḥ samāḥ śreṣṭhāḥ jihvā raktā samā śubhā

original: ślakṣṇā dīrghā ca vijñeyā tālū śvete dhanakṣaye /
analyzed: ślakṣṇā dīrghā ca vijñeyā tālū śvete dhana kṣaye

original: kṛṣṇe ca paruṣo vakraṃ samaṃ saumyaṃ ca saṃvṛtam // GarP_1,65.56 //
analyzed: kṛṣṇe ca paruṣaḥ vakram samam saumyam ca saṃvṛtam

original: bhūpānāmamalaṃ ślakṣṇaṃ viparītaṃ ca duḥ khinām /
analyzed: bhūpānām amalam ślakṣṇam viparītam ca duḥ khinām

original: mahā duḥ khaṃ durbhagāṇāṃ strīmukhaṃ putramāpnuyāt // GarP_1,65.57 //
analyzed: mahā duḥ kham durbhagāṇām strī mukham putram āpnuyāt

original: āḍhyānāṃ vartulaṃ vakraṃ nirdravyāṇāṃ ca dīrghakam /
analyzed: āḍhyānām vartulam vakram nirdravyāṇām ca dīrghakam
bhīru vakraḥ pāpa karmā dhūrtānām caturaśrakam
nimnam vakram aputrāṇām kṛpaṇānām ca hrasvakam

original: sampūrṇaṃ bhogināṃ kāntaṃ śmaśru snigdhaṃ śubhaṃ mṛdu // GarP_1,65.59 //
analyzed: sampūrṇam bhoginām kāntam śmaśru snigdham śubham mṛdu
saṃhatam ca a sphuṭita agram rakta śmaśruḥ ca caurakaḥ
rakta alpa paruṣa śmaśru karṇāḥ syuḥ pāpa mṛtyavaḥ
nirmāṃsaiḥ cipiṭaiḥ bhogāḥ kṛpaṇāḥ hrasva karṇakāḥ
śaṅku karṇāḥ ca rājānaḥ roma karṇāḥ gata āyuṣaḥ
bṛhat karṇāḥ ca dhaninaḥ rājānaḥ parikīrtitāḥ
karṇaiḥ snigdha avanaddhaiḥ ca vyālambaiḥ māṃsalaiḥ nṛpāḥ
bhogī vai nimna gaṇḍaḥ syāt matrī sampūrṇa gaṇḍakaḥ
śuka nāsaḥ sukhī syāt ca śuṣka nāsaḥ ti jīvanaḥ
chinna agra kūpa nāsaḥ syāt agamyā gamane rataḥ
dīrgha nāse ca saubhāgyam cauraḥ ca ākuñcita indriyaḥ
mṛtyuḥ cipiṭa nāse syāt hīnaḥ bhāgyavatām bhavet

original: svalpacchidrau supuṭau ca avakrau ca nṛpeśvare // GarP_1,65.65 //
analyzed: su alpa chidrau su puṭau ca avakrau ca nṛpa īśvare

original: krūre dakṣiṇavakrā syādvalināṃ ca kṣutaṃ sakṛt /
analyzed: krūre dakṣiṇa vakrā syāt valinām ca kṣutam sakṛt

original: syādviniṣpiṇḍitaṃ hrādi sānunādaṃ ca jīvakṛt // GarP_1,65.66 //
analyzed: syāt viniṣpiṇḍitam hrādi sa anunādam ca jīva kṛt
vakra antaiḥ padma patra ābhaiḥ locanaiḥ sukha bhāginaḥ
mārjāra locanaiḥ pāpmā durātmā madhu piṅgalaiḥ
krūrāḥ kekara netrāḥ ca harita akṣāḥ sa kalmaṣāḥ

original: jihyaiśca locanaiḥ śūrāḥ senānyo gajalocanāḥ // GarP_1,65.68 //
analyzed: jihyaiḥ ca locanaiḥ śūrāḥ senānyaḥ gaja locanāḥ
gambhīra akṣāḥ īśvarāḥ syuḥ mantriṇaḥ sthūla cakṣuṣaḥ

original: nīlotpa lākṣā vidvāṃsaḥ saubhāgyaṃ śyāmacakṣuṣām // GarP_1,65.69 //
analyzed: nīlotpa lākṣāḥ vidvāṃsaḥ saubhāgyam śyāma cakṣuṣām
syāt kṛṣṇa tāraka akṣāṇām akṣṇām utpāṭanam kila

original: maṇḍalākṣāśca pāpāḥ syurniḥ svāḥ syurdenalocanāḥ // GarP_1,65.70 //
analyzed: maṇḍala akṣāḥ ca pāpāḥ syuḥ niḥ svāḥ
dṛś snigdhā vipulā bhoge alpa āyuḥ adhika unnatā
viśāla unnatā sukhinī daridrā viṣama bhruvaḥ
ghana dīrgha asu sakta bhrūḥ bāla indu unnata su bhruvaḥ

original: āḍhyo niḥ svaśca khaṇḍabhrṛrmadhye ca vinatabhruvaḥ // GarP_1,65.72 //
analyzed: āḍhyaḥ niḥ svaḥ ca khaṇḍa bhrṛḥ madhye ca vinata bhruvaḥ

original: strīṣu gamyāsu saktāḥ syuḥ sutārthe parivarjitāḥ /
analyzed: strīṣu gamyāsu saktāḥ syuḥ suta arthe parivarjitāḥ
an nataiḥ vipulaiḥ śaṅkhaiḥ lalāṭaiḥ viṣamaiḥ tathā
nirdhanāḥ dhanavantaḥ ca ardha indu sadṛśaiḥ narāḥ
ācāryāḥ śukti viśālaiḥ śirālaiḥ pāpa kāriṇaḥ
sirābhiḥ ca svastikābhiḥ dhana īśvarāḥ
nimnaiḥ lalāṭaiḥ bandha arhāḥ krūra karma ratāḥ tathā
saṃvṛtaiḥ ca lalāṭaiḥ ca kṛpaṇāḥ unnataiḥ nṛpāḥ
anaśru snigdha ruditam adīnam śubha dam nṛṇām

original: pracurāśrudīnaṃ rūkṣaṃ ca ruditaṃ ca sukhāvaham /
analyzed: pracura aśru dīnam rūkṣam ca ruditam ca sukha āvaham
akampam hasitam śreṣṭham mīlita akṣam agha āvaham
asakṛt hasitam duṣṭam sa unmādasya hi anekadhā
lalāṭa upasṛtāḥ tisraḥ rekhāḥ syuḥ śata varṣiṇām
nṛpa tvam syāt catasṛbhiḥ āyuḥ pañcanavati atha
arekheṇa āyuḥ navatiḥ vicchinnābhiḥ ca
keśānta upagatābhiḥ ca aśīti āyūḥ naraḥ bhavet
pañcabhiḥ saptabhiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ pañcāśat vahubhiḥ tathā
catvāriṃśat ca vakrābhiḥ triṃśat bhrū lagna gāmibhiḥ
viṃśatiḥ vāma vakrā bhiḥ āyuḥ kṣudrābhiḥ alpakam
chatra ākāraiḥ śirobhiḥ tu nṛpāḥ nimna śirāḥ dhanī
cipiṭaiḥ ca pituḥ mṛtyuḥ gavā ādyāḥ parimaṇḍalaiḥ
ghaṭa mūrdhā pāpa ruciḥ dhana ādyaiḥ parivarjitaḥ
kṛṣṇaiḥ ākuñcitaiḥ keśaiḥ snigdhaiḥ ekaika sambhavaiḥ
a bhinna agraiḥ ca mṛdubhiḥ na ca ati bahubhiḥ nṛpāḥ
bahu mūlaiḥ ca viṣamaiḥ sthūla agraiḥ kapilaiḥ tathā
niḥ dhika
mūrdhajaiḥ
yat yat gātram mahā rūkṣam śirālam māṃsa varjitam
tat tat syāḥ daśubham sarvam tatas nyathā

original: vipulastriṣu gambhīro dīrghaḥ sūkṣmaśca pañcasu // GarP_1,65.86 //
analyzed: vipulaḥ triṣu gambhīraḥ dīrghaḥ sūkṣmaḥ ca pañcasu
ṣaṣ unnataḥ catur hrasvaḥ raktaḥ saptasu asau nṛpaḥ

original: nābhiḥ svaraśca sasattvaṃ ca trayaṃ gambhīramīritam // GarP_1,65.87 //
analyzed: nābhiḥ svaraḥ ca sa sattvam ca trayam gambhīram īritam
puṃsaḥ syāt ati vistīrṇam lalāṭam vadanam hi uraḥ

original: cakṣuḥ kakṣā nāsikā ca ṣaṭ syur nṛpakṛkāṭikāḥ // GarP_1,65.88 //
analyzed: cakṣuḥ kakṣā nāsikā ca ṣaṭ syuḥ nṛpa kṛkāṭikāḥ

original: unnatāni ca hrasvani jaṅghā grīvā ca liṅgakam /
analyzed: unnatāni ca hrasvani jaṅghā grīvā ca liṅgakam

original: pṛṣṭhaṃ catvāri raktāni karatālvadharā nakhāḥ // GarP_1,65.89 //
analyzed: pṛṣṭham catvāri raktāni kara tālu adharāḥ nakhāḥ
netra anta pāda jihvā oṣṭhāḥ pañca sūkṣmāṇi santi vai
daśana aṅguli parvāṇi nakha keśa tvacaḥ śubhāḥ
dīrghāḥ stanāntaram bāhu danta locana nāsikāḥ

original: narāṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ proktaṃ vadāmi strīṣu lakṣaṇam // GarP_1,65.91 //
analyzed: narāṇām lakṣaṇam proktam vadāmi strīṣu lakṣaṇam

original: rājñyāḥ snigdhau samau pādau talau tāmrau nakhau tathā /
analyzed: rājñyāḥ snigdhau samau pādau talau tāmrau nakhau tathā

original: śliṣṭāṅgulī connatāgrau tāṃ pāpya nṛpatirbhavet // GarP_1,65.92 //
analyzed: śliṣṭa aṅgulī ca unnata agrau tām pāpya nṛpatiḥ bhavet
nigūḍha gulpha upacitau padma kānti talau śubhau
asvedinau mṛdu talau
vajra abja hala cihnau ca dāsyāḥ pādau tatas nyathā

original: jaṅghe ca romarahite suvṛtte viśire śubhe // GarP_1,65.94 //
analyzed: jaṅghe ca roma rahite su vṛtte viśire śubhe

original: ūrū karikarākārāvaromau ca samau śubhau // GarP_1,65.95 //
analyzed: ūrū kari kara ākārau aromau ca samau śubhau
aśvattha patra sadṛśam vipulam guhyam uttamam
śroṇī lalāṭakam strīṇām ūru kūrma unnatam śubham

original: gūḍho maṇiśca śubhado nitambaśca guruḥ śubhaḥ /
analyzed: gūḍhaḥ maṇiḥ ca śubha daḥ nitambaḥ ca guruḥ śubhaḥ
vistīrṇa māṃsa upacitā gambhīrā vipulā śubhā

original: aromaśau stanau pīnau ghanāvaviṣamau śubhau // GarP_1,65.98 //
analyzed: aromaśau stanau pīnau ghanau aviṣamau śubhau

original: kaṭhinau romaśā śastā mṛdugrīvā ca kambubhā /
analyzed: kaṭhinau romaśā śastā mṛdu grīvā ca kambu bhā

original: āraktāvadharau śreṣṭhau māṃsalaṃ vartulaṃ mukham // GarP_1,65.99 //
analyzed: āraktau adharau śreṣṭhau māṃsalam vartulam mukham
kunda puṣpa samāḥ dantāḥ bhāṣitam kokilā samam

original: nāsā samā samapuṭā strīṇāṃ tu rucirā śubhā /
analyzed: nāsā samā sama puṭā strīṇām tu rucirā śubhā
nīlotpala nibham cakṣuḥ nāsā lagnam na lambakam

original: na pṛthū bālendunibhe bhruvau cātha lalāṭakam /
analyzed: na pṛthū bāla indu nibhe bhruvau ca atha lalāṭakam
śubham ardha indu saṃsthānam atuṅgam syāt alomaśam
su māṃsalam karṇa yugmam samam mṛdu samāhitam

original: snigdhā nīlāśca mṛdavo mūrdhajāḥ kuñcitāḥ kacāḥ // GarP_1,65.103 //
analyzed: snigdhāḥ nīlāḥ ca mṛdavaḥ mūrdhajāḥ kuñcitāḥ kacāḥ

original: strīṇāṃ samaṃ śiraḥ śreṣṭhaṃ pāde pāṇitale 'tha vā /
analyzed: strīṇām samam śiraḥ śreṣṭham pāde pāṇi tale vā
vāji kuñjara śrīvṛkṣa yūpa iṣu yava tomaraiḥ
dhvaja cāmara mālābhiḥ śaila kuṇḍala vedibhiḥ
śaṅkha ātapatra padmaiḥ ca matsya svastika sat rathaiḥ
lakṣaṇaiḥ aṅkuśa ādyaiḥ ca striyaḥ syuḥ rāja vallabhāḥ

original: na nimnaṃ nonnataṃ strīṇāṃ bhavetkaratalaṃ śubham /
analyzed: na nimnam nā unnatam strīṇām bhavet kara talam śubham

original: rekhā yā maṇibandhotthā gatā madhyāṅguliṃ kare // GarP_1,65.107 //
analyzed: rekhā yā maṇibandha utthā gatā madhyāṅgulim kare

original: gatā pāṇitale yā ca yordhvapādatale sthitā /
analyzed: gatā pāṇi tale yā ca yā ūrdhva pāda tale sthitā

original: strīṇāṃ puṃsāṃ tathā sā syādrājyāya ca sukhāya ca // GarP_1,65.108 //
analyzed: strīṇām puṃsām tathā sā syāt rājyāya ca sukhāya ca
kaniṣṭhikā mūla bhavā rekhā kuryāt śata āyuṣam

ūnāḥ ūna āyuṣam kuryāt rekhāḥ ca aṅguṣṭha mūla gāḥ
bṛhatyaḥ putrāḥ tanvyaḥ tu pramadāḥ parikīrtitāḥ
su alpa āyuṣaḥ bahu laghu

original: śubhaṃ tu lakṣaṇaṃ strīṇāṃ proktaṃ tvaśubhamanyathā // GarP_1,65.111 //
analyzed: śubham tu lakṣaṇam strīṇām proktam tu aśubham anyathā

original: kaniṣṭhikānāmikā vā yasyā na spṛśate mahīm /
analyzed: kaniṣṭhikā anāmikā vā yasyāḥ na spṛśate mahīm

original: aṅguṣṭhaṃ vā gatātītya tarjanī kulaṭā ca sā // GarP_1,65.112 //

analyzed: vāma āvartam nimnam alpam duḥ khitānām ca guhyakam

analyzed: grīvayā hrasvayā niḥ svāḥ dīrghayā ca kula kṣayaḥ

original: kekare piṅgale netre śyāme lolekṣaṇā satī // GarP_1,65.115 //
analyzed: kekare piṅgale netre śyāme lola īkṣaṇā satī

original: smite kūpe gaṇḍayośca sā dhruvaṃ vyabhicāriṇī /
analyzed: smite kūpe gaṇḍayoḥ ca sā dhruvam vyabhicāriṇī

original: pralambinī lalāṭe tu devaraṃ hanti cāṅganā // GarP_1,65.116 //

original: yā tu romottarauṣṭhī syānna śubhā bhartureva hi // GarP_1,65.117 //
analyzed: yā tu roma uttara oṣṭhī syāt na śubhā bhartuḥ eva hi

original: stanau saromāvaśubhau karṇau ca viṣamau tathā /
analyzed: stanau sa romau aśubhau karṇau ca viṣamau tathā

original: karālā viṣamā dantāḥ kleśāya ca bhavanti te // GarP_1,65.118 //
analyzed: karālāḥ viṣamāḥ dantāḥ kleśāya ca bhavanti te
cauryāya kṛṣṇa māṃsāḥ ca dīrghāḥ bhurtuḥ ca mṛtyave
kravyāda rūpaiḥ hastaiḥ ca vṛka kāka ādi sannibhaiḥ
śirālaiḥ viṣamaiḥ śuṣkaiḥ vitta hīnāḥ bhavanti hi
samunnata uttareṣṭhī yā kalahe rūkṣa bhāṣiṇī
strīṣu doṣāḥ virūpāsu patra ākāraḥ guṇāḥ tatas
nara strī lakṣaṇam proktam vakṣye tad jñāna dāyakam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe jyotiḥ śāstre sāmudrike strīnaralakṣaṇaṃ nāma pañcaṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe jyotiḥ śāstre sāmudrike strīnaralakṣaṇam nāma pañcaṣaṣṭitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
hariḥ uvāca
nirlakṣaṇā śubhā syāt ca cakra aṅkita śilā arcanāt
ādau sudarśanaḥ mūrtiḥ lakṣmī nārāyaṇaḥ paraḥ
sa avacyutaḥ syāt catur cakraḥ catur bhujaḥ
vāsudevaḥ ca pradyumnaḥ tatas saṅkarṣaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ
puruṣottamaḥ ca aṣṭamaḥ syāt navyūhaḥ daśa ātmakaḥ
ekādaśaḥ niruddhaḥ syāt dvādaśaḥ dvādaśātmakaḥ
atas ūrdhvam anantaḥ syāt śakre reka ādikaiḥ kramāt
su darśanāḥ lakṣitāḥ ca pūjitāḥ sarva kāma dāḥ
śālagrāma śilā yatra devaḥ dvāravatī bhavaḥ

original: ubhayoḥ saṃgamo yatra tatra muktirna saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,66.5 //
analyzed: ubhayoḥ saṃgamaḥ yatra tatra muktiḥ na saṃśayaḥ

original: vārāṇasī prayāgaśca kurukṣetraṃ ca sūkaram // GarP_1,66.6 //

original: gaṅgā ca narmadā caiva candrabhāgā sarasvatī /

original: prabhavo vibhavaḥ śuklaḥ pramodo 'tha prajāpatiḥ // GarP_1,66.8 //

original: sarvajitsarvadhārī ca virodhī vikṛtiḥ kharaḥ // GarP_1,66.10 //

ūrdhva tiryak gataiḥ rekhaiḥ ṣaṣ vahni kramam āgataiḥ

original: tithī ekā gnikoṣṭheṣu trayo rājātha sā (mā) jayāḥ /

udāsa amṛtyupīḍāḥ ca kujaḥ somasutaḥ kramāt

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe jyotiḥ śāstre śālagrāmaṣaṣṭyūbdasvarodayānāṃ nirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣaṭṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ

iti jyotiḥ śāstram samāptam

original: śobhaneṣu ca kāryeṣu yātrāyāṃ viṣakarmaṇi // GarP_1,67.15 //

original: dvābhyāṃ caiva pravāhe ca krūrasaumyavivarjane // GarP_1,67.16 //
