vāma ācāra samaḥ vāyuḥ jāyate karma siddhi daḥ

original: pravṛtte dakṣiṇe mārge viṣame viṣamākṣaram // GarP_1,67.30 //
analyzed: pravṛtte dakṣiṇe mārge viṣame viṣama akṣaram

original: anyatra vāmavāhe tu nāma vai viṣamākṣaram /
analyzed: anyatra vāma vāhe tu nāma vai viṣama akṣaram
tadā asau jayam āpnoti yodhaḥ saṃgrāma madhyatas
dakṣa vāta pravāhe tu yadi nāma sama akṣaram

original: jā(ja) yate nātra sandeho nāḍīmaghye tu lakṣayet // GarP_1,67.32 //
analyzed: yate na atra sandehaḥ nāḍī maghye tu lakṣayet
piṅgalā antargate prāṇe śamanīya āhavam jayet
yāvat nāḍī udayam cāraḥ tām diśam yāvat āpayet

original: na dātuṃ jāyate so 'pi nātra kāryā vicāraṇā /
analyzed: na dātum jāyate na atra kāryā vicāraṇā

original: atha saṃgrāmamadhye tu yatra nāḍī sadā vahet // GarP_1,67.34 //
analyzed: atha saṃgrāma madhye tu yatra nāḍī sadā vahet

original: sā diśā jayamāpnoti śūnye bhaṅgaṃ vinirdiśet /
analyzed: sā diśā jayam āpnoti śūnye bhaṅgam vinirdiśet
jāta cāre jayam vidyāt mṛtake mṛtam ādiśet

original: jayaṃ parājayaṃ caiva yo jānāti sa paṇḍitaḥ /
analyzed: jayam parājayam ca eva yaḥ jānāti sa paṇḍitaḥ

original: vāme vā dakṣiṇe vāpi yatra sañcarate śivam // GarP_1,67.36 //
analyzed: vāme vā dakṣiṇe vā api yatra sañcarate śivam
kṛtvā tat padam āpnoti yātrā santata śobhanā

original: śaśisūryapravāhe tu sati yuddhaṃ samācaret // GarP_1,67.37 //
analyzed: śaśi sūrya pravāhe tu sati yuddham samācaret
yaḥ tu pṛcchati tatrasthaḥ sa sādhuḥ jayati dhruvam

original: yāṃ diśaṃ vahate vāyustāṃ diśaṃ yāvadājayaḥ // GarP_1,67.38 //
analyzed: yām diśam vahate vāyuḥ tām diśam yāvat ājayaḥ

original: jāyate nātra sandeha handro yadyagrataḥ sthitaḥ /
analyzed: jāyate na atra sandeha handraḥ yadi agratas sthitaḥ

original: meṣyādyā daśa yā nāḍyo dakṣiṇā vāma saṃsthitāḥ // GarP_1,67.39 //
analyzed: meṣī ādyāḥ daśa yāḥ nāḍyaḥ dakṣiṇāḥ vāma saṃsthitāḥ
tad vimārge tādṛśa tādṛśe kramāt

original: nirgame nirgamaṃ yāti saṃgrahe saṃgrahaṃ viduḥ // GarP_1,67.40 //
analyzed: nirgame nirgamam yāti saṃgrahe saṃgraham viduḥ
pṛcchakasya vacaḥ śrutvā ghaṇṭā ākāreṇa lakṣayet

original: vāme vā dakṣiṇe vāpi pañcatattvasthitaḥ śive // GarP_1,67.41 //
analyzed: vāme vā dakṣiṇe vā api pañcatattva sthitaḥ śive
ūrdhve gniḥ adhas āpaḥ ca tiryak saṃsthaḥ prabhañjanaḥ

original: madhye tu pṛthivī jñeyā nabhaḥ sarvatra sarvadā // GarP_1,67.42 //
analyzed: madhye tu pṛthivī jñeyā nabhaḥ sarvatra sarvadā
ūrdhve mṛtyuḥ adhas śāntiḥ tiryak ca uccāṭayet sudhīḥ

original: madhye stambhaṃ vijānīyānmokṣaḥ sarvatra sarvage // GarP_1,67.43 //
analyzed: madhye stambham vijānīyāt mokṣaḥ sarvatra sarvage

original: iti śrīgāruḍemahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe svarodaye śubhāśubhanirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptaṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe svarodaye śubhāśubhanirūpaṇam nāma saptaṣaṣṭitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
sūtaḥ uvāca
parikṣām vacmi ratnānām balaḥ nāma asuraḥ bhavat

original: indrādyā nirjitāstena vijetuṃ tairna śakyate // GarP_1,68.1 //
analyzed: indra ādyāḥ nirjitāḥ tena vijetum taiḥ na śakyate
vara vyājena paśu tām yācitaḥ sa suraiḥ makhe
balaḥ dadau sa sva
paśu tā mati sattva suraiḥ hataḥ
paśu vat sa viśastaḥ taiḥ sva vākya aśani yantritaḥ
balaḥ loka uparāya devānām hita kāmyayā
tasya sattva viśuddhasya viśuddhena ca karmaṇā
kāyasya avayavāḥ sarve ratna bīja tvam āyayuḥ
devānām atha yakṣāṇām siddhānām pavanāśinām
ratna bījam svajam
yam grāhaḥ su mahān abhavat tadā
teṣām tu patatām vegāt vimānena vihāyasā

original: yadyatpapāta ratnānāṃ bījaṃ kracana kiñcana // GarP_1,68.6 //
analyzed: yat yat papāta ratnānām bījam kracana kiñcana

original: mahodadhau sariti vā pavarta kānane 'pi vā /
analyzed: mahā udadhau sariti vā pavarta kānane vā
tat tad ākara tām yātam sthānam ādheya gauravāt
teṣu rakṣaḥ viṣa vyāla vyādhi ghnāni agha hāni ca

original: prādurbhavanti ratnāni tathaiva viguṇāni ca // GarP_1,68.8 //
analyzed: prādurbhavanti ratnāni tathā eva viguṇāni ca
vajram muktāmaṇayaḥ sa padmarāgāḥ sa marakatāḥ proktāḥ
api ca indranīla maṇi vara vaidūryāḥ puṣparāgāḥ ca
karketanam sa pulakam rudhira ākhya samanvitam tathā sphaṭikam
vidruma maṇiḥ ca yatnāt uddiṣṭam saṃgrahe tad jñaiḥ

original: ākāravarṇau prathamaṃ guṇadoṣau tatphalaṃ parīkṣā ca /
analyzed: ākāra varṇau prathamam guṇa doṣau tad phalam parīkṣā ca
mūlyam ca ratna kuśalaiḥ vijñeyam sarva śāstrāṇām
ku lagneṣu upajāyante yāni ca upahate hani
dauṣaiḥ tāni apiyujyante hīyante guṇa sampadā
parīkṣā pariśuddhānām ratnānām pṛthivībhujā

original: dhāraṇaṃ saṃgraho vāpi kāryaḥ śriyamabhīpsatā // GarP_1,68.13 //
analyzed: dhāraṇam saṃgrahaḥ vā api kāryaḥ śriyam abhīpsatā
śāstra jñaḥ kuśalāḥ ca api ratna bhājaḥ parīkṣakāḥ

original: ta eva mūlyamātrāyā vettāraḥ parikīrtitāḥ // GarP_1,68.14 //
analyzed: te eva mūlya mātrāyāḥ vettāraḥ parikīrtitāḥ
mahā prabhāvam vibudhaiḥ yasya amāt vajram udāhṛtam
vajra pūrvā parīkṣā iyam smābhiḥ prakīrtyate

original: tasyāsthileśo nipapāta yeṣu bhuvaḥ pradeśeṣu kathañcideva /
analyzed: tasya asthi leśaḥ nipapāta yeṣu bhuvaḥ pradeśeṣu kathañcid eva
vajrāṇi vajrāyudha nirjigīṣoḥ bhavanti nānā ākṛtimanti teṣu
haima mātaṅga saurāṣṭrāḥ pauṇḍra kāliṅga kosalāḥ
veṇvātaṭāḥ sasauvīrāḥ vajrasya aṣṭa vihārakāḥ

original: ātāmrā himaśailajāśca śaśibhā veṇvātaṭīyāḥ smṛtāḥ sauvīre tvasitābjameghasadṛśāstābhrāśca saurāṣṭrajāḥ /
analyzed: ātāmrāḥ himaśaila jāḥ ca śaśibhāḥ veṇvātaṭīyāḥ smṛtāḥ sauvīre tu asita abja megha sadṛśāḥ tābhrāḥ ca saurāṣṭra jāḥ

original: kāliṅgāḥ kana kāvadātarucirāḥ pītaprabhāḥ kosale śyāmāḥ puṇḍrabhavā mataṅgaviṣaye nātyantapītaprabhāḥ // GarP_1,68.18 //
analyzed: kāliṅgāḥ kana ka avadāta rucirāḥ pīta prabhāḥ kosale śyāmāḥ puṇḍra bhavāḥ mataṅga viṣaye na atyanta pīta prabhāḥ
atyartham laghu varṇataḥ ca guṇavat pārśveṣu samyak samam rekhā bindu kalaṅka kākapadaka trāsa ādibhiḥ varjitam

original: loke 'sminparāmāṇumātramapi yadvajraṃ kraciddṛśyate tasmindevasamāśrayo hyavitathastīkṣṇāgradhāraṃ yadi // GarP_1,68.19 //
analyzed: loke smin parāmāṇu mātram api yat vajram kracid dṛśyate tasmin deva samāśrayaḥ hi avitathaḥ tīkṣṇa agra dhāram yadi
vajreṣu varṇa yuktyā devānām api vigrahaḥ proktaḥ
varṇebhyaḥ ca vibhāgaḥ kāryaḥ varṇa āśrayāt eva
harita sita pīta piṅga śyāmāḥ tāmrāḥ svabhāvataḥ rucirāḥ
hari varuṇa śakra hutavaha pitṛpati marutām svakāḥ varṇāḥ
viprasya śaṅkha kumuda sphaṭika avadātaḥ syāt kṣattriyasya śaśa babhru vilocana ābhaḥ
vaiśyasya kānta kadalī dala sannikāśaḥ śūdrasya dhauta karavāla samāna dīptiḥ

original: dvau vajravarṇau pṛthivīpatīnāṃ sadbhiḥ pradiṣṭau na tu sārvajanyau /
analyzed: dvau vajra varṇau pṛthivīpatīnām sadbhiḥ pradiṣṭau na tu sārvajanyau

original: yaḥ syājjavāvidrumabhaṅgaśoṇo yo vā haridrārasannikāśaḥ // GarP_1,68.23 //
analyzed: yaḥ syāt javāvi druma bhaṅga śoṇaḥ yaḥ vā haridrāra sannikāśaḥ
īśa tvāt sarva varṇānām guṇavat sārbavarṇikam
kāmatas dhārayet rājā na tu anyaḥ nyat kathañcana
adhara uttara vṛttayā hi yādṛś syāt varṇa saṅkaraḥ

original: tataḥ kaṣṭataro vajravarṇānāṃ saṅkaro mataḥ // GarP_1,68.25 //
analyzed: tatas kaṣṭataraḥ vajra varṇānām saṅkaraḥ mataḥ

original: na ca mārgavibhāgamātravṛttyā viduṣā vajraparigraho vidheyaḥ /
analyzed: na ca mārga vibhāga mātra vṛttyā viduṣā vajra parigrahaḥ vidheyaḥ
guṇavat guṇa sampadām vibhūtiḥ viparītaḥ vyasana udayasya hetuḥ

original: ekamapi yasya śṛṅgaṃ vidalitamavalokyate viśīrṇaṃ vā /
analyzed: ekam api yasya śṛṅgam vidalitam avalokyate viśīrṇam vā

original: guṇavadapi tanna dhāryaṃ vajraṃ śreyo 'rthibhirbhavane // GarP_1,68.27 //
analyzed: guṇavat api tat na dhāryam vajram śreyaḥ rthibhiḥ bhavane
sphuṭita agni vi śīrṇa śṛṅga deśam mala varṇaiḥ pṛṣataiḥ upeta madhyam

original: na hi vajrabhṛto 'pi vajramāśu śriyamapyāśrayalālasāṃ na kuryāt // GarP_1,68.28 //
analyzed: na hi vajrabhṛtaḥ vajram āśu śriyam api āśraya lālasām na kuryāt
yasya eka deśaḥ kṣataja avabhāsaḥ yat vā bhavet lohita varṇa citram

original: na tanna kuryāddhriyamāṇamāśu svacchandamṛtyorapi jīvitāntam // GarP_1,68.29 //
analyzed: na tat na kuryāt dhriyamāṇam āśu svacchanda mṛtyoḥ api jīvitāntam

original: koṭyaḥ pārśvani dhārāśca ṣaḍaṣṭau dvādaśeti ca /
analyzed: koṭyaḥ pārśvani dhārāḥ ca ṣaṣ aṣṭau dvādaśa iti ca
uttuṅga sama tīkṣṇa agrāḥ vajrasya ākara jāḥ guṇāḥ

original: ṣaṭkoṭi śudvamamalaṃ sphuṭatīkṣṇadhāraṃ varṇānvitaṃ laghu supārśvamapetadoṣam /
analyzed: ṣaṭkoṭi śudvam amalam sphuṭa tīkṣṇa dhāram varṇa anvitam laghu su pārśvam apeta doṣam
indrāyudha aṃśu visṛti churita antarikṣam evaṃvidham bhuvi bhavet sulabham na vajram

original: tīkṣṇāgraṃ vimalamapetasarvadoṣaṃ dhatte yaḥ prayatatanuḥ sadaiva vajram /
analyzed: tīkṣṇa agram vimalam apeta sarva doṣam dhatte yaḥ prayata tanuḥ sadā eva vajram
vṛddhiḥ tam pratidinam eti yāvadāyus strī sampad suta dhana dhānya go daśūnām
vyāla vahni viṣa vyāghra taskara ambu bhayāni ca
dūrāt tasya nivartante karmāṇi ātharvaṇāni ca
yadi vajram apeta sarva doṣam bibhṛyāt taṇḍula viṃśatim guru tve

original: maṇiśāstravido vadanti tasya dviguṇaṃ rūpakalakṣamagramūlyam // GarP_1,68.34 //
analyzed: maṇi śāstra vidaḥ vadanti tasya dviguṇam rūpaka lakṣam agra mūlyam
tri bhāga hīna ardha tad ardha śeṣam trayodaśam triṃśat atas ūrddha bhāgāḥ
śata aṃśa bhāgaḥ sahasra bhāgaḥ lpa samāna yogaḥ

original: yattaṇḍulairdvādaśabhiḥ kṛtasya vajrasya mūlyaṃ prathamaṃ pradiṣṭam /
analyzed: yat taṇḍulaiḥ dvādaśabhiḥ kṛtasya vajrasya mūlyam prathamam pradiṣṭam
dvābhyām kramāt vānim upāgatasya tu eka avamānasya viniścayaḥ yam
na ca api taṇḍulaiḥ eva vajrāṇām dharaṇa kramaḥ
aṣṭābhiḥ sarṣapaiḥ gairaiḥ taṃṇḍulam parikalpayet
yat tu sarva guṇaiḥ yuktam vajram tarati vāriṇi
ratna varge samaste tasya dhāraṇam iṣyate
alpena api hi doṣeṇa lakṣya a lakṣyeṇa dvaṣitam

original: sva (sa) mūlyāddaśamaṃ bhāgaṃ vajraṃ labhati mānavaḥ // GarP_1,68.39 //
analyzed: mūlyāt daśamam bhāgam vajram labhati mānavaḥ
prakaṭa aneka doṣasya su alpasya mahataḥ vā

original: sva (su) mūlyācchataśo bhāgo vajrasya na vidhīyate // GarP_1,68.40 //
analyzed: sva su mūlyāt śataśas bhāgaḥ vajrasya na vidhīyate
spaṣṭa doṣam alaṅkāre vajram yadi api dṛśyate

original: ratnānāṃ parikarmārthaṃ mūlyaṃ tasya bhavellaghu // GarP_1,68.41 //
analyzed: ratnānām parikarma artham mūlyam tasya bhavet laghu

original: prathamaṃ guṇasampadābhyupetaṃ pratibaddhaṃ samupaiti yacca doṣam /
analyzed: prathamam guṇa sampadā abhyupetam pratibaddham samupaiti yat ca doṣam

original: alamābharaṇena tasya rājño guṇahīno 'pi maṇirna bhūṣaṇāya // GarP_1,68.42 //
analyzed: alam ābharaṇena tasya rājñaḥ guṇa hīnaḥ pi maṇiḥ na bhūṣaṇāya
nāryāḥ vajram adhāryam guṇavat api suta prasūtim icchantyā
anyatra dīrgha a ci piṭa tri asra ādi aguṇaiḥ viyuktāt ca
ayasā puṣparāgeṇa tathā gomedakena ca
vaidūrya sphaṭikābhyām ca kācaiḥ ca api pṛthagvidhaiḥ
pratirūpāṇi kurvanti vajrasya kuśalāḥ janāḥ

original: parīkṣā teṣu kartavyā vidvadbhiḥ suparīkṣakaiḥ // GarP_1,68.45 //
analyzed: parīkṣā teṣu kartavyā vidvadbhiḥ su parīkṣakaiḥ
kṣāra ullekhana śāṇābhiḥ teṣām kāryam parīkṣaṇam

original: pṛthivyāṃ yāni ratnāni ye cānye lohadhātavaḥ // GarP_1,68.46 //
analyzed: pṛthivyām yāni ratnāni ye ca anye loha dhātavaḥ
sarvāṇi vilikhet vajram tat ca taiḥ na vilikhyate
guru tā sarva ratnānām gaurava ādhāra kāraṇam
vajre tām vaiparītyena sūrayaḥ paricakṣate

original: jātirajātiṃ vilikhati jātiṃ vilikhanti vajrakuruvindāḥ // GarP_1,68.48 //
analyzed: jātiḥ ajātim vilikhati jātim vilikhanti vajra kuruvindāḥ
vajraiḥ vajram vilikhati na anyena vilikhyate vajram

original: vajrāṇi muktāmaṇayo ye ca kecana jātayaḥ // GarP_1,68.49 //
analyzed: vajrāṇi muktāmaṇayaḥ ye ca kecana jātayaḥ
na teṣām pratibaddhānām bhās bhavati ūrdhva gāminī
tiryak kṣata tvāt keṣāṃcid kathañcid yadi jāyate
tiryak vilikhyamānānām sā sa
pārśveṣu vihanyate
yadi api viśīrṇa koṭiḥ sa bindu rekhā anvitaḥ vivarṇaḥ vā
tat api dhana dhānya putrān karoti sa indrāyudhaḥ vajraḥ

original: saudā minīvisphuritābhirāmaṃ rājā yathoktaṃ kaliśaṃ dadhānaḥ /
analyzed: saudāḥ minī visphurita abhirāmam rājā yathoktam kaliśam dadhānaḥ
parākrama ākrānta para pratāpaḥ samasta sāmanta bhuvam bhunakti

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe ratnatadviśeṣavajraparīkṣaṇādivarṇanaṃ nāmāṣṭaṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe ratnatadviśeṣavajraparīkṣaṇādivarṇanam nāma aṣṭaṣaṣṭitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
sūtaḥ uvāca
dvipa indra jīmūta varāha śaṅkha matsya ahi śukti udbhava veṇu jāni

original: muktāphalāni prathitāni loke teṣāṃ ca śuktyudbhavameva bhūri // GarP_1,69.1 //
analyzed: muktāphalāni prathitāni loke teṣām ca śukti udbhavam eva bhūri

original: tatraiva caikasya hi mūlamātra niviśyate ratnapadasya jātu /
analyzed: tatra eva ca ekasya hi niviśyate ratna padasya jātu

original: vedhyaṃ tu śuktayudbhavameva teṣāṃ śeṣāṇyavedhyāni vadanti tajjñāḥ // GarP_1,69.2 //
analyzed: vedhyam tu śuktayudbhavam eva teṣām śeṣāṇi avedhyāni vadanti tad jñāḥ
tvaksāra nāga indra timi prasūtam yat śaṅkha jam yat ca varā

original: prāyo vimuktāni bhavanti bhāsā śastāni māṅgalyatayā tathāpi // GarP_1,69.3 //
analyzed: prāyas vimuktāni bhavanti bhāsā śastāni māṅgalya tayā tathā api
yāḥ mauktikānām iha jātaye ṣṭau prakīrtitāḥ ratna viniścaya jñaiḥ

original: kambūdbhavaṃ teṣvadhamaṃ pradiṣṭamutpadyate yacca gajendrakumbhāt // GarP_1,69.4 //
analyzed: kambu udbhavam teṣu adhamam pradiṣṭam utpadyate yat ca gaja indra kumbhāt
sva yoni madya chavi tulya varṇam śāṅkham bṛhat lola phala pramāṇam
utpadyate vāraṇa kumbha madhyāt āpīta varṇam prabhayā vihīnam
ye kambavaḥ śārṅga mukha avamarśa pītasya śaṅkha pravarasya gotre

original: mataṅgajāścāpi viśuddhavaṃśyāste mauktikānāṃ prabhavāḥ pradiṣṭāḥ // GarP_1,69.6 //
analyzed: mataṅga jāḥ ca api viśuddha vaṃśyāḥ te mauktikānām prabhavāḥ pradiṣṭāḥ
utpadyate mauktikam eṣu vṛttam āpīta varṇam prabhayā vihīnam

original: pāṭhīnapṛṣṭhasya samānavarṇaṃ mīnātsuvṛttaṃ laghu cātisūkṣmam // GarP_1,69.7 //
analyzed: pāṭhīna pṛṣṭhasya samāna varṇam mīnāt su vṛttam laghu ca ati sūkṣmam

original: utpadyate vāricarānaneṣu matsyāśce te madhyacarāḥ payodheḥ /
analyzed: utpadyate vāricara ānaneṣu matsyāḥ ce te madhya carāḥ payodheḥ
varāha daṃṣṭrā prabhavam pradiṣṭam tasya eva daṃṣṭra aṅkura tulya varṇam
kracid kathañcid sa bhuvaḥ pradeśe prajāyate sūkara rāj viśiṣṭaḥ
varṣopalānām sama varṇa śobham tvaksāra parva prabhavam pradiṣṭam

original: te veṇavo divyajanopabhogye sthāne prarohanti na sārvajanye /
analyzed: te veṇavaḥ divya jana upabhogye sthāne prarohanti na sārvajanye
bhaujam mīna viśuddha vṛttam
nitānta dhauta pravikalpamāna nistriṃśa dhārā sama varṇa kānti

original: prāpyātiratnāni mahāprabhāṇi rājyaṃ śriyaṃ vā mahatīṃ durāpām // GarP_1,69.11 //
analyzed: prāpya ati ratnāni mahā prabhāṇi rājyam śriyam vā mahatīm durāpām
tejaḥ nvitāḥ puṇya kṛtaḥ bhavanti muktāphalasya ahi śiraḥ bhavasya

original: jijñāsayā ratnadhanaṃ vidhijñaiḥ śubhemuhūrte prayataiḥ prayatnāt // GarP_1,69.12 //
analyzed: jijñāsayā ratna dhanam vidhi jñaiḥ śubhe muhūrte prayataiḥ prayatnāt

original: rakṣāvidhānaṃ sumahadvidhāya harmyopariṣṭhaṃ kriyate yadā tat /
analyzed: rakṣā vidhānam su mahat vidhāya harmya upariṣṭham kriyate yadā tat
tadā mahā dundubhi mandra ghoṣaiḥ vidyut latā visphurita antarālaiḥ
payodhara ākrānti vilambi namraiḥ ghanaiḥ navaiḥ āvriyate ntarikṣam

original: na taṃ bhujaṅgā na tu yātudhānā na vyādhayo nāpyupasargadoṣāḥ // GarP_1,69.14 //
analyzed: na tam bhujaṅgāḥ na tu yātudhānāḥ na vyādhayaḥ na api upasarga doṣāḥ

original: hiṃsanti yasyāhiśiraḥ samutthaṃ muktāphalaṃ tiṣṭhati kośamadhye /
analyzed: hiṃsanti yasya ahi śiraḥ samuttham muktāphalam tiṣṭhati kośa madhye

original: nābhyeti meghaprabhavaṃ dharitrīṃ vipradgataṃ tadvibudhā haranti // GarP_1,69.15 //
analyzed: na abhyeti megha prabhavam dharitrīm tat vibudhāḥ haranti
arciḥ prabhā anāvṛta diś vibhāgam āditya vahuḥ kha vibhāvya bimbam
tejaḥ tiraskṛtya hutāśana indu nakṣatra tārā prabhavam samagram

original: divā yathā dīrptiṅkaraṃ tathaiva tamo 'vagāḍhāsvapi tanniśāsu /
analyzed: divā yathā dīrptiṅkaram tathā eva tamaḥ vagāḍhāsu api tat niśāsu
vicitra ratna dyuti cāru toyā catuḥ samudra ābharaṇa upapannā

original: mūlyaṃ na vā syāditi niścayo me kṛtsnā mahī tasya muvarṇapūrṇā /
analyzed: mūlyam na vā syāt iti niścayaḥ me kṛtsnā mahī tasya
piyaḥ tat labhate kadācid vipāka yogāt mahataḥ śubhasya

original: sāpatnyahīnāṃ sa mahīṃ samagrāṃ bhunakti tattiṣṭhati yāvadeva /
analyzed: sāpatnya hīnām sa mahīm samagrām bhunakti tat tiṣṭhati yāvat eva

original: na kevalaṃ tacchubhakṛnnṛpasya bhāgyaiḥ prajānāmapi tasya janma // GarP_1,69.19 //
analyzed: na kevalam tat śubha kṛt nṛpasya bhāgyaiḥ prajānām api tasya janma
tat yojanānām paritas sahasram sarvān anarthān vimukhī karoti

original: nakṣatramāleva divo viśīrṇā dantāvalistasya mahāmurasya // GarP_1,69.20 //
analyzed: nakṣatra mālā iva divaḥ viśīrṇā danta āvaliḥ tasya mahā murasya

original: vicitravarṇeṣu viśuddhavarṇā payaḥ su patyuḥ payasāṃ papāta /
analyzed: vicitra varṇeṣu viśuddha varṇā payaḥ su patyuḥ payasām papāta
sampūrṇa candra aṃśu kalāpa kānteḥ māṇipravekasya mahā guṇasya
tat śuktimatsu sthitim āpa bījam āsan purā api anya bhavāni yāni
yasmin pradeśe mbunidhau papāta su cāru muktāmaṇi ratna bījam
tasmin payaḥ toyadhara avakīrṇam śuktau sthitam mauktika tām avāpa
saiṃhalika pāralaukika saurāṣṭrika tāmraparṇa pāraśavāḥ
kauvera pāṇḍya hāṭaka hemakam iti ākarāḥ tu aṣṭau
śuktyudbhavam na ati nikṛṣṭa varṇam pramāṇa saṃsthāna guṇa prabhābhiḥ
utpadyate vardhana pārasīka pātāla loka antara siṃhaleṣu

original: cintyā na tasyākarajā viśeṣā rūpe pramāṇe ca yateta vidvān /
analyzed: cintyāḥ na tasya ākara jāḥ viśeṣāḥ rūpe pramāṇe ca yateta vidvān

original: na ca vyavasthāsti guṇāguṇeṣu sarvatra sarvākṛtayo bhavanti // GarP_1,69.25 //
analyzed: na ca vyavasthā asti guṇa aguṇeṣu sarvatra sarva ākṛtayaḥ bhavanti
etasya śuktiprabhasya muktāphalasya ca anyena samunmitasya

original: mūlyaṃ sahasrāṇi tu rūpakāṇāṃ tribhiḥ śatairapyādhikāni pañca // GarP_1,69.26 //
analyzed: mūlyam sahasrāṇi tu rūpakāṇām tribhiḥ śataiḥ api ādhikāni pañca
yat māṣaka ardhena tatas vihīnam tat pañca bhāga dvaya hīna mūlyam

original: yanmāṣakāṃstrīnbibhṛyātsahasre dve tasya mūlyaṃ paramaṃ pradiṣṭam // GarP_1,69.27 //
analyzed: yat māṣakān trīn bibhṛyāt sahasre dve tasya mūlyam paramam pradiṣṭam

original: ardhādhikau dvau vahato 'sya mūlyaṃ tribhiḥ śatairapyadhikaṃ sahasram /
analyzed: ardha adhikau dvau sya mūlyam tribhiḥ śataiḥ api adhikam sahasram

original: dvimāṣa konmānitagauravasya śatāni cāṣṭau kathitāni mūlyam // GarP_1,69.28 //
analyzed: dvi māṣa ka unmānita gauravasya śatāni ca aṣṭau kathitāni mūlyam

original: ardhādhikaṃ māṣakamunmitasya samaṃ ca viṃśatritayaṃ śatānām /
analyzed: ardha adhikam māṣakam unmitasya samam ca viṃśa tritayam śatānām

original: guñjāśca ṣaḍ dhārayataḥ śate dve mūlyaṃ paraṃ tasya vadanti tajjñāḥ /
analyzed: guñjāḥ ca ṣaḍ dhārayataḥ śate dve mūlyam param tasya vadanti tad jñāḥ
adhyardham unmānapa

original: kṛtaṃ śataṃ syānmūlyaṃ guṇaistasya samanvitasya // GarP_1,69.29 //
analyzed: kṛtam śatam syāt mūlyam guṇaiḥ tasya samanvitasya
yadi ṣoḍaśabhiḥ bhavet anūnandharaṇam tat pravadanti dārvikākhyam

original: adhikaṃ daśabhiḥ śataṃ ca mūlyaṃ samavāpnotyapi bāliśasya hastāt // GarP_1,69.30 //
analyzed: adhikam daśabhiḥ śatam ca mūlyam samavāpnoti api bāliśasya hastāt
dviguṇaiḥ daśabhiḥ bhavet anūnam dharaṇam tad bhavakam vadanti tad jñāḥ

original: navasaptatimāpnuyātsvamūlyaṃ yadi na syādguṇasampadā vihīnam // GarP_1,69.31 //
analyzed: nava saptatim āpnuyāt sva mūlyam yadi na syāt guṇa sampadā vihīnam

original: triṃśatā dharaṇaṃ pūrṇaṃ śikyaṃ tasyeti kīrtyate /
analyzed: triṃśatā dharaṇam pūrṇam śikyam tasya iti kīrtyate
catvāriṃśat bhavet tasyāḥ param mūlyam viniścayaḥ
bhavet tasyāḥ triṃśat mūlyam labhet sā

original: pañcāśattu bhavetsomastasya mūlyaṃ tu viṃśatiḥ // GarP_1,69.33 //
analyzed: pañcāśat tu bhavet somaḥ tasya mūlyam tu viṃśatiḥ
ṣaṣṭiḥ nikara śīrṣam syāt tasyāḥ mūlyam caturdaśa
aśītiḥ navatiḥ ca eva kūpyā iti parikīrtitā
ekādaśa syāt nava ca tayoḥ mūlyam anukramāt
ādāya tat sakalam eva tatas nna bhāṇḍam jambīra jāta rasa yojanayā vipakram

original: ghṛṣṭaṃ tato mṛdutanūkṛtapiṇḍamūlaiḥ kuryādyatheṣṭamanu mauktikamāśu viddham // GarP_1,69.35 //
analyzed: ghṛṣṭam tatas mṛdu tanūkṛta piṇḍa mūlaiḥ kuryāt yatheṣṭam anu mauktikam āśu viddham

original: mṛlliptamatsyapuṭamadhyagataṃ tu kṛtvā paścātpacettanu tataśca biḍālapuṭyā /
analyzed: mṛd lipta matsya puṭa madhya gatam tu kṛtvā paścāt pacet tanu tatas ca biḍāla puṭyā

original: dugdhe tataḥ payasi taṃ vipacetsudhāyāṃ pakraṃ tato 'pi payasā śucicikraṇena // GarP_1,69.36 //
analyzed: dugdhe tatas payasi tam vipacet sudhāyām pakram payasā
śuddham tatas vimala vastra nigharṣaṇena syāt mauktikam vipula sat guṇa kānti yuktam

original: vyāḍirjagāda jagatāṃ hi mahāprabhāvaḥ siddho vidagdhahitatatparayā dayāluḥ // GarP_1,69.37 //
analyzed: vyāḍiḥ jagāda jagatām hi mahā prabhāvaḥ siddhaḥ vidagdha hita tad parayā dayāluḥ
śvetakāca samam tāram hema aṃśa śata yojitam
rasa madhye pradhāryeta mauktikam deha bhūṣaṇam

original: evaṃ hi siṃhale deśe kurvanti kuśalā janāḥ /
analyzed: evam hi siṃhale deśe kurvanti kuśalāḥ janāḥ
yasmin kṛtraima sandehaḥ kracid bhavati mauktike
uṣṇe sa lavaṇe snehe niśām tat vāsayet jale
vrīhibhiḥ mardanīyam vā śuṣka vastra upaveṣṭitam
yat tu na āyāti vaivarṇyam vijñeyam tat akṛtrimam

original: sitaṃ pramāṇavatsnigdhaṃ guru svacchaṃ sunirmalam // GarP_1,69.41 //
analyzed: sitam pramāṇavat snigdham guru su accham su nirmalam

original: tejo 'dhikaṃ suvṛttaṃ ca mauktikaṃ guṇavatsmṛtam // GarP_1,69.42 //
analyzed: tejaḥ dhikam su vṛttam ca mauktikam guṇavat smṛtam
pramāṇavat gaurava raśmi yuktam sitam su vṛttam sama sūkṣma vedham
akretuḥ api āvahati pramodam yat mauktikam tat guṇavat pradiṣṭam

original: evaṃ samastena guṇodayena yanmauktikaṃ yogamupāgataṃ syāt /
analyzed: evam samastena guṇa udayena yat mauktikam yogam upāgatam syāt

original: na tasya bhartāramanarthajāta eko 'pi kaścit samupaiti doṣaḥ // GarP_1,69.44 //
analyzed: na tasya bhartāram anartha jātaḥ ekaḥ u pi kaścid samupaiti doṣaḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe muktāphalapramāṇādivarṇanaṃ nāma muktāphalaparīkṣā nāmaikonasaptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe muktāphalapramāṇādivarṇanam nāma muktāphala parīkṣā nāma ekonasaptatitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
sūtaḥ uvāca
divākaraḥ tasya mahā mahimnaḥ mahā asurasya uttama ratna bījam

original: asṛggṛhītvā carituṃ pratasthe nistriṃśanīlena nabhaḥ sthalena // GarP_1,70.1 //
analyzed: asṛj gṛhītvā caritum pratasthe nistriṃśa nīlena nabhaḥ sthalena
jettrā surāṇām samareṣu ajastram vīrya avalepa uddhata mānasena

original: laṅkādhipenārdhapathe sametya svarbhānuneva prasabhaṃ niruddhaḥ // GarP_1,70.2 //
analyzed: laṅkā adhipena ardha pathe sametya svarbhānunā iva prasabham niruddhaḥ
tad siṃhalī cāru nitamba bimba vikṣaḥ
pūga druma ābaddha taṭa dvayāyām mumoca sūryaḥ sarit uttamāyām
tatas prabhṛti sā gaṅgā tulya puṇya phala udayā
nāmnā rāvaṇagaṅgā iti prathimānam upāgatā

original: tataḥ prabhṛtyeva ca śarvarīṣu kūlāni ratnairnicitāni tasyāḥ /
analyzed: tatas prabhṛti eva ca śarvarīṣu kūlāni ratnaiḥ nicitāni tasyāḥ
suvarṇa nārāca śataiḥ iva antar bahis pradīptaiḥ niśitāni bhānti
tasyāḥ taṭeṣu ujjva cāru rāgāḥ bhavanti toyeṣu ca padmarāgāḥ
saugandhika utthāḥ kuruvinda jāḥ ca mahā guṇāḥ sphāṭika saṃprasūtāḥ
bandhū ka guñjā sakala indragopa ja vā sama asṛj sama varṇa śobhāḥ
bhrājiṣṇavaḥ dāḍima bīja varṇāḥ tathā apare kiśuka puṣpa bhāsaḥ
lākṣā rasasya api samāna varṇaḥ

original: sāṃdre 'pi rāge prabhayā svayaiva bhānti svalakṣyāḥ sphuṭamadhyaśobhāḥ // GarP_1,70.8 //
analyzed: sāṃdre pi rāge prabhayā svayā eva bhānti sva lakṣyāḥ sphuṭa madhya śobhāḥ
bhānoḥ ca bhāsām anuvedha yogām āsādya raśami prakareṇa dūram
pārśvāni sarvāṇi anurañjayanti guṇa apapannāḥ sphaṭika prasūtāḥ
kusuṃbha nīla vyatimiśra rāga pratyugra raktā buja tulya bhāsaḥ
tathā apare ruṣkara kaṇṭakāri puṣpa tviṣaḥ hiṅgula vat tviṣaḥ nye
cakora puṃskokila sārasānām netra avabhāsaḥ ca bhavanti kecid

original: anye punaḥ santi ca puṣpitānāṃ tulyatviṣā kokanadottamānām // GarP_1,70.11 //
analyzed: anye punar santi ca puṣpitānām tulya tviṣā kokanada uttamānām
prabhāva kāṭhinya guru tva yogaiḥ prāyas samānāḥ sphaṭika udbhavānām
ānīla rakta utpala cāru bhāsaḥ saugandhika utthāḥ maṇayaḥ bhavanti

original: kāmaṃ tu rāgaḥ kuruvindajeṣu sa naiva yādṛk sphaṭikodbhaveṣu /
analyzed: kāmam tu rāgaḥ kuruvinda jeṣu sa nā eva yādṛś sphaṭika udbhaveṣu

original: nirarciṣo 'ntarbahulā bhavanti prabhāvavanto 'pi nataiḥ samastaiḥ // GarP_1,70.13 //
analyzed: nirarciṣaḥ ntar bahulāḥ bhavanti nataiḥ samastaiḥ
ye tu rāvaṇagaṅgāyām jāyante kuruvindakāḥ
padmarāga ghanam rāgam bibhrāṇāḥ sphaṭika arciṣaḥ
varṇa anuyāyinaḥ teṣā māndhra deśe tathā pare

original: na jāyante hi ye kecinmūlyaleśamavāpnuyuḥ // GarP_1,70.15 //
analyzed: na jāyante hi ye kecid mūlya leśam avāpnuyuḥ
tathā eva sphāṭika utthānām deśe tumburu saṃjñake

original: sadharmāṇaḥ prajāyante svalpamūlyā hi te smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,70.16 //
analyzed: sadharmāṇaḥ prajāyante su alpa mūlyāḥ hi te smṛtāḥ
varṇa ādhikyam guru tvam ca snigdha tā sama tā accha tā

original: arciṣmattā mahattā ca maṇīnāṃ guṇasaṃgrahaḥ // GarP_1,70.17 //
analyzed: arciṣmat tā mahat tā ca maṇīnām guṇa saṃgrahaḥ
ye karkara chidra mala upadigdhāḥ prabhā vimuktāḥ paruṣāḥ vivarṇāḥ

original: na te praśastā maṇayo bhavanti samānato jātiguṇaiḥ samastaiḥ // GarP_1,70.18 //
analyzed: na te praśastāḥ maṇayaḥ bhavanti samānatas jāti guṇaiḥ samastaiḥ
doṣa upasṛṣṭam maṇim aprabodhāt vibharti yaḥ kaścana kañcid eva
tam śoka cintā āmaya mṛtyu vitta nāśa ādayaḥ doṣa gaṇāḥ bhajante
kāmam cārutarāḥ pañca pratirūpakāḥ
vijā tayaḥ prayatnena vidvān tan upalakṣayet
kalaśapura udbhava siṃhala tumburu deśa uttha muktapāṇīyāḥ
śrīpūrṇakāḥ ca sadṛśāḥ vijātayaḥ padmarāgāṇām
tuṣa upasargāt kalaśa abhidhānam ātāmra bhāvāt api tumburu uttham

original: kārṣṇyāttathā siṃhaladeśajātaṃ muktābhidhānaṃ nabhasaḥ svabhāvāt // GarP_1,70.22 //
analyzed: kārṣṇyāt tathā siṃhala deśa jātam muktā abhidhānam nabhasaḥ svabhāvāt
śrīpūrṇakam dīpti vinā kṛta tvāt vijāti liṅga āśrayaḥ eva bhedaḥ

original: yastāmrikāṃ puṣyati padmarāgo yogāttuṣāṇāmiva pūrṇamadhyaḥ // GarP_1,70.23 //
analyzed: yaḥ tāmrikām puṣyati padmarāgaḥ yogāt tuṣāṇām iva pūrṇa madhyaḥ

original: strehapradigdhaḥ pratibhāti yaśca yo vā praghṛṣṭaḥ prajahāti dīptim /
analyzed: streha pradigdhaḥ pratibhāti yaḥ ca yaḥ vā praghṛṣṭaḥ prajahāti dīptim

original: ākrāntamūrdhā ca tathāṅgulibhyāṃ yaḥ kālikāṃ pārśvagatāṃ bibharti // GarP_1,70.24 //
analyzed: ākrānta mūrdhā ca tathā aṅgulibhyām yaḥ kālikām pārśva gatām bibharti
saṃprāpya ca utkṣipya yathā anuvṛttim vibharti yaḥ sarva guṇān atīva

original: tulyapramāṇasya ca tulyajāteryo vā gurutvena bhavettu tulyaḥ /
analyzed: tulya pramāṇasya ca tulya jāteḥ yaḥ vā guru tvena bhavet tu tulyaḥ

original: prāpyāpi ratnākarajā svajātiṃ lakṣedgurutvena guṇena vidvān // GarP_1,70.25 //
analyzed: prāpya api ratna ākara jā sva jātim
apraṇaśyati sandehe śāṇe tu parilekhayet
jātaka samutthena likhitvā api parasparam

original: vajraṃ vā kuruvindaṃ vā vimucyānena kenacit /
analyzed: vajram vā kuruvindam vā vimucya anena kenacid
na aśakyam lekhanam kartum padmarāga indranīlayoḥ

original: jātyasya sarve 'pi maṇerna jātu vijātayaḥ santi samānavarṇāḥ /
analyzed: jātyasya sarve pi maṇeḥ na jātu vijātayaḥ santi samāna varṇāḥ

original: tathāpi nānākaraṇārthameva bhedaprakāraḥ paramaḥ pradiṣṭaḥ // GarP_1,70.28 //
analyzed: tathā api nānā karaṇa artham eva bheda prakāraḥ paramaḥ pradiṣṭaḥ

original: guṇopapannena sahāvabaddhomeṇirna dhāryo viguṇo hi jātyā /
analyzed: guṇa upapannena saha avabaddhaḥ meṇiḥ na dhāryaḥ viguṇaḥ hi jātyā

original: na kaustubhenāpi sahāvabaddhaṃ vidvānvijātiṃ bibhṛyātkadācit // GarP_1,70.29 //
analyzed: na kaustubhena api saha avabaddham vidvān vijātim bibhṛyāt kadācid

original: cāṇḍāla eko 'pi yathā dvijātīnsametya bhūrīnapi hantyayatnāt /
analyzed: cāṇḍālaḥ ekaḥ pi yathā dvijātīn sametya bhūrīn api hanti ayatnāt
atho maṇīn bhūri guṇa upapannān śakroti viplāvayitum vijātyaḥ
sapatna madhye kṛta adhivāsam pramāda vṛttau api vartamānam

original: na padmarāgasya mahāguṇasya bhartāramāpatspṛśatīha kācit // GarP_1,70.31 //
analyzed: na padmarāgasya mahā guṇasya bhartāram āpad spṛśati iha kācid
doṣa upasarga prabhavāḥ ca ye te na upadravāḥ tam samabhidravanti

original: guṇaiḥ samuttejitacārurāgaṃ yaḥ padmarāgaṃ prayato bibharti // GarP_1,70.32 //
analyzed: guṇaiḥ samuttejita cāru rāgam yaḥ padmarāgam prayataḥ bibharti
vajrasya yat taṇḍula saṃkhyayā uktam mūlyam samutpādita gauravasya
tat padmarāgasya mahā guṇasya tat māṣa kalpa ākalitasya mūlyam
varṇa dāpti apapannam hi maṇi ratnam praśasyate
tābhyām īṣat api bhraṣṭam maṇi mūlyāt prahīyate

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe padmarāgaparīkṣaṇaṃ nāma saptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe padmarāgaparīkṣaṇam nāma saptatitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
sūtaḥ uvāca
dānava adhipateḥ pittam ādāya bhujaga adhipaḥ

original: dvidhā kurvanniva vyoma satvaraṃ vāsukiryayau // GarP_1,71.1 //
analyzed: dvidhā kurvan iva vyoma sa tvaram vāsukiḥ yayau
sa tadā sva śiraḥ ratna prabhā dīpte nabhaḥ mbudhau
rājataḥ sa mahān ekaḥ khaṇḍa setuḥ iva ābabhau
tatas pakṣa nipātena saṃharan iva rodasī
garutmān pannaga indrasya prahartum upacakrame
sahasā eva mumoca tat phaṇi indraḥ surasa abhyakta turuṣka raṣka pādapāyām
kalikā ghana gandha vāsitā yām vara māṇikya gireḥ upatyakāyām
tasya prapāta samanantara kālam eva tadvat vara ālayam atītya ramā samīpe
sthānam kṣiteḥ upa payonidhi tīra lekhaṃyām vara māṇikya gireḥ upatyakāyām

original: tatraiva kiñcitpatatastu pittādupetya jagrāha tato garutmān /
analyzed: tatra eva kiñcid patataḥ tu pittāt upetya jagrāha tatas garutmān

original: mūrchāparītaḥ sahasaiva ghoṇārandhradvayena pramumoca sarvam // GarP_1,71.6 //
analyzed: mūrchā parītaḥ sahasā eva ghoṇā randhra dvayena pramumoca sarvam
tatra ā kaṭhora śuka kaṇṭha śirīṣa puṣpa khadyota pṛṣṭha cara śādvala śaivalānām

original: kalhāraśaṣpakabhujaṅgabhujāñca patraprāptatviṣo marakatāḥ śubhadā bhavanti // GarP_1,71.7 //
analyzed: kalhāra śaṣpaka bhujaṅga bhujān ca patra prāpta tviṣaḥ marakatāḥ śubha dāḥ bhavanti
tat yatra bhogi indra bhuja abhiyuktam papāta pittam ditija adhipasya

original: tasyākarasyātitarāṃ sa deśo duḥ khopalabhyaśca guṇaiśca yuktaḥ // GarP_1,71.8 //
analyzed: tasya ākarasya atitarām sa deśaḥ duḥ kha upalabhyaḥ ca guṇaiḥ ca yuktaḥ
tasmin marakata sthāne yat kiñcid upajāyate
tat sarvam viṣa rogāṇām praśamāya prakīrtyate
sarva mantrau ṣadhi gaṇaiḥ yat na śakyam cikitsitum
mahā ahi daṃṣṭrā prabhavam viṣam tat tena śāmyati
anyat api ākare tatra yat doṣaiḥ upavarjitam
jāyate tat pavitrāṇām uttamam parikīrtitam
atyanta harita varṇam komalam arciḥ vibheda jaṭilam ca
kāñcana cūrṇasya antar pūrṇam iva lakṣyate yat ca

original: yuktaṃ saṃsthānaguṇaiḥ samarāgaṃ gauraveṇa na vihīnam /
analyzed: yuktam saṃsthāna guṇaiḥ sama rāgam gauraveṇa na vihīnam
savituḥ kara saṃsparśāt churayati sarva āśramam dīptyā
hitvā ca harita bhāvam yasya antar vinihitā bhavet dīptiḥ
aciraprabhā prabhā hata nava śādvala sannibhā bhāti
yat ca manasaḥ prasādam vidadhāti nirīkṣyam atimātram
nat marakatam mahā gaṇam iti ratna vidām manaḥ vṛttiḥ
varṇasya ati vibhu tvāt yasya antar su accha kiraṇa paridhānam
sāndra snigdha viśuddham komala barhi prabhā ādi sama kānti
varṇa ujjvalayā kāntyā sāndra ākāraḥ vibhāsayā bhāti

original: tadapi guṇavatsaṃjñāmāpnoti hi yādṛśī pūrvam // GarP_1,71.17 //
analyzed: tat api guṇavat saṃjñām āpnoti hi yādṛśī pūrvam
śabala kaṭhora malinam rūkṣam pāṣāṇa karkara upetam
digdham śilājatunā marakatam evaṃvidham viguṇam
yat sandhi śoṣitam ratnam anyat marakatāt bhavet

original: śreyaskāmairna taddhāryaṃ kretavyaṃ vā katañcana // GarP_1,71.19 //
analyzed: śreyaskāmaiḥ na tat dhāryam kretavyam vā katañcana
bhallātakī putrikā ca tad varṇa sama yogataḥ
maṇeḥ marakatasya ete lakṣaṇīyāḥ vijātayaḥ

original: kṣaumeṇa vāsasā mṛṣṭā dīptiṃ tyajati putrikā /
analyzed: kṣaumeṇa vāsasā mṛṣṭā dīptim tyajati putrikā

original: lāghavenaiva kācasya śakyā kartuṃ vibhāvanā // GarP_1,71.21 //
analyzed: lāghavena eva kācasya śakyā kartum vibhāvanā
kasyacid aneka rūpaiḥ marakatam anugacchataḥ guṇa varṇaiḥ
bhallātakasya svanāt tu vaiṣamyam upaiti varṇasya

original: vajrāṇi muktāḥ santyanye ye ca keciddvijātayaḥ /
analyzed: vajrāṇi muktāḥ santi anye ye ca kecid dvijātayaḥ
teṣām na apratibaddhānām bhās bhavati ūrdhva gāminī
ṛju tvāt ca eva keṣāñcid kathañcid upajāyate
tiryak ālocya mānānām sadyas ca eva praṇaśyati
snāna ācamana japyeṣu rakṣā mantra kriyā vidhau
dadadbhiḥ go hiraṇyāni kurvadbhiḥ sādhanāni ca
daiva pitrya ātitheyeṣu guru saṃpūjaneṣu ca
bādhyamāneṣu vividhaiḥ deṣa jātaiḥ viṣa udbhavaiḥ
guṇaiḥ yuktam kāñcana pratiyojitam

original: saṃgrāme vicaradbhiśca dhāryaṃ marakataṃ budhaiḥ // GarP_1,71.27 //
analyzed: saṃgrāme vicaradbhiḥ ca dhāryam marakatam budhaiḥ
tulayā padmarāgasya yat mūlyam upajāyate
labhate bhyadhikam tasmāt guṇaiḥ marakatam yutam
tathā ca padmarāgāṇām doṣaiḥ mūlyam prahīyate
hāniḥ deṣaiḥ marakate bhavet

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe purvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍa marakataparīkṣaṇaṃ nāmaikasaptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe purva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍa marakataparīkṣaṇam nāma ekasaptatitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
sūtaḥ uvāca
tatra eva

original: deśe papāta ditijasya nitāntakāntaṃ protphullanīrajasamadyuti netrayugmam // GarP_1,72.1 //
analyzed: deśe papāta ditijasya nitānta kāntam protphulla nīraja sama dyuti netra yugmam
tad pratyayāt ubhaya śobhana vīci bhāsā vistāriṇī jalanidheḥ upa kaccha bhūmiḥ
prodbhinna ketaka vana pratibaddha lekhā sāndra indranīla maṇi ratnavatī vibhāti
tatra asita abja halabhṛt vasana asi bhṛṅga śārṅga āyudha aṅga hara kaṇṭha kaṣāya puṣpaiḥ
śuṣka itaraiḥ ca kusumaiḥ girikarṇikāyāḥ tasmāt bhavanti maṇayaḥ sadṛśa avabhāsaḥ
anye prasanna payasaḥ payasām nidhātuḥ ambu tviṣaḥ śikhi gaṇa pratimāḥ tathā anye
nīlī rasa prabhava budvuda bhāḥ ca kecid kecid tathā sa mada kokila kaṇṭha bhāsaḥ
eka prakārāḥ vispaṣṭa varṇa śobhā avabhāsinaḥ
jāyante maṇayaḥ tasmin indranīlāḥ mahā guṇāḥ
abhrikā paṭala chāyā varṇa doṣaiḥ ca dūṣitāḥ

original: tata eva hi jāyante maṇayastatra bhūrayaḥ /
analyzed: tatas eva hi jāyante maṇayaḥ tatra bhūrayaḥ
sa astra sambodhita dhiyaḥ tān praśaṃsanti sūrayaḥ
dhāryamāṇasya ye dṛṣṭā padmarāga maṇeḥ guṇāḥ
dhāraṇāt indranīlasya tān eva āpnoti mānavaḥ
yathā ca padmarāgāṇām jātaka tritayam bhavet
indra nīleṣu api tathā draṣṭavyam aviśeṣatas
parīkṣā pratyayaiḥ yaiḥ ca padmarāgaḥ parīkṣyate

original: ta eva pratyayā dṛṣṭā indranīlamaṇerapi // GarP_1,72.10 //
analyzed: te eva pratyayāḥ dṛṣṭāḥ indranīla maṇeḥ api
yāvantam ca kramet agnim padmarāga upayogataḥ
indranīla maṇiḥ tasmāt krameta su mahattaram
tathā api na parīkṣā artham guṇānām abhi vṛddhaye
maṇiḥ agnau samādheyaḥ kathañcid api kaścana
agni mātrā parijñāne dāha doṣaiḥ ca dūpitaḥ
saḥ narthāya bhavet bhartuḥ kartuḥ kārayituḥ tathā
kāca utpala karavīra sphaṭika ādyāḥ iha budhaiḥ sa vaidūryāḥ

original: kathitā vijātaya ime sadṛśā maṇinendranīlena // GarP_1,72.14 //
analyzed: kathitāḥ vijātayaḥ ime sadṛśāḥ maṇinā indranīlena
guru bhāva kaṭhina bhāvau eteṣām nityam eva vijñeyau
kācāt yathāvat uttara vivardhamānau viśeṣeṇa
indranīlaḥ yathā kaścid vibharti ātāmra varṇa tām
tathā tāmrau karavīra utpalau ubhau
yasya madhya gatā bhāti nīlasya indrāyudha prabhā
tam indranīlam iti āhuḥ mahārham bhuvi durlabham
yasya varṇasya bhūyaḥ tvāt kṣīre śataguṇe sthitaḥ

original: nīlatāṃ tannayetsarvaṃ mahānīlaḥ sa ucyate // GarP_1,72.18 //
analyzed: nīla tām tat nayet sarvam mahānīlaḥ saḥ ucyate
yat padmarāgasya mahā guṇasya mūlyam bhavet māṣa samunmitasya

original: tadindranīlasya mahāguṇasya suvarṇa saṃkhyātu litasya mūlyam // GarP_1,72.19 //
analyzed: tat indranīlasya mahā guṇasya suvarṇa saṃkhyā tu litasya mūlyam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe indranīlaparīkṣaṇaṃ nāma dvisaptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe indranīlaparīkṣaṇam nāma dvisaptatitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
sūtaḥ uvāca
vaidūrya puṣparāgāṇām karkete bhīṣmake vade

original: parīkṣāṃ brahmaṇā proktāṃ vyāsena kathitāṃ dvijā // GarP_1,73.1 //
analyzed: parīkṣām brahmaṇā proktām vyāsena kathitām dvijāḥ
kalpa anta kāla kṣubita amburāśeḥ nirhrāda kalpāt ditijasya nādāt
vaidūryam utpannam aneka varṇam śobha abhirāma dyuti varṇa bījam
avidūre vidūrasya gireḥ uttuṅga rodhasaḥ
kāma bhūtika sīmānam anu tasya akaraḥ bhavat
tasya nāda samuttha tvāt ākaraḥ su mahā guṇaḥ
abhūt uttarītaḥ loke loka traya vibhūṣaṇaḥ
tasya eva dānava pateḥ ninada anurūpāḥ pravṛṣ payoda vara darśita cāru rūpāḥ
vaidūrya ratna maṇayaḥ vividha avabhāsaḥ tasmāt sphuliṅga nivahāḥ iva saṃbabhūvuḥ
padmarāgam upādāya maṇi varṇāḥ hi ye kṣitau
sarvān tān varṇa śobhābhiḥ vaidūryam anugacchati
teṣām pradhānam śikhikaṇṭha nīlam yat vā bhavet veṇu dala prakāśam

original: cāṣāgrapakṣapratimaśriyo ye na te praśastā maṇiśāstravidbhiḥ // GarP_1,73.7 //
analyzed: cāṣa agra pakṣa pratima śriyaḥ ye na te praśastāḥ maṇi śāstra vidbhiḥ
guṇavān vaidūrya maṇiḥ yojayati svāminam paraṃbhā bho gyaiḥ
doṣaiḥ yuktaḥ doṣaiḥ tasmāt yatnāt parīkṣeta
giri kāca śiśupālau kāca sphaṭikāḥ ca dhūma nirbhinnāḥ
vaidūrya maṇeḥ ete vijātayaḥ sannibhāḥ santi
likhya abhāvāt kācam laghu bhāvāt śaisupālakam vidyāt
giri kāca sa dīpti tvāt sphaṭikam varṇa ujjvala tvena
yat indranīlasya mahā guṇasya suvarṇa saṃkhyā kalitasya mūlyam

original: tadeva vaidūryamaṇeḥ pradiṣṭaṃ paladvayonmāpi tagauravasya // GarP_1,73.11 //
analyzed: tat eva vaidūrya maṇeḥ pradiṣṭam pala dvaya unmāpi ta gauravasya

original: jātyasya sarve 'pi maṇestu yādṛgvijātayaḥ santi samānavarṇāḥ /
analyzed: jātyasya sarve maṇeḥ tu yādṛś vijātayaḥ santi samāna varṇāḥ
tathā api nānā karaṇa anumeya bheda prakāraḥ paramaḥ pradiṣṭaḥ

original: sukhopalakṣyaśca sadā vicāryo hyayaṃ prabhedo viduṣā nareṇa /
analyzed: sukha upalakṣyaḥ ca sadā vicāryaḥ hi ayam prabhedaḥ viduṣā nareṇa

original: snehaprabhedo laghutā mṛdutvaṃ vijātiliṅgaṃ khalu sārvajanyam // GarP_1,73.13 //
analyzed: sneha prabhedaḥ laghu tā mṛdu tvam vijāti liṅgam khalu sārvajanyam
kuśala akuśalaiḥ prapūryamāṇāḥ pratibaddhāḥ prati satkriyā prayogaiḥ
guṇa doṣa samudbhavam labhante bhinnāḥ
kramaśas samatīta vartamānāḥ pratibaddhāḥ maṇibandhakena yatnāt

original: yadi nāma bhavanti doṣahīnā maṇayaḥ ṣaḍguṇamāpnuvanti mūlyam // GarP_1,73.15 //
analyzed: yadi nāma bhavanti doṣa hīnāḥ maṇayaḥ ṣaḍguṇam āpnuvanti mūlyam
ākarān samatītānām udadheḥ tīra sannidhau

original: mūlyametanmaṇīnāṃ tu na sarvatra mahītale // GarP_1,73.16 //
analyzed: mūlyam etat maṇīnām tu na sarvatra mahī tale
suvarṇaḥ manunā yaḥ tu proktaḥ ṣoḍaśa māṣakaḥ

original: tasya saptatimo bhāgaḥ saṃjñārūpaṃ kariṣyati // GarP_1,73.17 //
analyzed: tasya saptatimaḥ bhāgaḥ saṃjñā rūpam kariṣyati
śāṇaḥ catur māṣa mānaḥ māṣakaḥ pañca kṛṣṇalaḥ

original: palasya daśamo bhāgo dharaṇaḥ parikīrtitaḥ // GarP_1,73.18 //
analyzed: palasya daśamaḥ bhāgaḥ dharaṇaḥ parikīrtitaḥ

original: itthaṃ maṇividhiḥ prokto ratnānāṃ mūlyaniścaye // GarP_1,73.19 //
analyzed: ittham maṇi vidhiḥ proktaḥ ratnānām mūlya niścaye

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vaidūryaparīkṣaṇaṃ nāma trisaptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe vaidūryaparīkṣaṇam nāma trisaptatitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
sūtaḥ uvāca
patitāyāḥ himādrau tu tvacaḥ tasya suradviṣaḥ
prādurbhavanti tābhyaḥ tu
rāgāḥ mahā guṇāḥ
āpīta pāṇḍu ruciraḥ pāṣāṇaḥ padmarāga saṃjñaḥ tu

original: kaukaṇṭakanāmā syātsa eva yadi lohitāpītaḥ // GarP_1,74.2 //
analyzed: kaukaṇṭaka nāmā syāt saḥ eva yadi lohita āpītaḥ

original: ālohitastu pītaḥ svacchaḥ kāṣāyakaḥ sa ekoktaḥ /
analyzed: ālohitaḥ tu pītaḥ su acchaḥ kāṣāyakaḥ saḥ eka uktaḥ
ā nīla śukla varṇaḥ snigdhaḥ soma alana
kaḥ sa guṇaḥ

original: atyantalohito yaḥ sa eva khalu padmarāgasaṃjñaḥ syāt /
analyzed: atyanta lohitaḥ yaḥ saḥ eva khalu padmarāga saṃjñaḥ syāt

original: api cendranīlasaṃjñaḥ sa eva kathitaḥ sunīlaḥ san // GarP_1,74.4 //
analyzed: api ca indranīla saṃjñaḥ saḥ eva kathitaḥ su nīlaḥ san
mūlyam vaidūrya maṇeḥ iva gāditam hi asya ratna sāra vidā

original: dhāraṇaphalaṃ ca tadvatkiṃ tu strīṇāṃ sutaprado bhavati // GarP_1,74.5 //
analyzed: dhāraṇa phalam ca tadvat kim tu strīṇām suta pradaḥ bhavati

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe puṣparāgaparīkṣaṇaṃ nāma catuḥ saptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe puṣparāgaparīkṣaṇam nāma catuḥsaptatitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
sūtaḥ uvāca
vāyuḥ nakhān daitya pateḥ gṛhītvā cikṣepa sat padma vaneṣu hṛṣṭaḥ

original: tataḥ prasūtaṃ pavanopapannaṃ karketanaṃ pūjayatamaṃ pṛthivyām // GarP_1,75.1 //
analyzed: tatas prasūtam pavana upapannam karketanam pūjayatamam pṛthivyām
varṇena tat rudhira soma madhu prakāśam ātāmra pīta dahana ujjvalitam vibhāti

original: nīlaṃ punaḥ khalu sitaṃ paruṣaṃ vibhinnaṃ vyādhyādidoṣakaraṇena ca tadvibhāti // GarP_1,75.2 //
analyzed: nīlam punar khalu sitam paruṣam vibhinnam vyādhi ādi doṣa karaṇena ca tat vibhāti

original: snigdhā viśuddhāḥ samarāgiṇaśca āpītavarṇā guravo vicitrāḥ /
analyzed: snigdhāḥ viśuddhāḥ sama rāgiṇaḥ ca āpīta varṇāḥ guravaḥ vicitrāḥ
trāsa vraṇa vyāla vivarjitāḥ ca karketanāḥ te paramam pavitrāḥ

original: patreṇa kāñcanamayena tu veṣṭayitvā taptaṃ yadā hutavahe bhavati prakāśam /
analyzed: patreṇa kāñcana mayena tu veṣṭayitvā taptam yadā hutavahe bhavati prakāśam

original: rogapraṇāśanakaraṃ kalināśanaṃ tadāyuṣkaraṃ kulakaraṃ ca sukhapradaṃ ca // GarP_1,75.4 //
analyzed: roga praṇāśana karam kali nāśanam tat āyuṣkaram kula karam ca sukha pradam ca

original: evaṃvidhaṃ bahuguṇaṃ maṇimāvahanti karketanaṃ śubhalaṅkṛtaye narā ye /
analyzed: evaṃvidham bahu guṇam maṇim āvahanti karketanam śubha alaṅkṛtaye narāḥ ye

original: te pūjitā bahudhanā bahubāndhavāśca nityojjvalāḥ pramuditā apite bhavanti // GarP_1,75.5 //
analyzed: te pūjitāḥ bahu dhanāḥ bahu bāndhavāḥ ca nitya ujjvalāḥ pramuditāḥ api te bhavanti
eke panahya vikṛta ākula nīla bhāsaḥ pramlāna rāga lulitāḥ kaluṣāḥ virūpāḥ

original: tejo 'tidīpti kulapuṣṭivihīnavarṇāḥ karketanasya sadṛśaṃ vapurudvahanti // GarP_1,75.6 //
analyzed: kula puṣṭi vihīna varṇāḥ karketanasya sadṛśam vapuḥ udvahanti
karketanam yadi parīkṣita varṇa rūpam pratyagra bhāsvara divākara su prakāśam

original: tasyottamasya maṇi śāstravidāṃ mahimnā tulyaṃ tu mūlyamuditaṃ tulitasya kāryam // GarP_1,75.7 //
analyzed: tasya uttamasya maṇi śāstra vidām mahimnā tulyam tu mūlyam uditam tulitasya kāryam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe karketanaparīkṣaṇaṃ nāma pañcasaptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe karketanaparīkṣaṇam nāma pañcasaptatitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
sūtaḥ uvāca
himavati uttara deśe vīryam patitam suradviṣaḥ tasya
saṃprāptam uttamānām ākaratām bhīṣma ratnānām
śuklāḥ śaṅkha abja nibhāḥ syonāka sannibhā prabhāvantaḥ
prabhavanti tatas taruṇāḥ vajra nibhāḥ bhīṣma pāṣāṇāḥ
hema ādi pratibaddhāḥ śuddham api śraddhayā vidhatte yaḥ

original: bhīṣmamaṇiṃ grīvādiṣu susampadaṃ sa sarvadā labhate // GarP_1,76.3 //
analyzed: bhīṣma maṇim grīvā ādiṣu su sampadam sa sarvadā labhate
nirīkṣya palāyante yam tam araṇya nivāsinaḥ
dvīpi vṛka śarabha kuñjara siṃha vyāghra ādayaḥ hiṃstrāḥ
tasaḥ yat kala taṣṭa taroḥ bhavati bhayam na ca asti īśam upahasanti
samyak prāpta aṅgulī kalatra tvaḥ
pitṝ tarpaṇe pitṝṇām tṛptiḥ bahu vārṣikī bhavati
śāmyanti adbhutāni api sarpa aṇḍaja ākhu vṛścika viṣāṇi
salila agni vairi taskara bhayāni bhīmāni naśyanti
śaivala balāhaka ābham puruṣam pīta prabham prabhā hīnam
malina dyuti ca vivarṇam dūrāt parivarjayet prājñaḥ
mūlyam prakalpyam eṣām vibudha varaiḥ daiśa kāla vijñānāt
dūre bhūtānām bahu kiñcid nikaṭa prasūtānām

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vaidūryaparīkṣaṇaṃ nāma ṣaṭsaptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe vaidūryaparīkṣaṇam nāma ṣaṭsaptatitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
sūtaḥ uvāca

original: puṇyeṣu parvatavareṣu ca nimnagāsu sthānāntareṣu ca tathottaradeśagatvāt /
analyzed: puṇyeṣu parvata vareṣu ca nimnagāsu sthāna antareṣu ca tathā uttara deśa ga tvāt

original: saṃsthāpitāḥ svanakhabāhugateḥ prakāśaṃ saṃpūjya dānavapatiṃ prathite pradeśe // GarP_1,77.1 //
analyzed: saṃsthāpitāḥ sva nakha bāhu gateḥ prakāśam saṃpūjya dānava patim prathite pradeśe
va
mekala kālaga ādau guñjā añjana kṣaudra mṛṇāla varṇāḥ

original: gandharvavahnikadalīsadṛśāvabhāsā ete praśastāḥ pulakāḥ prasūtāḥ // GarP_1,77.2 //
analyzed: gandharva vahni kadalī sadṛśa avabhāsāḥ ete praśastāḥ pulakāḥ prasūtāḥ
śaṅkha abja bhṛṅga arka vicitra bhaṅgā
petāḥ paramāḥ pavitrāḥ

original: maṅgalyayuktā bahubhakticitrā vṛddhipradāste pulakā bhavanti // GarP_1,77.3 //
analyzed: maṅgalya yuktāḥ bahu bhakti citrāḥ vṛddhi pradāḥ te pulakāḥ bhavanti
kākā kaśva rāsabha sṛgāla vṛka ugra rūpaiḥ gṛdhraiḥ sa māṃsa rudhira ārdra mukhaiḥ upetāḥ

original: mṛtyupradāśca viduṣā parivarjanīyā mūlyaṃ palasya kathitaṃ ca śatāni pañca // GarP_1,77.4 //
analyzed: mṛtyu pradāḥ ca viduṣā parivarjanīyāḥ mūlyam palasya kathitam ca śatāni pañca

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe pulakaparīkṣaṇaṃ nāma saptasaptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe pulakaparīkṣaṇam nāma saptasaptatitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
sūtaḥ uvāca
hutabhuj rūpam ādāya dānavasya yathā īpsitam
narmadāyām nicikṣepa kiñcid hīna ādi bhūmiṣu
tatra indragopa kalitam śuka vakra varṇam saṃsthānataḥ prakaṭa pīlu samāna mātram
nānā prakāra vihitam
ratnam uddhṛtya tasya khalu sarva samānam eva

original: madhyendupāṇḍuramatīva viśuddhavarṇaṃ taccendranīlasadṛśaṃ paṭalaṃ tule syāt /
analyzed: madhya indu pāṇḍuram atīva viśuddha varṇam tat ca indranīla sadṛśam paṭalam tule syāt

original: saiśvaryabhṛtyajananaṃ kathitaṃ tadaiva pakrañca tatkila bhavetsuravajravarṇam // GarP_1,78.3 //
analyzed: sa aiśvarya bhṛtya jananam kathitam tadā eva tat kila bhavet sura vajra varṇam

original: iti śrāgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe rudhirākṣaratnaparīkṣaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭasaptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrā gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe rudhirākṣaratnaparīkṣaṇam nāma aṣṭasaptatitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
sūtaḥ uvāca
kāvera vindhya yavana cīna nepāla bhūmiṣu
lāṅgalī vyakirat medaḥ dānavasya prayatnataḥ
ākāśa śuddham taila ākhyam utpannam sphaṭikam tatas
mṛṇāla śaṅkha dhavalam kiñcid varṇa antar anvitam
na ttulyam hi ratnānām athavā pāpa nāśanam

original: saṃskṛtaṃ śilpinā sadyo mūlyaṃ kiñcillabhettataḥ (dā) // GarP_1,79.3 //
analyzed: saṃskṛtam śilpinā sadyas mūlyam kiñcid labhet tatas

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe sphaṭikaparīkṣaṇaṃ nāmaikonāśītitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe sphaṭikaparīkṣaṇam nāma ekonāśītitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
sūtaḥ uvāca
ādāya śeṣaḥ tasya antram balasya

original: cikṣepa tatra jāyante vidrumāḥ subhahāguṇāḥ // GarP_1,80.1 //
analyzed: cikṣepa tatra jāyante vidrumāḥ
tatra pradhānam śaśa lohita ābham guñjā japā puṣpa nibham pradiṣṭam

original: sunīlakaṃ devakaromakañca sthānāni teṣu prabhavaṃ surāgam // GarP_1,80.2 //
analyzed: su nīlakam devaka romakam ca sthānāni teṣu prabhavam su rāgam

original: anyatra jātaṃ ca na tatpradhānaṃ mūlyaṃ bhavecchilpiviśeṣayogāt /
analyzed: anyatra jātam ca na tat pradhānam mūlyam bhavet śilpi viśeṣa yogāt

original: prasannaṃ komalaṃ snigdhaṃ surāgaṃ vidrumaṃ hi tat // GarP_1,80.3 //
analyzed: prasannam komalam snigdham su rāgam vidrumam hi tat
dhana dhānya karam loke viṣa ārti bhaya nāśanam
parīkṣā pulakasya uktā rudhirākṣasya vai maṇeḥ
sphaṭikasya vidrumasya ratna jñānāya śaunaka

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vidrumaparīkṣaṇaṃ nāmāśītitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe vidrumaparīkṣaṇam nāma aśītitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
iti ratnamuktā ādi parīkṣā samāptā
atha tīrtha kṣetra māhātmyam ārabhyate
sūtaḥ uvāca
sarva tīrthāni vakṣyāmi gaṅgā tīrtha uttama uttamā

original: sarvatra sulabhā gaṅgātriṣu sthāneṣu durlabhā // GarP_1,81.1 //
analyzed: sarvatra sulabhā gaṅgā triṣu sthāneṣu durlabhā
gaṅgādvāre prayāge ca gaṅgāsāgara saṅgame

original: prayāgaṃ paramaṃ tīrthaṃ mṛtānāṃ bhuktimuktidam // GarP_1,81.2 //
analyzed: prayāgam paramam tīrtham mṛtānām bhukti mukti dam
sevanāt kṛta piṇḍānām pāpa jit kāma dam nṛṇām

original: vārāṇasī paraṃ tīrthaṃ viśveśo yatra keśavaḥ // GarP_1,81.3 //
analyzed: vārāṇasī param tīrtham viśveśaḥ yatra keśavaḥ
kurukṣetram param tīrtham dāna ādyaiḥ bhukti mukti dam

original: prabhāsaṃ paraṃ tīrthaṃ somanātho hi tatra ca // GarP_1,81.4 //
analyzed: prabhāsam param tīrtham somanāthaḥ hi tatra ca
dvārakā ca purī ramyā bhukti mukti pradāyikā

original: prācī sarasvatī puṇyā saptasārasvataṃ param // GarP_1,81.5 //
analyzed: prācī sarasvatī puṇyā saptasārasvatam param
kedāram sarva pāpa ghnam sa śa
mbhalagrāmaḥ uttamaḥ
naranarāyaṇam tīrtham muktyai vadarikāśramaḥ

original: śvetadvīpaṃ purī māyā naimiṣaṃ puṣkaraṃ param /
analyzed: śvetadvīpam purī māyā naimiṣam puṣkaram param

original: ayodhyā cārghyatīrthaṃ tu citrakūṭaṃ ca gomatī // GarP_1,81.7 //
analyzed: ayodhyā ca arghyatīrtham tu citrakūṭam ca gomatī
vaināyakam mahī tīrtham rāmagiri āśramam param
rāmeśvaram param tīrtham kārtikeyam tathā uttamam
bhṛgutuṅgam kāmatīrtham tīrtham ca amarakaṇṭakam
ujjayinyām mahākālaḥ kubjake śrīdharaḥ hariḥ
kubjāmrakam mahā tīrtham kālasarpiḥ ca kāma dam

original: mahā keśī ca kāverī candrabhāgā vipāśayā /
analyzed: mahā keśī ca kāverī candrabhāgā vipāśayā

original: ekāmraṃ ca tathā tīrthaṃ brahmeśaṃ devakoṭakam // GarP_1,81.11 //
analyzed: ekāmram ca tathā tīrtham brahmeśam devakoṭakam

original: mathurā ca purī ramyā śoṇaścaiva mahānadaḥ /
analyzed: mathurā ca purī ramyā śoṇaḥ ca eva mahā nadaḥ

original: jambūsaro mahātīrthaṃ tāni tīrthāni viddhi ca // GarP_1,81.12 //
analyzed: jambūsaraḥ mahā tīrtham tāni tīrthāni viddhi ca

original: sūryaḥ śivo gaṇo devī hariryatra ca tiṣṭhati /
analyzed: sūryaḥ śivaḥ gaṇaḥ devī hariḥ yatra ca tiṣṭhati

original: eteṣu ca yathānyeṣu snānaṃ dānaṃ japastapaḥ // GarP_1,81.13 //
analyzed: eteṣu ca yathā anyeṣu snānam dānam japaḥ tapaḥ

original: pūjā śrāddhaṃ piṇḍadānaṃ sarvaṃ bhavati cākṣayam /
analyzed: pūjā śrāddham piṇḍa dānam sarvam bhavati ca akṣayam

original: śālagrāmaṃ sarvadaṃ syāttīrthaṃ paśupateḥ param // GarP_1,81.14 //
analyzed: śālagrāmam sarva dam syāt tīrtham paśupateḥ param
kokāmukham ca vārāham bhā bhu
ṇḍīram svāmi saṃjñakam
laḥ maḥ ha daṇḍe mahāviṣṇuḥ mandāre madhusūdanaḥ
kāmarūpam mahā tīrtham kāma ākhyā kṣā
yatra tiṣṭhati

original: puṇḍravardhanakaṃ tīrthaṃ kārtikeyaśca yatra ca // GarP_1,81.16 //
analyzed: puṇḍravardhanakam tīrtham kārtikeyaḥ ca yatra ca
virajaḥ tu mahā tīrtham tīrtham śrīpuruṣottamam

original: mahendraparvatastīrthaṃ kāverī ca nadī parā // GarP_1,81.17 //
analyzed: mahendra parvataḥ tīrtham kāverī ca nadī parā
godāvarī mahā tīrtham payoṣṇī varadā nadī

original: vindhyaḥ pāpaharaṃ tīrthaṃ narmadābheda uttamaḥ // GarP_1,81.18 //
analyzed: vindhyaḥ pāpa haram tīrtham narmadā bhedaḥ uttamaḥ

original: gokarṇaṃ paramaṃ tīrthaṃ tīrthaṃ māhiṣmatī purī /
analyzed: gokarṇam paramam tīrtham tīrtham māhiṣmatī purī
kālañjaram mahī tīrtham śuklatīrtham anuttamam

original: kṛte śauce muktidaṃ ca śārṅgadhārī tadantike /
analyzed: kṛte śauce mukti dam ca śārṅgadhārī tad antike

original: virajaṃ sarvadaṃ tīrthaṃ svarṇākṣaṃ tīrthamuttamam // GarP_1,81.20 //
analyzed: virajam sarva dam tīrtham svarṇākṣam tīrtham uttamam
nanditīrtham mukti dam ca koṭi tīrtha phala pradam

original: nāsikyaṃ ca mahātīrthaṃ govardhanamataḥ param // GarP_1,81.21 //
analyzed: nāsikyam ca mahā tīrtham govardhanam atas param
kṛṣṇaveṇī bhīmarathī gaṇḍakī yā tu irāvatī

original: tīrthaṃ bindusaraḥ puṇyaṃ viṣṇupādodakaṃ param // GarP_1,81.22 //
analyzed: tīrtham bindusaraḥ puṇyam viṣṇu pāda udakam param
brahmadhyānam param tīrtham tīrtham indriyanigrahaḥ

original: damastīrthaṃ tu paramaṃ bhavaśuddhiḥ paraṃ tathā // GarP_1,81.23 //
analyzed: damaḥ tīrtham tu paramam bhavaśuddhiḥ param tathā
jñāna hrade dhyāna jale rāga dveṣa mala apahe

original: yaḥ snāti mānase tīrthe sa yāti paramāṃ gatim // GarP_1,81.24 //
analyzed: yaḥ snāti mānase tīrthe sa yāti paramām gatim

original: idaṃ tīrthamidaṃ neti ye narā bhedadarśinaḥ /
analyzed: idam tīrtham idam na iti ye narāḥ bheda darśinaḥ

original: teṣāṃ vidhīyate tīrthagamanaṃ tatphalaṃ ca yat // GarP_1,81.25 //
analyzed: teṣām vidhīyate tīrtha gamanam tad phalam ca yat
sarvam brahma iti yaḥ vā iti na a tīrtham tasya kiñcana
eteṣu snāna dānāni śrāddham piṇḍam atha akṣayam
sarvāḥ nadyaḥ sarva śailāḥ tīrtham deva ādi sevitam

original: śrīraṅgaṃ ca harestīrthaṃ tāpī śreṣṭhā mahānadī // GarP_1,81.27 //
analyzed: śrīraṅgam ca hareḥ tīrtham tāpī śreṣṭhā mahānadī
saptagodāvaram tīrtham tīrtham koṇagiriḥ param

original: mahālakṣmīryatra devī praṇītā paramā nadī // GarP_1,81.28 //
analyzed: mahā lakṣmīḥ yatra devī praṇītā paramā nadī
sahya adrau devadeveśaḥ eka vīraḥ sureśvarī

original: snātvā kanakhale tīrthe sa bhavenna punarbhave /
analyzed: snātvā kanakhale tīrthe sa bhavet na punarbhave
sū uvāca

original: etānyanyāni tīrthāni snānādyaiḥ sarvadāni hi // GarP_1,81.30 //
analyzed: etāni anyāni tīrthāni snāna ādyaiḥ sarva dāni hi
śrutvā abravīt hareḥ brahmā vyāsam dakṣa ādi saṃyutam
etāni uktvā ca tīrthāni punar stīrtha uttamottamam
gayā ākhyam prāha sarveṣām akṣayam brahma loka dam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe sarvatīrtha māhātmyaṃ nāmaikāśītitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe sarvatīrtha māhātmyam nāma ekāśītitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
śrī gaṇeśāya namaḥ
atha gayāmāhātmyam prārabhyate
brahmā uvāca
sārāt sārataram vyāsa gayā bhāhātmya muttamam
pravakṣyāmi samāsena bukti mukti pradam śṛṇu
gaya asuraḥ bhavat pūrvam vīryavān paramaḥ sa ca
tapaḥ tapyan mahā ghoram sarva bhūta upatāpanam
tad tapaḥ tāpitāḥ devāḥ tad vadha artham harim gatāḥ

original: śaraṇaṃ harirūce tān bhavitavyaṃ śivātmabhaiḥ // GarP_1,82.3 //
analyzed: śaraṇam hariḥ ūce tān bhavitavyam
pātyate sya mahā dehaḥ tathā iti ūcuḥ surāḥ harim
kadācid śiva pūjā artham kṣīrābdheḥ kamalāni ca
ānīya kīkaṭe deśe śayanam ca akarot valī
viṣṇu māyā vimūḍhaḥ sau gadayā viṣṇunā hataḥ
atas gadādharaḥ viṣṇuḥ gayāyām mukti daḥ sthitaḥ

original: tasya deho liṅgarūpī sthitaḥ śuddhe pitāmahaḥ // GarP_1,82.6 //
analyzed: tasya dehaḥ liṅga rūpī sthitaḥ śuddhe pitāmahaḥ
janārdanaḥ ca kāla īśaḥ tathā anyaḥ prapitāmahaḥ
viṣṇuḥ āha atha maryādām puṇya kṣetram bhaviṣyati

original: yajñaṃ śrāddhaṃ piṇḍadānaṃ snānādi kurute naraḥ /
analyzed: yajñam śrāddham piṇḍa dānam snāna ādi kurute naraḥ

original: sa svargaṃ brahmalokaṃ ca gacchenna narakaṃ naraḥ // GarP_1,82.8 //
analyzed: sa svargam brahma lokam ca gacchet na narakam naraḥ

original: gayātīrthaṃ paraṃ jñātvā yāgaṃ cakre pitāmahaḥ /
analyzed: gayā tīrtham param jñātvā yāgam cakre pitāmahaḥ
brāhmaṇān pūjayāmāsa ṛtvij artham upāgatān
mahānadīm rasa vahām sṛṣṭvā vā api ādikam tathā
bhakṣya bhojya phala ādīn ca kāmadhenum tathā sṛjat
pañcakrośam brāhmaṇebhyaḥ dadau prabhuḥ
lobhāt tu pratigṛhya dhana ādikam
sthitāḥ viprāḥ tadā śaptāḥ gayāyām brāhmaṇāḥ tatas

original: mā bhūttraipuruṣī vidyā mā bhūttraipuruṣaṃ dhanam // GarP_1,82.12 //
analyzed: mā bhūt traipuruṣī vidyā mā bhūt traipuruṣam dhanam
yuṣmākam syāt vāri vahā nadī pāṣāṇa parvataḥ
śaptaiḥ tu prārthitaḥ brahmā anugraham kṛtavān prabhuḥ

original: lokāḥ puṇyā gayāyāṃ hi śrāddhino brahmalokagāḥ /

original: sarpadaṣṭā gayāśrāddhānmuktāḥ svargaṃ vrajanti te // GarP_1,82.18 //

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe gayāmāhātmyaṃ nāma dvyaśītitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe gayāmāhātmyam nāma dvyaśītitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

analyzed: viṣayaḥ cāraṇaḥ puṇyaḥ nadīnām ca punar

original: teṣāṃ brahmasadaḥ sthānaṃ somapānaṃ tathaiva ca // GarP_1,83.65 //

original: pūjitaiḥ pūjitāḥ sarve pitṛbhiḥ saha devatāḥ // GarP_1,83.66 //
analyzed: pūjitaiḥ pūjitāḥ sarve pitṛbhiḥ saha devatāḥ

original: tebhyo vyāsagayābhūmau piṇḍo deyo vidhānataḥ // GarP_1,83.70 //

original: mataṅgavāpyāṃ snātvā ca gosahasraphalaṃ labhet // GarP_1,83.71 //

original: somakuṇḍe naraḥ snātvā somalokaṃ ca gacchati /

original: saṃvartasya naro vāpyāṃ subhagaḥ syāttu piṇḍadaḥ // GarP_1,83.76 //
analyzed: saṃvartasya naraḥ vāpyām subhagaḥ syāt tu piṇḍa daḥ

analyzed: gadādharam suraiḥ sārdham ādyam gatvā dadāti yaḥ

original: arghyaṃ pātraṃ ca pādyaṃ ca gandhapuṣpaṃ ca dhūpakam /
analyzed: arghyam pātram ca pādyam ca gandha puṣpam ca dhūpakam

original: dīpaṃ naivaidyamutkaṣṭaṃ mālyāni vividhāni ca // GarP_1,86.14 //
analyzed: dīpam naivaidyam utkaṣṭam mālyāni vividhāni ca
vastrāṇi mukuṭam ghaṇṭā cāmaram prekṣaṇīyakam
alaṅkāra ādikam piṇḍam anna dāna ādikam tathā
teṣām tāvat dhanam dhānyam āyuḥ āro gya sampadaḥ
puttra ādi santati śreyaḥ vidyā artham kāmaḥ īpsitaḥ
bhāryā svarga ādi vāsaḥ ca svargāt āgatya rājyakam
kulīnaḥ sattva sampannaḥ raṇe
vadha bandha vinirmuktaḥ ca ante mokṣam avāpnuyāt
śrāddha piṇḍa ādi kartāraḥ pitṛbhiḥ brahma loka gāḥ
jagannātham ye subhadrām balabhadrakam

original: jñānaṃ prāpya śriyaṃ putrānvrajanti puruṣottamam // GarP_1,86.19 //
analyzed: jñānam prāpya śriyam putrān vrajanti puruṣottamam
puruṣottama rājasya sūryasya ca gaṇasya ca
puratas tatra piṇḍa ādi pitṝṇām
natvā kapardi vighneśam sarva vighnaiḥ pramucyate
kārtikeyam pūjayitvā brahma lokam avāpnuyāt
dvādaśādityam abhyarcya sarva rogaiḥ pramucyate
vaiśvānaram samabhyarcya uttamām dīptim āpnuyāt
revantam pūjayitvā atha aśvān āpnoti anuttamān
abhyarcya indram mahā aiśvaryam gaurīm saubhāgyam āpnuyāt

original: vidyāṃ sarasvatīṃ prārcya lakṣmīṃ saṃpūjya ca śriyam /
analyzed: vidyām sarasvatīm prārcya lakṣmīm saṃpūjya ca śriyam
garuḍam ca samabhyarcya vighna vṛndāt pramucyate
kṣetrapālam samabhyarcya graha vṛndaiḥ pramucyate
muṇḍapṛṣṭham samabhyarcya sarva kāmam avāpnuyāt
nāga aṣṭakam samabhyarcya nāga daṣṭaḥ vimucyate
brahmāṇam pūjayitvā ca brahma lokam avāpnuyāt
balabhadram samabhyarcya bala ārogyam avāpnuyāt

original: subhadrāṃ pūjayitvā tu saubhāgyaṃ paramāpnuyāt // GarP_1,86.27 //
analyzed: subhadrām pūjayitvā tu saubhāgyam param āpnuyāt
sarvān kāmān avāpnoti saṃpūjya puruṣottamam

original: nārāyaṇaṃ tu saṃpūjya narāṇāmadhipo bhavet // GarP_1,86.28 //
analyzed: nārāyaṇam tu saṃpūjya narāṇām adhipaḥ bhavet

original: spṛṣṭvā natvā nārasiṃhaṃ saṃgrāme vijayī bhavet /
analyzed: spṛṣṭvā natvā nārasiṃham saṃgrāme vijayī bhavet
varāham pūjayitvā tu bhūmi rājyam avāpnuyāt
mālā vidyādharau vidyādhara padam labhet
sarvān kāmān avāpnoti saṃpūjya ādigadādharam
somanātham samabhyarcya śiva lokam avāpnuyāt
rudra īśvaram namaskṛtya rudra loke mahīyate
rāmeśvaram naraḥ natvā rāma vat su priyaḥ bhavet

original: brahmeśvaraṃ naraḥ stutvā brahmalokāya kalpyate // GarP_1,86.32 //
analyzed: brahmeśvaram naraḥ stutvā brahma lokāya kalpyate
kāleśvaram samabhyarcya naraḥ kālañjayaḥ bhavet

original: kedāraṃ pūjayitvā tu śivaloke mahīyate // GarP_1,86.33 //
analyzed: kedāram pūjayitvā tu śiva loke mahīyate

original: siddheśvaraṃ ca saṃpūjya siddho brahmapuraṃ vrajet /
analyzed: siddheśvaram ca saṃpūjya siddhaḥ brahma puram vrajet

original: ādyai rudrādibhiḥ sārdhaṃ dṛṣṭvā hyādigadādharam // GarP_1,86.34 //
analyzed: ādyaiḥ rudra ādibhiḥ sārdham dṛṣṭvā hi ādigadādharam
kulānām śatam uddhṛtya nayet brahma puram naraḥ
prāpnuyāt dharmam artha arthaḥ ca artham āpnuyāt
kāmān saṃprāpnuyāt kāmī mokṣa arthaḥ mokṣam āpnuyāt
rājya arthaḥ rājyam āpnoti śānti arthaḥ śāntim āpnuyāt
sarvam āpnoti saṃpūjya ādigadādharam

original: putrānputrārthinī strī ca saubhāgyaṃ ca tadarthinī // GarP_1,86.37 //
analyzed: putrān putra arthinī strī ca saubhāgyam ca tad arthinī
vaṃśa arthinī ca vaṃśān vai prāpya arcya ādigadādharam
śrāddhena piṇḍa dānena anna dānena vāri daḥ
brahma lokam avāpnoti saṃpūjya ādigadādharam

original: pṛthivyāṃ sarvatīrthebhyo yathā śreṣṭhā gayā purī // GarP_1,86.39 //
analyzed: pṛthivyām sarva tīrthebhyaḥ yathā śreṣṭhā gayā purī
tathā śilā ādi rūpaḥ ca śreṣṭhaḥ ca eva gadādharaḥ

original: tasmindṛṣṭe śilā dṛṣṭā yataḥ sarvaṃ gadādharaḥ // GarP_1,86.40 //
analyzed: tasmin dṛṣṭe śilā dṛṣṭā yatas sarvam gadādharaḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe gayāmāhātmyaṃ nāma ṣaḍaśītitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe gayāmāhātmyam nāma ṣaḍaśītitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
iti gayāmāhātmyam samāptam
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
hariḥ uvāca
caturdaśa manūn vakṣye tad sutāḥ ca
manuḥ svāyambhuvaḥ pūrvam agni ghrā ādyāḥ ca tad sutāḥ
marīciḥ atri aṅgirasau pulastyaḥ pulahaḥ kratuḥ
vasiṣṭhaḥ ca mahā tejāḥ ṛṣayaḥ sapta kīrtitāḥ
śukrāḥ yāmāḥ tathā eva ca
gaṇāḥ dvādaśakāḥ ca eti catvāraḥ soma pāyinaḥ
viśvabhuj vāmadeva indraḥ bāṣkaliḥ tad ariḥ hi abhūt

original: sa hato viṣṇunā daityaścakreṇa sumahātmanā // GarP_1,87.4 //
analyzed: sa hataḥ viṣṇunā daityaḥ cakreṇa su mahātmanā
manuḥ svārociṣaḥ ca atha tad putraḥ maṇḍala īśvaraḥ

original: citrako vinataścaiva karṇānto vidyuto raviḥ // GarP_1,87.5 //
analyzed: citrakaḥ vinataḥ ca eva karṇāntaḥ vidyutaḥ raviḥ
bṛhadguṇaḥ nabhaḥ ca eva mahā bala parākramaḥ

original: ūrja stambastathā prāṇa ṛṣabho niścala (ra) stathā // GarP_1,87.6 //
analyzed: ūrja stambaḥ tathā prāṇa ṛṣabhaḥ
ṛṣyaḥ sapta kīrtitāḥ

original: tuṣitā dvādaśa proktāstathā pārāvatāśca ye // GarP_1,87.7 //
analyzed: tuṣitāḥ dvādaśa proktāḥ tathā pārāvatāḥ ca ye
indraḥ vipaścit devānām tad ripuḥ purukṛtsaraḥ
jaghāna hasti rūpeṇa bhagavān madhusūdanaḥ
auttamasya manoḥ putrāḥ ājaḥ ca paraśuḥ tathā

original: vinītaśca suketuśca sumitraḥ subalaḥ śuciḥ // GarP_1,87.9 //
analyzed: vinītaḥ ca suketuḥ ca sumitraḥ subalaḥ śuciḥ
devaḥ devāvṛdhaḥ rudra
mahā utsāhaḥ ujitaḥ tathā
rathaujāḥ ūrdhvabāhuḥ ca śaraṇaḥ ca anaghaḥ muniḥ
sutapāḥ śaṅkuḥ iti ete ṛṣayaḥ sapta kīrtitāḥ
vaśavarti svadhāmānaḥ śivāḥ satyāḥ pratardanāḥ

original: pañca devagaṇāḥ proktā sarve dvādaśakāstu te /
analyzed: pañca deva gaṇāḥ proktā sarve dvādaśakāḥ tu te

original: indraḥ svaśāntistacchukraḥ pralambo nāma dānavaḥ // GarP_1,87.12 //
analyzed: indraḥ sva śāntiḥ tad śukraḥ pralambaḥ nāma dānavaḥ
matsya rūpī hariḥ viṣṇuḥ tam jaghāna ca dānavam

original: tāmasasya manoḥ putrā jānujaṅgho 'tha nirbhayaḥ // GarP_1,87.13 //
analyzed: tāmasasya manoḥ putrāḥ nirbhayaḥ
navakhyātiḥ nayaḥ ca eva priyabhṛtyaḥ vivikṣipaḥ
dṛḍheṣudhiḥ kṛbandhuḥ kṛtaḥ tathā
jyotirdhāmā pṛthuḥ dhṛṣṭa
kāvyaḥ caitraḥ cetā agnihemakāḥ kau

original: munayaḥ kīrtitāḥ sapta surāgāḥ sudhiyastathā // GarP_1,87.15 //
analyzed: munayaḥ kīrtitāḥ sapta su rāgāḥ sudhiyaḥ tathā

original: harayo devatāmāṃ ca catvāraḥ pañca (sapta) viṃśakāḥ /
analyzed: harayaḥ ca catvāraḥ pañca sapta viṃśakāḥ

original: gaṇā indraḥ śivistasya śatrurbhomarathāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,87.16 //
analyzed: gaṇāḥ indraḥ śiviḥ tasya śatruḥ bhomarathāḥ smṛtāḥ
hariṇā kūrma rūpeṇa hataḥ suraḥ

original: raivatasya manoḥ putro mahā prāṇaśca sādhakaḥ // GarP_1,87.17 //
analyzed: raivatasya manoḥ putraḥ mahā prāṇaḥ ca sādhakaḥ
vana la bandhuḥ niramitraḥ pratyaṅgaḥ para hā śuciḥ
dṛḍha vrataḥ ṛṣayaḥ tasya varṇyate
vedaśrīḥ vedabāhuḥ ca ūrdhvabāhuḥ tathā eva ca
hiraṇya romā parjanyaḥ satya netraḥ nāmā
svadhāma ca
abhūtarajasaḥ ca eva tathā devāśva medhasaḥ
vaikuṇṭha ṇṭhāḥ ścāmṛta tā
ca eva catvāraḥ devatā gaṇāḥ
gaṇe caturdaśa surāḥ vibhuridraḥ pratāpavān

original: śāntaḥ śatrurhato daityo haṃsarūpeṇa viṣṇunā // GarP_1,87.21 //
analyzed: śāntaḥ śatruḥ hataḥ daityaḥ haṃsa rūpeṇa viṣṇunā
cākṣuṣasya manoḥ putrāḥ uruḥ puruḥ mahā balaḥ
śatadyumnaḥ tapasvī ca satyabāhuḥ kyaḥ
kṛtiḥ tathā
agniṣṇuḥ atirātraḥ ca sudyumnaḥ ca tathā naraḥ
haviṣmān uttamaḥ śrīmān sva su
dhāmā virajaḥ tathā
abhimānaḥ sahiṣṇuḥ ca madhuśrīḥ ṛṣayaḥ smṛtāḥ

original: āryāḥ prabhūtā bhāvyāśca lekhāśca pṛthukāstathā // GarP_1,87.24 //
analyzed: āryāḥ prabhūtāḥ bhāvyāḥ ca lekhāḥ ca pṛthukāḥ tathā

original: aṣṭakasya gaṇāḥ pañca tathā proktā divaukasām /
analyzed: aṣṭakasya gaṇāḥ pañca tathā proktāḥ divaukasām
indraḥ manojavaḥ śatruḥ mahākālaḥ
aśva rūpeṇa sa hataḥ hariṇā loka dhāriṇā
manoḥ vaivasvatasya ete putrāḥ viṣṇu parāyaṇāḥ
ikṣvākuḥ atha nābhāgaḥ dhṛṣṭaḥ śaryātiḥ eva ca

original: nariṣyantastathā pāṃsurnabho nediṣṭha eva ca // GarP_1,87.27 //
analyzed: nariṣyantaḥ tathā pāṃsuḥ nabhaḥ nediṣṭhaḥ eva ca
karūṣaḥ ca pṛṣadhraḥ ca sudyumnaḥ ca manoḥ sutāḥ
atriḥ vasiṣṭhaḥ bhagavān jamadagniḥ ca kaśyapaḥ
gautamaḥ ca bharadvājaḥ viśāmitraḥ saptamaḥ
tathā hi ekonapañcāśat marutaḥ parikīrtitāḥ
ādityāḥ vasavaḥ sādhyāḥ gaṇāḥ dvādaśakāḥ trayaḥ

original: ekādaśā tathā rudrā vasavo 'ṣṭau prakīrtitāḥ // GarP_1,87.30 //
analyzed: ekādaśā tathā rudrāḥ vasavaḥ ṣṭau prakīrtitāḥ
dvau aśvinau vinirdiṣṭau viśvedevāḥ tathā daśā
daśa uvā aṅgirasaḥ devāḥ nava deva gaṇāḥ tathā

original: tejasvī nāma vai śakro hiraṇyākṣo ripuḥ smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: tejasvī nāma vai śakraḥ hiraṇyākṣaḥ ripuḥ smṛtaḥ
hataḥ varāha rūpeṇa viṣṇunā
vakṣye manoḥ bhaviṣyasya sāvarṇya ākhyasya vai sutān
vijayaḥ cārvavīraḥ ca nirmohaḥ
variṣṭhaḥ ca gariṣṭhaḥ ca vācaḥ saṃgatiḥ eva ca

original: aśvatthāmā kṛpo vyāso gālavo dīptimānatha // GarP_1,87.34 //
analyzed: aśvatthāmā kṛpaḥ vyāsaḥ gālavaḥ dīptimān atha
ṛṣyaśṛṅgaḥ tathā rāmaḥ ṛṣayaḥ sapta kīrtitāḥ

original: sutapā amṛtābhāśca mukhyāścāpi tathā surāḥ // GarP_1,87.35 //
analyzed: sutapāḥ amṛtābhāḥ ca mukhyāḥ ca api tathā surāḥ

original: teṣāṃ gaṇastu devānā mekaiko viṃśakaḥ smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: teṣām gaṇaḥ tu devānām ekaikaḥ viṃśakaḥ smṛtaḥ
virocana sutaḥ teṣām baliḥ indraḥ bhaviṣyati
dattvā imām yācamānāya viṣṇave yaḥ pada trayam
ṛddhim indra padam hitvā tatas siddhim avāpsyati
vāruṇeḥ dakṣasāvarṇeḥ navamasya sutān śṛṇu
dhṛtiketuḥ deptiketuḥ pañcahastaḥ nirāmayaḥ

original: pṛtuśravā bṛhadūdyumna ṛcīko bṛhato guṇaḥ // GarP_1,87.38 //
analyzed: pṛtuśravāḥ bṛhadūdyumnaḥ ṛcīkaḥ bṛhataḥ guṇaḥ
medhātithiḥ dyutiḥ ca eva savasaḥ vasuḥ eva ca
jyotiṣmān havya kavyau ca ṛṣayaḥ vibhuḥ īśvaraḥ
paraḥ marīciḥ garbhaḥ ca sva su
dharmāṇaḥ ca te trayaḥ
deśa śatru kālakākṣaḥ tad hantā padmanābhakaḥ

original: bhaviṣyanti tadā devā ekaiko dvādaśo gaṇaḥ /
analyzed: bhaviṣyanti tadā devāḥ ekaikaḥ dvādaśaḥ gaṇaḥ
teṣām indraḥ mahā vīryaḥ bhaviṣyati adbhutaḥ hara

original: dhamaputrasya putrāṃstu daśa masya manoḥ śṛṇu /
analyzed: dhama putrasya putrān tu daśa masya manoḥ śṛṇu
sukṣetraḥ ca uttamaujāḥ ca bhūriśreṇyaḥ ca vīryavān
śatānīkaḥ niramitraḥ vṛṣasenaḥ jayadrathaḥ
bhūridyumnaḥ suvarcāḥ ca śāntiḥ indraḥ pratāpavān
mūrtiḥ haviṣmān ca sukṛtiḥ ca avyayaḥ tathā
nābhāgo pratimaujāḥ ca saurabhaḥ ṛṣayaḥ tathā
prāṇa ākhyāḥ śata saṃkhyāḥ tu devatānām gaṇaḥ tadā
teṣām indraḥ ca bhavitā śāntiḥ nāma mahā balaḥ

original: baliḥ śatrustaṃ hariśca gadayā ghātayiṣyati // GarP_1,87.44 //
analyzed: baliḥ śatruḥ tam hariḥ ca gadayā ghātayiṣyati
rudra putrasya te putrān vakṣyāmi ekādaśasya tu

original: sarvatragaḥ suśarmā ca devānīkaḥ pururguruḥ // GarP_1,87.45 //
analyzed: sarvatragaḥ suśarmā ca devānīkaḥ puruḥ guruḥ
kṣetravarṇaḥ dṛḍheṣuḥ ca ārdrakaḥ putrakaḥ tathā
haviṣmān ca haviṣyaḥ ca varuṇaḥ viśva vistarau
viṣṇuḥ ca eva agnitejāḥ ca ṛṣayaḥ sapta kīrtitāḥ
vihaṅgamāḥ kāmagam nirmāṇa rucayaḥ tathā
ekaikaḥ triṃśakaḥ teṣām gaṇaḥ ca aindraḥ ca vai vṛṣaḥ
ripuḥ tasya śrī rūpī ghātayiṣyati
manoḥ tu dakṣa putrasya dvādaśasya ātmajān śṛṇu
devavān u padevaḥ ca devaśreṣṭhaḥ vidūrathaḥ
mitravān mitradevaḥ ca mitrabinduḥ ca vīryavān
mitravāhaḥ pravāhaḥ ca dakṣa putra manoḥ sutāḥ
tapasvī sutapāḥ ca eva tapomūrtiḥ taporatiḥ
tapodhṛtiḥ dyutiḥ ca anyaḥ saptamaḥ ca tapodhanāḥ
sva dharmāṇaḥ su tapasaḥ haritaḥ

original: surārayo gaṇāścaite pratyekaṃ daśako gaṇaḥ // GarP_1,87.52 //
analyzed: surārayaḥ gaṇāḥ ca ete pratyekam daśakaḥ gaṇaḥ
ṛta dhāmā ca bhadre tatre
ndraḥ tārakaḥ nāma tad ripuḥ
hariḥ napuṃsakam bhūtvā ghātayiṣyati śaṅkara
trayodaśasya raucyasya manoḥ putrān nibodha me
citrasenaḥ vicitraḥ ca tapaḥ dharma rataḥ dhṛtiḥ
sunetraḥ kṣetravṛttiḥ ca sunayaḥ dharmapaḥ dṛḍhaḥ
dhṛtimān avyayaḥ ca eva niśārūpaḥ nirutsukaḥ
ca ṛṣayaḥ sapta kīrtitāḥ
sva su romāṇaḥ sva su
dharmāṇaḥ sva su
karmāṇaḥ tathā amarāḥ
trayastriṃśat vibhedāḥ te devānām tatra vai gaṇāḥ

original: indro divaspatiḥ śatrustviṣṭibho nāma dānavaḥ // GarP_1,87.57 //
analyzed: indraḥ divaspatiḥ śatruḥ tu iṣṭibhaḥ nāma dānavaḥ
māyūreṇa ca rūpeṇa ghātayiṣyati mādhavaḥ
caturdaśasya bhautyasya śṛṇu putrān manoḥ mama

original: ururgabhīro dhṛṣṭaśca tarasvīgrā (gra) ha eva ca /
analyzed: uruḥ gabhīraḥ dhṛṣṭaḥ ca tarasvī igrā gra haḥ eva ca
abhimāni pravīraḥ ca jiṣṇuḥ saṃkrandanaḥ tathā

original: tejasvī durlabhaścaiva bhautyasyaite manoḥ sutāḥ // GarP_1,87.59 //
analyzed: tejasvī durlabhaḥ ca eva bhautyasya ete manoḥ sutāḥ
agnīdhraḥ ca agnibāhuḥ ca māgadhaḥ ca tathā śuciḥ

original: ajito muktaśukrau ca ṛṣayaḥ sapta kīrtitāḥ // GarP_1,87.60 //
analyzed: ajitaḥ mukta śukrau ca ṛṣayaḥ sapta kīrtitāḥ
cākṣuṣāḥ karma niṣṭhāḥ ca pavitrāḥ bhrājinaḥ tathā

original: vacovṛddhā devagaṇāḥ pañca proktāstu saptakāḥ // GarP_1,87.61 //
analyzed: vacaḥ vṛddhāḥ deva gaṇāḥ pañca proktāḥ tu saptakāḥ
śuciḥ indraḥ mahā daityaḥ ripu hantā hariḥ svayam

original: eko devaścaturdhā tu vyāsarūpeṇa viṣṇunā // GarP_1,87.62 //
analyzed: ekaḥ devaḥ caturdhā tu vyāsa rūpeṇa viṣṇunā
kṛtaḥ tatas purāṇāni vidyāḥ ca aṣṭādaśa eva tu

original: aṅgāni caturo vedā mīmāṃsā nyāyavistaraḥ // GarP_1,87.63 //
analyzed: aṅgāni caturaḥ vedāḥ mīmāṃsā nyāya vistaraḥ
purāṇam dharma śāstram ca āyurveda artha śāstrakam

original: dhanurvedaśca gāndharvo vidyā hyaṣṭādaśaiva tāḥ // GarP_1,87.64 //
analyzed: dhanurvedaḥ ca gāndharvaḥ vidyāḥ hi aṣṭādaśa eva tāḥ

original: iti śrāgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe manutadvaṃśanirūpaṇaṃ nāma spatāśītitamo 'dhyāyaḥ

original: mama tvapaṅkadigdho 'pi vidyāmbhobhirvaraṃ hi tat // GarP_1,88.12 //

original: iti śrāgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe karmajñānamā nāmāṣṭāśītitamo 'dhyāyaḥ

original: kiṃ karomi kra gacchāmi kathaṃ me dārasaṃgrahaḥ /

namasye ham pitṝn bhaktyā ye vasanti adhidevatam

original: devairapi hi tarpyante ye śrāddheṣu svadhottaraiḥ // GarP_1,89.13 //

original: namasye 'haṃ pitṝn svarge ye tarpyante maharṣibhiḥ /

śrāddhaiḥ manaḥ mayaiḥ bhaktyā bhukti muktim abhīpsubhiḥ

tad maya tvena ṛddhim ātyantikīm parām
namasye ham pitṝn martyaiḥ arcyante bhuvi ye sadā
śrāddheṣu śraddhayā abhīṣṭa loka puṣṭi pradāyinaḥ

vāñchita abhīṣṭa lābhāya prājāpatya pradāyinaḥ
namasye ham pitṝn ye vai tarpyante raṇya vāsibhiḥ
vanyaiḥ śrāddhaiḥ yata āhāraiḥ tapaḥ nirdhūta kalmaṣaiḥ

ye saṃyata ātmabhiḥ nityam santarpyante samādhibhiḥ
namasye ham pitṝn śrāddhaiḥ rājanyāḥ tarpayanti yān
kavyaiḥ aśeṣaiḥ vidhivat loka dvaya phala pradān
namasye ham pitṝn vaiśyaiḥ arcyante bhuvi ye sadā
sva karma abhirataiḥ nityam puṣpa dhūpa anna vāribhiḥ

original: santarpyate jagatkṛtsnaṃ nāmnā khyātāḥ sukālinaḥ // GarP_1,89.23 //

bhogaiḥ aśeṣaiḥ vidhivat nāgaiḥ kāmān abhīpsubhiḥ
namasye ham pitṝn śrāddhaiḥ sarpaiḥ santarpitān sadā

original: pitṝnnamasye nivasanti sākṣādye devaloke 'tha mahītale vā /
analyzed: pitṝn namasye nivasanti sākṣāt ye deva loke mahī tale vā

original: tathāntarikṣe ca surāripūjyāste vai pratīcchantu mayopanītam // GarP_1,89.27 //
analyzed: tathā antarikṣe ca surāri pūjyāḥ te vai pratīcchantu mayā upanītam

original: pitṝnnamasye paramārthabhūtā ye vai vimāne nivasantyamūrtāḥ /

original: pitṝnnamasye divi ye ca mūrtāḥ svadhābhujaḥ kāmyaphalābhisandhau /
analyzed: pitṝn namasye divi ye ca mūrtāḥ svadhā bhujaḥ kāmya phala abhisandhau

original: tṛpyantu te 'sminpitaraḥ samastā icchāvatāṃ ye pradiśanti kāmān /
analyzed: tṛpyantu te smin pitaraḥ samastāḥ icchāvatām ye pradiśanti kāmān

original: somasya ye raśmiṣu yer'kabimbe śukle vimāne ca sadā vasanti /
analyzed: somasya ye raśmiṣu ye irka bimbe śukle vimāne ca sadā vasanti

original: yeṣāṃ hute 'gnau haviṣā ca tṛptirye bhuñjate vipraśarīrasaṃsthāḥ /
analyzed: yeṣām hute gnau haviṣā ca tṛptiḥ ye bhuñjate vipra śarīra saṃsthāḥ

original: ye piṇḍadānena mudaṃ prayānti tṛpyantu te 'sminpitaro 'nnatoyaiḥ // GarP_1,89.32 //
analyzed: ye piṇḍa dānena mudam prayānti tṛpyantu te smin pitaraḥ nna toyaiḥ
ye khaḍga māṃsena suraiḥ abhīṣṭaiḥ kṛṣṇaiḥ tilaiḥ divya manoharaiḥ ca

original: kālena śākena maharṣivaryaiḥ saṃprīṇitāste mudamatra yāntu // GarP_1,89.33 //
analyzed: kālena śākena mahā ṛṣi varyaiḥ saṃprīṇitāḥ te mudam atra yāntu

original: kavyānyaśeṣāṇi ca yānyabhīṣṭānyatīva teṣāṃ mama pūjitānām /
analyzed: kavyāni aśeṣāṇi ca yāni abhīṣṭāni atīva teṣām mama pūjitānām

original: teṣāñca sānnidhyamihāstu puṣpagandhāmbubhojyeṣu mayā kṛteṣu // GarP_1,89.34 //
analyzed: teṣām ca sānnidhyam iha astu puṣpa gandha ambu bhojyeṣu mayā kṛteṣu

original: dinedine ye pratigṛhṇater'cāṃ māsāntapūjyā bhuvi ye 'ṣṭakāsu /

original: ye vatsarānte 'bhyudaye ca pūjyāḥ prayāntu te me pitaro 'tra tuṣṭim // GarP_1,89.35 //
analyzed: ye vatsara ante bhyudaye ca pūjyāḥ prayāntu te me tuṣṭim

original: pūjyā dvijānāṃ kumudendubhāso ye kṣattriyāṇāṃ jvalanārkavarṇāḥ /
analyzed: pūjyāḥ dvijānām kumuda indu bhāsaḥ ye kṣattriyāṇām jvalana arka varṇāḥ

original: tathā viśāṃ ye kanakāvadātā nīlīprabhāḥ śūdrajanasya ye ca // GarP_1,89.36 //

original: tathāgnihomena ca yānti tṛptiṃ sadā pitṛbhyaḥ praṇato 'smi tebhyaḥ // GarP_1,89.37 //
analyzed: tathā agni homena ca yānti tṛptim sadā pitṛbhyaḥ praṇataḥ smi tebhyaḥ

analyzed: tṛptāḥ ca ye bhūti sṛjaḥ bhavanti tṛpyantu te smin praṇataḥ smi tebhyaḥ

original: agniṣvāttāḥ pitṛgaṇāḥ prācīṃ rakṣantu me diśam /

original: tathā barhiṣadaḥ pāntu yāmyāṃ me pitaraḥ sadā /
analyzed: tathā barhiṣadaḥ pāntu yāmyām me pitaraḥ sadā

rakṣaḥ bhūta piśācebhyaḥ tathā eva asura doṣataḥ

original: sarvataḥ pitaro rakṣāṃ kurvantu mama nityaśaḥ // GarP_1,89.42 //

original: kalyatāheturanghaḥ ṣaḍime te gaṇāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,89.44 //
analyzed: ṣaṭ ime te gaṇāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: viśvapātā tathā dhātā saptaite ca gaṇāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,89.45 //

original: pitṝṇāṃ kathyate caiva tathā gaṇacatuṣṭayam // GarP_1,89.47 //

original: ta evātra pitṛgaṇāstuṣyantu ca madāhitāt // GarP_1,89.48 //
analyzed: te eva atra pitṛ gaṇāḥ tuṣyantu ca mad āhitāt
mākraṇḍeyaḥ uvāca
evam tu stuvataḥ tasya tejasoḥ rāśiḥ ucchritaḥ
