ruciḥ uvāca
arcitānām amūrtānām pitṝṇām dīpta tejasām

original: namasyāmi sadā teṣāṃ dhyānināṃ divyacakṣuṣām // GarP_1,89.51 //
analyzed: namasyāmi sadā teṣām dhyāninām divya cakṣuṣām
indra ādīnām ca netāraḥ dakṣa mārīcayoḥ tathā
saptarṣoṇām tathā anyeṣām tān namasyāmi kāma dān
manu ādīnām ca netāraḥ sūryācandramasoḥ tathā
tān namasyāmi aham sarvān pitṝn api udadhau api
nakṣatrāṇām grahāṇām ca vāyu agnyoḥ nabhasaḥ tathā
dyāvāpṛthivyoḥ ca tathā namasyāmi kṛta añjaliḥ
prajāpateḥ kaśyapāya somāya varuṇāya ca
yoga īśvarebhyaḥ ca sadā namasyāmi kṛtāñjaliḥ
namaḥ gaṇebhyaḥ saptabhyaḥ tathā lokeṣu saptasu
svāyambhuve namasyāmi brahmaṇe yoga cakṣuṣe
soma ādhārān pitṛ gaṇān yoga mūrti dharān tathā

original: namasyāmi tathā somaṃ pitaraṃ jagatāmaham // GarP_1,89.57 //
analyzed: namasyāmi tathā somam pitaram jagatām aham
agni rūpān tathā eva anyān namasyāmi pitṝn aham
agni soma mayam viśvam yatas etat aśeṣatas

original: ye ca tejasi ye caite somasūryāgnimūrtayaḥ /
analyzed: ye ca tejasi ye ca ete soma sūrya agni mūrtayaḥ
jagat svarūpiṇaḥ ca eva tathā brahma svarūpiṇaḥ
tebhyaḥ khilebhyaḥ yogibhyaḥ pitṛbhyaḥ yata mānasaḥ
namaḥ namaḥ namaḥ te stu prasīdantu svadhā bhujaḥ
mākraṇḍeyaḥ uvāca
evam stutāḥ tatas tena muni sattamāḥ
niścakramuḥ te pitaraḥ bhāsayantaḥ diśā daśa
nivedanam ca yat tena puṣpa gandha anulepanam

original: tadbhūṣitānatha sa tāndadṛśe purataḥ sthitān // GarP_1,89.62 //
analyzed: tad bhūṣitān atha sa tān dadṛśe puratas sthitān
praṇipatya ruciḥ bhaktyā punar eva kṛtāñjaliḥ
namaḥ tubhyam namaḥ tubhyam iti āha pṛthak ādṛtaḥ
tatas prasannāḥ pitaraḥ tam ūcuḥ muni sattamam
varam vṛṇīṣva iti sa tān uvāca ānata kandharaḥ
ruciḥ uvāca
prajānām sarga kartṛ tvam ādiṣṭam brahmaṇā mama

original: so 'haṃ patnīmabhīpsāmi dhanyāṃ divyāṃ prajāvatīm // GarP_1,89.65 //
analyzed: saḥ ham patnīm abhīpsāmi dhanyām divyām prajāvatīm
pitaraḥ ūcuḥ
atrā eva sadyas patnī te bhavatu ati manoramā

original: tasyāñca putro bhavitā bhavato munisattama / // GarP_1,89.66 //
analyzed: tasyāṃ ca putraḥ bhavitā bhavataḥ muni sattama
manvantara adhipaḥ dhīmān tvad nāmnā eva upalakṣitaḥ

original: ruce / raucya iti khyātiṃ prayāsyati jagattraye // GarP_1,89.67 //
analyzed: ruce raucyaḥ iti khyātim prayāsyati jagattraye
tasya api bahavaḥ putrāḥ mahā bala parākramāḥ
bhaviṣyanti mahātmānaḥ pṛthivīparipālakāḥ

original: tvaṃ ca prijāpatirbhūtvā prajāḥ sṛṣṭvā caturvidhāḥ /
analyzed: tvam ca prijāpatiḥ bhūtvā prajāḥ sṛṣṭvā caturvidhāḥ
kṣīṇa adhikāraḥ dharma jñaḥ tatas siddhim avāpsyasi
stotreṇa anena ca naraḥ yaḥ smān toṣyati bhaktitaḥ

original: tasya tuṣṭā vayaṃ bhogānātmajaṃ dhyānamuttamam // GarP_1,89.70 //
analyzed: tasya tuṣṭāḥ vayam bhogān ātma jam dhyānam uttamam
āyuḥ ārogyam artham ca putra pautra ādikam tathā

original: vāñchadbhiḥ satataṃ stavyāḥ stotreṇānena vai yataḥ // GarP_1,89.71 //
analyzed: vāñchadbhiḥ satatam stavyāḥ stotreṇa anena vai yatas

original: śrāddheṣu ya imaṃ bhaktyā tvasmatprītikaraṃ stavam /
analyzed: śrāddheṣu yaḥ imam bhaktyā tu asmad prīti karam stavam

original: paṭhiṣyati dvijāgryāṇāṃ bhuñjatāṃ purataḥ sthitaḥ // GarP_1,89.72 //
analyzed: paṭhiṣyati dvijāgryāṇām bhuñjatām puratas sthitaḥ
stotra śravaṇa saṃprītyā sannidhāne pare kṛte
asmābhiḥ akṣayam śrāddham tat bhaviṣyati asaṃśayam
yadi api aśrotriyam śrāddham yadi api upahatam bhavet
anyāya upātta vittena yadi vā kṛtam anyathā
aśrāddha arhaiḥ upataiḥ upahāraiḥ tathā kṛtaiḥ

original: akāle 'pyatha vā deśe vidhihīnamathāpi vā // GarP_1,89.75 //
analyzed: akāle pi atha vā deśe vidhi hīnam atha api vā
aśraddhayā vā puruṣaiḥ dambham āśritya yat kṛtam
asmākam tṛptaye śrāddham tathā api etad udīraṇāt
yatra etat paṭhyate śrāddhe
asmākam jāyate tṛptiḥ tatra dvādaśa āvarṣikī
hemante dvādaśa abdāni tṛptim etat prayacchati

original: śiśire dviguṇābdāni tṛptiṃ stotramidaṃ śubham // GarP_1,89.78 //
analyzed: śiśire dviguṇa abdāni tṛptim stotram idam śubham
vasante ṣoḍaśa samāḥ tṛptaye śrāddha karmaṇi
grīṣme ca ṣoḍaśa eva etat paṭhitam tṛpti kārakam
vikale pi kṛte śrāddhe stotreṇa anena sādhite
varṣāsu tṛptiḥ asmākam akṣayyā jāyate ruce
śarad kāle pi paṭhitam śrāddha kāle prayacchati
asmākam etat puruṣaiḥ tṛptim pañcadaśa ābdikīm
yasmin gehe ca likhitam etat tiṣṭhati nityadā

original: sannidhānaṃ kṛte śrāddhe tatrāsmākaṃ bhaviṣyati // GarP_1,89.82 //
analyzed: sannidhānam kṛte śrāddhe tatra asmākam bhaviṣyati
tasmāt etat tvayā śrāddhe viprāṇām bhuñjatām puras
śrāvaṇīyam mahābhāga asmākam puṣṭi kārakam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe rucikṛtapitṛstotraṃ nāmaikonanavatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe rucikṛtapitṛstotram nāma ekonanavatitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
mākraṇḍeyaḥ uvāca
tatas tasmāt nadī madhyāt samuttasthau manoramā

original: pramlaucā nāma tanvaṅgī tatsamīpe varāpsarāḥ // GarP_1,90.1 //
analyzed: pramlaucā nāma tanvaṅgī tad samīpe vara apsarāḥ
sā ca uvāca mahātmānam rucim su madhura akṣarakam

original: prasādayāmāsa bhūyaḥ pramlocā ca varāpsarāḥ // GarP_1,90.2 //
analyzed: prasādayāmāsa bhūyas pramlocā ca vara apsarāḥ
atīva rūpiṇī kanyā mad prasādvara aṅganā
jātāḥ varuṇa putreṇa puṣkareṇa mahātmanā

original: tāṃ gṛhāṇa mayā dattāṃ bhāryārthe varavarṇinīm /
analyzed: tām gṛhāṇa mayā dattām bhāryā arthe varavarṇinīm
manuḥ mahāmatiḥ tasyām samutpatsyati te sutaḥ
mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca
tathā iti tena sā api uktā tasmāt toyāt vapuṣmatīm

original: uddadhāra tataḥ kanyāṃ māninīṃ nāma nāmataḥ // GarP_1,90.5 //
analyzed: uddadhāra tatas kanyām māninīm nāma nāmataḥ
nadyāḥ ca puline tasmin sa muniḥ muni sattamāḥ
jagrāha pāṇim vidhivat samānīya mahā muniḥ

original: tasyāṃ tasya suto jajñe mahāvīryo mahādyutiḥ /
analyzed: tasyām tasya sutaḥ jajñe mahā vīryaḥ mahā dyutiḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
sūtaḥ uvāca
svāyambhuva ādyāḥ munayaḥ harim dhyāyanti karmaṇā
vrata ācāra arcana dhyāna stuti japya parāyaṇāḥ
deha indriya manaḥ buddhi prāṇa ahaṅkāra varjitam

original: ākaśena vihīnaṃ vai tejasā parivarjitam // GarP_1,91.2 //
analyzed: ākaśena vihīnam vai tejasā parivarjitam
udakena vihīnam vai tad dharma parivarjitam
pṛthivī rahitam ca eva
bhūta adhyakṣam tathā baddha niyantāram prabhum vibhum
mukta saṅgam maheśānam sarva deva prapūjitam
tejaḥ rūpam asattvam ca tapasā parivarjitam
rahitam rajasā nityam vyatiriktam guṇaiḥ tribhiḥ
sarva rūpa vihīnam vai kartṛ tva ādi vivarjitam
vāsanā rahitam śuddham sarva doṣa vivarjitam
pipāsā varjitam tat tat śo ka moha vivarjitam
jarā maraṇa hīnam vai kūṭastham moha varjitam
utpatti rahitam ca eva pralayena vivarjitam
satyam sarva ācāra hīnam niṣkalam parameśvaram
jāgrat svapna suṣupti ādi varjitam nāma varjitam
adhyakṣam jāgrat ādīnām śānta rūpam sureśvaram
jāgrat ādi sthitam nityam kārya kāraṇa varjitam

original: sarvadṛṣṭaṃ tathā mūrtaṃ sūkṣmaṃ sūkṣmataraṃ param /
analyzed: sarva dṛṣṭam tathā mūrtam sūkṣmam sūkṣmataram param
viśvena rahitam tadvat taijasena vivarjitam
prājñena rahitam ca eva turīyam paramākṣaram
sarva goptṛ sarva hantṛ sarva bhūtātma rūpi ca

original: buddhidharmavihīnaṃ vai nirādhāraṃ śivaṃ harim // GarP_1,91.13 //
analyzed: buddhi dharma vihīnam vai nirādhāram śivam harim
vikriyā rahitam ca eva vedāntaiḥ vedyam eva ca

original: vedarūpaṃ paraṃ bhūtamindriyebhyaḥ paraṃ śubham // GarP_1,91.14 //
analyzed: veda rūpam param bhūtam indriyebhyaḥ param śubham
śabdena varjitam ca eva rasena ca vivarjitam
sparśena rahitam devam rūpa mātra vivarjitam
rūpeṇa rahitam ñca eva gandhena parivarjitam

original: anādi brahma randhrāntamahaṃ brahmāsmi kevalam // GarP_1,91.16 //
analyzed: anādi brahma randhra antam aham brahma asmi kevalam
evam jñātvā mahādeva dhyānam kuryāt jita indriyaḥ

original: dhyānaṃ yaḥ kurute hyevaṃ sa bhavedbahma mānavaḥ // GarP_1,91.17 //
analyzed: dhyānam yaḥ kurute hi evam sa mānavaḥ
iti dhyānam samākhyātam aśviḥ asya mayā tava
adhunā kathayāmi anyat kim tat brūhi vṛṣadhvaja

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe haridhyānaṃ nāmaikanavatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe haridhyānam nāma ekanavatitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
rudraḥ uvāca
viṣṇoḥ dhyānam punar brūhi śaṅkha cakra gadā dhara
yena vijñāta mātreṇa kṛtakṛtyaḥ bhavet naraḥ
hariḥ uvāca
pravakṣyāmi hareḥ dhyānam māyā tantra vimardakam
mūrta amūrta ādi bhedena tad dhyānam dvividham hara

original: amūrtaṃ rudra kathitaṃ hanta mūtta bravīmyaham /
analyzed: amūrtam rudra kathitam hanta mūtta bravīmi aham
sūrya koṭi pratīkāśaḥ jiṣṇuḥ bhājiṣṇuḥ ekatas
kunda go kṣīra dhavalaḥ hariḥ dhyeyaḥ mumukṣubhiḥ

original: viśālena susaumyena śaṅkhena ca samanvitaḥ // GarP_1,92.4 //
analyzed: viśālena su saumyena śaṅkhena ca samanvitaḥ
sahasra āditya tulyena jvālā mālā ugra rūpiṇā

original: cakreṇa cānvitaḥ śānto gadāhastaḥ śubhānanaḥ // GarP_1,92.5 //
analyzed: cakreṇa ca anvitaḥ śāntaḥ gadā hastaḥ śubha ānanaḥ
kirīṭena mahārheṇa ratna prajvalitena ca
sa āyudhaḥ sarva gaḥ devaḥ saroruha dharaḥ tathā
vanamālā dharaḥ śubhraḥ sa māṃsaḥ hema bhūṣaṇaḥ
su vastraḥ śuddha dehaḥ ca su karṇaḥ padma saṃsthitaḥ
hiraṇmaya śarīraḥ ca cāru hārī śubha aṅgadaḥ
keyūreṇa samāyuktaḥ vanamālā samanvitaḥ
sṛṣṭi saṃhāra kārakaḥ
sura dhyeyaḥ deva dhyeyaḥ tisundaraḥ
brahma ādi stamba paryanta bhūta jāta hṛdisthitaḥ
sanātanaḥ vyayaḥ medhyaḥ sarva anugraha kṛt prabhuḥ
sarva ātmā sarva rūpaḥ ca sarva gaḥ graha nāśanaḥ
cāru aṅgulīya saṃyuktaḥ su dīpta nakhaḥ eva ca

original: śaraṇyaḥ lasukhakārī ca saumyarūpo maheśvaraḥ // GarP_1,92.13 //

analyzed: sarva alaṅkāra saṃyuktaḥ cāru candana carcitaḥ
sarva deva samāyuktaḥ sarva deva priyaṅkaraḥ
āditya maṇḍale saṃsthaḥ agni sthaḥ vāri saṃsthitaḥ
vāsudevaḥ jagat dhātā dhyeyaḥ viṣṇuḥ mumukṣubhiḥ
vāsudevaḥ ham asmi iti ātmā dhyeyaḥ hari hariḥ

original: dhyāyantyevaṃ ca ye viṣṇuṃ te yānti paramāṃ gatim /
analyzed: dhyāyanti evam ca ye viṣṇum te yānti paramām gatim

original: yājñavalkyaḥ purā hyevaṃ dhyātvā viṣṇuṃ sureśvaram // GarP_1,92.17 //
analyzed: yājñavalkyaḥ purā hi evam dhyātvā viṣṇum sureśvaram
dharma upadeśa kartṛ tvam saṃprāpya agāt param padam
tasmāt tvam api deveśa
viṣṇum cintaya śaṅkara

original: viṣṇudhyānaṃ paṭhedyastu prāpnoti paramāṃ gatim // GarP_1,92.19 //
analyzed: viṣṇudhyānam paṭhet yaḥ tu prāpnoti paramām gatim

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe viṣṇudhyānaṃ nāma dvinavatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe viṣṇudhyānam nāma dvinavatitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
maheśvaraḥ uvāca

original: yājñavalkyena yatpūrvaṃ dharmaṃ proktaṃ kayaṃ hare / /
analyzed: yājñavalkyena yat pūrvam dharmam proktam hare
tat me kāthaya keśi ghna
yathā tattvena mādhava
hariḥ uvāca
yājñavalkyam namaskṛtya mithilāyām samāsthitam
apṛcchan ṝṣayaḥ gatvā varṇa dharma ādi aśeṣatas

original: tebhyaḥ sa kathayāmāsa viṣṇuṃ dhyātvā jitendriyaḥ // GarP_1,93.2 //
analyzed: tebhyaḥ sa kathayāmāsa viṣṇum dhyātvā jita indriyaḥ
yājñavalkyaḥ uvāca
yasmin deśe mṛgaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ tasmin dharmān nibodhata
purāṇa nyāya mīmāṃsā dharma śāstra aṅga miśritāḥ

original: vedāḥ sthānāni vidyānāṃ dharmasya ca caturdaśa /
analyzed: vedāḥ sthānāni vidyānām dharmasya ca caturdaśa
vaktāraḥ dharma śāstrāṇām manuḥ viṣṇuḥ yamaḥ ṅgirāḥ
vasiṣṭha dakṣa saṃvarta śātātapa parāśarāḥ
āpastamba uśanaḥ vyāsāḥ kātyāyana bṛhaspatī
gautamaḥ śaṅkhalikhitaḥ hārīto tris aham tathā

original: ete viṣṇuṃ samārādhya jātā dharmopadeśakāḥ // GarP_1,93.6 //
analyzed: ete viṣṇum samārādhya jātāḥ dharma upadeśakāḥ
deśa kāle upāyena dravyam śraddhā samanvitam
pātre pradīyate yat tat sakalam dharma lakṣaṇam
ijyā ācāraḥ damaḥ hiṃsā dānam svādhyāya karma ca

original: ayaṃ ca paramo dharmo yadyogenātmadarśanam // GarP_1,93.8 //
analyzed: ayam ca paramaḥ dharmaḥ yat yogena ātma darśanam
catvāraḥ veda dharma jñāḥ parṣad traividyam eva vā

original: sā brūte yatsvadharmaḥ syādeko vādhyātmavittamaḥ // GarP_1,93.9 //
analyzed: sā brūte yat svadharmaḥ syāt ekaḥ vā adhyātma vittamaḥ
brahma kṣāttriya viś śūdrāḥ varṇāḥ tu ādyāḥ trayaḥ dvijāḥ

original: niṣekādyāḥ śmaśānāntāsteṣāṃ vai mantrataḥ kriyāḥ // GarP_1,93.10 //
analyzed: niṣeka ādyāḥ śmaśāna antāḥ teṣām vai mantrataḥ kriyāḥ
garbhādhānam ṛtau puṃsaḥ savanam spandanāt purā

original: ṣaṣṭhe 'ṣṭame vā sīmantaḥ prasave jātakarma ca // GarP_1,93.11 //
analyzed: ṣaṣṭhe ṣṭame vā sīmantaḥ prasave jātakarma ca
ahani ekādaśe nāma caturthe māsi niṣkramaḥ
ṣaṣṭhe innaprāśanam māsi cūḍām kuryāt yathā kulam
evam enaḥ śamam yāti bīja garbha samudbhavam

original: tūṣṇa īmetāḥ kriyāḥ strīṇāṃ vivāhaśca samantrakaḥ // GarP_1,93.13 //
analyzed: tūṣṇe īm etāḥ kriyāḥ strīṇām vivāhaḥ ca sa mantrakaḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe yājñavalkyoktavarṇadharṃmanirūpaṇaṃ nāma trinavatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe yājñavalkyoktavarṇadharṃmanirūpaṇam nāma trinavatitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
yājñavalkyaḥ uvāca
garbha aṣṭame ṣṭame vā abde brāhmaṇasya upanāyanam
rajñām ekādaśe sa eke viśām eke yathākulam
upanīya kuruḥ śiṣyam mahā vyāhṛti pūrvakam
vedam adhyāpayet enam śauca ācārān ca śikṣayet
divā sandhyāsu karṇa stha brahmasūtraḥ udak mukhaḥ
kuryāt mūtra purīṣe tu rātrau ced dakṣiṇā mukhaḥ
gṛhīta śiśraḥ ca utthāya mṛdbhiḥ abhyuddhṛtaiḥ jalaiḥ
gandha lepa kṣaya karam śaucam kuryāt mahā vrataḥ
antar jānuḥ śucau deśe upaviṣṭaḥ udak mukhaḥ

original: prāgvā brāhmeṇa tīrthena dvijo nityamupaspṛśet // GarP_1,94.5 //
analyzed: prāk vā brāhmeṇa tīrthena dvijaḥ nityam upaspṛśet
kaniṣṭhā deśinī aṅguṣṭha mūlāni agram karasya ca
prajāpati pitṛ brahma deva tīrthāni anukramāt
tris prāśya apaḥ dvis unmṛjya khāni ādbhiḥ samupaspṛśet
adbhiḥ tu prakṛti sthābhiḥ henābhiḥ phena buhudaiḥ
hṛd kaṇṭha tālu gābhiḥ tu yathāsaṃkhyam dvijātayaḥ
śudhyeran strī ca śūdraḥ ca sakṛt spṛṣṭābhiḥ antatas
snānam ap daivataiḥ mantraiḥ mārjanam prāṇasaṃyamaḥ

original: sūryasya cāpyupasthānaṃ gāyattrayāḥ pratyayaṃ japaḥ // GarP_1,94.9 //
analyzed: sūryasya ca api upasthānam gāyatrayāḥ pratyayam japaḥ
gāyattrīm śirasā sārdham japet vyāhṛti pūrvikām
prati praṇava saṃyuktām tris ayam prāṇasaṃyamaḥ
prāṇān āyamya samprokṣya tryṛcena ap daivatena tu
japan āsīta sāvittrīm
sandhyām prāk prātar evam hi tiṣṭhet ā sūrya darśanāt
agni kāryam tatas kuryāt sandhyayoḥ ubhayoḥ api
tatas bhivādayet vṛdvān asau aham iti bruvan
gurum ca eva api upāsīta svādhyāya artham samāhitaḥ
sa āhūtaḥ ca api adhīyīta sarvam ca asmai nivedayet
hitam tasya ācaret nityam manaḥ vāc rāya karmabhiḥ
daṇḍa ajina upavītāni mekhalām ca eva dhārayet
brāhmaṇeṣu caret bhaikṣam anindyeṣu ātma vṛttaye
ādi madhya avasāneṣu bhavet chanda upalakṣitā
brāhmaṇa kṣattriya viśām bhaikṣa caryā yathākramam
kṛta agni kāryaḥ bhuñjīta vinītaḥ guru anujñayā
āpośāna kriyā pūrvam satkṛtya annam akutsayan
brahmacārī āsthitaḥ na ekam annam adyāt anāpadi
brāhmaṇaḥ kāmam aśrīyāt śrāddhe vratam apaḍiyan
madhu māṃsam tathā svinnam ityādi parivarjayet

original: sa gururyaḥ kriyāḥ kṛtvā vedamasmai prayacchati // GarP_1,94.19 //
analyzed: sa guruḥ yaḥ kriyāḥ kṛtvā vedam asmai prayacchati
upanīya dadāti enām ācāryaḥ sa prakīrtitaḥ
eka deśam upādhyāyaḥ ṛtvijaḥ yajña kṛt ucyate
ete mānyāḥ yathāpūrvam ebhyaḥ mātā garīyasī

original: prativedaṃ brahmacaryaṃ dvādaśābdāni pañca vā // GarP_1,94.21 //
analyzed: prativedam brahmacaryam dvādaśa abdāni pañca vā
grahaṇa antikam iti eke keśāntaḥ ca eva ṣoḍaśe
ā ṣoḍaśāt vā ā viṃśāt ca ā caturviṃśāt ca vatsarāt
brahma kṣattra viśām kālaḥ aupanāyanikaḥ paraḥ
atas ūrdhvam patanti ete sarva dharma vivarjitāḥ
sāvitrīpatitāḥ vrātyāḥ vrātyastomāt ṛte kratoḥ
mātuḥ yat agre jāyante dvitīyam mauñja bandhanam
brāhmaṇa kṣattriya viśaḥ tasmāt ete dvijātayaḥ

original: yajñānāṃ tapasāṃ caiva śubhānāṃ caiva karmaṇām // GarP_1,94.25 //
analyzed: yajñānām tapasām ca eva śubhānām ca eva karmaṇām

original: veda eva dvijātīnāṃ niḥ śreyasakaraḥ paraḥ /
analyzed: vedaḥ eva dvijātīnām niḥ śreyasa karaḥ paraḥ

original: madhunā payasā caiva sa devāṃstarpayeddvijaḥ // GarP_1,94.26 //
analyzed: madhunā payasā ca eva sa devān tarpayet dvijaḥ
pitṝn madhu ghṛtābhyām ca ṛcaḥ dhīte hi saḥ nu aham
yajuḥ sāma paṭhet tadvat atharvāṅgirasam dvijaḥ
santarpayet pitṝn devān saḥ nu aham hi ghṛta amṛtaiḥ

original: vākovākyaṃ purāṇaṃ ca nārāśaṃsīśca gāthikāḥ // GarP_1,94.28 //
analyzed: vākovākyam purāṇam ca nārāśaṃsīḥ ca gāthikāḥ
itihāsān tathā vidyāḥ yaḥ dhīte śaktitaḥ nu aham
santarpayet pitṝn devān māṃsa kṣīrodana ādibhiḥ
te tṛptāḥ tarpayanti enam sarva kāma phalaiḥ śubhaiḥ
yam yam kratum adhīte asau tasya asya āpnuyāt phalam
bhūmi dānasya tapasaḥ svādhyāya phala bhāj dvijaḥ
neṣṭhikaḥ brahmacārī tu vaset ācārya sannidhau
tad abhāve sya tanaye patnyām vaiśvānare vā
anena vidhinā dehe sādhayet vijita indriyaḥ

original: brahmalokamavāpnoti na ceha jāyate punaḥ // GarP_1,94.32 //
analyzed: brahma lokam avāpnoti na ca iha jāyate punar

original: ita śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākye ācārakāṇḍe yājñavalkyoktavarṇadharmanirūpaṇaṃ nāma caturnavatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākye ācāra kāṇḍe yājñavalkyoktavarṇadharmanirūpaṇam nāma caturnavatitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
yājñavalkyaḥ uvāca
śṛṇvantu munayaḥ dharmān gṛhasthasya yata vratāḥ

original: gurave ca dhanaṃ dattvā snātvā ca tadanujñayā // GarP_1,95.1 //
analyzed: gurave ca dhanam dattvā snātvā ca tad anujñayā
samāpita brahmacaryaḥ lakṣaṇyām striyam udvahet
ananya pūrvikām kāntām asapiṇḍām yavīyasīm
arogiṇīm bhrātṛmatīm asamāna ārṣa gotra jām
pañcamāt saptamāt ūrdhvam mātṛtaḥ pitṛtaḥ tathā
daśa pūruṣa vikhyātāt śrotriyāṇām mahā kulāt

original: savarṇaḥ śrotriyo vidvānvaro doṣānvito na ca // GarP_1,95.4 //
analyzed: savarṇaḥ śrotriyaḥ vidvān varaḥ doṣa anvitaḥ na ca
yat ucyate dvijātīnām śūdrāt dāra upasaṃgrahaḥ

original: na tanmama mataṃ yasmāttatrāyaṃ jāyate svayam // GarP_1,95.5 //
analyzed: na tat mama matam yasmāt tatra ayam jāyate svayam
tisraḥ varṇa ānupūrvyeṇa dve tathā ekā yathākramam
brāhmaṇa kṣattriya viśām bhāryāḥ svā śūdrajanmanaḥ
brāhmaḥ vivāhaḥ āhūya dīyate śakti alaṅkṛtā
tad jaḥ punāti ubhayatas puruṣaḥ ekaviṃśatim
yajña sthāya ṛtvije daivam ādāya ārṣaḥ tu go yugam
caturdaśa prathama jaḥ punāti uttara jaḥ ca ṣaṭū

original: ityuktvā caratāṃ dharmaṃ saha yā dīyate 'rthine /
analyzed: iti uktvā caratām dharmam saha yā dīyate rthine

original: sa kāyaḥ pāvayettajjaḥ ṣaḍvaṃśyānātmanā saha // GarP_1,95.9 //
analyzed: sa kāyaḥ pāvayet tad jaḥ ṣaṭ vaṃśyān ātmanā saha
āsuraḥ draviṇa ādānāt gāndharvaḥ samayāt mithas
rākṣasaḥ yuddha haraṇāt paiśācaḥ kanyakā chalāt
catvāraḥ brāhmaṇasya ādyāḥ tathā gāndharva rākṣasau

original: rājñastathāsuro vaiśye śūdre cāntyastu garhitaḥ // GarP_1,95.11 //
analyzed: rājñaḥ tathā āsuraḥ vaiśye śūdre ca antyaḥ tu garhitaḥ
pāṇiḥ grāhyaḥ savarṇāsu gṛhṇīta kṣattriyā śaram
vaiśyā pratodam ādadyāt vedane ca agrajanmanaḥ

original: pitā pitāmaho bhrātā sakulyo jananī tathā /
analyzed: pitā pitāmahaḥ bhrātā sakulyaḥ jananī tathā

original: kanyāpradaḥ pūrvanāśe prakṛtīsthaḥ paraḥ paraḥ // GarP_1,95.13 //
analyzed: kanyā pradaḥ pūrva nāśe prakṛtī sthaḥ paraḥ paraḥ
a prayacchan samāpnoti bhrūṇa hatyām ṛtau ṛtau

original: eṣāmabhāve dātṝṇāṃ kanyā kuryāt svayaṃvaram // GarP_1,95.14 //
analyzed: eṣām abhāve dātṝṇām kanyā kuryāt svayaṃvaram
sakṛt pradīyate kanyā haran tām cora daṇḍa bhāj

original: aduṣṭāṃ hi tyajandaṇḍyaḥ suduṣṭāṃ tu parityajet // GarP_1,95.15 //
analyzed: aduṣṭām hi tyajan daṇḍyaḥ su duṣṭām tu parityajet
aputrā devaraḥ

original: sapiṇḍo vā samotro vā ghṛtābhyakta ṛtāviyāt // GarP_1,95.16 //
analyzed: sapiṇḍaḥ vā sa motraḥ vā ghṛta abhyaktaḥ ṛtau iyāt
ā garbha sambhavam gacchet patitaḥ tu anyathā bhavet

original: anena vidhinā jāta kṣetrapasya bhavetsutaḥ // GarP_1,95.17 //
analyzed: anena vidhinā jāta kṣetrapasya bhavet sutaḥ
hṛta adhikārām malinām piṇḍa mātra upasevinīm
paribhūtām adhas śayyām vāsayet yvabhicāriṇīm

original: somaḥ śaucaṃ dadau tāsāṃ gandharvaśca subhāṃ giram /
analyzed: somaḥ śaucam dadau tāsām gandharvaḥ ca subhām giram

original: pāvakaḥ sarvamedhyatvaṃ medhyā vai yoṣito yataḥ // GarP_1,95.19 //
analyzed: pāvakaḥ sarva medhya tvam medhyāḥ vai yoṣitaḥ yatas
vyabhicārāt ṛtau śuddhiḥ garbhetyāgam karoti ca

original: garbhabhartṛvadhe tāsāṃ tathā mahati pātake // GarP_1,95.20 //
analyzed: garbha bhartṛ vadhe tāsām tathā mahati pātake
vyādhitā dveṣṭrī vandhyā artha ghnī apriyaṃvadā

original: adhivinnā ca bhartavyā mahadenonyathā bhavet // GarP_1,95.21 //
analyzed: adhivinnā ca bhartavyā mahat enāḥ nyathā bhavet
yatra avirodhaḥ dampatyoḥ trivargaḥ tattra vardhate

original: mṛte jīvati yā patyau yā nānyamupagacchati // GarP_1,95.22 //
analyzed: mṛte jīvati yā patyau yā na anyam upagacchati
sā iha kīrtim avāpnoti modate ca umayā saha
śuddhām tyajan tṛtīya aṃśam dadyāt āmaraṇam striyāḥ
strībhiḥ bhartuḥ vacaḥ kāryam eṣa dharmaḥ paraḥ striyāḥ

original: ṣoḍaśartuniśāḥ strīṇāṃ tāsu yugmāsu saṃviśet // GarP_1,95.24 //
analyzed: ṣoḍaśa ṛtu niśāḥ strīṇām tāsu yugmāsu saṃviśet
brahmacārī ca varjayet

original: evaṃ gacchaṃ striyaṃ kṣāmāṃ maghāṃ mūlāṃ ca varjayet // GarP_1,95.25 //
analyzed: evam striyam kṣāmām maghām mūlām ca varjayet
lakṣaṇyam janayet eva putram roga vivarjitam
yathā kāmī bhavet vā api strīṇām sma
valam anusmaran
sva dāra nirataḥ ca eva striyaḥ rakṣyāḥ yatas tatas
bhartṛ bhrātṛ pitṛ jñāti śvaśrū śvaśura devaraiḥ
bandhubhiḥ ca striyaḥ pūjyāḥ bhūṣaṇa ācchādana aśanaiḥ

original: saṃyato paskarā dakṣā hṛṣṭā vyayaparāṅmukhī // GarP_1,95.28 //
analyzed: dakṣā hṛṣṭā vyaya parāṅmukhī
śvaśrū śvaśurayoḥ kuryāt pādayoḥ vandanam sadā
krīḍā śarīra saṃskāra samāja utsava daśanam
hāsyam para gṛhe yānam tyajet preṣita bhartṛkā

original: rakṣetkanyāṃ pitā bālye yauvane patireva tām // GarP_1,95.30 //
analyzed: rakṣet kanyām pitā bālye yauvane patiḥ eva tām
vārdhakye rakṣate putraḥ hi anyathā jñātayaḥ tathā

original: patiṃ vinā na tiṣṭhettu divā vā yadi vā niśi // GarP_1,95.31 //
analyzed: patim vinā na tiṣṭhet tu divā vā yadi vā niśi
jyeṣṭhām dharma vidhau kuryāt na kaniṣṭhām kadācana
dāhayet agni hotreṇa striyam vṛttavatīm patiḥ
āharet vidhivat dārān agnim ca eva avilambitaḥ

original: hitā bharturdivaṃ gacchediha kīrtīravāpya ca // GarP_1,95.33 //
analyzed: hitā bhartuḥ divam gacchet iha kīrtīḥ avāpya ca

original: iti śrāgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe yājñavalkyoktagṛhalthadharmanirṇayo nāma pañcanavatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrā gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe yājñavalkyoktagṛhalthadharmanirṇayaḥ nāma pañcanavatitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrā garuḍa mahā purāṇam
yājñavalkyaḥ uvāca
vakṣye saṅkara jāti ādi gṛhastha ādi vidhim param

original: viprānmūrdhāvaṣikto hi kṣāttriyāyāṃ viśaḥ striyām // GarP_1,96.1 //
analyzed: viprāt mūrdhāvaṣiktaḥ hi kṣāttriyāyām viśaḥ striyām
jātaḥ mbaṣṭhaḥ tu śūdrāyām niṣādaḥ vā
māhiṣyaḥ kṣattriyāt jātaḥ vaiśyāyām mleccha saṃjñitaḥ
śūdrāyām karaṇaḥ vaiśyāt vinnāsu eṣa vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ
brāhmaṇyām kṣattriyāt sūtaḥ vaiśyāt vaidehakaḥ tathā
śūdrāt jātaḥ tu cāṇḍālaḥ sarva varṇa vigarhitaḥ

original: kṣattriyā māgadhaṃ vaiśyācchūdrā kṣattārameva ca // GarP_1,96.4 //
analyzed: kṣattriyā māgadham vaiśyāt śūdrā kṣattāram eva ca
śūdrāt ayogavam vaiśyā janayāmāsa vai sutam

original: māhiṣyeṇa karaṇyāṃ tu rathakāraḥ prajāyate // GarP_1,96.5 //
analyzed: māhiṣyeṇa karaṇyām tu rathakāraḥ prajāyate
asat santaḥ tu vai jñeyāḥ pratiloma anuloma jāḥ

original: jātyutkarṣāddvijo jñeyaḥ saptame pañcame 'pi vā // GarP_1,96.6 //
analyzed: jāti utkarṣāt dvijaḥ jñeyaḥ saptame pañcame vā
vyatyaye karmaṇām sāmyam pūrvavat ca uttara avaram

original: karma smārtaṃ vivāhāgnau kurvīta pratyahaṃ gṛhī // GarP_1,96.7 //
analyzed: karma smārtam vivāha agnau kurvīta pratyaham gṛhī
dāya kālāt ṛte vā api śrautam vaitānika agniṣu
śarīra cintām nirvartya kṛta śauca vidhiḥ dvijaḥ
prātar sandhyām upāsīta danta dhāvana pūrvakam
hutvā agnau sarya devatyān japet mantrān samāhitaḥ
veda arthān adhigacchet ca śāstrāṇi vividhāni ca
yogakṣoma ādi siddhi artham upeyāt īśvaram gṛhī
snātvā devān pitṝn ca eva tarpayet arcayet tathā
vedān atha purāṇāni sa itihāsāni śaktitaḥ
japa yajña anu siddhi artham vidyām ca ādhyātmikīm japet
bali karma svadhā homa svādhyāya atithi sakriyāḥ
bhūta pitṛ amara brahma manuṣyāṇām mahā makhāḥ

original: devebhyastu hutaṃ cāgnau kṣipedbhūtabaliṃ haret // GarP_1,96.13 //
analyzed: devebhyaḥ tu hutam ca agnau kṣipet bhūta balim haret
annam bhūmi auśva cāṇḍāla vāyasebhyaḥ ca niḥ kṣipet
annam pitṛ manuṣyebhyaḥ deyam api anvaham jalam
svādhyāyam anvaham kuryāt na pacet ca annam ātmane
bāla svavāsinī vṛddha garbhiṇī ātura kanyakāḥ
saṃbhojya atithi bhṛtyān ca dampatyoḥ śeṣa bhojanam
prāṇa agnihotra vidhinā āśrīyāt annam akutsayan

original: mitaṃ vipākaṃ ca hitaṃ bhakṣyaṃ bālādipūrvakam /
analyzed: mitam vipākam ca hitam bhakṣyam bāla ādi pūrvakam
āpośānena upariṣṭāt adhastāt ca eva bhujyate
anagnam amṛtam ca eva kāryam annam dvijanmanā
atithibhyaḥ tu varṇebhyaḥ deyam śaktyā anupūrvaśas
apraṇodyaḥ tithiḥ sāyam api na atra vicāraṇā

original: satkṛtya bhikṣave bhikṣā dātavyā suvratāya ca // GarP_1,96.19 //
analyzed: satkṛtya bhikṣave bhikṣā dātavyā suvratāya ca
āgatān bhojayet sarvān mahā ukṣam śrotriyāya ca
pratisaṃvatsaram tu arcyāḥ snātaka ācārya pārthivāḥ

original: priyo vivāhyaśca tathā yajñaṃ pratyṛrtvijaḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: priyaḥ vivāhyaḥ ca tathā yajñam prati ṛtvijaḥ punar
tithiḥ proktaḥ śrotriyaḥ vedapāragaḥ
mānyau etau gṛhasthasya brahma lokam abhīpsataḥ
para pāka ruciḥ na syāt anindya āmantraṇāt ṛte
vāc pāṇi pāda cāpalyam varjayat ca ati bhojanam
śrotriyam vā atithim tṛptam ā sīmāntāt anuvrajet
ahar śeṣam saha āsīta śiṣṭaiḥ iṣṭaiḥ ca bandhubhiḥ

original: upāsya paścimāṃ sandhyāṃ hutvāgnau bhojanaṃ tataḥ // GarP_1,96.24 //
analyzed: upāsya paścimām sandhyām hutvā agnau bhojanam tatas
kuryāt bhatyaiḥ samāyuktaiḥ cintayet ātmanaḥ hitam

original: brāhme muhūrte cotthāya mānyo vipro dhanādibhiḥ // GarP_1,96.25 //
analyzed: brāhme muhūrte ca utthāya mānyaḥ vipraḥ dhana ādibhiḥ
vṛddha ārtānām samādeyaḥ panthāḥ vai bhāra vāhinām
ijyā adhyayana dānāni vaiśyasya kṣattriyasya ca
pratigrahaḥ dhikaḥ vipre yājana adhyāpane tathā

original: pradhānaṃ kṣattriye karma prajānāṃ paripālanam // GarP_1,96.27 //
analyzed: pradhānam kṣattriye karma prajānām paripālanam
kusīda kṛṣi vāṇijyam pāśupālyam viśaḥ smṛtam

original: śūdrasya dvijaśuśrūṣā dvijo yajñānna hāpayet // GarP_1,96.28 //
analyzed: śūdrasya dvija śuśrūṣā dvijaḥ yajñāt na hāpayet
ahiṃsā satyam asteyam śaucam indriya saṃyamaḥ

original: damaḥ kṣamārjavaṃ dānaṃ sarveṣāṃ dharmasādhanam // GarP_1,96.29 //
analyzed: damaḥ kṣamā ārjavam dānam sarveṣām dharma sādhanam
ācaret sadṛśīm vṛttim a jihmām a śaṭhām tathā

original: traivārṣikā dhikānno yaḥ sa somaṃ pātumarhati // GarP_1,96.30 //
analyzed: traivārṣikāḥ dhika annaḥ yaḥ sa somam pātum arhati
syāt annam vārṣikam yasya kuryāt kriyām

original: pratisaṃvatsaraṃ somaḥ paśuḥ pratyayanaṃ tathā // GarP_1,96.31 //
analyzed: pratisaṃvatsaram somaḥ paśuḥ pratyayanam tathā
kartavyā a grahaṇā iṣṭiḥ ca cāturmāsyāni yatnataḥ
eṣām asambhave kuryāt iṣṭim vaiśvānarīm dvijaḥ

original: hīnakalpaṃ na kurvīta sati dravye phalapradam /
analyzed: hīna kalpam na kurvīta sati dravye phala pradam
caṇḍālaḥ jāyate yajña karaṇāt śūdra bhikṣitāta
yajña artha labdham na ādadyāt bhāsaḥ vā bhavet

original: kusūtakumbhīdhānyo vā tryāhikaḥ śvastano 'pi vā // GarP_1,96.34 //
analyzed: kusūta kumbhīdhānyaḥ vā tryāhikaḥ vā
jīvet vā api śilā uñchena śreyān eṣām paraḥ paraḥ
na svādhyāya virodhi artham īheta na yatas tatas
rāja antevāsi yājyebhyaḥ sīdan icchet dhanam kṣudhā
dambha haituka pāṣaṇḍi bakavṛttīn ca varjayet
śukla ambara dharaḥ nīca keśa śmaśru nakhaḥ śuciḥ
na bhāryā darśane śrīyāt na eka vāsāḥ na saṃsthitaḥ
apriyam na vadet jātu brahmasūtrī vinītavān
deva pradakṣiṇām kuryāt yaṣṭimān sa kamaṇḍaluḥ
na tu mehet nadī chāyā bhasma goṣṭā ambu vartmasu
na prati agni arka go soma sandhyā ambu strī dvijanmanām
na īkṣeta agni arka nagnām strīm na ca saṃsṛṣṭa maithunām

original: na ca mūtraṃ purīṣaṃ vā svapetpratyakūśirā na ca // GarP_1,96.40 //
analyzed: na ca mūtram purīṣam vā svapet pratyakū śirāḥ na ca
ṣṭīvana asṛj śakṛt mūtra viṣāṇi apsu na saṃkṣipet
pādau pratāpayet na agnau na ca enam abhilaṅghayet
pibet na añjalinā toyam na śayānam prabodhayet

original: nākṣaiḥ krījecca kitavairvyādhitaiśca na saṃviśet // GarP_1,96.42 //
analyzed: na akṣaiḥ kitavaiḥ vyādhitaiḥ ca na saṃviśet
viruddham varjayet kama pretadhūmam nadī taram
keśa bhasma tuṣa aṅgāra kapāleṣu ca saṃsthitim
na ācakṣīta dhayantīm gām na advāreṇa āviśet kracid
na rājñaḥ pratigṛhṇāyāt lubdhasya ucchāstra vartinaḥ
adhyāyānām upākarma śrāvaṇyām śravaṇena vā

original: hastenauṣadhibhāve vā pañcamyāṃ śrāvaṇasya ca // GarP_1,96.45 //
analyzed: hastena oṣadhi bhāve vā pañcamyām śrāvaṇasya ca
pauṣa māsasya rohiṇyām aṣṭakāyām atha api vā
jala ante chandasām kuryāt utsargam vidhivat vahis
anadhyāyaḥ tri aham prete
upākarmaṇi ca utsarge sva śākhā śrotriye mṛte
sandhyā garjita nirghāta bhūkampa ulkā nipātane
samāpya vedam dyuniśam āraṇyakam adhītya ca
pañcadaśyām caturdaśyām aṣṭamyām rāhusūtake

original: ṛtusandhiṣu bhuktvā vā śrāddhikaṃ pratigṛhya ca // GarP_1,96.49 //
analyzed: ṛtu sandhiṣu bhuktvā vā śrāddhikam pratigṛhya ca
paśu maṇḍūka nakula śva ahi mārjāra sūkaraiḥ
kṛte ntare tu ahorātram śakrapāte tathā ucchraye
śva kroṣṭu gardabha ulūka sāma bāṇa ārtaniḥ svane
amedhya śava śūdra antya śmaśāna patita antike
deśe śucau ātmani ca vidyut stanita saṃplave
bhuktvā ārdra pāṇiḥ ambhaḥ ntar ardharātre timārute
digdāhe pāṃsu varṣeṣu sandhyānī hāra bhītiṣu

original: dhāvataḥ pūtigandhe ca śiṣṭe ca gṛhamāgate // GarP_1,96.53 //
analyzed: dhāvataḥ pūti gandhe ca śiṣṭe ca gṛham āgate
khara uṣṭra yāna hasti aśva nau vṛkṣa giri rohaṇe
saptatriṃśat anadhyāyān etān tātkālikān viduḥ
veda diṣṭam tathā ācāryam rāja chāyām para striyam
na ākrāmet rakta viṣ mūtra ṣṭhīvana udvartanāni ca
vipra ahi kṣattriya ātmānaḥ na avajñeyāḥ kadācana
dūrāt ucchiṣṭa viṣ mūtra pāda ambhāṃsi samutsṛjet
śruti smṛti uktam ācāram kuryāt marmaṇi na spṛśet

original: na nindātāḍane kuryātsutaṃ śiṣyaṃ ca tāḍayet // GarP_1,96.57 //
analyzed: na nindā tāḍane kuryāt sutam śiṣyam ca tāḍayet
ācaret sarvadā dharmam tad viruddham tu na ācaret
mātā pitṛ atithi ibhya āḍhyaiḥ vivādam na ācaret gṛhī
pañca piṇḍān an uddhṛtya na snāyāt para vāriṣu
snāyāt nadī prastravaṇa devakhāta hradeṣu ca
varjayet para śayyā ādi na ca āśrīyāt anāpadi
kadarya baddhacaḥ vai
rāṇām tathā ca anamnikasya ca
vaiṇa abhiśasta vārdhuṣya gaṇikā gaṇa dīkṣiṇām
cikitsaka ātura kruddha klība raṅga upajīvinām
krūra ugra patita vrātya dāmbhika ucchiṣṭa bhojinām
śāstra vikrayiṇaḥ ca eva strī jita grāma yājinām
nṛśaṃsa rāja rajaka kṛtaghna vadhajīvinām
piśuna anṛtinoḥ ca eva soma vikrayiṇaḥ tathā
bandinām svarṇakārāṇām annam eṣām kadācana

original: na bhoktavyaṃ vṛthā māṃsaṃ keśakīṭasamanvitam // GarP_1,96.64 //
analyzed: na bhoktavyam vṛthā māṃsam keśa kīṭa samanvitam
bhaktam paryuṣita ucchiṣṭam śva spṛṣṭam te kṣitam
udakyā spṛṣṭa saṃghuṣṭam aparyāptam ca varjayet
śakuna ucchiṣṭam pāda spṛṣṭa ca kāmataḥ
śūdreṣu dāsa gopāla kula mitra ardhasīriṇaḥ
bhojya annaḥ nāpitaḥ ca eva yaḥ ca ātmānam nivedayet

original: annaṃ paryuṣitaṃ bhojyaṃ snehāktaṃ cirasaṃbhṛ (sthi) tam // GarP_1,96.67 //
analyzed: annam paryuṣitam bhojyam sneha aktam cira saṃbhṛ sthi
asnehāḥ api ghodhūma yava gorasa vikriyāḥ
auṣṭram aikaśapham strīṇām payaḥ ca parivarjayet
kravyāda pakṣi dātyūha śuka māṃsāni varjayet
sārasa ekaśaphān haṃsān balāka baka ṭiṭṭibhān
vṛthā kṛsara saṃyāva pāyasa apūpa śaṣkulīḥ
kuraram jālapādam ca khañjarīṭa mṛga dvijān
vai kāmataḥ naraḥ

original: ballūraṃ kāmato jagddhvā sopa vāsastryahaṃ bhavet // GarP_1,96.71 //
analyzed: ballūram kāmataḥ jagddhvā saḥ upa vāsaḥ tri aham bhavet
palāṇḍu laśuna ādīni jagddhvā cāndrāyaṇam caret

original: śrāddhe devānpitṝnprārcya khādanmāṃsaṃ na doṣabhāk // GarP_1,96.72 //
analyzed: śrāddhe devān pitṝn prārcya khādat māṃsam na doṣa bhāj
vaset sa narake ghora dināni paśu romataḥ
saṃmitāni durācāraḥ yaḥ hanti avidhinā paśūn

original: māṃsaṃ santyajya saṃprārthya kāmānyāti tato harim // GarP_1,96.73 //
analyzed: māṃsam santyajya saṃprārthya kāmān yāti tatas harim

original: iti śrīgāruje mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe yājñavalkyoktaśrāddhanirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣaṇṇavatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruje mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe yājñavalkyoktaśrāddhanirūpaṇam nāma ṣaṇṇavatitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
yājñavalkyaḥ uvāca
dravya śuddhim pravakṣyāmi tat nibodhata sattamāḥ
sauvarṇa rājata ap jānām śaṅkha rajju ādi carmaṇām
pātrāṇām ca āsanānām ca vāriṇā śuddhiḥ iṣyate
struk struvayoḥ dhānya ādeḥ prokṣaṇena ca
takṣaṇāt dāru śṛṅga ādeḥ yajña pātrasya mārjanāt
sa uṣṇaiḥ udaka go mūtraiḥ śudhyati āvika kauśikam
bhaikṣyam yoṣit mukham paśyan punar pākāt mahī mayam
gā ghnāte nne tathā keśa makṣikā kīṭa dūṣite
bhasma kṣepāt viśuddhiḥ syāt bhū śuddhiḥ mājana ādinā
trapu sīsaka tāmrāṇām kṣāra amla udaka vāribhiḥ
bhasma adbhiḥ loha kāṃsyānām ajñātam ca sadā śuci
amedhya aktasya mṛd toyaiḥ gandha lepa apakarṣaṇāt
śuci go tṛpti dam toyam prakṛti stham mahī gatam
tathā māṃsam śva cāṇḍāla kravyāda ādi nipātitam
raśmiḥ agniḥ rajaḥ chāyā gauḥ aśvaḥ vasudhā anilāḥ
aśva aja vipruṣaḥ medhyāḥ stathā ācamana bindavaḥ

original: snātvā pītvā kṣute supte bhuktvā rathyāprasarpaṇe /
analyzed: snātvā pītvā kṣute supte bhuktvā rathyā prasarpaṇe
ācāntaḥ punar ācāmet vāsaḥ ca
kṣute niṣṭhīvite svāpe paridhāne śru pātane
pañcasu eteṣu na ācāmet dakṣiṇam śravaṇam spṛśet

original: tiṣṭhantyagnyādayo devā viprakarṇe tu dakṣiṇe // GarP_1,97.10 //
analyzed: tiṣṭhanti agni ādayaḥ devāḥ vipra karṇe tu dakṣiṇe

original: iti śrāgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe yājñavalkyoktadravyaśuddhinirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptanavatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrā gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe yājñavalkyoktadravyaśuddhinirūpaṇam nāma saptanavatitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
yājñavalkyaḥ uvāca

original: atha dānividhiṃ vakṣye tanme śṛṇuta suvratāḥ /
analyzed: atha dāni vidhim vakṣye tat me śṛṇuta suvratāḥ
anyebhyaḥ brāhmaṇāḥ śreṣṭhāḥ tebhyaḥ ca eva kriyā parāḥ
brahma vettā ca tebhyaḥ pi pātram vidyāt tapaḥ nvitāḥ tam
go bhū dhānya hiraṇya ādi pātre dātavyam arcitam

original: vidyātapobhyāṃ hīnena na tu grāhyaḥ pratigrahaḥ /
analyzed: vidyā tapobhyām hīnena na tu grāhyaḥ pratigrahaḥ
gṛhṇan pradātāram adhas nayati ātmānam eva ca
dātavyam pratyaham pātre nimitteṣu viśeṣataḥ

original: yācitenāpi dātavyaṃ śraddhāpūtaṃ tu śaktitaḥ // GarP_1,98.4 //
analyzed: yācitena api dātavyam śraddhā pūtam tu śaktitaḥ
hema śṛṅgī śaphaiḥ raupyaiḥ śuśīlā vastra saṃyutā

original: sakāṃsyāpātrā dātavya kṣīriṇī gauḥ sadakṣiṇā // GarP_1,98.5 //
analyzed: sa kāṃsya a pātrā kṣīriṇī gauḥ sa dakṣiṇā
daśa sauvarṇikam śṛṅgam śapham sapta palaiḥ kṛtam

original: pañcāśatpalikaṃ pātraṃ kāṃsyaṃ vatsasya kīrtyate // GarP_1,98.6 //
analyzed: pañcāśat palikam pātram kāṃsyam vatsasya kīrtyate
svarṇa pippala pātreṇa vatsaḥ vā vatsikā api vā

original: asyā api ca dātavyamapatyaṃ rogavarjitam // GarP_1,98.7 //
analyzed: asyāḥ api ca dātavyam apatyam roga varjitam
dātā svargam avāpnoti vatsarān roma saṃmitān
kaṣilā ced ārayet bhūyaḥ ca āsaptamam kulam

original: yāvadvatsasya dvau pādau mukhaṃ yonyāṃ pradṛśyate /
analyzed: yāvat vatsasya dvau pādau mukham yonyām pradṛśyate

original: tāvadgauḥ pṛthivī jñeyā yāvadgarbhaṃ na muñcati // GarP_1,98.9 //
analyzed: tāvat gauḥ pṛthivī jñeyā yāvat garbham na muñcati
yathā kathañcid dattvā vā adhenum eva vā
arogām aparikliṣṭām dātā svarge mahīyate
śrānta saṃvāhanam rogi paricaryā sura arcanam
pāda śaucam dvija ucchiṣṭa mārjanam gā pradāna vat
dvijāya yat abhīṣṭam tu dattvā svargam avāpnuyāt
bhū dīpān ca anna vastrāṇi sarpiḥ dattvā
gṛha dhānya chatra mālya vṛkṣayā na ghṛtam jalam
śayyā anulepanam dattvā svarga loke mahīyate
brahma dātā brahma lokam prāpnoti sura durlabham
veda artha yajña śāstrāṇi dharma śāstrāṇi ca eva hi
mūlyena api likhitvā api brahma lokam avāpnuyāt
etat mūlam jagat yasmāt asṛjat pūrvam īśvaraḥ
tasmāt sarva prayatnena kāryaḥ veda artha saṃgrahaḥ

original: itihāsapurāṇaṃ vā likhitvā yaḥ prayacchati // GarP_1,98.16 //
analyzed: itihāsa purāṇam vā likhitvā yaḥ prayacchati
brahma dāna samam puṇyam prāpnoti dviguṇa unnatim
lokāyatam kutarkaḥ ca prākṛta mleccha bhāṣitam

original: na śrotavyaṃ dvijenaitadadho nayati taṃ dvijam /
analyzed: na śrotavyam dvijena etat adhas nayati tam dvijam
samarthaḥ yaḥ na gṛhṇīyāt dātṛ lokān avāpnuyāt

original: kuśāḥ śākaṃ payo gandhāḥ pratyākhyeyā na vāri ca /
analyzed: kuśāḥ śākam payaḥ gandhāḥ pratyākhyeyāḥ na vāri ca
a yacitā hṛtam grāhyam api duṣkṛta karmaṇaḥ
anyatra kulaṭā ṣaṇḍha patitebhyaḥ dviṣaḥ tathā
deva atithi arcana kṛte pitṛ tṛpti artham eva ca
sarvatas pratigṛhṇīyāt ātma tṛp sartham eva ca

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe yājñavalkyoktadānadharmanirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭanavatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe yājñavalkyoktadānadharmanirūpaṇam nāma aṣṭanavatitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
yājñavalkyaḥ uvāca
atha śrāddha vidhim vakṣye sarva pāpa praṇāśanam
dravyam brāhmaṇa sampattiḥ viṣuvat sūrya saṃkramaḥ
vyatīpātaḥ gajacchāyā grahaṇam candra sūryayoḥ
śrāddham pratiruciḥ ca eva śrāddha kālāḥ prakīrtitāḥ
sarva deveṣu śrotriyaḥ veda vid yuvā
veda artha vid jyeṣṭha sāmā tri madhuḥ tri suparṇikaḥ
svastrīyaḥ ṛtvij ajāmātā yajya śvaśura mātulāḥ
triṇāciketa dauhitra śiṣya sambandhi bāndhavāḥ
karma niṣṭhāḥ tapaḥ niṣṭhāḥ pañca agni brahmacāriṇaḥ
pitṛ mātṛ parāḥ ca eva brāhmaṇāḥ śrāddha devatāḥ
rogī hīna atirikta aṅgaḥ kāṇaḥ paunarbhavaḥ tathā

original: avakīrṇyāda yo ye ca ye cācāravivarjitāḥ /
analyzed: avakīrṇī āda yaḥ ye ca ye ca ācāra vivarjitāḥ

original: avaiṣṇavāśca te sarve na śrāddhārhāḥ kadācana // GarP_1,99.7 //
analyzed: avaiṣṇavāḥ ca te sarve na śrāddha arhāḥ kadācana
nimantrayet ca pūrvedyus dvijaiḥ bhāvyam ca saṃyataiḥ
āja antān ca eva pūrvāhne ihi āsaneṣu upaveśayet
yugmān deve tathā pitrye sva pradeśeṣu śaktitaḥ

original: dvau daiva prāgudak pitrye trīṇyekaṃ cobhayoḥ pṛthak // GarP_1,99.9 //
analyzed: dvau prāc udak pitrye trīṇi ekam ca ubhayoḥ pṛthak
mātāmahānām api evam tantram vā vaiśvadevikam
hasta prakṣālanam dattvā viṣṭara arthe kuśān api
āvāhya tad anujñātaḥ viśva devāsaḥ eti ṛcā
yavaiḥ annam vikīrya atha bhājane sa pavitrake
śannodevyā payaḥ kṣiptvā yavaḥ si iti yavān tathā

original: yādivyā iti mantreṇa hasteṣveva viniḥ kṣipet // GarP_1,99.12 //
analyzed: iti mantreṇa hasteṣu eva viniḥ kṣipet
gandha udake tathā dīpa mālya dāma pradīpakam
apasavyam tatas kṛtvā pitṝṇām apradakṣiṇam
dviguṇān tu kuśān dattvā uśantaḥ tvā iti ṛcā pitṝn
āvāhya tadanu jñātaḥ japet āyantunaḥ tatas
yava arthaḥ tu tilaiḥ kāryaḥ kuryāt arghya ādi pūrvavat

original: dattvārghyaṃ saṃstravāṃsteṣāṃ pātre kṛtvā vidhānataḥ // GarP_1,99.15 //
analyzed: dattvā arghyam saṃstravān teṣām pātre kṛtvā vidhānataḥ
pitṛbhyaḥ sthānam asi iti nyubjam pātram karoti adhas

original: agnau kariṣya ādāya pṛcchatyannaṃ ghṛplutam // GarP_1,99.16 //
analyzed: agnau kariṣye ādāya pṛcchati annam ghṛ plutam
kuruṣva iti tathā uktā usau hutvā agnau pitṛyajña vat
huta śeṣam pradadyāt ca bhājaneṣu samāhitaḥ
yathā lābha upapanneṣu raupyeṣu ca viśeṣataḥ
dattvā annam pṛthivī pātram iti pātra abhimantraṇam
kṛtve daṃviṣṇuḥ iti evam dvija aṅguṣṭham niveśayet
sa vyāhṛtim ca gāyattrīm madhuvāta iti ṛcaḥ tathā
japtvā yathāsukham vācyam bhuñjīran te vāgyatāḥ
annam iṣṭam haviṣyam ca dadyāt a krodhana utvaraḥ
ātṛpteḥ tu pavitrāṇi japtvā pūrva japam tathā

original: annamādāya tṛptāḥ sthaḥ śeṣaṃ caivānumantrya ca // GarP_1,99.21 //
analyzed: annam ādāya tṛptāḥ sthaḥ śeṣam ca eva anumantrya ca
tat annam vikiret bhūmau dadyāt ca apaḥ sakṛt sakṛt
sarvam annam upādāya sa tilam dakṣiṇāmukhaḥ
ucchiṣṭa sannidhau piṇḍān pradadyāt pitṛ yajña vat
mātāmahānām api avam dadyāt ācamanam tatas
svasti vācyam tatas dadyāt akṣayya udakam eva ca

original: dattvā ca dakṣiṇāṃ śaktyā svadhākāramudāharet // GarP_1,99.24 //
analyzed: dattvā ca dakṣiṇām śaktyā svadhākāram udāharet
vācyatām inī anujñātaḥ pitṛbhyaḥ ca svadhā ucyatām

original: viprairastu svadhetyukto bhūmau siñcettato jalam // GarP_1,99.25 //
analyzed: vipraiḥ astu svadhā iti uktaḥ bhūmau siñcet tatas jalam
prīyantām iti ca āha evam viśvedevyam jalam dadat

original: dātāro no 'bhivardhantāṃ vedāḥ santatireva ca // GarP_1,99.26 //
analyzed: dātāraḥ naḥ bhivardhantām vedāḥ santatiḥ eva ca

original: śraddhā ca no mā vyagamadvahu deyaṃ ca no 'stviti /
analyzed: śraddhā ca naḥ mā vyagamat vahu deyam ca naḥ stu iti

original: ityutkrotkrā priyā vācaḥ praṇipatya visarjayet // GarP_1,99.27 //
analyzed: iti utkrā utkrā priyāḥ vācaḥ praṇipatya visarjayet
vājevāje iti prītyā pitṛ pūrvam visarjanam
yasmin te saṃstravāḥ pūrvam arghya pātre nipātitāḥ
pitṛpātram tat uttānam kṛtvā viprān visarjayet
pradakṣiṇam anuvrajya bhuñjīta pitṛ sevitam

original: brahmacārī bhavettāṃ tu rajanīṃ bhāryayā maha /
analyzed: brahmacārī bhavet tām tu rajanīm bhāryayā maha

original: evaṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā vṛddhau nāndīmukhānapi // GarP_1,99.30 //
analyzed: evam pradakṣiṇam kṛtvā vṛddhau nāndīmukhān api
yajet tad adhi karkandhū miśrāḥ piṇḍāḥ śritāḥ
ekoddiṣṭam daiva hīnam eka anna eka pavitrakam
āvāhana agnaukaraṇa rahitam tu apasavyavat
upatiṣṭhatām iti akṣayya sthāne viprān visarjayet
sma ha
gandhaḥ daka tilaiḥ miśram kuryāt pātra catuṣṭayam
arghya artham pitṛpātreṣu pretapātram prasecayet

original: yesamānā iti dvābhyāṃ śeṣaṃ pūrvavadācaret // GarP_1,99.34 //
analyzed: iti dvābhyām śeṣam pūrvavat ācaret
etat sapiṇḍīkaraṇam ekoddiṣṭam striyāḥ api
arvāk sapiṇḍīkaraṇam yasya saṃvatsarāt bhavet
tasya api annam sodakumbham dadyāt saṃvatsaram dvijaḥ

original: piṇḍāṃśca goja viprebhyo dadyādgnau jale 'pi vā // GarP_1,99.36 //
analyzed: piṇḍān ca viprebhyaḥ dadyāt agnau jale vā

original: haviṣyānnena vai māsaṃ pāyasena tu vatsaram /
analyzed: haviṣya annena vai māsam pāyasena tu vatsaram
mātsya hāriṇaka aurabhra śākuna chāga pārṣataiḥ
aiṇa raurava vā rāha śāśa māṃsaiḥ yathākramam
māsa vṛddhyā api tuṣyanti dattaiḥ iha pitāmahāḥ
dadyāt varṣā trayodaśyām maghāsu ca na saṃśayaḥ
pratipad prabhṛtiṣu evam kanyāḥ dīn śrāddha daḥ labhet
śastreṇa nihatānām tu caturdaśyām pradīyate

original: svargaṃ hyapatyamojaśca śauryaṃ kṣetraṃ balaṃ tathā // GarP_1,99.40 //
analyzed: svargam hi apatyam ojaḥ ca śauryam kṣetram balam tathā

original: putraśraiṣṭyaṃ sa saubhāgyaṃ samṛddhiṃ mukhyatāṃ śubham /
analyzed: putra śraiṣṭyam sa saubhāgyam samṛddhim mukhya tām śubham
pravṛtta cakra tām ca eva vāṇijya prabhṛtīn tathā
arogi tvam yaśaḥ vīta śoka tām paramām gatim

original: dhanaṃ vidyāṃ ca vāksiddhiṃ kupyaṃ gojāvikaṃ tathā // GarP_1,99.42 //
analyzed: dhanam vidyām ca vāc siddhim kupyam gojāvikam tathā
aśvān āyuḥ ca vidhivat yaḥ śrāddham saṃprayacchati
kṛttikā ādi bharaṇī antam sa kāmān prāpnuyāt imān
vastra ādyāḥ prīṇayanti eva naram śrāddha kṛtam dvijāḥ

original: āyuḥ prajā dhanaṃ vidyāṃ svargamokṣasukhāni ca // GarP_1,99.44 //
analyzed: āyuḥ prajāḥ dhanam vidyām svarga mokṣa sukhāni ca

original: prayacchati yathā rājyaṃ prītyā nityaṃ pitāmahaḥ // GarP_1,99.45 //
analyzed: prayacchati yathā rājyam prītyā nityam pitāmahaḥ

original: iti śrāgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe yājñavalkyoktaśrāddhavidhinirūpaṇaṃ nāma navanavatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrā gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe yājñavalkyoktaśrāddhavidhinirūpaṇam nāma navanavatitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrā garuḍa mahā purāṇam
yājñavalkyaḥ uvāca
vināyaka upasṛṣṭasya lakṣaṇāni nibodhata
svapne vagāhate tyartham jalam muṇḍān ca paśyati
vimanāḥ viphala ārambhaḥ

original: rājā rājyaṃ kumārī ca patiṃ putraṃ ca gurviṇī // GarP_1,100.2 //
analyzed: rājā rājyam kumārī ca patim putram ca gurviṇī
na āpnuyāt snāpanam tasya puṇye hni vidhi pūrvakam
gaurasarṣapa kalkena sa ājyena utsāritasya tu
sarva auṣadhaiḥ sarva gandhaiḥ vilipta śirasaḥ tathā
bhadrāsana upaviṣṭasya svasti vācyam dvijān śubhān

original: mṛttikāṃ rocanāṃ gandhān gugguluṃ cāpsu niḥ kṣipet /
analyzed: mṛttikām rocanām gandhān guggulum ca apsu niḥ kṣipet
yāḥ āhṛtāḥ eka varṇaiḥ caturbhiḥ kalaśaiḥ hradāt
carmaṇi ānuḍuhe rakte sthāpyam bhadrāsane tathā
sahasrākṣam śatadhāram ṛṣibhiḥ pāvanam smṛtam
tena tvām abhiṣiñcāmi pāvamānyaḥ punantu te

original: bhagaṃ tu varuṇo rājā bhagaṃ sūryo bṛhaspatiḥ // GarP_1,100.7 //
analyzed: bhagam tu varuṇaḥ rājā bhagam sūryaḥ bṛhaspatiḥ
bhagam indraḥ ca vāyuḥ ca bhagam saptarṣayaḥ daduḥ

original: yatte keśeṣu daurbhāgyaṃ sīmante yacca mūrdhani // GarP_1,100.8 //
analyzed: yat te keśeṣu daurbhāgyam sīmante yat ca mūrdhani
lalāṭe karṇayoḥ akṣṇoḥ āpaḥ tat ghnuntu te sadā

original: snātasya sārṣapaṃ tailaṃ snuveṇaudumbareṇa tu // GarP_1,100.9 //
analyzed: snātasya sārṣapam tailam snuveṇa audumbareṇa tu
juhuyāt mūrdhani kuśān savyena parigṛhya ca
mitaḥ ca samitaḥ ca eva tathā śāla kaṭaṅkaṭau
kuṣmāṇḍaḥ rājaputraḥ ca ante svāhā samanvitaiḥ
dadyāt catuṣpathe bhūmau kuśān āstīrya sarvaśas
kṛta a kṛtān taṇḍulān ca palala odanam eva ca

original: puṣpaṃ citraṃ sugandhaṃ ca surāṃ ca trividhāmapi // GarP_1,100.12 //
analyzed: puṣpam citram su gandham ca surām ca trividhām api
mūlakam pūrikā apūpam

original: dadhi pāyasamannaṃ ca guḍapiṣṭaṃ samodakam // GarP_1,100.13 //
analyzed: dadhi pāyasam annam ca guḍapiṣṭam samodakam
etān sarvān upāhṛtya bhūmau kṛtvā tatas śiraḥ
ambikām upatiṣṭhet ca dadyāt arghyam kṛtāñjaliḥ
dūrvā sarṣapa puṣpaiḥ ca putra janmabhiḥ antatas
kṛta svastyayanam ca eva prārthayet ambikām satīm

original: rūpaṃ dehi yaśodehi bhagaṃ bhagavati / dehi me /
analyzed: rūpam dehi yaśaḥ dehi bhagam bhagavati dehi me

original: putrāndehi śriyaṃ dehi sarvānkāmāṃśca dehi me // GarP_1,100.16 //
analyzed: putrān dehi śriyam dehi sarvān kāmān ca dehi me
brāhmaṇān bhojayet paścāt śukla vastra anulepanaiḥ
vastra yugma aṅguroḥ dadyāḥ saṃpūjya ca grahān tathā
śreyaḥ karma phalam vindyāt sūrya arcana rataḥ tathā

original: iti śrāgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe yājñavalkloktagaṇapatikalpanirūpaṇaṃ nāma śatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrā gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe yājñavalkloktagaṇapatikalpanirūpaṇam nāma śatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
yājñavalkyaḥ uvāca
śrī kāmaḥ śānti kāmaḥ vā graha dṛṣṭi abhicāravān

original: grahayañjñaṃ samaṃ kuryādgahāścaite budhaiḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,101.1 //
analyzed: grahayan jñam samam kuryāt gahāḥ ca ete budhaiḥ smṛtāḥ
sūryaḥ somaḥ maṅgalaḥ ca budhaḥ ca eva bṛhaspatiḥ

original: śukraḥ śanaiścaro rāhuḥ keturgrahagaṇāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,101.2 //
analyzed: śukraḥ śanaiścaraḥ rāhuḥ ketuḥ graha gaṇāḥ smṛtāḥ
tāmrakāt sphāṭikāt raktacandanāt svarṇakāt ubhau
rajatāt ayasaḥ sīsāt kāṃsyāt varṇān nibodhata

original: raktaḥ śuklastathā raktaḥ pītaḥ pītaḥ sitositaḥ /
analyzed: raktaḥ śuklaḥ tathā raktaḥ pītaḥ pītaḥ sita usitaḥ

original: kṛṣṇaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ kramādvarṇā dravyāṇi munayastataḥ // GarP_1,101.4 //
analyzed: kṛṣṇaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ kramāt varṇāḥ dravyāṇi munayaḥ tatas
sthāpayet gaha varṇāni homa artham pralikhet paṭe
snāpayet homayet ca eva graha dravyaiḥ vidhānataḥ

original: suvarṇāni pradeyāni vāsāṃsi susumāni ca // GarP_1,101.5 //
analyzed: suvarṇāni pradeyāni vāsāṃsi su sumāni ca
gandhāḥ ca balayaḥ ca eva dhūpaḥ deyaḥ ca gugguluḥ
kartavyāḥ tatra mantraiḥ ca caravaḥ pratidaivatam
ākṛṣṇena agniḥ mūrdhā divaḥ kakud
ubdudhyasva iti juhuyāt ebhiḥ eva yathākramam
sarve annāt parisutam
śannodevī kayānaḥ ca ketuṅkraṇvan iti kramāt
arkaḥ palāśaḥ khadiraḥ tu apāmārgaḥ pippalaḥ

original: audumbaraḥ śamī dūrvā kuśāśca samidhaḥ kramāt // GarP_1,101.9 //
analyzed: audumbaraḥ śamī dūrvā kuśāḥ ca samidhaḥ kramāt
hotavyāḥ madhu sarpirbhyām dadhnā ca eva samanvitaḥ

original: guḍaudanaṃ pāyasaṃ ca haviṣyaṃ kṣīraṣāṣṭikam // GarP_1,101.10 //
analyzed: guḍa odanam pāyasam ca haviṣyam kṣīraṣāṣṭikam
dadhi odanam haviḥ pūpān māṃsam citrānnam eva ca
dadyāt gaha kramāt etān grahebhyaḥ bhājanam tatas
dhenuḥ śaṅkhaḥ tathā anaḍvān hema vāsaḥ hayaḥ tathā

original: kṛṣṇā gaurāyasaṃ chāga etā vai dakṣiṇāḥ kramāt /
analyzed: kṛṣṇā gauḥ āyasam chāgaḥ etāḥ vai dakṣiṇāḥ kramāt

original: grahāḥ pūjyāḥ sadā yasmādrajyādi prāpyate phalam // GarP_1,101.12 //
analyzed: grahāḥ pūjyāḥ sadā yasmāt rajyā ādi prāpyate phalam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe yājñavalkyoktagrahaśāntinirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe yājñavalkyoktagrahaśāntinirūpaṇam nāma ekottaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
yājñavalkyaḥ uvāca
vānaprastha āśramam vakṣye tat śṛṇvantu mahā ṛṣayaḥ

original: putreṣu bhāryāṃ niḥ kṣipya vanaṃ gacchetsahaiva vā // GarP_1,102.1 //
analyzed: putreṣu bhāryām niḥ kṣipya vanam gacchet saha eva vā
vānaprasthaḥ brahmacārī sa agniḥ sa upāsanaḥ kṣamī
a phāla kṛṣṭena agnīn ca pitṛ deva atithīn tathā
bhṛtyān tu tarpayet śmaśru jaṭā loma bhṛt ātmavān
dāntaḥ triṣavaṇa snāyī nivṛttaḥ ca pratigrahāt
svādhyāyavān dhyāna śīlaḥ sarva bhūta hita rataḥ tiḥ

original: ahno māsasya madhye vā kuryādvārthaparigraham // GarP_1,102.4 //
analyzed: ahnaḥ māsasya madhye vā kuryāt vā artha parigraham
kṛtam tyajet āśvayuje yuñjet kālam vrata ādinā
pakṣe māse thavā aśnīyāt dantolūkhalikaḥ bhavet
svapet bhūmau karma kuryāt phala ādinā
grīṣme pañcāgni madhya sthaḥ varṣāsu sthaṇḍileśayaḥ
ārdra vāsāḥ tu hemante yoga abhyāsāt dinam nayet
yaḥ kaṇṭakaiḥ vitudati candanaiḥ yaḥ ca limpati

original: akruddhaḥ parituṣṭaśca samastasya ca tasya ca // GarP_1,102.7 //
analyzed: akruddhaḥ parituṣṭaḥ ca samastasya ca tasya ca

original: iti śrīgāruje mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe yājñavalkyoktavānaprasthadharmanirūpaṇaṃ nāma dvyuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruje mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe yājñavalkyoktavānaprasthadharmanirūpaṇam nāma dvyuttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
yājñavalkyaḥ uvāca
bhikṣoḥ dharmam pravakṣyāmi itas nibodhata sattamāḥ
vanāt gṛhāt vā kṛtvā iṣṭim sarvavedasa dakṣiṇām
prājāpatya anta dante agnim āropya ca ātmani
sarva bhūta hitaḥ śāntaḥ tridaṇḍī sa kamaṇḍaluḥ
sarva ārāmam parivrajya bhikṣā arthaḥ grāmam āśrayet
apramattaḥ caret bhaikṣyam sāyāhne na abhilakṣitaḥ
rohite bhikṣukaiḥ grāme yātrām atra mala ulupaḥ
bhavet paramahaṃsaḥ vā ekadaṇḍī yama āditaḥ
siddha yogaḥ tyajan deham amṛta tvam iha āpnuyāt
dāta atithi priyaḥ jñānī gṛhī śrāddhe pimucyate

original: iti śrāgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe yājñavalkyoktavānaprasthasannyāsadharmanirūpaṇaṃ nāma tryuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrā gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe yājñavalkyoktavānaprasthasannyāsadharmanirūpaṇam nāma tryuttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrā garuḍa mahā purāṇam
yājñavalkyaḥ uvāca
narakāt patākā udbhūtāt kṣayāt pāpasya kamaṇaḥ

original: brahmahā śvā kharoṣṭraḥ syādbheko yakaḥ surāpyapi // GarP_1,104.1 //
analyzed: brahma hā śvā khara uṣṭraḥ syāt bhekaḥ yakaḥ surāpī api
svarṇa coraḥ kṛmiḥ kīṭaḥ tṛṇa ādiḥ guru talpa gaḥ
kṣaya rogī śyāva dantaḥ kunakhī śipiviṣṭakaḥ
brahmahatyā kramāt syuḥ ca tat sarvam vā śiśeḥ bhavet
anna hartā mayāvī syāt mūkaḥ vāc apahārakaḥ
dhānya hāri atirikta aṅgaḥ piśunaḥ pūti nāsikaḥ
taila āhārī taila pāyī pūti vaktraḥ tu sūcakaḥ

original: brahmasvaṃ kanyakāṃ krītvā vane rakṣo bhavedvṛṣaḥ /
analyzed: brahma svam kanyakām krītvā vane rakṣaḥ bhavet vṛṣaḥ
ratna hṛt hīna jātaḥ syāt patra śāka haraḥ śikhī
guccham cucundarī hṛtvā dhānya hṛt mūṣakaḥ bhavet

original: phalaṃ kapiḥ paśūnhṛtvā tvajā kākaḥ payastathā // GarP_1,104.6 //
analyzed: phalam kapiḥ paśūn hṛtvā tu ajā kākaḥ payaḥ tathā

original: māṃsaṃ gṛdhraḥ paṭaṃ śvitrī cīrī lavaṇahārakaḥ /
analyzed: māṃsam gṛdhraḥ paṭam śvitrī cīrī lavaṇa hārakaḥ

original: yathākarma phalaṃ prāpya tiryaktvaṃ kālaparyayāt // GarP_1,104.7 //
analyzed: yathākarma phalam prāpya tiryaktvam kāla paryayāt
jāyante lakṣaṇa bhraṣṭāḥ daridrāḥ puruṣa adhamāḥ

original: tato niṣkaluṣībhūtā kule mahati yoginaḥ // GarP_1,104.8 //
analyzed: tatas niṣkaluṣībhūtā kule mahati yoginaḥ
jāyante lakṣaṇa upetāḥ dhana dhānya samanvitāḥ

original: iti śrāgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe yājñavalkyoktakarmavipākanirūpaṇaṃ nāma caturuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrā gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe yājñavalkyoktakarmavipākanirūpaṇam nāma caturuttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
vihitasya ananuṣṭhānāt ninditasya ca sevanāt
anigrahāt ca indriyāṇām naraḥ patanam ṛcchati
tasmāt yatnena kartavyam prāyaścittam viśuddhaye
evam asya antarātmā ca lokaḥ ca eva
lokaḥ prasīdet ātmā evam prāyaścittaiḥ agha kṣayaḥ
prāyaścittam akurvāṇāḥ paścāttāpa vivarjitāḥ
narakān yānti pāpāḥ vai mahāraurava rauravān
tāmistram lohaśaṅkum ca pūtigandhasamākulam
haṃsābham lohitodam ca sañjīvana nadīpatham

original: avīciṃ kumbhīpākaṃ ca yānti pāpā hyapuṇyataḥ /
analyzed: avīcim kumbhīpākam ca yānti pāpāḥ hi apuṇyataḥ

original: brahmahā madyapaḥ steyī saṃyogī gurutalpagaḥ // GarP_1,105.6 //
analyzed: brahma hā madyapaḥ steyī saṃyogī guru talpa gaḥ
guru nindā veda nindā brahma hatyā same hi ubhe
niṣiddha bhakṣaṇam jihma kriyā caraṇam eva ca
rajasvalā mukha āsvādaḥ surā pāna samāni tu
aśva ratna ādi haraṇam suvarṇa steya saṃmitam
sakhi bhāryā kumārīṣu sva yoniṣu antyajāsu ca

original: sagotrāsu tathā strīṣu gurutalpasamaṃ smṛtam // GarP_1,105.9 //
analyzed: sagotrāsu tathā strīṣu guru talpa samam smṛtam

original: pituḥ svasāraṃ mātuśca mātulānīṃ snuṣāma pi /
analyzed: pituḥ svasāram mātuḥ ca mātulānīm snuṣām pi
mātuḥ sapatnīm bhaginīm ācārya tanayām tathā
ācārya patnīm sva sutām gacchan tu guru talpa gaḥ

original: chittvā liṅgaṃ vadhastasya sakāmāyāḥ striyāstathā // GarP_1,105.11 //
analyzed: chittvā liṅgam vadhaḥ tasya sa kāmāyāḥ striyāḥ tathā
go vadhaḥ vrātya tā steyam ṛṇānām ca parikriyā
anāhitāgni tā paṇya vikrayaḥ parivedanam
bhṛtyāḥ ca adhyayana ādānam bhṛtaka adhyā panan tathā
pāradāryam pārivittyam vārdhuṣyam lavaṇa kriyā
sat śūdra viś kṣattrabandhoḥ nindita artha upajīvi tā

original: nāstikyaṃ vratalopaśca śūlyaṃ gośveva vikrayaḥ // GarP_1,105.14 //
analyzed: nāstikyam vrata lopaḥ ca śūlyam vikrayaḥ
pitṛ mātṛ suhṛd tyāgaḥ taḍāga ārāma vikrayaḥ
ca eva parivindaka yājanam
kanyā pradānam tasya eva kauṭilyam vrata lopanam
ātmanā arthe kriyā ārambhaḥ madyapa strī niṣevaṇam
svādhyāya agni suta tyāgaḥ bāndhava tyāgaḥ eva ca
asat śāstra abhigamanam krayaḥ
upapāpāni ca uktāni prāyaścittam nibodhata

original: śiraḥ kapāladhvajavān bhikṣāśī karma vedayan // GarP_1,105.18 //
analyzed: śiraḥ kapāla dhvajavān bhikṣāśī karma vedayan
brahma hā dvādaśa samāḥ mita bhuj śuddhim āpnuyāt

original: lomabhyaḥ svāheti ca vā lomaprabhṛti vai tanum // GarP_1,105.19 //
analyzed: lomabhyaḥ svāhā iti ca vā loma prabhṛti vai tanum
majjā antām juhuyāt vā api sva sva mantraiḥ yathākramam
śuddhiḥ syāt brāhmaṇa trāṇāt kṛtvā evam śuddhiḥ eva ca

original: nirātaṅkaṃ dvijaṃ gāṃ ca brāhmaṇārthe hato 'pi vā /
analyzed: nirātaṅkam dvijam gām ca brāhmaṇa arthe vā

original: araṇye niyato juptvā triḥ kṛtvo vedasaṃhitām // GarP_1,105.21 //
analyzed: araṇye niyataḥ tris kṛtvas veda saṃhitām

original: sarasvatīṃ vā saṃsevyaṃ dhanaṃ pātre samarpayet /
analyzed: sarasvatīm vā saṃsevyam dhanam pātre samarpayet
caret brahma haṇaḥ vratam
garbha hā vā yathāvarṇam tathā ātreyīniṣū su danam
caret bratam a hatvā api ghātana artham upāgataḥ
dviguṇam savana sthe tu brāhmaṇe vratam ācaret
surā ambu ghṛta go mūtram pītvā śuddhiḥ surāpiṇaḥ

original: agnivarṇaṃ ghṛtaṃ vāpi cīravāsa jaṭī bhavet /
analyzed: agnivarṇam ghṛtam vā api cīra vāsa jaṭī bhavet
vratam brahma haṇaḥ kuryāt punar saṃskāram arhati
retaḥ viṣ mūtra pānāt ca surā pā brāhmaṇī tathā
pati loka paribhraṣṭā gṛdhrī syāt sūkarī śunī
