original: ṣaṣṭhe catura hācchuddhiḥ saptame ca dinatrayam /
analyzed: ṣaṣṭhe saptame ca dina trayam

original: deśāntare mṛte bāle sadyaḥ śuddhiryato mṛte // GarP_1,107.14 //
analyzed: deśa antare mṛte bāle sadyas śuddhiḥ yatas mṛte

original: ajātadantā ye bālā ye ca garbhādviniḥ sṛtāḥ /
analyzed: a jāta dantāḥ ye bālāḥ ye ca garbhāt viniḥ sṛtāḥ

original: na teṣāmagnisaṃskāro na piṇḍaṃ nodakakriyā // GarP_1,107.15 //
analyzed: na teṣām agni saṃskāraḥ na piṇḍam na udakakriyā

original: yadi garbho vipadyata stravate vāpi yoṣitaḥ /
analyzed: yadi garbhaḥ vipadyate stravate vā api yoṣitaḥ
yāvat māsam sthitaḥ garbhaḥ tāvat dināni sūtakam
ā nāma karaṇāt sadyas ā cūḍā antāt aharniśam
ā vratāt tu tri rātreṇa tad ūrdhvan daśabhiḥ dinaiḥ
ā caturthāt bhavet stravaḥ pātaḥ pañcama ṣaṣṭhayoḥ
brahmacaryāt agnihotrāt na aśuddhiḥ saṅga varjanāt
śilpinaḥ kāravaḥ vaidyāḥ dāsī dāsāḥ ca bhṛtyakāḥ

original: agnimāñchrotriyo rājā sadyaḥ śaucāḥ prakīrtitāḥ // GarP_1,107.19 //
analyzed: agnimān śrotriyaḥ rājā sadyas śaucāḥ prakīrtitāḥ
daśa ahāt śudhyate mātā snānāt sūte pitā śuciḥ

original: saṅgātsūtau sūtakaṃ syādupaspṛśya pitā śuciḥ // GarP_1,107.20 //
analyzed: saṅgāt sūtau sūtakam syāt upaspṛśya pitā śuciḥ
vivāha utsava yajñeṣu antarā mṛta sūtake
pūrva saṃkalpitāt anya varjanam ca vidhīyate
mṛtena śudhyate sūtiḥ mṛta vat jātakam janau
go graha ādau vipannānām eka rātram tu sūtakam
anātha preta vahanāt prāṇāyāmena śudhyati
preta śūdrasya vahanāt tri rātram aśuciḥ bhavet
ātmaghāti viṣa udvandha kṛmi daṣṭe na saṃskṛtiḥ

original: gohataṃ kṛmidaṣṭaṃ ca spṛṣṭvā kṛcchreṇa śudhyati // GarP_1,107.24 //
analyzed: go hatam kṛmi daṣṭam ca spṛṣṭvā kṛcchreṇa śudhyati
aduṣṭa apatitam bhāryā yauvane yā parityajet

original: saptajanma bhavetstrītvaṃ vaidhavyaṃ ca punaḥ punaḥ // GarP_1,107.25 //
analyzed: sapta janma bhavet strī tvam vaidhavyam ca punar punar

original: bālahatyā tvagamanādṛtau ca strī tu sūkari /
analyzed: bāla hatyā tu agamanāt ṛtau ca strī tu sūkari
agamyāḥ vrata kāriṇyaḥ bhraṣṭa pāna udaka kriyāḥ

original: aurasaḥ kṣetrajaḥ putraḥ pitṛjau piṇḍadau pituḥ /
analyzed: aurasaḥ kṣetrajaḥ putraḥ pitṛ jau piṇḍa dau pituḥ

original: parivittestu kṛcchraṃ syātkanyāyāḥ kṛcchrameva ca // GarP_1,107.27 //
analyzed: parivitteḥ tu kṛcchram syāt kanyāyāḥ kṛcchram eva ca
atikṛcchram caret dātā hotā cāndrāyaṇam caret
kubja vāmana ṣaṇḍeṣu gadgadeṣu jaḍeṣu ca
jātyandha badhire mūke na doṣaḥ parivedane

original: naṣṭe mṛte pravrajite klībe vā patite patau // GarP_1,107.29 //
analyzed: naṣṭe mṛte pravrajite klībe vā patite patau
pañcasu āpatsu nārīṇām patiḥ anyaḥ vidhīyate

original: bhartrā sahamṛtā nārī romābdāni vaseddivi // GarP_1,107.30 //
analyzed: bhartrā sahamṛtā nārī roma abdāni vaset divi
śva ādi daṣṭaḥ tu gāyattryāḥ japāt śuddhaḥ bhavet naraḥ
dāhyaḥ loka agninā vipraḥ cāṇḍāla ādyaiḥ hataḥ gnimān

original: kṣīraiḥ prakṣālya tasyāsthi svāgninā mantrato dahet /
analyzed: kṣīraiḥ prakṣālya tasya asthi sva agninā mantratas dahet

original: pravāse tu mṛte bhūyaḥ kṛtvā kuśamayaṃ dahet // GarP_1,107.32 //
analyzed: pravāse tu mṛte bhūyas kṛtvā kuśa mayam dahet
kṛṣṇājine samāstīrya ṣaḍ śatāni palāśa jān

original: śamīṃ śiśre viniḥ kṣipya araṇiṃ vṛṣaṇe kṣipet // GarP_1,107.33 //
analyzed: śamīm viniḥ kṣipya araṇim vṛṣaṇe kṣipet
kaṇḍam dakṣiṇa haste tu vāma haste tathā upabhṛt

original: pārśve tūlūkhalaṃ dadyātpṛṣṭhe tu musalaṃ dadet // GarP_1,107.34 //
analyzed: pārśve tu ulūkhalam dadyāt pṛṣṭhe tu musalam dadet
niḥ kṣipya dṛṣadam taṇḍula ājya tilān mukhe

original: śrotra ca prokṣaṇīṃ dādyadājyasthālīṃ ca cakṣuṣoḥ // GarP_1,107.35 //
analyzed: ca prokṣaṇīm ca cakṣuṣoḥ

original: karṇe netre mukhe ghrāṇe hiraṇyaśakalān kṣipet /
analyzed: karṇe netre mukhe ghrāṇe hiraṇya śakalān kṣipet
agnihotra upakaraṇāt brahma loka gatiḥ bhavet
asau svargāya lokāya svāhā iti ājya āhutiḥ sakṛt
haṃsa sārasa krauñcānām cakravākam ca kukruṭam
maya rameṣa ghātī ca ahar rātreṇa śudhyati
pakṣiṇaḥ sakalān hatvā ahorātreṇa śudhyati
sarvān catuṣpadān hatvā ahorātraḥ sitaḥ japet
śūdram hatvā caret kṛcchram atikṛcchram tu vaiśya hā

original: kṣattraṃ cāndrāyaṇaṃ vipraṃ dvāviṃśātriṃśamāhare (vahe) t // GarP_1,107.39 //
analyzed: kṣattram cāndrāyaṇam vipram dvāviṃśātriṃśam āhare vahe

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākye ācārakāṇḍe parāśaroktadharmanirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākye ācāra kāṇḍe parāśaroktadharmanirūpaṇam nāma saptottaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
sūtaḥ uvāca
nīti sāram pravakṣyāmi arthaśāstra ādi saṃśritam
rāja ādibhyaḥ hitam puṇyam āyuḥ svarga ādi dāyakam

original: sadbhiḥ saṅgaṃ prakurvīta siddhikāmaḥ sadā naraḥ /
analyzed: sadbhiḥ saṅgam prakurvīta siddhi kāmaḥ sadā naraḥ
na asadbhiḥ ihalokāya paralokāya vā hitam
varjayet kṣudra saṃvādam aduṣṭasya tu darśanam

original: virodhaṃ saha mitreṇa saṃprītiṃ śatrusevinā // GarP_1,108.3 //
analyzed: virodham saha mitreṇa saṃprītim śatru sevinā
mūrkha śiṣya upadeśena duṣṭa strī bharaṇena ca
duṣṭānām saṃprayogeṇa
brāhmaṇam bāliśam kṣattra maya uddhāram viśam jaḍam
śūdram akṣara saṃyuktam dūratas parivarjayet
kālena ripuṇā asandhiḥ kāle mitreṇa vigrahaḥ
kārya kāraṇam āśritya kālam kṣipati paṇḍitaḥ

original: kālaḥ pacati bhūtāni kālaḥ saṃharate prajāḥ /
analyzed: kālaḥ pacati bhūtāni kālaḥ saṃharate prajāḥ

original: kālaḥ supteṣu jāgarti kālo hi duratikramaḥ // GarP_1,108.7 //
analyzed: kālaḥ supteṣu jāgarti kālaḥ hi duratikramaḥ

original: kāleṣu harate vīryaṃ kāle garbhe ca vartate /
analyzed: kāleṣu harate vīryam kāle garbhe ca vartate

original: kālo janayate sṛṣṭiṃ punaḥ kālo 'pi saṃharet // GarP_1,108.8 //
analyzed: kālaḥ janayate sṛṣṭim punar kālaḥ u pi saṃharet
kālaḥ sūkṣma gatiḥ nityam dvividhaḥ ca iha bhāvyate
sthūla saṃgraha cāreṇa sūkṣma cāra antareṇa ca
nīti sāram sura indrāya imam ūca bṛhaspatiḥ
sarva jñaḥ yena ca indraḥ bhūt daityān hatvā āpnuyāt divam
rāja ṛṣi brāhmaṇaiḥ kāryam deva vipra ādi pūjanam
aśvamedhena yaṣṭabyam mahāpātaka nāśanam

original: uttamaiḥ saha sāṅgatyaṃ paṇḍitaiḥ saha satkathām /
analyzed: uttamaiḥ saha sāṅgatyam paṇḍitaiḥ saha sat kathām

original: alubdhaiḥ saha mitratvaṃ kurvāṇo nāvasīdati // GarP_1,108.12 //
analyzed: alubdhaiḥ saha mitra tvam kurvāṇaḥ na avasīdati
parīvādam para artham ca parihāsam para striyam

original: paraveśmani vāsaṃ ca na kurvīta kadācana // GarP_1,108.13 //
analyzed: para veśmani vāsam ca na kurvīta kadācana
paraḥ pi bandhuḥ api ahitaḥ paraḥ
ahitaḥ deha jaḥ vyādhiḥ hitam āraṇyam auṣadham

original: sa bandhuryo hite yuktaḥ sa pitā yastu poṣakaḥ /
analyzed: sa bandhuḥ yaḥ hite yuktaḥ sa pitā yaḥ tu poṣakaḥ

original: tanmitraṃ yatra viśvāsaḥ sa deśo yatra jīvyate // GarP_1,108.15 //
analyzed: tat mitram yatra viśvāsaḥ sa deśaḥ yatra jīvyate

original: sa bhṛtyo yo vidheyastu tadbījaṃ yatprarohati /
analyzed: sa bhṛtyaḥ yaḥ vidheyaḥ tu tat bījam yat prarohati

original: sā bhāryā yā priyaṃ brūte sa putro yastu jīvati // GarP_1,108.16 //
analyzed: sā bhāryā yā priyam brūte sa putraḥ yaḥ tu jīvati

original: sa jīvati guṇā yasya dharmo yasya sa jīvati /
analyzed: sa jīvati guṇāḥ yasya dharmaḥ yasya sa jīvati

original: guṇadharmavihīno yo niṣphala tasya jīvanam // GarP_1,108.17 //
analyzed: guṇa dharma vihīnaḥ tasya jīvanam

original: sā bhāryā yā gṛhe dakṣā sā bhāryāyā priyaṃvadā /
analyzed: sā bhāryā yā gṛhe dakṣā sā bhāryāyā priyaṃvadā

original: sā bhāryā yā patiprāṇā sā bhāryā yā pativratā // GarP_1,108.18 //
analyzed: sā bhāryā yā patiprāṇā sā bhāryā yā pativratā

original: nitya snātā sugandhā ca nityaṃ ca priyavādinī /
analyzed: nitya snātā sugandhā ca nityam ca priya vādinī
alpa bhukta alpa bhāṣī ca satatam maṅgalaiḥ yutā
satatam dharma bahulā satatam ca pati priyā

original: satataṃ priyavakrī ca satataṃ tvṛtukāminī // GarP_1,108.20 //
analyzed: satatam priya vakrī ca satatam tu ṛtu kāminī
etad ādi kriyā yuktā sarva asau bhāgya vardhinī

original: yasyedṛśī bhavedbhāyyā sa devendrona mānuṣaḥ // GarP_1,108.21 //
analyzed: yasya īdṛśī bhavet bhāyyā sa deva indraḥ na mānuṣaḥ
yasya bhāryā virūpa akṣī kaśmalā kalaha priyā

original: uttarottaravādā syā sā jarā na jarā jarā // GarP_1,108.22 //
analyzed: uttara uttara vādā syā sā jarā na jarā jarā
yasya bhāryā para veśma abhikāṅkṣiṇī

original: kukriyā tyaktalajjā ca sā jarā na jarā jarā // GarP_1,108.23 //
analyzed: kukriyā tyakta lajjā ca sā jarā na jarā jarā
yasya bhāryā guṇa jñā ca bhartāram anugāminī

original: alpālpena tu santuṣṭā sā priyā na priyā priyā // GarP_1,108.24 //
analyzed: alpa alpena tu santuṣṭā sā priyā na priyā priyā
duṣṭā bhāryā śaṭham mitram bhṛtyaḥ ca uttara dāyakaḥ

original: sasarpe ca gṛhe vāsomṛtyureva na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,108.25 //
analyzed: sa sarpe ca gṛhe vāsaḥ mṛtyuḥ eva na saṃśayaḥ
tyaja durjana saṃsargam bhaja sādhu samāgamam
kuru puṇyam ahorātra smara nityam anitya tām

original: vyālīkaṇṭhapradeśāhyapi ca phaṇabhṛdbhāṣaṇā yā ca raudrī yā kṛṣṇā vyākulāgī rudhiranayanasaṃvyākulā vyāghrakalpā /
analyzed: vyālī kaṇṭha pradeśa ahi api ca phaṇabhṛt bhāṣaṇā yā ca raudrī yā kṛṣṇā rudhira nayana saṃvyākulā vyāghra kalpā

original: krodhe yaivogravaktrā sphuradanalaśikhā kākajihvā karālā sevyā na strī vidagdhā parapuragamanā bhrāntacittā virākta // GarP_1,108.27 //
analyzed: krodhe yā evā ugra vaktrā sphurat anala śikhā kāka jihvā karālā sevyā na strī vidagdhā para pura gamanā bhrānta cittā

original: saktiḥ sutoke sukṛtaṃ kṛtaghne śatiṃ ca vahnau (sītāpahau hyatapayaiva)?haime /
analyzed: saktiḥ su toke sukṛtam kṛtaghne śatim ca vahnau sītā apahau

original: utpadyate daivavaśātkadācidveśyāsu rāgo na bhavetkadācit // GarP_1,108.28 //
analyzed: utpadyate daiva vaśāt kadācid veśyāsu rāgaḥ na bhavet kadācid

original: bhujaṅgame veśmani dṛṣṭidṛṣṭe vyādhau cikitsāvinivartite ca /
analyzed: bhujaṅgame veśmani dṛṣṭi dṛṣṭe vyādhau cikitsā vinivartite ca

original: dehe ca bālyādivayo 'nvite ca kālā vṛto 'sau labhate dhṛtiṃ kaḥ // GarP_1,108.29 //
analyzed: dehe ca bālya ādi vayaḥ nvite ca labhate dhṛtim kaḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bṛhaspatiproktanītisāranirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe bṛhaspatiproktanītisāranirūpaṇam nāma aṣṭottaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
sūtaḥ uvāca
āpad arthe dhanam rakṣet dārān rakṣet dhanaiḥ api
ātmānam satatam rakṣet dāraiḥ api dhanaiḥ api
tyajet akam kulasya arthe grāmasya arthe kulam tyajet

original: grāmaṃ janapadasyārthe ātmārthe pṛthivīṃ tyajet // GarP_1,109.2 //
analyzed: grāmam janapadasya arthe ātma arthe pṛthivīm tyajet

original: varaṃ hi narake vāso na tu duścarite gṛhe /
analyzed: varam hi narake vāsaḥ na tu duścarite gṛhe
narakāt kṣīyate pāpa kugṛhāt na nivartate
calati ekena pādena tiṣṭhati ekena buddhimān

original: na parīkṣya paraṃ sthānaṃ pūrvamāyatanaṃ tyajet // GarP_1,109.4 //
analyzed: na parīkṣya param sthānam pūrvam āyatanam tyajet
tyajet deśam asat vṛttam vāsam sa upadravam tyajet
tyajet kṛpaṇa rājānam mitram māyā mayam tyajet

original: arthena kiṃ kṛpaṇahastagatena kena jñānena kiṃ bahuśaṭhāgrahasaṃkulena /
analyzed: arthena kim kṛpaṇa hasta gatena kena jñānena kim bahu śaṭha agraha saṃkulena

original: rūpeṇa kiṃ guṇaparākramavarjitena mitreṇa kiṃ vyasanakālaparāṅmukhena // GarP_1,109.6 //
analyzed: rūpeṇa kim guṇa parākrama varjitena mitreṇa kim vyasana kāla parāṅmukhena

original: adṛṣṭapūrvā bahavaḥ sahāyāḥ sarve padasthasya bhavanti mitrāḥ /
analyzed: a dṛṣṭa pūrvāḥ bahavaḥ sahāyāḥ sarve pada sthasya bhavanti mitrāḥ

original: arthairvihīnasya padacyutasya bhavatyakāle svajano 'pi śatruḥ // GarP_1,109.7 //
analyzed: arthaiḥ vihīnasya pada cyutasya bhavati akāle sva janaḥ pi śatruḥ

original: āpatsu mitraṃ jānī yādraṇe śūraṃ rahaḥ śucim /
analyzed: āpatsu mitram jānī yādraṇe śūram rahaḥ śucim

original: māryā ca vibhave kṣīṇe durbhikṣe ca priyātithim // GarP_1,109.8 //
analyzed: māryā ca vibhave kṣīṇe durbhikṣe ca priya atithim

original: vṛkṣaṃ kṣīṇaphalaṃ tyajanti vihagāḥ śuṣkaṃ saraḥ sārasānirdravyaṃ puruṣaṃ tyajanti gaṇikā bhraṣṭaṃ nṛpaṃ mantriṇaḥ /
analyzed: vṛkṣam kṣīṇa phalam tyajanti vihagāḥ śuṣkam saraḥ sārasa a nirdravyam puruṣam tyajanti gaṇikāḥ bhraṣṭam nṛpam mantriṇaḥ

original: puṣpaṃ paryuṣitaṃ tyajanti madhupāḥ dargdha vanāntaṃ mṛgāḥ sarvaḥ kāryavaśājjano hi ramate kasyāsti ko vallabhaḥ // GarP_1,109.9 //
analyzed: puṣpam paryuṣitam tyajanti madhupāḥ vanāntam mṛgāḥ sarvaḥ kārya vaśāt janaḥ hi ramate kasya asti kaḥ vallabhaḥ
lubdham artha pradānena ślādhyam añjali karmaṇā

original: mūrkhaṃ chandānuvṛttyā ca yāthātathyena paṇḍitam // GarP_1,109.10 //
analyzed: mūrkham chanda anuvṛttyā ca yāthātathyena paṇḍitam

original: sadbhāvena hi tuṣyanti devāḥ satpuruṣā dvijāḥ /
analyzed: sat bhāvena hi tuṣyanti devāḥ sat puruṣāḥ dvijāḥ
khādya pānena māna dānena paṇḍitāḥ
uttamam praṇipātena śaṭham bhedena yojayet
nīcam su alpa pradānena samam tulya parākramaiḥ

original: yasyayasya hi yo bhāvastasyatasya hitaṃ vadan /
analyzed: yasya yasya hi yaḥ bhāvaḥ tasya tasya hitam vadan
anupraviśya medhāvī kṣipram ātma vaśam nayet

original: nadīnāṃ ca nakhīnāṃ ca śṛṅgiṇāṃ śastrapāṇinām /
analyzed: nadīnām ca nakhīnām ca śṛṅgiṇām śastra pāṇinām

original: viśvāso naiva gantavyaḥ striṣu rājakuleṣu ca // GarP_1,109.14 //
analyzed: viśvāsaḥ nā eva gantavyaḥ striṣu rāja kuleṣu ca
artha nāśam manaḥ tāpam gṛhe duścaritāni ca

original: vañcanaṃ cāpa mānaṃ ca matimānna prikāśayet // GarP_1,109.15 //
analyzed: vañcanam ca apa mānam ca matimān na prikāśayet
snehaḥ nyageha vāsaḥ ca nārī sat śīla nāśanam

original: kasya doṣaḥ kule nāsti vyādhinā ko pīḍitaḥ /
analyzed: kasya doṣaḥ kule na asti vyādhinā pīḍitaḥ

original: kena na vyasanaṃ prāptaṃ śriyaḥ kasya nirantarāḥ // GarP_1,109.17 //
analyzed: kena na vyasanam prāptam śriyaḥ kasya nirantarāḥ

original: kor'thaṃ prāpya na garvito bhuvi naraḥ kasyāpadonāgatāḥ strībhiḥ kasya na khaṇḍitaṃ bhuvi manaḥ ko nāma rājñāṃ priyaḥ /
analyzed: kaḥ ṛtham prāpya na garvitaḥ bhuvi naraḥ strībhiḥ kasya na khaṇḍitam bhuvi manaḥ kaḥ nāma rājñām priyaḥ

original: kaḥ kālasya na gocarāntaragataḥ kor'tho gato gauravaṃ ko vā durjanavāgurānipatitaḥ kṣemeṇa yātaḥ pumān // GarP_1,109.18 //
analyzed: kaḥ kālasya na gocara antara gataḥ kaḥ ṛthaḥ gataḥ gauravam kaḥ vā durjana vāgurā nipatitaḥ kṣemeṇa yātaḥ pumān
suhṛd sva jana bandhuḥ na buddhiḥ yasya na ca ātmani
yasmin karmaṇi siddhe na dṛśyeta phala udayaḥ

original: vipattau ca mahadduḥkhaṃ tadvudhaḥ kathamācaret // GarP_1,109.19 //
analyzed: vipattau ca mahat duḥkham tat vudhaḥ katham ācaret

original: yasmindeśe na saṃmānaṃ na prītirna ca bāndhavāḥ /
analyzed: yasmin deśe na saṃmānam na prītiḥ na ca bāndhavāḥ

original: na ca vidyāgamaḥ kaścittaṃ deśaṃ parivarjayet // GarP_1,109.20 //
analyzed: na ca vidyā āgamaḥ kaścid tam deśam parivarjayet

original: dhanasya yasya rājato bhayaṃ na cāsti caurataḥ /
analyzed: dhanasya yasya rājataḥ bhayam na ca asti caurataḥ

original: mṛtaṃ ca yanna mucyate samarjayasva taddhanam // GarP_1,109.21 //
analyzed: mṛtam ca yat na mucyate samarjayasva tat dhanam

original: yadarjitaṃ prāṇaharaiḥ pariśramairmṛtasya taṃ vai vibhajantirikthinaḥ /
analyzed: yat arjitam prāṇa haraiḥ pariśramaiḥ mṛtasya tam vai vibhajanti rikthinaḥ

original: kṛtaṃ ca yadduṣkṛtamarthalipsayā tadeva doṣopahatasya yautukam // GarP_1,109.22 //
analyzed: kṛtam ca yat duṣkṛtam artha lipsayā tat eva doṣa upahatasya yautukam
sañcitam nihitam dravyam parāmṛśyam muhur muhur

original: ākhoriva kadaryasya dhanaṃ duḥ khāya kevalam // GarP_1,109.23 //
analyzed: ākhoḥ iva kadaryasya dhanam duḥ khāya kevalam
nagnāḥ vyasaninaḥ rūkṣāḥ kapāla aṅkita pāṇayaḥ
darśayanti iha lokasya adātuḥ phalam īdṛśam

original: śikṣayanti ca yācante dehīti kṛpaṇā janāḥ /
analyzed: śikṣayanti ca yācante dehi iti kṛpaṇāḥ janāḥ
avastheyam adānasya mā bhūt evam bhavān api

original: sañcitaṃ kratuśatairna yujyate yācitaṃ guṇavate na dīyate /
analyzed: sañcitam kratu śataiḥ na yujyate yācitam guṇavate na dīyate
tat kadarya parirakṣitam dhanam cora pārthiva gṛhe prayujyate

original: na devebhyo na viprobhyo bandhubhyo naiva cātmane /
analyzed: na devebhyaḥ na bandhubhyaḥ na eva ca ātmane
kadaryasya dhanam yāti tu agni taskara rājasu
ati kleśena ye pi arthāḥ dharmasya atikrameṇa ca

original: arervā praṇipātena mā bhūtaste kadācana // GarP_1,109.28 //
analyzed: areḥ vā praṇipātena mā bhūtaḥ te kadācana
vidyā ghātaḥ hi anabhyāsaḥ strīṇām ghātaḥ kucaila tā

original: vyādhīnāṃ bhojanaṃ jīrṇaṃ śatrorghātaḥ prapañcatā // GarP_1,109.29 //
analyzed: vyādhīnām bhojanam jīrṇam śatroḥ ghātaḥ prapañca tā
taskarasya vadhaḥ daṇḍaḥ ku mitrasya alpa bhāṣaṇam

original: pṛthak śayyā tu nārīṇāṃ brāhmaṇasyānimantraṇam // GarP_1,109.30 //
analyzed: pṛthak śayyā tu nārīṇām brāhmaṇasya a nimantraṇam

original: durjanāḥ śilpino dāsā duṣṭāśca paṭahāḥ striyaḥ /
analyzed: durjanāḥ śilpinaḥ dāsāḥ duṣṭāḥ ca paṭahāḥ striyaḥ

original: tāḍitā mārdavaṃ yānti na te satkārabhājanam // GarP_1,109.31 //
analyzed: tāḍitāḥ mārdavam yānti na te satkāra bhājanam
jānīyāt preṣaṇe bhṛtyān bāndhavān vyasana āgame

original: mitramāpadi kāle ca bhāryāñca vibhavakṣaye // GarP_1,109.32 //
analyzed: mitram āpadi kāle ca bhāryām ca vibhava kṣaye

original: strīṇāṃ dviguṇa āhāraḥ prajñā caiva caturguṇā /
analyzed: strīṇām dviguṇaḥ āhāraḥ prajñā ca eva caturguṇā
ṣaḍguṇaḥ vyavasāyaḥ ca kāmaḥ ca aṣṭaguṇaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: na svapnena jayennidrāṃ na kāmena striyaṃ jayet /
analyzed: na svapnena jayet nidrām na kāmena striyam jayet

original: na cendhanairjayedvahniṃ na madyena tṛṣāṃ jayet // GarP_1,109.34 //
analyzed: na ca indhanaiḥ jayet vahnim na madyena tṛṣām jayet
sa māṃsaiḥ bhojanaiḥ snigdhaiḥ madyaiḥ gandha vilepanaiḥ
vastraiḥ manoramaiḥ mālyaiḥ kāmaḥ strīṣu vijṛmbhate
brahmacarye vaktavyam prāptam manmatha ceṣṭitam

original: hṛdyaṃ hi puruṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā yoniḥ praklidyate striyāḥ // GarP_1,109.36 //
analyzed: hṛdyam hi puruṣam dṛṣṭvā yoniḥ praklidyate striyāḥ

original: suveṣaṃ puruṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhrātaraṃ yadi vā sutam /
analyzed: su veṣam puruṣam dṛṣṭvā bhrātaram yadi vā sutam

original: yoniḥ klidyati nārīṇāṃ satyaṃsatyaṃ hi śaunaka / // GarP_1,109.37 //
analyzed: yoniḥ klidyati nārīṇām satyam satyam hi śaunaka
nadyaḥ ca nāryaḥ ca sama svabhāvāḥ svatantra bhāve gamana ādike ca

original: toyaiśca doṣaiśca nipātayanti nadyo hi kūlāni kulā ni nāryaḥ // GarP_1,109.38 //
analyzed: toyaiḥ ca doṣaiḥ ca nipātayanti nadyaḥ hi kūlāni kulā ni nāryaḥ

original: nadī pātayate kūlaṃ nārī pātayate kulam /
analyzed: nadī pātayate kūlam nārī pātayate kulam

original: nārīṇāñca nadīnāṃ ca svacchandā lalitā gatiḥ // GarP_1,109.39 //
analyzed: nārīṇām ca nadīnām ca svacchandā lalitā gatiḥ
na agniḥ tṛpyati kāṣṭhānām na āpagānām mahā udadhiḥ

original: nāntakaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ na puṃsāṃ vāmalocanāḥ // GarP_1,109.40 //
analyzed: na antakaḥ sarva bhūtānām na puṃsām vāmalocanāḥ
na tṛptiḥ asti śiṣṭānām iṣṭānām priya vādinām

original: sukhānāñca sutānāñca jīvitasya varasya ca // GarP_1,109.41 //
analyzed: sukhānām ca sutānām ca jīvitasya varasya ca

original: rājā na tapto dhanasaṃcayena na sāgarastṛptimagājjalena /
analyzed: rājā na taptaḥ dhana saṃcayena na sāgaraḥ tṛptim agāt jalena

original: na paṇḍitastṛpyati bhāṣitena tṛptaṃ na cakṣurnṛpadarśanena // GarP_1,109.42 //
analyzed: na paṇḍitaḥ tṛpyati bhāṣitena tṛptam na cakṣuḥ nṛpa darśanena

original: svakarma dharmārjitajīvitānāṃ śāstreṣu dāreṣu sadā ratānām /
analyzed: sva karma dharma arjita jīvitānām śāstreṣu dāreṣu sadā ratānām
jita indriyāṇām atithi priyāṇām gṛhe mokṣaḥ puruṣa uttamānām
manaḥ nukūlāḥ pramadā rūpavatyaḥ su alaṅkṛtāḥ
prāsāda pṛṣṭheṣu svargaḥ syāt śubha karmaṇaḥ

original: na dānena na mānena nārjavena na savayā /
analyzed: na dānena na mānena na ārjavena na

original: na śastreṇa na śāstreṇa sarvathā viṣamā striyaḥ // GarP_1,109.45 //
analyzed: na śastreṇa na śāstreṇa sarvathā viṣamāḥ striyaḥ
śanais vidyā śanais parvatam āruhet

original: śanaiḥ kāmaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca pañcaitāni śanaiḥ śanaiḥ // GarP_1,109.46 //
analyzed: śanais kāmam ca dharmam ca pañca etāni śanais śanais
śāśvatam deva pūjā ādi vipra dānam ca śāśvatam

original: śāśvataṃ saguṇā vidyā suhṛnmitraṃ ca śāśvatam // GarP_1,109.47 //
analyzed: śāśvatam sa guṇā vidyā suhṛd mitram ca śāśvatam

original: ye bālabhāvānna paṭhanti vidyāṃ ye yauvanasthā hyadhanātmadārāḥ /
analyzed: ye bāla bhāvāt na paṭhanti vidyām ye yauvana sthāḥ hi a dhana ātma dārāḥ

original: te śocanīyā iha jīvaloke manuṣyarūpeṇa mṛgāścaranti // GarP_1,109.48 //
analyzed: te śocanīyāḥ iha jīva loke manuṣya rūpeṇa mṛgāḥ caranti
paṭhane bhojane cittam na kuryāt śāstra sevakaḥ
su dūram api vidyā arthaḥ vrajet garuḍa vegavān

original: ye bālabhāve na paṭhanti vidyāṃ kāmāturā yauvananaṣṭavittāḥ /
analyzed: ye bāla bhāve na paṭhanti vidyām kāma āturāḥ yauvana naṣṭa vittāḥ

original: te vṛddhabāve paribhūyamānāḥ saṃdahyamānāḥ śiśire yathābjam // GarP_1,109.50 //
analyzed: te vṛddha bāve paribhūyamānāḥ saṃdahyamānāḥ śiśire yathā abjam

original: tarke 'pratiṣṭhā śrutayo vibhinnāḥ nāsāvṛṣiryasya mataṃ na bhinnam /
analyzed: tarke pratiṣṭhā śrutayaḥ vibhinnāḥ na asau ṛṣiḥ yasya matam na bhinnam

original: dharmasya tattvaṃ nihitaṃ guhāyāṃ mahājano yena gataḥ sa panthāḥ // GarP_1,109.51 //
analyzed: dharmasya tattvam nihitam guhāyām mahājanaḥ yena gataḥ sa panthāḥ
ākāraiḥ iṅgitaiḥ gatyā ceṣṭayā bhāṣitena ca
netra vakra vikārābhyām lakṣyate ntargatam manaḥ

original: anuktamapyūhati paṇḍito janaḥ pareṅgitajñānaphalā hi buddhayaḥ /
analyzed: anuktam api ūhati paṇḍitaḥ janaḥ para iṅgita jñāna phalāḥ hi buddhayaḥ

original: udīritorthaḥ paśunāpi gṛhyate hayāśca nāgāśca vahanti darśitam // GarP_1,109.53 //
analyzed: udīrita ūrthaḥ paśunā api gṛhyate hayāḥ ca nāgāḥ ca vahanti darśitam

original: arthādbhraṣṭastīrthayātrāṃ tu gacchetsatyādbhraṣṭo rauravaṃ vai vrajecca /
analyzed: arthāt bhraṣṭaḥ tīrtha yātrām tu gacchet satyāt bhraṣṭaḥ rauravam vai vrajet ca

original: yogādbhraṣṭaḥ satyaghṛtiñca gacchedrājyādbhraṣṭo mṛgayāyāṃ vrajecca // GarP_1,109.54 //
analyzed: yogāt bhraṣṭaḥ gacchet rājyāt bhraṣṭaḥ mṛgayāyām vrajet ca

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bṛhadṛ nītisāre navottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe nīti sāre navottaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
sūtaḥ uvāca
yaḥ dhruvāṇi parityajya hi adhuvāṇi niṣevate

original: dhruvāṇi tasya naśyanti hyadhruvaṃ naṣṭameva ca // GarP_1,110.1 //
analyzed: dhruvāṇi tasya naśyanti hi adhruvam naṣṭam eva ca

original: vāgyantrahīnasya narasya vidyā śastraṃ yathā kāpuruṣasya haste /
analyzed: vāc yantra hīnasya narasya vidyā śastram yathā kāpuruṣasya haste

original: na tuṣṭimutpādayate śarīre hyandhasya dārā iva darśanīyāḥ // GarP_1,110.2 //
analyzed: na tuṣṭim utpādayate śarīre hi andhasya dārāḥ iva darśanīyāḥ
bhojye bhojana śaktiḥ ca rati śaktiḥ vara striyaḥ

original: vibhave dānaśaktiśca nālpasya tapasaḥ phalam // GarP_1,110.3 //
analyzed: vibhave dāna śaktiḥ ca na alpasya tapasaḥ phalam
agnihotra phalāḥ vedāḥ śīla vṛtti phalam śubham
rati putra phalāḥ dārāḥ datta bhukta phalam dhanam
varayet kula jām prājñaḥ virūpām api kanyakām
su rūpām su nitambām ca na akulīnām kadācana

original: arthenāpi hi kiṃ tena yasyānarthe tu saṃgatiḥ /
analyzed: arthena api hi kim tena yasya anarthe tu saṃgatiḥ

original: ko hi nāma śikhājātaṃ pannagasya maṇiṃ haret // GarP_1,110.6 //
analyzed: kaḥ hi nāma śikhā jātam pannagasya maṇim haret
bālāt api subhāṣitam
amedhyāt kāñcanam grāhyam strī ratnam duṣkulāt api
viṣāt api amṛtam grāhyam amedhyāt api kāñcanam
nīcāt api uttamām vidyām strī ratnam duṣkulāt api

original: na rājñā saha mitratvaṃ na sarpo nirviṣaḥ kracit /
analyzed: na rājñā saha mitra tvam na sarpaḥ nirviṣaḥ kracid

original: na kulaṃ nirmalaṃ tatra strījano yatra jāyate // GarP_1,110.9 //
analyzed: na kulam nirmalam tatra strī janaḥ yatra jāyate
kule niyojayet bhaktam putram vidyāsu yojayet
vyasane yojayet śatrum iṣṭam dharme niyojyet
sthāneṣu eva prayoktāvyāḥ bhṛtyāḥ ca ābharaṇāni ca

original: na hi cūḍāmaṇiḥ pāde śobhate vai kadācana // GarP_1,110.11 //
analyzed: na hi cūḍāmaṇiḥ pāde śobhate vai kadācana
cūḍāmaṇiḥ samudraḥ gniḥ ghaṇṭā ca akhaṇḍam ambaram

original: athavā pṛthivīpālo mūrdhni pāde pramādataḥ // GarP_1,110.12 //
analyzed: athavā pṛthivīpālaḥ mūrdhni pāde pramādataḥ
kusuma stabakasya iva dve gatī tu manasvinaḥ

original: mūrdhni vā sarvalokānāṃ śīrṣataḥ patito vane // GarP_1,110.13 //
analyzed: mūrdhni vā sarva lokānām śīrṣataḥ patitaḥ vane
kanaka bhūṣaṇa saṃgrahaṇa ucitaḥ yadi maṇiḥ trapuṇi pratibadhyate

original: na ca virauti na cāpi sa śobhate bhavati yojayiturvacanīyatā // GarP_1,110.14 //
analyzed: na ca virauti na ca api sa śobhate bhavati yojayituḥ vacanīya tā
vāji vāraṇa lauhānām kāṣṭha pāṣāṇa vāsasām
nārī puruṣa toyānām antaram mahat antaram
kadarthitasya api hi dhairya vṛtteḥ na śakyate sarva guṇa pramāthaḥ

original: adhaḥ khalenāpi kṛtasya vahnernādhaḥ śikhā yāti kadācideva // GarP_1,110.16 //
analyzed: adhas khalena api kṛtasya vahneḥ na adhas śikhā yāti kadācid eva

original: na sadaśvaḥ kaśāghātaṃ siṃho na gajagarjitam /
analyzed: na sat aśvaḥ kaśā ghātam siṃhaḥ na gaja garjitam

original: vīro vā paranirdiṣṭaṃ na sahedbhīmaniḥ svanam // GarP_1,110.17 //
analyzed: vīraḥ vā para nirdiṣṭam na sahet bhīma niḥ svanam

original: yadi vibhavavihīnaḥ pracyuto vāśu daivānna tu khalajanasevāṃ kāṅkṣayennaiva nīcām /
analyzed: yadi vibhava vihīnaḥ pracyutaḥ vā āśu daivāt na tu khala jana sevām kāṅkṣayet nā eva nīcām

original: na tṛṇamadanakārye sukṣudhārto 'tti siṃhaḥ pibati rudhiramuṣṇaṃ prāyaśaḥ kuñcarāṇām // GarP_1,110.18 //
analyzed: na tṛṇa madana kārye su kṣudhā ārtaḥ tti siṃhaḥ pibati rudhiram uṣṇam prāyaśas kuñcarāṇām
sakṛt duṣṭam ca yaḥ mitram punar sandhātum icchati
sa mṛtyum eva gṛhṇīyāt garbham aśvatarī yathā
śatroḥ apatyāni priyaṃvadāni na upekṣitavyāni budhaiḥ manuṣyaiḥ

original: tānyeva kāleṣu vipatkarāṇi viṣasya pātrāṇyapi dāruṇāni // GarP_1,110.20 //
analyzed: tāni eva kāleṣu vipad karāṇi viṣasya pātrāṇi api dāruṇāni
upakāra gṛhītena śatruṇā śatrum uddharet
pāda lagnam kara sthena kaṇṭakena eva kaṇṭakam
apakāra parān nityam cinta yet na kadācana

original: svayameva patiṣyanti kūlajātā iva drumāḥ // GarP_1,110.22 //
analyzed: svayam eva patiṣyanti kūla jātāḥ iva drumāḥ
anarthāḥ hi artha rūṣāḥ ca arthāḥ ca anartha rūpiṇaḥ

original: bhavanti te vināśāya daivāyattasya vai sadā // GarP_1,110.23 //
analyzed: bhavanti te vināśāya daiva āyattasya vai sadā
kārya kāla ucita apāpā matiḥ sañjāyate hi vai

original: sānukūle tu daive śaṃ puṃsaḥ sarvatra jāyate // GarP_1,110.24 //
analyzed: sa anukūle tu daive śam puṃsaḥ sarvatra jāyate
tathā vidyā gameṣu ca

original: āhāre vyavahāre ca tyaktalajjaḥ sadā bhavet // GarP_1,110.25 //
analyzed: āhāre vyavahāre ca tyakta lajjaḥ sadā bhavet

original: dhaninaḥ śrotriyo rājā nadī vaidyastu pañcamaḥ /
analyzed: dhaninaḥ śrotriyaḥ rājā nadī vaidyaḥ tu pañcamaḥ

original: pañca yatra na vidyante na kuryāttatratra saṃsthitim // GarP_1,110.26 //
analyzed: pañca yatra na vidyante na kuryāt tatra tra saṃsthitim

original: pañca yatra na vidyante na tatra divasaṃ vaset // GarP_1,110.27 //
analyzed: pañca yatra na vidyante na tatra divasam vaset
kāla vid śotriyaḥ rājā nadī sādhuḥ ca pañcamaḥ

original: ete yatra na vidyante tatra vāsaṃ na kārayet // GarP_1,110.28 //
analyzed: ete yatra na vidyante tatra vāsam na kārayet
nā ekatra pariniṣṭhā asti jñānasya kila śaunaka

original: sarvaḥ sarvaṃ na jānāti sarvajño nāsti kutracit // GarP_1,110.29 //
analyzed: sarvaḥ sarvam na jānāti sarvajñaḥ nā asti kutracid

original: na sarvavitkaścidihāsti loke nātyantamūrkho bhuvi cāpi kaścit /
analyzed: na sarva vid kaścid iha asti loke na atyanta mūrkhaḥ bhuvi ca api kaścid

original: jñānena nīcottamamadhyamena yo 'yaṃ vijānāti sa tena vidvān // GarP_1,110.30 //
analyzed: jñānena nīca uttama madhyamena yaḥ yam vijānāti sa tena vidvān

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bṛhadṛ nītisāre daśottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe nīti sāre daśottaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
sūtaḥ uvāca
pārthivasya tu vakṣyāmi bhṛtyānām ca eva lakṣaṇam

original: sarvāṇi hi mahīpālaḥ samyaṅnityaṃ parīkṣayet // GarP_1,111.1 //
analyzed: sarvāṇi hi mahīpālaḥ samyak nityam parīkṣayet
rājyam pālayate nityam satya dharma parāyaṇaḥ

original: nirjitya parasainyāni kṣitaṃ dharmeṇa pālayet // GarP_1,111.2 //
analyzed: nirjitya para sainyāni kṣitam dharmeṇa pālayet
puṣpāt puṣpam vicinvīta mūla chedam na kārayet
mālākāraḥ iva araṇye na yathā aṅgāra kārakaḥ
dogdhāraḥ kṣīra bhuñjānāḥ vikṛtam tat na bhuñjate

original: pararāṣṭraṃ mahīpālairbhoktavyaṃ na ca dūṣayet // GarP_1,111.4 //
analyzed: para rāṣṭram mahīpālaiḥ bhoktavyam na ca dūṣayet

original: nodhaśchindyāttu yo dhenvāḥ kṣārārtho labhate payaḥ /
analyzed: na ūdhaḥ chindyāt tu yaḥ dhenvāḥ kṣāra arthaḥ labhate payaḥ

original: evaṃ rāṣṭraṃ prayogeṇa pīḍyamānaṃ na vardhate // GarP_1,111.5 //
analyzed: evam rāṣṭram prayogeṇa pīḍyamānam na vardhate
tasmāt sarva prayatnena pṛthivīm anupālayet
pālakasya bhavet bhūmiḥ kīrtiḥ āyuḥ yaśaḥ balam
ā abhyarcya viṣṇum dharma ātmā go brāhmaṇa hite rataḥ

original: prajāḥ pālayituṃ śaktaḥ pārthivo vijitendriyaḥ // GarP_1,111.7 //
analyzed: prajāḥ pālayitum śaktaḥ pārthivaḥ vijita indriyaḥ
aiśvaryam adhruvam prāpya rājā dharme matin caret
kṣaṇena vibhavaḥ naśyet na ātma āyattam dhana ādikam

original: satyaṃ manoramāḥ kāmāḥ satyaṃ ramyā vibhūtayaḥ /
analyzed: satyam manoramāḥ kāmāḥ satyam ramyāḥ vibhūtayaḥ

original: kintu vai vanitāpāṅgabhaṅgilolaṃ hi jīvitam // GarP_1,111.9 //
analyzed: kintu vai vanitā apāṅga bhaṅgi lolam hi jīvitam

original: vyāghrīva tiṣṭhati jarā paritarjayantī rogāśca śatrava iva prabhavanti gātre /
analyzed: vyāghrī iva tiṣṭhati jarā paritarjayantī rogāḥ ca śatravaḥ iva prabhavanti gātre

original: āyuḥ paristravati bhinnaghaṭādivāmbho loko na cātmahitamācaratīha kaścit // GarP_1,111.10 //
analyzed: āyuḥ paristravati bhinna ghaṭāt iva ambhaḥ lokaḥ na ca ātma hitam ācarati iha kaścid

original: niḥ śaṅkaṃ kiṃ manuṣyāḥ kuruta parahitaṃ yuktamagre hitaṃ yanmodadhvaṃ kāminībhirmadanaśarahatā mandamandātidṛṣṭyā /
analyzed: niḥ śaṅkam kim manuṣyāḥ kuruta para hitam yuktam agre hitam yat modadhvam kāminībhiḥ madana śara hatāḥ manda manda ati dṛṣṭyā

original: mā pāpaṃ saṃkurudhvaṃ dvijahariparamāḥ saṃbhajadhvaṃ sadaiva āyurniḥ śeṣameti skhalati jalaghaṭībhūtamṛtyucchalena // GarP_1,111.11 //
analyzed: mā pāpam saṃkurudhvam dvija hari paramāḥ saṃbhajadhvam sadā eva āyuḥ niḥ śeṣam eti skhalati jala ghaṭī bhūta mṛtyu chalena
mātṛ vat para dāreṣu para dravyeṣu loṣṭa vat

original: ātmavat sarvabhūteṣu yaḥ paśyati sa paṇḍitaḥ // GarP_1,111.12 //
analyzed: ātma vat sarva bhūteṣu yaḥ paśyati sa paṇḍitaḥ
etad artham hi vipra indrāḥ rājyam icchanti bhūbhṛtaḥ

original: yadeṣāṃ sarvakāryeṣu vaco na pratihanyate // GarP_1,111.13 //
analyzed: yat eṣām sarva kāryeṣu vacaḥ na pratihanyate
etad artham hi kurvanti rājānaḥ dhana sañcayam

original: rakṣayitvā tu cātmānaṃ yaddhanaṃ taddvijātaye // GarP_1,111.14 //
analyzed: rakṣayitvā tu ca ātmānam yat dhanam tat dvijātaye
oṅkāra śabdaḥ viprāṇām yena rāṣṭram pravardhate

original: sa rājā vardhate yogādvyādhibhiśca na badhyate // GarP_1,111.15 //
analyzed: sa rājā vardhate yogāt vyādhibhiḥ ca na badhyate
asamarthāḥ ca kurvanti munayaḥ dravya sañcayam
kim punar tu mahīpālaḥ putra vat pālayan prajāḥ
yasya arthāḥ tasya mitrāṇi yasya arthāḥ tasya bāndhavāḥ

original: yasyārthāḥ sa mumāṃllāke yasyārthāḥ sa ca paṇḍitaḥ // GarP_1,111.17 //
analyzed: yasya arthāḥ sa yasya arthāḥ sa ca paṇḍitaḥ

original: tyajanti mitrāṇi dhanairvihīnaṃ putrāśca dārāśca suhṛjjanāśca /
analyzed: tyajanti mitrāṇi dhanaiḥ vihīnam putrāḥ ca dārāḥ ca suhṛd janāḥ ca

original: te cārthavantaṃ punarāśrayanti hyartho hi loke puruṣasya bandhuḥ // GarP_1,111.18 //
analyzed: te ca arthavantam punar āśrayanti hi arthaḥ hi loke puruṣasya bandhuḥ

original: andhā hi rājā bhavati yastu sāstravivarjitaḥ /
analyzed: andhāḥ hi rājā bhavati yaḥ tu sa astra vivarjitaḥ

original: andhaḥ paśyati cāreṇa śāstrahīno na paśyati // GarP_1,111.19 //
analyzed: andhaḥ paśyati cāreṇa śāstra hīnaḥ na paśyati
yasya putrāḥ ca bhṛtyāḥ ca mantriṇaḥ ca purohitāḥ

original: indriyāṇi prasuptāni tasya rājyaṃ ciraṃ na hi // GarP_1,111.20 //
analyzed: indriyāṇi prasuptāni tasya rājyam ciram na hi
yena arjitāḥ trayaḥ pya u pi ete putrāḥ bhṛtyāḥ ca bāndhavāḥ
jitā tena samam bhūpaiḥ catur abdhiḥ vasundharā
laṅghayet śāstra yuktāni hetu yuktāni yāni ca

original: sahi naśyati vai rājā iha loke paratra ca // GarP_1,111.22 //
analyzed: sahi naśyati vai rājā iha loke paratra ca

original: manastāpaṃ na kurvīta āpadaṃ prāpya pārthivaḥ /
analyzed: manaḥ tāpam na kurvīta āpadam prāpya pārthivaḥ

original: samabuddhiḥ prasannātmā prasannātmā sukhaduḥkhe samo bhavet // GarP_1,111.23 //
analyzed: sama buddhiḥ prasanna ātmā prasanna ātmā sukha duḥkhe samaḥ bhavet
dhīrāḥ kaṣṭam anuprāpya na bhavanti viṣādinaḥ

original: praviśya vadanaṃ rāhoḥ kiṃ nodati punaḥ śaśī // GarP_1,111.24 //
analyzed: praviśya vadanam rāhoḥ kim punar śaśī

original: dhigdhik śarīrasukhalālitamānaveṣu mā khedayeddhanakṛśaṃ hi śarīrameva /
analyzed: dhik dhik śarīra sukha lālita mānaveṣu mā khedayet dhana kṛśam hi śarīram eva

original: saddārakā hyadhanapāṇḍusutāḥ śrutā hi duḥkhaṃ vihāya punareva sukhaṃ prapannāḥ // GarP_1,111.25 //
analyzed: sat dārakāḥ hi adhana pāṇḍu sutāḥ śrutāḥ hi duḥkham vihāya punar eva sukham prapannāḥ
gandharva vidyām ālokya vādyam ca gaṇikā gaṇān
dhanurveda artha śāstrāṇi loke rakṣet ca bhūpatiḥ

original: kāraṇena vinā bhṛtye yastu kupyati pārthivaḥ /
analyzed: kāraṇena vinā bhṛtye yaḥ tu kupyati pārthivaḥ
sa gṛhṇāti viṣa unmādam kṛṣṇasarpa visarjitam
cāpalāt vārayet dṛṣṭim mithyā vākyam ca vārayet

original: mānave śrotriye caiva bhṛtyavarge sadaiva hi // GarP_1,111.28 //
analyzed: mānave śrotriye ca eva bhṛtya varge sadā eva hi
līlām karoti yaḥ rājā bhṛtya sva jana garvitaḥ

original: śāsane sarvadā kṣipraṃ ripubhiḥ paribhūyate // GarP_1,111.29 //
analyzed: śāsane sarvadā kṣipram ripubhiḥ paribhūyate

original: huṅkāre bhṛkuṭīṃ naiva sadā kurvīta pārthivaḥ /
analyzed: huṅkāre bhṛkuṭīm nā eva sadā kurvīta pārthivaḥ

original: vinā doṣeṇa yo bhṛtyānrājādhamaṇa śāsti ca /
analyzed: vinā doṣeṇa yaḥ bhṛtyān rāja adhamaṇa śāsti ca
līlā sukhāni bhogyāni tyajet iha mahīpatiḥ

original: sukhapravṛttaiḥ sādhyantai śatravo vigrahe sthitaiḥ // GarP_1,111.31 //
analyzed: sukha pravṛttaiḥ śatravaḥ vigrahe sthitaiḥ
udyogaḥ sāhasam dhairyam buddhiḥ śaktiḥ parākramaḥ

original: ṣaḍvidho yasya utsāhastasya devo 'pi śaṅkate // GarP_1,111.32 //
analyzed: ṣaḍvidhaḥ yasya utsāhaḥ tasya śaṅkate

original: udyogena kṛte kārye siddharyasya na vidyate /
analyzed: udyogena kṛte kārye siddhar yasya na vidyate

original: daivaṃ tasya pramāṇaṃ hi kartavyaṃ pauruṣaṃ sadā // GarP_1,111.33 //
analyzed: daivam tasya pramāṇam hi kartavyam pauruṣam sadā

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bṛhadṛ nītisāre ekādaśottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe nīti sāre ekādaśottaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
sūtaḥ uvāca
bhṛtyāḥ bahuvidhāḥ jñeyāḥ uttama adhama madhyamāḥ
niyoktavyāḥ yathārheṣu trividheṣu eva karmasu

original: bhṛtye parikṣaṇaṃ vakṣye yasyayasya hi yo guṇaḥ /
analyzed: bhṛtye pari kṣaṇam vakṣye yasya yasya hi yaḥ guṇaḥ

original: tamimaṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi ye yathākathitaṃ kila // GarP_1,112.2 //
analyzed: tam imam saṃpravakṣyāmi ye yathā kathitam kila
yathā caturbhiḥ kanakam parīkṣyate nigharṣaṇa chedana tāpa tāḍanaiḥ

original: tathā caturbhirbhṛtakaṃ parīkṣayedvatena śīlena kalena karmaṇā // GarP_1,112.3 //
analyzed: tathā caturbhiḥ bhṛtakam śīlena kalena karmaṇā
kula śīla guṇa upetaḥ satya dharma parāyaṇaḥ
rūpavān su prasannaḥ ca kośa adhyakṣaḥ vidhīyate
mūlya rūpa parīkṣā kṛt bhave dratna parīkṣakaḥ
balābala parijñātā senā adhyakṣaḥ vidhīyate
iṅgita ākāra tattva jñaḥ balavān priya darśanaḥ

original: apramādī pramāthī ca pratīhāraḥ sa ucyate // GarP_1,112.6 //
analyzed: apramādī pramāthī ca pratīhāraḥ saḥ ucyate
medhāvī vāc paṭuḥ prājñaḥ satya vādī jita indriyaḥ

original: sarvaśāstrasamālokī hyeṣa sādhuḥ sa lekhakaḥ // GarP_1,112.7 //
analyzed: sarva śāstra samālokī hi eṣa sādhuḥ sa lekhakaḥ
buddhimān matimān ca eva para citta upalakṣakaḥ

original: krūro yathoktavādī ca eṣa dūto vidhīyate // GarP_1,112.8 //
analyzed: krūraḥ yathā ukta vādī ca eṣa dūtaḥ vidhīyate
samasta smṛti śāstra jñaḥ jita indriyaḥ
śaurya vīrya guṇa upetaḥ dharma adhyakṣaḥ vidhīyate

original: śuciśca kaṭhinaścaiva sūpakāraḥ sa ucyate // GarP_1,112.10 //
analyzed: śuciḥ ca kaṭhinaḥ ca eva sūpa kāraḥ saḥ ucyate
āyurveda kṛta abhyāsaḥ sarveṣām priya darśanaḥ

original: āyuḥ śīlaguṇopeto vaidya eva vidhīyate // GarP_1,112.11 //
analyzed: āyuḥ śīla guṇa upetaḥ vaidyaḥ eva vidhīyate
āśīrvāda paraḥ nityam eṣa rāja purohita
lekhakaḥ pāṭhakaḥ ca eva gaṇakaḥ pratirodhakaḥ
ālasya yuktaḥ ca edrājā karma saṃvarjayet sadā
dvi jihvam udvega karam krūram ekānta dāruṇam
khalasya aheḥ ca vadanam apakārāya kevalam
durjanaḥ parihartavyaḥ vidyayā alaṅkṛtaḥ pisan

original: maṇinā bhūṣitaḥ sarpaḥ kimasau na bhayaṅkaraḥ // GarP_1,112.15 //
analyzed: maṇinā bhūṣitaḥ sarpaḥ kim asau na bhayaṅkaraḥ

original: akāraṇaviṣkṛtakopadhāriṇaḥ khalādbhayaṃ kasya na nāma jāyate /
analyzed: akāraṇa viṣkṛta kopa dhāriṇaḥ khalāt bhayam kasya na nāma jāyate

original: viṣaṃ mahāherviṣamasya durvacaḥ saduḥ sahaṃ sannipatetsadā mukhe // GarP_1,112.16 //
analyzed: viṣam mahā aheḥ viṣamasya durvacaḥ sa duḥ saham san nipatet sadā mukhe
tulya artham tulya sāmarthyam marma jñam vyavasāyinam

original: ardharājyaharaṃ bhṛtyaṃ yo hanyātsa na hanyate // GarP_1,112.17 //
analyzed: ardha rājya haram bhṛtyam yaḥ hanyāt sa na hanyate
śūra tva yuktāḥ mṛdu manda vākyāḥ jita indriyāḥ satya parākramāḥ ca

original: prāgeva paścādviparī tarupā ye te tu bhṛtyā na hitā bhavanti // GarP_1,112.18 //
analyzed: prāk eva paścāt viparī ye te tu bhṛtyāḥ na hitāḥ bhavanti
nirālasyāḥ su santuṣṭāḥ pratibodhakāḥ

original: sukhaduḥ khasamā dhīrā bhṛtyā lokeṣu durlabhāḥ // GarP_1,112.19 //
analyzed: sukha duḥ kha samāḥ dhīrāḥ bhṛtyāḥ lokeṣu durlabhāḥ
kṣāntiḥ taya vihīnaḥ ca krūra buddhiḥ ca nindakaḥ
dāmbhikaḥ kapaṭī ca eva śaṭhaḥ ca spṛhayā anvitaḥ

original: aśakto bhayabhītaśca rājñā tyaktavya eva saḥ // GarP_1,112.20 //
analyzed: aśaktaḥ bhaya bhītaḥ ca rājñā tyaktavyaḥ eva saḥ
su sandhānāni ca astrāṇi śastrāṇi vividhāni ca

original: durge praveśitavyāni tataḥ śatruṃ nipātayet // GarP_1,112.21 //
analyzed: durge praveśitavyāni tatas śatrum nipātayet
ṣaṣ māsam atha varṣam vā sandhim kuryāt narādhipaḥ
paśyan sañcitam ātmānam punar śatrum nipātayet
mūrkhān niyojayet yaḥ tu trayaḥ pi ete mahīpateḥ
ayaśaḥ ca artha nāśaḥ ca narake ca eva pātanam

original: yatkiñcitkurute karma śubhaṃ vā yādi vāśubham /
analyzed: yat kiñcid kurute karma śubham vā yā ādi vā aśubham

original: tena sma vardhate rājā sūkṣmato bhṛtyakāryataḥ // GarP_1,112.24 //
analyzed: tena sma vardhate rājā sūkṣmataḥ bhṛtya kāryataḥ
tasmāt bhūmi īśvaraḥ prājñam dharma kāma artha sādhane
niyoja yet hi satatam go brāhmaṇa hitāya vai

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bṛhaspatyukta nītiptāre dvādaśottarakaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe dvādaśottarakaśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
sūtaḥ uvāca
guṇavantam niyuñjīta guṇa hīnam vivarjayet

original: paṇḍitasya guṇāḥ sarve mūrve doṣāśca kevalāḥ // GarP_1,113.1 //
analyzed: paṇḍitasya guṇāḥ sarve mūrve doṣāḥ ca kevalāḥ
sadbhiḥ āsīta satatam sadbhiḥ kurvīta saṅgatim
sadbhiḥ vivādam na asadbhiḥ kiñcid ācaret
paṇḍitaiḥ ca virnātaiḥ ca dharmaśaiḥ satya vādibhiḥ

original: bandhstho 'pi tiṣṭhecca na tu rājye khalaiḥ saha // GarP_1,113.3 //
analyzed: tiṣṭhet ca na tu rājye khalaiḥ saha
sa avaśeṣāṇi kāryāṇi kuvatra arthe yujyate
tasmāt sarvāṇi kāryāṇi sa avaśeṣāṇi kārayet
madhu hā iva duhet sāram kusumam ca na ghātayet

original: vatsāpekṣī duhetkṣīraṃ bhūmiṃ gāñcaiva pārthipaḥ // GarP_1,113.5 //
analyzed: vatsa apekṣī duhet kṣīram bhūmim gān ca eva pārthipaḥ
yathākrameṇa puṣpebhyaḥ cinute madhu ṣaṭpadaḥ

original: tathā vittamu pādāya rājā kurvīta sañcayam // GarP_1,113.6 //
analyzed: tathā vittam u pādāya rājā kurvīta sañcayam
valmīkam madhu jālam ca śuklaṇkṣe tu candramāḥ
rāja dravyam ca bhaikṣyam ca stokam stokam pravardhate
arjitasya kṣayam dṛṣṭā saṃpradattasya sañcayam
avandhyam divasam kuryāt dāna adhyayana karmasu

original: vane 'pi doṣāḥ prabhavanti rāgiṇāṃ gṛhe 'pi pañcendriyanigrahastapaḥ /
analyzed: vane pi doṣāḥ prabhavanti rāgiṇām gṛhe pi pañca indriya nigrahaḥ tapaḥ

original: akutsite karmaṇi yaḥ pravartate nivṛttarāgasya gṛhaṃ tapovanam // GarP_1,113.9 //
analyzed: akutsite karmaṇi yaḥ pravartate nivṛtta rāgasya gṛham tapaḥ vanam

original: satyena rakṣyate dharmo vidyā yogena rakṣyate /
analyzed: satyena rakṣyate dharmaḥ vidyā yogena rakṣyate

original: mṛjayā rakṣyate pātraṃ kulaṃ śalina rakṣyate // GarP_1,113.10 //
analyzed: mṛjayā rakṣyate pātram kulam śalina rakṣyate

original: varaṃ vindhyāṭavyāṃ nivasanamabhuktasya maraṇaṃ varaṃ sarpākīrṇe śayanamatha kūpe nipatanam /
analyzed: varam vindhya aṭavyām nivasanam abhuktasya maraṇam varam sarpa ākīrṇe śayanam atha kūpe nipatanam

original: varaṃ bhrāntāvarte sabhayajalamadhye praviśanaṃ na tu svīye pakṣe hi dhanamaṇu dehīti kathanam // GarP_1,113.11 //
analyzed: varam bhrānta āvarte sa bhaya jala madhye praviśanam na tu svīye pakṣe hi dhanam aṇu dehi iti kathanam
bhāgya kṣayeṣu kṣīyante na upabhogena sampadaḥ

original: pūrvārjite hi sukṛte na naśyanti kadācana // GarP_1,113.12 //
analyzed: pūrva arjite hi sukṛte na naśyanti kadācana

original: viprāṇāṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ vidyā pṛthivyā bhūṣaṇaṃ nṛpaḥ /
analyzed: viprāṇām bhūṣaṇam vidyā pṛthivyāḥ bhūṣaṇam nṛpaḥ

original: nabhaso bhūṣaṇaṃ candraḥ śīlaṃ sarvasya bhūṣaṇam // GarP_1,113.13 //
analyzed: nabhasaḥ bhūṣaṇam candraḥ śīlam sarvasya bhūṣaṇam

original: ete te candratulyāḥ kṣitipatitanayā bhīmasenārjunādyāḥ śurāḥ satyapratijñā dinakaravapuṣaḥ keśavenopagūḍhāḥ /
analyzed: ete te candra tulyāḥ kṣitipati tanayāḥ bhīmasena arjuna ādyāḥ śurāḥ satya pratijñāḥ dinakara vapuṣaḥ keśavena upagūḍhāḥ

original: te vai duṣṭagrahasthāḥ kṛpaṇavaśagatā bhaikṣyacaryāṃ prayātāḥ ko vā kasminsamartho bhavati vidhivaśādbhrāmayetkarmarekhā // GarP_1,113.14 //
analyzed: te vai duṣṭa graha sthāḥ kṛpaṇa vaśa gatāḥ bhaikṣya caryām prayātāḥ kaḥ vā kasmin samarthaḥ bhavati vidhi vaśāt bhrāmayet karma rekhā

original: brahmā yena kulālavanniyamito brahmāṇḍabhāṇḍodare viṣṇuryena daśāvatāragahane kṣipto mahāsaṅkaṭe /
analyzed: brahmā yena kulāla vat niyamitaḥ brahmāṇḍa bhāṇḍa udare viṣṇuḥ yena daśa avatāra gahane kṣiptaḥ mahā saṅkaṭe

original: rudroyena kapālapāṇipuṭake bhikṣāṭanaṃ kāritaḥ sūryo bhrāmyati nityameva gagane taramai namaḥ karṇaṇe // GarP_1,113.15 //
analyzed: rudroyena kapāla pāṇi puṭake bhikṣāṭanam kāritaḥ sūryaḥ bhrāmyati nityam eva gagane taramai namaḥ karṇaṇe

original: dātā baliryācakako murārirdānaṃ mahī vipramukhasya madhye /
analyzed: dātā baliḥ yācakakaḥ murāriḥ dānam mahī vipra mukhasya madhye

original: dattvā phalaṃ bandhanameva labdhaṃ namo 'stu te daiva yatheṣṭakāriṇe // GarP_1,113.16 //
analyzed: dattvā phalam bandhanam eva labdham namaḥ stu te daiva yatheṣṭa kāriṇe
mātā yadi bhavet lakṣmīḥ pitā sākṣāt janārdanaḥ
ku buddhau pratipattiḥ ca ettasmin daṇḍaḥ patet sadā
yena yena yathā yadvat purā karma su niścitam
tat tat eva antarā bhuṅkte svayam āhitam ātmanā

original: ātmanā vihitaṃ duḥ khamātmanā vihitaṃ sakham /
analyzed: ātmanā vihitam duḥ kham ātmanā vihitam sakham

original: na cāntarikṣe na samudramadhye na parvatānāṃ vivarapraveśe /
analyzed: na ca antarikṣe na samudra madhye na parvatānām vivara praveśe

original: na mātṛmūrdhni pradhṛtastathāṅke tyaktuṃ kṣamaḥ karma kṛtaṃ naro hi // GarP_1,113.20 //

analyzed: dugaḥ tri kūṭaḥ parikhā samudraḥ rakṣāṃsi yodhāḥ paramā ca vṛttiḥ

original: śāstrañca vai tūśanasā pradiṣṭaṃ sa rāvaṇaḥ kālavaśādvinaṣṭaḥ // GarP_1,113.21 //
analyzed: śāstram ca vai tu uśanasā pradiṣṭam sa rāvaṇaḥ kāla vaśāt vinaṣṭaḥ

analyzed: yasmin vayasi yat kāle yat divā yat ca vā niśi

analyzed: yat muhūrte kṣaṇe vā api tat tathā na tat anyathā
gacchanti ca antarikṣe vā praviśanti mahī tale

original: purā kṛtāni karmāṇi hyagre dhāvanti dhāvataḥ // GarP_1,113.24 //
analyzed: purā kṛtāni karmāṇi hi agre dhāvanti dhāvataḥ

analyzed: sthūlajaṅghaḥ yadā rāmaḥ śabda gāmī ca lakṣmaṇaḥ

original: ghanakeśī yadā sītā trayaste duḥ khabhājanam // GarP_1,113.26 //
analyzed: ghanakeśī yadā sītā trayaḥ te duḥ kha bhājanam

original: prāptavyamarthaṃ labhate manuṣyo devo 'pi taṃ vārayituṃ na śaktaḥ /

original: ato na śocāmi na vismayo me lalāṭalekhā na punaḥ prayāti (yadasmadīyaṃ na tu tat pareṣām // GarP_1,113.32 //

original: dharmārtho ca mahāṃlloke tatsmṛtvā hyarthakāraṇāt // GarP_1,113.35 //
analyzed: ca mahān loke tat smṛtvā hi artha kāraṇāt

original: annārtho yāni duḥ khāni karoti kṛpaṇo janaḥ /

original: tānyeva yadi dharmārtho na bhūyaḥ kleśabhājanam // GarP_1,113.36 //

original: kuśāgreṇa tu saṃspṛṣṭaṃ prāptakālo na jīvati // GarP_1,113.49 //

analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe nīti sāre trayośottaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: yathopāyo vadho daṇḍastathaiva hyanu vartate // GarP_1,114.7 //

original: parādhīnā nidrā paradṛdayakṛtyānusaraṇaṃ sadā helā hāsyaṃ niyatamapi śokena rahitam /

original: paṇe nyastaḥ kāyo viṭajanakhurairdāritagalo bahūtkaṇṭhavṛtirjagati gaṇikrāyā bahumataḥ // GarP_1,114.12 //

original: nityaṃ paropasevyāni sadyaḥ prāṇaharāṇi ṣaṭ // GarP_1,114.13 //
analyzed: nityam para upasevyāni sadyas prāṇa harāṇi ṣaḍ
kim citram yadi veda śabda

original: śāstrakuśalo vipro bhavetpaṇḍitaḥ kiṃ citraṃ yadi daṇḍanītikuśalo rājā bhaveddhārmikaḥ /
analyzed: śāstra kuśalaḥ vipraḥ bhavet paṇḍitaḥ kim citram yadi daṇḍa nīti kuśalaḥ rājā bhavet dhārmikaḥ

original: kiṃ citraṃ yadi rūpayauvanavatī sādhvī bhavetkāminī taccitraṃ yadi nirdhano 'pi puruṣaḥ pāpaṃ na kuryātkracit // GarP_1,114.14 //

original: yadi no cikurodbhedāllabhyante kaiḥ striyo na hi // GarP_1,114.16 //

original: na tathā bādhate śatruḥ kṛtavairo bahiḥ sthitaḥ // GarP_1,114.17 //

original: arthena nārīṃ tapasā hi devānsarvāṃśca lokāṃśca susaṃgraheṇa // GarP_1,114.18 //

original: sukhena vidyāṃ puruṣeṇa nārīṃ vāñchanti vai ye na ca paṇḍitāste // GarP_1,114.19 //

original: niṣphalaṃ tasya vai kāryāṃ mahādoṣamavāpnuyāt // GarP_1,114.20 //
analyzed: niṣphalam tasya vai kāryām mahā doṣam avāpnuyāt

original: sadhano hi tapasvī ca dūrato vai kṛtaśramaḥ /

original: madyapa strī satītyevaṃ vipra na śraddadhāmyaham // GarP_1,114.21 //

original: vṛddhāḥ striyo navaṃ madyaṃ śuṣkaṃ māṃsaṃ trimūlakam /
