original: rātrau dadhi divā svapnaṃ vidvānṣaṭ parivarjayet // GarP_1,114.25 //
analyzed: rātrau dadhi divā svapnam vidvān ṣaḍ parivarjayet

original: viṣaṃ goṣṭhī daridrasya vṛddhasya taruṇī viṣam /
analyzed: viṣam goṣṭhī daridrasya vṛddhasya taruṇī viṣam

original: viṣaṃ kuśikṣitā vidyā ajīrṇe bhojanaṃ viṣam // GarP_1,114.26 //
analyzed: viṣam kuśikṣitā vidyā ajīrṇe bhojanam viṣam
priyam gānam akuṇṭhasya nīcasya ucca āsanam priyam

original: priyaṃ dānaṃ daridrasya bhūnaścataruṇī priyā // GarP_1,114.27 //
analyzed: priyam dānam daridrasya bhūnaśca taruṇī priyā
ati ambu pānam kaṭhina aśanam ca dhātu kṣayaḥ vega vidhāraṇam ca

original: divāśayo jāgaraṇañca rātrau ṣaḍbhirnarāṇāṃ nivasanti rogāḥ // GarP_1,114.28 //
analyzed: divā āśayaḥ jāgaraṇam ca rātrau ṣaḍbhiḥ narāṇām nivasanti rogāḥ
bāla ātapaḥ ca api ati maithunam ca śmaśāna dhūmaḥ kara tāpanam ca
rajasvalā vatkra nirīkṣaṇam ca su dīrgham āyuḥ nanu karṣayet ca

original: śuṣkaṃ māṃsaṃ striyo vṛddhā bālārkastaruṇaṃ dadhi /
analyzed: śuṣkam māṃsam striyaḥ vṛddhāḥ bāla arkaḥ taruṇam dadhi

original: prabhāte maithunaṃ nidrā sadyaḥ prāṇaharāṇi ṣaṭ // GarP_1,114.30 //
analyzed: prabhāte maithunam nidrā sadyas prāṇa harāṇi ṣaḍ

original: sadyaḥ pakraghṛtaṃ drākṣā bālā strī kṣīrabhojanam /
analyzed: sadyas pakra ghṛtam drākṣā bālā strī kṣīra bhojanam

original: uṣṇodakaṃ tarucchāyā sadyaḥ prāṇaharāṇi ṣaṭ // GarP_1,114.31 //
analyzed: uṣṇa udakam taru chāyā sadyas prāṇa harāṇi ṣaḍ
kūpādakam vaṭa chāyā nārīṇām ca payodharaḥ
śīta kāle bhavet uṣṇam uṣṇa kāle ca śītalam
trayaḥ bala karāḥ sadyas bāla abhyaṅga su bhojanam

original: trayo balaharāḥ sadyo hyadhvā ve maithunaṃ jvaraḥ // GarP_1,114.33 //
analyzed: trayaḥ bala harāḥ sadyas hi adhvā maithunam jvaraḥ

original: śuṣkaṃ māṃsaṃ payo nityaṃ bhāryāmitraiḥ sahaiva tu /
analyzed: śuṣkam māṃsam payaḥ nityam bhāryā mitraiḥ saha eva tu

original: na bhāktavyaṃ nṛpaiḥ sārdhaṃ viyogaṃ kurute kṣaṇāt // GarP_1,114.34 //
analyzed: na bhāktavyam nṛpaiḥ sārdham viyogam kurute kṣaṇāt
danta mala upadhāriṇam bahu āśinam niṣṭhura vākya bhāṣiṇam

original: sūryodaye hyastamaye 'pi śāyinaṃ vimuñcati śrīrapi cakrapāṇinam // GarP_1,114.35 //
analyzed: sūrya udaye hi astamaye śāyinam vimuñcati śrīḥ api cakrapāṇinam

original: nityaṃ chedastṛṇānaṃ dharaṇivilakhanaṃ pādayoścāpamārṣṭiḥ dantānāmapyaśaucaṃ malinavasanatā rūkṣatā mūrdhajānām /
analyzed: nityam chedaḥ tṛṇānam dharaṇi vilakhanam pādayoḥ ca apamārṣṭiḥ dantānām api aśaucam malina vasana tā rūkṣa tā mūrdhajānām

original: dve sadhye cāpi nidrā vivasanaśayanaṃ grāsahāsātirekaḥ svāṅge pīṭhe ca vādyaṃ nidhanamupanayetkeśavasyāpi lakṣmīm // GarP_1,114.36 //
analyzed: dve sadhye ca api nidrā vivasana śayanam grāsa hāsa atirekaḥ sva aṅge pīṭhe ca vādyam nidhanam upanayet keśavasya api lakṣmīm
śiraḥ su dhautam caraṇau su mārjitau vara aṅganā sevanam alpa bhojanam
anagna śāyi tvam aparva maithunam cira pranaṣṭām śriyam ānayanti ṣaḍ

original: yasya kasya tu puṣpasya pāṇāḍarasya viśeṣataḥ /
analyzed: yasya kasya tu puṣpasya pāṇāḍarasya viśeṣataḥ
śirasā dhāryamāṇasya hi alakṣmīḥ pratihanyate

original: dīpasya paścimā chāyā chāyā śayyāsanasya ca /
analyzed: dīpasya paścimā chāyā chāyā śayyā āsanasya ca
rajakasya tu yat tīrtha lakṣmīḥ tatra tiṣṭhati

original: bālātapaḥ pretadhūmaḥ strī vṛddhā taruṇaṃ dadhi /
analyzed: bāla ātapaḥ pretadhūmaḥ strī vṛddhā taruṇam dadhi

original: āyuṣkāmo na seveta tathā saṃmārjanīrajaḥ // GarP_1,114.40 //
analyzed: āyuṣkāmaḥ na seveta tathā saṃmārjanī rajaḥ
gaja aśva ratha dhānyānām gavām ca eva rajaḥ śubham
aśubham ca vijānīyāt khara uṣṭra ja āvikeṣu ca
gavām rajaḥ dhānya rajaḥ putrasya aṅga bhavam rajaḥ
etat rajaḥ mahā śastam mahāpātaka nāśanam
ajā rajaḥ khara rajaḥ yat tu saṃmārjanī rajaḥ
etat rajaḥ mahā pāpam mahā kilbiṣa kārakam
śūrpa vātaḥ nakha agra ambu snāna vastra mṛjā udakam

original: keśāmbu mārjanīreṇurhanti puṇyaṃ purā kṛtam // GarP_1,114.44 //
analyzed: keśa ambu mārjanī reṇuḥ hanti puṇyam purā kṛtam
viprayoḥ vipra vahnyoḥ ca dampatyoḥ svāminoḥ tathā

original: antareṇa na gantavyaṃ hayasya vṛṣabhasya ca // GarP_1,114.45 //
analyzed: antareṇa na gantavyam hayasya vṛṣabhasya ca
strīṣu rāja agni sarpeṣu svādhyāye śatru sevane

original: bhogāsvādeṣu viśvāsaṃ kaḥ prājñaḥ kartumarhati // GarP_1,114.46 //
analyzed: bhoga āsvādeṣu viśvāsam kaḥ prājñaḥ kartum arhati
na viśvaset aviśvastam viśvastam viśvastam na ati viśvaset
viśvāsāt bhayam utpannam mūlāt api nikṛntati

original: vairiṇā saha sandhāya viśvasto yadi tiṣṭhati /
analyzed: vairiṇā saha sandhāya viśvastaḥ yadi tiṣṭhati

original: sa vṛkṣāgre prasupto hi patitaḥ pratibudhyate // GarP_1,114.48 //
analyzed: sa vṛkṣa agre prasuptaḥ hi patitaḥ pratibudhyate
na atyantam mṛdunā bhāvyam na atyantam kūra karmaṇā

original: mṛdunaiva mṛduṃ hanti dāruṇenaiva dāruṇam // GarP_1,114.49 //
analyzed: mṛdunā eva mṛdum hanti dāruṇena eva dāruṇam
na atyantam saralaiḥ bhāvyam na atyantam mṛdunā tathā
saralāḥ tatra chidyante kubjāḥ tiṣṭhanti pādapāḥ

original: namanti phalino vṛkṣā namanti guṇino janāḥ /
analyzed: namanti phalinaḥ vṛkṣāḥ namanti guṇinaḥ janāḥ

original: śuṣkavṛkṣāśca mūrkhāśca bhidyante na namanti ca // GarP_1,114.51 //
analyzed: śuṣka vṛkṣāḥ ca mūrkhāḥ ca bhidyante na namanti ca

original: aprārthitāni duḥ khāni yathaivāyānti yānti ca /
analyzed: a prārthitāni duḥ khāni yathā eva āyānti yānti ca

original: mārjāra iva lumpeta tathā prārthayitāra naraḥ // GarP_1,114.52 //
analyzed: mārjāraḥ iva lumpeta tathā naraḥ
pūrvam paścāt caranti ārye sadā eva bahu sampadaḥ

original: viparītamanārye ca yathecchasi tathā cara // GarP_1,114.53 //
analyzed: viparītam anārye ca yathā icchasi tathā cara
ṣaṣ karṇaḥ bhidyate mantraḥ catuḥ karṇaḥ ca dhāryate

original: dvikarṇasya tu mantrasya brahmāpyanta na budhyate // GarP_1,114.54 //
analyzed: dvi karṇasya tu mantrasya na budhyate

original: tayā gavā kiṃ kriyate yā na dogdhrī na garbhiṇī /
analyzed: tayā gavā kim kriyate yā na dogdhrī na garbhiṇī

original: kor'tha putreṇa jātena yo na vidvānna dhārmikaḥ // GarP_1,114.55 //
analyzed: kortha putreṇa jātena yaḥ na vidvān na dhārmikaḥ
ekena api su putreṇa vidyā yuktena dhīmatā

original: kulaṃ puruṣasiṃhena candreṇa gaganaṃ yathā // GarP_1,114.56 //
analyzed: kulam puruṣa siṃhena candreṇa gaganam yathā
ekena api su vṛkṣeṇa puṣpitena su gandhinā

original: vanaṃ suvāsitaṃ sarvaṃ suputreṇa kulaṃ yathā // GarP_1,114.57 //
analyzed: vanam su vāsitam sarvam su putreṇa kulam yathā

original: eko hi guṇavānputro nirguṇena śatena kim /
analyzed: ekaḥ hi guṇavān putraḥ nirguṇena śatena kim

original: candro hanti tamāṃsyeko na ca jyotiḥ sahasrakam // GarP_1,114.58 //
analyzed: candraḥ hanti tamāṃsi ekaḥ na ca jyotiḥ sahasrakam
lālayet pañca varṣāṇi daśa varṣāṇi tāḍayet

original: prāpte tu ṣoḍaśe varṣe putraṃ mitravadācaret // GarP_1,114.59 //
analyzed: prāpte tu ṣoḍaśe varṣe putram mitra vat ācaret
jāyamānaḥ haret dārān vardhamānaḥ haret dhanam
mriyamāṇaḥ haret prāṇān na asti putra samaḥ ripuḥ
kecid mṛga mukhāḥ vyāghrāḥ kecid vyāghra mukhāḥ mṛgāḥ
hi aviśvāsaḥ pade pade
ekaḥ kṣamāvatām doṣaḥ dvitīyaḥ nā upapadyate

original: yadenaṃ kṣamayā yuktamaśaktaṃ manyate janaḥ // GarP_1,114.62 //
analyzed: yat enam kṣamayā yuktam aśaktam manyate janaḥ
etat eva anumanyeta bhogāḥ hi kṣaṇa bhaṅginaḥ

original: snigdheṣu ca vidagdhasya matayo vai hyanākulāḥ // GarP_1,114.63 //
analyzed: snigdheṣu ca vidagdhasya matayaḥ vai hi an ākulāḥ

original: jyeṣṭhaḥ pitṛsamo bhrātā mṛte pitari śaunaka /
analyzed: jyeṣṭhaḥ pitṛ samaḥ bhrātā mṛte pitari śaunaka

original: sarveṣāṃ sa pitā hi syātsarveṣāmanupālakaḥ // GarP_1,114.64 //
analyzed: sarveṣām sa pitā hi syāt sarveṣām anupālakaḥ
kaniṣṭheṣu ca sarveṣu sama tvena anuvartate
yathā evam tanayeṣu ca
bahūnām alpa sārāṇām samavāyaḥ hi dāruṇaḥ
tṛṇaiḥ āveṣṭitā rajjuḥ tayā badhyate

original: apahṛtya parasvaṃ hi yastu dānaṃ prayacchati /
analyzed: apahṛtya para svam hi yaḥ tu dānam prayacchati

original: sa dātā narakaṃ yāti yasyārthāstasya tatphalam // GarP_1,114.67 //
analyzed: sa dātā narakam yāti yasya arthāḥ tasya tat phalam
deva dravya vināśena brahma sva haraṇena ca
kulāni akula tām yānti brāhmaṇa atikrameṇa ca

original: brahmaghne ca surāpe ca core bhagnavrate tathā /
analyzed: brahma ghne ca surā pe ca core bhagna vrate tathā

original: niṣkṛtirvihitā sadbhiḥ kṛtaghne nāsti niṣkṛtiḥ // GarP_1,114.69 //
analyzed: niṣkṛtiḥ vihitā sadbhiḥ kṛtaghne na asti niṣkṛtiḥ
pitaraḥ devāḥ kṣudrasya vṛṣalī pateḥ
bhāryā jitasya yasyāḥ ca upapatiḥ gṛhe
dīrdha roṣam anārjavam

original: caturo viddhi cāṇḍālāñjātyā jāyeta pañcamaḥ // GarP_1,114.71 //
analyzed: caturaḥ viddhi cāṇḍālān jātyā jāyeta pañcamaḥ
na upekṣitavyaḥ śatruḥ alpaḥ pi avajñayā
vahniḥ alpaḥ pi asaṃhāryaḥ kurute bhasmasāt jagat

original: nave vayasi yaḥ śāntaḥ sa śānta iti me matiḥ /
analyzed: nave vayasi yaḥ śāntaḥ sa śāntaḥ iti me matiḥ

original: dhātuṣu kṣīyamāṇeṣu śamaḥ kasya na jāyate // GarP_1,114.73 //
analyzed: dhātuṣu kṣīyamāṇeṣu śamaḥ kasya na jāyate
panthānaḥ iva vipra indra sarva sādhāraṇāḥ śriyaḥ

original: madīyā iti matvā vai na hi harṣayuto bhavet // GarP_1,114.74 //
analyzed: madīyāḥ iti matvā vai na hi harṣa yutaḥ bhavet

original: cittāyattaṃ dhātuvaśyaṃ śarīraṃ citte naṣṭe dhātavo yānti nāśam /
analyzed: citta āyattam dhātu vaśyam śarīram citte naṣṭe dhātavaḥ yānti nāśam

original: tasmāccittaṃ sarvadā rakṣaṇīyaṃ svasthe citte dhātavaḥ sambhavanti // GarP_1,114.75 //
analyzed: tasmāt cittam sarvadā rakṣaṇīyam svasthe citte dhātavaḥ sambhavanti

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bṛhadṛ nītisāre caturdaśottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe nīti sāre caturdaśottaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
sūtaḥ uvāca

original: kumāryāṃ ca kumitraṃ ca kurājānaṃ kuputrakam /
analyzed: kumāryām ca ku mitram ca ku rājānam ku putrakam

original: kukanyāṃ ca kudeśaṃ ca dūrataḥ parivarjayet // GarP_1,115.1 //
analyzed: ku kanyām ca ku deśam ca dūratas parivarjayet

original: dharmaḥ pravrajitastapaḥ pracalitaṃ satyaṃ ca dūraṃ gataṃ pṛthvī vandhyaphalā janāḥ kapaṭino laulye sthitā brāhmaṇāḥ /
analyzed: dharmaḥ pravrajitaḥ tapaḥ pracalitam satyam ca dūram gatam pṛthvī vandhya phalā janāḥ kapaṭinaḥ laulye sthitāḥ brāhmaṇāḥ

original: martyāḥ strīvaśagāḥ striyaśca capalā nīcā janā unnatāḥ hā kaṣṭaṃ khalujīvitaṃ kaliyuge dhanyā janā ye mṛtāḥ // GarP_1,115.2 //
analyzed: martyāḥ strī vaśa gāḥ striyaḥ ca capalāḥ nīcāḥ janāḥ unnatāḥ hā kaṣṭam khalu jīvitam kali yuge dhanyāḥ janāḥ ye mṛtāḥ

original: dhanyāste ye na paśyanti deśabhaṅgaṃ kulakṣayam /
analyzed: dhanyāḥ te ye na paśyanti deśa bhaṅgam kula kṣayam
para citta gatān dārān putram ku vyasane sthitam
ku putre nirvṛtiḥ nā asti ku bhāryāyām kutas ratiḥ

original: sumitra nāsti viśvāsaḥ kurājye nāsti jīvitam // GarP_1,115.4 //
analyzed: sumitra na asti viśvāsaḥ ku rājye na asti jīvitam

original: parānnaṃ ca parasvaṃ ca paraśayyāḥ parastriyaḥ /
analyzed: para annam ca para svam ca para śayyāḥ para striyaḥ
para veśmani vāsaḥ ca śakrāt api haret śriyam
ālāpāt gātra saṃsparśāt saṃsargāt saha bhojanāt
āsanāt śayanāt yānāt pāpam saṃkramate nṛṇām

original: striyo naśyanti rūpeṇa tapaḥ krodhana naśyati /
analyzed: striyaḥ naśyanti rūpeṇa tapaḥ krodhana naśyati
gāvaḥ śūdra annena dvijottamaḥ
āsanāt eka śayyāyām bojanāt paṅkti saṅkarāt

original: tataḥ saṃkramate pāpaṃ ghaṭāddhaṭa ivodakam // GarP_1,115.8 //
analyzed: tatas saṃkramate pāpam ghaṭāt dhaṭe iva udakam
lālane bahavaḥ doṣāḥ tāḍane bahavaḥ guṇāḥ

original: tasmācchiṣyaṃ ca putraṃ ca tāḍayenna tu lālayet // GarP_1,115.9 //
analyzed: tasmāt śiṣyam ca putram ca tāḍayet na tu lālayet

original: adhvā jarā dehavatāṃ parvatānāṃ jalaṃ jarā /
analyzed: adhvā jarā dehavatām parvatānām jalam jarā
asaṃbhogaḥ ca nārīṇām vastrāṇām ātapaḥ jarā
adhamāḥ kalim icchanti sandhim icchati madhyamāḥ

original: uttamā mānamicchanti māno hi mahatāṃ dhanam // GarP_1,115.11 //
analyzed: uttamāḥ mānam icchanti mānaḥ hi mahatām dhanam

original: māno hi mūlamarthasya māne sati dhanena kim /
analyzed: mānaḥ hi mūlam arthasya māne sati dhanena kim
prabhraṣṭa māna darpasya kim dhanena kim āyuṣā
adhamāḥ dhanam icchanti dhana mānau hi madhyamāḥ

original: uttamā mānamicchanti māno hi mahatāṃ dhanam // GarP_1,115.13 //
analyzed: uttamāḥ mānam icchanti mānaḥ hi mahatām dhanam

original: vane 'pi siṃhā na namanti kaṃ ca bubhu kṣitā māṃsanirīkṣaṇaṃ ca /
analyzed: vane pi siṃhāḥ na namanti kam ca bubhu kṣitāḥ māṃsa nirīkṣaṇam ca

original: dhanairvihīnāḥ sukuleṣu jātā na nīcakarmāṇi samārabhante // GarP_1,115.14 //
analyzed: dhanaiḥ vihīnāḥ su kuleṣu jātāḥ na nīca karmāṇi samārabhante

original: nābhiṣeko na saṃskāraḥ siṃhasya kriyate vane /
analyzed: na abhiṣekaḥ na saṃskāraḥ siṃhasya kriyate vane
nityam ūrjita sattvasya svayam eva mṛgendra tā

original: vaṇikpramādī bhṛkaśca mānī bhikṣurvilāsī hyadhanaśca kāmī /
analyzed: vaṇij pramādī mānī bhikṣuḥ vilāsī hi adhanaḥ ca kāmī

original: varāṅganā cāpriyavādinī ca na te ca karmāṇi samārabhante // GarP_1,115.16 //
analyzed: vara aṅganā ca apriya vādinī ca na te ca karmāṇi samārabhante

original: dātā daridraḥ kṛpaṇor'thayuktaḥ puttro 'vidheyaḥ kujanasya sevā /
analyzed: dātā daridraḥ kṛpaṇa artha yuktaḥ puttraḥ vidheyaḥ ku janasya sevā

original: paropakāreṣu narasya mṛtyuḥ prajāyate duścaritāni pañca // GarP_1,115.17 //
analyzed: para upakāreṣu narasya mṛtyuḥ prajāyate duścaritāni pañca

original: kāntāviyogaḥ svajanāpamānaṃ ṛṇasya śeṣaḥ kujanasya sevā /
analyzed: kāntā viyogaḥ sva jana apamānam ṛṇasya śeṣaḥ ku janasya sevā

original: dāridrayābhāvādvimukhāśca mitrā vināgninā pañca dahanti tīvrāḥ // GarP_1,115.18 //
analyzed: dāridrayā abhāvāt vimukhāḥ ca mitrāḥ vinā agninā pañca dahanti tīvrāḥ
cintā sahasreṣu ca teṣu madhye cintāḥ catasraḥ pi asi dhāra tulyāḥ

original: nīcāpamānaṃ kṣudhitaṃ kalatraṃ bhāryā viraktā sahajoparodhaḥ // GarP_1,115.19 //
analyzed: nīca apamānam kṣudhitam kalatram bhāryā viraktā sahaja uparodhaḥ

original: vaśyaśca purtrer'tha karī ca vidyā arogitā sajjanasaṅgatiśca /
analyzed: vaśyaḥ ca karī ca vidyā arogi tā sat jana saṅgatiḥ ca

original: iṣṭā ca bhāryā vaśavartinī ca duḥ khasya mūloddharaṇāni pañca // GarP_1,115.20 //
analyzed: iṣṭā ca bhāryā vaśa vartinī ca duḥ khasya mūla uddharaṇāni pañca
mīnāḥ hatāḥ pañcabiḥ eva pañca

original: ekaḥ pramāthī sa kathaṃ na ghātyo yaḥ sevate pañcabhireva pañca // GarP_1,115.21 //
analyzed: ekaḥ pramāthī sa katham na ghātyaḥ yaḥ sevate pañcabhiḥ eva pañca
adhīraḥ karkaśaḥ stabdhaḥ ku celaḥ svayam āgataḥ

original: pañca viprā na pūjyante bṛhaspatisamā api // GarP_1,115.22 //
analyzed: pañca viprāḥ na pūjyante bṛhaspati samāḥ api

original: āyuḥ karma ca vittaṃ ca vidyā nidhanameva ca /
analyzed: āyuḥ karma ca vittam ca vidyā nidhanam eva ca
pañca etāni vivicyante jāyamānasya dehinaḥ
parvata ārohaṇe toye gokule duṣṭa nigrahe
patitasya samutthāne śastāḥ pañca hi ete
guṇāḥ smṛtāḥ
abhra chāyā khale prītiḥ para nārīṣu saṃgatiḥ

original: pañcaite hyasthirā bhāvā yauvanāni dhanāni ca // GarP_1,115.25 //
analyzed: pañca ete hi asthirāḥ bhāvāḥ yauvanāni dhanāni ca
asthiram jīvitam loke asthiram dhana yauvanam

original: asthiraṃ puttradārādyaṃ dharmaḥ kīrtiryaśaḥ sthiram // GarP_1,115.26 //
analyzed: asthiram puttra dāra ādyam dharmaḥ kīrtiḥ yaśaḥ sthiram
jīvitam ati alpam rātriḥ tasya ardha hāriṇī
vyādhi śoka jarā āyāsaiḥ ardham tat api niṣphalam

original: āyurvarṣaśataṃ nṛṇāṃ parimitaṃ rātrau tadardhaṃ gataṃ tasyārdhasthitakiñcidardhamadhikaṃ bālyasya kāle gatam /
analyzed: āyuḥ varṣa śatam nṛṇām parimitam rātrau tad ardham gatam tasya ardha sthita kiñcid ardham adhikam bālyasya kāle gatam

original: kiñcidvandhuviyogaduḥ khamaraṇairbhūpālasevāgataṃ śeṣaṃ vāritaraṅgagarbhacapalaṃ mānena kiṃ māninām // GarP_1,115.28 //
analyzed: kiñcid vandhu viyoga duḥ kha maraṇaiḥ bhūpāla sevā gatam śeṣam vāri taraṅga garbha capalam mānena kim māninām
ahorātra mayaḥ loke jarā rūpeṇa saṃcaret

original: mṛtyurgrasati bhūtāni pavanaṃ pannago yathā // GarP_1,115.29 //
analyzed: mṛtyuḥ grasati bhūtāni pavanam pannagaḥ yathā

original: gacchatastiṣṭhato vāpi jāgrataḥ svapato na cet /
analyzed: gacchataḥ tiṣṭhataḥ vā api jāgrataḥ svapataḥ na ced
sarva sattva hita arthāya paśoḥ iva viceṣṭitam
ahita hita vicāra śūnya buddheḥ śruti samaye bahubhiḥ vitarkitasya

original: udarabharaṇamātratuṣṭabuddheḥ puruṣapaśośca paśośca ko viśeṣaḥ // GarP_1,115.31 //
analyzed: udara bharaṇa mātra tuṣṭa buddheḥ puruṣa paśoḥ ca paśoḥ ca kaḥ viśeṣaḥ

original: śaurye tapasi dāne ca yasya na prathitaṃ yaśaḥ /
analyzed: śaurye tapasi dāne ca yasya na prathitam yaśaḥ

original: vidyāyāmarthalābhe vā māturuccāra eva saḥ // GarP_1,115.32 //
analyzed: vidyāyām artha lābhe vā mātuḥ uccāre eva saḥ
yat jīvyate kṣaṇam api prathitam manuṣyaiḥ vijñāna vikrama yaśobhiḥ abhagna mānaiḥ

original: tannāma jīvitamiti pravadanti tajjñāḥ kāko 'pi jīvati ciraṃ ca baliṃ ca bhuṅkte // GarP_1,115.33 //
analyzed: tat nāma jīvitam iti pravadanti tad jñāḥ jīvati ciram ca balim ca bhuṅkte

original: kiṃ jīvitena dhanamānavivarjitena mitreṇa kiṃ bhavati bhītisaśaṅkitena /
analyzed: kim jīvitena dhana māna vivarjitena mitreṇa kim bhavati bhīti sa śaṅkitena

original: siṃhavrataṃ carata gacchata mā viṣādaṃ kāko 'pi jīvati ciraṃ ca baliṃ ca bhuṅkte // GarP_1,115.34 //
analyzed: siṃha vratam carata gacchata mā viṣādam kākaḥ pi jīvati ciram ca balim ca bhuṅkte

original: yo vātmanīha na gurau na ca bhṛtyavarge dīne dayāṃ na kurute na ca mitrakārye /
analyzed: yaḥ vā ātmani iha na gurau na ca bhṛtya varge dīne dayām na kurute na ca mitra kārye

original: kiṃ tasya jīvitaphalenamanuṣyaloke kāko 'pi jīvati ciraṃ ca baliṃ ca bhuṅkte // GarP_1,115.35 //
analyzed: kim tasya jīvita phalena manuṣya loke jīvati ciram ca balim ca bhuṅkte
yasya trivarga śūnyāni dināni āyānti yānti ca

original: sa lauhakārabhastreva śvasannapi na jīvati // GarP_1,115.36 //
analyzed: sa lauhakāra bhastrā iva śvasan api na jīvati
svādhīna vṛtteḥ sāphalyam na para adhīna varti tā

original: ye parādhīnakarmāṇo jīvanto 'pi ca te mṛtāḥ // GarP_1,115.37 //
analyzed: ye para adhīna karmāṇaḥ jīvantaḥ ca te mṛtāḥ
susva pūrāḥ vai kāpuruṣāḥ susva
pūraḥ mūṣika añjaliḥ
asantuṣṭaḥ kāpuruṣaḥ su alpakena api tuṣyati
abhra chāyā tṛṇāt agniḥ nocasevā pathaḥ jalam

original: veśyārāgaḥ khale prītiḥ ṣaḍete budvudopamāḥ // GarP_1,115.39 //
analyzed: veśyā rāgaḥ khale prītiḥ ṣaṭ ete budvuda upamāḥ

original: vācā vihitasārthena loko na ca sukhāyate /
analyzed: vācā vihita sārthena lokaḥ na ca sukhāyate

original: jīvitaṃ mānamūlaṃ hi māne mlāne kutaḥ sukham? // GarP_1,115.40 //
analyzed: jīvitam māna mūlam hi māne mlāne kutas sukham

original: abalasya balaṃ rājā bālasya ruditaṃ balam /
analyzed: abalasya balam rājā bālasya ruditam balam

original: balaṃ mūrkhasya maunaṃ hi taskarasyānṛtaṃ balam // GarP_1,115.41 //
analyzed: balam mūrkhasya maunam hi taskarasya anṛtam balam
yathā yathā hi puruṣaḥ śāstram samadhigacchati

original: tathātathāsya medhā syādvijñānaṃ cāsya rocate // GarP_1,115.42 //
analyzed: tathā tathā asya medhā syāt vijñānam ca asya rocate

original: yathāyathā hi puruṣaḥ kalyāṇe kurute matim /
analyzed: yathā yathā hi puruṣaḥ kalyāṇe kurute matim

original: tathātathā hi sarvatra śliṣyate lokasupriyaḥ // GarP_1,115.43 //
analyzed: tathā tathā hi sarvatra śliṣyate loka su priyaḥ
lobha pramāda viśvāsaiḥ puruṣaḥ naśyati tribhiḥ

original: tasmāllobho na kartavyaḥ pramādo nona viśvaset // GarP_1,115.44 //
analyzed: tasmāt lobhaḥ na kartavyaḥ pramādaḥ viśvaset
tāvat bhayasya bhetavyam yāvat bhayam anāgatam

original: utpanne tu bhaye tīvre sthātavyaṃ vai hyabhītavat // GarP_1,115.45 //
analyzed: utpanne tu bhaye tīvre sthātavyam vai hi abhīta vat
ṛṇa śeṣam ca agni śeṣam vyādhi śeṣam tathā eva ca

original: punaḥ punaḥ pravardhante tasmāccheṣaṃ na kārayet // GarP_1,115.46 //
analyzed: punar punar pravardhante tasmāt śeṣam na kārayet
kṛte pratikṛtam kuryāt hiṃsite pratihiṃsitam

original: na tatra doṣaṃ paśyāmi duṣṭe doṣaṃ samācaret // GarP_1,115.47 //
analyzed: na tatra doṣam paśyāmi duṣṭe doṣam samācaret
parokṣe kārya hantāram pratyakṣe priya vādinam
varjayet tādṛśam mitram māyā mayam arim tathā
durjanasya hi saṃgena vinaśyati
prasannam api pānīyam kardamaiḥ kaluṣīkṛtam
sa bhuṅkte sa dvijaḥ bhuṅkte sama śeṣa nirūpaṇam
tasmāt sarva prayatnena dvijaḥ pūjyaḥ prayatnataḥ

original: tadbhujyate yaddvijabhuktaśeṣaṃ sa buddhimānyo na karoti pāpam /
analyzed: tat bhujyate yat dvija bhukta śeṣam sa buddhimān yaḥ na karoti pāpam

original: tatsauhṛdaṃ yakriyate parokṣe dambhairvinā yaḥ kriyate sa dharmaḥ // GarP_1,115.51 //
analyzed: tat sauhṛdam parokṣe dambhaiḥ vinā yaḥ kriyate sa dharmaḥ

original: na sā sabhā yatra na santi vṛddhāḥ vṛddhā na te ye na vadanti dharmam /
analyzed: na sā sabhā yatra na santi vṛddhāḥ vṛddhāḥ na te ye na vadanti dharmam

original: dharmaḥ sa no yatra na satyamasti naitatsatyaṃ yacchalenānuviddham // GarP_1,115.52 //
analyzed: dharmaḥ sa no yatra na satyam asti na etat satyam yat chalena anuviddham
brāhmaṇaḥ pi manuṣyāṇām ādityaḥ ca eva tejasām
śiraḥ sarva gātrāṇām vratānām satyam uttamam

original: tanmaṅgalaṃ yatra manaḥ prasannaṃ tajjīvanaṃ yanna parasya sevā /
analyzed: tat maṅgalam yatra manaḥ prasannam tat jīvanam yat na parasya sevā

original: tadarjitaṃ yatsvajanena bhuktaṃ tadgarjitaṃ yatsamare ripūṇām // GarP_1,115.54 //
analyzed: tat arjitam yat sva janena bhuktam tat garjitam yat samare ripūṇām

original: sā strīyā na madaṃ kuryātsa sukhī tṛṣṇayojjhitaḥ /
analyzed: sā strīyā na madam kuryāt sa sukhī tṛṣṇayā ujjhitaḥ

original: tanmitraṃ yatra viśvāsaḥ puruṣaḥ sa jitendriyaḥ // GarP_1,115.55 //
analyzed: tat mitram yatra viśvāsaḥ puruṣaḥ sa jita indriyaḥ
tatra mukta ādara snehaḥ viluptam yatra sauhṛdam

original: tadeva kevalaṃ ślaghyaṃ yasyātmā kriyate stutau // GarP_1,115.56 //
analyzed: tat eva kevalam ślaghyam yasya ātmā kriyate stutau
nadīnām agnihotrāṇām bhāratasya kalasya ca

original: mūlānveṣo na kartavyo mūlāddoṣo na hīyate // GarP_1,115.57 //
analyzed: mūla anveṣaḥ na kartavyaḥ mūlāt doṣaḥ na hīyate
lavaṇajala antāḥ nadyaḥ strī bheda antam ca maithunam

original: ṣaiśunyaṃ janavārtāntaṃ vittaṃ duḥ khatrayāntakam // GarP_1,115.58 //
analyzed: ṣaiśunyam jana vārtā antam vittam duḥ kha traya antakam
rājya śrīḥ brahma śāpa antā pāpa antam brahmavarcasam

original: ācāntaṃ ghoṣavāsāntaṃ kulasyāntaṃ striyā prabho (bhuḥ) // GarP_1,115.59 //
analyzed: ācāntam ghoṣa vāsa antam kulasya antam striyā prabho bhuḥ
sarve kṣaya antāḥ nilayāḥ patana antāḥ samucchrayāḥ

original: saṃyogā viprayogāntā maraṇāntaṃ hi jīvitam // GarP_1,115.60 //
analyzed: saṃyogāḥ viprayoga antāḥ maraṇa antam hi jīvitam
yadi icchet punar āgantum na ati dūram anuvrajet
udaka antāt nivarteta snigdha varṇāt ca pādapāt

original: anāyake na vastavyaṃ na caiva bahunāyake /
analyzed: anāyake na vastavyam na ca eva bahu nāyake

original: strīnāyake na vastavyaṃ vastavyaṃ bālanāyake // GarP_1,115.62 //
analyzed: strī nāyake na vastavyam vastavyam bāla nāyake

original: pitā rakṣati kaumāre bhattā rakṣati yauvane /
analyzed: pitā rakṣati kaumāre bhattā rakṣati yauvane

original: putrastu sthavire kāle na strī svātantryamarhati // GarP_1,115.63 //
analyzed: putraḥ tu sthavire kāle na strī svātantryam arhati
tyajet vandhyām aṣṭame bde navame tu mṛta prijām
ekādaśe strī jananīm sadyas ca apriyā vādinīm
an arthi tvāt manuṣyāṇām bhiyā parijanasya ca
arthāt apeta maryādāḥ trayaḥ tiṣṭhanti bhartṛṣu

original: aśvaṃ śrāntaṃ gajaṃ mattaṃ gāvaḥ prathamasūtikāḥ /
analyzed: aśvam śrāntam gajam mattam gāvaḥ prathama sūtikāḥ

original: anūdake ca maṇḍūkānprājño dūreṇa varjayet // GarP_1,115.66 //
analyzed: anūdake ca maṇḍūkān prājñaḥ dūreṇa varjayet

original: arthāturāṇāṃ na suhṛnna bandhuḥ kāmāturāṇāṃ na bhayaṃ na lajjā /
analyzed: artha āturāṇām na suhṛd na bandhuḥ kāma āturāṇām na bhayam na lajjā

original: cintāturāṇāṃ na sukhaṃ na nidrā kṣudhāturāṇāṃ na balaṃ na tejaḥ // GarP_1,115.67 //
analyzed: cintā āturāṇām na sukham na nidrā kṣudhā āturāṇām na balam na tejaḥ
kutas nidrā daridrasya para preṣya varasya ca
para nārī prasaktasya para dravya harasya ca
sukham svapiti anṛṇavān vyādhi muktaḥ ca yaḥ naraḥ

original: sāvakāśastu vai bhuṅkte yastu dārairna saṅgataḥ // GarP_1,115.69 //
analyzed: sa avakāśaḥ tu vai bhuṅkte yaḥ tu dāraiḥ na saṅgataḥ
ambhasaḥ parimāṇe unnatam kamalam bhavet

original: svasvāminā balavatā bhṛtyo bhavati garvitaḥ // GarP_1,115.70 //
analyzed: sva svāminā balavatā bhṛtyaḥ bhavati garvitaḥ
sthāna sthitasya padmasya mitre varuṇa bhāskarau
sthāna cyutasya tasya eva kleda śoṣaṇa kārakau

original: ye padasthasya mittrāṇi te tasya riputāṃ gatāḥ /
analyzed: ye pada sthasya mittrāṇi te tasya ripu tām gatāḥ

original: bhānoḥ padme jale prītiḥ sthaloddharaṇaśoṣaṇaḥ // GarP_1,115.72 //
sthānasthitāni pūjyante pūjyante ca pade sthitāḥ /
analyzed: sthāna sthitāni pūjyante pūjyante ca pade sthitāḥ

original: sthānabhraṣṭā na pūjyante keśā dantā nakhā narāḥ // GarP_1,115.73 //
analyzed: sthāna bhraṣṭāḥ na pūjyante keśāḥ dantāḥ nakhāḥ narāḥ
ācāraḥ kulam ākhyati deśam ākhyāti bhāṣitam
sambhramaḥ sneham ākhyāti vapuḥ ākhyāti bhojanam

original: vṛthā vṛṣṭiḥ samudrasya vṛthā tṛptasya bhojanam /
analyzed: vṛthā vṛṣṭiḥ samudrasya vṛthā tṛptasya bhojanam

original: vṛthā dānaṃ samṛddhasya nīcasya sukṛtaṃ vathā // GarP_1,115.75 //
analyzed: vṛthā dānam samṛddhasya nīcasya sukṛtam vathā

original: dūrastho 'pi samīpastho yo yasya hṛdaye sthitaḥ /
analyzed: dūra sthaḥ samīpa sthaḥ yaḥ yasya hṛdaye sthitaḥ
hṛdayāt api niṣkrāntaḥ samīpa sthaḥ dūratas
mukha bhaṅgaḥ svaraḥ dīnaḥ gātra svedaḥ mahat bhayam

original: maraṇe yāni cihnāni tāni cihnāni yācake // GarP_1,115.77 //
analyzed: maraṇe yāni cihnāni tāni cihnāni yācake
kubjasya kīṭa ghātasya vātāt niṣkāsitasya ca

original: śikhare vasatastasya varaṃ janma na yācitam // GarP_1,115.78 //
analyzed: śikhare vasataḥ tasya varam janma na yācitam
jagatpatiḥ hi yācitvā viṣṇuḥ vāmana tām yatas

original: kānyo 'dhikatarastasya yor'tho yāti na lāghavam // GarP_1,115.79 //
analyzed: dhikataraḥ tasya yaḥ ṛthaḥ yāti na lāghavam

original: mātā śatruḥ pitā vairī bālā yena na pāṭhitāḥ /
analyzed: mātā śatruḥ pitā vairī bālāḥ yena na pāṭhitāḥ

original: sabhāmadhye na śobhante haṃsamadhye bakāyathā // GarP_1,115.80 //
analyzed: sabhā madhye na śobhante haṃsa madhye bakāḥ yathā

original: vidyā nāma kurūparūpamadhikaṃ vidyātiguptaṃ dhanaṃ vidyā sādhukarī janapriyakarī vidyā gurūṇāṃ guruḥ /
analyzed: vidyā nāma ku rūpa rūpam adhikam vidyā ati guptam dhanam vidyā sādhu karī jana priya karī vidyā gurūṇām guruḥ

original: vidyā bandhujanārtināśanakarī vidyā paraṃ daivataṃ vidyā rājasu pūjitā hi manujo vidyavihīnaḥ paśuḥ // GarP_1,115.81 //
analyzed: vidyā bandhu jana ārti nāśana karī vidyā param daivatam vidyā rājasu pūjitā hi manujaḥ vidya vihīnaḥ paśuḥ

original: gṛhe cābhyantare dravyaṃ lagnaṃ caiva tu dṛśyate /
analyzed: gṛhe ca abhyantare dravyam lagnam ca eva tu dṛśyate

original: aśeṣaṃ haraṇīyaṃ ca vidyā na hriyate paraiḥ // GarP_1,115.82 //
analyzed: aśeṣam haraṇīyam ca vidyā na hriyate paraiḥ
śaunakīyam nīti sāram viṣṇuḥ sarvatra tāni ca
kathayāmāsa vaipūrvam tatra śuśrāva śaṅkaraḥ
śaṅkarāt aśṛṇot vyāsaḥ vyāsāt asmābhiḥ eva ca

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe śaunakoktanītisārādivarṇanaṃ nāma pañcadaśottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe śaunakoktanītisārādivarṇanam nāma pañcadaśottaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
brahmā uvāca

original: vratāni vyāsa vakṣyāmi hariryaiḥ sarvado bhavet /
analyzed: vratāni vyāsa vakṣyāmi hariḥ yaiḥ sarva daḥ bhavet
sarva māsa ṛkṣa tithiṣu vāreṣu hariḥ arcitaḥ
eka bhaktena naktena upavāsa phala ādinā
dadāti dhana dhānya ādi putra rājya jaya ādikam
vaiśvānaraḥ pratipadi kuberaḥ pūjita ūrtha daḥ
poṣya brahmo pratipadi arcitaḥ śriḥ tathā aśvinī
dvitīyāyām yamaḥ lakṣmī nārāyaṇaḥ iha artha daḥ
tṛtīyāyām tri devāḥ ca gaurī vighneśa śaṅkarāḥ
caturthyām ca catur vyūhaḥ pañcamyām arcitaḥ hariḥ

original: kārtikeyo raviḥ ṣaṣṭhyāṃ saptamyāṃ bhāskaror'thadaḥ // GarP_1,116.5 //
analyzed: kārtikeyaḥ raviḥ ṣaṣṭhyām saptamyām bhāskara ūrtha daḥ
durgā aṣṭamyām navamyām ca
daśamyām ca yamaḥ candraḥ ekādaśyām ṛṣīn yajet
dvādaśyām ca hariḥ kāmaḥ trayodaśyām maheśvaraḥ

original: caturdaśyāṃ pañcadaśyāṃ brahmā ca pitaror'thadāḥ // GarP_1,116.7 //
analyzed: caturdaśyām pañcadaśyām brahmā ca pitaraḥ ṛtha dāḥ
amāvāsyām pūjanīyāḥ vārāḥ vai bhāskara ādayaḥ

original: nakṣatrāṇi ca yogāśca pūjitāḥ sarvadāyakāḥ // GarP_1,116.8 //
analyzed: nakṣatrāṇi ca yogāḥ ca pūjitāḥ sarva dāyakāḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe tithyādivratavarṇanaṃ nāma ṣoḍaśottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe tithyādivratavarṇanam nāma ṣoḍaśottaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
brahmā uvāca
mārgaśīrṣe site pakṣe
anaṅgāya iti naivedyam madhaprāśyā atha pauṣake
yogeśvaram pūjayet ca bilva patraiḥ kadamba jam
dantakāṣṭham candana ādi naivedyam kṛsara ādikam
māghe naṭeśvarāya arcya kundaiḥ mauktika mālayā

original: plakṣeṇa dantakāṣṭhaṃ ca naivedyaṃ pūrikā mune // GarP_1,117.3 //
analyzed: plakṣeṇa dantakāṣṭham ca naivedyam pūrikā mune
vīreśvaram phālgune tu pūjayet tu marū bakaiḥ
śarkarā śākam aṇḍāḥ ca cūta jam dantadhāvanam
caitre yajet su rūpāya karpūram prāśayet niśi
naivedyam śaṣkulīm dadet
pūjā damanakaḥ śambhoḥ veśākhe śokra puṣpakaiḥ
mahārūpāya naivedyam guḍa bhaktam puṭṭabaram
dantakāṣṭham prāśayet ca dadet jatī phalam tathā
pradyumnam pūjayet jyeṣṭhe campakaiḥ bilva jam daśet
lava gārā tathā ṣaṣ hi umāmadati śāsanaḥ
agurum dantakāṣṭham ca tam apāmārgakaiḥ yajet
śrāvaṇe karavīram ca śambhave śūlapāṇaye
gandha aśanaḥ ghṛta ādyaiḥ ca karavīra ja śodhanam
sadyojātam bhādrapade bakulaiḥ pūpakaiḥ yajet
gandharva āśaḥ madanakam āśvine ca surādhipam
campakaiḥ svarṇavā
yādaḥ jinma udaka saṃpradaḥ

original: khādiraṃ dantakāṣṭhaṃ ca kārtike rudramarcayet // GarP_1,117.11 //
analyzed: khādiram dantakāṣṭham ca kārtike rudram arcayet
badaryāḥ dantakāṣṭham ca madanaḥ daśama aśanaḥ
kṣīra śāka pradaḥ padmaiḥ śivam arcayet
rati muktam anaṅgam ca svarṇa maṇḍala saṃsthitam
gandha ādyaiḥ daśa sāhasram tila vrīhi ādi homayet
jāgaram vedayet

original: dvijāya śayyāṃ pātraṃ ca chatraṃ vastramupānahau // GarP_1,117.14 //
analyzed: dvijāya śayyām pātram ca chatram vastram upānahau
gām dvijam bhojayet bhaktyā kṛtakṛtyaḥ bhavet naraḥ
etat udyāpanam sarvam vrateṣu
phalam ca śrī suta ārogya saubhāgya svargatam bhavet

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe 'naṅgatrayodaśīvrataṃ nāma saptadaśottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe naṅgatrayodaśīvratam nāma saptadaśottaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
brahmā uvāca
vratam kaivalya śamanam akhaṇḍadvādaśīm vade

original: māgaśīrṣe site pakṣe gavyāśī samupoṣitaḥ // GarP_1,118.1 //
analyzed: māgaśīrṣe site pakṣe gavya āśī samupoṣitaḥ
dvādaśyām dviṣṇum dadyāt māsa catuṣṭayam
pañca vrīhi yutam pātram viprāya idam udāharet

original: saptajanmani he viṣṇo yanmayā hi vrataṃ kṛtam /
analyzed: sapta janmani he viṣṇo yat mayā hi vratam kṛtam
bhagavan tvad prasādena tat akhaṇḍam iha astu me
yathākhaṇḍam jagat sarvam tvam eva puruṣottama

original: tathākhilānyakhaṇḍāni vritāni mama santi vai // GarP_1,118.4 //
analyzed: tathā akhilāni akhaṇḍāni mama santi vai
saktu pātrāṇi caitra ādau śrāvaṇa ādau ghṛta anvitān
vrata kṛt vata pūrṇaḥ tu strī putra svarga bhāj bhavet

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe 'khaṇḍadvādaśīvratakathanaṃnāmāṣṭādaśottara śatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe khaṇḍadvādaśīvratakathanaṃnāmā aṣṭādaśottara śatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
brahmā uvāca

original: aprāpte bhāskare kanyāṃ sati bhāge tribhirdinaiḥ // GarP_1,119.1 //
analyzed: aprāpte bhāskare kanyām sati bhāge tribhiḥ dinaiḥ

original: arghyaṃ dadyādagastyāya mūrtiṃ saṃpūjya vai mune / /
analyzed: arghyam dadyāt agastyāya mūrtim saṃpūjya vai mune
kāśa puṣpa mayīm kumbhe pradoṣe kṛta jāgaraḥ
dadhi akṣata ādyaiḥ saṃpūjya upoṣya phala puṣpakaiḥ
pañca varṇa samāyuktam hema raupya samanvitam
saptadhānya yutam pātram dadhi candana carcitam
agastyaḥ khanamānā iti mantreṇa arghyam
agni māruta sambhava

original: mitrāvāruṇayoḥ puttro kumbhayone namo 'stu te // GarP_1,119.5 //
analyzed: mitrāvāruṇayoḥ kumbha yone namaḥ stu te
śūdra strī ādiḥ anena eva tyajet dhānyam phalam rasam
dadyāt dvijātaye kumbham sa hiraṇyam sa dakṣiṇam

original: bhojayecca dvijānsapta varṣaṃ kṛtvā tu sarvabhāk // GarP_1,119.6 //
analyzed: bhojayet ca dvijān sapta varṣam kṛtvā tu sarva bhāj

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe 'gastyārghyavrataṃ nāmakonaviṃśatyuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe gastyārghyavratam nāmaka ūnaviṃśatyuttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
brahmā uvāca
rambhātṛtīyām vakṣya ca saubhagya śrī suta ādi dām
mārgaśīrṣe site pakṣe tṛtīyāyām upoṣitaḥ
gaurīm yajet vilva patraiḥ kuśa udaka karaḥ tatas
tanta kāṣṭham phālgune gomatīm yajet

original: kundaiḥ kṛtvā dantakāṣṭhaṃ jīvāśaḥ śaṣkulīpradaḥ // GarP_1,120.4 //
analyzed: kundaiḥ kṛtvā dantakāṣṭham jīva āśaḥ śaṣkulī pradaḥ
viśālākṣīm damanakaiḥ caitre ca kṛsara pradaḥ

original: dadhiprāśo dantakāṣṭhaṃ tagaraṃ śrīmukhīṃ yajet // GarP_1,120.5 //
analyzed: dadhi prāśaḥ dantakāṣṭham tagaram śrīmukhīm yajet
vaiśākhe karṇikāraiḥ ca aśoka āśaḥ vaṭa pradaḥ
jyeṣṭhe nārāyaṇīm arcet śatapatraiḥ ca khaṇḍa daḥ

original: lavaṅgāśo bhavedeva āṣāḍhe mādhavīṃ yajet // GarP_1,120.6 //
analyzed: lavaṅga āśaḥ bhavet eva āṣāḍhe mādhavīm yajet
tila āśaḥ bilva patraiḥ ca kṣīra anna vaṭaka pradaḥ

original: audumbaraṃ dantakāṣṭhaṃ tagaryāḥ śrāvaṇe śriyam // GarP_1,120.7 //
analyzed: audumbaram dantakāṣṭham tagaryāḥ śrāvaṇe śriyam
dantakāṣṭham mallikāyāḥ kṣīra daḥ hi uttamām yajet
padmaiḥ yajet bhādrapade
rājaputrīm ca āśvayuje japā puṣpaiḥ ca jīrakam

original: prāśayenniśi naivedyaiḥ kṛsaraiḥ kārtike yajet // GarP_1,120.9 //
analyzed: prāśayet niśi naivedyaiḥ kṛsaraiḥ kārtike yajet
jātī puṣpaiḥ padmajām ca pañcagavya aśanaḥ yajet
ghṛtodanam ca varṣā ante sa patnīkān dvijān yajet
umāmaheśvaram pūjya pradadyāt ca guḍa ādikam
vastra chatra suvarṇa ādyaiḥ rātrau ca kṛta jāgaraḥ
gīta vādyaiḥ dadat pratarga vādyam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe rambhātṛtīyāvrataṃ nāma viṃśatyuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe rambhātṛtīyāvratam nāma viṃśatyuttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
brahmā uvāca
cāturmāsya vratāni ūce ekādaśyām samācaret
āṣāḍhyām paurṇamāsyām vā sarveṇa harim arcya ca

original: idaṃ vrataṃ mayā deva gṛhītaṃ puratastava /
analyzed: idam vratam mayā deva gṛhītam puratas tava

original: nirvighnaṃ siddhimāpnotu prasanne tvayi keśava // GarP_1,121.2 //
analyzed: nirvighnam siddhim āpnotu prasanne tvayi keśava
gṛhīte smin vrate deva yadi apūrṇe mriyāmi aham
tat me bhavatu sampūrṇam tvad prasādāt janārdana
evam abhyarcya gṛhṇīyāt vrata arcana japa ādikam

original: sarvāghaṃ ca kṣayaṃ yāti cikīrṣedyo harervratam // GarP_1,121.4 //
analyzed: sarva agham ca kṣayam yāti cikīrṣet yaḥ hareḥ vratam
gṛhṇīyāt vrata arcana japa ādikam
snātvā yat caturaḥ māsān eka bhaktena pūjayet

original: viṣṇuṃ sa yāti viṣṇorva lokaṃ malavivarjitam // GarP_1,121.5 //
analyzed: viṣṇum sa yāti lokam mala vivarjitam
veda vid hari pūjanāt
taila varji viṣṇu lokam viṣṇu bhāj kṛcchra pāda kṛt
eka rātra upavāsāt ca devaḥ vaimānikaḥ bhavet
śvetadvīpam tri rātrāt tu vrajet ṣaṣṭha anna kṛt naraḥ
cāndrāyaṇāt hareḥ dhāma labhet muktim a yācitām
prājāpatyam viṣṇu lokam parāka vrata kṛt harim
saktu yāvaka bhikṣā āśī payaḥ dadhi ghṛta aśanaḥ
go mūtra yāvaka āhāraḥ pañcagavya kṛta aśanaḥ
śāka mala phala ādi āśī ca viṣṇu bhāj

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe cāturmāsyavratanirūpaṇaṃ nāmakāvaśatyuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe cāturmāsyavratanirūpaṇam dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
brahmā uvāca
vratam māsopavāsa ākhyam sarva utkṛṣṭam vadāmi te
vānaprasthaḥ yatiḥ nārī kuryāt māsopavāsakam
āśvinasya site pakṣe ekādaśyām upoṣitaḥ
vratam etat tu gṛhṇīyāt yāvat triṃśat dināni tu
adya prabhṛti aham viṣṇo yāvat utthānakam tava
dināni triṃśat eva tu
kārtika āśvinayoḥ viṣṇo dvādaśyoḥ śuklayoḥ aham

original: mriyeyadyantarāle tu vratabhaṅgo na me bhavet // GarP_1,122.4 //
analyzed: mriyeyadi antarāle tu vrata bhaṅgaḥ na me bhavet
harim yaja ud triṣavaṇa snāyī gandha ādibhiḥ vratī
gātra abhyaṅgam gandha lepam devatāyatane tyajet
dvādaśyām atha saṃpūjya pradadyāt dvija bhojanam
tatas ca pāraṇam kuryāt hareḥ māsopavāsa kṛt
dugdha ādi prāśanam kuryāt vrata sthaḥ mūrchitaḥ ntarā
dugdha ādyaiḥ na vratam naśyet bhukti muktim avāpnuyāt

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe māsopavāsavrataṃ nāma dvāviṃśatyuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe māsopavāsavratam nāma dvāviṃśatyuttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
brahmā uvāca

original: vratāni kārtike vakṣye snātvā viṣṇuṃ prapūjayet /
analyzed: vratāni kārtike vakṣye snātvā viṣṇum prapūjayet

original: ekabhaktena naktena māsaṃ vāyācitena vā // GarP_1,123.1 //
analyzed: eka bhaktena naktena māsam vā a yācitena vā
dugdha śāka phala ādyaiḥ vā upavāsena vā punar
sarva pāpa vinirmuktaḥ prāpta kāmaḥ harim vrajet
sadā hareḥ vratam śreṣṭham tatas syāt dakṣiṇāyane
cāturmāsye tatas tasmāt kārtike bhīṣmapañcakam
tatas śreṣṭha vratam śuklasya ekādaśyām samācaret
snātvā tri kālam pitṛ ādīn yava ādyaiḥ arcayet harim
yajet maunī ghṛta ādyaiḥ ca pañcagavyena vāribhiḥ
snāpayitvā atha karpūra mukhaiḥ ca eva anulepayet
ghṛta akta guggulaiḥ dhūpam dvijaḥ pañca dinam dahet

original: naivadyaṃ paramānnaṃ tu japedaṣṭottaraṃ śatam // GarP_1,123.6 //
analyzed: naivadyam paramānnam tu japet aṣṭa uttaram śatam
om namaḥ vāsudevāya ghṛta vrīhi tila ādikam

original: aṣṭākṣareṇa mantreṇa svāhāntena tu homayet // GarP_1,123.7 //
analyzed: aṣṭa akṣareṇa mantreṇa svāhā antena tu homayet
prathame hni hareḥ pādau yajet padmaiḥ
bilva patraiḥ jānu deśam nābhi gandhena ca apare
skandhāḥ bilva javābhiḥ ca pañcame hni śiraḥ ūrcayat
mālatyāḥ bhūmi śāyī syāt gomayam prāśayet kramāt

original: gomūtraṃ ca dadhi kṣīraṃ pañcame pañcagavyakam /
analyzed: go mūtram ca dadhi kṣīram pañcame pañcagavyakam
naktam kuryāt pañcadaśyām vratī syāt bhukti mukti bhāj
ekādaśīvratam nityam tat kuryāt pakṣayoḥ dvayoḥ
agha ogha narakam hanyāt sarva dam viṣṇu loka dam

original: ekādaśī dvādaśī ca niśānte ca trayodaśī /
analyzed: ekādaśī dvādaśī ca niśā ante ca trayodaśī

original: nityamekādaśī yatra tatra sannihito hariḥ // GarP_1,123.12 //
analyzed: nityam ekādaśī yatra tatra sannihitaḥ hariḥ
daśamī ekādaśī yatra tatra sthāḥ ca asura ādayaḥ

original: dvādaśyāṃ pāraṇa kuryātsūtake mṛtake caret // GarP_1,123.13 //
analyzed: dvādaśyām kuryāt sūtake mṛtake caret
caturdaśīm pratipadam pūrva miśrām upāvaset
paurṇamāsyāḥ mamāvāsyām pratipad miśritām mune
dvitīyām tṛtīyā miśrām tṛtīyām ca api upāvaset
caturthyā saṅga tām nityam yutām
pañcamīm ṣaṣṭhī a saṃyuktām ṣaṣṭhyā yuktām ca saptamīm

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bhīṣmapañcakādivrataṃ nāma trayoviṃśatyuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe bhīṣmapañcakādivratam nāma trayoviṃśatyuttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
brahmā uvāca
śivarātri vratam vakṣye kathām vai sarva kāma dām

original: yathā ca gaurī bhūteśaṃ pṛcchati sma paraṃ vratam // GarP_1,124.1 //
analyzed: yathā ca gaurī bhūteśam pṛcchati sma param vratam
īśvarā uvāca
māgha phālgunayoḥ madhye kṛṣṇā yā tu caturdaśī
tasyām jāgaraṇāt rudraḥ pūjitaḥ bhukti mukti daḥ
kāma yuktaḥ haraḥ pūjyaḥ keśavaḥ
upoṣitaiḥ pūjitaḥ san narakāt tarayat tathā
rājā pāpī sundarasenakaḥ

original: sa kukruraiḥ samāyukto mṛgānhantuṃ vanaṃ gataḥ // GarP_1,124.4 //
analyzed: sa kukruraiḥ samāyuktaḥ mṛgān hantum vanam gataḥ
mṛga ādi kam a saṃprāpya kṣudh pipāsā arditaḥ girau
rātrau taḍāga tīreṣu nikuñje jāgrat āsthitaḥ
tatra asti liṅgam svam rakṣan śarīram ca akṣipat tatas

original: parṇāni cāpatanmūrdhni liṅgasyaiva na jānataḥ // GarP_1,124.6 //
analyzed: parṇāni ca apatat mūrdhni liṅgasya eva na jānataḥ

original: tena dhūlinirodhāya kṣiptaṃ nīraṃ ca liṅgake /
analyzed: tena dhūli nirodhāya kṣiptam nīram ca liṅgake
śaraḥ pramādena ekaḥ tu pracyutaḥ karapallavāt
jānubhyām avanīm gatvā liṅgam spṭaṣṭvā gṛhītavān

original: evaṃ snānaṃ sparśanaṃ ca pūjanaṃ jāgaro 'bhavat // GarP_1,124.8 //
analyzed: evam snānam sparśanam ca pūjanam jāgaraḥ
prātar gṛha āgataḥ bhāryā datta annam bhuktavān sa ca

original: kāle mṛto yamabhaṭaiḥ pāśairbaddhvā tu nīyate // GarP_1,124.9 //
analyzed: kāle mṛtaḥ yama bhaṭaiḥ pāśaiḥ baddhvā tu nīyate

original: tadā mama gaṇairyuddhe jitvā muktīkṛtaḥ sa ca /
analyzed: tadā mama gaṇaiḥ yuddhe jitvā muktīkṛtaḥ sa ca
kukkureṇa saha evā abhūt gaṇaḥ mad pārśva gaḥ malaḥ
evam ajñānataḥ puṇyan jñānāt puṇyam atha akṣayam

original: trayodaśyāṃ śivaṃ pūjya kuryātta niyamaṃ vratī // GarP_1,124.11 //
analyzed: trayodaśyām śivam pūjya niyamam vratī
prātar deva
caturdaśyām jāgariṣyāmi aham niśi

original: pūjāṃ dānaṃ tapo homaṃ kariṣyāmyātmaśaktitaḥ // GarP_1,124.12 //
analyzed: pūjām dānam tapaḥ homam kariṣyāmi ātma śaktitaḥ
caturdaśyām nirāhāraḥ bhūtvā śambho pare hani

original: bhokṣye 'haṃ bhuktimuktyarthaṃ śaraṇaṃ me bhaveśvara // GarP_1,124.13 //
analyzed: bhokṣye ham bhukti mukti artham śaraṇam me bhava īśvara
pañcagavya amṛtaiḥ snāpya tad kāle gurum śritaḥ

original: oṃ namo namaḥ śivāya gandhādyaḥ pūjayeddharam // GarP_1,124.14 //
analyzed: om namaḥ namaḥ śivāya gandha ādyaḥ pūjayet haram
tila taṇḍula vrīhīn ca juhuyāt sa ghṛtam carum
hutvā pūrṇāhutim dattvā śṛṇuyāt gīta sat kathām

original: ardharātre triyāme ca caturthe ca punayarjat /
analyzed: ardharātre tri yāme ca caturthe ca

original: mūlamantraṃ tathā japtvā prabhāte tu kṣamāpayet // GarP_1,124.16 //
analyzed: mūlamantram tathā japtvā prabhāte tu kṣamāpayet
avighnena vratam deva
tvad prasadāt mayā arcitam
kṣamasva jagatām nātha
trailokya adhipate hara
yat mayā adya kṛtam puṇyam yat rudrasya niveditam
tvad prasādāt mayā deva
vratam adya samāpitam

original: prasanno bhava me śrīman gṛhaṃ prati ca gamyatām /
analyzed: prasannaḥ bhava me śrīman gṛham prati ca gamyatām
tvad ālokana mātreṇa pavitraḥ smi na saṃśayaḥ
bhojayet dhyāna niṣṭhān ca vastra chatra ādikam dadet
deva ādideva bhūteśa loka anugraha kāraka

original: yanmayā śraddhayā dattaṃ prīyatāṃ tena me prabhuḥ /
analyzed: yat mayā śraddhayā dattam prīyatām tena me prabhuḥ

original: iti kṣamāpya ca vratī kuryādvādaśavārṣikam // GarP_1,124.21 //
analyzed: iti kṣamāpya ca vratī kuryāḥ dvādaśa vārṣikam
kīrti śrī putra rājya ādi prāpya śaivam puram vrajet
dvādaśeṣu api māseṣu prakuryāt iha jāgaram

original: vratī dvādaśa saṃbhojya dīpadaḥ svargamāpnuyāt // GarP_1,124.23 //
analyzed: vratī dvādaśa saṃbhojya dīpa daḥ svargam āpnuyāt

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe śivarātrivrataṃ nāma caturviṃśatyuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe śivarātrivratam nāma caturviṃśatyuttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
pitāmahaḥ uvāca
māndhātā cakravartī āsīt upoṣya ekādaśīm nṛpaḥ
ekādaśyām na bhuñjīta pakṣayoḥ ubhayār api
daśamī ekādaśī miśrā gāndhāryā samupoṣitā

original: tasyāḥ putraśataṃ naṣṭaṃ tasmāttāṃ parivarjayet // GarP_1,125.2 //
analyzed: tasyāḥ putra śatam naṣṭam tasmāt tām parivarjayet
dvādaśī ekādaśī yatra tatra sannihitaḥ hariḥ
daśamī ekādaśī yatra tatra sannihitaḥ suraḥ
bahu vākya virodhena sandehaḥ jāyate yadā

original: dvādaśī tu tadā grāhyā trayodaśyāntu pāraṇam /
analyzed: dvādaśī tu tadā grāhyā trayodaśyām tu pāraṇam
ekādaśī kalā api syāt upoṣyā dvādaśī tathā
ekādaśī dvādaśī ca viśeṣeṇa trayodaśī

original: trimiśrā sā tithirgrāhyā sarvapāpaharā śubhā // GarP_1,125.5 //
analyzed: tri miśrā sā tithiḥ grāhyā sarva pāpa harā śubhā
ekādaśīm upoṣya eva dvādaśīm dvija

original: trimiśrāṃ caiva kurvīta na daśamyā yutāṃ kracit // GarP_1,125.6 //
analyzed: tri miśrām ca eva kurvīta na daśamyā yutām kracid
rātrau jāgaraṇam kurvan purāṇa śravaṇam nṛpaḥ
gadādharam pūjayan ca upoṣya ekā daśī dvayam
rukmāṅgadaḥ yayau mokṣam anye ca ekādaśīvratam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe ekādaśīmāhātmyaṃ nāma pañcaviṃśatyuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe ekādaśīmāhātmyam nāma pañcaviṃśatyuttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
brahmā uvāca

original: yenārcanena vai loko jagāma paramāṃ gatim /
analyzed: yena arcanena vai lokaḥ jagāma paramām gatim
tam arcanam pravakṣyāmi bhukti mukti karam param
sāmānya maṇḍalam nyasya dhātāram dvāra deśataḥ

original: vidhātāraṃ tathā gaṅgāṃ yamunāṃ ca mahānadīm // GarP_1,126.2 //
analyzed: vidhātāram tathā gaṅgām yamunām ca mahā nadīm

original: dvāraśriyaṃ ca daṇḍaṃ ca pracaṇḍaṃ vāstupūruṣam /
analyzed: dvāra śriyam ca daṇḍam ca pracaṇḍam vāstu pūruṣam

original: madhye cādhāraśaktiṃ ca kūrmaṃ cānantamarcayet // GarP_1,126.3 //
analyzed: madhye ca ādhāra śaktim ca kūrmam ca anantam arcayet

original: bhūmiṃ dharmaṃ tathā jñānaṃ vairagyaiśvaryameva ca /
analyzed: bhūmim dharmam tathā jñānam vairagya aiśvaryam eva ca

original: adharmādīṃśca caturaḥ kandaṃ nālaṃ ca paṅkajam // GarP_1,126.4 //
analyzed: adharma ādīn ca caturaḥ kandam nālam ca paṅkajam

original: karṇikāṃ kesaraṃ sattvaṃ rājasaṃ tāmasaṃ guṇam /
analyzed: karṇikām kesaram sattvam rājasam tāmasam guṇam
surya ādi maṇḍalāni eva vimalā ādyāḥ ca śaktayaḥ

original: durgāṃ gaṇaṃ sarasvatīṃ kṣetrapālaṃ ca koṇake /
analyzed: durgām gaṇam sarasvatīm kṣetrapālam ca koṇake

original: āsanaṃ mūrtimabhyarcya vāsudevaṃ balaṃ smaran // GarP_1,126.6 //
analyzed: āsanam mūrtim abhyarcya vāsudevam balam smaran
aniruddham mahātmānam nārāyaṇam atha arcayet
hṛdaya ādīni ca aṅgāni śaṅkha ādīni āyudhāni ca
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
brahmā uvāca
māgha māse śukla pakṣe sūrya ṛkṣeṇa yutā purā

original: ekādaśī tathā caikā bhīmena samupoṣitā // GarP_1,127.1 //
analyzed: ekādaśī tathā ca ekā bhīmena samupoṣitā
āścarya tu vratam kṛtvā pitṝṇām anṛṇaḥ bhavat
bhīmadvādaśī vikhyātā prāṇinām puṇya vardhinī
nakṣatreṇa vinā api eṣā brahmahatyā ādi nāśayet

original: vinihanti mahāpāpaṃ kunṛpo viṣayaṃ yathā // GarP_1,127.3 //
analyzed: vinihanti mahā pāpam ku nṛpaḥ viṣayam yathā

original: kuputtrastu kulaṃ yadvatkubhāryā ca patiṃ yathā /
analyzed: ku puttraḥ tu kulam yadvat ku bhāryā ca patim yathā

original: adharmaṃ ca yathā dharmaḥ kumantrī ca yathā nṛpam // GarP_1,127.4 //
analyzed: adharmam ca yathā dharmaḥ kumantrī ca yathā nṛpam
ajñānena yathā jñānam śaucam āśaucakam yathā
aśraddhayā yathā śraddhā satyam ca eva anṛtaiḥ yathā
himam yathā uṣṇam āhanyāt anartham ca artha saṃcayaḥ

original: yathā prakartināddānaṃ tapo vai vismayādyathā // GarP_1,127.6 //
analyzed: yathā tapaḥ vai vismayāt yathā
a śikṣayā yathā putraḥ gāvaḥ dūra gataiḥ yathā

original: krodhena ca yathā śāntiryathā vittamavaddhanāt // GarP_1,127.7 //
analyzed: krodhena ca yathā śāntiḥ yathā vittama vat dhanāt
vidyā niṣkāmena yathā phalam

original: tathaiva pāpanāśāya prokteyaṃ dvādaśī śubhā // GarP_1,127.8 //
analyzed: tathā eva pāpa nāśāya proktā iyam dvādaśī śubhā
brahma hatyā surā pāna steyam guru aṅganā āgamaḥ
yugapad tu prajātān ihanti tripuṣkaram

original: na cāpi naimiṣaṃ kṣetraṃ kurukṣetraṃ prabhāsakam /
analyzed: na ca api naimiṣam kṣetram kurukṣetram prabhāsakam

original: kālindī yamunā gaṅgā na caiva na sarasvatī // GarP_1,127.10 //
analyzed: kālindī yamunā gaṅgā na ca eva na sarasvatī
ca eva sarva tīrthāni ekādaśyāḥ samāni hi

original: na dānaṃ na japo homo na cānyatsukṛtaṃ kracit // GarP_1,127.11 //
analyzed: na dānam na japaḥ homaḥ na ca anyat su kṛtam kracid
ekatas pṛthivī dānam ekatas hari vāsaraḥ
tatas pi ekā mahā puṇyā iyam ekādaśī varā
asmin varāhapuruṣam kṛtvā devam tu hāṭakam

original: ghaṭopari nave pātre kṛtvā vai tāmrabhājane // GarP_1,127.13 //
analyzed: ghaṭa upari nave pātre kṛtvā vai tāmra bhājane
sarva bīja bhṛte viprāḥ sita vastra avagaṇṭhite
sa hiraṇya pradīpa ādyaiḥ kṛtvā pūjām prayatnanaḥ

original: varāhāya namaḥ pādau kroḍākṛtaye namaḥ kaṭim /
analyzed: varāhāya namaḥ pādau kroḍa ākṛtaye namaḥ kaṭim
nābhim gaṃbhīra ghoṣayā uraḥ śrīvatsa dhāriṇe
bāhum sahasra śirase grīvām sarveśvarāya ca

original: mukhaṃ sarvātmane pūjyaṃ lalāṭaṃ prabhavāya ca // GarP_1,127.16 //
analyzed: mukham sarvātmane pūjyam lalāṭam prabhavāya ca
keśāḥ śatamayūkhāya pūjyāḥ devasya cakriṇaḥ

original: vidhinā pūjayitvā tu kṛtvā jāgaraṇaṃ niśi // GarP_1,127.17 //
analyzed: vidhinā pūjayitvā tu kṛtvā jāgaraṇam niśi
śrutvā purāṇam devasya māhātmya pratipādakam

original: prātarviprāya dattvā ca yācakāya śubhāya tat // GarP_1,127.18 //
analyzed: prātar viprāya dattvā ca yācakāya śubhāya tat
kanaka kroḍa sahitam san nivedya paricchadam
paścāt tu pāraṇam kuryāt na atitṛptaḥ sakṛt vrataḥ

original: evaṃ kṛtvā naro vidyānna bhūya stanapo bhavet /
analyzed: evam kṛtvā naraḥ vidyāt na bhūyas stanapaḥ bhavet
upoṣya ekādaśīm puṇyām mucyate vai ṛṇa trayāt
manaḥ bhilaṣita avāptiḥ kṛtvā sarva vrata ādikam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe ekādaśīmāhātmyaṃ nāma saptaviṃśatyuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe ekādaśīmāhātmyam nāma saptaviṃśatyuttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
brahmā uvāca

original: vratāni vyāsa vakṣyāmi yaistuṣṭaḥ sarvado hariḥ /
analyzed: vratāni vyāsa vakṣyāmi yaiḥ tuṣṭaḥ sarva daḥ hariḥ

original: śāstrodito hi niyamo vrataṃ tacca tapo matam // GarP_1,128.1 //
analyzed: śāstra uditaḥ hi niyamaḥ vratam tat ca tapaḥ matam
niyamāḥ tu viśeṣāḥ syuḥ vratasya asya dama ādayaḥ

original: nityaṃ triṣavaṇaṃ snāyādadhaḥ śayī jitendriyaḥ // GarP_1,128.2 //
analyzed: nityam triṣavaṇam snāyāt adhas śayī jita indriyaḥ
strī śūdra patitānām tu varjayet abhibhāṣaṇam

original: pavitrāṇi ca pañcaiva juhuyāccaiva śaktitaḥ // GarP_1,128.3 //
analyzed: pavitrāṇi ca pañca eva juhuyāt ca eva śaktitas
kṛcchrāṇi etāni sarvāṇi caret sukṛtavān naraḥ

original: keśānāṃ rakṣaṇārthaṃ tu dviguṇaṃ vratamācaret // GarP_1,128.4 //
analyzed: keśānām rakṣaṇa artham tu dviguṇam vratam ācaret
kāṃsyam māṣam masūram ca caṇakam koradūṣakam

original: śākaṃ madhu parānnaṃ ca varjayedupavāsavān // GarP_1,128.5 //
analyzed: śākam madhu para annam ca varjayet upavāsavān
puṣpa alaṅkāra vastrāṇi dhūpa gandha anulepanam
upavāsena duṣyet tu dantadhāvanam añjanam
dantakāṣṭham pañcagavyam kṛtvā prātar vratam caret
asakṛt jala pānāt ca tāmbūlasya ca bhakṣaṇāt
upavāsaḥ praduṣyeta kṣa maithunāt

original: kṣamā satyaṃ dayā dānaṃ śaucamindriyanigrahaḥ // GarP_1,128.8 //
analyzed: kṣamā satyam dayā dānam śaucam indriya nigrahaḥ
deva pūjā agni havane santoṣaḥ teyam eva ca
sarva vrateṣu ayam dharmaḥ sāmānyaḥ daśadhā smṛtaḥ
nakṣatra darśanāt naktam anaktam niśi bhojanam

original: gomūtraṃ ca pala dadyādardhāṅguṣṭhaṃ tu gomayam // GarP_1,128.10 //
analyzed: go mūtram ca dadyāt ardha aṅguṣṭham tu gomayam
kṣīram sapta palam dadyāt dadhnaḥ ca eva pala trayam
ghṛtam eka phalam dadyāt palam ekam kuśa udakam

original: gāyattryā caiva gandheti āpyāyasva dṛ dadhigrahaḥ /
analyzed: gāyattryā ca eva gandha iti āpyāyasva dṛ dadhi grahaḥ

original: tejo 'sīti ca devasya brahmakūrcavrataṃ caret // GarP_1,128.12 //
analyzed: ca devasya brahmakūrca vratam caret
agni ādhānam pratiṣṭhām tu yajña dāna vratāni ca
veda vrata vṛṣotsarga cūḍākaraṇa mekhalāḥ
māṅgalyam abhiṣekam ca malamāse vivarjayat
darśāt darśasya cāndraḥ syāt triṃśa ahobhiḥ tu sāvanaḥ
ravi saṃkramaṇāt sauraḥ nākṣatraḥ saptaviṃśatiḥ

original: sauro māso vivāhāya yajñādau sāvanasthitiḥ // GarP_1,128.15 //
analyzed: sauraḥ māsaḥ vivāhāya yajña ādau sāvana sthitiḥ
yugma agni yuga bhūtāni ṣaṣ munyoḥ vasu randhrayoḥ

original: rudreṇa dvādaśī yuktā caturdaśyātha pūrṇimā // GarP_1,128.16 //
analyzed: rudreṇa dvādaśī yuktā caturdaśyā atha pūrṇimā
pratipadi api amāvāsyā mahā phalam

original: etadvyastaṃ mahāghoraṃ hanti puṇyaṃ purā kṛtam // GarP_1,128.17 //
analyzed: etat vyastam mahā ghoram hanti puṇyam purā kṛtam

original: prārabdhatapasā strīṇāṃ rajo hanyādvrataṃ na hi /
analyzed: prārabdha tapasā strīṇām rajaḥ hanyāt vratam na hi
anyaiḥ dāna ādikam kuryāt kāyikam svayam eva ca
krodhāt pramādāt lobhāt vā vrata bhaṅgaḥ bhavet yadi

original: dinatrayaṃ na bhuñjīta śiraso muṇḍanaṃ bhavet // GarP_1,128.19 //
analyzed: dina trayam na bhuñjīta śirasaḥ muṇḍanam bhavet
a sāmarthye śarīrasya putra ādīn kārayet vratam
vrata stham mūrchitam vipram jala ādīni anupāyayet

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vrataparibhāṣā nāmāṣṭāviṃśatyuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe vrataparibhāṣā nāma aṣṭāviṃśatyuttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
brahmā uvāca
vakṣye pratipad ādīni vratāni vyāsa śṛṇu atha
vāśvānara padam yāti śikhivratam idam smṛtam
pratipadi eka bhakta āśī samāpte kapilā pradaḥ
caitra ādau kārayet ca eva brahma pūjām yathāvidhi
gandha puṣpa arcanaiḥ dānaiḥ mālya ādyaiḥ ca manoramaiḥ
saha umaiḥ pūjayet devam sarvān kāmān avāpnuyāt

original: kārtike ta site 'ṣṭamyāṃ puṣpahārī ca vatsaram // GarP_1,129.3 //
analyzed: kārtike site ṣṭamyām puṣpa hārī ca vatsaram
puṣpa ādi dātā rūpeṇa rūpa bhāgī bhavet naraḥ

original: kṛṣṇapakṣe tṛtīyāyāṃ śrāvaṇe śrīdharaṃ śriyā // GarP_1,129.4 //

analyzed: yajet a śūnya śayyāyām phalam dadyāt dvijātaye

original: śayyāṃ dattvā prārthayecca śrīdharāya namaḥ śriyai // GarP_1,129.5 //
analyzed: śayyām dattvā prārthayet ca śrīdharāya namaḥ śriyai

original: umāṃśivaṃ hutāśaṃ ca tṛtīyāyāṃ ca pūjayet /
analyzed: umāṃśivam hutāśam ca tṛtīyāyām ca pūjayet

original: haviṣyamanna naivedya deya damanakaṃ tathā // GarP_1,129.6 //
analyzed: tathā
caitra ādau phalam āpnoti umayā me prabhāṣitam
phālguna ādi tṛtīyāyām lavaṇam yaḥ tu varjayet
samāpte śayanam dadyāt gṛham ca upaskara anvitam
saṃpūjya bhavānī prīyatām iti
gaurī loke vaset nityam saubhāgya karam uttamam

original: gaurī kālī umā bhadrā durgā kāntiḥ sarasvatī // GarP_1,129.9 //
analyzed: gaurī kālī umā bhadrā durgā kāntiḥ sarasvatī

original: maṅgalā vaiṣṇavī lakṣmīḥ śivā nārāyaṇī kramāt /
analyzed: maṅgalā vaiṣṇavī lakṣmīḥ śivā nārāyaṇī kramāt
mārge tṛtīyām ārabhya aviyoga ādim āpnuyāt
caturthyām sita māgha ādau nirāhāraḥ vrata anvitaḥ

original: dattvā tilāṃstu viprāya svayaṃ bhuṅkte tilodakam // GarP_1,129.11 //
analyzed: dattvā tilān tu viprāya svayam bhuṅkte tila udakam
varṣa dvaye samāptiḥ ca nirvighna ādim samāpnuyāt

original: gaḥ svāhā mūlamantro 'yaṃ praṇavena samanvitaḥ // GarP_1,129.12 //
analyzed: gaḥ svāhā mūlamantraḥ yam praṇavena samanvitaḥ

original: glaiṃ glāṃhṛdaye gāṃ gīṃ hūṃ hrīṃ hrīṃ śiraḥ śikhā /
analyzed: glaiṃ glāṃ hṛdaye gām gīṃ hūm hrīṃ hrīṃ śiraḥ śikhā

original: gūṃ varma goṃ ca gaiṃ netraṃ goṃ ca āvāhanādiṣu // GarP_1,129.13 //
analyzed: gūm varma goṃ ca gaiṃ netram goṃ ca āvāhana ādiṣu
āgaccha ulkāya puṣpa ulkaḥ dhūpaka ulkakaḥ

original: dīpolkāya maholkāya baliścātha visa (mār) janam // GarP_1,129.14 //
analyzed: dīpa ulkāya mahā ulkāya baliḥ ca atha mār janam
sidedha ulkāya ca gāyatrī tra
nyāsa uṃguṣṭha ādiḥ īritaḥ

original: oṃ mahākarṇāya vidmahe--vakratuṇḍāya dhīmahi--tanno dantiḥ pracodayāt // GarP_1,129.15 //
analyzed: om mahākarṇāya vidmahe vakratuṇḍāya dhīmahi tat naḥ dantiḥ pracodayāt
pūjaya uttila homaiḥ ca ete pūjyāḥ gaṇāḥ tathā

original: gaṇāya gaṇapataye svāhā kūṣmāṇḍakāya ca // GarP_1,129.16 //
analyzed: gaṇāya gaṇapataye svāhā kūṣmāṇḍakāya ca
amogha ulkāya ekadantāya tripurāntaka rūpiṇe

original: oṃ śyāma (va) dantavikarālāsyāhavepāya vai namaḥ // GarP_1,129.17 //
analyzed: om vai namaḥ

original: padmadaṃṣṭāya svāhānte mudrā vai nartanaṃ gaṇe /

analyzed: hasta tālaḥ ca hasanam saubhāgya ādi phalam bhavet
mārgaśīrṣe tathā śukla caturthyām pūjayet gaṇa
abdam prāpnoti vidyā śrī kīrti āyuḥ putra santatim
somavāre caturthyām ca samupoṣya arcayet gaṇam
japan juhvat smaran vidyā svargam nirvāṇa tām vrajet
yajet śukla caturthyām yaḥ
sarvān sa kāmān saubhāgyam āpnuyāt
putra ādikam damanakaiḥ damana ākhyā caturthī api

original: āṃ gaṇapataye namaḥ caturthyantaṃ yajedgaṇam // GarP_1,129.22 //
analyzed: ām gaṇapataye namaḥ caturthī antam yajet gaṇam
māse tu yasmin kasmiṃścid juhuyāt vā japet smaret
sarvān kāmān avāpnoti sarva vighna vināśanam
vināyakam mūrtika ādyam yajet ebhiḥ ca nāmabhiḥ
saḥ sat gatim āpnoti svarga mokṣa sukhāni ca
dhūmravarṇaḥ bhālacandraḥ vināyakaḥ
gaṇapatiḥ hastimukhaḥ dvādaśāre yajet gaṇam
pṛthak samastam sarvān kāmān vāpnuyāt

original: śrāvaṇe cāśvine bhādre pañcamyāṃ kāttika śubhe // GarP_1,129.27 //
analyzed: śrāvaṇe ca āśvine bhādre pañcamyām śubhe

original: tato 'pitarvivasvāṃśca tataḥ sūnurvivasvataḥ manurikṣvākuśaryātī nṛgo dhṛṣṭaḥ praṣadhrakaḥ // GarP_1,138.2 //
analyzed: pitar vivasvān ca tatas sūnuḥ vivasvataḥ manuḥ ikṣvāku śaryātī nṛgaḥ dhṛṣṭaḥ praṣadhrakaḥ

original: nariṣyantaśca nābhāgo diṣṭaḥ śaśaka eva ca /
analyzed: nariṣyantaḥ ca nābhāgaḥ diṣṭaḥ śaśakaḥ eva ca
manoḥ āsīt ilā kanyā sudyumnaḥ sya sutaḥ bhavat

original: ilāyāṃ tu budhājjāto rājā rudra purūravāḥ /
analyzed: ilāyām tu budhāt jātaḥ rājā rudra purūravāḥ
sutāḥ trayaḥ ca sudyumnāt utkalaḥ vinataḥ gayaḥ
abhṛt śradraḥ go vadhāt tu pṛṣadhraḥ tu manoḥ sutaḥ

original: karūṣātkṣattriyā jātā kārūṣā iti viśrutāḥ // GarP_1,138.5 //
analyzed: karūṣāt kṣattriyā jātā kārūṣāḥ iti viśrutāḥ
diṣṭa putraḥ tu nābhāgaḥ vaiśyā tām agamat sa ca
tasmāt bhalandanaḥ putraḥ vatsaprītiḥ bhalandanāt
tatas pāṃśuḥ khanitraḥ bhūt bhūpaḥ tasmāt tatas kṣupaḥ
kṣupāt viṃśaḥ bhavat putraḥ viṃśāt jātaḥ viviṃśakaḥ
viviṃśāt ca khanīnetraḥ vibhūtiḥ tad sutaḥ smṛtaḥ
karandhamaḥ vibhūteḥ tu tatas jātaḥ pi avikṣitaḥ
maruttaḥ vikṣitasya api nariṣyantaḥ tatas smṛtaḥ
nariṣyantāt tamaḥ jātaḥ tatas bhūt rājavardhanaḥ
rājavardhāt sudhṛtiḥ ca naraḥ bhūt sudhṛteḥ sutaḥ
narāt ca kevalaḥ putraḥ kevalāt dhundhumān api
dhundhumataḥ vegavān ca budhaḥ vegavataḥ sutaḥ
tṛṇabinduḥ budhāt jātaḥ tathā
viśālam janayāmāsa tṛṇabindoḥ tu alambusā
viśālāt hemacandraḥ bhūt hema candrāt ca candrakaḥ
dhūmrāśvaḥ ca eva candrāt tu dhūmrāśvāt sṛñjayaḥ tathā
sañjayāt sahadevaḥ bhūt kṛśāśvaḥ tad sutaḥ bhavat
kṛśāśvāt somadattaḥ tu tatas bhūt janamejayaḥ

original: tatputraśca sumantiśca ete vaiśālakā nṛpāḥ // GarP_1,138.14 //
analyzed: tad putraḥ ca sumantiḥ ca ete vaiśālakāḥ nṛpāḥ
śaryāteḥ tu sukanyābūtsā bhāryā cyavanasya tu
anantaḥ nāma śāryate ranantāt revataḥ bhavat
raivataḥ revatasya api raivatāt revatī sutā
dhṛṣṭasya dhārṣṭar ta
kam kṣetram vaiṣṇavam śyakam
tat vabhūva ha
nābhāga putraḥ hi ambarīṣaḥ pi tad sutaḥ
ambarīṣāt virūpaḥ bhūt pṛṣadaśvaḥ virūpataḥ
rathīnaraḥ ca tad putraḥ vāsudeva parāyaṇaḥ
ikṣvākoḥ tu trayaḥ putrāḥ vikukṣi nimi daṇḍakāḥ
ikṣvāku jaḥ vikukṣiḥ tu śaśādaḥ śaśa bhakṣaṇāt
purañjayaḥ śaśādāt ca kakutstha ākhyaḥ bhavat sutaḥ
anenāḥ tu kakutsathāt ca pṛthuḥ putraḥ tu anenasaḥ
viśvarātaḥ pṛthoḥ putraḥ ārdre bhūt viśvarātataḥ
yuvanāśvaḥ bhavat ca ārdrāt śāvastaḥ yuvanāśvataḥ
bṛhadaśvaḥ tu śāvastāt tad putraḥ kuvalāśvakaḥ
dhundhumāraḥ hi vikyātaḥ bhavat
candrāśvaḥ kapilāśvaḥ ca haryaśvaḥ ca dṛḍhaśvataḥ
haryaśvāt ca nikumbaḥ bhūt hitāśvaḥ ca nikumbhataḥ
pūjāśvaḥ ca hitāśvāt ca tad sataḥ yuvanāśvakaḥ
yuvanāśvāt ca māndhātā bindumatyāḥ tatas bhavat
mucukundaḥ mbarīṣaḥ ca purukutsaḥ trayaḥ sutāḥ
pañcāśat kanyakāḥ ca eva bhāryāḥ tāḥ saubhareḥ muneḥ
yuvanāśvaḥ mbarīṣāt ca haritaḥ yuvanāśvataḥ
purukutsāt narmadāyām trasadasyuḥ abūt sutaḥ
anaraṇyaḥ tatas jātaḥ haryaśvaḥ pi anaraṇyataḥ
tad putraḥ bhūt vasumanāḥ tridhanvā tasya ca ātmajaḥ
trayyāruṇaḥ tasya putraḥ satyarataḥ sutaḥ
yaḥ triśaṅkuḥ samākhyātaḥ hariścandraḥ bhavat tatas
hariścandrāt rohitāśvaḥ haritaḥ rohitāśvataḥ
haritasya sutaḥ cañcuḥ cañcoḥ ca vijayaḥ sutaḥ

original: vijayādruruko jajñe rurukāttu vṛkaḥ sutaḥ // GarP_1,138.29 //
analyzed: vijayāt rurukaḥ jajñe rurukāt tu vṛkaḥ sutaḥ
vṛkāt bāhuḥ nṛpaḥ bhūt ca bāhoḥ tu sagaraḥ smṛtaḥ

original: ṣaṣṭiḥ putra sahasrāṇi sumatyāṃ sagarāddhara // GarP_1,138.30 //
analyzed: ṣaṣṭiḥ putra sahasrāṇi sumatyām sagarāt hara
keśinyām ekaḥ eva asau asamañjasa saṃjñakaḥ
tasya aṃśumān sutaḥ vidvān dilīpaḥ tad sutaḥ bhavat
bhagīrathaḥ dilīpāt ca yaḥ gaṅgām ānayat bhuvam
śrutaḥ bhagīratha sutaḥ nābhagaḥ ca śrutāt kila
nābhāgāt ambarīṣaḥ bhūt sindudvīpaḥ mbarīṣataḥ
sindudvīpasya ayuta āyūḥ ṛtuparṇaḥ tad ātmajaḥ
ṛtuṣarṇāt sarvakāmaḥ sudāsaḥ bhūt tad ātmajaḥ

original: sudāsasya ca saudāso nāmnā mitrasahaḥ smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: sudāsasya ca saudāsaḥ nāmnā mitrasahaḥ smṛtaḥ
kalmāṣa pāda saṃjñaḥ ca damayantyām tad ātmajaḥ
aśvaka ākhyaḥ bhavat putraḥ hi aśvakāt mūlan mṛccha kaḥ bhavat

original: tato daśaratho rājā tasya cailavilaḥ sutaḥ // GarP_1,138.36 //
analyzed: tatas daśarathaḥ rājā tasya ca ailavilaḥ sutaḥ
tasya viśvasahaḥ putraḥ khaṭvāṅgaḥ ca tad ātmajaḥ
khaṭvāṅgat dīrghabāhuḥ ca dīrghabāhoḥ hi ajaḥ sutaḥ
tasya puttraḥ daśarathaḥ catvāraḥ tad sutāḥ smṛtāḥ
rāma lakṣmaṇa śatrughna bharatāḥ ca mahā balāḥ
rāmāt kuśa lavau jātau bharatāt tārkṣa puṣkarau
citrāṅgadaḥ candraketuḥ lakṣmaṇāt saṃbabhūvatuḥ
subāhu śūrasenau ca śatrughnāt saṃbabhūvatuḥ

original: kuśasya cātithiḥ putro niṣadho hyatitheḥ sutaḥ // GarP_1,138.40 //
analyzed: kuśasya ca atithiḥ putraḥ niṣadhaḥ hi atitheḥ sutaḥ

original: niṣadhasya nalaḥ putro nalasya ca nabhāḥ smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: niṣadhasya nalaḥ putraḥ nalasya ca nabhāḥ smṛtaḥ
nabhasaḥ puṇḍarīkaḥ tu kṣemadhanvā tad ātmajaḥ
devānīkaḥ tasya putraḥ devānīkāt ahīnakaḥ
ahīnakāt ruruḥ yajñe pāriyātraḥ ruroḥ sutaḥ
pāriyātrāt dalaḥ yajñe dala putraḥ chalaḥ smṛtaḥ
chalāt ukthaḥ tatas hi ukthāt vajranābhaḥ tatas gaṇaḥ
uṣitāśvaḥ gaṇāt jajñe tatas viśvasahaḥ bhavat
hiraṇyanābhaḥ tad putraḥ tad putraḥ puṣpakaḥ smṛtaḥ
dhruvasandhiḥ abhūt puṣpāt dhruvasandheḥ sudarśanaḥ
sudarśanāt agnivarṇaḥ padmavaṇaḥ gnivarṇataḥ
śīghraḥ tu padmavarṇāt tu śīghrāt putraḥ maruḥ tu abhūt

original: maroḥ prasuśrutaḥ putrastasya codāvasuḥ sutaḥ // GarP_1,138.46 //
analyzed: maroḥ prasuśrutaḥ putraḥ tasya ca udāvasuḥ sutaḥ
udāvasoḥ nandivardhanaḥ suketuḥ nandivardhanāt
suketoḥ devarātaḥ bhūt vṛhadukthaḥ tatas sutaḥ
bṛhadukthāt mahā vīryaḥ sudhṛtiḥ tasya ca ātmajaḥ
sudhṛteḥ dhṛṣṭaketuḥ ca haryaśvaḥ dhṛṣṭaketutaḥ
haryaśvāt tu maruḥ jātaḥ maroḥ pratīndhakaḥ bhavat
pratīndhakāt kṛtirathaḥ devamīḍhaḥ tad ātmajaḥ
vibudhaḥ devamīḍhāt tu vibudhāt tu mahādhṛtiḥ
mahādhṛteḥ kīrtirātaḥ mahāromā tad ātmajaḥ
mahāromṇaḥ svarṇaromā hrasvaromā tad ātmajaḥ
sīradhvajaḥ hrasvaromṇaḥ tasya sītā bhavat sutā
bhrātā kuśadhvajaḥ tasya sīradhvajāt tu bhānumān
śatadyumnaḥ bhānumataḥ śatadyumnāt śuciḥ smṛtaḥ
ūrja nāmā śuceḥ putraḥ sanadvājaḥ tad ātmajaḥ
sanadvājāt kuliḥ jātaḥ nañjanaḥ tu kuleḥ sutaḥ
anañjanāt ca kulajit tasya api ca adhinemikaḥ
śrutāyuḥ tasya putraḥ bhūt supārśvaḥ ca tad ātmajaḥ
supārśvāt sṛṃjayaḥ jātaḥ kṣemāriḥ sṛjayāt samṛtaḥ

original: kṣemāri tastvanenāśca tasya rāmarathaḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,138.55 //
analyzed: kṣemāri taḥ tu anenāḥ ca tasya rāmarathaḥ smṛtaḥ
satyarathaḥ rāmarathāt tasmāt upaguruḥ smṛtaḥ
upaguroḥ upaguptaḥ svāgataḥ ca upaguptataḥ
svanaraḥ svāgatāt jajñe suvarcāḥ tasya ca ātmajaḥ
suvarcasaḥ supārśvaḥ tu suśrutaḥ ca supārśvataḥ
jayaḥ tu suśrutāt jajñe jayāt tu vijayaḥ

original: vijayasya ṛtaḥ putraḥ ṛtasya sunayaḥ sutaḥ // GarP_1,138.58 //
analyzed: vijayasya ṛtaḥ putraḥ ṛtasya sunayaḥ sutaḥ
sunayāt vītahavyaḥ tu vītahavyāt hatiḥ smṛtaḥ

original: bahulāśvo dhṛteḥ putro bahulāśvātkṛtiḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,138.59 //
analyzed: bahulāśvaḥ dhṛteḥ putraḥ bahulāśvāt kṛtiḥ smṛtaḥ

original: janakasya dvaye vaṃśe ukto yogasamāśrayaḥ // GarP_1,138.60 //
analyzed: janakasya dvaye vaṃśe uktaḥ yoga samāśrayaḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe sūryavaṃśavarṇanaṃ nāmāṣṭatriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe sūryavaṃśavarṇanam nāma aṣṭatriṃśaduttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
hariḥ uvāca

original: sūryasya kathito vaṃśaḥ somavaṃśaṃ śṛṇuṣva me /
analyzed: sūryasya kathitaḥ vaṃśaḥ soma vaṃśam śṛṇuṣva me
nārāyaṇa sutaḥ brahmā treḥ samudbhavaḥ

original: atreḥ somastasya bhāryā tārā suraguroḥ priyā /
analyzed: atreḥ somaḥ tasya bhāryā tārā suraguroḥ priyā

original: somāttarā budhaṃ jajñe budhaputraḥ purūravāḥ // GarP_1,139.2 //
analyzed: somāttarā budham jajñe budha putraḥ purūravāḥ
budha putrāt atha urvaśyām ṣaṭ putrāḥ tu śrutātmakaḥ
viśvāvasuḥ śatāyuḥ ca āyuḥ dhāḥ mān anamāvasuḥ
amāvasoḥ bhoma nāmā bhīma putraḥ ca kāñcanaḥ
kāñcanasya suhotraḥ bhūt jahruḥ ca abhūt suhotrataḥ
jahnoḥ sumantuḥ abhavat sumantoḥ apajāpakaḥ

original: balākāśvastasya putro balākāśvāt kuśaḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,139.5 //
analyzed: balākāśvaḥ tasya putraḥ balākāśvāt kuśaḥ smṛtaḥ
kuśāśvaḥ kuśanābhaḥ ca amūrtarayaḥ vasuḥ kuśāt
gādhiḥ kuśāśvāt saṃjajñe viśvāmitraḥ tad ātmajaḥ

original: kanyā satyavatī dattā ṛcīkāya dvijāya sā /
analyzed: kanyā satyavatī dattā ṛcīkāya dvijāya sā
ṛcīkāt jamadāgniḥ ca rāmaḥ tasya abhavat sutaḥ
viśvāmitrāt devarātama ducchanda ādayaḥ sutāḥ
āyuṣaḥ nahuṣaḥ tasmāt anenāḥ raji rambhakau
kṣattravṛddhaḥ kṣattravṛddhāt suhotraḥ ca abhavat nṛpaḥ
kāśya kāśau gṛtsamadaḥ suhotrāt abhavan trayaḥ
gṛtsamadāt śauna kaḥ bhūt kāśyāt dīrghatamāḥ tathā
vaidyaḥ dhanvantariḥ tasmāt ketumān ca tad ātmajaḥ
bhīmarathaḥ ketumataḥ divodāsaḥ tad ātmajaḥ
divodāsāt pratardanaḥ śatrujit saḥ tra viśrutaḥ
ṛtadhvajaḥ tasya putraḥ hi alarkaḥ ca ṛtadhvajāt
alarkāt sannatiḥ jajñe sunītaḥ sannateḥ sutaḥ
satyaketuḥ sunītasya satyaketoḥ vibhuḥ sutaḥ

original: vibhostu suvibhuḥ putraḥ suvibhoḥ sukumārakaḥ // GarP_1,139.13 //
analyzed: vibhoḥ tu suvibhuḥ putraḥ suvibhoḥ sukumārakaḥ
sukumārāt dhṛṣṭaketuḥ votihotraḥ tad ātmajaḥ
vītihotrasya bhargaḥ bhūt bhargabhūmiḥ tad ātmajaḥ
vaiṣṇavāḥ syuḥ mahātmānaḥ iti ete kāśayaḥ nṛpāḥ
pañca putra śatāni āsan rajeḥ śakreṇa saṃhṛtāḥ
pratikṣattraḥ kṣattravṛddhāt saṃjayaḥ ca tad ātmajaḥ

original: vijayaḥ saṃjayasyāpi vijayasya kṛtaḥ sutaḥ // GarP_1,139.16 //
analyzed: vijayaḥ saṃjayasya api vijayasya kṛtaḥ sutaḥ
kṛtāt vṛṣadhanaḥ ca abhūt sahadevaḥ tad ātmajaḥ
sahadevāt adīnaḥ bhūt jayatsenaḥ pi adīnataḥ
jayatsenāt saṃkṛtiḥ ca kṣattradharmā ca saṃkṛteḥ
yatiḥ yayātiḥ saṃyātiḥ ayātiḥ vikṛtiḥ kramāt
nahuṣasya sutāḥ khyātāḥ yayāteḥ nṛpateḥ tathā

original: yaduṃ ca turvasuṃ caiva devayānī vyajāyata // GarP_1,139.19 //
analyzed: yadum ca turvasum ca eva devayānī vyajāyata

original: druhyuṃ cānuṃ ca pūruñca śarmiṣṭhā vārṣapārvaṇī /
analyzed: druhyum ca anum ca pūrum ca śarmiṣṭhā vārṣapārvaṇī
sahasrajīt kroṣṭumanāḥ raghuḥ ca eva yadoḥ sutāḥ
sahasrajitaḥ śatajit tasmāt vai haya haihayau
anaraṇyaḥ hayāt putraḥ dharmaḥ haihayataḥ bhavat
dharmasya dharmanetraḥ būtkuntiḥ vai dharmanetrataḥ
kunteḥ babhūta sāhañjiḥ mahiṣmān ca tad ātmajaḥ
bhadraśreṇyaḥ tasya puttraḥ bhadraśreṇayasya durdamaḥ
dhanakaḥ durdamāt ca eva kṛtavīryaḥ ca jānakiḥ
kṛtāgniḥ kṛta karmā ca kṛtaujāḥ su mahā balaḥ
kṛtavīryāt arjunaḥ bhūt arjunāt śūrasenakaḥ

original: jayadhvajo madhuḥ śūro vṛṣaṇaḥ pañca savratāḥ /
analyzed: jaya dhvajaḥ madhuḥ śūraḥ vṛṣaṇaḥ pañca savratāḥ
jayadhvajāt tālajaṅghaḥ bharataḥ tālajaṅgataḥ
vṛṣaṇasya madhuḥ puttraḥ madhoḥ vṛṣṇi ādi vaṃśakaḥ
kroṣṭoḥ vijajñivān puttraḥ āhiḥ tasya mahātmanaḥ
saṃjajñe itasya citrarathaḥ sataḥ
śaśabinduḥ citrarathāt patnyaḥ lakṣaḥ ca tasya ha
putrāṇām pṛthukīrti ādayaḥ varāḥ
pṛthuśravasaḥ bhūttamaḥ uśanāḥ tamasaḥ bhavat
tad putraḥ śitaguḥ nāma śrī rukmakavacaḥ tatas
rukmaḥ ca pṛthurukmaḥ ca jyāmaghaḥ pālitaḥ hariḥ
śrī rukmakavacasya ete vidarbhaḥ jyāmaghāt tathā
bhāryāyām ca eva śaibyāyām vidarbhāt kratha kauśikau
romapādaḥ romapādāt babhruḥ babhroḥ dhṛtiḥ tathā

original: kauśikasya ṛciḥ putraḥ tataścaidyo nṛpaḥ kila /
analyzed: kauśikasya ṛciḥ putraḥ tatas caidyaḥ nṛpaḥ kila

original: kuntiḥ kilāsya putro 'bhūtkuntervṛṣṇiḥ sutaḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,139.32 //
analyzed: kuntiḥ kila asya putraḥ bhūt kunteḥ vṛṣṇiḥ sutaḥ smṛtaḥ
vṛṣṇeḥ ca nivṛtiḥ putraḥ daśārhe nivṛteḥ tathā

original: daśārhasya suto vyomā jīmūtaśca tadātmajaḥ // GarP_1,139.33 //
analyzed: daśārhasya sutaḥ vyomā jīmūtaḥ ca tad ātmajaḥ
jīmūtāt vikṛtiḥ jajñe tatas bhīmarathaḥ bhavat

original: tato madhuratho jajñe śakunistasya cātmajaḥ // GarP_1,139.34 //
analyzed: tatas madhurathaḥ jajñe śakuniḥ tasya ca ātmajaḥ
karambhiḥ śakuneḥ putraḥ tasya vai devavān smṛtaḥ
devakṣattraḥ devanataḥ devakṣattrāt madhuḥ smṛtaḥ
kuruvaṃśaḥ madhoḥ putraḥ hi anuḥ ca kuruvaṃśataḥ

original: puruhotro hyanoḥ putro hyaṃśuśca puruhotrataḥ // GarP_1,139.36 //
analyzed: puruhotraḥ hi anoḥ putraḥ hi aṃśuḥ ca puruhotrataḥ
sattvaśrutaḥ sutaḥ ca aṃśoḥ tatas vai sāttvataḥ nṛpaḥ
bhajinaḥ bhajamānaḥ ca sātvatāt andhakaḥ sutaḥ
mahābhojaḥ vṛṣṇi divyau anyaḥ devāvṛdhaḥ bhavat
nimi vṛṣṇiḥ bhajamānāt ayutājit tathā eva ca
śatajit ca sahasrājit babhruḥ devaḥ bṛhaspatiḥ
mahābhojāt tu bhojaḥ bhūt tad vṛṣṇeḥ ca sumitrakaḥ
svadhājit saṃjñakaḥ tasmāt anamitrāśinī tathā
anamitrasya nighnaḥ bhūt nighnāt chatrājitaḥ bhavat
prasenaḥ ca aparaḥ khyātaḥ hi anamitrāt śibiḥ tathā
śibeḥ tu satyakaḥ putraḥ satyakāt sātyakiḥ tathā
sātyakeḥ sañjayaḥ putraḥ kuliḥ ca eva tad ātmajaḥ
kuleḥ yugandharaḥ putraḥ te śaibeyāḥ prakīrtitāḥ
anamitra anvaye vṛṣṇiḥ śvaphalkaḥ citrakaḥ sutaḥ
śvaphalkāt ca eva gāndinyām akrūraḥ vaiṣṇavaḥ bhavat
upamadguḥ atha akrūrāt devadyotaḥ tatas sutaḥ
devavān upadevaḥ ca hi akrūrasya sutau smṛtau
pṛthuḥ vipṛthuḥ citrasya tu andhakasya śuciḥ smṛtaḥ
kukuraḥ bhajamānasya tathā kambalabarhiṣaḥ
dhṛṣṭaḥ tu kukurāt jajñe tasmāt kāpotaromakaḥ

original: tadātmajo vilomā ca vilomnastumburuḥ sutaḥ // GarP_1,139.46 //
analyzed: tad ātmajaḥ vilomā ca vilomnaḥ tumburuḥ sutaḥ
tasmāt ca dundubhiḥ jajñe punarvasuḥ atas smṛtaḥ

original: tasyāhukaścāhukī ca kanyā caivāhukasya tu // GarP_1,139.47 //
analyzed: tasya āhukaḥ ca āhukī ca kanyā ca eva āhukasya tu
devakaḥ ca ugrasenaḥ ca devakāt devakī tu abhūt
vṛkadevā upadevā ca sahadevā surakṣitā

original: śrīdevī śāntidevī ca vasudeva uvāha tāḥ /
analyzed: śrīdevī śāntidevī ca vasudevaḥ uvāha tāḥ
devavān upadevaḥ ca sahadevā sutau smṛtau
ugrasenasya kaṃsaḥ bhūtsunāmā ca vaṭa ādayaḥ
vidūrathaḥ bhajamānāt śūraḥ ca abhūt vidūrathāt
vidūratha sutasya atha sūrasya api śamī sutaḥ
pratikṣattraḥ ca śaminaḥ svayambhojaḥ tad ātmajaḥ
hṛdikaḥ ca svayambhojāt kṛtavarmā tad ātmajaḥ
devaḥ śatadhanuḥ ca eva śūrāt vai devamīḍhuṣaḥ
daśa putrāḥ māriṣāyām vasudeva ādayaḥ bhavan

original: pṛthā ca śrutadevī ca śrutakīrtiḥ śrutaśravāḥ // GarP_1,139.53 //
analyzed: pṛthā ca śrutadevī ca śrutakīrtiḥ śrutaśravāḥ
śūrāt ca pṛthām kunteḥ sutām adāt

original: sā dattā kuntinā pāṇḍostasyāṃ dharmānilendrakaiḥ // GarP_1,139.54 //
analyzed: sā dattā kuntinā pāṇḍoḥ tasyām dharma anila indrakaiḥ
yudhiṣṭhiraḥ bhīma pārthaḥ nakulaḥ sahadevakaḥ

original: mādrayāṃ nāsatyadastrābhyāṃ kuntyāṃ karṇaḥ purābhavat // GarP_1,139.55 //
analyzed: mādrayām nāsatya dastrābhyām kuntyām karṇaḥ purā bhavat
śrutadevyām dantavakraḥ jajñe vai yuddha durmadaḥ
santardana ādayaḥ pañca śrutakīrtyāt ca kaikayāt
rājādhidevyām jajñāte vindaḥ ca eva anuvindakaḥ
śrutaśravāḥ damaghoṣāt prajajñe śiśupālakam
pauravī bhāryā madirā ānakadundubheḥ
sāraṇa ādyāḥ śaṭhaḥ ca eva revatyām balabhadrataḥ

original: niśaṭhaścolmuko jāto devakyāṃ ṣaṭ ca jajñire // GarP_1,139.59 //
analyzed: niśaṭhaḥ ca ulmukaḥ jātaḥ devakyām ṣaṭ ca jajñire
kīrtimān ca suṣeṇaḥ ca bhadrasenakaḥ

original: ṛjudāso bhadradevaḥ kaṃsa evāvadhīcca tān // GarP_1,139.60 //
analyzed: ṛjudāsaḥ bhadradevaḥ kaṃsaḥ evā avadhīt ca tān
saṃkarṣaṇaḥ saptamaḥ bhūt aṣṭamaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ eva ca
ṣoḍaśa strī sahasrāṇi bhāryāṇām ca abhavan hareḥ
rukmiṇī satyabhāmā ca lakṣmaṇā cāruhāsinī

original: śreṣṭhā jāmbavatī cāṣṭau jajñire tāḥ sutānbahūn // GarP_1,139.62 //
analyzed: śreṣṭhā jāmbavatī ca aṣṭau jajñire tāḥ sutān bahūn
pradyumnaḥ cārudeṣṇaḥ ca pradhānāḥ sāmbaḥ eva ca
pradyumnāt aniruddhaḥ bhūt kakudminyām mahā balaḥ
aniruddhāt subhadrāyām vajraḥ nāma nṛpaḥ bhavat
pratibāhuḥ vajra sutaḥ cāruḥ tasya sutaḥ bhavat
vahniḥ tu turvasoḥ vaṃśe vahneḥ bhargaḥ bhavat sutaḥ
bhargāt bhānuḥ abhūt putraḥ bhānoḥ putraḥ karandhamaḥ
karandhamasya marutaḥ druhyoḥ vaṃśam nibodha me
drahyoḥ tu tanayaḥ setuḥ āraddhaḥ ca tad ātmajaḥ
āraddhasya eva gāndha raḥ gharmaḥ gāndhārataḥ bhavat
ghṛtaḥ tu gharmaputraḥ bhūt durgamaḥ ca tu
pracetāḥ durgamasya eva anoḥ vaṃśam śṛṇuṣva me
anoḥ sabhānaraḥ putraḥ tasmai kālañjayaḥ bhavat
kālañjayāt sṛñjayaḥ bhūt sṛñjayāt tu puruñjayaḥ
janamejayaḥ tu tad putraḥ mahāśālaḥ tad ātmajaḥ
mahāmanāḥ mahāśāladuśīnaraḥ iha smṛtaḥ
aśīnarāt śibiḥ jajñe vṛṣadarbhaḥ śiveḥ sutaḥ
mahāmanaḥ jāt titikṣoḥ putraḥ bhūt ca ruṣadrathaḥ
hemaḥ ruṣadrathāt jajñe sutapāḥ hemataḥ bhavat
baliḥ sutapasaḥ jajñe hi aṅga vaṅga kaliṅgakāḥ
andhaḥ paiṇḍraḥ ca bāleyāḥ hi anapānaḥ tathā aṅgataḥ
anapānāt divirathaḥ tatas dharmarathaḥ bhavat
romapādaḥ dharmarathāt caturaṅgaḥ tad ātmajaḥ
pṛthulākṣaḥ tasya putraḥ campaḥ bhūt pṛthulākṣataḥ
campa putraḥ ca haryaṅgaḥ tasya bhadrarathaḥ sutaḥ
bṛhatkarmā sutaḥ tasya bṛhadbhānuḥ tatas bhavat
buhanmanāḥ bṛhādbhānoḥ tasya putraḥ jayadrathaḥ
jayajrathasya vijayaḥ vijayasya dhṛtiḥ sutaḥ
dhṛteḥ dhṛvrataḥ putraḥ satyadharmā dhṛtavratāt
tasya putraḥ tu adhirathaḥ karṇaḥ tasya sutaḥ bhavat
vṛrṣasenaḥ tu karṇasya puru vaṃśyān śaṇuṣva me

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahupārāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe candravaṃśavarṇanaṃ nāmaikonacatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahupārāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe candravaṃśavarṇanam nāma ekonacatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
hariḥ uvāca
janamejayaḥ puroḥ ca abhūt namasyuḥ janamejayāt
tasya putraḥ ca abhayadaḥ sudyuḥ ca abhayadāt abhūt
sudyoḥ bahugatiḥ putraḥ saṃjātiḥ tasya ca ātmajaḥ
vatsajātiḥ ca sañjāteḥ raudrāśvaḥ ca tad ātmajaḥ
ṛteyuḥ sthaṇḍileyuḥ ca kakṣeyuḥ ca kṛteyukaḥ

original: jaleyuḥ santateyuśca rodrāśvasya sutā varāḥ // GarP_1,140.3 //
analyzed: jaleyuḥ santateyuḥ ca rodrāśvasya sutāḥ varāḥ
ratināraḥ ṛteyoḥ ca tasya pratirathaḥ sutaḥ
tasya medhātithiḥ putraḥ tad putraḥ ca ainilaḥ smṛtaḥ
ainilasya tu duṣyantaḥ bharataḥ tasya ca ātmajaḥ
śakuntalāyām saṃjajñe vitathaḥ bharatāt abhūt
vitathasya sutaḥ manyuḥ manyoḥ ca eva naraḥ smṛtaḥ

original: narasya saṃkṛtiḥ putro gargo vai saṃkṛteḥ sutaḥ // GarP_1,140.6 //
analyzed: narasya saṃkṛtiḥ putraḥ gargaḥ vai saṃkṛteḥ sutaḥ

original: gargādamanyuḥ putro vai śiniḥ putro vyajāyata /
analyzed: gargāt amanyuḥ putraḥ vai śiniḥ putraḥ vyajāyata
manyu putrāt mahā vīryāt sutaḥ bhavat uru kṣayaḥ
urukṣayāt trayyāruṇiḥ vyūhakṣatrāt ca manyujāt
suhotraḥ tasya hastī ca ajamīḍha dvimīḍhakau
hastinaḥ purumīḍhaḥ ca kaṇvaḥ bhūt ajamīḍhataḥ
kaṇvāt medhātithiḥ jajñe yatas kāṇvāyanāḥ dvijāḥ
ajamīḍhāt vṛhadiṣuḥ tad putraḥ ca bṛhaddhanuḥ

original: bṛhatkarmā tasya putrastasya putro jayadrathaḥ // GarP_1,140.10 //
analyzed: bṛhatkarmā tasya putraḥ tasya putraḥ jayadrathaḥ
jayadrathāt viśvajit ca senajit ca tad ātmajaḥ
rucirāśvaḥ senajitaḥ pṛthusenaḥ tad ātmajaḥ
pāraḥ tu pṛthusenasya pārāt dvīpaḥ bhavat nṛpaḥ

original: nṛpasya sṛmaraḥ putraḥ sukṛtiśca pṛthoḥ sutaḥ // GarP_1,140.12 //
analyzed: nṛpasya sṛmaraḥ putraḥ sukṛtiḥ ca pṛthoḥ sutaḥ
vibhrājaḥ sukṛteḥ putraḥ vibhrājāt aśvahaḥ bhavat
kṛtyām tasmāt brahmadattaḥ viṣvaksenaḥ tad ātmajaḥ
yavīnaraḥ dvimīḍhasya dhṛtimān ca yavīnarāt
dhatimataḥ satyadhṛtiḥ dṛḍhanemiḥ tad ātmajaḥ
dṛḍhanemeḥ supārśvaḥ bhūt supārśvāt sannatiḥ tathā
kṛḥ tu sannateḥ putraḥ kṛtāt ugrāyudhaḥ bhavat
ugrāyudhāt ca kṣemyaubhūt sudhīraḥ tu tad ātmajaḥ

original: purañjayaḥ sudhīrācca tasya putro vidūrathaḥ // GarP_1,140.16 //
analyzed: purañjayaḥ sudhīrāt ca tasya putraḥ vidūrathaḥ
ajamīḍhāt nalinyāt ca nīlaḥ nāma nṛpaḥ bhavat
nīlāt śāntiḥ abhūt putraḥ suśāntiḥ tasya ca ātmajaḥ
suśānteḥ ca puruḥ jātaḥ hi arkaḥ tasya sutaḥ bhavat
arkasya ca eva haryaśvaḥ haryaśvāt mukulaḥ bhavat
yavīnaraḥ bṛhadbhānuḥ kampillaḥ sṛñjayaḥ tathā
pāñcālāt mukulāt jajñe śaradvān vaiṣṇavaḥ mahān
divodāsaḥ dvitīyaḥ sya hi ahalyāyām śaradvataḥ
śatānandaḥ bhavat putraḥ tasya satyadhṛtiḥ sataḥ
kṛpaḥ kṛpī satyadhṛteḥ urvaśyām vīrya hānitaḥ
droṇa patnī kṛpī jajñe aśvatthāmānam uttamam
divodāsāt mitrayuḥ ca mitrayoḥ cyavanaḥ bhavat
sudāsaḥ cyavanāt jajñe saudāsaḥ tasya jātmajaḥ
sahadevaḥ tasya putraḥ sahadevāt tu somakaḥ
jantuḥ tu somakāt jajñe pṛṣataḥ ca aparaḥ mahān
pṛṣatāt drupadaḥ jajñe dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ tatas bhavat
dhṛṣṭadyumnāt dhṛṣṭaketuḥ ṛkṣaḥ bhūtajamīḍhataḥ
ṛkṣāt saṃvaraṇaḥ jajñe kuruḥ saṃvaraṇāt abhūt

original: sudhanuśca pīkṣicca jahnuścaiva kuroḥ sutāḥ // GarP_1,140.25 //
analyzed: sudhanuḥ ca pīkṣit ca jahnuḥ ca eva kuroḥ sutāḥ
sudhanuṣaḥ suhotraḥ bhūt cyavanaḥ bhūt suhotrataḥ
cyavanāt kṛtakaḥ jajñe tathā uparicaraḥ vasuḥ
bṛhadrathaḥ ca pratyagraḥ satya ādyāḥ ca vasoḥ sutāḥ
bṛhadrathāt kuśa agraḥ ca kuśa agrāt ṛṣabhaḥ bhavat
ṛṣabhāt puṣpavān tasmāt jajñe satyahitaḥ nṛpaḥ
satyahitāt sudhanvā abhūt jahruḥ ca vai sudhanvanaḥ
bṛhadrathāt jarāsandhaḥ sahadevaḥ tad ātmajaḥ

original: sahadevācca ca somāpiḥ somāpeḥ śrutavānsutaḥ // GarP_1,140.29 //
analyzed: sahadevāt ca ca somāpiḥ somāpeḥ śrutavān sutaḥ
bhīmasena ugrasenau ca śrutaseno parājitaḥ
janamejayaḥ tathā anyaḥ bhūt jahnoḥ tu surathaḥ bhavat
vidūrathaḥ tu surathāt sārvabhaumaḥ vidūrathāt
jayasenaḥ sārvabhauma ādau adhītaḥ tad ātmajaḥ
ayutāyuḥ tasya putraḥ tasya ca akrodhanaḥ sutaḥ
akrodhanasya atithiḥ ca ṛkṣaḥ bhūt atitheḥ sutaḥ
ṛkṣāt ca bhīmasenaḥ bhūt dilīpaḥ bhīmasenataḥ
pratīpaḥ bhūt dilīpāt ca devāpiḥ tu pratīpataḥ
śantanuḥ ca eva vāhlīkaḥ trayaḥ te bhrātaraḥ nṛpāḥ
vāhlīkāt somadattaḥ bhūt bhūriḥ bhūriśravāḥ tatas
śalaḥ ca śantanoḥ bhoṣmaḥ gaṅgāyām dhārmikaḥ mahān
citrāṅgada vicitrau tu satyavatyān tu śantanoḥ
bhārye vicitravīryasya tu ambikā ambālike tayoḥ

original: dhṛrāṣṭraṃ ca pāṇḍuñca taddāsyāṃ vidurantathā // GarP_1,140.36 //
analyzed: dhṛrāṣṭram ca pāṇḍum ca tad dāsyām viduram tathā
vyāsaḥ utpādayāmāsa gāndhāgī dhṛtarāṣṭrataḥ

original: śataputraṃ duryodhanādyaṃ pāṇḍoḥ pañca prajajñire // GarP_1,140.37 //
analyzed: śata putram duryodhana ādyam pāṇḍoḥ pañca prajajñire
pratibindhyaḥ śrutasomaḥ śrutakīrtiḥ tathā arjunāt

original: śatānīkaḥ śrutakarmā draupadyāṃ pañca vai kramāt // GarP_1,140.38 //
analyzed: śatānīkaḥ śrutakarmā draupadyām pañca vai kramāt

original: yaudheyī ca hiḍimbā ca kauśī caiva subhadrikā /
analyzed: yaudheyī ca hiḍimbā ca kauśī ca eva subhadrikā

original: vijayā vai reṇumatī pañcabhyastu sutāḥ kramāt // GarP_1,140.39 //
analyzed: vijayā vai reṇumatī pañcabhyaḥ tu sutāḥ kramāt
devakaḥ ghaca utkacaḥ ca hi abhimanyuḥ ca sarvagaḥ
suhotraḥ niramitraḥ ca parīkṣit abhimanyu jaḥ
janamejayaḥ sya tatas bhaviṣyān ca nṛpān śṛṇu

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe candravaṃśavarṇanaṃ nāma catvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe candravaṃśavarṇanam nāma catvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
hariḥ uvāca
śatānīkaḥ hi aśvamedhadattaḥ ca api adhisomakaḥ
kṛṣṇaḥ niruddhaḥ ca api uṣṇaḥ tatas citrarathaḥ nṛpaḥ
śucidrathaḥ vṛṣṇimān ca supeṇaḥ ca sunīthakaḥ

original: nṛcakṣuśca mukhābāṇaḥ medhāvī ca nṛpañjayaḥ // GarP_1,141.2 //
analyzed: nṛcakṣuḥ ca mukhābāṇaḥ medhāvī ca nṛpañjayaḥ
pāriplavaḥ ca munayaḥ medhāvī ca nṛpañjayaḥ
bṛhat rathaḥ hariḥ tigmaḥ śatānīkaḥ sudānakaḥ
udānaḥ daṇḍapāṇiḥ nimittakaḥ

original: kṣemakaśca tataḥ śūdraḥ pitā pūrvastataḥ sutaḥ // GarP_1,141.4 //
analyzed: kṣemakaḥ ca tatas śūdraḥ pitā pūrvaḥ tatas sutaḥ
bṛhat balāḥ tu kathayante nṛpoḥ ca aikṣvāku vaṃśa jāḥ
bṛhadbalāt urukṣayaḥ vatsavyūhaḥ tatas paraḥ
vatsavyūhāt tatas sūryaḥ sahadevaḥ tad ātmajaḥ
bṛhadaśvaḥ bhānurathaḥ pratīcyaḥ ca pratītakaḥ
manudevaḥ sunakṣatraḥ kinnaraḥ ca antarikṣakaḥ
suparṇaḥ kṛtajit ca eva bṛhadbhrājaḥ ca dhārmikaḥ

original: kṛtañjayo dhanañjayaḥ saṃjayaḥ śākya eva ca // GarP_1,141.7 //
analyzed: kṛtañjayaḥ dhanañjayaḥ saṃjayaḥ śākyaḥ eva ca
śuddhodanaḥ bāhulaḥ ca senajit kṣudrakaḥ tathā
sumitraḥ kuḍavaḥ ca atas sumitrāt māgadhān śaṇu
jarāsandhaḥ sahadevaḥ somāpiḥ ca śrutaśravāḥ
