śrutañjayaḥ senajit ca bhūriḥ ca eva śuciḥ tathā

original: kṣemyaśca suvrato dharmaḥ śmaśrulo dṛḍhasenakaḥ // GarP_1,141.10 //
analyzed: kṣemyaḥ ca suvrataḥ dharmaḥ śmaśrulaḥ dṛḍhasenakaḥ
sumatiḥ subalaḥ satyajit viśvajit tathā

original: iṣuñjayaśca ityete nṛpā bārhadrathāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,141.11 //
analyzed: iṣuñjayaḥ ca iti ete nṛpāḥ bārhadrathāḥ smṛtāḥ
adharmiṣṭhāḥ ca śūdrāḥ ca bhaviṣyanti nṛpāḥ tatas
svarga ādi kṛt hi bhagavān sākṣāt nārāyaṇaḥ vyayaḥ
naimittikaḥ prākṛtikaḥ tathā eva ātyantikaḥ layaḥ

original: yāti bhūḥ pralayaṃ cāpsu hyāpastejasi pāvakaḥ // GarP_1,141.13 //
analyzed: yāti bhūḥ pralayam ca apsu hi āpaḥ tejasi pāvakaḥ
vāyau vāyuḥ ca viyati tu ākāśau yāti ahaṅkṛtau

original: ahaṃ buddhau matirjove jīvo 'vyakte tadātmani // GarP_1,141.14 //
analyzed: aham buddhau matiḥ jove jīvaḥ vyakte tad ātmani
ātmā para īśvaraḥ viṣṇuḥ ekaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ naraḥ

original: avināśyaparaṃ sarvaṃ jagatsvargādi nāśi hi // GarP_1,141.15 //
analyzed: avināśya param sarvam jagat svarga ādi hi
nṛpa ādayaḥ gatāḥ nāśam atas pāpam vivarjayet

original: dharmaṃ kuryātsthiraṃ yena pāpaṃ hitvā hariṃ vrajet // GarP_1,141.16 //
analyzed: dharmam kuryāt sthiram yena pāpam hitvā harim vrajet

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bhaviṣya rājavaṃśa dṛ nāmaikacatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe nāma ekacatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
brahmā uvāca
viṃśa ādīn pālayāmāsa hi avatīrṇaḥ hariḥ prabhuḥ
daitya dharmasya nāśa artham veda dharma ādi guptaye
matsya ādika svarūpeṇa tu avatāram karoti ajaḥ

original: matsyo bhūtvā hayagrīvaṃ daityaṃ hatvājikaṇṭakam // GarP_1,142.2 //
analyzed: matsyaḥ bhūtvā hayagrīvam daityam hatvā āji kaṇṭakam
vedān ānīya manu ādīn pālayāmāsa keśavaḥ

original: mandaraṃ dhārayāmāsa kūrmo bhūtvā hitāya ca // GarP_1,142.3 //
analyzed: mandaram dhārayāmāsa kūrmaḥ bhūtvā hitāya ca
kṣīroda mathane vai dyaḥ devaḥ dhanvantariḥ hi arbhūt
bibhrat kamaṇḍalum pūrṇam amṛtena samutthitaḥ
āyurvedam atha aṣṭāṅgam suśrutāya saḥ uktavān

original: amṛtaṃ pāyayāmāsa strīrūpī ca surānhariḥ // GarP_1,142.5 //
analyzed: amṛtam pāyayāmāsa strī rūpī ca surān hariḥ
avatīrṇaḥ hiraṇyākṣam jaghāna ha
pṛthivīm dhārayāmāsa pālayāmāsa devatāḥ
narasiṃhaḥ hiraṇyakaśipum ripum
daityān nihatavān veda dharma ādīn abhyapālayat
tatas paraśurāmaḥ bhūt jamadagneḥ jagatprabhuḥ

original: triḥ saptakṛtvaḥ pṛthivīṃ cakre niḥ kṣattriyāṃ hariḥ // GarP_1,142.8 //
analyzed: tris sapta kṛtvas pṛthivīm cakre niḥ kṣattriyām hariḥ
kārtavīryam jaghāna ājau kaśyapāya mahīm dadau

original: yāgaṃ kṛtvā mahābāhurmahendre parvate sthitaḥ // GarP_1,142.9 //
analyzed: yāgam kṛtvā mahābāhuḥ mahendre parvate sthitaḥ
tatas rāmaḥ bhaviṣṇuḥ ca caturdhā
putraḥ daśarathāt jajñe rāmaḥ ca bharataḥ nujaḥ
lakṣmaṇaḥ ca atha śatrughnaḥ rāma bhāryā ca jānakī
rāmaḥ ca pitṛ satya artham mātṛbhyaḥ hitam ācaran
śṛṅgaveram citrakūṭam daṇḍaka araṇyam āgataḥ
nāsām śūrpaṇakhāyāḥ ca chittvā atha khara dūṣaṇam
hatvā sa rākṣasam sītā apahāri rajanīcaram

original: rāvaṇaṃ cānujaṃ tasya laṅkāpuryāṃ vibhīṣaṇam // GarP_1,142.13 //
analyzed: rāvaṇam ca anujam tasya laṅkā puryām vibhīṣaṇam
rakṣaḥ rājye ca saṃsthāpya

original: āruhya puṣpakaṃ sārdhaṃ sītayā patibhaktayā // GarP_1,142.14 //
analyzed: āruhya puṣpakam sārdham sītayā pati bhaktayā
lakṣmaṇena anukūlena hi ayodhyām sva purīm gataḥ

original: rājyaṃ cakāra devādīnpālayāmāsa sa prajāḥ // GarP_1,142.15 //
analyzed: rājyam cakāra deva ādīn pālayāmāsa sa prajāḥ
dharma saṃrakṣaṇam cakre hi aśvamedha ādikān kratūn

original: sā mahīpatinā reme rāmeṇaiva yathāsukham // GarP_1,142.16 //
analyzed: sā mahīpatinā reme rāmeṇa eva yathāsukham

original: rāvaṇasya gṛhe sītā sthitā bheje na rāvaṇam /
analyzed: rāvaṇasya gṛhe sītā sthitā bheje na rāvaṇam

original: karmaṇā manasā vācā sā gatā rāghavaṃ sadā // GarP_1,142.17 //
analyzed: karmaṇā manasā vācā sā gatā rāghavam sadā

original: pativratā tu sā sītā hyanasūyā yathaiva tu /
analyzed: pativratā tu sā sītā hi anasūyā yathā eva tu

original: pativratāyā māhātmyaṃ śṛṇu tvaṃ kathayāmyaham // GarP_1,142.18 //
analyzed: pativratāyāḥ māhātmyam śṛṇu tvam kathayāmi aham
kauśikaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ kuṣṭhī pratiṣṭhāne bhavat purā

original: taṃ tathā vyādhitaṃ bhāryā patiṃ devamivārcayat // GarP_1,142.19 //
analyzed: tam tathā vyādhitam bhāryā patim devam iva arcayat
nirbhartsitā api bhartāram tam amanyata daivatam
bhartrā uktā sā anayat veśyām śulkam ādāya ca adhikam
pathi sūle tadā protam acauram caura śaṅkayā
māṇḍavyam ati dus kha ārtam andhakāre sa dvijaḥ
patnī skandha samārūḍhaḥ cālayāmāsa kauśikaḥ
māṇḍavyaḥ tam uvāca ha
sūrya udaye mṛtiḥ tasya yena aham cālitaḥ padā

original: tacchrutvā prāha tadbhāryā sūryo nodayameṣyati // GarP_1,142.23 //
analyzed: tat śrutvā prāha tad bhāryā sūryaḥ nā udayam eṣyati
tatas sūrya udaya abhāvāt bhavat satatam niśā

original: bahūnyabdapramāṇāni tato devā bhayaṃ yayuḥ // GarP_1,142.24 //
analyzed: bahūni abda pramāṇāni tatas devāḥ bhayam yayuḥ
brahmāṇam śaraṇam jagmuḥ tām ūce padmasambhavaḥ
praśāmyate tejasā eva tapaḥ tejaḥ tu anena vai
pativratāyāḥ māhātmyāt na udgacchati divākaraḥ
tasya ca anudayāt hāniḥ martyānām bhavatām tathā
tasmāt pativratām atreḥ anasūyām tapasvinīm
prasādayata vai patnīm bhānoḥ udaya kāmyayā

original: taiḥ sā prasāditā gatvā hyanasūyā pativratā /
analyzed: taiḥ sā prasāditā gatvā hi anasūyā pativratā
kṛtvā āditya udayam sā ca tam bhartāram ajīvayat
pativratā anasūyāyāḥ sītā abhūt adhikā kila

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe daśāvatāradṛ nāma dvicatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe nāma dvicatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
brahmā uvāca
rāmāyaṇam atas vakṣye śrutam pāpa vināśanam
viṣṇu nābhi abjataḥ brahmā marīciḥ tad sutaḥ bhavat
marīceḥ kaśyapaḥ tasmāt raviḥ tasmāt manuḥ smṛtaḥ
manoḥ ikṣvākuḥ asya abhūt vaṃśe rājā raghuḥ smṛtaḥ
raghoḥ ajaḥ tatas jātaḥ rājā daśarathaḥ balī
tasya putrāḥ tu catvāraḥ mahā bala parākramāḥ
kausalyāyāma bhūdrāmaḥ bharataḥ kaikayī sutaḥ
sutau lakṣmaṇa śakṣughnau sumitrāyām babhūvatuḥ
rāmaḥ bhaktaḥ pituḥ mātuḥ viśvāmitrāt avāptavān

original: astragrāmaṃ tato yakṣīṃ tāṭakāṃ prajaghāna ha // GarP_1,143.5 //
analyzed: astra grāmam tatas yakṣīm tāṭakām prajaghāna ha
viśau amitrasya yajñe vai subāhum nyavadhīt balī

original: janakasya kratuṃ gatvā upayeme 'tha jānakīm // GarP_1,143.6 //
analyzed: janakasya kratum gatvā upayeme tha jānakīm

original: ūrmilāṃ lakṣmaṇo vīro bharato māṇḍavīṃ sutām /
analyzed: ūrmilām lakṣmaṇaḥ vīraḥ bharataḥ māṇḍavīm sutām

original: śatrughno vai kīrtimatīṃ kuśadhvajasute ubhe // GarP_1,143.7 //
analyzed: śatrughnaḥ vai kīrtimatīm kuśadhvaja sute ubhe
pitṛ ādibhiḥ ayodhyāyām gatvā rāma ādayaḥ sthitāḥ
yudhājitam mātulañca śatrughna bharatau gatau
gatayoḥ nṛpa varyo sau rājyam dātum samudyataḥ

original: sa rāmāya tatputrāya kaikeyyā prārthitastadā // GarP_1,143.9 //
analyzed: sa rāmāya tad putrāya kaikeyyā prārthitaḥ tadā
caturdaśa samā vāsaḥ vanerāmasya vāñchitaḥ

original: rāmaḥ pitṛhitārthañca lakṣmaṇena ca sītayā // GarP_1,143.10 //
analyzed: rāmaḥ pitṛ hita artham ca lakṣmaṇena ca sītayā
rājyam ca tṛṇa vat tyaktvā śṛṅgavera puram gataḥ

original: rathaṃ tyaktvā prayāgañca citrakūṭagiriṃ gataḥ // GarP_1,143.11 //
analyzed: ratham tyaktvā prayāgam ca citrakūṭa girim gataḥ

original: rāmasya tu viyogena rājā svargaṃ samāśritaḥ /
analyzed: rāmasya tu viyogena rājā svargam samāśritaḥ
saṃskṛtya bharataḥ ca agāt rāmam āha bala anvitaḥ
ayodhyām tu samāgatya rājyam kuru mahāmate

original: sa naicchatpāduke dattvā rājyāya bharatāya tu // GarP_1,143.13 //
analyzed: sa na aicchat pāduke dattvā rājyāya bharatāya tu
visarjitaḥ bharataḥ rāma rājyam apālayat

original: nandigrāme sthito bhakto hyayodhyāṃ nāviśadvratī // GarP_1,143.14 //
analyzed: nandigrāme sthitaḥ bhaktaḥ hi ayodhyām na aviśat vratī
citrakūṭāt ca hi atreḥ āśramam āyayau
natvā sutīkṣṇam ca agastyam daṇḍaka araṇyam āgataḥ
tatra śūrpaṇakhā nāma rākṣasī ca attum āgatā

original: nikṛtya karṇo nāse ca rāmeṇāthāpavāritā // GarP_1,143.16 //
analyzed: nikṛtya karṇaḥ nāse ca rāmeṇa atha apavāritā
tad preritaḥ kharaḥ ca agāt dūṣaṇaḥ triśirāḥ tathā
caturdaśa sahasreṇa balena ca
rāmaḥ pi preṣayāmāsa bāṇaiḥ yama puram ca tān
rākṣasyā preritaḥ bhyāgāt rāvaṇaḥ haraṇāya hi
mṛga rūpam sa mārīcam kṛtvā agre

original: sītayā prerito rāmo mārīcaṃ nijaghāna ha // GarP_1,143.19 //
analyzed: sītayā preritaḥ rāmaḥ mārīcam nijaghāna ha

original: mriyamāṇaḥ sa ca prāha hā sīte /
analyzed: mriyamāṇaḥ sa ca prāha hā sīte
lakṣmaṇā iti ca
sītā uktaḥ lakṣmaṇaḥ thā agāt rāmaḥ ca anudadarśa tam

original: uvāca rākṣasī māyā nūnaṃ sītā hṛteti saḥ /
analyzed: uvāca rākṣasī māyā nūnam sītā hṛtā iti saḥ
rāvaṇaḥ ntaram āsādya hi aṅkena ādāya jānakīm

original: jaṭāyuṣaṃ vinirbhidya yayau laṅkāṃ tato balī /
analyzed: jaṭāyuṣam vinirbhidya yayau laṅkām tatas balī
aśoka vṛkṣa chāyāyām rakṣitām tām adhārayat

original: āgatya rāmaḥ sūnyāñca parṇaśālāṃ dadarśa ha /
analyzed: āgatya rāmaḥ sūnyām ca parṇa śālām dadarśa ha

original: śokaṃ kṛtvātha jānakyā mārgaṇaṃ kṛtavānprabhuḥ // GarP_1,143.23 //
analyzed: śokam kṛtvā atha jānakyāḥ mārgaṇam kṛtavān prabhuḥ
jaṭāyuṣan ca saṃskṛtya tad uktaḥ dakṣiṇām diśam

original: gatvā sakhyaṃ tataścakre sugrīveṇa ca rāghavaḥ // GarP_1,143.24 //
analyzed: gatvā sakhyam tatas cakre sugrīveṇa ca rāghavaḥ
sapta tālān vinirbhidya śareṇa ānata parvaṇā
vālinam ca vinirbhidya kiṣkindhāyām hari īśvaram
sugrīvam kṛtavān rāmaḥ ṛśyamūke svayam sthitaḥ
sugrīvaḥ preṣayāmāsa vānarān parvata upamān
sītāyāḥ mārgaṇam kartum pūrva ādi āśāsu sa utsavān

original: pratīcīmuttarāṃ prācīṃ diśaṃ gatvā samāgatāḥ // GarP_1,143.27 //
analyzed: pratīcīm uttarām prācīm diśam gatvā samāgatāḥ

original: dakṣiṇāntu diśaṃ ye ca mārgayanto 'tha jānakīm /
analyzed: dakṣiṇām tu diśam ye ca mārgayantaḥ jānakīm
vanāni parvatān dvīpān nadīnām pulināni ca
jānakīnte hi apaśyantaḥ maraṇe kṛta niścayāḥ
sampāti vacanāt jñātvā hanūmān kapi kuñjaraḥ
śata yojana vistīrṇam pupluve makara ālayam
apaśyat jānakīm tatra hi aśoka vanikā sthitām
bhartsitām rākṣasībhiḥ ca rāvaṇena ca rakṣasā

original: bhava bhāryeti vadatā cintayantīñca rāghavam // GarP_1,143.31 //
analyzed: bhava bhāryā iti vadatā cintayantīm ca rāghavam
aṅgulīyam kapiḥ dattvā sītām kauśalyam abravīt

original: rāmasya tasya dūto 'haṃ śokaṃ mā kuru maithili // GarP_1,143.32 //
analyzed: rāmasya tasya dūtaḥ ham śokam mā kuru maithili

original: svābhijñānañca me dehi yena rāmaḥ smariṣyati /
analyzed: sva abhijñānam ca me dehi yena rāmaḥ smariṣyati

original: tacchrutvā pradadau sītā veṇīratnaṃ hanūmate // GarP_1,143.33 //
analyzed: tat śrutvā pradadau sītā veṇī ratnam hanūmate

original: yathā rāmo nayecchīghraṃ tathā vācyaṃ tvayā kape /
analyzed: yathā rāmaḥ nayet śīghram tathā vācyam tvayā kape

original: tathetyuktvā tu hanumānvanaṃ divyaṃ babhañja ha // GarP_1,143.34 //
analyzed: tathā iti uktvā tu hanumān vanam divyam babhañja ha
hatvā akṣam rākṣasān ca anyān bandhanam svayam āgataḥ
sarvaiḥ indrajitaḥ bāṇaiḥ dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇam abravīt
rāma dūtaḥ smi hanumān dehi rāmāya maithilīm
etat śrutvā prakupitaḥ dīpayāmāsa pucchakam
kapiḥ jvalita lāṅgūlaḥ laṅkām dehe mahā balaḥ

original: dagdhvā laṅkāṃ samāyāto rāmapārśvaṃ sa vānaraḥ // GarP_1,143.37 //
analyzed: dagdhvā laṅkām samāyātaḥ rāma pārśvam sa vānaraḥ
jagdhvā phalam madhuvane dṛṣṭā sītati avedayat

original: veṇīratnañca rāmāya rāmo laṅkāpurrī yayau // GarP_1,143.38 //
analyzed: veṇī ratnam ca rāmāya rāmaḥ laṅkā purrī yayau
sa sugrīvaḥ sa hanumān sa aṃgadaḥ ca sa lakṣmaṇaḥ

original: vibhīṣaṇo 'pi samprāptaḥ śaraṇaṃ rāghavaṃ prati // GarP_1,143.39 //
analyzed: vibhīṣaṇaḥ pi samprāptaḥ śaraṇam rāghavam prati
laṅkā aiśvaryeṣu abhyaṣiñcat rāmaḥ tam rāvaṇa anujam

original: rāmo nalena setuñca kṛtvābdhau cottatāra tam // GarP_1,143.40 //
analyzed: rāmaḥ nalena setuñca kṛtvā abdhau ca uttatāra tam
suvela avasthitaḥ ca eva purīm laṅkām dadarśa ha

original: atha te vānarā vīrā nīlāṅgadanalādayaḥ // GarP_1,143.41 //
analyzed: atha te vānarāḥ vīrāḥ nīla aṅgada nala ādayaḥ
dhūmra dhūmrākṣa vīra indrāḥ jāmbavat pramukhāḥ tadā
mainda dvivida mukhyāḥ te purīm laṅkām babhañjire
rākṣasān ca mahā kāyān kāla añjana caya upamān

original: rāmaḥ salakṣmaṇo hatvā sakapiḥ sarvarākṣasān // GarP_1,143.43 //
analyzed: rāmaḥ sa lakṣmaṇaḥ hatvā sa kapiḥ sarva rākṣasān
vidyujjihvam ca dhūmrākṣam devāntaka narānta kau
mahodara mahāpārśvau atikāyam mahā balam
kumbham nikumbham mattam ca makarākṣam hi akampanam
prahastam vīram unmattam kumbhakarṇam mahā balam
rāvaṇim lakṣmaṇo chinta hi astra ādyaiḥ rāghavaḥ balī
nikṛtya bāhu cakrāṇi nyapātayan

original: sītāṃ śuddhāṃ gṛhītvātha vimāne puṣpake sthitaḥ /
analyzed: sītām śuddhām gṛhītvā atha vimāne puṣpake sthitaḥ

original: savānaraḥ samāyāto hyayodhyāṃ pravarāṃ purīm // GarP_1,143.47 //
analyzed: sa vānaraḥ samāyātaḥ hi ayodhyām pravarām purīm
tatra rājyam cakāra atha puttra vat pālayan prajāḥ
daśa aśvamedhān āhṛtya gayāśirasi pātanam
piṇḍānām vidhivat kṛtvā dattvā dānāni rāghavaḥ

original: putrau kuśalavau dṛṣṭvā tau ca rājye 'bhyaṣecayat // GarP_1,143.49 //
analyzed: putrau kuśa lavau dṛṣṭvā tau ca rājye bhyaṣecayat
ekādaśa sahasrāṇi rāmaḥ rājyam akārayat

original: śatrughno lavaṇaṃ jaghne śailūṣaṃ bhatastataḥ // GarP_1,143.50 //
analyzed: śatrughnaḥ lavaṇam jaghne śailūṣam bhatas tatas
agastya ādīn munīn natvā śrutvā utpattim ca rakṣasām

original: svargaṃ gato janaiḥ sārdhamayodhyāsthaiḥ kṛtārthakaḥ // GarP_1,143.51 //
analyzed: svargam gataḥ janaiḥ sārdham ayodhyā sthaiḥ kṛtārthakaḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe rāmāyaṇavarṇanaṃ nāma tricatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe rāmāyaṇavarṇanam nāma tricatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
brahmā uvāca
harivaṃśam pravakṣyāmi kṛṣṇa māhātmyam uttamam
vasudevāt tu devakyām vāsudevaḥ balaḥ bhavat
dharma ādi rakṣaṇa arthāya hi adharma ādi vinaṣṭaye

original: kṛṣṇaḥ pītvā stanau gāḍhaṃ pūtanāmanayatkṣayam // GarP_1,144.2 //
analyzed: kṛṣṇaḥ pītvā stanau gāḍham pūtanām anayat kṣayam
śakaṭaḥ bhagnau ca yamalārjunau

original: damitaḥ kāliyo nāgo dhenuko vinipātitaḥ // GarP_1,144.3 //
analyzed: damitaḥ kāliyaḥ nāgaḥ dhenukaḥ vinipātitaḥ
dhṛtaḥ govardhanaḥ śailaḥ indreṇa paripūjitaḥ
bhāra avataraṇam cakre pratijñām kṛtavān hariḥ
rakṣaṇāya arjuna ādeḥ ca hi ariṣṭa ādiḥ nipātitaḥ

original: keśī vinihato daityo gopādyāḥ paritoṣitāḥ // GarP_1,144.5 //
analyzed: keśī vinihataḥ daityaḥ gopa ādyāḥ paritoṣitāḥ
cāṇūraḥ muṣṭikaḥ mallaḥ kaṃsaḥ mañcāt nipātitaḥ

original: rukmiṇīsatyabhāmādyāḥ hyaṣṭau patnyo hareḥ parāḥ // GarP_1,144.6 //
analyzed: rukmiṇī satyabhāmā ādyāḥ hi aṣṭau patnyaḥ hareḥ parāḥ
ṣoḍhaśa strī sahasrāṇi hi anyāni āsa mahātmanaḥ

original: tāsāṃ putrāśca pautrādyāḥ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ // GarP_1,144.7 //
analyzed: tāsām putrāḥ ca pautra ādyāḥ sahasraśas
rukmiṇyām ca eva pradyumnaḥ nyavadhīt śaṃbaram ca yaḥ
tasya putraḥ niruddhaḥ bhūduṣābāṇa sutāpatiḥ
mahā yuddham babhūva ha
bāṇa bāhu sahasrañca chinnam bāhu dvayam hi abhūt

original: narako nihato yena pārijātaṃ jahāra yaḥ /
analyzed: narakaḥ nihataḥ yena pārijātam jahāra yaḥ

original: balaśca śisupālaśca hataśca dvividaḥ kapiḥ // GarP_1,144.10 //
analyzed: balaḥ ca śisupālaḥ ca hataḥ ca dvividaḥ kapiḥ

original: aniruddhādabhūdvajraḥ sa ca rājā gate harau /
analyzed: aniruddhāt abhūt vajraḥ sa ca rājā gate harau
sandīpanim gurun cakre sa putram ca cakāra saḥ

original: mathurāyāṃ cograsenaṃ pālanaṃ ca divaukasām // GarP_1,144.11 //
analyzed: mathurāyām ca ugrasenam pālanam ca divaukasām

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe harivaṃśavarṇanaṃ nāma catuścātvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe harivaṃśavarṇanam nāma catuścātvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
brahmā uvāca
bhāratam saṃpravakṣyāmi bhāra avataraṇam bhuvaḥ
cakre kṛṣṇaḥ yudhyamānaḥ pāṇḍava ādi nimittataḥ
viṣṇu nābhi abjataḥ brahmā tris atritaḥ
somaḥ tatas budhaḥ tasmāt ilāyām ca purūravāḥ
tasya āyuḥ tatra vaṃśe bhūt yayātiḥ bharataḥ kuruḥ
śantanuḥ tasya vaṃśe bhūt gaṅgāyām śantanoḥ sutaḥ
bhīṣmaḥ sarva guṇaiḥ yuktaḥ brahmavaivarta pāragaḥ

original: śantanoḥ satyavatyāṃ ca dvau putrau saṃbabhūvatuḥ /
analyzed: śantanoḥ satyavatyām ca dvau putrau saṃbabhūvatuḥ
citrāṅgadam tu gandharvaḥ putram citrāṅgadaḥ vadhīt
anyaḥ vicitravīryaḥ bhūt kāśī rāja sutā patiḥ
vicitravīrye svaryāte vyāsāt tad kṣetrataḥ bhavat
dhṛtarāṣṭaḥ mbikā putraḥ pāṇḍura ambālikā sutaḥ
bhujiṣyāyāntu viduraḥ gāndhāryām dhṛtarāṣṭrataḥ
duryodhana pradhānāḥ tu śata saṃkhyāḥ mahā balāḥ

original: pāṇḍoḥ kuntyāñca mādyāṃ ca pañca putrāḥ prajajñire // GarP_1,145.8 //
analyzed: pāṇḍoḥ kuntyām ca mādyām ca pañca putrāḥ prajajñire
yudhiṣṭhiraḥ bhīmasenaḥ hi arjunaḥ nakulaḥ tathā
sahadevaḥ ca pañca ete mahā bala parākramāḥ
kuru pāṇḍavayoḥ vairam daiva yo gāt babhūva ha
duryodhanena adhīreṇa pāṇḍavāḥ samupadrutāḥ

original: dagdhā jatugṛhe vīrāste muktāḥ svadhiyāmalāḥ // GarP_1,145.11 //
analyzed: dagdhāḥ jatu gṛhe vīrāḥ te muktāḥ sva dhiyā amalāḥ
tatas tat ekacakrāyām brāhmaṇasya niveśane
viviśuḥ te mahātmānaḥ nihatya baka rākṣasam
tatas pāñcāla viṣaye id raupadyāḥ te svayaṃvaram
vijñāya vīrya śulka antām pāṇḍavāḥ upayemire
droṇa bhīṣma anumatyā tu dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ samānayat

original: ardvarājyaṃ tataḥ prāptā indraprasthe purottame // GarP_1,145.14 //
analyzed: ardva rājyam tatas prāptāḥ indraprasthe pura uttame
rājasūyan tatas cakruḥ sabhām kṛtvā yata vratāḥ
arjunaḥ dvāravatyāḥ tu subhadrām prāptavān priyām
vāsudevasya bhaginīm anumatyā muradviṣaḥ
nandighoṣam ratham divyam agneḥ ghanuḥ anuttamam

original: gāṇḍīvaṃ nāma taddivyaṃ triṣu lokeṣu viśrutam /
analyzed: gāṇḍīvam nāma tat divyam triṣu lokeṣu viśrutam
akṣayān sāyakān ca eva tathā abhedyam ca daṃśanam

original: sa tena dhanuṣā vīraḥ pāṇḍavo jātavedasam /
analyzed: sa tena dhanuṣā vīraḥ pāṇḍavaḥ jātavedasam
kṛṣṇa dvitīyaḥ bībhatsuḥ atarpayata vīryavān
nṛpān digvijaye jitvā ratnāni ādāya vai dadau

original: yudhiṣṭhirāya mahate bhrātre nītivide mudā // GarP_1,145.18 //
analyzed: yudhiṣṭhirāya mahate bhrātre nīti vide mudā
yudhiṣṭhiraḥ pi dharma ātmā bhrātṛbhiḥ parivāritaḥ
jitaḥ duryodhanena eva māyā dyūtena pāpinā
sthitena śakuneḥ mate
atha dvādaśa varṣāṇi vane tepuḥ mahat tapaḥ
sa dhaumyāḥ draupadī ṣaṣṭhāḥ muni vṛnda abhisaṃvṛtāḥ
yayuḥ virāṭa nagaram gupta rūpeṇa saṃśritāḥ
varṣam ekam mahā prājñāḥ gograhāt tam apālayan
tate yātāḥ svakam rāṣṭram prārthayāmāsuḥ ādṛtāḥ
pañca grāmān ardha rājyāt vīrāḥ duryodhanam nṛpam
na āptavantaḥ kurukṣetre yuddhañcakruḥ bala anvitāḥ
akṣauhiṇībhiḥ divyābhiḥ saptabhiḥ parivāritāḥ
ekādaśabhiḥ udyuktāḥ yuktāḥ duryodhana ādayaḥ
āsīt yuddham saṃkulam ca deva asura raṇa upamam
bhīṣmaḥ senāpatiḥ abhūt ādau dauryodhane bale

original: pāṇḍavānāṃ śikhaṇḍī ca tayoryuddhaṃ babhūva ha /
analyzed: pāṇḍavānām śikhaṇḍī ca tayoḥ yuddham babhūva ha
śastrāśastri mahā ghoram śarāśari
śikhaṇḍi arjuna bāṇaiḥ ca bhīṣmaḥ śara śataiḥ citaḥ
uttarāyaṇam āvīkṣya dhyātvā devam gadādharam
uktvā dharmān bahuvidhān tarpayitvā pitṝn bahūn

original: ānande tu pade līno vimale muktakilbiṣe // GarP_1,145.27 //
analyzed: ānande tu pade līnaḥ vimale mukta kilbiṣe

original: tato droṇo yayau yoddhuṃ dhṛṣṭadyumnena bīryavān /
analyzed: tatas droṇaḥ yayau yoddhum dhṛṣṭadyumnena bīryavān
dināni pañca tat yuddham āsīt parama dāruṇam

original: yatra te pṛthivīpālā hatāḥ pārthena saṃgare /
analyzed: yatra te pṛthivīpālāḥ hatāḥ pārthena saṃgare
śoka sāgaram āsādya droṇaḥ pi svargam āptavān
tatas karṇāḥ yayau yoddhum arjunena miha ātmanā
dina dvayam mahā yuddham kṛtvā pārtha astra sāgare

original: nimagnaḥ sūryalokantu tataḥ prāpa sa vīryavān // GarP_1,145.30 //
analyzed: nimagnaḥ sūrya lokam tu tatas prāpa sa vīryavān

original: tataḥ śalyo yayau yoddhuṃ dharmarājena dhīmatā /
analyzed: tatas śalyaḥ yayau yoddhum dharmarājena dhīmatā
dina ardhena hataḥ śalyaḥ bāṇaiḥ jvalana sannibhaiḥ
duryodhanaḥ tha vegena gadām ādāya vīryavān
abhyadhāvata vai bhībham kāla antaka yama upamaḥ
atha bhīmena vīreṇa gadayā vinipātitaḥ

original: aśvatthāmā gato drauṇiḥ suptasainyaṃ tato niśi // GarP_1,145.33 //
analyzed: aśvatthāmā gataḥ drauṇiḥ supta sainyam tatas niśi
jaghāna bāhu vīryeṇa pituḥ vadham anusmaran
dhṛṣṭadyumnam jaghāna atha draupadeyān ca vīryavān
draupadyām rudyamānāyām aśvatthāmnaḥ śiromaṇim

original: aiṣikāstreṇa taṃ jitvā jagrāhārjuna uttamam // GarP_1,145.35 //
analyzed: aiṣika astreṇa tam jitvā jagrāha arjunaḥ uttamam
yudhiṣṭhiraḥ samāśvāsya strī janam śoka saṃkulam

original: snātvā santarpya devāṃśca pitṝnatha pitāmahān // GarP_1,145.36 //
analyzed: snātvā santarpya devān ca pitṝn atha pitāmahān
āśvāsitaḥ bhīṣmeṇa rājyañca eva akarot mahat
viṣṇum īje śvamedhena vidhivat dakṣiṇāvatā
rājye parīkṣitam sthāpya yādavānām vināśanam

original: śrutvā tu mausale rājā japtvā nāmasahasrakam // GarP_1,145.38 //
analyzed: śrutvā tu mausale rājā japtvā nāma sahasrakam
viṣṇoḥ svargam jagāma atha bhīma ādyaiḥ bhrātṛbhiḥ yutaḥ
vāsudevaḥ punar buddha saṃmohāya suradviṣām
kalkiḥ viṣṇuḥ ca bhavitā śaṃbhala grāmake punar
aśva ārūḍhaḥ khilān lokān tadā bhasmīkariṣyati
deva ādīnām rakṣaṇāya hi adharma hāraṇāya ca

original: duṣṭānāñca vadhārthāya hyavatāraṃ karoti ca // GarP_1,145.41 //
analyzed: duṣṭānām ca vadha arthāya hi avatāram karoti ca
yathā dhanvantariḥ vaṃśe jātaḥ kṣīroda manthane
deva ādīnām jīvanāya hi āyurvedam uvāca ha
viśvāmitra sutāya eva śuśrutāya mahātmane
bhāratān ca avatārān ca śrutvā svargam vrajet naraḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bhāratādivarṇanaṃ nāma pañcacatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe bhāratādivarṇanam nāma pañcacatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
dhanvantariḥ uvāca
sarvaroganidānam ca vakṣye suśruta tattvataḥ
ātreya ādyaiḥ muni varaiḥ yathā pūrvam udīritam

original: rogaḥ pāpmā jvaro vyādhirvikāro duṣṭa āmayaḥ /
analyzed: rogaḥ pāpmā jvaraḥ vyādhiḥ vikāraḥ duṣṭaḥ āmayaḥ
yakṣma ātaṅka gadāḥ bādhāḥ śabdāḥ paryāya vācinaḥ
nidānam pūrvarūpāṇi rūpāṇi upaśayaḥ tathā

original: saṃprāptiścaiti vijñānaṃ rogāṇāṃ pañcadhā smṛtam // GarP_1,146.3 //
analyzed: saṃprāptiḥ ca eti vijñānam rogāṇām pañcadhā smṛtam
nimitta hetu āyatana pratyaya utthāna kāraṇaiḥ

original: nidānamāhuḥ paryāyaiḥ prāgrūpaṃ yena lakṣyate // GarP_1,146.4 //
analyzed: nidānam āhuḥ paryāyaiḥ prāgrūpam yena lakṣyate
utpitsuḥ āmayaḥ doṣa viśeṣeṇa anadhiṣṭhitaḥ
liṅgam avyaktam alpa tvāt vyādhīnām tat yathāyatham
tat eva vyakta tām yātam rūpam iti abhidhīyate

original: saṃsthānāṃ vyañjanaṃ liṅgaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ cihnamākṛtiḥ // GarP_1,146.6 //
analyzed: saṃsthānām vyañjanam liṅgam lakṣaṇam cihnam ākṛtiḥ
hetu vyādhi viparyasta viparyasta artha kāriṇām
auṣadha anna vihārāṇām upayogam sukha āvaham

original: vidyādupaśayaṃ vyādheḥ sa hi sātmyamiti smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: vidyāt upaśayam vyādheḥ sa hi sātmyam iti smṛtaḥ
viparītaḥ nu paśayaḥ vyādhi asātmya iti saṃjñitaḥ
yathā duṣṭena doṣeṇa yathā ca anuvisarpatā
nirvṛttiḥ āmayasya asau saṃprāptiḥ abhidhīyate
saṃkhyā vikalpa prādhānya bala kāla viśeṣataḥ

original: sā bhidyate yathātraiva vakṣyante 'ṣṭau jvarā iti // GarP_1,146.10 //
analyzed: sā bhidyate yathā atra eva vakṣyante ṣṭau jvarāḥ iti
doṣāṇām samavetānām vikalpa uśa aṃśa kalpanā
svātantrya pāratantryābhyām vyādheḥ prādhānyam ādiśet
hetu ādi kārtsnya avayavaiḥ bala abala viśeṣa ṣaṇam
naktandina ardha bhukta aṃśaiḥ vyādhi kālaḥ yathāmalam
iti proktaḥ nidāna arthaḥ sa vyāsena upadekṣyate

original: sarveṣāmeva rogāṇāṃ nidānaṃ kupitā malāḥ // GarP_1,146.13 //
analyzed: sarveṣām eva rogāṇām nidānam kupitāḥ malāḥ
tad prakopasya tu proktam vividha ahita sevanam
ahitaḥ trividhaḥ yogaḥ trayāṇām prāk udāhṛtaḥ
tikta ūṣaṇa kaṣāya amla rūkṣa apramita yojanaiḥ
dhāvana udīraṇa niśā jāgara ati ucca bhāṣaṇaiḥ
kriyā abhiyoga bī śoka cintā vyāyāma maithunaiḥ
grīṣma ahar rātra bhukti ante prakupyati samīraṇaḥ
pittam kaṭu āla tīkṣṇa uṣṇa kaṭu krodha vidāhibhiḥ
śarad madhyāhna rātri ardha vidāha samayeṣu ca
āsya asvapna sukha ajīrṇa divāsvapna ādi bṛṃhaṇaiḥ
pricchardana ādya yogena bhukta annasya api ajīrṇake

original: pūrvāhne pūrvarātre ca śleṣmā vakṣyāmi saṅkarān // GarP_1,146.19 //
analyzed: pūrvāhne pūrvarātre ca śleṣmā vakṣyāmi saṅkarān
miśrībhāvāt samastānām sannipātaḥ tathā punar
saṃkīrṇa ajīrṇa viṣama viruddha ādi aśana ādibhiḥ
vyāpanna madya pānīya śuṣka śāka āma mūlakaiḥ
piṇyāka mṛti avasara pūti śuṣka kṛśa miṣaiḥ
doṣatraya karaiḥ taiḥ taiḥ tathā anna parivartataḥ
dhātoḥ duṣṭāt puras vātāt dvi graha āveśa viplavāt
duṣṭa āma annaiḥ ati ślaiṣma grahaiḥ janma ṛkṣa pīḍanāt
mithyāyogāt ca vividhāt pāpānām ca niṣevaṇāt
strīṇām prasava vaiṣamyāt tathā mithyā upacārataḥ
pratirogam iti kruddhāḥ roga vidhi anugāminaḥ

original: rasāyanaṃ prapadyāśu doṣā dehe vikurvate // GarP_1,146.24 //
analyzed: rasāyanam prapadya āśu doṣāḥ dehe vikurvate

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākye ācārakāṇḍe sarvaroganidānaṃ nāma ṣaṭcatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākye ācāra kāṇḍe sarvaroganidānam nāma ṣaṭcatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
dhanvantariḥ uvāca
vakṣye jvaranidānam hi sarva jvara vibuddhaye
jvaraḥ roga patiḥ pāpmā mṛtyu rājaḥ śanaḥ ntakaḥ
tad santāpaḥ moha mayaḥ santāpa ātma apacāra jaḥ
vividhaiḥ nāmabhiḥ krūraḥ nānā yoniṣu vartate
pākalaḥ gajeṣu abhitāpaḥ vājiṣu alarkaḥ kukrureṣu

original: indramado jaladeṣvapsu nīlikā jyotiroṣadhīṣu bhūmyāmūṣaro nāma // GarP_1,147.3 //
analyzed: indramadaḥ jaladeṣu apsu nīlikā jyotiḥ oṣadhīṣu bhūmyām ūṣaraḥ nāma
hṛllāsaḥ chardanam kāsaḥ staṃbhaḥ tvac ādiṣu

original: aṅgeṣu ca samudbhūtāḥ piḍakāśca kaphodbhave // GarP_1,147.4 //
analyzed: aṅgeṣu ca samudbhūtāḥ piḍakāḥ ca kapha udbhave
kāle yathāsvam sarveṣām pravṛttiḥ vṛddhiḥ eva vā
nidāna uktaḥ anupaśayaḥ viparīta upaśāyi tā
aruciḥ ca avipākaḥ ca staṃbham ālasyam eva ca
hṛd dāhaḥ ca vipākaḥ ca tandrā ca ālasyam eva ca
vastiḥ vimarda avanayā doṣāṇām apravartanam
svaccham uṣṇa guru tvañca gātrāṇām bahu mūtra tā

original: na vijīrṇaṃ na ca mlānirjvarasyāmasya lakṣaṇam // GarP_1,147.7 //
analyzed: na vijīrṇam na ca mlāniḥ jvarasya āmasya lakṣaṇam
kṣudh kṣāma tā laghu tvam ca gātrāṇām jvara mārdavam
doṣa pravṛttiḥ aṣṭa ahāt nirāma jvara lakṣaṇam
yathā sva liṅgam saṃsarge jvara saṃsarga jaḥ vā
śiraḥ ṛti mūrchā vami deha dāha kaṇṭha āsya śoṣa aruci parva bhedāḥ
unnidra tā saṃbhrama romaharṣāḥ jṛṃbhā ati vāc tvam pavanāt sa pittāt
tāpa hāni aruci parva śiraḥ ru ṣṭhīvana śvasana kāsa vivarṇāḥ
śīta jāḍya timira bhrami tandrā śleṣma vāta janita jvara liṅgam
śīta stambha sveda dāha avyavasthāḥ tṛṣṇā kāsaḥ śleṣma pitta pravṛttiḥ

original: mohastandrāliptatiktāsyatā ca jñeyaṃ rūpaṃ śleṣmapittajvarasya // GarP_1,147.11 //
analyzed: mohaḥ tandrā lipta tikta āsya tā ca jñeyam rūpam śleṣma pitta jvarasya
sarvajaḥ lakṣaṇaiḥ sarvaiḥ dāhaḥ ca muhur muhur

original: taducchītaṃ mahā nidrā divā jāgaraṇaṃ niśi // GarP_1,147.12 //
analyzed: mahā nidrā divā jāgaraṇam niśi

original: sadā vā naiva vā nidrā mahāsvedo hi naiva vā /
analyzed: sadā vā nā eva vā nidrā mahā svedaḥ hi nā eva vā
gīta nartana hāsya ādiḥ prakṛta īhā pravartanam
sa aśruṇī kaluṣe rakte bhugne lulita pakṣmaṇī
akṣiṇī piṇḍikā pārśva śiraḥ parva asthi ruj bhramaḥ

original: sasvanau sarujau karṇau mahāśītau hi naiva vā /
analyzed: sa svanau sa rujau karṇau mahā śītau hi nā eva vā
paridagdhā kharā jihvā guruḥ trasta aṅga sandhi tā
ṣṭhīvanam rakta pittasya loṭhanam

original: koṣṭhānāṃ śyāvaraktānāṃ maṇḍalānāṃ ca darśanam // GarP_1,147.16 //
analyzed: koṣṭhānām śyāva raktānām maṇḍalānām ca darśanam
hṛd vyathā malam sasargaḥ pravṛttiḥ vā alpaśas ti vā
snigdha āsya tā bala bhraṃśaḥ svara sādaḥ
doṣa pākaḥ ciram tandrā pratatam kaṇṭha kūjanam
sannipātam abhinyāsam tam brūyāt ca hata ojasam
vāyunā kaṇṭha ruddhena pittam antar su pīḍitam
vyavāyi tvāt ca saukhyāt ca bahis margam prapadyate
tena hāridra netra tvam sannipāta udbhave jvare
doṣe vivṛddhe naṣṭe gnau sarva saṃpūrṇa lakṣaṇaḥ
sānnipāta jvaraḥ sādhyaḥ kṛcchra sādhyaḥ tatas nyathā
anyatra sannipāta uttham yatra pittam pṛthak sthitam

original: tvaci koṣṭhe ca vā dāhaṃ vidadhāti puro 'nu vā // GarP_1,147.21 //
analyzed: tvaci koṣṭhe ca vā dāham vidadhāti puras nu vā
tadvat vāta kaphe śītam dāha ādiḥ dustaraḥ tayoḥ

original: śītādau tatra pittena kaphe syānditaśoṣite // GarP_1,147.22 //
analyzed: śīta ādau tatra pittena kaphe

original: pitte śānte 'tha vai mūrchā madastṛṣṇā ca jāyate /
analyzed: pitte śānte vai mūrchā madaḥ tṛṣṇā ca jāyate

original: dāhādau punaranteṣu tandrālasye vamiḥ kramāt // GarP_1,147.23 //
analyzed: dāha ādau punar anteṣu tandrā ālasye vamiḥ kramāt
āgantuḥ abhigāta abhiṣaṅga śāpa abhicārataḥ

original: caturdhā tu kṛtaḥ svedo dāhādyairabhighātajaḥ // GarP_1,147.24 //
analyzed: caturdhā tu kṛtaḥ svedaḥ dāha ādyaiḥ abhighāta jaḥ
śramāt ca tasmin pavanaḥ prāyas raktam pradūṣayan
sa vyathā śoka vaivarṇyam sa rujam kurute jvaram
abhiṣaṅga grahaḥ pi asmin akasmāt vāsa rodane
oṣadhī gandha je mūrchā śiraḥ ruj vamathuḥ kṣayaḥ
viṣāt mūrchā atisāraḥ ca śyāva tā dāha kṛt bhramaḥ
krodhāt kampaḥ śiraḥ ruj ca pralāpaḥ bhaya śoka je
kāmāt bhramaḥ ruciḥ dāhaḥ hrī nidrā dhī dhṛti kṣayāḥ
graha ādau sannipātasya rūpa ādau marutaḥ tayoḥ
kopāt kope pittasya yau tu śāpa abhicāra jau
sannipāta jvarau ghorau tau asahyatamau matau
tantra ābhicārikaiḥ mantraiḥ dūyamānam ca tapyate
dehaḥ tatas visphoṭa digbhramaiḥ
sa dāha mūrchā grastasya pratyaham vardhate jvaraḥ

original: iti jvaro 'ṣṭadhā dṛṣṭaḥ samāsāddvibidhastu saḥ // GarP_1,147.32 //
analyzed: iti jvaraḥ ṣṭadhā dṛṣṭaḥ samāsāt dvibidhaḥ tu saḥ
śārīraḥ mānasaḥ saumyaḥ tīkṣṇaḥ ūm antar bahis āśrayaḥ

original: prākṛto vaikṛtaḥ sādhyo 'sādhyaḥ sāmo nirāmakaḥ // GarP_1,147.33 //
analyzed: prākṛtaḥ vaikṛtaḥ sādhyaḥ sādhyaḥ sāmaḥ nirāmakaḥ

original: pūrvaṃ śarire śarīre tāpo manasi mānase /
analyzed: pūrvam śarīre tāpaḥ manasi mānase
pavanaiḥ yogavāhi tvāt śītam śleṣma yute bhavet

original: dāhaḥ pittayute miśraṃ miśre 'ntaḥ saṃśraye punaḥ /
analyzed: dāhaḥ pitta yute miśram miśre ntar saṃśraye punar

original: jvare 'dhikaṃ vikārāḥ syurantaḥ kṣobho malagrahaḥ // GarP_1,147.35 //
analyzed: jvare dhikam vikārāḥ syuḥ antar kṣobhaḥ mala grahaḥ

original: bahireva bahirvege tāpo 'pi ca sa sādhitaḥ /
analyzed: bahis eva bahis vege ca sa sādhitaḥ
varṣā śarad vasanteṣu vāta ādyaiḥ prakṛtaḥ kramāt

original: vaikṛto 'nyaḥ sa duḥ sādhyaḥ prāyaśca prākṛto 'nilāt /
analyzed: vaikṛtaḥ sa dus sādhyaḥ prāyas ca prākṛtaḥ

original: varṣāsu māruto duṣṭaḥ pittaśleṣmānvitaṃ jvaram // GarP_1,147.37 //
analyzed: varṣāsu mārutaḥ duṣṭaḥ pitta śleṣma anvitam jvaram

original: kuryācca pittaṃ śaradi tasya cānucaraḥ kaphaḥ /
analyzed: kuryāt ca pittam śaradi tasya ca anucaraḥ kaphaḥ
tad prakṛtyā visargāt ca tatra na anaśanāt bhayam
kaphaḥ vasante tam api vātapittam bhavet anu
balavatsu alpa doṣeṣu jvaraḥ sādhyaḥ nupadravaḥ
sarvathā vikṛti jñāne prāk asādhyaḥ udāhṛtaḥ
jvara upadrava tīkṣṇa tvam manda agniḥ bahu mūtra tā
na pravṛttiḥ na vijīrṇā na kṣudh sāma jvara ākṛtiḥ
jvara vegaḥ dhikaḥ tṛṣṇā pralāpaḥ śvasanam bhramaḥ
mala pravṛttiḥ utkleśaḥ pacyamānasya lakṣaṇam
jīrṇa tām aviparyāsāt sapta rātram ca laṅghanam
jvaraḥ pañcavidhaḥ proktaḥ mala kāla bala abalāt
prāyaśas sannipātena bhūyasām upadiśyate
santataḥ satataḥ nyedyus tṛtīyaka caturthakau
dhātu mūtra śakṛt vāhi snota sām vyāpinaḥ malāḥ
tāpayantaḥ tanum sarvām tulya dṛṣṭi ādi vardhitāḥ
balinaḥ guravaḥ tasya aviśeṣeṇa rasa āśritāḥ
satatam niṣpratidvandvā jvaram kuryuḥ su duḥsaham

original: malaṃ jvaroṣṇadhātūnvā sa śīghraṃ kṣapayettataḥ // GarP_1,147.46 //
analyzed: malam jvara uṣṇa dhātūn vā sa śīghram kṣapayet tatas
sarva ākāram rasa ādīnām śuddhyā asuddhyā api vā kramāt
vāta pitta kaphaiḥ saptada śa dvādaśa vāsarāt

original: prāyo 'nuyāti maryādāṃ mokṣāya ca vadhāya ca /
analyzed: prāyas nuyāti maryādām mokṣāya ca vadhāya ca

original: ityagniveśasya mataṃ hārītasya punaḥ smṛtiḥ // GarP_1,147.48 //
analyzed: iti agniveśasya matam hārītasya punar smṛtiḥ

original: dviguṇā saptamī yā ca navamyekādaśī tathā /
analyzed: dviguṇā saptamī yā ca navamī ekādaśī tathā

original: eṣā tridoṣamaryādā mokṣāya ca vadhāya ca // GarP_1,147.49 //
analyzed: eṣā tridoṣa maryādā mokṣāya ca vadhāya ca
śuddhyā aśuddhyā jvaraḥ kālam dīrgham api atra vartate
kṛśānām vyādhi yuktānām mithyā āhāra ādi sevinām
alpaḥ pi doṣaḥ duṣṭi ādeḥ labdhvā anyatamataḥ balam
sa pratyanīkaḥ viṣamam yasmāt vṛddhi kṣaya anvitaḥ
sa vikṣepaḥ jvaram kuryāt viṣama kṣaya vṛddhi bhāj

original: doṣaḥ pravartate teṣāṃ sve kāle jvarayanbalī // GarP_1,147.52 //
analyzed: doṣaḥ pravartate teṣām sve kāle jvarayan balī
nivartate punar ca eva pratyanīka bala abalaḥ

original: kṣīṇadoṣo jvaraḥ sūkṣmo rasādiṣveva līyate // GarP_1,147.53 //
analyzed: kṣīṇa doṣaḥ jvaraḥ sūkṣmaḥ rasa ādiṣu eva līyate
līna tvāt kārśya vaivarṇya jāḍya ādīnām dadhāti saḥ
āsanna vikṛta āsya tvāt srotasām rasa vāhinām

original: āśu sarvasya vapuṣo vyāptidoṣo na jāyate /
analyzed: āśu sarvasya vapuṣaḥ vyāpti doṣaḥ na jāyate
santaḥ satataḥ tena viparītaḥ viparyayāt
viṣamaḥ viṣama ārambhaḥ kṣapā kālena saṅgavān

original: doṣo raktāśrayaḥ prāyaḥ karoti santataṃ jvaram // GarP_1,147.56 //
analyzed: doṣaḥ rakta āśrayaḥ prāyas karoti santatam jvaram
ahar rātrasya sandhau syāt sakṛt anyedyus āśritaḥ
tasmin māṃsa vahā nāḍī medaḥ nāḍī tṛtīyake
grāhī pitta anilān mūrdhnaḥ trikasya kapha pittataḥ
sa pṛṣṭhasya anila kaphāt sa ca eka aha antaraḥ smṛtaḥ
caturthakaḥ malaiḥ medaḥ majja asthi anyatare sthitaḥ
majjā sthaḥ eva hi aparaḥ prabhāvam anudarśayet
dvidhā kaphoṇi jaṅghābhyām sa pūrvam śirasā anilāt
asthi majjoḥ upagataḥ caturthaka viparyayaḥ
tridhā tri aham jvarayati dinam ekam tu muñcati
balāḥ balena doṣaṇām anya ceṣṭā ādi janmanām
pakrānām aviparyāsāt sapta rātram ca laṅghayet
jvaraḥ syāt manasaḥ tadvat karmaṇaḥ ca tadā tadā
gambhīra dhātu cāri tvāt sannipātena sambhavāt
tulya ucchrayāt ca doṣāṇām duścikitsyaḥ caturthakaḥ
ca
doṣaḥ rakta ādi mārgeṣu śanais alpaḥ cireṇa yat
yāti deham ca na aśeṣam santāpa ādīn karoti atas

original: kramo yatnena vicchinnaḥ satāpo lakṣyate jvaraḥ // GarP_1,147.65 //
analyzed: kramaḥ yatnena vicchinnaḥ sa tāpaḥ lakṣyate jvaraḥ
yathottaram manda gatiḥ manda śaktiḥ yathāyatham
kālena āpnoti sadṛśān sa rasa ādīn tathā tathā
doṣaḥ jvarayati kruddhaḥ cirāt ciratareṇa ca

original: bhūmau sthitaṃ jalaiḥ siktaṃ kālaṃ naiva pratīkṣate /
analyzed: bhūmau sthitam jalaiḥ siktam kālam na eva pratīkṣate

original: aṅkurāya yathā bījaṃ doṣabījaṃ bhavettathā // GarP_1,147.68 //
analyzed: aṅkurāya yathā bījam doṣa bījam bhavet tathā
vegam kṛtvā aviṣam yadvat āśaye nayate balam
kupyati āpta balam bhūyas kāla doṣa viṣam tathā
evam jvarāḥ pravartante viṣamāḥ satata ādayaḥ

original: utkleśo gauravaṃ dainyaṃ bhaṅgo 'ṅgānāṃ vijṛmbhaṇam // GarP_1,147.70 //
analyzed: utkleśaḥ gauravam dainyam bhaṅgaḥ ṅgānām vijṛmbhaṇam
arocakaḥ vamiḥ śvāsaḥ sarvasmin rasa ge jvare
dāha rāga bhrama mada pralāpaḥ rakta saṃśrite
tṛṣ glāniḥ spṛṣṭa varcaskam antar dāhaḥ bhramaḥ tamaḥ
daurgandhyam gātra vikṣepaḥ māṃsa sthe medasi sthite

original: svedo 'titṛṣṇā vamanaṃ daurgandhyaṃ vā sahiṣṇutā // GarP_1,147.73 //
analyzed: titṛṣṇā vamanam daurgandhyam vā sahiṣṇu tā
pralāpaḥ glāniḥ aruciḥ asthi ge tu asthi bhedanam
doṣa pravṛttiḥ udbodhaḥ śvāsa aṃga kṣepa kūjanam

original: antardāho bahiḥ śaityaṃ śvāso hikkā hi majjame /
analyzed: antar dāhaḥ bahis śaityam śvāsaḥ hikkā hi
tamasaḥ darśanam marma chedanam stabdha meḍhra tā
śukra pravṛttau mṛtyuḥ tu jāyate śukra saṃśraye

original: uttarottaraduḥ sādhyāḥ pañcānye tu viparyaye // GarP_1,147.76 //
analyzed: uttara uttara duḥ sādhyāḥ pañca anye tu viparyaye
pralimpan iva gātrāṇi śleṣmaṇā gauraveṇa ca
manda jvara pralāpaḥ tu sa śītaḥ syāt pralepakaḥ
nityam manda jvaraḥ rūkṣaḥ śīta kṛcchreṇa gacchati
stabdha aṅgaḥ śleṣma bhūyiṣṭhaḥ bhavet aṅga bala āśakaḥ
haridrā bheda varṇa ābhaḥ tadvat lepam pramehati

original: sa vai hāridrako nāma jvarabhedo 'ntakaḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,147.79 //
analyzed: sa vai hāridrakaḥ nāma jvara bhedaḥ ntakaḥ smṛtaḥ
kapha vātau samau yatra hīna pittasya dehinaḥ

original: tīkṣṇo 'tha vā divā mando jāyate rātrijo jvaraḥ // GarP_1,147.80 //
analyzed: tīkṣṇaḥ vā divā mandaḥ jāyate rātri jaḥ jvaraḥ
divākara arpita bale vyāyāmāt ca viśoṣite
śarīre niyatam vātāt jvaraḥ syāt paurvarātrikaḥ
āmāśaye yat ātma sthe śleṣma pitte hi adhas sthite

original: tadardhaṃ śītalaṃ dehe hyardhaṃ coṣṇaṃ prajāyate // GarP_1,147.82 //
analyzed: tad ardham śītalam dehe hi ardham ca uṣṇam prajāyate

original: kāye pittaṃ yadā nyastaṃ śleṣmā cānte vyavasthitaḥ /
analyzed: kāye pittam yadā nyastam śleṣmā ca ante vyavasthitaḥ

original: uṣṇatvaṃ tena dehasya śītatvaṃ karapādayoḥ // GarP_1,147.83 //
analyzed: uṣṇa tvam tena dehasya śīta tvam kara pādayoḥ
rasa rakta āśrayaḥ sādhyaḥ māṃsa medaḥ gataḥ ca yaḥ
asthi majjā gataḥ kṛcchraḥ taiḥ taiḥ sva aṅgaiḥ hata prabhaḥ
visaṃjñaḥ sa krodhaḥ iva vīkṣate
sa doṣam uṣṇañca sadā śakṛt muñcati vegavat
dehaḥ laghuḥ vyapagata klama moha tāpaḥ pākaḥ mukhe karaṇa sauṣṭhavam avyatha tvam

original: svedaḥ kṣuvaḥ prakṛtiyogimano 'nnalipsā kaṇḍūśca mūrdhni vigatjvaralakṣaṇāni // GarP_1,147.86 //
analyzed: svedaḥ kṣuvaḥ prakṛti yogi manaḥ nna lipsā kaṇḍūḥ ca mūrdhni vigat jvara lakṣaṇāni

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe jvaranidānādikaṃ nāma saptacatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe jvaranidānādikam nāma saptacatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
dhanvantariḥ uvāca
atha atas raktapittasya nidānam pravadāmi aham
bhṛśa uṣṇa tikta kaṭu amla lavaṇa ādi vidāhibhiḥ
kodrava uddālakaiḥ ca anyaiḥ tad uktaiḥ ati sevitaiḥ

original: kupitaṃ paittikaiḥ pittaṃ dravaṃ raktañca mūrchati // GarP_1,148.2 //
analyzed: kupitam paittikaiḥ pittam dravam raktam ca mūrchati
taiḥ mithas tulya rūpa tvam āgamya vyāpnuvan tanum
pittaraktasya vikṛteḥ saṃsargāt daṣaṇāt api
gandha varṇa anuvṛtteṣu raktena vyapadiśyate
prabhavati asṛjaḥ sthānāt plīhataḥ yakṛtaḥ ca saḥ
śiraḥ guru tvam aruciḥ śīta icchā dhūmakaḥ mlakaḥ

original: chardhitaśchardibai bhatsyaṃ kāsaḥ śvāso bhramaḥ klamaḥ // GarP_1,148.5 //
analyzed: chardhitaḥ chardibai bhatsyam kāsaḥ śvāsaḥ bhramaḥ klamaḥ
lohitaḥ na hitaḥ vijvare
rakta hāridra harita varṇa tā nayana ādiṣu
nīlalohita pītānām varṇānām avivecanam
svapne bhavati asmin bhaviṣyati
urdhvam nāsā akṣi karṇa āsyaiḥ meḍhra yoni gudaiḥ adhas
kupitam romakūpaiḥ ca samastaiḥ tat pravartate
ūrdhvam sādhyam kaphāt yasmāt tat virecana sādhitam

original: bahvauṣadhāni pittasya vireko hi varauṣadham // GarP_1,148.9 //
analyzed: bahu auṣadhāni pittasya virekaḥ hi vara auṣadham

original: anubandhī kapho yatra tatra tasyāpi śuddhikṛt /
analyzed: anubandhī kaphaḥ yatra tatra tasya api śuddhi kṛt

original: kaṣāyāḥ svādavo yasya viśuddhau śleṣmalā hitāḥ // GarP_1,148.10 //
analyzed: kaṣāyāḥ svādavaḥ yasya viśuddhau śleṣmalāḥ hitāḥ
kaṭu tikta kaṣāyāḥ vā ye nisargāt kapha āvahāḥ
adhas na āyuṣmān tad pracchardana sādhakam
alpa auṣadham ca pittasya vamanam

original: anubandhi balaṃ yasya śāntapittanarasya ca // GarP_1,148.12 //
analyzed: anubandhi balam yasya śānta pitta narasya ca
kaṣāyaḥ ca hitaḥ tasya madhurāḥ eva kevalam
kapha māruta saṃspṛṣṭam asādhyam upanāmanam
asahyam pratiloma tvāt asādhyāt auṣadhasya ca

original: na hi saṃśodhanaṃ kiñcidasya ca pratilominaḥ // GarP_1,148.14 //
analyzed: na hi saṃśodhanam kiñcid asya ca pratilominaḥ
śodhanam pratilomam ca raktapitte bhisarjitam
evam eva upaśamanam saṃśodhanam iha iṣyate

original: saṃsṛṣṭeṣu hi doṣeṣu sarvathā chardanaṃ hitam /
analyzed: saṃsṛṣṭeṣu hi doṣeṣu sarvathā chardanam hitam

original: tatra doṣo 'tra gamanaṃ śivāstra iva lakṣyate // GarP_1,148.16 //
analyzed: tatra gamanam śiva astraḥ iva lakṣyate
upadravāḥ ca vikṛtim phalataḥ teṣu sādhitam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe raktapittanidānaṃ nāmāṣṭacatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe raktapittanidānam nāma aṣṭacatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
dhanvantariḥ uvāca

original: āśukārī yataḥ kāsaḥ sa evātaḥ pravakṣyate /
analyzed: āśukārī yatas kāsaḥ saḥ eva atas pravakṣyate
pañca kāsāḥ smṛtāḥ vāta pitta śleṣma kṣata kṣayaiḥ
kṣayāya upekṣitāḥ sarve balinaḥ ca uttarottaram

original: teṣāṃ bhaviṣyatāṃ rūpaṃ kaṇṭhe kaṇḍūrarocakaḥ // GarP_1,149.2 //
analyzed: teṣām bhaviṣyatām rūpam kaṇṭhe kaṇḍūḥ arocakaḥ
śuṣka karṇa āsya kaṇṭha tvam tatra adhas vihitaḥ nilaḥ

original: ūrdhvaṃ pravṛttaḥ prāpyo rastasminkaṇṭhe ca saṃsṛjan // GarP_1,149.3 //
analyzed: ūrdhvam pravṛttaḥ prāpyaḥ raḥ tasmin kaṇṭhe ca saṃsṛjan
śirā srotāṃsi saṃpūrya tatas ṅgāni utkṣipanti ca

original: kṣipannivākṣiṇī kliṣṭasvaraḥ pārśve ca pīḍayan // GarP_1,149.4 //
analyzed: kṣipan iva akṣiṇī kliṣṭa svaraḥ pārśve ca pīḍayan
pravartate sa vakreṇa bhinna kāṃsya upama dhvaniḥ
śūla moha kṣobha svara kṣayān
karoti śuṣka kāsam ca mahā vega rujā svanam

original: soṃgaharṣo kaphaṃ śuṣkaṃ kṛchrānmuktvālpatāṃ vrajet // GarP_1,149.6 //
analyzed: kapham śuṣkam kṛchrāt muktvā alpa tām vrajet
pittāt pīta ākṣika tvam ca tikta āsya tvam jvaraḥ bhramaḥ

original: pittāsṛgvamanaṃ tṛṣṇā vaisvaryaṃ dhūmako madaḥ // GarP_1,149.7 //

analyzed: pratatam kāsa vege ca jyotiṣām iva darśanam
kaphāt uraḥ lpa ruj mūrdhi hṛdayam stimite guru
kaṇṭhe pralepa mada jam pīnasa chardi arocakāḥ
roma harṣaḥ pravartanam
yuddha ādyaiḥ sāhasaiḥ taiḥ taiḥ sevitaiḥ ayathābalam

original: upasyantaḥ kṣato vāyuḥ pittenānugato balī // GarP_1,149.10 //
analyzed: upasyantaḥ kṣataḥ vāyuḥ pittena anugataḥ balī

original: kupitaḥ kurute kāsaṃ kaphaṃ tena saśoṇitam /
analyzed: kupitaḥ kurute kāsam kapham tena sa śoṇitam

original: pītaṃ śyāvañca śuṣkañca grathitaṃ kupitaṃ bahu // GarP_1,149.11 //
analyzed: pītam śyāvam ca śuṣkam ca grathitam kupitam bahu
ṣṭhīvet kaṇṭhena rujatā vibhinnena eva ca urasā
sūcībhiḥ iva tīkṣṇābhiḥ tudyamānena śūlinā
dus kha sparśena śūlena
parva bheda jvara śvāsa tṛṣṇā vaisvarya kampavān
pārāvataḥ iva utkūjan pārśva śūlī ca
kapha ādyaiḥ vamanam pakti bala varṇam ca hīyate
kṣīṇasya sa asṛj mūtra tvam śvāsa pṛṣṭa kaṭi grahaḥ
ṣāyu pradhānāḥ kupitāḥ dhāvataḥ rājayakṣmaṇaḥ
yakṣma āyatane kāsam ṣṭhīvat kapham tatas
pūti pūya upamam vītam miśram harita lohitam

original: supyate tudyata iva hṛdayaṃ pacatīva ca /
analyzed: supyate tudyate iva hṛdayam pacati iva ca
akasmāt uṣṇa śīta icchā bahu āśi tvam bala kṣayaḥ
snigdha prasanna vakra tvam śrīmat darśana netra tā
tatas sya kṣaya rūpāṇi sarvāṇi āvirbhavanti ca
iti eṣa kṣaya jaḥ kāsa kṣīṇānām deha nāśanaḥ

original: yāpyau vā balināṃ tadvatkṣatajo 'pi navau tu tau // GarP_1,149.19 //
analyzed: yāpyau vā balinām navau tu tau
sidhyetām api sāmarthyāt sādhya ādau ca pṛthak kramaḥ

original: miśrā yāpyāśca ye sarve jarasaḥ sthavirasya ca // GarP_1,149.20 //
analyzed: miśrāḥ yāpyāḥ ca ye sarve jarasaḥ sthavirasya ca
kāsa śvāsa kṣaya chardi sva rasāda ādayaḥ gadāḥ
bhavanti upekṣayā yasmāt tasmāt tāḥ tvarayā jayet

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe kāsanidānā nāmaikonapañcāśaduttaraśatatamodhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe nāma ekonapañcāśaduttaraśatatamaḥ adhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
dhanvantariḥ uvāca
atha atas śvāsa rogasya nidānam pravadāmi aham
kāsa vṛddhyā bhavet śvāsaḥ pūrvaiḥ vā doṣa kopanaiḥ
āmātisāra vamathu viṣa pāṇḍu jvaraiḥ api
rajaḥ dhūma anilaiḥ marma ghātāt api hima ambunā
kṣudrakaḥ tamakaḥ chinnaḥ mahān ūrdhvaḥ ca pañcamaḥ
kapha uparuddha gamana pavanaḥ viṣvak āsthitaḥ
prāṇa udaka anna vāhīni duṣṭa srotāṃsi dūṣayan
uraḥ sthaḥ kurute śvāsam āmāśaya samudbhavam
prāgrūpam tasya hṛd pārśva śūlam prāṇa viloma tā
ānāhaḥ śaṅkhabhedaḥ ca tatra āyāsaḥ ti bhojanaiḥ

original: preritaḥ prerayankṣudraṃ svayaṃ sa samalaṃ marut /
analyzed: preritaḥ prerayan kṣudram svayam sa sa malam marut

original: pratilomaṃ śirā gacchedudīrya pavanaḥ kapham // GarP_1,150.6 //
analyzed: pratilomam sirāḥ gacchet udīrya pavanaḥ kapham
parigṛhya śiraḥ grīvam uraḥ pārśve ca pīḍayan
kāsam ghurghurakam moham arucim pīnasam bhṛśam
karoti tīvra vegam ca śvāsam prāṇa upatāpinam
pratāmyet tasya vegena ṣṭhīvana ante kṣaṇam sukhī
kṛcchrāt śayānaḥ śvasiti niṣaṇṇaḥ svāsthyam arhati
ucchrita akṣaḥ lalāṭena svidyatā bhṛśam ārtimān
viśuṣka āsyaḥ muhur śvāsaḥ kāṅkṣati uṣṇam sa vepathuḥ
megha ambu śīta prāc vātaiḥ śleṣmalaiḥ ca vivardhate

original: sa yāpyastamakaḥ sādhyo narasya balino bhavet /
analyzed: sa yāpyaḥ tamakaḥ sādhyaḥ narasya balinaḥ bhavet
jvara mūrchāvataḥ sītā aiḥ na śāmyet prathamaḥ tu saḥ
kāsa śvasita vat śīrṇa marma cheda rujā arditaḥ
sa sveda mūrchaḥ sa ānāhaḥ vasti dāha vibodhavān
adhas dṛṣṭiḥ snihyat rakta eka locanaḥ
śuṣka āsyaḥ pralapan dīnaḥ naṣṭa chāyaḥ vicetanaḥ
dīnaḥ nādena śvasiti
uddhūyamānaḥ saṃrabdhaḥ matta ṛṣabhaḥ iva aniśam
pranaṣṭa jñāna vijñānaḥ vibhrānta nayana ānanaḥ
netre samākṣipan baddha mūtra varcāḥ viśīrṇa vāc
śuṣka kaṇṭhaḥ muhur ca eva ti ruj

original: yo dīrghamucchvasityūrdhvaṃ na ca pratyāharatyadhaḥ // GarP_1,150.16 //
analyzed: yaḥ dīrgham ucchvasiti ūrdhvam na ca pratyāharati adhas
śleṣma āvṛta mukha śrotraḥ kruddha gandhavaha arditaḥ

original: ūrdhvaṃ samīkṣate bhrāntamakṣiṇī paritaḥ kṣipan // GarP_1,150.17 //
analyzed: ūrdhvam samīkṣate bhrāntam akṣiṇī paritas kṣipan
marmasu chidyamāneṣu paridevī niruddha vāc

original: ete sidhyeyuravyaktāḥ vyaktāḥ prāṇaharā dhruvam // GarP_1,150.18 //
analyzed: ete sidhyeyuḥ avyaktāḥ vyaktāḥ prāṇa harāḥ dhruvam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe śvāsanidānā nāma pañcāśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe nāma pañcāśaduttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
dhanvantariḥ uvāca
hikrā roga nidānam ca vakṣye suśruta tat śṛṇu
śvāsa eka hetuḥ prāgrūpam saṃkhyā prakṛti saṃśrayā

original: hikrā bhakṣyodbhavā kṣudrā yamalā mahatīti ca /
analyzed: hikrā bhakṣya udbhavā kṣudrā yamalā mahatī iti ca
gambhīrā ca marut tatra tvarayā ayukti sevitaiḥ
rūkṣa tīkṣṇa khara aśāntaiḥ anna pānaiḥ prapīḍitaḥ

original: karoti hikrāṃ śvasanaḥ mandaśabdāṃ kṣudhānugām // GarP_1,151.3 //
analyzed: karoti hikrām śvasanaḥ manda śabdām kṣudhā anugām

original: samaṃ sandhyānnapānena yā prayāti ca sānnajā /
analyzed: samam sandhyā anna pānena yā prayāti ca sa anna jā

original: āyāsātpavanaḥ kruddhaḥ kṣudrāṃ hikrāṃ pravartayet // GarP_1,151.4 //
analyzed: āyāsāt pavanaḥ kruddhaḥ kṣudrām hikrām pravartayet
jatru mūlāt parisṛtā manda vegavantī hi sā

original: vṛddhimāyāsato yāti bhuktamātre ca mārdabam // GarP_1,151.5 //
analyzed: vṛddhim āyāsataḥ yāti bhukta mātre ca mārdabam
cireṇa yamalaiḥ vegaiḥ yā hikrā saṃpravartate

original: pariṇāmānmukhe vṛddhiṃ pariṇāme ca gacchati // GarP_1,151.6 //
analyzed: pariṇāmāt mukhe vṛddhim pariṇāme ca gacchati

original: kampayantī śiro grīvāṃ yamalāṃ tāṃ vinirdiśet /
analyzed: kampayantī śiraḥ grīvām yamalām tām vinirdiśet
pralāpa chardi atīsāra netra vipluta jṛmbhi tā

original: yamalā veginī hikrā pariṇāmavatī ca sā /
analyzed: yamalā veginī hikrā pariṇāmavatī ca sā
dhvasta bhrū śaṅkha yugmasya śruti vipluta cakṣuṣaḥ

original: stambhayantī tanuṃ vācaṃ smṛtiṃ saṃjñāṃ ca muñcatī /
analyzed: stambhayantī tanum vācam smṛtim saṃjñām ca muñcatī
tudantī mārgamāṇasya kurvatī marma ghaṭṭanam
pṛṣṭhatas namanam mahā ahikrā pravartate
mahā śūlā mahā śabdā mahā vegā mahā balā
pakrāśayāt ca nābheḥ vā pūrvavat sā pravartate
tad rūpā sā mahat kuryāt jṛmbhaṇām ga prasāraṇam

original: gambhīreṇa nidānena gambhīrā tu susādhayet // GarP_1,151.12 //
analyzed: gambhīreṇa nidānena gambhīrā tu susādhayet

original: ādye dve varjayedanye sarvaliṅgāṃ ca veginīm /
analyzed: ādye dve varjayet anye sarva liṅgām ca veginīm
sarvasya saṃcita āmasya sthavirasya vyavāyinaḥ
vyādhibhiḥ kṣīṇa dehasya bhakta cheda kṛśasya ca

original: sarve 'pi rogā nāśāya na tvevaṃ śāghrakāriṇaḥ // GarP_1,151.14 //
analyzed: sarve rogāḥ nāśāya na tu evam śāghrakāriṇaḥ

original: hikrāśvāsau yathā tau hi mṛtyukāle kṛtālayau // GarP_1,151.15 //
analyzed: hikrā śvāsau yathā tau hi mṛtyu kāle kṛta ālayau

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe hikrānidānā nāmaikapañcāśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe nāma ekapañcāśaduttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
dhanvantariḥ uvāca
atha atas yakṣma rogasya nidānam pravadāmi aham
aneka roga anugataḥ bahu roga purogamaḥ
rājayakṣmā kṣayaḥ śoṣaḥ   iti kathyate
nakṣatrāṇām dvijānām ca rājñaḥ bhūt yat ayam purā

original: yacca rājā ca yakṣmā ca rājayakṣmā tato mataḥ /
analyzed: yat ca rājā ca yakṣmā ca rājayakṣmā tatas mataḥ
deha auṣadha kṣaya kṛteḥ kṣayaḥ tad sambhavāt ca saḥ
rasa ādi śoṣaṇāt śoṣaḥ   iti rāja vat
sāhasam vega saṃrodhaḥ śukra ojaḥ sneha saṃkṣayaḥ
anna pāna vidhi tyāgaḥ catvāraḥ tasya hetavaḥ

original: tairudīrṇo 'nilaḥ pittaṃ vyarthaṃ codīrya sarvataḥ // GarP_1,152.5 //
analyzed: taiḥ udīrṇaḥ nilaḥ pittam vyartham ca udīrya sarvatas
tāḥ sirāḥ pratipīḍayan

original: mukhāni srotasāṃ ruddhvā tathaivātivisṛjya vā // GarP_1,152.6 //
analyzed: mukhāni srotasām ruddhvā tathā eva ati visṛjya vā
madhyam ūrdhvam adhas tiryak avyathām sañjanayet hṛdaḥ

original: rūpaṃ bhaviṣyatastasya pratiśyāyo bhṛśaṃ jvaraḥ // GarP_1,152.7 //
analyzed: rūpam bhaviṣyataḥ tasya pratiśyāyaḥ bhṛśam jvaraḥ
prasekaḥ mukha mādhuryam mārdavam vahni de hayoḥ
laulya bhāvaḥ nna pāna ādau śucau aśuci vīkṣaṇam
makṣikā tṛṇa keśa ādi pātaḥ prāyas anna pānayoḥ
hṛllāsaḥ chardiḥ aruciḥ asnāte bala kṣayaḥ
pāda āsya kukṣi akṣṇoḥ ati śukla tā

original: bāhvoḥ pratodo jihvāyāḥ kāye baibhatsyadarśanam // GarP_1,152.10 //
analyzed: bāhvoḥ pratodaḥ jihvāyāḥ kāye baibhatsya darśanam
strī madya māṃsa priya tā ghṛṇi tā mūrdha guṇṭhanam
nakha keśa asthi vṛddhiḥ ca svapne ca abhibhavaḥ bhavet
patanam kṛkalāsa ahi kapi śvāpada pakṣibhiḥ
keśa asthi tuṣa bhasma ādi tarau samadhirohaṇam
śūnyānām grāma deśānām darśanam śuṣyataḥ mbhasaḥ

original: jyotirdivi davāgnīnāṃ jvalatāṃ ca mahīruhām // GarP_1,152.13 //
analyzed: jyotiḥ divi dava agnīnām jvalatām ca mahīruhām
pīnasa śvāsa kāsam ca svara mūrdha rujaḥ ruciḥ
ūrdhva niḥ śvāsa saṃśoṣau adhas chardiḥ ca koṣṭha ge

original: sthite pārśve ca rugbodhe sandhisthe bhavati jvaraḥ /
analyzed: sthite pārśve ca ruj bodhe sandhi sthe bhavati jvaraḥ
rūpāṇi a ekādaśa etāni jāyante rājayakṣmaṇaḥ
teṣām upadravān vidyāt kaṇṭha dhvaṃsa karīḥ rujāḥ
jṛmbhā aṅgamarda niṣṭhīva vahni māndya āsya pūti tā
tatra vātāt śiraḥ pārśva śūlanam sa aṃga mardanam
kaṇṭha rodhaḥ svara bhraṃśaḥ pittāt pāda aṃsa pāṇiṣu
sṛj chardiḥ mukha gandhaḥ jvaraḥ madaḥ
kaphāt arocaka chardi kāsāḥ ga gauravam
prasekaḥ pīnasaḥ śvāsaḥ svarabhedaḥ lpa vahni tā
doṣaiḥ manda anala tvena śotha lepa kapha ulbaṇaiḥ
srotaḥ mukheṣu ruddheṣu dhātuṣu su alpakeṣu ca

original: vidāho manasaḥ sthāne bhavantyanye hyupadravāḥ // GarP_1,152.20 //
analyzed: vidāhaḥ manasaḥ sthāne bhavanti anye hi upadravāḥ
pacyate koṣṭhe eva annam amla yuktaiḥ rasaiḥ yutam
prāyas sya kṣaya bhāgānām na eva annam ca aṅga puṣṭaye

original: raso hyasya na raktāya māṃsāya kurute tu tat /
analyzed: rasaḥ hi asya na raktāya māṃsāya kurute tu tat

original: upaṣṭabdhaḥ samantācca kevalaṃ vartate kṣayī // GarP_1,152.22 //
analyzed: upaṣṭabdhaḥ samantāt ca kevalam vartate kṣayī
liṅgeṣu alpeṣu ati kṣīṇam vyādhau ṣaṣ karaṇa kṣayam
varjayet sādhayet eva sarveṣu api tatas nyathā
doṣaiḥ vyastaiḥ samastaiḥ ca kṣayāt sarvasya medasaḥ

original: svarabhedo bhavettasya kṣāmo rūkṣaścalaḥ svaraḥ // GarP_1,152.24 //
analyzed: svarabhedaḥ bhavet tasya kṣāmaḥ rūkṣaḥ calaḥ svaraḥ
śuka varṇa ābha kaṇṭha tvam snigdha uṣṇa upaśamaḥ nilāt

original: pittāttālugale dāhaḥ śoṣo bhavati santatam // GarP_1,152.25 //
analyzed: pittāt tālu gale dāhaḥ śoṣaḥ bhavati santatam
limpan iva kaphaiḥ kaṇṭham mukham ghuraghurāyate

original: svayaṃ viruddhaiḥ sarvaistu sarvāliṅgaiḥ kṣayo bhavet // GarP_1,152.26 //
analyzed: svayam viruddhaiḥ sarvaiḥ tu kṣayaḥ bhavet
dhūmāyati iva ca atyartham udeti śleṣma lakṣaṇam
kṛcchra sādhyāḥ kṣayāḥ ca atra sarvaiḥ alpam ca varjayet

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe yakṣmanidānā nāma dvipañcāśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe nāma dvipañcāśaduttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
dhanvantariḥ udāca
arocaka nidā ante vakṣye ham suśruta adhunā
arocakaḥ bhavet doṣaiḥ jihvā hṛdaya saṃśrayaiḥ
sannipātena manasaḥ santāpena ca pañcamaḥ
kaṣāya tikta madhuram vāta ādiṣu mukham kramāt
sarvam vīta rasam śoka krodha ādiṣu yathā manaḥ
chardi doṣaiḥ pṛthak sarvaiḥ duṣṭaiḥ anyaiḥ ca pañcamaḥ
udānaḥ dhi kṛtān doṣān sarvam sandhi arham asyati
āśu lāvaṇya praseka arucayaḥ kramāt
nābhi pṛṣṭham rujati āśu pārśve ca āhāram utkṣipet
tatas phenilam vamet
śabda udgara yutaḥ kṛcchram anu kṛcchreṇa vegavat
kāsa āsya śoṣakam vātāt svara pīḍā samanvitam
pittāt kṣāra udaka nibham dhūmram harita pītakam
sa asṛj amlam kaṭu tiktam tṛṣ mūrchā dāha pākavat
kaphāt snigdham ghanam pītam śleṣmataḥ tu sa mākṣikam

original: madhuraṃ lavaṇaṃ bhūri prasaktaṃ lomaharṣaṇam // GarP_1,153.8 //
analyzed: madhuram lavaṇam bhūri prasaktam loma harṣaṇam
makha śvayathu mādhurya tandrā hṛllāsa kāsavān
sarvaiḥ liṅgaiḥ samāpannaḥ tyājyaḥ bhavati sarvathā
sarvam yasya ca vidviṣṭam darśana śravaṇa ādibhiḥ
vāta ādinā eva saṃkruddha kṛmi duṣṭa anna je gade
śūla vepatu hṛllāsaḥ viśeṣāt kṛmi je bhavet

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe 'rocakanidānā nāma tripañcāśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe nāma tripañcāśaduttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
dhanvantariḥ uvāca
hṛd roga ādi nidānam te vakṣye ham suśruta adhunā

original: kṛmihṛdrogaliṅgaiśca smṛtāḥ pañca tu hṛdgatāḥ // GarP_1,154.1 //
analyzed: kṛmi hṛd roga liṅgaiḥ ca smṛtāḥ pañca tu hṛd gatāḥ
vātena śūnyātā atyartham bhujyate rorudīti ca

original: bhidyate śuṣyate stabdhaṃ hṛdayaṃ śūnyatā bhramaḥ // GarP_1,154.2 //
analyzed: bhidyate śuṣyate stabdham hṛdayam śūnya tā bhramaḥ
akasmāt dīna tā śokaḥ bhayam śabde sa aiṣṇu tā
vepathuḥ vepanāt mohaḥ śvāsa rodhaḥ lpanidra tā
pittāt tṛṣṇā śramaḥ dāhaḥ svedaḥ mla kapha jaḥ kramaḥ
chardanam hi amla pittasya dhūma kalpitakaḥ jvaraḥ
śleṣmaṇā hṛdayam stabdham bhārikam sa aśma garbha vat
kāsa asthi sāda niṣṭhīva nidrā ālasya aruci jvarāḥ
hṛd roge hi kṛmibhiḥ śyāva netra tā

original: tamaḥ praveśo hṛllāsaḥ śothaḥ kaṇḍūḥ kaphastrutiḥ // GarP_1,154.6 //
analyzed: tamaḥ praveśaḥ hṛllāsaḥ śothaḥ kaṇḍūḥ kaphaḥ trutiḥ
hṛdayam satatam ca atra krakacena iva dīryate
raṃ
ghoram tat śīghram śīghra māriṇam
vātāt pittāt kaphāt tṛṣṇā sannipātāt bala kṣayaḥ

original: ṣaṣṭhī syādupasargācca vātapitte ca kāraṇam // GarP_1,154.8 //
analyzed: ṣaṣṭhī syāt upasargāt ca vāta pitte ca kāraṇam
sarveṣu tad prakopaḥ hi samyak dhātu praśoṣaṇāt
jihvā mūla gala kloma tālu toya vahāḥ sirāḥ

original: saṃśoṣya tṛṣṇā jāyante tāsāṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇam // GarP_1,154.10 //
analyzed: saṃśoṣya tṛṣṇāḥ jāyante tāsām sāmānya lakṣaṇam
mukha śoṣaḥ jala atṛptiḥ anna dveṣaḥ svara kṣayaḥ
kaṇṭha uṣṭha tālu kārkaśyāt jihvā niṣkramaṇe klamaḥ
pralāpaḥ citta vibhraṃśaḥ hi udgara āḍhyaḥ tathā āmayaḥ
mārutāt kṣāma tā dainyam śaṅkha bhe
daḥ śiraubhramaḥ
gandha ajñāna āsya vairasya śruti nidrā bala kṣayāḥ
śīta amla phena vṛddhiḥ ca pittāt mūrchā āsya tikta tā
rakta īkṣaṇa tvam satatam śoṣaḥ dāhaḥ ti dhūmakaḥ
kaphaḥ rasāḥ dvi kupitaḥ toya vāhiṣu mārutaḥ
srotaḥ tu sa kapham tena paṅka vat śoṣyate tatas
śūkaiḥ iva ācitaḥ kaṇṭhaḥ nidrā madhura vakra tā
ādhmānam śirasaḥ jāḍyam staimitya chardi arocakam
ālasyam avipākam ca yaḥ sa syāt sarva lakṣaṇaḥ
āma udbhavāt ca raktasya saṃrodhāt vāta pitta tā
uṣṇa ākrāntasya sahasā śīta ambhaḥ bhajataḥ tṛṣā
uṣṇāt ūrdhvam gataḥ koṣṭham kuryāt vai pitta jā evasā

original: yā ca pānātipānotthā tīkṣṇāgre snehapākajā // GarP_1,154.18 //
analyzed: yā ca pāna atipāna utthā tīkṣṇa agre sneha pāka jā
snigdha kaṭu amla lavaṇa bhojanena kapha udbhavā
tṛṣṇā rasa kṣaya uktena lakṣaṇena kṣaya ātmikā
śoṣa moha jvara ādi anya dīrgha roga upasargataḥ

original: yā tṛṣṇā jāyate tīvrā sopasargātmikā smṛtā // GarP_1,154.20 //
analyzed: yā tṛṣṇā jāyate tīvrā sa upasarga ātmikā smṛtā

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe āmlapittanidānā nāma catuḥ pañcāśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe nāma catuḥ pañcāśaduttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
dhanvantariḥ uvāca
vakṣye madātyaya ādeḥ ca nidānam muni bhāṣitam
tīkṣṇa amla rūkṣa sūkṣma amla vyavāya asukaram laghu
vikāśi viśadam madyam medasaḥ smāt viparyayaḥ
tīkṣṇa udayāḥ ca divi uktāḥ citta upaplavinaḥ guṇāḥ
jīvita antāḥ prajāyante viṣeṇa utkarṣa vartinā
tīkṣṇa ādibhiḥ guṇaiḥ madyam guṇān
daśabhiḥ guṇaiḥ saṃkṣomyam cetaḥ nayati ca akriyam
ādye made dvitīye pi prama mo
dāyatane sthitaḥ
durvikalpa hataḥ mūḍhaḥ sukham iti abhimucyate

original: madhyamottamayoḥ sandhiṃ prāpya rājāsano madaḥ // GarP_1,155.5 //
analyzed: madhyama uttamayoḥ sandhim prāpya rāja āsanaḥ madaḥ
niraṅkuśaḥ iva vyālaḥ na kiñcid na ācaret tatas
iyam bhūmiḥ avācyānām dauḥ śīlasya idam āspadam
ekaḥ yam bahu mārgāyāḥ
teḥ darśakaḥ param

original: niśceṣṭaḥ sannavākśete tṛtīye 'tra made sthitaḥ // GarP_1,155.7 //
analyzed: niśceṣṭaḥ san avāk śete tṛtīye made sthitaḥ
maraṇāt api pāpa ātmā gataḥ pāpatarām daśām

original: dharmādharmaṃ sukhaṃ duḥ khaṃ mānānarthaṃ hitāhitam // GarP_1,155.8 //
analyzed: dharma adharmam sukham duḥ kham māna anartham hita ahitam
na veda śīka moha ārtam śoṣa ka
moha ādi saṃyutaḥ
sa unmāda bhrama mūrchāyām sa apasmāraḥ patati adhas
na ati mādyanti balinaḥ kṛta āhārāḥ mahā aśanāḥ
vātāt pittāt kaphāt sarvaiḥ bhavet rogaḥ madātyayaḥ
sāmānya lakṣaṇam teṣām pramohaḥ hṛdaya vyathā

original: vibhedaṃ prasabhaṃ tṛṣṇā saumyo glānirjvaro 'ruciḥ // GarP_1,155.11 //
analyzed: vibhedam prasabham tṛṣṇā saumyaḥ glāniḥ jvaraḥ ruciḥ
puras vibandhaḥ timiram kāsaḥ śvāsaḥ prajāgaraḥ
svedaḥ timātram viṣṭambhaḥ śvayathuḥ citta vibhramaḥ
svapnena iva abhibhavati na ca uktaḥ ca sa bhāṣateḥ

original: pittāddāhajvaraḥ svedo moho nityaṃ ca vibhramaḥ // GarP_1,155.13 //
analyzed: pittāt dāha jvaraḥ svedaḥ mohaḥ nityam ca vibhramaḥ
śleṣmaṇaḥ chardiḥ hṛllāsaḥ nidrā ca udara gauravam

original: sarvaje sarvaliṅgatvaṃ jñātvā madyaṃ pibettu yaḥ // GarP_1,155.14 //
analyzed: sarvaje sarva liṅga tvam jñātvā madyam pibet tu yaḥ
sahasā ruciram ca anyatara dhvaṃsaka śoṣiṇau
bhavetām mārutāt kaṣṭāt bhavet tasya viśeṣataḥ
dhvaṃsaka śleṣma niṣṭhivāḥ kaṇṭha śoṣaḥ tinidra tā
śabda asaha tvam tad citta vikṣepaḥ ṅge hi vāta ruj
hṛd kaṇṭha rogaḥ saṃmohaḥ śvāsa tṛṣṇā vami jvarāḥ
nivartet yaḥ tu madyebhyaḥ jita ātmā buddhi pūrva kṛt

original: vikāraiḥ kliśyate jātu na sa śarīramānasaḥ /
analyzed: vikāraiḥ kliśyate jātu na sa śarīra mānasaḥ
syuḥ trayaḥ gadāḥ
mada mūrchā apa saṃnyāsāḥ yathottara bala udbhavāḥ
doṣaiḥ sarvaiḥ tu rakta madya viṣaiḥ api
śakti ānantyāt gata ābhāsaḥ calaḥ chalita veṣṭitaḥ
rūkṣa śyāma aruṇa tanuḥ madye vāta udbhave bhavet
pittena krodhanaḥ rakta pīta ābhaḥ kalaha priyaḥ
svapne sambaddha vākya ādiḥ kaphāt dhyāna paraḥ hi saḥ
sarva uttha sannipātena rakta stambha aṅga dūṣaṇam
pitta liṅga tvam ādyena vikṛta īhā svara ajña tā
ca sarvebhyaḥ bhyadhikam śramaḥ
lakṣayet lakṣaṇa utkarṣāt vāta ādīn śoṇita ādiṣu
aruṇam nīla kṛṣṇam vā sampraviśyan viśet tamaḥ
śīghram ca pratibudhyeta hṛd pīḍā vepathuḥ bhramaḥ

original: kāsaḥ śyāvāruṇā cchāyā mūrchāyāṃ mārutātmakaḥ // GarP_1,155.25 //
analyzed: kāsaḥ śyāva aruṇā chāyā mūrchāyām māruta ātmakaḥ

original: pittena raktaṃ pītaṃ vā nabhaḥ paśyanviśettamaḥ /
analyzed: pittena raktam pītam vā nabhaḥ paśyan viśet tamaḥ
vibudhyeta ca sa svedaḥ dāha tṛṣṇā upapīḍitaḥ
bhinna vat pīta nīla ābhaḥ rakta nīla ākula īkṣaṇaḥ
kaphena megha saṃkāśam paśyati ākāśam āviśet
tamaḥ cirāt ca budhye hṛd uraḥ su prasekavān
gurubhiḥ timitaiḥ rai
raṅge rāja dharma avabandhān vat
sarva ākṛtiḥ tribhiḥ deṣaiḥ apasmāraḥ iva aparaḥ
pātayati āśu niśceṣṭam vinā bībhatsa ceṣṭitaiḥ
doṣaiḥ tu mada mūrchāyām kṛta vegeṣu dehinām
svayam eva upaśāmyanti saṃnyāsena auṣadhaiḥ
vāc deha manasām ceṣṭām ākṣipya ati balābalāḥ
sa sanyāsam nipatitāḥ prāṇa āghātana saṃśrayāḥ
bhavanti tena puruṣāḥ kāṣṭha bhūtāḥ mṛta upamāḥ

original: mriyeta śīghraṃ śīghraṃ ceccikitsā na prayujyate // GarP_1,155.32 //
analyzed: mriyeta śīghram śīghram ced cikitsā na prayujyate
agādhe grāha bahule salila oghe iva arṇave
saṃnyāse vinimajjantam naram āśu nivartayet
mada māna roṣa toṣa pravṛttibhiḥ itas tatas

original: yuktāyuktaṃ ca samaṃ yuktiṃ yuṅkte na madyena // GarP_1,155.34 //
analyzed: yukta a yuktam ca samam yuktim yuṅkte na madyena
bala kāsa deśa pātram prakṛti saha tām athavā vayāṃsi
pravibhajjyāt tanu rūpam pibati tatas pibati amṛta

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe madātyayādinidānaṃ nāma pañcapañcāśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe madātyayādinidānam nāma pañcapañcāśaduttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
dhanvantariḥ uvāca

original: athārśasāṃ nidānaṃ ca vyākhyāsyami ca suśruta / /
analyzed: atha arśasām nidānam ca vyākhyāsyami ca suśruta

original: sarvadā prāṇināṃ māṃse kīlakāḥ prabhavanti ye // GarP_1,156.1 //
analyzed: sarvadā prāṇinām māṃse kīlakāḥ prabhavanti ye
arśāṃsi tasmāt ucyante guda mārga nirodhanāt
doṣaḥ tvac māṃsa medāṃsi san dūṣya vividha ākṛtīn
māṃsa aṃkurān apāna ādau kurvanti arśāṃsi tān jaguḥ
saha janma antara utthena bhedaḥ dvedhā samāsatas
śuṣka agra avāvi bhedāḥ ca guda sthāna anusaṃśrayāḥ
ardha pañca aṅguliḥ tasmin tisraḥ ghi ardha aṅguli sthitāḥ
bālya pravāhiṇī tāsām antra madhye visarjinī
bāhyā saṃvaraṇe tasyāḥ guda ādau bahis aṅgule
sārdha aṅgula pramāṇena romāṇi atra tatas param

original: tatra hetuḥ sahotthānāṃ bālye bījopataptatā // GarP_1,156.6 //
analyzed: tatra hetuḥ sahotthānām bālye bīja upatapta tā

original: devatānāṃ prakope hi sānnipātasya cānyataḥ // GarP_1,156.7 //
analyzed: devatānām prakope hi sānnipātasya ca anyatas
asādhyāḥ evam ākhyātāḥ sarve rogāḥ kula udbhavāḥ
sahajāni viśeṣeṇa rūkṣa durdarśanāni tu
antar mukhāni pāṇḍūni dāruṇa upadravāṇi ca
yojyāni ca pṛthā ud doṣa saṃsarga nicayāt svatas
śuṣkāṇi vāta śleṣmabhyām ārdrāṇi tu asya pittataḥ
doṣa prakopa hetuḥ tu prāc ukta ivastra sādini
agnau male tinicite punar ca ayam ti
vyavāyataḥ
pāna saṃkṣobha viṣama kaṭhina kṣudraka aśanāt
vasti netra gala oṣṭha uttha tala bheda ādi ghaṭṭanāt
bhṛśa śīta ambu saṃsparśa pratata ati pravāhaṇāt
gata mūtra śakṛt vega dhāraṇāt tad udīraṇāt
jugupsā atīsāram eva grahaṇī sā u pi upadravaḥ
karṣaṇāt viṣama ādeḥ ca ceṣṭābhyaḥ yoṣitām punar
āmagarbha prapatanāt garbha vṛddhi prapīḍanāt
īdṛśaiḥ ca aparaiḥ vāyuḥ apānaḥ kupitaḥ male
pāyoḥ valīṣu pūrṇa mūrtiṣu
tat pūrvam lakṣaṇam vahni manda tā
viṣṭambhaḥ sa asthi sadanam piṇḍi ṣṭa
kā udveṣṭanam bhramaḥ
śothaḥ vā grahaḥ

original: mārutaḥ purato mūḍhaḥ prāyo nābheradhaścaran // GarP_1,156.17 //
analyzed: mārutaḥ puratas mūḍhaḥ prāyas nābheḥ adhas caran
sa raktaḥ parikṛntan ca kṛcchrāt ākuñcati śvasan
antra kūjanam āṭopaḥ kṣārita udgāra bhūri tā
prabhūta mūtram alpā viṣ aśraddhā dhūmra koṣṭhakaḥ
śiraḥ pṛṣṭha urasām śūlam ālasyam bhinna varcasam

original: indriyārtheṣu laulyaṃ ca krodho duḥ khopacārataḥ /
analyzed: indriya artheṣu laulyam ca krodhaḥ duḥ kha upacārataḥ

original: āśaṅkā grahaṇī śothaḥ pāṇḍugulmodareṣu ca // GarP_1,156.20 //
analyzed: āśaṅkā grahaṇī śothaḥ pāṇḍu gulmodareṣu ca
etāni eva vivardhante jāteṣu ahata nāmasu
nivartamānaḥ mānaḥ hi taiḥ adhas mārga rodhataḥ
kṣobhayet anilān anyān sarva indriya śarīgān
tathā mūtra śakṛt pitta kaphān vāyuḥ ca śoṣayan
muṣṇāti agnim tatas sarve bhavanti prāyaśas ūrśasaḥ

original: kṛśo bhṛśaṃ hatotsāho dīnaḥ kṣāmo 'tha niṣprabhaḥ // GarP_1,156.23 //
analyzed: kṛśaḥ bhṛśam hata utsāhaḥ dīnaḥ niṣprabhaḥ
asārī vigata chāyaḥ jantu dagdhaḥ iva druma
kṛcchraiḥ ugra dravaiḥ grastaḥ yakṣma uktaiḥ marma pīḍanaiḥ
tathā kāśa pipāsā āsya vairasya śvāsa pīnasaiḥ
klama aṅga bhaṅga vamathu kṣavathu śvayathu jvaraiḥ
klaibya bādhirya staimitya śarkarā paripīḍitaḥ
kṣāmaḥ bhinna svaraḥ dhyāyan muhur ṣṭhīvan arocakī
sarva parva asthi hṛd nābhī pāyu vaṅkṣaṇa śūlavān
gudena astravatā pittam balākā udara sannibham
viśuṣkam ca eva mukta agram pakva āmam ca antara antaram
pāṇḍu pittam haridrā aktam picchilam ca upaveśyate
gudāṅkurāḥ bahu anilāḥ śuṣkāḥ cimacima anvitāḥ
pīna aṅgāra aruṇāḥ stabdhāḥ viṣamāḥ paruṣa ākarāḥ
mithas vakrāḥ tīkṣṇāḥ
śimbī kharjṛra karkandhū kārpāsa phala sannibhāḥ
kecid kadamba puṣpa ābhāḥ kecid siddhārthaka upamāḥ
śiraḥ pārśva aṃsa jaṅghā ūru vaṅkṣaṇa ādi adhika vyathāḥ
kṣavathu udgāra viṣṭambha hṛd gaha arocaka pradāḥ
kāsa śvāsa agni vaiṣamya karṇa nāda bhrama āvahāḥ
taiḥ ārtaḥ grathitam stokam sa śabdam sa pravāhikam
ruj phena picchā anugatam vibaddham upaveśyate
kṛṣṇa tvac baddha viṣ mūtra netra vaktraḥ ca jāyate
gulma plīhodara aṣṭhīlā saṃbhavaḥ tasya ca eva hi
pitta uttarāḥ nīla mukhāḥ rakta pīta asita prabhāḥ
tanu agra strāviṇaḥ viśrāḥ tanavaḥ mṛdavaḥ ślathāḥ
śuka jihvāḥ yakṛt khaṇḍa jalaukā vaktra sannibhāḥ
ka jvara sveda tṛṣ mūrchā ruci moha dāḥ
sa ūṣmāṇaḥ drava nīla uṣṇa pīta rakta āma varcasaḥ
yava madhyāḥ harit pīta hāridra tvac nakha ādayaḥ
śleṣma ulbaṇāḥ mahā mūlāḥ ghanāḥ manda rujaḥ sitāḥ
utsanna upacita snigdha stabdha vṛtta guru sthirāḥ
picchilāḥ stimitāḥ ślakṣṇāḥ kaṇḍva āḍhyāḥ sparśana priyāḥ
karīra panasa asthi ābhāḥ tathā gostana sannibhāḥ
vaṅkṣaṇa ānāhinaḥ puyubasti nābhi vikartanāḥ
sakāśa śvāsa hṛllāsa praseka aruci pīnasāḥ
maha kṛcchra śiraḥ jāḍya śiśira kṣāra kāriṇaḥ
vasā ābha sa kapha prājya purīṣa asṛj pravāhikāḥ

original: na stravanti na bhidyante pāṇḍusnigdhatvagādayaḥ // GarP_1,156.42 //
analyzed: na stravanti na bhidyante pāṇḍu snigdha tvac ādayaḥ
saṃsṛṣṭa liṅgat saṃsarga nicayāt sarva lakṣaṇāḥ
rakta ulbaṇāḥ gude kīlāḥ pīta ākṛti samanvitāḥ
vaṭa praseha sadṛśāḥ guñjā vidruma sannibhāḥ
te tyartham duṣṭam uṣṇam ca gāḍha viṣṭaṃbha pīḍitāḥ
stravanti sahasā raktam tasya ca atipravṛttitaḥ

original: kekābhaḥ pīḍyate duḥ khaiḥ śoṇitakṣayasambhavaiḥ // GarP_1,156.45 //
analyzed: kekā ābhaḥ pīḍyate duḥ khaiḥ śoṇita kṣaya sambhavaiḥ
hīna varṇa bala utsāhaḥ hata ojāḥ kaluṣa indriyaḥ
mudga kodrava jaṃbīra karīra caṇaka ādibhiḥ
rūkṣaiḥ saṃgrāhibhiḥ vāyuḥ viṣ sthāne kupitaḥ balī
adhas vahāni srotāṃsi saṃrudhya adhas praśoṣayan
purīṣam kurvīta dāruṇam

original: tena tīvrā rujā koṣṭhapṛṣṭhahṛtpārśvagā bhavet // GarP_1,156.48 //
analyzed: tena tīvrā rujā koṣṭha pṛṣṭha hṛd pārśva gā bhavet
ādhmānam udare viṣṭhā hṛllāsa parikartane

original: bastau ca sutarāṃ śūlo gaṇḍaśvayathusaṃbhavaḥ // GarP_1,156.49 //
analyzed: vastau ca sutarām śūlaḥ gaṇḍa śvayathu saṃbhavaḥ
pavanasya ūrdhva gāmi tvāt tatas chardi aruci jvarāḥ
hṛd roga grahaṇī doṣa mūtra saṃga pravāhikāḥ
bādhirya ati śiraḥ śvāsa śiraḥ ruj kāśa pīnasāḥ
manaḥ vikāraḥ tṛṣ śvāsa pitta gulmodara ādayaḥ

original: ete ca vātajā rogā jāyante bhṛśadāruṇāḥ /
analyzed: ete ca vāta jāḥ rogāḥ jāyante bhṛśa dāruṇāḥ
durnāma amṛtyu udāvarta paramaḥ yam upadravaḥ
vāta abhibhūta koṣṭhānām taiḥ vinā api vijāyate

original: sahajāni tu doṣāṇi yāni cābhyantare valau // GarP_1,156.53 //
analyzed: sahajāni tu doṣāṇi yāni ca abhyantare valau
sthitāni tāni asādhyāni yāpyante gni bala ādibhiḥ

original: dvandvajāni dvitīyāyāṃ valā yānyāśritāni ca // GarP_1,156.54 //
analyzed: dvandva jāni dvitīyāyām valāḥ yāni āśritāni ca
kṛcchra sādhyāni tāni āhuḥ parisaṃvatsarāṇi ca

original: bāhyāyāṃ tu valau jātānyekadoṣolbaṇāni ca // GarP_1,156.55 //
analyzed: bāhyāyām tu valau jātāni eka doṣa ulbaṇāni ca
arśāṃsi sukha sādhyāni na cira utpattikāni ca

original: meḍhrādiṣvapi vakṣyante yathāsvaṃ nābhijāni tu // GarP_1,156.56 //
analyzed: meḍhra ādiṣu api vakṣyante yathāsvam nābhi jāni tu
gaṇḍūpadasya rūpāṇi picchilāni mṛdūni ca

original: vyāno gṛhītvā śleṣmāṇaṃ karotyarśastvaco bahiḥ // GarP_1,156.57 //
analyzed: vyānaḥ gṛhītvā śleṣmāṇam karoti arśaḥ tvacaḥ bahis
kīla upamam sthira kharam carmakīlam ca tat viduḥ
vātena todaḥ pāruṣyam pittāt asita vaktra tā
śleṣmaṇaḥ snigdha tā tasya grathita tvam savarṇa tā
arśasām praśame yatnam āśu kurvīta buddhimān
tāni āśu hi gadandhā kāḥ
kuryuḥ baddha guda udaram

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍer'śonidānā nāma ṣaṭpañcāśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍerśonidānā nāma ṣaṭpañcāśaduttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
dhanvantariḥ uvāca
atīsāra grahaṇyoḥ ca nidānam vacmi suśruta
doṣaiḥ vyastaiḥ samastaiḥ ca bhayāt śokāt ca ṣaḍvidhaḥ
atīsāraḥ sa sutarām jāyate
viśuṣka anna vasā sneha tila piṣṭa virūḍhakaiḥ
madya rūkṣa atimātra ādi rasa atisneha vibhramāt
kṛmi ghoṣa virodhāt ca tad vidheḥ kupita anilaḥ
vistraṃsayati adhovātam hatvā tena eva ca analam
vyāpārya anna śakṛt koṣṭha purīṣa drava tā ādayaḥ
prakalpate tīsārasya lakṣaṇam tasya bhāvinaḥ
bhedaḥ hṛd guda koṣṭheṣu gātra svedaḥ mala grahaḥ
ādhmānam avipākaḥ ca tatra vātena vijvaram
alpa alpam śabda śūnya āḍhyam viru ba
ddham upaveśyate

original: rūkṣaṃ saphenamacchaṃ ca gṛhītaṃ va muhurmuhuḥ /
analyzed: rūkṣam sa phenam accham ca gṛhītam muhur muhur
tathā a dagdha gadā ābhāsam picchilam parikartayan
sa śuṣka bhraṣṭa pāyuḥ ca hṛṣṭa romā viniśvasan
pittena pītam aśitam hāridram śādvala prabham
sa raktam ati durgandham tṛṣ mūrchā sveda dāhavān
sa śūla pāyu santāpa pākavān śleṣmaṇā ghanam
picchilam tatra anusāram alpa alpam sa pravāhikam
sa roma harpaḥ se kleśaḥ guru vasti guda udaraḥ
kṛte pi akṛta saṅgaḥ ca sarva ātmā sarva lakṣaṇaḥ

original: bhayena kṣubhite citte śāyite drāvayetsa (ccha) kṛt // GarP_1,157.11 //
analyzed: bhayena kṣubhite citte śāyite drāvayet sa ccha kṛt
vāyuḥ tatas nivāryeta kṣipram uṣṇam dravam plavam
vāta pitte samam liṅgam āhuḥ tadvat ca śokataḥ
atīsāraḥ samāsena dvedhā sāmaḥ nirāmakaḥ
sa asṛj jātam gauravāt apsu muñcati
śakṛt durgandham āṭopa viṣṭambha ārti prasekinaḥ
viparītaḥ nirāmaḥ tu kaphāt kaḥ pi na majjati

original: atīsāreṣu yo nāti yatnavān grahaṇīgadaḥ // GarP_1,157.14 //
analyzed: atīsāreṣu yaḥ na ati yatnavān grahaṇī gadaḥ
tasya syāt agni nirvāṇa kāryaiḥ atyartha sañcitaiḥ

original: sāmaṃ śakṛnnirāmaṃ vā jīrṇaṃ yenātisāryate // GarP_1,157.15 //
analyzed: sāmam śakṛt nirāmam vā jīrṇam yena atisāryate
saḥ tisāraḥ tisaraṇāḥ dāśukārīḥ svabhāvataḥ

original: sāmaṃśīrṇamajīrṇena jīrṇe pakvaṃ tu naiva ca // GarP_1,157.16 //
analyzed: sāmaṃśīrṇam ajīrṇena jīrṇe pakvam tu nā eva ca
cira kṛt grahaṇī doṣaḥ sañcayān ca upaveśayet
akasmāt vāra survedham akasmāt sandhinī muhur

original: sa caturdhā pṛthagdoṣaiḥ sannipātācca jāyate // GarP_1,157.17 //
analyzed: sa caturdhā pṛthak doṣaiḥ sannipātāt ca jāyate
prāgrūpa aṅgasya sadanam cirāt pavana alpakaḥ
prasekaḥ vaktra vairasyam aruciḥ tṛṣ śramaḥ bhramaḥ
chardiḥ karṇake pyanukūjakam

original: sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ kārśyaṃ vamaka stamako jvaraḥ // GarP_1,157.19 //
analyzed: sāmānya lakṣaṇam kārśyam vamakaḥ stamakaḥ jvaraḥ
mūrchā śira ūru viṣṭambhaḥ śvayathuḥ kara pādayoḥ
tandrā anilāt tāluśoṣaḥ timiram karṇayoḥ svanaḥ
pārśva ūru vaṅkṣaṇa grīvā rujā tīkṣṇa viṣūcikā
rugṇeṣu vṛddhiḥ sarvaṣu kṣudh tṛṣṇā parihartrikā
jīrṇe jīryati ca ādhmānam bhukte svāsthyam samaśnute
vātāt hṛd roga gulma arśaḥ plīha pāṇḍura śaṅkitāḥ

original: cirādduḥ khaṃ dravaṃ śuṣkaṃ tundāraṃ śabdaphenavat /
analyzed: kham dravam śuṣkam śabda phenavat
punar punar sṛjet varcam pāyuḥ ucchvāsa kāsavān
pītena pīta nīla ābham pīta ābham sṛjati dravam
śleṣmaṇā pacyate duḥkhe manaḥ chardiḥ arocakaḥ
āsya upadāha niṣṭhīva kāsa hṛllāsa pīnasāḥ
hṛdayam manyate styānam udaram stimitam guru
udgāraḥ duṣṭa madhuraḥ sadanam sa praharṣaṇam
pravartacam
akṛśasya api daurbalyam sarvaje sarva darśanam
vibhāge ṅgasya ye proktā pipāsā ādyāḥ trayaḥ malāḥ
te pi asya grahaṇīdoṣāḥ samanteṣu asti kāraṇam
vāta vyādhi aśmarī kuṣṭha meha udara bhagandaram
arśāṃsi grahaṇī iti aṣṭau mahārogāḥ su dustarāḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍetisāranidāna nāma saptañcāśaduttaraśatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍa itisāranidāna nāma saptañcāśaduttaraśatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
dhanvantariḥ uvāca
atha atas mūtraghātasya nidānam śṛṇu suśruta
vasti vasti śiraḥ meḍhra kaṭī vṛṣaṇa pāyu ca
eka saṃvahanāḥ proktāḥ guda asthi vivara āśrayāḥ
adhas mukhaḥ vastiḥ hi mūtra vāhi sirā mukhaiḥ
pārśvebhyaḥ pūryate ślakṣṇaiḥ sūkṣmaiḥ
syandamānaiḥ anāratam
taiḥ taiḥ eva praviśya evam doṣān kuvanti viṃśatim
mūtrāghātaḥ pramehaḥ ca kṛcchrāt marma samāśrayet
vasti vaṅkṣaṇa meḍhra ārti yukta ulpa alpam muhur muhur
raktam vā kapha jaḥ vasti meḍhra gaurava śothavān

original: sapicchaṃ saniruddhaṃ ca sarvaiḥ sarvātmakaṃ malaiḥ /
analyzed: sa piccham sa niruddham ca sarvaiḥ sarva ātmakam malaiḥ
yadā vāyuḥ mukham basteḥ vyāvartya pāriśoṣayan

original: mūtraṃ sapittaṃ sakaphaṃ saśukraṃ vā tadā kramāt /
analyzed: mūtram sa pittam sa kapham sa śukram vā tadā kramāt

original: saṃjāyate 'śmarī ghorā pittaṃ goriva rocanā // GarP_1,158.7 //
analyzed: saṃjāyate śmarī ghorā pittam goḥ iva rocanā
śleṣma āśrayā ca sarvā syāt atha asyāḥ pūrvalakṣaṇam
vasti ādhmānam tad āsanna deśaḥ hi paritas ti ruj
vastau ca mūtra saṅgi tvam mūtrakṛcchram jvaraḥ ruciḥ
sāmānya liṅgam ruj nābhi sīvanī vasti mūrdhasu
mūtram syāt tathā mārga nirodhane

original: baddhaṃ baddhvā sukhaṃ mehedacchaṃ gomedakopamam // GarP_1,158.10 //
analyzed: baddham baddhvā sukham mehet accham gomedaka upamam
tad saṃkṣobhāt bhavet sa asṛk māṃsam adhvani ruj bhavet
tatra bātā abhisṛtya ārta udantān khādati vepate
gṛhṇāti mehanam nābhim pīḍayati ati lakṣaṇam
sa anilam muñcati śakṛt muhur mehati binduśaḥ
śyāma rūkṣā aśmarī ca asya syāt citā kaṇṭakaiḥ iva

original: pittena dahyate bastiḥ pacyamāna ivoṣṇavān // GarP_1,158.13 //
analyzed: pittena dahyate vastiḥ pacyamānaḥ iva uṣṇavān
bhallātaka asthi saṃsthānā raktā pītā sitā aśmarā

original: bastirnistudyata iva śleṣmaṇā śītalo guruḥ // GarP_1,158.14 //
analyzed: vastiḥ nistudyate iva śleṣmaṇā śītalaḥ guruḥ

original: aśmarī mahatī ślakṣṇā madhuvarṇātha vā sitā /
analyzed: aśmarī mahatī ślakṣṇā madhu varṇā atha vā sitā

original: etā bhavanti bālanāṃ teṣāmeva ca bhūyasām // GarP_1,158.15 //
analyzed: etāḥ bhavanti teṣām eva ca bhūyasām
āśaya upacaya alpa tvāt gahaṇa āharaṇe sukhī

original: sukrāśmarī tu mahatī jāyate śukradhāraṇāt // GarP_1,158.16 //
analyzed: sukra aśmarī tu mahatī jāyate śukra dhāraṇāt
sthāna cyutam abhuktam vā aṇḍayoḥ antare nilaḥ
śoṣayati upasaṃgṛhya śukram tat śukram aśmarī
vasti ruj kṛcchra mūtra tvam śuklā śvayathu kāriṇī
tasyām utpanna mātrāyām śuṣkam etya vilīyate
pīḍite jvara kāse smin aśmarī eva ca śarkarā

original: asau vā vāyunā bhinnā sā tvasminnamulomage // GarP_1,158.19 //
analyzed: asau vā vāyunā bhinnā sā tu asmin amuloma ge
nireti saha mūtreṇa pratilome vipacyate
mūtra saṃdhāraṇam kuryāt kruddhaḥ vasteḥ mukhe marut
mūtrasaṅgam rujam kaṇḍūm kadācid ca su vāmataḥ
pracchādya vastim uddhṛtya sthūla viplutām
karoti tatra ruj dāham spandana udveṣṭanāni ca

original: binduśaśca pravarteta mūtraṃ bastau tu pīḍite // GarP_1,158.22 //
analyzed: binduśaḥ ca pravarteta mūtram vastau tu pīḍite
dhārā avarodhaḥ ca api eṣa vātavastiḥ iti smṛtaḥ
dustaraḥ dustarataraḥ dvitīyaḥ prabalaḥ nilaḥ
śakṛt mārgasya vasteḥ ca vāyuḥ antaram āśritaḥ
aṣṭhīlā ābham ghanam granthim karoti a ca ba
lam unnatam
vātāṣṭhīlā iti sa ātmānam sarga kṛt
viguṇaḥ kuṇḍalībhūtaḥ vastau tīvra vyathā unilaḥ
ābadhya mūtram bhramati saṃstambha udveṣṭa gauravam
mūtram alpa alpam athavā vimuñcati sakṛt sakṛt
vātakuṇḍalikā iti eva mūtram tu vidhṛte ciram

original: na nireti niruddhaṃ vā mūtrātītaṃ tadalparuk // GarP_1,158.27 //
analyzed: na nireti niruddham vā mūtrātītam tat alpa ruj
vidhāraṇāt pratihatam vātāt āvartitam yadā
nābheḥ adhastāt udaram mūtram āpūrayet tadā
kuryāt tīvra ruj ādhmānam aśaktim mala saṃgraham
tat mūtram jāṭhara chidra vaiguṇyena anilena vā

original: ākṣiptamalpamūtrasya vastau nābhau ca vā male /
analyzed: ākṣiptam alpa mūtrasya vastau nābhau ca vā male
sthitvā plavet śanais paścāt sa rujam vā athavā arujam
mūtra utsargam sa vicchinnam tat śreyaḥ guru śephasoḥ

original: antarvasti mukhe tṛṣṇā sthirālpaṃ sahasā bhavet // GarP_1,158.31 //
analyzed: antar vasti mukhe tṛṣṇā sthira alpam sahasā bhavet
aśmarī tulya ruj granthiḥ mūtragranthiḥ saḥ ucyate

original: mūtritasya striyaṃ yāto vāyunā śukramuddhṛtam // GarP_1,158.32 //
analyzed: mūtritasya striyam yātaḥ vāyunā śukram uddhṛtam
sthānāt cyutam mūtrayataḥ prāk paścāt vā pravartate
bhasma udaka pratīkāśam mūtraśukram tat ucyate
rūkṣa durbalayoḥ vātena udāvartam śakṛt yadā
mūtra srotaḥ nu paryeti saṃsṛṣṭam śakṛtā tadā
mūtra bindum tulya gandham syāt vighātam tam ādiśet
pitta vyāyāma tīkṣṇa amla bhojana ādhmānaka ādibhiḥ
pravṛddha vāyunā mūtre vasti sthe ca eva dāha kṛt

original: mūtraṃ vartayate pūrvaṃ saraktaṃ raktameva vā // GarP_1,158.36 //
analyzed: mūtram vartayate pūrvam sa raktam raktam eva vā

original: uṣṇaṃ punaḥ punaḥ kṛcchrāduṣṇavātaṃ vadanti tam /
analyzed: uṣṇam punar punar kṛcchrāt uṣṇavātam vadanti tam
rūkṣasya klānta dehasya vasti sthau pitta mārutau
mūtrakṣayam sa ruj dāham janayetām tad āhvayam

original: pittaṃ kapho dvādapi vā saṃhanyetenilenacet // GarP_1,158.38 //
analyzed: pittam kaphaḥ dvāt api vā saṃhanyeta inilena ced

original: kṛcchrānmūtraṃ tadā pītaṃ raktaṃ śvetaṃ ghanaṃ sṛjet /
analyzed: kṛcchrāt mūtram tadā pītam raktam śvetam ghanam sṛjet
sa dāham rocanā śaṅkha cūrṇa varṇam bhavet ca tat
śuṣkam samasta varṇam vā mūtrasādam vadanti tam

original: iti vistārataḥ proktā rogā mūtrapravartitāḥ // GarP_1,158.40 //
analyzed: iti vistārataḥ proktāḥ rogāḥ mūtra pravartitāḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe mūtrāghātamūtrākṛcchanidāna nāmāṣṭapañcāśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe mūtrāghātamūtrākṛcchanidāna nāma aṣṭapañcāśaduttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
dhanvanvariḥ uvāca
pramehāṇām nidāna ante vakṣye haṃ śṛṇu suśruta

original: pramehā viṃśatistatra śleṣmaṇo daśa pittataḥ // GarP_1,159.1 //
analyzed: pramehāḥ viṃśatiḥ tatra śleṣmaṇaḥ daśa pittataḥ
ṣaṭcatvāraḥ nilāt te ca medaḥ matra kapha āvahāḥ
vistram māñjiṣṭham eha ica mañjiṣṭhā salila upamam
vistram uṣṇam sa lavaṇam rakta ābha raktamehataḥ
vasāmehī vasā miśram vasā ābham mūtrayet muhur

original: majjābhaṃ majjamiśraṃ vā majjamehī muhurmuhuḥ // GarP_1,159.4 //
analyzed: majja ābham majja miśram vā majjamehī muhur muhur
hastī mattaḥ iva ajastram mūtram vega vivarjitam

original: salasīkaṃ vivaddhaṃ ca hastimehī pramehati // GarP_1,159.5 //
analyzed: sa lasīkam vivaddham ca hastimehī pramehati

original: madhumehī madhusamaṃ jāyate sa kila dvidhā /
analyzed: madhumehī madhu samam jāyate sa kila dvidhā
kruddhe dhātu kṣayāt vāyau doṣa āvṛta pathe yadā
āvṛtaḥ doṣa liṅgāni saḥ nimittam pradarśayet
kṣaṇāt kṣīṇaḥ kṣaṇāt pūrṇaḥ bhajate kṛcchra sāghya tām
kālena upekṣitaḥ sarvaḥ hi āyāti madhumeha tām

original: madhuraṃ yacca meheṣu prāyo madhviva mehati // GarP_1,159.8 //
analyzed: madhuram yat ca meheṣu prāyas madhu iva mehati
sarve te madhumeha ākhyāḥ mādhuryāt ca tanoḥ yatas
avipākaḥ ruciḥ chardiḥ nidrā kāsaḥ sa pīnasaḥ
upadravāḥ prajāyante mehānām kapha janmanām
vasti mehanayoḥ todaḥ umuṣka avadaraṇam jvaraḥ
dāhaḥ tṛṣṇā amlikā mūrchā viḍbhedaḥ pitta janmanām
vāta jānām udāvartaḥ kampa hṛd gaha lolatāḥ
śūlam unnidrā tā śoṣaḥ śvāsaḥ kāsaḥ ca jāyate
vidradhiḥ ca iti piḍikāḥ prameha upekṣayā daśa
annasya kapha saṃśleṣāt prāyaḥ tatra pravartanam
svādu amla lavaṇa snigdha guru picchila śītam
navam dhānyam surā sūpa māṃsa ikṣu guḍa gorasam
eka sthāna āsanavati śayanam vinivartanam
vastim āśritya kurute pramehāt dūṣitaḥ kaphaḥ
dūṣayitvā vapuḥ kledam sveda medaḥ vasā āmiṣam
pittam raktam ati kṣīṇe kapha ādau mūtra saṃśrayam
dhātum vastim upānīya tat kṣayet ca eva mārutaḥ
sādhya asādhya pratīti ādyāḥ mehāḥ tena eva tad bhavāḥ
