original: same samakṛtā doṣe paramatvāttathāpi ca // GarP_1,159.18 //
analyzed: same sama kṛtāḥ doṣe parama tvāt tathā api ca
sāmānya lakṣaṇam teṣām prabhūta āvila mūtra tā
doṣa dūṣyāḥ viśeṣe tad saṃyoga viśeṣataḥ
mūtra varṇa ādi bhedena bhedaḥ meheṣu kalpyate
accham bahu sitam śītam nirgandham udaka upamam
mehati udakamehena kiñcid āvila picchilam
ikṣoḥ rasam iva atyartham madhuram ca ikṣumehataḥ
sāndrī bhavet paryuṣitam sāndramehena mehati
surāmehī surā tulyam upari accham adhas ghanam
sa hṛṣṭa romā piṣṭena piṣṭa bat bahulam sitam

original: śukrābhaṃ śukramiśraṃ vā śukramehī pramehati // GarP_1,159.23 //
analyzed: śukra ābham śukra miśram vā śukramehī pramehati
mūtrayet sikatāmehī sikatā rūpiṇaḥ malān
śītamehī su bahuśas madhuram bhṛśa śītalam
śanais śanais śanairmehī mandam mandam pramehati
lālā tantu yutam mūtram lālāmehena picchilam
gandha varṇa rasa sparśeḥ kṣāreṇa kṣāra toya vat
sandhi marmasu jāyante māṃsaleṣu ca dhāmasu
anta unnatā akleda su rujā anvitā
śarāva māna saṃsthānā piḍikā syāt śarāvikā

original: sadāhā kūrmasaṃsthānā jñeyā kacchapikā budhaiḥ // GarP_1,159.28 //
analyzed: sa dāhā kūrma saṃsthānā jñeyā kacchapikā budhaiḥ

original: mahatī piḍikā nīlā vinatā nāma sā smṛtā /
analyzed: mahatī piḍikā nīlā vinatā nāma sā smṛtā
dahati tvacam utthāne jvālinī kaṣṭa dāyinī

original: raktā sitā sphoṭacitā dāruṇā tvalajī bhavet /
analyzed: raktā sitā sphoṭa citā dāruṇā tu alajī bhavet

original: masūrākṛti saṃsthānā vijñeyā tu masūrikā // GarP_1,159.30 //
analyzed: masūrī ākṛti saṃsthānā vijñeyā tu masūrikā
sarṣapa upama saṃsthānā jihvā pāka mahā rujā

original: putriṇī mahatī cālpā susūkṣmā piḍikā smṛtā // GarP_1,159.31 //
analyzed: putriṇī mahatī ca alpā su sūkṣmā piḍikā smṛtā
vidārī kanda vat vṛttā kaṭhinā ca vidārikā

original: vidradherlakṣaṇairyuktā jñeyā vidradhikā tu sā // GarP_1,159.32 //
analyzed: vidradheḥ lakṣaṇaiḥ yuktā jñeyā vidradhikā tu sā

original: putriṇī ca vidārī ca duḥ sahā bahumedasaḥ /
analyzed: putriṇī ca vidārī ca duḥ sahā bahu medasaḥ
sadyas pitta ulbaṇāḥ tu anyāḥ sambhavanti alpa medasaḥ
piḍikāḥ tāḥ bhaveyuḥ syāt doṣa udrekaḥ yathāyatham
prameheṇa vinā api etāḥ jāyante duṣṭa medasaḥ
tāvat ca na upalakṣyante yāvat varṇam ca varjitam
hāridram rakta varṇam vā meha prāgrūpa varjitam
yaḥ mūtrayeta raktapittam tu tat viduḥ
svedaḥ ṅga ga andhaḥ śithila tvam aṅge śyyā aśana svapna sukha abhiṣaṅgaḥ
hṛd netra jihvā śravaṇa upadāhāḥ ghana ugra tā keśa nakha abhivṛddhiḥ
śīta priya tvam gala tālu śoṣaḥ mādhurya mā āsye kara pāda dāhaḥ

original: bhaviṣyato mehagaṇasya rūpaṃ mūtre 'pi dhāvanti pipīlikāśca // GarP_1,159.37 //
analyzed: bhaviṣyataḥ meha gaṇasya rūpam mūtre dhāvanti pipīlikāḥ ca

original: tṛṣṇā pramehe madhuraṃ prapicchaṃ madhvāmaye syādvividhovikāraḥ /
analyzed: tṛṣṇā pramehe madhuram prapiccham madhu āmaye syāt vividhaḥ vikāraḥ

original: sampūraṇādvā kaphasambhavaḥ syātkṣīṇeṣu doṣeṣvanilātmako vā // GarP_1,159.38 //
analyzed: sampūraṇāt vā kapha sambhavaḥ syāt kṣīṇeṣu doṣeṣu anila ātmakaḥ vā

original: sampūrṇarūpāḥ kaphapittamehāḥ krameṇa ye vai ratisambhavāśca /
analyzed: sampūrṇa rūpāḥ kapha pitta mehāḥ krameṇa ye vai rati sambhavāḥ ca

original: sakrāmate pittakṛtāstu yāpyāḥ sādhyo 'sti meho yadi nāsti diṣṭam // GarP_1,159.39 //
analyzed: pitta kṛtāḥ tu yāpyāḥ sādhyaḥ sti mehaḥ yadi nā asti diṣṭam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe pramehanidāna nāmaikonaṣaṣṭyuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe pramehanidāna nāma ekonaṣaṣṭyuttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
dhanvantariḥ uvāca
nidānam vidradheḥ vakṣye gulmasya śṛṇu śuśruta
bhuktaiḥ paryuṣita ati uṣṇa śuṣka rūkṣa vidāhibhiḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
dhanvantariḥ uvāca
nidānam vidradheḥ vakṣye gulmasya śṛṇu śuśruta
bhuktaiḥ paryuṣita ati uṣṇa śuṣka rūkṣa vidāhibhiḥ
jihma śayyā viceṣṭābhiḥ taiḥ taiḥ ca asṛj pradūṣaṇaiḥ
duṣṭa sa tvak māṃsa medaḥ sthi mada amṛṣṭa udara āśrayaḥ
yaḥ śothaḥ bahis antar ca mahā śūlaḥ mahā rujaḥ

original: vṛttaḥ syādāyato yo vā smṛto rogaḥ sa vidradhiḥ // GarP_1,160.3 //
analyzed: vṛttaḥ syāt āyataḥ yaḥ vā smṛtaḥ rogaḥ sa vidradhiḥ
doṣaiḥ pṛthak samuditaiḥ śoṇitena ca

original: vahate tatra tatrāṅge dāruṇe grathito 'strutaḥ // GarP_1,160.4 //
analyzed: vahate tatra tatra aṅge dāruṇe
antarā dāruṇaḥ ca eva gambhīraḥ gulma vardhanaḥ
valmīka vat samutstrāvī hi agnimāndyam ca jāyate
nābhi vasti yakṛt plīha kloma hṛd kukṣi vaṅkṣaṇi
hṛdaye vepamāne tu tatra tatra ati tīvra ruj
śyāma aruṇa sirā utthāna pākaḥ viṣama saṃsthitiḥ
saṃjñā cheda bhrama ānāha syanda sarpaṇa śabdavān
rakta tāmra asitaḥ pittāt tṛṣ moha jvara dāhavān
kṣipta utthāna prapākaḥ ca pāṇḍuḥ kaṇḍū yutaḥ kaphāt
saṃkleśa śītaka stambha jṛmbhā arocaka gauravāḥ
cira utthānaḥ vipākaḥ ca saṃkīrṇaḥ sannipāta jaḥ
sāmarthyāt ca atra viḍbhedaḥ bāhya abhyantara lakṣaṇam
kṛṣṇa sphoṭa āvṛta śyāmaḥ tīvra dāha rujā jvaraḥ
bāhye strīṇām eva tathā antaram
śastra ādyaiḥ abhighāta uttha raktaiḥ ca roga kāraṇam

original: kṣatottho vāyunā kṣiptaḥ sa raktaḥ pittamīrayan /
analyzed: kṣata utthaḥ vāyunā kṣiptaḥ sa raktaḥ pittam īrayan
pitta asṛj lakṣaṇam kuryāt vidradhim bhūri upadravam
tena upadrava bhedaḥ ca smṛtaḥ dhiṣṭhāna bhedataḥ

original: nābhau hi dhmātaṃ cedbastau mūtrakṛcchrañcajāyate // GarP_1,160.13 //
analyzed: nābhau hi dhmātam ced vastau mūtrakṛcchram ca jāyate
śvāsa praśvāsa rodhaḥ ca param
gala rodhaḥ ca klomni syāt sarva aṅga prarujāḥ hṛdi
pramohaḥ tamakaḥ kāsau hṛdaya uddhaṭṭanam tathā

original: kukṣipārśvāntare caiva kukṣau doṣopajanma ca // GarP_1,160.15 //
analyzed: kukṣi pārśva antare ca eva kukṣau doṣa upajanma ca
tathā ced ūru sandhau ca vaṅkṣaṇe kaṭi pṛṣṭhayoḥ

original: pārśvayośca vyathā pāyau pavanasya nirodhanam // GarP_1,160.16 //
analyzed: pārśvayoḥ ca vyathā pāyau pavanasya nirodhanam
āma pakva vidagdha tvam teṣām śotha vat ādiśet
nābheḥ ūrdhva mukhāt pakvāt pradravanti apare gudāt
vidyāt doṣa kleda ucca vidradhau
kurute sva adhiṣṭhānasya vivartam sannipāta jaḥ
pakvaḥ hi nābhi vasti sthaḥ bhinnaḥ ntar bahis eva vā
pākaḥ ca antar pravṛddhasya kṣīṇasya upadrava arditaḥ
vidradhiḥ ca bhavet tatra pāpānām pāpa yoṣitām

original: mṛte tu garbhage caiva sambhavecchvayatharghanaḥ // GarP_1,160.20 //
analyzed: mṛte tu garbha ge ca eva sambhavet śvayathaḥ ghanaḥ
stane duḥkham vā bāhya vidradhi lakṣaṇam
nārīṇām sūkṣma rakta tvāt kanyāyām tu na jāyate
kruddhaḥ ruddha gatiḥ vāyuḥ saḥ
muṣka vaṅkṣaṇataḥ prāpya phalakoṣa ati vāhinīm
āpīḍya dhamanī vṛddhim karoti phalakoṣayoḥ

original: doṣo medaḥsu tatrāste savṛddhiḥ saptadhā gadaḥ // GarP_1,160.23 //
analyzed: doṣaḥ medaḥsu tatra āste sa vṛddhiḥ saptadhā gadaḥ
mūtra antayoḥ api anilāt bāhye vā abhyantare tathā

original: vātapūrṇaḥ kharasparśo rūkṣo vātācca dāhakṛt // GarP_1,160.24 //
analyzed: vāta pūrṇaḥ khara sparśaḥ rūkṣaḥ vātāt ca dāha kṛt
pakva udumbara saṅkāśaḥ pittāt dāha ūṣma pākavān
kaphāt tīvraḥ guruḥ snigdhaḥ kaṇḍūmān kaṭhinaḥ lpa ruj
kṛṣṇaḥ sphoṭa āvṛtaḥ vṛddhi liṅgaḥ ca raktataḥ
kapha vat medasām vṛddhiḥ mṛdutāla phala upamaḥ
mūtra dhāraṇa śīlasya mūtra jaḥ tatra gacchataḥ
alobhaḥ pūrṇa dhṛtimān kṣobham yāti saran mṛdu
mūtrakṛcchram adhastāt ca valayaḥ phalakoṣayoḥ
śīta toya avagāhanaiḥ
viṣ mūtra dhāraṇāt ca eva viṣama aṅga viceṣṭanaiḥ
kṣobhitaiḥ kṣobhita ojāḥ ca kṣīṇa antar dehinaḥ yadā
pavanaḥ viguṇībhūya śoṇitam tat adhas nayet
kuryāt tad kṣaṇa sandhi sthaḥ granthi ābhaḥ śvayathuḥ tadā
upekṣyamāṇasya ca gulma vṛddhim ādhmāna ruj vai vividhāḥ ca rogāḥ

original: supīḍito 'ntaḥ svanavān prayāti pradhmāpayanneti punaśca mūrdhni // GarP_1,160.31 //
analyzed: su pīḍitaḥ ntar svanavān prayāti pradhmāpayan eti punar ca mūrdhni
rakta vṛddhiḥ asādhye yam vāta vṛddhi sama ākṛtiḥ
rūkṣa kṛṣṇa aruṇa sirāḥ ūrṇā āvṛta gavākṣa vat
vātaḥ ṣṭadhā saṃspṛṣṭaiḥ nicayam gataḥ

original: ārtavasya ca doṣeṇa nārīṇāṃ jāyate 'ṣṭamaḥ // GarP_1,160.33 //
analyzed: ārtavasya ca doṣeṇa nārīṇām jāyate ṣṭamaḥ
jvara mūrchā atisāraiḥ ca vamana ādyaiḥ ca karmabhiḥ
karśitaḥ balavān yāti śīta ārtaḥ ca bubhukṣitaḥ
yaḥ pibati anna pānāni laṅghana plāvana ādikam
sevate hīna saṃjñābhiḥ arditaḥ samudīrayan
sneha svedau an abhyasya śoṣaṇam vā niṣevayet

original: śuddho vā suddhihānirvā bhajeta spandanāni vā // GarP_1,160.36 //
analyzed: śuddhaḥ vā suddhi hāniḥ vā bhajeta spandanāni vā
vāta ulbaṇāḥ tasya malāḥ pṛthak ca eva hi te
sarvaḥ rakta yutaḥ vātāt deha snotaḥ anusāriṇaḥ
ūrdhva adhas mārgam āvṛtya vāyuḥ śūlam karoti vai
sparśa upalabhyam gulma uttham uṣṇam granthi svarūpiṇam
karṣaṇāt kapha viṣ ghātaiḥ mārgasya āvaraṇena vā
vāyuḥ kṛta āśrayaḥ koṣṭhe raukṣyāt kāṭhinyam āgataḥ
svatantraḥ sva āśraye duṣṭaḥ paratantraḥ para āśraye

original: tataḥ piṇḍakavacchleṣmā malasaṃsṛṣṭa eva ca // GarP_1,160.40 //
analyzed: tatas piṇḍaka vat śleṣmā mala saṃsṛṣṭaḥ eva ca
gulamaḥ iti ucyate vasti nābhi hṛd pārśva saṃśrayaḥ
vāta janye śiraḥ śūla jvara plīha antra kūjanam

original: vedhaḥ sūcyeva viḍbhraṃśaḥ kṛcchre mūtraṃ pravartate /
analyzed: vedhaḥ sūcyā iva viṣ bhraṃśaḥ kṛcchre mūtram pravartate

original: gātre mukhe pade śothaḥ hyagnimāndyaṃ tathaiva ca // GarP_1,160.42 //
analyzed: gātre mukhe pade śothaḥ hi agnimāndyam tathā eva ca
rūkṣa kṛṣṇa tvac ādi tvam cala tvāt anilasya ca
anirūpita saṃsthānaḥ vividhān janayet vyathām
pipīlikā vyāptaḥ iva gulmaḥ sphurati nudyate
pittāt dāha amlakau mūrchā viḍbhedaḥ sveda tṛṣ jvarāḥ
sarva gātreṣu gulmāt śothasya darśanam

original: hīyate dīpyate śleṣmā svasthānaṃ dahatīvaca // GarP_1,160.45 //
analyzed: hīyate dīpyate śleṣmā sva sthānam dahati iva ca
kaphāt staimityam aruciḥ sadanam śirasi jvaraḥ
pīnasa ālasya hṛllāsau śukla kṛṣṇa tvac ādi tā
gulmaḥ gabhīraḥ kaṭhinaḥ guruḥ garbha stha bāla vat
sva sthāna sthāḥ adhāvantaḥ tatas eva atra mārakāḥ
prāyas tu yat tat dvandva utthāḥ gulmāḥ saṃsṛṣṭa maithunāḥ
sarvajaḥ tīvra ruj dāhaḥ śīghra pākī ghana unnataḥ
saḥ sādhyaḥ raktagulmaḥ tu striyāḥ eva prajāyate

original: ṛtau yā caiva śūlārtā yati vā yonirogiṇī // GarP_1,160.49 //
analyzed: ṛtau yā ca eva śūla ārtā yati vā yoni rogiṇī
sevate vā anilān ca strī kruddhaḥ tasyāḥ samīraṇaḥ
nirudhya ati ārtavam yonyām pratimāsam vyavasthitam
karoti tad garbhe liṅgam āviṣkaroti ca
hṛllāsa dauhṛda stanya darśanam kāma cāri tā
krameṇa vāyoḥ saṃsargāt pittam yoniṣu sañcayam
raktasya kurute tasyāḥ vāta pitta ukta gulma jān
garbhāśaye ca sutarām śūlān ca eva asṛj āśraye
yoni strāvaḥ ca daurgandhyam bhūyas syandana vedane
kadāpi garbha vat gulmaḥ sarve te rati sambhavāḥ

original: pākañcireṇa bhajate naidhate vidradhiḥ punaḥ // GarP_1,160.54 //
analyzed: pākañcireṇa bhajate na edhate vidradhiḥ punar
pacyate śīghram atyartham duṣṭa rakta āśrayaḥ tu saḥ
atas śīghram vidāhitvā advadradhiḥ saḥ bhīdhīyate
gulma antāra śraye basti dāhaḥ ca plīha vedanā
agni varṇa bala bhraṃśaḥ vegānām vā pravartanam
atas viparyaye bāhya koṣṭha aṅgeṣu ca na ati ruj
vaivarṇyam atha vā kāsaḥ bahis unnata tā adhikam
sa āṭopam ati ugra rujam ādhmānam udare bhṛśam
ūrdhva adhas vāta rodhena tam ānāham pracakṣate
granthilaḥ ṣṭhīlā tu samunnatā
pakva śaya udbhavaḥ pi evam vāyuḥ tīvra rujā āśrayāt
udgāra bāhulya purīṣa bandha tṛpti akṣama tva antra vikūjanāni
āca upama ādhmānam apakti śaktiḥ āsanna gulmasya bhavet ca cihnam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vidradhigulmanidāna nāma ṣaṣṭyuttaraśatatamodhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe vidradhigulmanidāna nāma ṣaṣṭyuttaraśatatamaḥ adhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
dhanvantariḥ uvāca
udarāṇām nidānañca vakṣye suśruta tat śṛṇu

original: rogāḥ sarve 'pi mandāgnau sutarāmudarāṇi tu // GarP_1,161.1 //
analyzed: rogāḥ sarve manda agnau sutarām udarāṇi tu
anīrṇa āmayāḥ ca api anye jāyante mala saṃcayāt
ūrdhva adhas vāyavaḥ ruddhvā
prāṇān apānān saṃdūṣya kuryuḥ tān māṃsa sandhi gān

original: ādhmāpya kukṣimudaramaṣṭadhā te ca bhedataḥ // GarP_1,161.3 //
analyzed: ādhmāpya kukṣim udaram aṣṭadhā te ca bhedataḥ
pṛthak doṣaiḥ samastauḥ ca
tena ārtāḥ śuṣka tālu oṣṭhāḥ sarva pāda kara udarāḥ
naṣṭa ceṣṭa bala āhārāḥ kukṣayaḥ

original: puruṣāḥ syuḥ pretarūpā bhāvinastasya lakṣaṇam // GarP_1,161.5 //
analyzed: puruṣāḥ syuḥ preta rūpāḥ bhāvinaḥ tasya lakṣaṇam
kṣudh nāśaḥ ruci vat sarvam sa vidāham ca pacyate

original: jīrṇānnaṃ yo na jānāti so 'pathyaṃ sevatenaraḥ // GarP_1,161.6 //
analyzed: jīrṇa annam yaḥ na jānāti saḥ u pathyam sevate naraḥ
kṣīyate balam aṅgasya śvasiti alpaḥ viceṣṭitaḥ
viṣaya āvṛtti buddhiḥ ca śoka śoṣa ādayaḥ api ca
ruj vasti sandhau satatam laghu alpa bhojanaiḥ api
jarā jīrṇaḥ bala bhraṃśaḥ bhavet jaṭhara rogiṇaḥ
dāhaḥ śvayathuḥ ādhmānam antre salila sambhave

original: sarvatra toye maraṇaṃ śocanaṃ tatra niṣphalam /
analyzed: sarvatra toye maraṇam śocanam tatra niṣphalam
gavākṣa vat sirā jālaiḥ udaram guḍguḍāyate
nābhi mantraḥ ca viṣṭabhya vegam kṛtvā praṇaśyati
mārute hṛd kaṭī nābhi pāyu vaṅkṣaṇa vedanāḥ
sa śabdaḥ niḥ saret vāyuḥ vahate mūtram alpakam

original: nātimātraṃ bhavellaulyaṃ narasya virasaṃ mukham // GarP_1,161.12 //
analyzed: na atimātram bhavet laulyam narasya virasam mukham
tatra vāta udare śothaḥ pāṇi pād mukha kukṣiṣu
kurkṣi pārśva udara kaṭī pṛṣṭha ruj parva bhadanam
śuṣka kāsa aṅgamarda adhas guru tā mala saṃgrahaḥ
śyāma aruṇa tvac ādi tvam mukhe ca rasa vat hitā
sa toda bhedam udaram nīla kṛṣṇa sirā tatam

original: ādhmātamudare śabdamadbhutaṃ vā karoti saḥ // GarP_1,161.15 //
analyzed: ādhmātam udare śabdam adbhutam vā karoti saḥ
vāyuḥ ca atra sa ruj śabdam vidhatte sarvathā gatim

original: pittodare jvaro mūrchā dāhitvaṃ kaṭukāsyatā // GarP_1,161.16 //

analyzed: bhrama utisāraḥ pīta tvam tvac ādau udaram harit
sa svedam soṣma dahyate
dhūmāyate mṛdu sparśam kṣaipra pākam pradūyate
śleṣma udareṣu sadanam sveda śvayathu gauravam
nidrā kleśaḥ ruciḥ śvāsaḥ kāśaḥ śukla tvac ādi tā
udaram timiram snigdham śukla kṛṣṇa sirā vṛtam
nīra ati vṛddhau kaṭhinam śīta sparśam guru sthiram
tridoṣa kopane taiḥ taiḥ tridoṣa jīnaiḥ etaiḥ malaiḥ
sarva dūṣaṇa duṣṭāḥ ca sa raktāḥ sañcitāḥ malāḥ
koṣṭham prāpya vikurvāṇāḥ śoṣa mūrchā bhrama anvitam
kuryuḥ tri liṅgam udaram śīghra pākam su dāruṇam
vardhate tat ca sutarām śīta vāta pradarśane
ati aśanāt ca saṃkṣobhāt yāna pāna ādi ceṣṭhitaiḥ
avihitaiḥ ca pāna ādyaiḥ vamana vyādhi karṣaṇaiḥ
vāma pārśva āsthitaḥ plīhā vivardhate
śoṇitāt vā rasa ādibhyaḥ vivṛddhaḥ janayet vyathām
ca ati kaṭhinaḥ pronnataḥ kūrma pṛṣṭha vat
krameṇa vardhamānaḥ ca kukṣau vyātatim āharet
śvāsa kāsa pipāsā āsya vairasya ādhmānaka jvaraiḥ
pāṇḍu tva mūrchā chardi tvac dāha mohaiḥ ca saṃyutaḥ
aruṇa ābham vicitra ābham nīla hāridra rājitam
udāvartena ca ānāha moha tṛṣ dgahana jvaraiḥ
gaurava aruci kāṭhinyaiḥ vighāta bhrama saṃkramāt
plīha vat dakṣiṇāt pārśvāt kuryāt yakṛt api cyutam

original: pakve bhūte yakṛti ca sadā baddhamalo gude /
analyzed: pakve bhūte yakṛti ca sadā baddha malaḥ gude
durnāmabhiḥ udāvartaiḥ anyaiḥ vā pīḍitaḥ bhavet
varcaḥ pitta kaphān baddhān karoti kupitaḥ nilaḥ

original: apāno jaṭhare tena saṃruddho jvararukkaraḥ // GarP_1,161.30 //
analyzed: apānaḥ jaṭhare tena saṃruddhaḥ jvara ruj karaḥ
kāśa śvāsa ūru sadganam śiraḥ ruj nābhi pārśva ruj
mala asaṃgaḥ ruciḥ chardiḥ udare mala mārutaḥ
sthira nīla aruṇa sirā jālaiḥ udaram āvṛtam

original: nābherupari ca prāyo gopucchākṛti jāyate // GarP_1,161.32 //
analyzed: nābheḥ upari ca prāyas go puccha ākṛti jāyate
asthi ādi śalyaiḥ viddhe ca eva udare tathā
pacyate yakṛt ādiḥ ca tad chidraiḥ ca saran bahis
āmaḥ eva tatas lpa alpaḥ śakṛt rasaḥ
sa syāt vikṛta gandhaḥ pi picchilaḥ pīta lohitaḥ
śeṣaḥ ca āpūrya jaṭharam ghoram ārabhate tatas

original: vardhate tadadho nābherāśu caiti jalātmatām // GarP_1,161.35 //
analyzed: vardhate tad adhas nābheḥ āśu ca eti jala ātma tām

original: udrikte doṣarūpe ca vyāpte ca śvāsatṛṭbhramaiḥ /
analyzed: udrikte doṣa rūpe ca vyāpte ca śvāsa tṛṣ bhramaiḥ
chidrodaram idam prāhuḥ paristrāvi iti ca apare
pravṛtta sneha pāna ādeḥ sahasā apathya sevinaḥ
ati ambu pānāt manda agneḥ kṣīṇasya ati kṛśasya ca
ruddhaḥ sva mārgāt anilaḥ kaphaḥ ca jala mūrchitaḥ
vardhate tu tat eva ambu tad mātrāt vindu rāśitaḥ
tad kopāt udaram tṛṣṇā guda snuti rujā anvitam
kāśa śvāsa aruci yutam nānā varṇa āśiḥ ātatam
toya pūrṇāt mṛdu sparśāt sadṛśa kṣobha vepathu
baka udaram sthiram snigdham nāḍīm āvṛtya jāyate
upekṣāyām ca sarveṣām svasthānām paricālitāḥ
pākāḥ dravāḥ dravīkuryuḥ sandhi srotaḥ mukhāni api
svede ca eva tu saṃruddhe mūrchitāḥ ca antara sthitāḥ
tat eva udaram āpūrya kuryāt udarāmayam
guru udaram sthitam vṛttam āhatam ca na śabda kṛt

original: hīnabalaṃ tathā ghoraṃ nāḍyāṃ spṛṣṭañca sapati // GarP_1,161.43 //
analyzed: hīna balam tathā ghoram nāḍyām spṛṣṭam ca sapati
sirā antardhānam udare sarva lakṣaṇam ucyate
vāta pitta kapha plīha sannipāta udaka udaram
pakṣāt ca jāta salilam viṣṭambha upadrava anvitam

original: janmanaivodaraṃ sarvaṃ prāyaḥ kṛcchratamaṃ matam // GarP_1,161.45 //
analyzed: janmanā eva udaram sarvam prāyas kṛcchratamam matam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇme pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe ekaṣaṣṭyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇme pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe ekaṣaṣṭyadhikaśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
dhanvantariḥ uvāca
pāṇḍu śotha nidānañca śṛṇu suśrata vacmi te
pitta pradhānāḥ kupitāḥ yathā uktaiḥ kopanaiḥ malāḥ
balinā kṣipta ākṣiptam yadi sthitam
dhamanīḥ daśamīḥ prāpya vyāpnuvan sakalām tanum
tvak asṛj śleṣma māṃsāni pradūṣyan rasam āśritam

original: tvaṅmāṃsayostu kurute tvaci varṇān pṛthagvidhān // GarP_1,162.3 //
analyzed: tvak māṃsayoḥ tu kurute tvaci varṇān pṛthagvidhān

original: svayaṃ haridrā hāridraṃ pāṇḍutvaṃ teṣu cādhikam /
analyzed: svayam haridrā hāridram pāṇḍu tvam teṣu ca adhikam

original: yāto 'yaṃ prahatedugraḥ sa rogastena gauravam // GarP_1,162.4 //
analyzed: yātaḥ yam sa rogaḥ tena gauravam
dhātūnām sparśa śaithilyam āma jaḥ ca guṇa kṣayaḥ
tatas lpa rakta medaḥ sthiniḥ sāraḥ syāt ślatha indriyaḥ
śīryamāṇaiḥ iva aṅgaiḥ tu dravatā hṛdayena ca
śūla ukṣikūṭa vadane staimityam tatra lālayā
hīna tṛṣ śiśira dveṣī śīrṇa lobhaḥ hata analaḥ

original: mandaśaktirjvarī śvāsī karṇaśūlī tathā bhramī // GarP_1,162.7 //
analyzed: manda śaktiḥ jvarī śvāsī karṇa śūlī tathā bhramī
sa pañcadhā pṛthak doṣaiḥ samastaiḥ mṛttikā adanāt
prāgrūpam asya hṛdaya spandanam rūkṣa tā tvaci
aruciḥ pīta mūtra tvam sveda abhāvaḥ lpa mṛtra tā
medaḥ sama anilāt tatra gāḍha ruj kleda gātra tā
kṛṣṇa īkṣaṇam kṛṣṇa sirā nakha viṣ mūtra netra tā
śothaḥ nāsā āsya vairasyam viṣ śoṣaḥ pārśva mūrchanā
pitte harita pitta ābhaḥ sirā ādiṣu jvaraḥ tamaḥ
tṛṣ śoṣa mūrchā daurgandhyam śīta icchā kaṭu vakra tā
viḍbhedaḥ ca amlakaḥ dāhaḥ kaphāt ca hṛdaya ārdra tā
tandrā lavaṇa vakra tvam roma harṣaḥ svara kṣayaḥ
kāśaḥ chardiḥ ca nicayāt naṣṭa liṅgaḥ sahaḥ
utkṛṣṭa inila pittābhyā kaṭuḥ vā madhuraḥ kaphaḥ
dūṣayitvā vasā ādīn ca raukṣyāt rakta vimokṣaṇam

original: srotasāṃ saṃkṣayaṃ kuryādanurudhya ca pūrvavat // GarP_1,162.14 //
analyzed: srotasām saṃkṣayam kuryāt anurudhya ca pūrvavat
pāṇḍu roga ikṣaye jāte nābhi pāda āsya mehanam
purīṣam kṛmi vat muñcet bhinnam sa astram kapha anvitam

original: yaḥ pittarogī seveta pittalaṃ tasya kāmalam /
analyzed: yaḥ pitta rogī seveta pittalam tasya kāmalam
koṣṭhaśā kha udgatam pittam dagdhvā asṛj māṃsam āharet
hāridra mūtra netra tvam mukham raktam śakṛt tathā
dāhī vipāka tṛṣṇāvān bheka ābhaḥ durbala indriyaḥ
bhavet pitta anugaḥ śothaḥ pāṇḍu roga āvṛtasya ca

original: upekṣayā ca śothādyāḥ sakṛcchrāḥ kumbhakāmalāḥ // GarP_1,162.18 //
analyzed: upekṣayā ca śotha ādyāḥ sa kṛcchrāḥ kumbhakāmalāḥ

original: vātapitte bhramastṛṣṇā strīṣu harṣo mṛdujvaraḥ // GarP_1,162.19 //
analyzed: vāta pitte bhramaḥ tṛṣṇā strīṣu harṣaḥ mṛdu jvaraḥ
tandrā vā ca anala bhraṃśaḥ tam vadanti halīmakam
ālasyam ca ati bhavati teṣām pūrvam upadravaḥ

original: śothaḥ pradhānaḥ kathitaḥ sa evāto nigadyate /
analyzed: śothaḥ pradhānaḥ kathitaḥ saḥ eva atas nigadyate
pitta rakta kaphān vāyuḥ duṣṭaḥ duṣṭān bahis sirāḥ
nītvā ruddha gatiḥ taiḥ hi kuryāt tvac māṃsa saṃśrayam
utsedham saṃhatam śotham tam āhuḥ nicayāt atas
sarva hetu viśaṣaiḥ tu rūpa bhedāt nava ātmakam
doṣaiḥ pṛthagvidhaiḥ sarvaiḥ abhighātāt viṣāt api
tat eva nīyamānam tu sarva aṅge kāma jam bhavet
pṛthu unnata agra grathitaiḥ viśeṣaiḥ ca tridhā viduḥ
sāmānya hetuḥ śothānām doṣa jātaḥ viśeṣataḥ
vyādhiḥ karma upavāsa ādi kṣīṇasya bhavati drutam
atimātram yadā sevet gurum atyanta śītalam
rodhaḥ vegasya vallūram ajīrṇa śrama maithunam

original: pacyate mārgagamanaṃ yānena kṣobhiṇāpi vā // GarP_1,162.27 //
analyzed: pacyate mārga gamanam yānena kṣobhiṇā api vā
śvāsa kāsa atisāra arśaḥ jaṭhara pradara jvarāḥ
ūrdhva śotham adhas vastau madhye kurvanti madhya gāḥ
sarva aṅga gaḥ sarva gataḥ tad āśrayaḥ
tad pūrvarūpam kṣavathuḥ sirāyām aṅga gauravam
vātāt śothaḥ calaḥ rūkṣaḥ khara roma aruṇaḥ sitaḥ
śaṅkha vasti antra śopha ṛti medaḥ bhedāḥ prasupti tā
vāta uttānaḥ klamaḥ śīghram unnamet pīḍitām tanum
sigdhaḥ tu mardanaiḥ śāmyet rātrau alpaḥ divā mahān
tvak sarṣapa vilipte ca tasmin cimicimāyate
pitta jātaḥ ca śoṣa kṛt

original: śīghraṃ nāsau vā praśamenmadhye prāgdahate tanum // GarP_1,162.33 //
analyzed: śīghram nā asau vā praśamet madhye prāk dahate tanum
sa tṛṣ dāha jvara svedaḥ

original: sābhilāṣī śakṛdbhedo gandhaḥ sparśasaho mṛduḥ // GarP_1,162.34 //
analyzed: sa abhilāṣī śakṛdbhedaḥ gandhaḥ sparśa sahaḥ mṛduḥ
kaṇḍūmān pāṇḍu romā tvac kaṭhinaḥ śītalaḥ guruḥ
snigdhaḥ ślakṣṇaḥ sthiraḥ śūlaḥ nidrā chardi agni māndya kṛt
āghātena ca śastra ādi cheda bheda kṣata ādibhiḥ
hima anilaiḥ dadhi anilaiḥ bhallāta kapikaccha jaiḥ
rasaiḥ śuṣkaiḥ ca saṃsparśāt śvayathuḥ syāt visarpavān
bhṛśa ūṣmā lohita ābhāsaḥ prāyaśas pitta lakṣaṇaḥ
viṣa jaḥ sa viṣa prāṇi parisarpaṇa mūtraṇāt
daṃṣṭrā danta nakha āghātāt aviṣa prāṇinām api
viṣ mūtra śukra upahata malavat vastu saṃṅkarāt
viṣa vṛkṣa anila sparśāt gara yoga avacūrṇanāt
mṛduḥ calaḥ valambī ca śīghraḥ dāha rujā karaḥ
navaḥ śothaḥ sādhyaḥ sādhyaḥ purā īritaḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe pāṇḍusothanidānaṃ nāma dviṣaṣṭyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe pāṇḍusothanidānam nāma dviṣaṣṭyadhikaśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
dhanvantīrar uvāca
visarpa ādi nidāna ante vakṣye suśruta tat śṛṇu
syāt visarpaḥ vighātāt tu doṣaiḥ duṣṭaiḥ ca śotha vat
adhiṣṭhānam ca tam prāhuḥ bāhyam tatra bhayāt śramāt

original: yathāttarañca duḥ sādhyastatra doṣo yathāyatham // GarP_1,163.2 //
analyzed: yathāttaram ca sādhyaḥ tatra doṣaḥ yathāyatham
prakopanaiḥ prakupitāḥ viśeṣeṇa vidāhibhiḥ

original: dehe śīghraṃ viśantīha te 'ntare hi sthitā bahiḥ // GarP_1,163.3 //
analyzed: dehe śīghram viśanti iha te ntare hi sthitāḥ bahis
tṛṣṇā abhiyogāt vegānām viṣamāt ca pravartanāt
āśu ca agni bala bhraṃśāt atas bāhyam visarpayet
tatra vātāt sa vīsarpaḥ vāta jvara sama vyathaḥ
śotha sphuraṇa nistoda bheda āyāsa ārti harṣavān
pittāt druta gatiḥ pitta jvara liṅgaḥ ti lohitaḥ
kaphāt kaṇḍū yutaḥ snigdhaḥ kapha jvara samāna ruj
sannipāta samutthāḥ ca sarva liṅga samanvitāḥ
sva doṣa liṅgaiḥ cīyante sarvaiḥ sphoṭaiḥ upekṣitāḥ
te svedān vimuñcati bibhrataḥ vraṇa lakṣaṇam
vāta pittāt jvara chardi mūrchā atīsāra tṛṣ bhramaiḥ
ganthi bheda agni sadana tamaka arocakaiḥ yutaḥ
karoti sarvam aṅgam ca dīpta aṅgāra avakīrṇa vat

original: yaṃyaṃ deśaṃ visarpaśca visarpati bhavetsasaḥ // GarP_1,163.9 //
analyzed: yaṃ yam deśam visarpaḥ ca visarpati bhavet sasaḥ

original: śāntāṅgārāsito nīlo rakto vāsu ca cīyate /
analyzed: śānta aṅgāra asitaḥ nīlaḥ raktaḥ ca cīyate

original: agnidagdha iva sphoṭaiḥ śīghragatvāddrutaṃ sa ca // GarP_1,163.10 //
analyzed: agni dagdhaḥ iva sphoṭaiḥ śīghra ga tvāt drutam sa ca
marma anusārī vīsarpaḥ syāt vātaḥ ti balaḥ tatas
vyathate ṅgam haret saṃjñām nidrām ca śvāsam īrayet
hikkām ca sa gataḥ vasthām īdṛśīm labhate naraḥ
kvacid marma arati grastaḥ bhūmi śayyā āsana ādiṣu
ceṣṭamānaḥ tatas kliṣṭaḥ manaḥ deha pramohavān
duṣprabodhaḥ śnute nidrām saḥ gnivīsarpaḥ ucyate

original: kaphena ruddhaḥ pavano bhittvātaṃ bahudhā kapham /
analyzed: kaphena ruddhaḥ pavanaḥ bhittvā atam bahudhā kapham
raktam vā vṛddha raktasya tvac sirā snāyu māṃsa gam
dūṣayitvā tu dīrgha anuvṛtta sthūla khara ātmikām
granthīnām kurute mālām sa raktān tīvra ruj jvarām
śvāsa kāsa atisāra āsya śoṣa hikkā vami bhramaiḥ
moha vaivarṇya mūrchā aṅga bhaṅga agni sadanaiḥ yutām
iti ayam granthivīsarpaḥ kapha māruta kopa jaḥ
kapha pittāt jvaraḥ stambhaḥ nidrā tandrā śiraḥ rujā
aṅga avasāda vikṣeṃpau pralāpa arocaka bhramāḥ
mūrchā agni hāniḥ bhedaḥ sthnām pipāsā indriya gauravam

original: āmopaveśanaṃ lepaḥ srotasāṃ sa ca sarpati // GarP_1,163.18 //
analyzed: āma upaveśanam lepaḥ srotasām sa ca sarpati
prāyeṇa āmāśayam gṛhṇan eka deśam na ca ati ruj
pīḍakaiḥ avakīrṇaḥ ti pīta lohita pāṇḍuraiḥ
snidhnaḥ sitaḥ mecaka ābhaḥ malinaḥ śothavān guruḥ
gambhīra pākaḥ prāya ūṣma spṛṣṭaḥ klinna uṃ vat īryate
pakva vat śīrṇa māṃsaḥ ca spaṣṭa snāyu sirā gaṇaḥ
sarva gaḥ lakṣaṇaiḥ sarveḥ sarva ga tvac samarpaṇaḥ

original: śavagandhī ca vīsarpaḥ kardamākhyamuśanti tam // GarP_1,163.21 //
analyzed: śava gandhī ca vīsarpaḥ kardama ākhyam uśanti tam
bāhya hetoḥ kṣatāt kruddhvaḥ sa raktam pittam īrayan
vīsarpam mārutaḥ kuryāt kulattha sadṛśaiḥ citam
sphoṭaiḥ śotha jvara rujā dāha āḍhyam śyāva śoṇitam
pathak doṣaiḥ trayaḥ sādhyāḥ dvandva jāḥ ca anupadravāḥ
asādhyāḥ kṛta sarva utthāḥ sarve ca ākrānta marmaṇaḥ
śīrṇa snāyu śirā māṃsāḥ klinnāḥ ca śava gandhayaḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vīsarpanidānaṃ nāma tripaṣṭyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe vīsarpanidānam nāma tripaṣṭyadhikaśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
dhanvantariḥ uvāca
mithyā āhāra vihāreṇa viśeṣeṇa virodhinā
sādhu nindā vadhāt yuddha haraṇa ādyaiḥ ca sevitaiḥ
pāpmabhiḥ karmabhiḥ sadyas prāktanaiḥ prerita amalāḥ
śirāḥ prapadya taiḥ yuktāḥ tvac vasā raktam āmiṣam
dūṣayanti ca saṃśoṣya niścarantaḥ tatas bahis

original: tvacaḥ kurvānti vaivarṇyaṃ śiṣṭāḥ kuṣṭhamuśantitam // GarP_1,164.3 //
analyzed: tvacaḥ kurvānti vaivarṇyam śiṣṭāḥ kuṣṭham uśanti tam
kālena upekṣitam yat syāt sarvam koṣṭhāni tat vapuḥ
prapadya dhātūn bāhya antar sarvān saṃkledya ca āvahet
sa sveda kleda saṅkocān kṛmīn sūkṣmān ca dāruṇān
loma tvak snāyu dhamanīḥ ākrāmati yathākramam
bhasma ācchādita vat kuryāt bāhyam kuṣṭham udāhṛtam

original: kuṣṭhāni saptadhā doṣaiḥ pṛthagdvandvaiḥ samāgataiḥ // GarP_1,164.6 //
analyzed: kuṣṭhāni saptadhā doṣaiḥ pṛthak dvandvaiḥ samāgataiḥ
sarveṣu api tridoṣeṣu vyapadeśaḥ dhikaḥ tatas

original: vātena kuṣṭhaṃ kāpālaṃ pittenaudumbaraṃ kaphāt // GarP_1,164.7 //
analyzed: vātena kuṣṭham kāpālam pittena audumbaram kaphāt
maṇḍala ākhyam vicarco ca ṛṣi ākhyam vāta pitta jam
carma ekakuṣṭham kiṭimam sidhma alasa vipādikāḥ
vāta śleṣma udbhavāḥ śleṣma pittāt dadrū śatāruṣī

original: puṇḍarīkaṃ savisphoṭaṃ pāmā carmadalaṃ tathā // GarP_1,164.9 //
analyzed: puṇḍarīkam sa visphoṭam pāmā carmadalam tathā
sarvebhyaḥ kākaṇam pūrva trikam dadru sa kākaṇam

original: puṇḍarīkaryajihve ca mahākuṣṭhāni sapta tu // GarP_1,164.10 //
analyzed: puṇḍarīkarya jihve ca mahākuṣṭhāni sapta tu
ati ślakṣṇa khara sparśa sveda asveda vivarṇa tāḥ
dāhaḥ kaṇḍūḥ tvaci svāpaḥ todaḥ koca unnatiḥ tamaḥ
vraṇānām adhikam śūlam śīghra utpattiḥ cira sthitiḥ
rūḍhānām api rūkṣa tvam nimitte lpe tikopanam
roma harṣaḥ sṛjaḥ kārṣṇyam kuṣṭha lakṣaṇam agra jam
kṛṣṇa aruṇa kapāla ābham yat rūkṣam paruṣam tanu
vistṛta ākṛti paryasta dūṣitaiḥ lomabhiḥ citam

original: kāpālaṃ todabahulaṃ tatkuṣṭhaṃ viṣamaṃ smṛtam // GarP_1,164.14 //
analyzed: kāpālam toda bahulam tat kuṣṭham viṣamam smṛtam
udumbara phala ābhāsam kuṣṭham audumbaram vadet
vartulam dāha rujā adhikam
asaṃcchannam adaraṇam kṛmi vat syāt udumbaram

original: sthiraṃ satyānaṃ guru snigdhaṃ śvetaraktaṃ malānvitam // GarP_1,164.16 //
analyzed: sthiram guru snigdham śveta raktam mala anvitam
anyonya sakta puccha ūna bahu kaṇḍū snuti kṛmi
ślakṣṇa pīta ābhā saṃyuktam maṇḍalam parikīrtitam
sa kaṇḍū piṭikā śyāvā sa kledā ca vicarcikā
paruṣantatra rakta antam antar śyāmam samunnatam
hasti carma khara sparśam carma ākhyam kuṣṭham ucyate
asvedañca matsya śalka sannibham kiṭimam punar
rūkṣa agni varṇam duḥ sparśam kaṇḍūmat paruṣa asitam

original: antā rūkṣaṃ bahiḥ snigdhamantarghṛṣṭaṃ rajaḥ kiret /
analyzed: antar rūkṣam bahis snigdham antar ghṛṣṭam rajaḥ kiret
ślakṣṇa sparśam tanu snigdham svaccham asveda puṣpavat
prāyeṇa ca ūrdhva kārśyam ca kuṇḍaiḥ kaṇḍū paraiḥ citam
pāṇi pāde kuryāt vipādikā
tīvra ārtim gāḍha kaṇḍūm ca sa rāga piḍikā citam
dīrgha pratāna dūrvāvat atasī kusuma chavi
ucchūna maṇḍalaḥ dadruḥ kaṇḍūmān iti kathyate
sthūla mūlam sa dāha ārti rakta strāvam bahu vraṇam
prāyaśas sarva janma ca
rakta akta maṇḍalam pāṇḍu kaṇḍū dāha rujā anvitam
sa utsedham ācitam raktaiḥ kañja parṇam iva ambuṣu

original: puṇḍarīkaṃ bhavettaddhi citaṃ sphoṭaiḥ sitāruṇaiḥ // GarP_1,164.26 //
analyzed: puṇḍarīkam bhavet tat hi citam sphoṭaiḥ sita aruṇaiḥ
visphoṭa piṭikā pāmā kaṇḍū kleda rujā anvitāḥ

original: sūkṣmā śyāmāruṇā rūkṣā prāyaḥ sphikpāṇikūrpare // GarP_1,164.27 //
analyzed: sūkṣmā śyāma aruṇā rūkṣā prāyas sphic pāṇi kūrpare
sa sphoṭa saṃsparśa saham kaṇḍū rakta ati dāhavat
raktadalam carmadalam kākaṇam tīvra dāha ruj
pūrva raktam ca kṛṣṇam ca kākaṇam triphalā upamam
kṛṣṇa liṅgaiḥ yutaiḥ sarvaiḥ sva sva kāraṇataḥ bhavet
doṣa bhedāya vihitaiḥ ādiśet liṅga karmabhiḥ
kuṣṭha sva doṣa anugatam sarva doṣa gatam tyajet
kuṣṭha uktam yat ca yat ca asthi majjā śukra samāśrayam
kṛcchram medaḥ matam ca eva yāpyam snāpvā asthi māṃsa gam
akṛcchram kapha vāta uttham tvac gatam tu amalam ca yat

original: tatra tvaci sthite kaṣṭhe kāye vaivarṇyarūkṣātā // GarP_1,164.32 //
analyzed: tatra tvaci sthite kaṣṭhe kāye vaivarṇya rūkṣa tā
sveda tāpa śvayathavaḥ śoṇite piśite punar
pāṇi pāda āśritāḥ sphoṭāḥ kleśāt sandhiṣu ca adhikam
doṣasya abhīkṣṇa yogena dalanam syāt ca medasi
na ati saṃjñā asti majja asthi netra vega svarakṣyaḥ
kṣate ca krimibhiḥ śukre sva dāra apatya bādhanam
yathāpūrvāṇi sarvāṇi sva liṅgāni mṛga ādiṣu
kaṣṭha eka sambhavam śvitram kilāsam dāruṇam bhavet
nirdiṣṭam aparistrāvi tridhātu udbhava saṃśrayam
vātāt rūkṣa aruṇam pittāt tāmram kamala patra vat

original: sadāhaṃ romavidhvaṃsi kaphācchvetaṃ ghana guru // GarP_1,164.37 //
analyzed: sa dāham roma vidhvaṃsi kaphāt śvetam ghana guru
sa kaṇḍūram kramāt rakta māṃsa medaḥ su ca ādiśet
varṇena eva īdṛś ubhayam kṛcchram tat ca uttarottaram
a śukla roma bahulam a saṃśliṣṭam mithas navam
anagni dagdha jam sādhyam śvitram varjyam atas nyathā
guhya pāṇi tala oṣṭheṣu jātam api acirantaram
varjanīyam viśeṣeṇa kilāsam siddhim icchitā
sparśa eka āhāra saṃga ādi sevanāt prāyaśas gadāḥ
eka śayyā āsanāt ca eva vastra mālya anulepanāt

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe kuṣṭharoganidāna nāma catuḥ ṣaṣṭyuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe kuṣṭharoganidāna nāma catuḥ ṣaṣṭyuttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
dhanvantariḥ uvāca
krimayaḥ ca dvidhā proktāḥ bāhi abhyantara bhedataḥ
bahis mala kapha asṛk viṣ janma bhedāt caturvidhāḥ
nāmataḥ viṃśatividhāḥ bāhyāḥ tatra mala udbhavāḥ
tila pramāṇa saṃsthāna varṇāḥ keśa ambara āśrayāḥ
bahupādāḥ ca sūkṣmāḥ ca yūkāḥ likṣāḥ ca nāmataḥ
dvidhā te koṣṭha piḍikāḥ kaṇḍū gaṇḍān prakurvate
kuṣṭha eka hetavaḥ ntar jāḥ śleṣma jāḥ bāhya sambhavāḥ
madhura anna guḍa kṣīra dadhi matsya nava odanaiḥ
kaphāt āmāśaye jātāḥ vṛddhāḥ sarpanti sarvatas
pṛthu bradhna nibhāḥ kecid kecid gaṇḍūpada upamāḥ
rūḍha dhānya aṅkura ākārāḥ tanu dīrghāḥ tathā aṇavaḥ

original: śvetāstāmrāvabhāsāśca nāmataḥ saptadhā tu te // GarP_1,165.6 //
analyzed: śvetāḥ tāmra avabhāsāḥ ca nāmataḥ saptadhā tu te
antrādāḥ udarāveṣṭāḥ hṛdayādāḥ mahāgudāḥ

original: cyuravo darbhakusumāḥ sugandhāste ca kurvate // GarP_1,165.7 //
analyzed: cyuravaḥ darbhakusumāḥ sugandhāḥ te ca kurvate
hṛllāsam āsya śravaṇam avipākam arocakam
mūrchā chardi jvara ānāha kārśya kṣavathu pīnasān
rakta vāhi sirā sthāna rakta jāḥ jantavaḥ ṇavaḥ
apādāḥ vṛtta tāmrāḥ ca saukṣmyāt kecid adarśanāḥ
keśādāḥ roma vidhvaṃsāḥ roma dvīpāḥ udumbarāḥ
ṣaṭ te kuṣṭha eka karmāṇaḥ sahasā aurasa mātaraḥ
pakvāśaye purīṣa utthāḥ jāyante
vṛddhāḥ te syuḥ bhaveyuḥ ca te yadā āmāśaya unmukhāḥ
tadā asya udgāra niḥ śvāma viṣ gandha anuvidhāyinaḥ
pṛthu vṛtta tanu sthūlāḥ śyāva pīta sita asitāḥ
te pañca nāmnā krimayaḥ kakeruka makerukāḥ

original: sausurādāḥ saśūlākhyā lelihā janayanti hi // GarP_1,165.13 //
analyzed: sausurādāḥ sa śūla ākhyāḥ lelihāḥ janayanti hi
vaṅ bheda śūla viṣṭambha kārśya pāruṣya pāṇḍutāḥ
roma harṣa agni sadanam guda kaṇḍūṃr vimārga gāḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe kriminidānaṃ nāma pañcaṣaṣṭhyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe kriminidānam nāma pañcaṣaṣṭhyadhikaśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
dhanvantariḥ uvāca
vātavyādhi nidānam te vakṣye suśruta tat śṛṇu

original: sarvathānarthakathane vighna eva ca kāraṇam // GarP_1,166.1 //
analyzed: sarvathā anartha kathane vighnaḥ eva ca kāraṇam
adṛṣṭa duṣṭa pavana śarīram aviśeṣataḥ

original: sa viśvakarmā viśvātmā viśvarūpaḥ prajāpatiḥ // GarP_1,166.2 //
analyzed: sa viśva karmā viśva ātmā viśva rūpaḥ prajāpatiḥ
sraṣṭā dhātā vibhuḥ viṣṇuḥ saṃhartā mṛtyuḥ antakaḥ

original: tadvaduktaṃ ca yatnena yatitavyamataḥ sadā // GarP_1,166.3 //
analyzed: tadvat uktam ca yatnena yatitavyam atas sadā
tasya ukte doṣa vijñāne karma prākṛta vaikṛtam
samāsa vyāsataḥ doṣa bhedānām avadhārya ca
pratyekam pañcadhā vīraḥ vyāpāraḥ ca iha vaikṛtaḥ
tasya ucyate vibhāgena sa nidānam sa lakṣaṇam
dhātu kṣaya karaiḥ vāyuḥ kruddhaḥ na ati niṣevyate
catuḥ snotaḥ vakāśeṣu bhūyas tāni eva pūrayet
tebhyaḥ tu doṣa pūrṇebhyaḥ pracchādya vivaram tatas
tava vāyuḥ sakṛt kruddhaḥ śūla ānāha antra kūjanam
mala rodham svara bhraṃśam dṛṣṭi pṛṣṭha kaṭi graham
karoti eva punar kāye kṛcchrān anyān upadravān
āmāśaya uttha vamathu śvāsa kāsa viṣūcikāḥ
kaṇḍū uparodha gharma ādi vyādhīn ūrdhvañca nābhitaḥ
śrotra ādi indriya bādhām ca tvaci sphoṭana rūkṣa tām
antrasya antar ca viṣṭambham arucim kṛśa tām bhramam
māṃsa medaḥ gata granthim carma ādau upakarkaśam
tyartham daṇḍa muṣṭi hatam yathā
asthi sthaḥ sakthi sandhi asthi śūlam tīvram ca lakṣayet
ca asthairyam asvapnam yat tadā rujām
śukrasya śīghram utsaṅga sargān vikṛtim eva vā
tad tad garbha stha śukra sthaḥ śirasi ādhmānariktātā

original: tatra sthānasthitaḥ kuryāt kruddhaḥ śvayathukṛcchratām // GarP_1,166.14 //
analyzed: tatra sthāna sthitaḥ kuryāt kruddhaḥ śvayathu kṛcchra tām
jala pūrṇa dṛti sparśam śoṣam sandhi gataḥ nilaḥ
sarva aṅga saṃśrayaḥ toda bheda sphuraṇa bhañjanam
stambhana ākṣepaṇam svapnaḥ sandhi bhañjana kampanam

original: yadā tu dhamanīḥ sarvāḥ kruddho 'bhyeti muhurmuhuḥ /
analyzed: yadā tu dhamanīḥ sarvāḥ kruddhaḥ bhyeti muhur muhur
tadā aṅgam ākṣipati eṣa vyādhiḥ ākṣepaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ
adhas pratihataḥ vāyuḥ vrajet ūrdhvam yadā punar

original: tadāvaṣṭabhya hṛdayaṃ śiraḥ śaṅkhau ca pīḍayet // GarP_1,166.17 //
analyzed: tadā avaṣṭabhya hṛdayam śiraḥ śaṅkhau ca pīḍayet

original: sakṣipetparito gātraṃ hanuṃ vā cāsya nāmayat /
analyzed: sa kṣipet paritas gātram hanum vā ca asya nāmayat
kṛcchrāt ucchvasitam ca api nimīlat nayana dvayam

original: kapota iva kūjecca niḥ saṃgaḥ sopatantrakaḥ /
analyzed: kapotaḥ iva kūjet ca niḥ saṃgaḥ sa upatantrakaḥ

original: sa eva vāmanāsāyāṃ yuktastu marutā hṛdi // GarP_1,166.19 //
analyzed: saḥ eva vāma nāsāyām yuktaḥ tu marutā hṛdi
prāpnoti ca muhur svāsthyam muhur asvāsthyavān bhavet
abhighāta samutthaḥ ca duścikitsyatamaḥ mataḥ
sveda stambham tadā tasya vāyuḥ chinna tanuḥ yadā

original: vyāpnoti sakalaṃ dehaṃ yatra cāyāmyate punaḥ // GarP_1,166.21 //
analyzed: vyāpnoti sakalam deham yatra ca āyāmyate punar
antardhā antu gataḥ ca eva vega stambham ca netrayoḥ

original: karoti jṛmbhāṃ sadanaṃ daśanānāṃ hatodyamam // GarP_1,166.22 //
analyzed: karoti jṛmbhām sadanam daśanānām hata udyamam
pārśvayoḥ vedanām bāhyām hanu pṛṣṭha siraḥ graham

original: dehasya bahirāyāmaṃ pṛṣṭhato hṛdaye śiraḥ // GarP_1,166.23 //
analyzed: dehasya bahis āyāmam pṛṣṭhataḥ hṛdaye śiraḥ

original: uraścotkṣipyate tatra skandho vā nāmyate tadā /
analyzed: uraḥ ca utkṣipyate tatra skandhaḥ vā nāmyate tadā

original: danteṣvāsye ca vaivarṇyaṃ hyasvedastatra gātrataḥ // GarP_1,166.24 //
analyzed: danteṣu āsye ca vaivarṇyam hi asvedaḥ tatra gātrataḥ
bāhyāyāmam hanustambham bravate vāta rogiṇam
viṣ mūtram asṛjam prāpya sa samīra samīraṇāḥ
āyacchanti tanoḥ deṣāḥ sarvam āpādamastakam
tiṣṭhataḥ pāṇḍu mātrasya vraṇāyāmaḥ su vardhitaḥ
gātra vege bhavet svāsthyam sarveṣu ākṣepaṇena tat
jihvā vilekhanāt uṣṇa bhakṣaṇāt ati mānataḥ
kupitaḥ hanu mūla sthaḥ stambhayitvā anilaḥ hanum
karoti vivṛta āsya tvam athavā saṃvṛta āsya tām
hanastambhaḥ sa tena syāt kṛcchrāt carvaṇa bhāṣaṇam
vāgvādinī sirā stambhaḥ jihvām stambhayate nilaḥ
jihvāstambhaḥ sa tena anna pāna vākyeṣu anīśa tā
śirasā bhāra haraṇāt ati hāsya prabhāṣaṇāt
viṣamāt upadhānāt ca kaṭhinānām ca carvaṇāt
vāyuḥ vivardhate taiḥ ca vātūlaiḥ ūrdhvam āsthitaḥ
vakrīkaroti vaktram ca hi uccais hasitam īkṣitam

original: tato 'sya kurute mṛdvīṃ vākśaktiṃ stabdhanetratām // GarP_1,166.32 //
analyzed: kurute mṛdvīm vāc śaktim stabdha netra tām
danta cālam svara bhraṃśaḥ śruti hāni īkṣita grahau
gandha ajñānam smṛti dhvaṃsaḥ trāsaḥ śvāsaḥ ca jāyate
niṣṭhīvaḥ pārśva todaḥ ca hi ekasya akṣṇaḥ nimīlanam
jatroḥ ūrdhvam rujaḥ tīvrāḥ vā
tam āhuḥ arditam kecid ekāṅgam atha ca apare

original: raktamāśritya ca śirāḥ kuryānmūrdhadharāḥ śirāḥ? // GarP_1,166.35 //
analyzed: raktam āśritya ca sirāḥ kuryāt mūrdha dharāḥ sirāḥ
rūkṣaḥ sa vedanaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ saḥ sādhyaḥ syāt śiraḥ grahaḥ

original: tanuṃ gṛhītvā vāyuśca snāyustathaiva ca // GarP_1,166.36 //
analyzed: tanum gṛhītvā vāyuḥ ca snāyuḥ tathā eva ca
pakṣam anyataram hanti pakṣāghātaḥ saḥ ucyate
kṛtsnasya kāyasya ardham syāt akarmaṇyam acetanam
ekāṅgaroga tām kecid anye kakṣarujām viduḥ
sarva aṅga rodhaḥ stambhaḥ ca sarva kāya āśrite nile
śuddha vāta kṛtaḥ pakṣaḥ kṛcchra sādhyatamaḥ mataḥ
kṛcchraḥ ca anyena saṃsṛṣṭaḥ vivṛddhaḥ kṣaya hetukaḥ
āma baddha ayanaḥ kuryāt saṃstabhya aṅgam kapha anvitaḥ

original: asādhya eva sarvo hi bhaveddaṇḍāpatānakaḥ // GarP_1,166.40 //
analyzed: asādhyaḥ eva sarvaḥ hi bhavet daṇḍāpatānakaḥ
aṃsa mūla utthitaḥ vāyuḥ śirāḥ saṃkucya tatra gaḥ
bahis prasyandita haram janayati eva bāhukam
talam pratyaṅgulīnām yaḥ kaṇḍarā bāhu pṛṣṭhataḥ

original: bāhvoḥ karmakṣayakarī vipūcī veti socyate // GarP_1,166.42 //
analyzed: bāhvoḥ karma kṣaya karī vipūcī vā iti sā ucyate
vāyuḥ kaṭi āśritaḥ sakthnaḥ kaṇḍarām ākṣaipet yadā

original: tadā khañjo bhavejjantuḥ paṅguḥ sakthnordvayorvadhāt // GarP_1,166.43 //
analyzed: tadā khañjaḥ bhavet jantuḥ paṅguḥ sakthnoḥ dvayoḥ vadhāt
kampate gamana ārambhe khañjan iva ca gacchati
kalāyakhañjam tam vidyāt mukta sandhi prabandhanam
śīta uṣṇa drava saṃsuṣka guru snigdhaiḥ ca sevitaiḥ
jīrṇa a jīrṇe tathā āyāsa kṣobha snigdha prajāgaraiḥ
śleṣma bhedaḥ samaye param atyartha saṃcitam
abhibhūya itaram doṣam śarīram pratipadyate
sakthi asthīni prapūrya antar śleṣmaṇā stambhitena tat

original: tadāsthi snāti tenorostathā śītānilena tu // GarP_1,166.47 //
analyzed: tadā asthi snāti tena ūroḥ tathā śīta anilena tu
śyāmā aṅgam aṅga staimitya tandrā mūrchā aruci jvaraiḥ
tam ūrustambham iti āha bāhyavātam atha apare
vāta śoṇita saṃśothaḥ jānu madhye mahā rujaḥ
jñeyaḥ kroṣṭukaśīrṣaḥ tu sthūla kroṣṭuka śīrṣa vat
ruj pāda viṣama nyaste śramāt vā jāyate yadā
vātena gulpham ākṣitya tam āhuḥ vātakaṇṭakam
pārṣṇi pratyaṅgulī nābhau kaṇṭhe vā māruta ardite

original: satikṣepaṃ nigṛhṇāti gṛdhrasīṃ tāṃ pracakṣate // GarP_1,166.51 //
analyzed: sati kṣepam nigṛhṇāti gṛdhrasīm tām pracakṣate

original: hṛṣyete caraṇau yasya bhavetāṃ cāpi suptakau /
analyzed: hṛṣyete caraṇau yasya bhavetām ca api suptakau
pādaharṣaḥ sa vijñeyaḥ kapha māruta kopa jaḥ
pādayoḥ kurute dāham pitta asṛj sahitaḥ nilaḥ
viśeṣataḥ caṅkramataḥ pādadāham tam ādiśet

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vātavyādhinidānaṃ nāma ṣaṭūṣaṣṭyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe vātavyādhinidānam nāma ṣaṭūṣaṣṭyadhikaśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
dhanvantarīḥ uvāca
vātarakta nidānam te vakṣye suśruta tat śṛṇu
viruddha adhyaśana krodha divāsvapna prajāgaraiḥ
prāyaśas su kumārāṇām mithyā āhāra vihāriṇām

original: sthūlānāṃ sukhināṃ cāpi kupyate vātaśoṇitam // GarP_1,167.2 //
analyzed: sthūlānām sukhinām ca api kupyate vāta śoṇitam
agni ghātāt aśuddheḥ ca nṛṇām asṛji dūṣite
vātalaiḥ śītalaiḥ vāyuḥ vṛddhaḥ kruddhaḥ vimārga gaḥ
tādṛśā eva asṛjā ruddhaḥ prāk tadā eva pradūṣayet

original: tathā vāto gude pīḍāṃ balāsaṃ vātaśoṇitam // GarP_1,167.4 //
analyzed: tathā vātaḥ gude pīḍām balāsam vātaśoṇitam
saṃstabhya janayet pūrvam paścāt sarvatra dhāvati
viśeṣāt vamana ādyaiḥ ca pralambaḥ tasya lakṣaṇam
bhaviṣyataḥ kuṣṭha samam tathā sa ambuda saṃjñakam
jānu jaṅghā ūru kaṭi aṃsa hasta pāda aṅga sandhiṣu
kaṇḍū sphuraṇa nistoda bheda gaurava supta tāḥ

original: bhūtvā bhūtvā praśāmyanti muhurāvirbhavanti ca // GarP_1,167.7 //
analyzed: bhūtvā bhūtvā praśāmyanti muhur āvirbhavanti ca
pādayoḥ mūlam āsthāya kadācid hastayoḥ api

original: ākhoriva vilaṃ kruddhaḥ kṛtsnaṃ dehaṃ bidhāvati // GarP_1,167.8 //
analyzed: ākhoḥ iva vilam kruddhaḥ kṛtsnam deham bidhāvati
tat pūrvam jāyate tatas
kāla antareṇa gambhīram sarva dhātūn abhidravet
kaṭi ādi saṃyata sthāne tvac tāmra śyāva lohitāḥ
śvayathuḥ grathitaḥ pākaḥ sa vāyuḥ ca asthi majjasu
chindan iva carati antar cakīkurvan ca vegavān

original: karoti khañjaṃ paṅguṃ vā śarīraṃ sarvataścaran // GarP_1,167.11 //
analyzed: karoti khañjam paṅgum vā śarīram sarvatas caran
vāta adhike dhikam tatra śūla sphuraṇa bhañjanam
śothasya raukṣyam kṛṣṇa tvam śyāva tā vṛddhi hānayaḥ
dhamani aṅguli sandhīnām saṃkoca uṅga grahaḥ ti ruj
śīta dveṣa anupaśayau stambha vepathu suptayaḥ
rakte
snigdha rūkṣaiḥ samam na eti kaṇḍu kleda samanvitaḥ

original: pitte vidāhaḥ saṃmohaḥ svādo mūrchā madastṛṣā /
analyzed: pitte vidāhaḥ saṃmohaḥ svādaḥ mūrchā madaḥ tṛṣā

original: sparśāsahatvaṃ rugrāvaḥ śoṣaḥ pāko bhṛśoṣmatā // GarP_1,167.15 //
analyzed: sparśa asaha tvam ruj rāvaḥ śoṣaḥ pākaḥ bhṛśa ūṣma tā
kaphe staimitya guru tā supti snigdha tva śīta tā

original: kaṇḍūrmandā ca rugdbandvaṃ sarvaliṅgañca saṃkarāt // GarP_1,167.16 //
analyzed: kaṇḍūḥ mandā ca ruj dbandvam sarva liṅgam ca saṃkarāt
eka doṣam ca saṃsādhyam yāpyam ca eva dvi doṣa jam
tridoṣa jan tyajet āśu raktapittam su dāruṇam
raktam aṅge nihanti āśu śākhā sandhiṣu mārutaḥ
niveśya anyonyam āvārya vedanābhiḥ harati asūn
vāyau pañca ātmake prāṇe raukṣyāt cāpalya laṅghanaiḥ
ati āhāra abhighātāt ca vega udīraṇa cāraṇaiḥ
kupitaḥ cakṣuḥ ādīnām upaghātam prakalpayet
pīnasaḥ dāha tṛṣ kāsa śvāsa ādiḥ ca eva jāyate
kuryāt ca galagaṇḍa dīn tad jatrum ūrdhva saṃśrayaḥ
vyāna u ti gamana snāna krīḍā viṣaya coṣṭitaiḥ
viruddha rūkṣa bhī harṣa viṣāda ādyaiḥ ca dūṣitaḥ
puṃstva utsāha bala bhraṃśa śoka citta plava jvarān
sarva ākāra ādi nistoda roma harṣam suṣupta tām
kuṣṭham visarpam anyat ca kuryāt sarva aṅga sādanam
samānaḥ viṣama ajīrṇa śīta saṅkīrṇa bhojanaiḥ
karoti akāla śayana jāgara ādyaiḥ ca dūṣitaḥ
śūla gulma grahaṇī ādīn yakṛt kāma āśrayān gadān
apānaḥ rūkṣa guru anna vega āghāta ati vāhanaiḥ
yāna pāna samutthāna caṅkramaiḥ ca atisevitaiḥ
kupitaḥ kurute rogān kṛtsnān pakvāśaya āśrayān
mūtra sukra pradoṣa arśaḥ gudabhraṃśa ādikān bahūn
sarva aṅgam ātatam sāmam tandrā staimitya gauravaiḥ
snigdha tvāt bodha kālasya śaitya śotha agni hānayaḥ
kaṇḍū rūkṣa ati nāśena tadvidha upaśamena ca

original: muktiṃ vidyānnirāmaṃ taṃ tandrādīnāṃ viparyayāt // GarP_1,167.29 //
analyzed: muktim vidyāt nirāmam tam tandrā ādīnām viparyayāt
vāyoḥ āvaraṇam vātaḥ bahu bhedam pracakṣate
pitta liṅga āvṛte dāhaḥ tṛṣṇā śūlam bhramaḥ tamaḥ
kaṭuka uṣṇa amla lavaṇaiḥ vidāha śīta kāma tā
śaitya gaurava śūla agni kaṭu ājya payasaḥ dhikam
laṅghana āyāsa rūkṣa uṣṇa kāma tā ca kapha āvṛte
kapha āvṛte ṅgamardaḥ syāt hṛllāsaḥ gurutā aruciḥ
rakta vṛte sa dāha ārtiḥ tavak māṃsa āśraya jā bhṛśam
bhavet sa rāgaḥ śvayathuḥ jāyante maṇḍalāni ca
śothaḥ māṃsena kaṭhinaḥ hṛllāsa piṭikāḥ tathā

original: harṣaḥ pipīlikānāṃ ca saṃcāra iva jāyate /
analyzed: harṣaḥ pipīlikānām ca saṃcāraḥ iva jāyate

original: calalagrano mṛduḥ śītaḥ śotho gātreṣu rocakaḥ // GarP_1,167.34 //
analyzed: mṛduḥ śītaḥ śothaḥ gātreṣu rocakaḥ

original: āḍhyavāta iva jñeyaḥ sa kṛcchro medasāvataḥ /
analyzed: āḍhyavātaḥ iva jñeyaḥ sa kṛcchraḥ medasāvataḥ
sparśaḥ ācchādita iti uṣṇa śītalaḥ ca tu anāvṛte

original: majjāvṛte tu viṣamaṃ jṛmbhaṇaṃ pariveṣṭanam // GarP_1,167.35 //
analyzed: majja āvṛte tu viṣamam jṛmbhaṇam pariveṣṭanam
śūlam ca paḍyimānaḥ ca pāṇibhyām labhate sukham

original: śukrāvṛte tu śothe vai cātivego na vidyate // GarP_1,167.36 //
analyzed: śukra āvṛte tu śothe vai ca ativegaḥ na vidyate

original: bhukte kukṣau rujā jīrṇe nikṛttirbhavati dhruvam /
analyzed: bhukte kukṣau rujā jīrṇe dhruvam
mūtra apravṛttiḥ ādhmānam vasteḥ mūtra āvṛte bhavet
chidra āvṛte sva sthānam

original: patatyāśu jvarākrānto mūrchāṃ ca labhate naraḥ // GarP_1,167.38 //
analyzed: patati āśu jvara ākrāntaḥ mūrchām ca labhate naraḥ
sakṛt pīḍitam anyena duṣṭam śukram cirāt sṛjet
sarva dhātu āvṛte vāyau śroṇi vaṅkṣaṇa pṛṣṭha ruj
vilome mārute ca eva hṛdayam paripīḍyate

original: bhramo mūrchā rujā dāhaḥ pittena prāṇa āvṛte // GarP_1,167.40 //
analyzed: bhramaḥ mūrchā rujā dāhaḥ pittena prāṇe āvṛte

original: rujā tandrā svarabhraṃśo dāho vyāne tu sarvaśaḥ /
analyzed: rujā tandrā svara bhraṃśaḥ dāhaḥ vyāne tu sarvaśas
santāpaḥ saha vedanaḥ
samānaḥ ūṣma upahatiḥ sa sveda uparatiḥ su tṛṣ

original: dāhaśca syādapāne tu male hāridravarṇatā // GarP_1,167.42 //
analyzed: dāhaḥ ca syāt apāne tu male hāridra varṇa tā
rajaḥ vṛddhiḥ tāpanam ca tathā ca ānāha mehanam

original: śleṣmaṇā prāvṛte prāṇe nādaḥ snoto 'varodhanam // GarP_1,167.43 //
analyzed: śleṣmaṇā prāvṛte prāṇe nādaḥ snotaḥ varodhanam
ṣṭhīvanam ca eva śvāsa saṃgrahaḥ
udāne guru gātra tvam aruciḥ vāc svara grahaḥ
bala varṇa praṇāśaḥ ca pāne parva asthi saṃgrahaḥ
guru tā aṅgeṣu sarveṣu sthūla tvañca āgatam bhṛśam
samāne ti kriyā jña tvam asvedaḥ manda vahni tā

original: apāne sakalaṃ mūtraṃ śakṛtaḥ syātpravartanam? // GarP_1,167.46 //
analyzed: apāne sakalam mūtram śakṛtaḥ syāt pravartanam
iti dvāviṃśatividham vātarakta āmayam viduḥ
prāṇa ādayaḥ tathā anyaḥ samākrāntāḥ yathākramam
sarve viṃśatividham vidyāt āvaraṇañca yat
hṛllāsa ucchvāsa saṃrodhaḥ pratiśyāyaḥ śiraḥ grahaḥ
hṛd rogaḥ mukha śoṣaḥ ca prāṇena apāne āvṛte
udānena āvṛte prāṇe bala saṃkṣayaḥ
vicāraṇena vibhajet sarvam āvaraṇam bhiṣak

original: sthānānyapekṣya vātānāṃ vṛrdhihāniṃ ca karmaṇām // GarP_1,167.50 //
analyzed: sthānāni apekṣya vātānām vṛrdhi hānim ca karmaṇām
prāṇa ādīnām ca pañcānām pittam āvaraṇam mithas
pitta ādīnām āvasatiḥ miśrāṇām miśritaiḥ ca taiḥ
miśraiḥ pitta ādibhiḥ tadvat miśrāṇi api tu anekadhā
tān lakṣayet avahitaḥ yathāsvam lakṣaṇa udayāt
śanais śanais ca upaśayān dṛḍhān api muhur muhur
viśeṣāt jīvitam prāṇaḥ udānaḥ balam ucyate
syāt tayoḥ balasya ca
āvṛtāḥ vāyavaḥ jñātāḥ jñātāḥ vā sthāna vicyutāḥ
prayatnena api dus sādhyāḥ bhaveyuḥ vā anupadravāḥ
vidradhi plīha hṛd roga gulma agni sadana ādayaḥ
bhavanti upadravāḥ teṣām āvṛtānām upekṣayā
nidānam suśruta
mayā ātreya uktam samīritam
sarva roga vivekāya nara ādi āyuḥ pravṛddhaye
evam vijñāya roga ādīn cikitsām atha vai caret
sa vyoṣā triphalā vā api sarva roga pramardinī
śatāvarī guḍūcī agni viḍaṅgena yutā athavā

original: punarnavā ca bṛhatī nirguṇḍī nimbapatrakam // GarP_1,167.59 //
analyzed: ca
bhāvitā triphalā sapta vāram ekham atha api vā
pūrva uktaḥ ca yathā lābha yuktaiḥ cūrṇam ca modakaḥ
vaṭikā ghṛta tailam vā śoṣa roga nud

original: palaṃ palārdhakaṃ vāpi karṣaṃ karṣārdhameva vā // GarP_1,167.61 //
analyzed: palam pala ardhakam vā api karṣam karṣa ardham eva vā

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vātaraktani saptaṣaṣṭyādhikaśatatamodhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe saptaṣaṣṭyādhikaśatatamaḥ adhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
nidānam samāptam
dhanvantariḥ uvāca
sarva roga haram siddham yogasāram vadāmi aham
śṛṇu suśrutam saṃkṣepāt prāṇinām jīva hetave
kaṣāya kaṭu tikta amla rūkṣa āhāra ādi bhojanāt
cintā vyavaya vyāyāma bhaya śoka prajāgarāt
uccais bhāṣā ati bhārāt ca karma yoga atikarṣaṇāt

original: vāyuḥ kupyati parjanye jīrṇānne dinasaṃkṣaye // GarP_1,168.3 //
analyzed: vāyuḥ kupyati parjanye jīrṇa anne dina saṃkṣaye
uṣṇa amla lavaṇa kṣāra kaṭuka ajīrṇa bhojanāt
tīkṣṇa ātapa agni santāpa madya krodha niṣevaṇāt
vidāha kāle bhuktasya madhyāhne jalada atyaye
grīṣma kāla īrddharātre pi pittam kupyati dehinaḥ
svādu amla lavaṇa snigdha guru śīta ati bhojanāt
nava anna picchila ānūpa māṃsa ādeḥ sevanāt api
a vyāyāma divāsvapna śayyā āsana sukha ādibhiḥ

original: kaphapradoṣo bhukte ca vasante ca prakupyati // GarP_1,168.7 //
analyzed: kapha pradoṣaḥ bhukte ca vasante ca prakupyati
deha pāruṣya saṃkoca toda viṣṭambhaka ādayaḥ
tathā ca suptā romaharṣa stambhana śoṣaṇam
śyāma tvam aṅga viśleṣa balam āyāsa vardhanam

original: vāyorliṅgāni tairyuktaṃ rogaṃ vātātmakaṃ vadet // GarP_1,168.9 //
analyzed: vāyoḥ liṅgāni taiḥ yuktam rogam vāta ātmakam vadet
dāha ūṣma pāda saṃkledaka uparāga pariśramāḥ
kaṭu amla śava vaigandhya sveda mūrchā ati tṛṣ bhramāḥ
hāridram harita tvam ca pitta liṅga anvitaiḥ naraḥ
dehe snigdha tva mādhurya cirakāri tva bandhanam
staimitya tṛpti saṅghāta śotha śatila gauravam
kaṇḍū nidrā abhiyogaḥ ca lakṣaṇam kapha sambhavam
hetu lakṣaṇa saṃsargāt vidyāt vyādhim dvi doṣa jam
sarva hetu samutpannam tri liṅgam sānnipātikam
doṣa dhātu mala ādhāraḥ dehinām dehaḥ ucyate
teṣām sama tvam ārogyam kṣaya vṛddheḥ viparyayaḥ
vasā asṛk māṃsa medaḥ sthi majjā śukrāṇi dhātavaḥ

original: vātapittakaphā doṣā viṇmūtrādyā malāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,168.15 //
analyzed: vāta pitta kaphāḥ doṣāḥ viṣ mūtra ādyāḥ malāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: vāyuḥ śīto laghuḥ sūkṣmaḥ svaranāśīsthiro balī /
analyzed: vāyuḥ śītaḥ laghuḥ sūkṣmaḥ svara nāśī sthiraḥ balī
pittam amla kaṭu uṣṇam ca apaṅktiḥ roga kāraṇam
madhuraḥ lavaṇaḥ snigdhaḥ guruḥ śleṣamā ati picchilaḥ
guda śroṇi āśrayaḥ vāyuḥ pittam pakvāśaya sthitam
kaphasya āmāśaya sthānam kaṇṭhaḥ vā mūrdha sandhayaḥ
kaṭu tikta kaṣāyāḥ ca kopayanti samīraṇam
kaṭu amla lavaṇāḥ pittam svādu uṣṇa lavaṇāḥ kapham
ete eva viparyastāḥ śamāya eṣām prayojitāḥ

original: bhavanti rogiṇāṃ śāntyai svasthāne sukhahetavaḥ // GarP_1,168.19 //
analyzed: bhavanti rogiṇām śāntyai sva sthāne sukha hetavaḥ
amla uttaraḥ manaḥ hṛdyam tathā dīpana pācanam
dīpanaḥ jvara tṛṣṇā ghnaḥ tiktaḥ śodhana śoṣaṇaḥ

original: pittalo lekhana stambhī kaṣāyo grāhiśoṣaṇaḥ // GarP_1,168.21 //

analyzed: rasa vīrya vipākānām āśrayam dravyam uttamam
rasa pāka antara sthāyi sarva dravya āśrayam drutam
śīta uṣṇam lavaṇam vīryam atha vā śaktiḥ iṣyate

original: rasānāṃ dvividhaḥ pāko kaṭureva ca // GarP_1,168.23 //
analyzed: rasānām dvividhaḥ kaṭuḥ eva ca
bhiṣaj bheṣaja roga ārta paricāraka sampadaḥ
cikitsā aṅgāni catvāri viparītāni asiddhaye
deśa kāla vayaḥ vahni sāmya prakṛti bheṣajam
deha sattva bala vyādhīn buddhvā karma samācaret
bahu udaka nagaḥ nūpaḥ kapha māruta kopavān
para śākhī ca rakta pitta gada uttaraḥ
saṃsṛṣṭa lakṣaṇa upetaḥ deśaḥ sādhāraṇaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: bāla ā ṣoḍaśānmadhyaḥ saptatervṛddha ucyate // GarP_1,168.26 //
analyzed: bālaḥ ṣoḍaśāt madhyaḥ saptateḥ vṛddhaḥ ucyate
kapha pitta anilāḥ prāyas yathākramam udīritāḥ
kṣāra agni śastra rahitā kṣīṇe pravayasi kriyāḥ
kṛśasya vṛṃhaṇam kāryam sthūla dehasya karṣaṇam
rakṣaṇam madhya kāyasya deha bhedāḥ trayaḥ matāḥ
sthairya vyāyāma santoṣaiḥ boddhavyam yatnataḥ balam
avikārī mahā utsāhaḥ mahā sāhasikaḥ naraḥ
pāna āhāra ādayaḥ yasya viruddhāḥ prakṛteḥ api
śva sukhāya upakalpyante tat sāmyam iti kathyate
garbhiṇyāḥ ślaiṣmikaiḥ bhakṣyaiḥ ślaiṣmikaḥ jāyate naraḥ
vātalaiḥ pittalaiḥ tadvat sama dhātuḥ hita aśanāt
kṛśaḥ rūkṣaḥ lpa keśaḥ ca cala cittaḥ naraḥ sthitaḥ
bahu vākya rataḥ svapnevāta prakṛtikaḥ naraḥ
akāla palitaḥ gauraḥ prasvedī kopanaḥ budhaḥ
svapne dīptimat prekṣī pitta prakṛtiḥ ucyate
sthira cittaḥ svaraḥ sūkṣmaḥ prasannaḥ snigdha mūrdhajaḥ

original: svapne jalaśilālokī śleṣma prakṛtiko naraḥ // GarP_1,168.34 //
analyzed: svapne jala śilā ālokī śleṣma prakṛtikaḥ naraḥ
saṃmiśra lakṣaṇaiḥ jñeyaḥ dvi tri doṣa anvayaḥ naraḥ
doṣasya itara sadbhāve pi adhikā prakṛtiḥ smṛtāḥ
mandaḥ tīkṣṇaḥ viṣamaḥ samaḥ ca eti caturvidhāḥ
kapha pitta anila ādhikyāt tad sāmyāt jāṭharaḥ nalaḥ
samasya pālanam kāryam viṣame vāta nigrahaḥ
tīkṣṇe pitta pratīkāraḥ mande śleṣma viśodhanam
prabhavaḥ sarva rogāṇām ajīrṇam ca agni nāśanam
āma amla rasa viṣṭambha lakṣaṇam tat caturvidham
āmāt viṣūcikā ca eva hṛd ālasya ādayaḥ tathā
vacā lavaṇa toyena chardanam tatra kārayet
śukra abhāvaḥ bhramaḥ mūrchā tarṣaḥ mlāt saṃpravartate
apakvam tatra śīta ambu pānam vāta niṣevaṇam
gātra bhaṅgam śiraḥ jāḍyam bhakta doṣa ādayaḥ gadān

original: tasminsvāpo divā kāryolaṅghanaṃ ca vivarjanam // GarP_1,168.41 //
analyzed: tasmin svāpaḥ divā kāryaḥ laṅghanam ca vivarjanam
śūla gulmau ca viṣ mūtra sthāna viṣṭambha sūcakau

original: vidheyaṃ svedanaṃ tatra pānīyaṃ lavaṇodakam // GarP_1,168.42 //
analyzed: vidheyam svedanam tatra pānīyam lavaṇa udakam
āmam amlam ca viṣṭabdham kapha pitta anilaiḥ kramāt
ālipya jaṭharam prājñaḥ hiṅgu tryūṣaṇa saindhavaiḥ
divāsvapnam prakurvīta sarva ajīrṇa vināśanam
ahita annaiḥ roga rāśiḥ ahita annam tatas tyajet

original: uṣṇāmbu vānupānaṃ ca mākṣikaiḥ pācanaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: uṣṇa ambu vā anupānam ca mākṣikaiḥ pācanam bhavet
karīra dadhi matsyaiḥ ca prāyas kṣīram virudhyate

original: bilvaḥ śoṇā ca gambhārī pāṭalā gaṇikārikā /
analyzed: ca
dīpanam kapha vāta ghnam pañcamūlam idam mahat
śālaparṇo pṛśriparṇaḥ bṛhatī dvaya gokṣuram
ubhayam daśa sūlam syāt sannipāta jvara apaham

original: kāse śvāse ca tandrāyāṃ pārśvaśūle ca śasyate // GarP_1,168.48 //
analyzed: kāse śvāse ca tandrāyām pārśva śūle ca śasyate
etaiḥ tailāni pralepāt alakām jayet
kvāthāt caturguṇam vāri pāda stham syāt caturguṇam
sneham ca tad samam kṣīram kalkaḥ ca sneha pādakaḥ
saṃvartita auṣadhaiḥ pākaḥ vastau pāne bhavet samaḥ
kharaḥ bhyaṅge mṛduḥ nasye saṃprakalpayet
sthūla deha indriyāḥ cintyā prakṛtiḥ yā tu adhiṣṭhitā
ārogyam iti tam vidyāt āyuṣmantam upācaret
yaḥ gṛhṇāti indriyaiḥ arthān viparītān sa mṛtyu bhāj
bhiṣaj mitra guru dveṣī priya arātiḥ ca yaḥ bhavet
gulpha jānu lalāṭam ca hanuḥ gaṇḍaḥ tathā eva ca

original: bhraṣṭaṃ sthānacyutaṃ yasya sa jahātyacirādasūn // GarP_1,168.53 //
analyzed: bhraṣṭam sthāna cyutam yasya sa jahāti acirāt asūn
vāma akṣi majjanam jihvā śyāmā nāsā vikāriṇī

original: kṛṣṇau sthānacyutau coṣṭhau kṛṣṇāsyaṃ yasyataṃ tyajet // GarP_1,168.54 //
analyzed: kṛṣṇau sthāna cyutau ca uṣṭhau kṛṣṇa āsyam tyajet

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vaidyakaśāstraparibhāṣā nāmāṣṭaṣaṣṭyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe vaidyakaśāstraparibhāṣā nāma aṣṭaṣaṣṭyadhikaśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
dhanvantariḥ uvāca
hita ahita vikekāya anupāna vidhim bruve
śīttaḥ guruḥ tridoṣa ghnaḥ prāyaśas gaura ṣaṣṭikaḥ
tadvat priyaṅgu nīvāra koradūṣāḥ prakīrtitāḥ

original: vṛṣyaḥ śīto guruḥ svādurgodhūmo vātanāśanaḥ // GarP_1,169.4 //
analyzed: vṛṣyaḥ śītaḥ guruḥ svāduḥ godhūmaḥ vāta nāśanaḥ
kapha pitta astra jit mudgaḥ kaṣāyaḥ madhuraḥ laghuḥ

original: māṣo bahubalo vṛṣyaḥ pittaśleṣmaharo guruḥ // GarP_1,169.5 //

analyzed: śītaḥ grāhī makuṣṭhakaḥ
masūraḥ madhuraḥ saṃgrahī kapha pitta hā
tadvat sarva guṇa āḍhyaḥ ca kalāyaḥ ca ati vātalaḥ

original: āgkī kaphapittaghno śukralā ca tathā smṛtā /
analyzed: kapha pitta ghnā śukralā ca tathā smṛtā

original: atasī pittalā jñeyā siddhārthaḥ kaphavātajit // GarP_1,169.9 //
analyzed: atasī pittalā jñeyā siddhārthaḥ kapha vāta jit

original: balaghnā rūkṣalāḥ śītā vividhāḥ sasyajātayaḥ // GarP_1,169.10 //
analyzed: bala ghnāḥ rūkṣalāḥ śītāḥ vividhāḥ sasya jātayaḥ
citraka iṅguda nālīkāḥ pippalī madhuśigravaḥ
tadvat eva ca kausmasumbham rājikā vāta pittalā
doṣa ghnam padmapatram ca tripuṭam vāta kṛt param

original: sakṣāraḥ sarvadoṣaghno vāstuko rocanaḥ paraḥ // GarP_1,169.15 //

analyzed: taṇḍukīyovipa haraḥ pālaṅkyāḥ ca tathā apare
mūlakam doṣa kṛt śāmam svinnam vāta kapha āpadam
sarva doṣa haram hi adyam kaṇṭhyam tat pakvam iṣyate
karkoṭakam sa vārtākam kāravellakam
sarva doṣa haram hṛdyam kūṣmāṇḍam basti śodhanam
trapuṣa urvāruke vāta śleṣmale pitta vāraṇe

original: vātaghnaṃ dāḍimaṃ grāhi nāgaraṅgaphalaṃ guru // GarP_1,169.20 //

analyzed: keśaram mātuluṅgam ca dīpanam kapha vāta nud
saram āmalakam vṛṣyam madhuram hṛdyam amla kṛt
bhukta prarocakā puṇyā harītakī amṛta upamā
straṃsanī kapha vāta ghnī hi akṣaḥ tadvat tridoṣa jit

original: kapitthaṃ grāhi doṣaghnaṃ pakvaṃ guru viṣāpaham /

analyzed: pakva āmram vāta kṛt māṃsa śukra varṇa bala pradam

original: vātaghnaṃ kaphapittaghnaṃ grāhi viṣṭambhi jāmbavam // GarP_1,169.26 //
analyzed: vāta ghnam kapha pitta ghnam grāhi viṣṭambhi jāmbavam

original: viṣṭambhi vātalaṃ bilvaṃ priyālaṃ pavanāpaham // GarP_1,169.27 //
analyzed: viṣṭambhi vātalam bilvam priyālam pavana apaham
śukra māṃsa karāṇi āhuḥ svādu snigdha gurūṇi ca

original: māgadhī madhurā pakvā śvāsapittaharā parā // GarP_1,169.29 //
analyzed: māgadhī madhurā pakvā śvāsa pitta harā parā
ārdrakam rocakam vṛṣyam dīpanam kapha vāta hṛt
śuṇṭhī marica pippalyaḥ kapha vāta jitaḥ matāḥ
avṛṣyam maricam vidyāt iti vaidyaka saṃmatam

original: cakṣuṣyaṃ saindhavaṃ vṛṣyaṃ tridoṣaśamanaṃ smṛtam // GarP_1,169.32 //
analyzed: cakṣuṣyam saindhavam vṛṣyam tridoṣa śamanam smṛtam
sauvarcalam vibandha ghnam uṣṇam hṛd śūla nāśanam

original: uṣṇaṃ śūlaharaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ viḍaṅgaṃ vātanāśanam // GarP_1,169.33 //
analyzed: uṣṇam śūla haram tīkṣṇam viḍaṅgam vāta nāśanam

original: romakaṃ vātalaṃ svādu rocanaṃ kledanaṃ guru /
analyzed: romakam vātalam svādu rocanam kledanam guru

original: doṣaghnaṃ nābhasaṃ vārilaghu hṛdyaṃ viṣāpaham // GarP_1,169.35 //
analyzed: doṣa ghnam nābhasam vāri laghu hṛdyam viṣa apaham

original: nādeyaṃ vātalaṃ rūkṣaṃ sārasaṃ madura laghu /
analyzed: nādeyam vātalam rūkṣam sārasam madura laghu

original: vātaśleṣmaharaṃ vārpyaṃ tāḍāgaṃ vātalaṃ smṛtam // GarP_1,169.36 //

analyzed: raucyam agni karam rūkṣam kapha ghnam laghu nairjharam
dīpanam pittalam kaupama audbhidam pitta nāśanam
divā arka kiraṇaiḥ juṣṭam rātrau ca eva indu raśmibhiḥ
sarva doṣa vinirmuktam tat tulyam gaganāmbunā
uṣṇam vāri jvara śvāsa medaḥ nila kapha apaham
śṛtam śīta tridoṣa ghnam uṣitam tat ca doṣalam
gavyāt gurutaram snigdham māhiḥ vahni nāśanam

original: cakṣuṣyaṃ jīvanaṃ strīṇāṃ raktapitte canāvanam // GarP_1,169.41 //
analyzed: cakṣuṣyam jīvanam strīṇām raktapitte ca nāvanam
param vāta haram vṛṣyam pitta śleṣma karam dadhi
grahaṇi arśaḥ ṛdita ārti ghnam navanītam navoddhṛtam
vikārāḥ ca kilāṭa ādyāḥ guravaḥ kuṣṭha hetavaḥ
tridoṣa śamanam takram kathitam pūrva sūribhiḥ
vṛṣyam ca madhuram sarpiḥ vāta pitta kapha apaham

original: gavyaṃ medhyañca cākṣuṣyaṃ saṃskārācca tridoṣajit // GarP_1,169.45 //
analyzed: gavyam medhyam ca cākṣuṣyam saṃskārāt ca tridoṣa jit
apasmāra gada unmāda mūrchā ghnam saṃskṛtam ghṛtam
aja ādīnām ca vidyāt go kṣīra sat guṇaiḥ
pāṇḍu tva udara kuṣṭha arśaḥ śotha gulma prameha nud

original: vātaśleṣmaharaṃ balyaṃ tailaṃ kaśyaṃ tilodbhavam // GarP_1,169.47 //

analyzed: kṣaumam tailam acakṣuṣyam pitta hṛt vāta nāśanam

original: tridoṣaghnaṃ madhu proktaṃ vātalañca prakīrtitam // GarP_1,169.49 //
analyzed: tridoṣa ghnam madhu proktam vātalañca prakīrtitam
hikkā śvāsa kṛmi chardi meha tṛṣṇā viṣām aham
ikṣavaḥ raktapitta ghnaḥ balyāḥ vṛṣyāḥ kapha pradāḥ

original: phāṇitaṃ pittalaṃ tavriṃ surā matsyaṇḍikā laghuḥ /
khaṇḍaṃ vṛṣyaṃ tathā snigdhaṃ svādvasṛkpittavātajit // GarP_1,169.51 //
sa pittaghnaḥ paraḥ pathyaḥ purāṇo 'sṛkprasādanaḥ // GarP_1,169.52 //
analyzed: sa pitta ghnaḥ paraḥ pathyaḥ purāṇaḥ sṛj prasādanaḥ
sarva pitta karam madyam amla tvāt kapha vāta jit
rakta pitta karāḥ tīkṣṇāḥ tathā sauvīra jātayaḥ

original: pācano dīpanaḥ pathyo maṇḍaḥ syādbhṛṣṭataṇḍulaḥ // GarP_1,169.54 //

analyzed: vāta anulomanī laghvī peyā vasti viśodhanī
inti iyam su kṛtā peyā sa pravāhikāḥ
pāyasaḥ kapha kṛt balyaḥ kṛśarā vāta nāśinī
su dhautaḥ prastrutaḥ snigdhaḥ sukha uṣṇaḥ laghu rocanaḥ
īṣat uṣṇa sevanāt ca laghuḥ sūpaḥ su sādhitaḥ

original: svinna niṣpīḍitaṃ śākaṃ hitaṃ snehādisaṃskṛtam // GarP_1,169.58 //
analyzed: svinna niṣpīḍitam śākam hitam sneha ādi saṃskṛtam
dāḍima āmalakaiḥ yūṣaḥ vahni kṛt vāta pitta hā
śvāsa kāsa pratiśyāya kapha ghnaḥ malakaiḥ kṛtaḥ
yava kola kulatthānām yūṣaḥ kaṇṭhyaḥ nila apahaḥ
sa guḍam dadhi vāta ghnam saktavaḥ rūkṣa vātulāḥ

original: ghṛtapūrṇo 'gnikārī syādvṛṣyā gurvo ca śaṣkulī // GarP_1,169.61 //
analyzed: ghṛtapūrṇaḥ gnikārī syāt vṛṣyā ca śaṣkulī

original: bṛṃhaṇāḥ sāmiṣā bhakṣyapiṣṭa kā gukhaḥ smṛtāḥ /
analyzed: bṛṃhaṇāḥ sa āmiṣāḥ smṛtāḥ
taila siddhāḥ ca dṛṣṭi ghnāḥ toya svinnāḥ ca durjarāḥ

original: atyuṣṇā maṇḍakāḥ pathyāḥ śītalā gukho matāḥ /
analyzed: ati uṣṇāḥ maṇḍakāḥ pathyāḥ śītalāḥ matāḥ
anupānam ca pānīyam śrama tṛṣṇā ādi nāśanam
anna pāna ādinā rakṣā kṛt syāt roga varjitaḥ
anuṣṇaḥ śikhi kaṇṭha ābhaḥ viṣam ca eva vivarṇa kṛt
gandha sparśa rasāḥ tīvrāḥ abhoktuḥ ca syāt manaḥ vyathā
āghrāṇe ca akṣi rogaḥ syāt asādhyaḥ ca bhiṣaj varaiḥ
vepathuḥ jṛmbhaṇa ādyam syāt viṣasya etat tu lakṣaṇam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe anupānādividhikathanaṃ nāmaikonasaptatyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe anupānādividhikathanam nāma ekonasaptatyadhikaśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
dhanvantariḥ uvāca
jvaraḥ ṣṭadhā pṛthak dvandva saṃghāta āgantu jaḥ smṛtaḥ
nāgaram devakāṣṭham ca dhānyākam bṛhatī dvayam
dadyāt pācanakam pūrvam jvaritāya jvara apaham

original: kaṣāyaḥ pācanaḥ sāme saśūle ca jvarehitaḥ // GarP_1,170.3 //
analyzed: kaṣāyaḥ pācanaḥ sa āme sa śūle ca jvara īhitaḥ
madhūka sāra sindhūttha vacā ūṣaṇa kaṇāḥ samāḥ
ślakṣṇam piṣṭvā ambhasā nasyam kuryāt saṃjñā prabodhanam
trivṛt viśālā triphalā kaṭukā āragvadhaiḥ kṛtaḥ

original: sakṣāro bhedanaḥ kvāthaḥ peyaḥ sarvajvarāpahaḥ // GarP_1,170.5 //

analyzed: kvāthaḥ tṛtīyakam hanti śarkarā madhu yojitaḥ
apāmaga jaṭā kaṭyām lohitaiḥ sapta tantubhiḥ

original: baddhvā vāre ravernūnaṃ jvaraṃ hanti tṛtīyakam // GarP_1,170.7 //
analyzed: baddhvā vāre raveḥ nūnam jvaram hanti tṛtīyakam
gaṅgāyāḥ uttare kūle aputraḥ tāpasaḥ mṛtaḥ
tasmai tila udakam dadyāt muñcati aikāhikaḥ jvaraḥ
guḍūcyāḥ kvātha kalkābhyām viphalā vāsakasya ca

original: mṛdvīkāyā balāyāśca siddhāḥ snehā jvaracchidaḥ // GarP_1,170.9 //
analyzed: mṛdvīkāyāḥ balāyāḥ ca siddhāḥ snehāḥ jvara chidaḥ
jvara atisāra haraṇam auṣadham pravadāmi atha
jyanti āmam atīsāram sa jvaram sa mahauṣadhāḥ
mustā parpaṭaka divyaśṛṅga vera śṛtam payaḥ
śālaparṇo pṛśriparṇaḥ bṛhatī kaṇṭakārikā
etat āhāra saṃyoge hitam sarva atisāriṇām
bilva cūta asthi kvāthaḥ ca khaṇḍam madhu atisāra nud
atisāre hitā tadvat kuṭaja tvac kaṇā yutā
prayuktaḥ ca āma śūla āḍhye hi atīsāre sa śoṇita
cikitsā atha
citrakā kvātha klakābhyām grahaṇī ghnam kṣṛtam haviḥ
sauvarcalam saindhavam ca viḍaṅga audbhidam eva ca
sāmudreṇa samam pañcalavaṇāni atra yojayet
bheṣajam śastra kṣāra agnyaḥ tridhā vai ca arśasām haram

original: viddhi taccārśasoghnantu yaddhi takraṃ navoddhṛtam // GarP_1,170.19 //
analyzed: viddhi tat ca arśasā ghnantu yat hi takram nava uddhṛtam
guḍūṭīm pippalī yuktām abhayām ghṛta bharjitām
trivṛt arśaḥ vināśa artham bhakṣayet amla loṇikām
tila ikṣu rasa saṃyogaḥ ca arśaḥ kuṣṭha vināśanaḥ
pañcakolam sa maricam sa tryūṣaṇam atha agni kṛt
harītakī bhakṣyamāṇā guḍena vā
saindhava upahitā vā api sātatyena agni dīpanī
kvāthaḥ kṣaudra yutaḥ hanyāt pāṇḍu rogam sa kāmalam

original: trivṛcca triphalā śyāmā pippalī śarkaga madhu /
analyzed: trivṛt ca triphalā śyāmā pippalī madhu
vāsāyām vidyamānāyām āśāyām jīvitasya ca
raktapittī kṣayī kāsī kimartham avasīdati
pītam kṣīram ca madhu āḍhyam pṛthak śoṇita vāraṇam
sa mūla phala patrāyāḥ nirguṇḍyāḥ svarasaiḥ ghṛtam

original: siddhaṃ pītvā kṣayakṣīṇī nirvyādirbhāti devavat // GarP_1,170.28 //
analyzed: siddham pītvā kṣaya kṣīṇī nirvyādiḥ bhāti deva vat
kāsa ghnaḥ modakaḥ proktaḥ tṛṣṇā arocaka nāśanaḥ

original: prasthaṃ siddhaṃ ghṛtaṃ syācca kāsanudvahnidāpanam // GarP_1,170.30 //
analyzed: prastham siddham ghṛtam syāt ca kāsa nud vahni dāpanam

original: kṛṣṇā dhātrī śitā śuṇṭhī hakkāghnī madhusaṃyutā /

analyzed: hikkā śvāsī pivet bhārṅgo sa viśvām uṣṇa vāriṇā
taila aktam svarabhede vā khādiram dhārayet mukhe

original: pathyāṃ pippalikāyuktāṃ saṃyuktāṃ nāgareṇa vā // GarP_1,170.32 //
analyzed: pathyām pippalikā yuktām saṃyuktām nāgareṇa vā
āmra jambū kaṣāyam vā piba unmākṣika saṃyutam
chardi sarvām praṇudati tṛṣṇām ca eva apakarṣati

original: triphalā bhramamūrchāhṛtpītā sā madhunāpi vā // GarP_1,170.34 //
analyzed: triphalā bhrama mūrchā hṛt pītā sā madhunā api vā
brāhmī rasa vacā kuṣṭha śaṅkhapuṣpībhiḥ eva ca
purāṇam sevyam unmāda graha apasmāra dghṛnutam
aśvagandhā kaṣāye ca kalke kṣīre caturguṇe

original: ghṛtapakvantu vātaghnaṃ vṛṣyaṃ māṃ sāya putrakṛt // GarP_1,170.37 //
analyzed: ghṛta pakvantu vāta ghnam vṛṣyam mām sāya putra kṛt
chinnā kvātham piban hanti vātaraktam sudustaram
sa guḍāḥ pañca pathyāḥ ca kuṣṭa arśaḥ vāta sādanāḥ

original: gaḍacīsvarasaṃ kalkaṃ cūrṇaṃ vā kvāthameva vā // GarP_1,170.39 //
analyzed: gaḍacī svarasam kalkam cūrṇam vā kvātham eva vā
ūrustambha vināśāya go mūtreṇa ca gugguluḥ
hanti
kāsa ghnaḥ modakaḥ proktaḥ tṛṣṇā arocaka nāśanaḥ
prastha siddham ghṛtam ca eva kāsa nud hṛdi dīpanaḥ

original: kvātha eraṇḍatailena sāmaṃ hantyanilaṃ gurum // GarP_1,170.45 //
analyzed: kvāthaḥ eraṇḍa tailena sāmam hanti anilam gurum
pītam vāta śūla vimardanam
pāyayet madhunā miśram dāha śūla upaśāntaye
vilihat madhu sarpirbhyām śūlam hanti tridoṣa jam
trivṛt kṛṣṇā harītakyaḥ dvi catur pañca bhāgikāḥ
guṭikāḥ guḍa tulyāḥ tāḥ viṣ vibandha gada apahāḥ
harītakī yavakṣāra pippalī trivṛtaḥ tathā
ghṛtaiḥ cūrṇam idam peyam udāvarta avināśanam
trivṛt harītakī śyāmāḥ snuhī kṣīreṇa bhāvitāḥ
vaṭikāḥ mūtra pītāḥ tāḥ śreṣṭāḥ ca ānāha bhedikāḥ
tryūṣaṇa triphalā dhanya viḍaṅga cavya citrakaiḥ
kalkīkṛtaiḥ ghṛtam siddham saṃskāram vāta gulma nud

original: sauvacalaṃ tadardhantu śivānāñca ghṛtaṃ pibet // GarP_1,170.53 //
analyzed: tad ardham tu śivānām ca ghṛtam pibet
kaṇā pāṣāṇa bhedaiḥ vā śilājatuka cūrṇakam
taṇḍulībhiḥ guḍena api mūtrakṛcchrī iti jīvati
amṛtā nāgarī dhātrī vājigandhā trikaṇṭakām
prapibet vāta rega ārtaḥ sa śūlaḥ mūtrakṛcchravān

original: mūtre viruddhe karpūracūrṇaṃ liṅge praveśayet // GarP_1,170.57 //
analyzed: mūtre viruddhe karpūra cūrṇam liṅge praveśayet
kvāthaḥ ca śigru mūla utthaḥ kaṭu uṣṇa uśmā nipātanaḥ
triphalā dāru dārvī aṣṭa kvāthaḥ kṣaudreṇa meha hā

original: asvapnaṃ ca vyavāyaṃ ca vyāyāmāścintanāni ca /
analyzed: asvapnam ca vyavāyam ca vyāyāmāḥ cintanāni ca
sthaulyam icchan pa parityaktam krameṇa abhipravardhayet
yava śyāmāka bhojī syāḥ sthaulya kṛt madhu vāriṇā
uṣṇam annam sa maṇḍam vā piban kṛśa tanuḥ bhavet

original: madhunā raktavaḥ pītā medhoghnā sarvadīpanāḥ // GarP_1,170.61 //
analyzed: madhunā raktavaḥ pītāḥ medhaḥ ghnā sarva dīpanāḥ

original: caturguṇe jale mūtre dviguṇe citrakāṇi ca /
analyzed: caturguṇe jale mūtre dviguṇe citrakāṇi ca

original: kalkaiḥ siddha ghṛta prasthaṃ sakṣīraṃ jaṭharī pibet // GarP_1,170.62 //
analyzed: kalkaiḥ siddha ghṛta prastham sa kṣīram jaṭharī pibet
krama vṛddhyā daśa ahāni daśa paippālikam dinam
vardhayet payasā sārdham tathā eva apānayet punar
kṣīra ṣaṣṭika bhojī syāt evam kṛṣṇa sahasrakam
bṛṃhaṇam mudgam āyuṣyam plīha udara vināśanam

original: gāvā matreṇa saṃsevyaṃ pippalī vā payo 'nvitāḥ /
analyzed: gāvā matreṇa saṃsevyam pippalī vā payaḥ nvitāḥ

original: guḍana vābhayāṃ tulyāṃ viśvaṃ vā śotharogiṇā // GarP_1,170.65 //
analyzed: vā abhayām tulyām viśvam vā śotha rogiṇā
tailam eraṇḍa jam pītvā balā siddham payaḥ nvitam
ādhmāna śūla upacita a mantravṛddhin jayet naraḥ
nirguṇḍī mūla nasyena gaṇḍamālā vinaśyati
hastikarṇa palāśasya galagaṇḍam tu lepataḥ
dhattūra eraṇḍa nirguṇḍī varṣābhū śigru sarṣapaiḥ
pralepaḥ ślīpadam hanti cira uttham ati dāruṇam
śara puṅkhā madhu yutā yā tsar sva vraṇa gepaṇī
nimba patrasya vā ālepaḥ śvayathu vraṇa gepaṇaḥ

original: sadyaḥ kṣataṃ vraṇaṃ vaidyaḥ saśūlaṃ pariṣecayet // GarP_1,170.72 //
analyzed: sadyas kṣatam vraṇam vaidyaḥ sa śūlam pariṣecayet
yaṣṭīmadhuka yuktena kiñcid uṣṇena sarpiṣā
buddhvā āgantu vraṇān vaidyaḥ ghṛta kṣaudra samanvitām
śītām kriyām prayuñjīta pitta rakta ūṣma nāśinīm
kvāthaḥ vaṃśa tvak eraṇḍa śvadaṃṣṭra vanidā kṛtaḥ
sa hiṅgu saindhavaḥ pītaḥ koṣṭha stham strāvayet asṛj
yava kola kulatthānām niḥsnehena rasena vā
bhuñjīta annam yavāgvā vā pivet saindhava saṃyutam
triphalā cūrṇa saṃyuktaḥ gugguluḥ vaṭakīkṛtaḥ
dārvā tvacaḥ ca kalkena pradhānam vraṇa ropaṇam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe jvarādicikitsānirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptatyuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe jvarādicikitsānirūpaṇam nāma saptatyuttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
dhanvantariḥ uvāca
nāḍīvraṇa ādi rogāṇām cikitsām śṛṇu suśruta

original: nāḍīṃ śastreṇa saṃpāṭya nājīnāṃ vraṇavatkriyā // GarP_1,171.1 //
analyzed: nāḍīm śastreṇa saṃpāṭya nājīnām vraṇa vat kriyā
guggulu triphalā vyopaiḥ sama aṃśaiḥ ājya yojitaiḥ
nāḍī duṣṭavraṇam śūlam bhagandaram atho jayet
hitam pāma āmayānām tu pāna abhyañjana nāvanaiḥ
ghuṭi guḍi kā śotha gulma arśaḥ bhagandaravatām hitā
dhvajamadhye śirāvedhe viśuddhiḥ upadaṃśake

original: pāko rakṣyaḥ prayatnena śiśrakṣayakaro hi saḥ // GarP_1,171.5 //
analyzed: pākaḥ rakṣyaḥ prayatnena śiśrakṣaya karaḥ hi saḥ
paṭola nimba triphalā guḍūcī kvātham āpibet
sa guggulum sa khadiram upadaṃśaḥ vinaśyati

madha saṃyutām

original: upadaṃśe pralepo 'ya sadyo ropayate vraṇam // GarP_1,171.7 //
analyzed: upadaṃśe pralepaḥ sadyas ropayate vraṇam
triphalā nimba bhūnimba karañja khadira ādibhiḥ
kalkaiḥ kvāthaiḥ ghṛtam pakvam upadaṃśa haram param
ādau bhagnam viditvā tu secayet śītala aṃbunā

original: pakvenālepanaṃ kāryaṃ bandhanaṃ ca kuśānvitam // GarP_1,171.9 //
analyzed: pakvena ālepanam kāryam bandhanam ca kuśa anvitam

original: māṣaṃ māṃsaṃ tathā sarpiḥ kṣīraṃ yūṣaḥ satījalaḥ /
analyzed: māṣam māṃsam tathā sarpiḥ kṣīram yūṣaḥ satī jalaḥ
bṛṃhaṇam ca anna pānam syāt pradeyam bhagnarogiṇe

original: tulyo guggulunā yojyo bhagnasandhiprasādha (kṛt) kaḥ // GarP_1,171.12 //
analyzed: tulyaḥ guggulunā yojyaḥ bhagna sandhi prasādha kṛt kaḥ
sarva kuṣṭheṣu vamanam recanam raktamokṣaṇa

kaṣāyaḥ madhunā pītaḥ vāta hṛt madana anvitaḥ
virecanam prayoktavyam trivṛt karṇa phalatrikaiḥ
manaḥ śilām marīcaiḥ tu tailam kuṣṭha vināśanam

original: karavīrodvartanaṃ ca tailāktasya ca kuṣṭhahṛt // GarP_1,171.16 //
analyzed: karavīra udvartanam ca taila aktasya ca kuṣṭha hṛt

original: āragvadhaḥ karañjaśca lepaḥ kuṣṭhaharaḥ paraḥ // GarP_1,171.17 //
analyzed: āragvadhaḥ karañjaḥ ca lepaḥ kuṣṭha haraḥ paraḥ
manaḥ śilā viḍaṅgāni vāgajī sarṣapāḥ tathā
karañjaiḥ mūtra piṣṭaḥ yam lepaḥ kuṣṭa hara ūrka vat
mūtra amla piṣṭaḥ lepaḥ yam dadrū kuṣṭa vināśanaḥ
sauvīra piṣṭam dadrūṇām etat udvartanam param
āragvadhasya patrāṇi āranālena peṣayet
dadrūkiṭṭima bha
kuṣṭhāni hanti sidhmānam eva ca
pītā vāgujī ca kuṣṭha jit kṣīra bhojanaḥ

original: vṛṣyāḥ sapta samā medhyāḥ kaṣṭhahāḥ kāmacāriṇaḥ // GarP_1,171.22 //
analyzed: vṛṣyāḥ sapta samāḥ medhyāḥ kaṣṭha hāḥ kāma cāriṇaḥ

yaḥ khādet abhayā ariṣṭam ariṣṭa āmalaka āniśāḥ
sa jayet sarva kuṣṭhān i māsāt ūrdhvam na saṃśayaḥ
dahyamāna āyutaḥ kumbhe mūla ge khadira aṅkuraḥ

original: śaṅkhendudhavalaṃ śvitraṃ hanti tūrṇaṃ na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,171.26 //
analyzed: śaṅkha indu dhavalam śvitram hanti tūrṇam na saṃśayaḥ

original: sevitaṃ khādiraṃ vāri pānādyaiḥ kuṣṭhajidbhavet // GarP_1,171.27 //
analyzed: sevitam khādiram vāri pāna ādyaiḥ kuṣṭha jit bhavet
karṣam bhakṣet alavaṇaḥ hi akṣa phalgu śṛtam pibet

original: vāsā śuddhā ca triphalā paṭolaṃ ca karañjakam // GarP_1,171.29 //
analyzed: vāsā śuddhā ca triphalā paṭolam ca karañjakam

atha amlapitta cikitsā
dhātrī nimba phalam tadvat go mūtreṇa ca citrakam

amla pitte prayoktavyam guḍa kūṣmāṇḍakam tathā

iti amlapitta cikitsā
pippalī amṛta bhūnimba vāsaka ariṣṭa parpaṭaiḥ

prayoktavyam vireka artham vīsarpa jvara śāntaye

kvāthaḥ ṣṭakā ākhyaḥ jayati romāntikamasūrikām

original: laśunānāṃ tu cṛrṇasya gharṣo maśakanāśanaḥ // GarP_1,171.41 //
analyzed: laśunānām tu cṛrṇasya gharṣaḥ maśaka nāśanaḥ
carmakīlam jaru maṇim maśakān tilakālakān
utkṛtya śastreṇa dahet kṣāk agnibhyām aśeṣatas
paṭola nīlī lepaḥ syāt jāla jvālā
dāruṇa kṛt kuṣṭha vāta vyādhi vināśanam

original: jīrṇe pakve lauhacūrṇaṃ kāñjikaṃ kṛṣṇakeśakṛt // GarP_1,171.44 //
analyzed: jīrṇe pakve lauha cūrṇam kāñjikam kṛṣṇa keśa kṛt

original: tailamya kuḍavaṃ pakvaṃ tannasyaṃ palitāpaham // GarP_1,171.45 //
analyzed: kuḍavam pakvam tat nasyam palita apaham
mukha roge tu triphalā gaṇḍūṣa paridhāraṇam

laśuna ārdraka śigrūṇām pārulyāḥ mūlakasya ca

original: rudantyāśca rasaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ kaduṣṇaḥ karṇapūraṇe // GarP_1,171.49 //
analyzed: rudantyāḥ ca rasaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ kaduṣṇaḥ karṇapūraṇe

basta mūtram kṣipet koṣṇam saindhavena avacūrṇitam

original: śuṇṭhītailaṃ sārṣapaṃ ca kroṣṇaṃ syātkarṇaśūlanut // GarP_1,171.51 //
analyzed: śuṇṭhī tailam sārṣapam ca kroṣṇam syāt karṇa śūla nut

akṣi kukṣi bhavāḥ rogāḥ pratiśyāya vraṇa jvarāḥ

original: pañcaite pañcarātreṇa praśamaṃ yānti laṅghanāt // GarP_1,171.53 //
analyzed: pañca ete pañca rātreṇa praśamam yānti laṅghanāt

dhāryaḥ cakṣuṣi saṃkṣepāt śotha kaṇḍū rujā apahaḥ
madhu ājya līḍham kvāthaḥ vā sarva netra ruj ardanam
jala piṣṭaiḥ iyam virtiḥ aśeṣa timira apahā
dadhnā ati ghṛṣṭam maricam rātri āndhya apaham añjanam
timirāṇi acirāt hanyāt pītam etat niśā mukhe

original: trikaṭu triphalā nakta saindhavaṃ ca manaḥ śilā /
analyzed: trikaṭu triphalā saindhavam ca manaḥ śilā
rucakam śaṅkhanābhiḥ ca jātī puṣpāṇi nimbakam
rasāñjanam bhṛṅgarājam ghṛtam madhu payaḥ tathā

original: śiro 'rtiṃ nāśayatyāśu puṣpaṃ vā mucukundaka (ja) m // GarP_1,171.64 //
analyzed: śiraḥ nāśayati āśu puṣpam vā
