pitta jvara haraḥ syāt ca śṛṇu anyam yogam uttamam
vālaka uśīra pāṭhābhiḥ kaṇṭakārika mustakaiḥ

original: jvaranucca kṛtaḥ kvāthastathā vai suradāruṇā // GarP_1,175.7 //
analyzed: jvara nud ca kṛtaḥ kvāthaḥ tathā vai suradāruṇā
dhanyāka nimba mustānām sa madhuḥ sa tu śaṅkara
paṭola patra yuktaḥ tu guḍūcī triphalā yutaḥ
khila jvara haraḥ kṣudhā kṛt vāta nud tu idam
cūrṇam jvaram ca kvathitam dhānya dhanyā
ka uśīra pa parpaṭaiḥ

original: āmalakyā guḍūcyā ca madhuyuktaṃ sacandanam // GarP_1,175.10 //
analyzed: āmalakyā guḍūcyā ca madhu yuktam sa candanam
samasta jvara nud ca syāt sannipāta haram śṛṇu
haridrā nimba triphalā mustakaiḥ devadāruṇā
tridoṣa jvara nud ca syāt pītam tu kvathitam jalam
kaṇṭakāryāḥ nāgarasya guḍūcyā puṣkareṇa ca
jagdhvā nāgabalā cūrṇam śvasa kāsa ādi nud bhavet
kapha vāta jvare deyam jalam uṣṇam pipāsine
dadyāt su śītalam vāri tṛṣ chardi jvara dāha nud

original: bilvādipa pañcamūlasya kvāthaḥ syādvātike jvare // GarP_1,175.15 //
analyzed: bilvādipa pañcamūlasya kvāthaḥ syāt vātike jvare

original: vātajvare tvayaṃ kvātho dattaḥ śāntikaraḥ paraḥ // GarP_1,175.16 //
analyzed: vāta jvare tu ayam kvāthaḥ dattaḥ śānti karaḥ paraḥ

original: vidhāne kriyamāṇe 'pi ysaya saṃjñā na jāyate // GarP_1,175.17 //
analyzed: vidhāne kriyamāṇe pi ysaya saṃjñā na jāyate
pādayoḥ tu lalāṭe vā dahet lauha śalākayā

original: tiktā pāṭhā parpaṭāśca viśālā triphalā trivṛt /
analyzed: tiktā pāṭhā parpaṭāḥ ca viśālā triphalā trivṛt

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe jvaraharanānāyogādivarṇanaṃ nāma pañcasaptatyuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe jvaraharanānāyogādivarṇanam nāma pañcasaptatyuttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
śrī bhagavān uvāca
sapta rātrāt prajāyante khalvāṭasya kacāḥ śubhāḥ
dagdha hasti danta lepāt sa ajā kṣīra rasāñjanāt
keśa vṛddhi karam tailam guñjā cūrṇa anvitena ca
elā māṃsī kuṣṭha murā yuktam abhyaṅgataḥ śivam
āmra asthi cūrṇa lepāt vai keśāḥ sūkṣmāḥ bhavanti ca
āmra asthi majja āmalaka lepāt keśāḥ bhavanti vai

original: baddhamūlā ghanā dīrghāḥ snagdhāḥ syurnotpatanti ca // GarP_1,176.5 //
analyzed: baddha mūlāḥ ghanāḥ dīrghāḥ snagdhāḥ syuḥ na utpatanti ca
viḍaṅga gandhapāṣāṇa sādhitam tailam uttamam
sa caturguṇa go mūtram manasaḥ śilam eva vā
śiraḥ bhyaṅgāt śirājan mayūkālikhyāḥ kṣayam nayet
kacāḥ ślakṣṇāḥ mahā kṛṣṇāḥ bhavanti vṛṣabhadhvaja

original: nīlī ca karavīraṃ ca guḍametaiḥ samaṃ śṛtam /
analyzed: nīlī ca karavīram ca guḍam etaiḥ samam śṛtam
palitāni iha kṛṣṇāni kuryāt lepāt mahauṣadham
āmra asthi majjā triphalā
lī ca bhṛṅga rājakam

original: jīrṇaṃ pakvaṃ lohacūrṇaṃ kāñjikaṃ kṛṣṇakeśakṛt // GarP_1,176.10 //
saindhavaṃ ca vacā hiṅgu kuṣṭhaṃ nāgeśvaraṃ tathā /
analyzed: saindhavam ca vacā hiṅgu kuṣṭham nāgeśvaram tathā

original: śatapuṣpā devadāru ebhistailaṃ tu sādhitam // GarP_1,176.12 //
analyzed: śatapuṣpā devadāru ebhiḥ tailam tu sādhitam
tad kaṇa bharaṇāt ugra karṇa śūlam kṣayam nayet
meṣa mūtra saindhavābhyām karṇayoḥ bharaṇāt śiva
karṇayoḥ pūtināśaḥ syāt kṛmi strāva ādikasya ca
mālatī puppa dalayoḥ rasena bharaṇāt tathā
go jalena eva pūreṇa pūya strāvaḥ vinaśyati
kaṣṭha māṣa marīcāni tagaram madhu pippalī
apāmārgaḥ śvagandhā ca bṛhatī sita sarṣapāḥ
yavāḥ tilāḥ saindhavam ca pādikā udvartanam śubham
liṅga bāhu stanānām ca karṇayoḥ vṛddhi kṛt bhavet

original: valkalaiḥ sādhitairliptaṃ liṅgaṃ tena vivardhate // GarP_1,176.18 //
analyzed: valkalaiḥ sādhitaiḥ liptam liṅgam tena vivardhate

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe keśotpattyādivarṇanaṃ nāma ṣaṭsaptatyuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe keśotpattyādivarṇanam nāma ṣaṭsaptatyuttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
hariḥ uvāca
sobhāñjana patra rasam madhu yuktam hi cakṣuṣoḥ
ca raṇāt roga haraṇam bhavet na asti atra saṃśayaḥ
aśīti tila puṣpāṇi jātyāḥ ca kusuma api ca
chāyāsuṣkām vaṭīm kuryāt piṣṭvā taṇḍula vāriṇā
madhunā sahasā ca akṣṇoḥ añjanāt timira ādi nud
nimba patra marīcā ajā mūtreṇa peṣayet

original: puṣpaṃ rātryandhatāṃ hanti timiraṃ paṭalaṃ tathā /
analyzed: puṣpam rātri andhatām hanti timiram paṭalam tathā

original: caturbhāgāni śaṅkhasya tadardhena manaḥ śilā // GarP_1,177.5 //
analyzed: catur bhāgāni śaṅkhasya tad ardhena manaḥ śilā
saindhavam ca tad ardhena tu etat piṣṭvā ādakena tu

original: chāyāśuṣkāṃ tu vaṭikāṃ kṛtvā nayanamañjayet // GarP_1,177.6 //
analyzed: chāyāśuṣkām tu vaṭikām kṛtvā nayanam añjayet

original: timiraṃ paṭalaṃ hanti piciṭaṃ ca mahauṣadham /
analyzed: timiram paṭalam hanti piciṭam ca mahauṣadham

original: trikaṭu triphalāṃ caiva karaṃ jasya phalāni ca // GarP_1,177.7 //
analyzed: trikaṭu triphalām ca eva karam jasya phalāni ca
piṣṭvā tad añjanāt eva timira ādi vināśanam
āṭarūṣaka mūlam tu kāñjikā piṣṭam eva tu
tena akṣi būmi lepāt ca cakṣuḥ śūlam vinaśyati
sa takram badarī mūlam pītam vā akṣi vyathām haret

original: saindhaṃvaṃ kaṭutailaṃ ca apāmārgasya mūlakam // GarP_1,177.10 //
analyzed: saindhaṃvam kaṭutailam ca apāmārgasya mūlakam
kṣīra kāñjika saṃghṛṣṭam tāmra pātre tu tena ca
añjanāt piñjaṭasya eva nāśaḥ bhavati śaṅkara

original: oṃ dadru sara kroṃ hrīṃ ṭhaḥ ṭhaḥ dadru sara hrīṃ hrīṃ oṃ uṃ ū sara krīṃ krīṃ ṭhaḥ ṭhaḥ /
analyzed: om dadru sara kroṃ hrīṃ ṭhaḥ ṭhaḥ dadru sara hrīṃ hrīṃ om uṃ ū sara krīṃ krīṃ ṭhaḥ ṭhaḥ

original: ādyā hi vaśāmāyānti mantreṇānena cāñjanāt // GarP_1,177.12 //
analyzed: ādyāḥ hi vaśām āyānti mantreṇa anena ca añjanāt
bilvaka nīlikā mūlam piṣṭam abhyañjanena ca
anena añjita mātreṇa naśyanti timirāṇi hi
tagaram ca eva haridrā āmalakam vacā
khadira piṣṭa vāttaḥ ca añjanāt netra roga nud
nīra pūrṇa mukhaḥ dhauti bṛhat mānena yaḥ kṣiṇī

original: prabhāte netrarogaiśca nityaṃ sarvaiḥ pramucyate // GarP_1,177.15 //
analyzed: prabhāte netra rogaiḥ ca nityam sarvaiḥ pramucyate
śukla eraṇḍasya mūlena patreṇa api prasādhitam
chaga dagdha sekam auṣṇyāt cakṣuṣoḥ vāta śalanat
candanam saindhavam vṛddha pālāśaḥ ca harītakī
paṭalam kusumam nīlī ca va
krikām harate ñjanam

original: guñjāmūlaṃ chāgamūtre ghṛṣṭaṃ timiranucca tat raupyatāmrasuvarṇānāṃ hastaghṛṣṭaśalākayā // GarP_1,177.18 //
analyzed: guñjā mūlam chāga mūtre ghṛṣṭam timira nud ca tat raupya tāmra suvarṇānām hasta ghṛṣṭa śalākayā
ghṛṣṭam udvartanam rudra kāmalā vyādhi nāśanam
ghoṣā phalam apāghrātam pīta kāmalā nāśanam
nāsā arśaḥ vāta rakta nun nasyāt vai svarasena hi
āpiṣṭvā jāṅgalī mū tū
laṃ tad rasena vṛṣadhvaja
nasyāt ārāt vinaśyeta nāśa arśaḥ nīlalohita
gavyam ghṛtam sarjarasam rudra dhanyāka saindhavam

original: dhuttūrakaṃ gairikaṃ ca etaiḥ sādhitasikthakam // GarP_1,177.22 //

analyzed: sa tailam vraṇa nud syāt ca sphuṭita uddhaṭita adhare

original: jātīpatraṃ ca carvitvā vidhṛtaṃ mukharoganut // GarP_1,177.23 //
analyzed: jātī patram ca carvitvā vidhṛtam mukha roga nud
bhakṣāt kesara bījasya dantāḥ syuḥ calitāḥ sthirāḥ

original: muṣṭakaṃ kuṣṭhamelā ca yaṣṭikaṃ madhuvālakam // GarP_1,177.24 //
analyzed: muṣṭakam kuṣṭham elā ca yaṣṭikam madhuvālakam
dhanyākam etad adanāt mukha durgandhan uddhara

original: kaṣāyaṃ kaṭukaṃ vāpi tiktaśākasya bhakṣaṇāt // GarP_1,177.25 //
analyzed: kaṣāyam kaṭukam vā api tikta śākasya bhakṣaṇāt
tala yuktasya nityam syāt mukha durgandha tā kṣayaḥ

original: dantavraṇāni sarvāṇi kṣayaṃ gacchantyanena tu // GarP_1,177.26 //
analyzed: danta vraṇāni sarvāṇi kṣayam gacchanti anena tu
kāñjikasya sa tailasya gaṇḍūṣa kavala asthitiḥ
tāmbūla cūrṇa dagdhasya mukhasya vyādhinut śiva
parityakta śleṣmaṇaḥ ca śuṇṭhī carvaṇataḥ yathā

original: mātuluṅgadalānyelā yaṣṭī madhu ca pippalī // GarP_1,177.28 //
analyzed: mātuluṅga dalāni elā yaṣṭī madhu ca pippalī

original: jātīpatramathaiṣāṃ ca cūrṇaṃ līḍhvā tathā kṛtam /
analyzed: jātī patram atha eṣām ca cūrṇam līḍhvā tathā kṛtam
śephālika jaṭāyāḥ ca carvaṇam galaśuṇṭhi nud
nāsā śirā rakta karṣāt naśyet śaṃśa kara jihvikā
rasaḥ śirīṣa bījānām haridrāyāḥ caturguṇaḥ
tena pakvena bhūteśa nasyam mastaka roga nud
gala rogāḥ vinaśyanti nasya mātreṇa tad kṣaṇāt
dantakīṭa vināśaḥ myāt guñjā mūlasya carvaṇāt
danta ākrāntān danta jān ca kṛmīn nāśayate śiva
tena cāmī aṅgitā dantāḥ kuryuḥ kaṭakaṭān na hi
liptvā karkaṭa pādena kevalena athavā aśiva

original: trisaptāhaṃ vāḥ piṣṭāni jyotiṣmatyāḥ phalāni hi /
analyzed: tri sapta aham vār piṣṭāni jyotiṣmatyāḥ phalāni hi
śuklā abhayā majja lepāt dantasya aṅka kalaṅka nud
lodhra kuṅkuma mañjiṣṭhā lohakāḥ leyakāni ca
yava taṇḍulam etaiḥ ca yaṣṭī madhu samanvitaiḥ
vāri piṣṭaiḥ vaktra lepaḥ strīṇām śobhana vaktra kṛt

original: dvibhāgaṃ chāgadugdhena tailaprasthaṃ tu sādhitam // GarP_1,177.37 //
analyzed: dvi bhāgam chāga dugdhena taila prastham tu sādhitam
rakta vandana mañjiṣṭhā alakṣāṇām karṣakeṇa vā

original: ebhiśca kvathitaṃ vāri pītaṃ cāgniṃ karoti vai // GarP_1,177.39 //
analyzed: ebhiḥ ca kvathitam vāri pītam ca agnim karoti vai
vāta śūla kṣayam ca eva kaga iti prathama īśvara
gokṣuram kvathitam tu abhiḥ vāri pītam śrama apahan

original: dāhaṃ pittaṃ jvaraṃ śoṣaṃ mūrchāṃ caiva kṣayaṃ nayet // GarP_1,177.41 //
analyzed: dāham pittam jvaram śoṣam mūrchām ca eva kṣayam nayet
pītam hṛd roga kāsasya viṣamajvara nud bhavet
kvātha aupadhīnām sarvāsām karṣa ardham grāhyam eva ca
vayaḥ jñeyaḥ viśeṣaḥ vṛṣabhadhvaja

original: dugdhaṃ pītaṃ tu saṃyuktaṃ gopurīṣarasena ca /
analyzed: dugdham pītam tu saṃyuktam go purīṣa rasena ca
viṣamajvara nud syāt ca kākajandhā rasaḥ tathā
yaṣṭīmadhuka mustam ca saindhavam bṛhatī phalam
etaiḥ nidrā syāt purupasya ca
bhavet śiva
mūlam tu kākajaṅghāyāḥ nidrā kṛt syāt śira sthitam

original: siddhaṃ tailaṃ kāñjikena tathā sarjarasena ca // GarP_1,177.47 //
analyzed: siddham tailam kāñjikena tathā sarja rasena ca
śīta udaka samāyuktam lepāt santāpa nāśanam
śoṇita jvara dāhebhyaḥ jāta santāpa nud tathā
śṛka śaivāla manthaḥ ca śuṇṭhī pāpāṇabhedakam

original: śauvāñjanaṃ gokṣuraṃ vā varuṇacchannameva ca // GarP_1,177.49 //
analyzed: śauvāñjanam gokṣuram vā varuṇa channam eva ca

original: saubhāñjanasya mūlaṃ ca etaiḥ kvathitavāri ca /
analyzed: saubhāñjanasya mūlam ca etaiḥ kvathita vāri ca
dattvā hiṅgu yavakṣāram pītam vāta vināśanam
vāri etaiḥ kvathitam pītam vara śūla apahāra kṛt
aśvagandhā mūlakābhyām siddhā valmīka mṛttikā
etayā mardanāt rudraḥ ūrustambhaḥ praśāmyati
bṛhatīkasya vai mūlam saṃpiṣṭam udakena ca
pītam saṃghāta vātasya vipāṭana kṛt eva ca

original: pītaṃ takreṇa mūlaṃ ca ārdrasya tagarasya ca /
analyzed: pītam takreṇa mūlam ca ārdrasya tagarasya ca
haret jhiñjinī vātam
vai vṛkṣam indra aśaniḥ yathā
asthi saṃhāram ekena bhaktena saha vāditam
patim māṃsa rasena api vāta nud ca asthi bhaṅga nud
ghṛta liptam sa śuṣkam ca chāgī kṣīreṇa saṃyutam
tad lopāt pāda yāḥ naṃśyet sa kṣepye ca atra saṃśayaḥ
madhu ājya saindhavam siktham guḍa kairika guggulaiḥ
sa sarjarasa sphuṭitaḥ kloma śuddhiḥ ca lepanāt
kaṭutailena liptaḥ vai vidhūma agnau pratāpitaḥ
mṛttikāra khāditaḥ pādaḥ samaḥ syāt vṛṣabhadhvaja

original: sarjarasāḥ sikthakaṃ ca jīrakaṃ ca harītakī /
analyzed: sarjarasāḥ sikthakam ca jīrakam ca harītakī
utsādhita ghṛta abhyaṅgaḥ hi agni dagdha vyathā
tila tailam ca agni dagdham yava bhasma samanvitam
agni dagdha vraṇam naśyet brahuśas kṛta lepataḥ
navanītam māhiṣam ca dagdha piṣṭa tilāni ca
sa bhallākam vraṇam naśyet hṛd śūlam nasya lepanāt
karpūra gavya sarpirbhyām prahāraḥ pūritaḥ hara
śastra udbhavaḥ sabaddhaḥ ca śukla varṇena śaṅkara

original: pākaṃ ca vedanāṃ caiva saṃspṛśedvṛṣabhadhvaja // GarP_1,177.62 //
analyzed: pākam ca vedanām ca eva saṃspṛśet vṛṣabhadhvaja
āmra tasya mūla rasena eva śastra ghātaḥ prapūritaḥ
ḍhaukate śastra ghātābhyām nirvraṇaḥ ghṛ pūritaḥ

original: śarapuṅkhā lajjālukā pāṭhā caiṣāṃ tu mūlakam /
analyzed: śarapuṅkhā lajjālukā pāṭhā ca eṣām tu mūlakam
jala piṣṭam tasya lepāt śastra ghātaḥ praśāmyati
mūlam ca kākajaṅghāyāḥ tri rātreṇa eva śoṣitaḥ

original: pākapūtiṃ vedanāṃ ca hanti vai rohito vraṇe // GarP_1,177.65 //
analyzed: pāka pūtim vedanām ca hanti vai rohitaḥ vraṇe
sa jalam tila tailam ca apāmārgasya mūlakam
tad seka dānāt naśyet ca prahāra udbhava vedanā
abhayām saindhavam śuṇṭhīm etat piṣṭvā udakena tu

original: bhakṣayitvā hyajīrṇasya nāśo bhavati śaṅkara / // GarP_1,177.67 //
analyzed: bhakṣayitvā hi ajīrṇasya nāśaḥ bhavati śaṅkara
śaṇa mūlam sa tāmbūlam dagdham indriyakasya
anna svinna haridrā ca śvetasarṣapa mūlakam
bījāni mātuluṅgasya eṣām udvartanam samam
sapta rātra prayogeṇa śubha deha karam bhavet
nasya dānāt ḍākinīnām mātṝṇām brahmarakṣasām
mokṣaḥ syāt madhusāreṇa nasyāt ca vṛṣabhadhvaja
mūlam śveta jayantyāḥ ca puṣya ṛkṣe tu samāhṛtam
śveta aparājitā arkasya citrakasya ca mūlakam

original: kṛtvā tu vaṭikāṃ nārī tilakena vaśī bhavet // GarP_1,177.71 //
analyzed: kṛtvā tu vaṭikām nārī tilakena vaśī bhavet
pippalī loha cūrṇam tu śuṇṭhīḥ ca āmalakāni ca
samāni rudra jānīyāt saindhavam madhu śarkarā
udumbara pramāṇena sapta aham bhakṣaṇāt samam
pumān ca balavān sa syāt jīvet varṣa śata dvayam

original: oṃ ṭha ṭha ṭha iti sarvavaśyaprayogeṣu prayuktaḥ sarvakāmakṛt // GarP_1,177.73 //
analyzed: om ṭha ṭha ṭha iti sarva vaśya prayogeṣu prayuktaḥ sarva kāma kṛt
saṃgṛhya vidvān kākasya nilayam pradahet ca tat

original: citāgnau bhasma tacchatrordattaṃ śirasi śaṅkara // GarP_1,177.74 //
analyzed: citā agnau bhasma tat śatroḥ dattam śirasi śaṅkara
tam uccāṭayate rudra śṛṇu tad yogam uttamam

original: niḥ kṣiptaṃ ca purīṣaṃ vai vanamūṣikacarmaṇi // GarP_1,177.75 //
analyzed: niḥ kṣiptam ca purīṣam vai vanamūṣika carmaṇi
kaṭi tantu nibaddham vai kuryāt mala nirodhanam

original: kṛṣṇakākasya raktena yasya nāma pralipya ca // GarP_1,177.76 //
analyzed: kṛṣṇa kākasya raktena yasya nāma pralipya ca

original: cyutadale madhyamadhye tato niḥ kṣipyate hara / /
analyzed: cyutadale madhya madhye tatas niḥ kṣipyate hara

original: sa khādyate kākavṛndairnārī puruṣa eva ca // GarP_1,177.77 //
analyzed: sa khādyate kāka vṛndaiḥ nārī puruṣaḥ eva ca
sa śatrum nāśayet rudra
uccāṭitam idam hara
ulūka kṛṣṇa kākasya bilvasya atha samicchatam
rudhireṇa samāyuktam yayoḥ nāmnā tu hūyate
tayoḥ madhye mahā vairam bhavet na asti atra saṃśayaḥ
bhāvitam ṛkṣa dugdhena matsyasya rohitasya ca
māṃsam tad sādhitam tailam tad abhyaṅgāt ca roga nud
candana udaka nasyāt tu roma utthānam bhavet punar
haste lāṅgalikā kandam gṛhītam tena lepitam

original: śarīraṃ yena sa pumānvṛddherdarpaṃ vyapohati // GarP_1,177.81 //
analyzed: śarīram yena sa pumān vṛddheḥ darpam vyapohati
mayūra rudhireṇa eva jīvam saṃharate śiva
jvalatām tu bhujaṅgānām bila sthānām api īśvara
dehaḥ citā agnau dagdhaḥ ca sarpasya ajagarasya hi

original: tadbhasma saṃmukhe kṣiptaṃ śatraṇāṃ bhaṅgakṛdbhavet // GarP_1,177.83 //
analyzed: tat bhasma saṃmukhe kṣiptam śatraṇām bhaṅga kṛt bhavet
mantreṇa anena tat kṣiptam mahā bhaṅga karam ripoḥ

original: oṃ ṭha ṭha ṭha cāhīhicāhīhi svāhā /
analyzed: om ṭha ṭha ṭha svāhā
om udaram pāhihi pāhi svāhā

original: sudarśanāyā malaṃ tu puṣyarkṣe tu samāhṛtam /
analyzed: sudarśanāyāḥ malam tu puṣya ṛkṣe tu samāhṛtam

original: niḥ kṣiptaṃ gṛhamadhye tu bhujaṅgā varjayanti tat // GarP_1,177.85 //
analyzed: niḥ kṣiptam gṛha madhye tu bhujaṅgāḥ varjayanti tat
arka mūlena raviṇā arka agni jvalitā śiva
yuktā siddhārtha tailena vartiḥ mārga ahi nāśinī

original: chāga mūtreṇa tallipto mūṣiko mūṣikānharet // GarP_1,177.87 //
analyzed: chāga mūtreṇa tad liptaḥ mūṣikaḥ mūṣikān haret

original: mukto hi mandire rudra nātra kāryā vicāraṇā /
analyzed: muktaḥ hi mandire rudra na atra kāryā vicāraṇā
viphalā arjuna puṣpāṇi bhallātaka śirīṣakam
lākṣā sarjarasaḥ ca eva viḍaṅgaḥ ca eva gugguluḥ
etaiḥ dhūpaḥ makṣikāṇām maśakāṇām vināśanaḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe netrāñjanādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptasaptatyuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe netrāñjanādinirūpaṇam nāma saptasaptatyuttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
hariḥ uvāca

om nārāyaṇyai svāhā

original: tāmbūlaṃ yasya dīyeta sa vaśī syātsumantrataḥ /
analyzed: tāmbūlam yasya dīyeta sa vaśī syāt su mantrataḥ
om hariḥ hariḥ svāhā
godantam haritālam ca saṃyuktam kākajihvayā

original: cūrṇokṛtya yasya śire dīyate sa vaśī bhavet /
analyzed: yasya śire dīyate sa vaśī bhavet

original: vaibhī takaṃ śākhoṭakaṃ mūlaṃ patreṇa saṃyutam /

original: sthāpyate yadgṛhadvāre tatra vai kalaho bhavet // GarP_1,178.4 //

original: khañjarīṭasya māṃsaṃ tu madhunā saha peṣayet /
analyzed: khañjarīṭasya māṃsam tu madhunā saha peṣayet
ṛtu kāleya ūni lepāt puruṣaḥ dāsa tām iyāt

original: guḍena dhūpayitvā tu rājadvāre priyo bhavet // GarP_1,178.6 //

om namaḥ khaḍga vajrapāṇaye mahā yakṣa senāpataye svāhā

original: oṃ rudraṃ hrāṃ hrīṃ varaśaktā tvaritāvidyā /

om mātaraḥ stambhaya svāhā

original: oṃ namaḥ sarvasattvebhyo namaḥ siddhiṃ kuru kuru svāhā /

original: oṃ hrīṃ gauri devi saubhāgyaṃ putravaśādi dehi me /
analyzed: om hrīṃ gauri devi saubhāgyam putra vaśa ādi dehi me
om hrīṃ lakṣmi
devi saubhāgyam sarvam trailokya mohanam

vaśayet rudra dhūpaḥ ca tathā puṣpa sugandhayoḥ

tila tailena saṃyuktam yoni lepāt vaśī naraḥ

māhiṣam navanītam ca kaṣṭam ca madhuyaṣṭikā

etāni sama bhāgāni pibet uṣṇena vāriṇā

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe ekāśītyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ

etaiḥ dhūpaḥ vaśa karaḥ smara bāṇaiḥ smāra ardanaḥ
rati kāle mahādeva pārvatī priya śaṅkara

original: nijaśukraṃ gṛhī tvā tu vāmahastena yaḥ pumān /
analyzed: nija śukram gṛhī tvā tu vāma hastena yaḥ pumān

original: kāminīcaraṇaṃ vāmaṃ liṃpetsa syātstriyāḥ priyaḥ // GarP_1,185.15 //
analyzed: kāminī caraṇam vāmam liṃpet sa syāt striyāḥ priyaḥ
saindhavam ca mahādeva pārāvata malam madhu

original: ebhirlipte tu liṅge vai kāminīvaśakṛdbhavet // GarP_1,185.16 //
analyzed: ebhiḥ lipte tu liṅge vai kāminī vaśa kṛt bhavet

original: puṣpāṇi pañcaraktāni gṛhītvā yāni kāni ca /
analyzed: puṣpāṇi pañca raktāni gṛhītvā yāni kāni ca
tad tulyam ca priyaṅgum ca peṣayet eka yogataḥ
anena lipta liṅgasya kāminī vaśa tām iyāt
hayagandhā ca mañjiṣṭhā mālatī kusumāni ca

original: śvetasaṣarpa etaiśca liptaliṅgaḥ striyāḥ priyaḥ // GarP_1,185.18 //
analyzed: śvetasaṣarpaḥ etaiḥ ca lipta liṅgaḥ striyāḥ priyaḥ
mūlantu kākajaṅghāyāḥ dugdha pītam tu śoṣa nud
aśvagandhā nāgabalā guḍa māṣa niṣeviṇaḥ
rūpam bhavet yathā tadvat nava yauvana cāriṇām
lauha cūrṇa samāyuktam triphalā cūrṇam eva vā
madhunā sevitam rudra pariṇāma ākhya śūla nud
kvathita udaka pānam tu śambūka kṣārakam tathā
mṛga śṛṅgam hi agni dagdham gavya ājyena samanvitam
pīta hṛd pṛṣṭha śūlānām bhavet nāśa karam śiva
hiṅgu sauvarcalam śuṇṭhī vṛṣadhvaja mahauṣadham

original: ebhistu kvathitaṃ vāri pītaṃ vai sarvaśūlanut // GarP_1,185.22 //
analyzed: ebhiḥ tu kvathitam vāri pītam vai sarva śūla nud
apāmārgasya vai mūlam sāmudra lavaṇa anvitam
āsvādi tam ajīrṇasya śūlasya syāt vimardanam

original: pītaḥ satakro 'tīsāraṃ kṣayaṃ nayati śaṅkara // GarP_1,185.24 //
analyzed: pītaḥ tīsāram kṣayam nayati śaṅkara
sarva atīsāra grahaṇīm pītam harati bhūtapa
marīca śuṇṭhi kuṭaja tvac cūrṇam ca guḍa anvitam
kramāt tat dviguṇam pītam grahaṇī vyādhi nāśanam
śveta aparājitā mūlam haridrā siktha taṇḍulāḥ
apāmārga trikaṭuka meṣām ca vaṭikā śiva
viṣūcikā mahā vyādhim harati eva na saṃśayaḥ
triphalā aguru bhūteśa śilājatu harītakī
ekaikam eṣām cūrṇam tu madhunā ca vimiśritam

original: pītaṃ sarvañca mehantu kṣayaṃ nayati śaṅkara // GarP_1,185.28 //
analyzed: pītam sarvañca mehantu kṣayam nayati śaṅkara
arka kṣīra prastham ekam tila tailam tathā eva ca

original: manaḥ śilāmarīcānāṃ sindūrasya palaṃ palam // GarP_1,185.29 //
analyzed: manaḥ śilā marīcānām sindūrasya palam palam
cūrṇam kṛtvā tāmra pātre tu ātapaiḥ śoṣayet tatas

original: pītaṃ snuhīgataṃ dugdhaṃ saindhavaṃ śūlanudbhavet // GarP_1,185.30 //

analyzed: trikaṭu triphalā naktam tila tailam tathā eva ca
manaḥ śilā nimba patram jātī puṣpam ajā payaḥ
tad mūtram saṅkhanābhiḥ ca candanam gharṣayet tatas

original: ebhiśca vartikāṃ kṛtvā tvakṣiṇī cāñjayettataḥ // GarP_1,185.32 //
analyzed: ebhiḥ ca vartikām kṛtvā tu akṣiṇī ca añjayet tatas
naśyate paṭalam kācam puṣpam ca timira ādikam

original: vibhītakasya vai cūrṇaṃ samadhu śvāsanāśanam // GarP_1,185.33 //
analyzed: vibhītakasya vai cūrṇam sa madhu śvāsa nāśanam
sarva roga jvara śvāsa śoṣa pīnasa hṛt bhavet
devadāroḥ ca vai cūrṇam ajā matreṇa bhāvayet
ekaviṃśati vāram vā etu akṣiṇī tena ca añjayet
rātri andha tā paṭala tā naśyet nirloma tā tathā
sarva akṣi rogāḥ naśyeyuḥ sa kṣīrāt añjanāt tatas
kākajaṅghā śigru mūle mukhena vidhṛte śiva

original: carvitvā dantakīṭānāṃ vināśo hi bhaveddhara // GarP_1,185.37 //
analyzed: carvitvā dantakīṭānām vināśaḥ hi bhavet hara

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe mantratantravaidyaprayodṛpañcāśītyadhiśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe mantra tantra vaidya prayodṛ pañcāśītyadhiśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
hariḥ uvāca

original: pītaḥ sāro guḍūcyāśca madhunā ca pramehanut /
analyzed: pītaḥ sāraḥ guḍūcyāḥ ca madhunā ca prameha nud

original: tathā hikkāṃ haretpītaṃ sauvarcalayutañca vai // GarP_1,186.2 //
analyzed: tathā hikkām haret pītam sauvarcala yutam ca vai
piṣṭvā vai mālatī mūlam grīṣma kāle samāhitam
sādhitam chāga dugdhena patim śarkasya anvitam
haret mūtranirodham ca haret vai pāṇḍuśarkarām
dvija yaṣṭyāḥ ca vai mūlam piṣṭam taṇḍula vāriṇā
gaṇḍamālām haret lepāt asādhyam galagaṇḍakam
rasāñjanam harītakyāḥ cūrṇam tena eva guṇṭhanāt
nāśayet puruṣaḥ vyādhīn na atra kāryā vicāraṇā
karavīra mūla lepāt vai lepāt pūga phalasya ca
puṃs vyādhiḥ naśyate rudra yogam anyam vadāmi aham

original: dantīmūlaṃ haridrā ca citrakaṃ tasya lepanāt /
analyzed: dantī mūlam haridrā ca citrakam tasya lepanāt
bhagandara vināśaḥ syāt anyam yogam vadāmi aham
jalaukā jagdha raktam ca bhagandaram umāpate
triphalā jala ghṛṣṭam ca mārjāra asthi vilepitam

original: tato na prastravedraktaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,186.9 //
analyzed: tatas na prastravet raktam na atra kāryā vicāraṇā
haridrā aneka vāram ca snuhī kṣīreṇa bhāvitā
vaṭikā arśaḥ vināśāya tad lepāt vṛṣabhadhvaja

original: ghoṣāphalaṃ saindhavañca piṣṭvā cārśoharaṃ param // GarP_1,186.10 //
analyzed: ghoṣā phalam saindhavam ca piṣṭvā ca arśaḥ haram param
triguṇena trikaṭukam arśāṃsi kṣapayet śiva

original: bilvasya ca phalaṃ dagdhaṃ raktārśaḥ pravināśanam /
analyzed: bilvasya ca phalam dagdham rakta arśaḥ pravināśanam
jagdhavā kṛṣṇa tilān eva navanīta yutān api
agni vṛddhim karoti eva pratyūṣe vṛṣabhadhvaja

original: śuṇṭhyā ca kvathitaṃ vāri pītaṃ cāgniṃ karoti vai /
analyzed: śuṇṭhyā ca kvathitam vāri pītam ca agnim karoti vai

original: harītakīṃ saindhavañca citrakaṃ rudra pippalī // GarP_1,186.14 //
analyzed: harītakīm saindhavam ca citrakam rudra pippalī
cūrṇam uṣṇa udakena eṣām pītam ca ati kṣudhā karam

original: sājyaṃ sūkaramāṃsaṃ vai pītaṃ cātikṣudhākaram // GarP_1,186.15 //
analyzed: sa ājyam sūkara māṃsam vai pītam ca ati kṣudhā karam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe ṣaḍaśītyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe ṣaḍaśītyadhikaśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
hariḥ uvāca
hastikarṇa palāśasya patrāṇi
cūrṇayet hara
sarva roga vinirmuktam cūrṇam pala śatam śiva
sa kṣīram bhakṣītam kuryāt sapta ahena vṛṣadhvaja
naram śruti dharam rudra mṛgendra gati vikramam
padmarāga pratīkāśam yuktam daśa śata āyuṣā
ṣoḍaśa abda ākṛtim rudra satatam dugdha bhojanāt
madhu sarpiḥ samāyuktam dugdham āyuṣkaram bhavet

original: tajjagdhaṃ madhunā sārdhaṃ daśavarṣa sahasriṇam // GarP_1,187.4 //
analyzed: tat jagdham madhunā sārdham daśa varṣa sahasriṇam
kuryāt naram śruti dharam pramadā jana vallabham

original: dadhnā nityaṃ bhakṣitantu vajradehakaraṃ bhavet // GarP_1,187.5 //
analyzed: dadhnā nityam bhakṣitantu vajra deha karam bhavet
keśa rāji samāyuktam naram varṣa sahasriṇam

original: tacca kāñjikasaṃyuktaṃ naraṃ kuryācca bhakṣitam // GarP_1,187.6 //
analyzed: tat ca kāñjika saṃyuktam naram kuryāt ca bhakṣitam
śata varṣam divya deham valī palita varjitam

original: jagdhaṃ triphalayā kṣaudraṃ cakṣuṣmantaṃ karoti vai // GarP_1,187.7 //
analyzed: jagdham triphalayā kṣaudram cakṣuṣmantam karoti vai

original: andhaḥ paśyettu cūrṇasya sājyasyaiva tu bhakṣaṇāt /
analyzed: andhaḥ paśyet tu cūrṇasya sa ājyasya eva tu bhakṣaṇāt
mahiṣī kṣīra saṃyuktaḥ tad lepaḥ kṛṣṇa keśa kṛt

original: khalvāṭasya ca vai keśā bhavanti vṛṣabhadhvaja /
analyzed: khalvāṭasya ca vai keśāḥ bhavanti vṛṣabhadhvaja
taila yuktena cūrṇena valī palita nāśanam
tad udvartana mātreṇa sarva rāgaḥ pramucyate
sa chāga kṣīra cūrṇena dṛṣṭiḥ syāt māsataḥ ñjanāt

original: palāśasya ca bījāni śrāvaṇe vituṣāṇi ca /
analyzed: palāśasya ca bījāni śrāvaṇe vituṣāṇi ca

original: gṛhītvā navanītena teṣāṃ cūrṇaṃ ca bhakṣayet // GarP_1,187.11 //
analyzed: gṛhītvā navanītena teṣām cūrṇam ca bhakṣayet

original: karṣārdhamekaṃ seveta natvā nityaṃ hariṃ prabhum /
analyzed: karṣa ardham ekam seveta natvā nityam harim prabhum
purāṇa ṣaṣṭi dhānyasya pathyam ambu piban hara
jīvet varṣa sahasrāṇi valī palita varjitaḥ

original: bhṛṅgarājasya vai mūlaṃ puṣyarkṣe tu samāhṛtam /
analyzed: bhṛṅgarājasya vai mūlam puṣya ṛkṣe tu samāhṛtam

original: vidhāya tasya cūrṇaṃ vai sasauvīrañca bhakṣayetaṃ // GarP_1,187.13 //
analyzed: vidhāya tasya cūrṇam vai sa sauvīram ca bhakṣayetam
māsa mātra prayogeṇa valī palita varjitaḥ

original: śatāni pañca jīvecca naro nāgabalo bhavet /
analyzed: śatāni pañca jīvet ca naraḥ nāga balaḥ bhavet

original: bhavecchrutidharo rudra puṣyarkṣe caiva bhakṣaṇāt // GarP_1,187.14 //
analyzed: bhavet śruti dharaḥ rudra puṣya ṛkṣe ca eva bhakṣaṇāt

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe āyuṣkarayogodṛsaptāśītyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
hariḥ uvāca
nirvraṇaḥ syāt pūyaṃhīnaḥ prahāraḥ ghṛ pūritaḥ
apāmārgasya vai mūlam hastābhyām ca vimarditam

original: tadrasena prahārasya raktastrāvo na pūraṇāt // GarP_1,188.1 //
analyzed: tad rasena prahārasya raktaḥ trāvaḥ na pūraṇāt
rudra lāṅgalikā mūlam ca ikṣu darbhaḥ tathā eva ca

original: tena vraṇamukhaṃ liptaṃ śalyaṃ niḥ sa rati vraṇāt /
analyzed: tena vraṇa mukham liptam śalyam niḥ sa rati vraṇāt
cira kāla praviṣṭaḥ tena mārgeṇa śaṅkara
bāla mūlam meṣaśṛṅgī mūlam vā vāri gharṣitam

original: tena liptaṃ ciraṃ jātaṃ vraṇaṃ nāḍyāḥ praśāmyati // GarP_1,188.3 //
analyzed: tena liptam ciram jātam vraṇam nāḍyāḥ praśāmyati
jagdham māhiṣa padhnā ca yuktam kodrava bhaktakam

original: hiṅgumūlasya vai cūrṇaṃ dattaṃ nāḍīvraṇāpaham // GarP_1,188.4 //
analyzed: hiṅgu mūlasya vai cūrṇam dattam nāḍī vraṇa apaham
brahmayaṣṭi phalam piṣṭam vāriṇā tena lepitam

original: tena ghṛṣṭaṃ raktadoṣaḥ praṇaśyati na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,188.5 //
analyzed: tena ghṛṣṭam rakta doṣaḥ praṇaśyati na saṃśayaḥ
yava bhasma viḍaṅgam ca gandhapāṣāṇam eva ca
cūrṇam
kṛkalāsasya tat liptam vidradhim nāśayet śiva
saubhāñjanasya bījāni tu atasīm asinā saha
saurasarṣapa yuktāni sarvāṇi etāni śaṅkara
piṣṭāni anamla takreṇa granthikam nāśayet hi vai
śvetāparājitā mūlam piṣṭam taṇḍula vāriṇā
tena nasya pradānāt syāt bhūta vṛndasya vidravaḥ
agastya puṣpa nasyam vai sa marīcam tu śūla hṛt

original: bhujaṅgacarma vai hiṅgu nimbapatraṃ tathā yavāḥ /
analyzed: bhujaṅga carma vai hiṅgu nimba patram tathā yavāḥ

original: gaurasarṣama ebhiḥ syāllepo bhūtaharaḥ śiva // GarP_1,188.10 //
analyzed: gaurasarṣamaḥ ebhiḥ syāt lepaḥ bhūta haraḥ śiva
gorocanā marīcāni pippalī saindhavam madhu
añjanam kṛtam ebhiḥ syāt graha bhūta haram śiva
cāturthika jvaraiḥ muktaḥ kṛṣṇa vastra avaguṇṭhitaḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vraṇāci dṛmāṣṭāśītyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe vraṇāci dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
hariḥ uvāca
śveta aparājitā puṣpa rasena akṣṇoḥ ca pūraṇe

original: paṭalaṃ nāśamāyāti nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,189.1 //
analyzed: paṭalam nāśam āyāti na atra kāryā vicāraṇā
mūlam gokṣurakasya eva carvitvā nīlalohita
dantakīṭa vyathā naśyet sura asura vimardan
nārī puṣpādine pītvā go kṣīreṇa upavāsataḥ

original: śvetārkasya tu vai mūlaṃ tasyāstadgulmaśūlanut // GarP_1,189.3 //
analyzed: śvetārkasya tu vai mūlam tasyāḥ tat gulma śūla nud
śveta arka puṣpam vidhinā gṛhītam pūrva mantritam

original: ṛtuśuddhā ca lalanā kaṭau baddhvā prasūyate // GarP_1,189.4 //
analyzed: ṛtu śuddhā ca lalanā kaṭau baddhvā prasūyate
hasta baddham palāśasya apāmārgasya vā hara
mūlam sarva jvara haram bhūta preta ādi nud bhavet
pītam vṛścika mūlam ca prātar paryuṣita ambunā
sārdham vināśayet dāha jvaram ca parameśvara
śikhāyām ca eva tat baddham bhavet aikāhika ahi nud
pītam paryuṣita adbhiḥ ca bhavet sarva viṣa apahṛt
yasya lajjā alukā mūlam dīyate ca sva retasā

original: sārdhaṃ sa vairaṃ saṃyāti pumānstrī vā na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,189.8 //
analyzed: sārdham sa vairam saṃyāti pumān strī vā na saṃśayaḥ
piṣṭvā gavya ghṛtena eva pāṭhā mūlam pibet tu yaḥ

original: sarvaṃ viṣaṃ vinaśyecca nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,189.9 //
analyzed: sarvam viṣam vinaśyet ca na atra kāryā vicāraṇā
mūlam paryuṣita udena śirīṣasya yathā tathā
karṇayoḥ kāmalā vyādhi nāśaḥ syāt na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: trisaptāhena vai pītaṃ kṣayarogaṃ kṣayaṃ nayet // GarP_1,189.11 //
analyzed: tri sapta ahena vai pītam kṣaya rogam kṣayam nayet
nārikelasya vai puṣpam chāga kṣīreṇa saṃyutam
pibet ca trividhaḥ tasya rakta vātaḥ vinaśyati
kuryāt sudarśanā mūlam mālyena su samāhṛtam
puṣpam dhavalaguñjāyāḥ gṛhītam mūlam eva ca

original: mukhe tu nihitaṃ rudra harennānāviṣaṃ bahu // GarP_1,189.14 //
analyzed: mukhe tu nihitam rudra haret nānā viṣam bahu

original: haste baddhaṃ kāṇḍayuktaṃ kaṇṭhe baddhaṃ grahādihṛt /

analyzed: kṛṣṇāyāntu caturdaśyām kaṭi baddham samāhṛtam
siṃha ādi śvāpadāt bhītim haret ca nīlalohita
viṣṇukrāntā mūlam īśa karṇa baddhan tu dhārayet

original: paṭṭasūtreṇa bhūteśa makarādibhayaṃ na vai // GarP_1,189.16 //
analyzed: paṭṭasūtreṇa bhūteśa makara ādi bhayam na vai

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe ekonanavatyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe ekonanavatyadhikaśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
hariḥ uvāca
aparājitāyāḥ mūlañca go mūtreṇa samanvitam

original: pītañcāśu haratyeva gaṇḍamālāṃ na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,190.1 //
analyzed: pītam ca āśu harati eva gaṇḍamālām na saṃśayaḥ
atha indravāruṇī mūlam vidhinā pītam īśvara
jiṅgiṇyā eraṇḍakam rudra śūkaśimbyā samanvitam
śīta udakam ca bāhu grīvā vyathām haret
māhiṣam navanītam ca aśvagandhā ca pippalī
tad lepaḥ yuvatīnām ca kuryāt vṛtta ujakau śubhau
indravāruṇikā mūlam yasya nāmnā su dūratas

original: niḥ kṣipyate samutpāṭya tasya plīhā vinaśyati // GarP_1,190.5 //
analyzed: niḥ kṣipyate samutpāṭya tasya plīhā vinaśyati
punarnavāyāḥ śuklāyāḥ mūlam taṇḍula vāriṇā

original: pītaṃ vidradhinutsyācca nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,190.6 //
analyzed: pītam vidradhi nud syāt ca na atra kāryā vicāraṇā
kadalī dala kṣāram tu pānīyena prasādhitam
tasya adanāt vinaśyanti udara vyādhayaḥ khilāḥ
kadalyāḥ mūlam ādāya guḍa ājyena samanvitam
agninā sādhitam jagdham udara stha krimīn haret
nityam nimba dalānām ca cūrṇam āmalakasya ca

original: pratyūṣe bhakṣayeccaiva tasya kuṣṭhaṃ vinaśyati // GarP_1,190.9 //
analyzed: pratyūṣe bhakṣayet ca eva tasya kuṣṭham vinaśyati
harītakī viḍaṅgam ca haridrā sita sarṣapāḥ
somarājasya mūlāni karañjasya ca raundhavam
go mūtra piṣṭāni etāni kuṣṭha roga harāṇi vai
ekaḥ ca triphalā bhāgaḥ tathā bhāga dvayam śivā

original: somarājasya bījānāṃ jagdhaṃ pathyena dadrunut // GarP_1,190.11 //
analyzed: somarājasya bījānām jagdham pathyena dadru nud
kāṃsya ghṛṣṭam kharam lepāt kuṣṭha dadru vināśanam
haridrā haritālaḥ ca dūrvā go mūtra saindhavam

original: ayaṃ lepo hanti dadruṃ pāmānaṃ ca garaṃ tathā // GarP_1,190.13 //
analyzed: ayam lepaḥ hanti dadrum pāmānam ca garam tathā
soma rājasya bījāni navanīta yutāni ca
madhunā āsvāditāni syuḥ śukla kuṣṭha harāṇi vai

original: takrānnapānato rudra nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,190.14 //
analyzed: takra anna pānataḥ rudra na atra kāryā vicāraṇā
śvetāparā jitā mūlam vartitam ca asya vāriṇā
tad lepaḥ rudra māsena śukla kuṣṭha vināśanaḥ
māhiṣam navanītam ca sindūram sa marīcakam
pāmā vilepanāt naśyet dus nāmā vṛṣabhadhvaja
bhakṣitam śuklapittasya vināśa karam īśvara

original: mūlakasya tu bījāni hyapā mārgarasena vai /
analyzed: mūlakasya tu bījāni hi apāḥ mārga rasena vai

original: piṣṭāni tena lepena sidhmakaṃ rudra naśyati // GarP_1,190.18 //
analyzed: piṣṭāni tena lepena sidhmakam rudra naśyati
rambhā apāmārgayoḥ kṣāraḥ eraṇḍena vimiśritaḥ
tad abhyaṅgāt mahādeva
sadyas sidhma vinaśyati
kūṣmāṇḍa nāla kṣāraḥ ca sa go mūtraḥ ca tattvataḥ

original: jalapiṣṭā haridrā ca siddhā mandānalenahi // GarP_1,190.20 //
analyzed: jala piṣṭā haridrā ca siddhā manda analena hi
māhiṣeṇa purīṣeṇa veṣṭitā vṛṣabhadhvaja
asyāḥ udvartanam kuryāt aṅga sauṣṭhavam īśvara
tena udvartita dehaḥ syāt durgandhaḥ surabhiḥ pumān
manoharaḥ ca anudinam dūrvāṇām kākajaṅghāyā
arjunasya tu puṣpāṇi jambū patra yutāni ca

original: salodhrāṇi ca tallepo dehadurgandhatāṃ haret // GarP_1,190.23 //
analyzed: sa lodhrāṇi ca tad lepaḥ deha durgandha tām haret
yuktam lodhra bhavaiḥ noraiḥ cūrṇam tu kanakasya ca
tena udvartita dehasya na syāt grīṣma prabādhikā
dugdhena uṣasi sekaḥ ca gharma doṣaḥ ca naśyati
kākajaṅghā udvartanam tu hi aṅga rāga karam bhavet

original: madhuyaṣṭī śarkarā ca vāsakasya raso madhu /
analyzed: madhuyaṣṭī śarkarā ca vāsakasya rasaḥ madhu
etat pītam rakta pitta kāmalā pāṇḍu roga nud
raktapittam haret pītaḥ vāsakasya rasaḥ madhu

original: prātaḥ kāle toyapānātpīnasaṃ dāruṇaṃ haret // GarP_1,190.27 //
analyzed: prātar kāle toya pānāt pīnasam dāruṇam haret

original: bibhītakasya vai cūrṇaṃ pippalyāḥ saindhavasya ca /
analyzed: bibhītakasya vai cūrṇam pippalyāḥ saindhavasya ca

original: pītaṃ sakāñjikaṃ hanti svarabhedaṃ maheśvara // GarP_1,190.28 //
analyzed: pītam sa kāñjikam hanti svarabhedam maheśvara
cūrṇam āmalakam sevyam pītam gavya payaḥ nvitam

original: manaḥ śilā balāmūlaṃ kolapaṇa ca gugguluḥ // GarP_1,190.29 //
analyzed: manaḥ śilā balā mūlam ca gugguluḥ

original: jātipatraṃ kolapatraṃ tathā caiva manaḥ śilā /
analyzed: jāti patram kola patram tathā ca eva manaḥ śilā
ebhiḥ ca eva kṛtā vartiḥ badarī agnau maheśvara

original: dhūmapānaṃ kāsaharaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,190.30 //
analyzed: dhūma pānam kāsa haram na atra kāryā vicāraṇā
triphalā pippalī cūrṇam bhakṣitam madhunā āyutam
bhojana ādau hi
ritam haret
bilva mūlam ca sa madhu guḍūcī kvathitam jalam
pītam haret ca tri vadham chardim na eva atra saṃśayaḥ
pītā dūrvā chardi nud syāt piṣṭa ātaṇḍula vāriṇā

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe navatyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe navatyadhikaśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
hariḥ uvāca
punarnavāyāḥ mūlañca śvetam puṣye samāhṛtam

original: vāri pītaṃ tasya pārśva bhavaneṣu na pannagāḥ // GarP_1,191.1 //
analyzed: vāri pītam tasya pārśva bhavaneṣu na pannagāḥ
tārkṣya mūrtim vahet yaḥ vai bhallūka danta nirmitām

original: sa pannagairna dṛśyeta yāvajjīvaṃ vṛṣadhvaja // GarP_1,191.2 //
analyzed: sa pannagaiḥ na dṛśyeta yāvajjīvam vṛṣadhvaja
pibet śalmali mūlam yaḥ puṣya ṛkṣe rudra vāriṇā
tasmin apāsta daśanāḥ nāgāḥ syuḥ na atra saṃśayaḥ
puṣye lajjālukā mūle hasta baddhe tu pannagān

original: gṛhṇīyāllepato vāpi nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,191.4 //
analyzed: gṛhṇīyāt lepataḥ vā api na atra kāryā vicāraṇā
puṣye śveta arka mūlam tu pītam śītena vāriṇā
naśyetu daṃśaka viṣam karavīra ādi jam viṣam

original: mahākālasya vai mūlaṃ piṣṭaṃ tatkāñjikena vai /
analyzed: mahākālasya vai mūlam piṣṭam tat kāñjikena vai

original: voḍrāṇāṃ ḍuṇḍubhānāṃ ca tallopo harate viṣam // GarP_1,191.6 //
analyzed: voḍrāṇām ḍuṇḍubhānām ca tad lopaḥ harate viṣam
taṇḍulīyaka mūlam ca piṣṭam taṇḍula vāriṇā

original: ghṛtena saha pītantu haretsarvāviṣāṇi ca // GarP_1,191.7 //
analyzed: ghṛtena saha haret sarva aviṣāṇi ca
pītam tat daṃśaka viṣam naśyet ekena vā ubhayoḥ

original: pītaḥ sadugdho hanyācca daṃśakasyaviṣaṃ ca vai // GarP_1,191.9 //
analyzed: pītaḥ sa dugdhaḥ hanyāt ca daṃśakasya viṣam ca vai

original: tathā kodravamūlasya mohasya hara eva ca /
analyzed: tathā kodrava mūlasya mohasya haraḥ eva ca

original: yaṣṭīmadhusamāyuktā tathā pītā ca śarkarā // GarP_1,191.10 //
analyzed: yaṣṭīmadhu samāyuktā tathā pītā ca śarkarā

original: sadugdhā ca trirātreṇa mūṣakānāṃ viṣaṃ haret /
analyzed: sa dugdhā ca tri rātreṇa mūṣakānām viṣam haret
culuka traya pānāt ca vāriṇaḥ śītalasya vai
tāmbūla dagdha mukhasya lālā strāvaḥ vinaśyati

original: ghṛtaṃ saśarkaraṃ ṣītvā madyapānamado na vai // GarP_1,191.12 //
analyzed: ghṛtam sa śarkaram ṣītvā madya pāna madaḥ na vai
tatas naśyat gara viṣam tri rātreṇa maheśvara
uṣṇam gavya ghṛtam ca eva saindhavena samanvitam
nāśayet tat mahādeva vedanām vṛścika udbhavām
kusubham kaṅkumam ca eva haritālam manaḥ śilā

original: karañjaṃ piṣitaṃ caiva hyarkamūlaṃ ca śaṅkara // GarP_1,191.15 //
analyzed: karañjam piṣitam ca eva hi arka mūlam ca śaṅkara
viṣam nṛṇām vinaśyet tu eteṣām bhakṣaṇāt śiva
dīpa taila pradānāt ca daṃśaiḥ ā kīṭa jaiḥ śiva

original: kharjūrakaviṣaṃ naśyettadā vai nātra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,191.16 //
analyzed: kharjūraka viṣam naśyet tadā vai na atra saṃśayaḥ
daṃśasthānam vṛścikasya śuṇṭhī tagara saṃyutā
naśyet madhumakṣikāyāḥ eteṣām lepataḥ viṣam

original: śatapuṣpā saindhavañca sājyaṃ vā tena lepayet /
analyzed: śatapuṣpā saindhavam ca sa ājyam vā tena lepayet

original: śirīṣasya tu bījaṃvai siddha kṣīreṇa gharṣitam // GarP_1,191.18 //
analyzed: śirīṣasya tu bījam vai siddha kṣīreṇa gharṣitam
tad lepena mahādeva naśyet kukkura jam viṣam
tathā dardura jam viṣam
viṣam vinaśyet tu śaśāṅka aṅkita śekhara
vaṭa nimba śamīnām ca valkalaiḥ kvathitam jalam
tad sekāt mukha dantānām naśyet vai viṣa vedanā
lepanāt devadāroḥ ca gairikasya ca lepanāt

original: nāgeśvaro daridre dve tathā mañjiṣṭhakā hara /
analyzed: nāgeśvaraḥ daridre dve tathā mañjiṣṭhakāḥ hara
ebhiḥ lepāt vinaśyet tu lūtā viṣam umāpate
karañjasya tu bījāni varuṇacchadam eva ca

original: tilāśca sarṣapā hanyurviṣaṃ vai nātra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,191.23 //
analyzed: tilāḥ ca sarṣapāḥ hanyuḥ viṣam vai na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: ghṛtaṃ kumārīpatraṃ vai dattaṃ salavaṇaṃ hara /
analyzed: ghṛtam kumārī patram vai dattam sa lavaṇam hara
turaṅgama śarīrāṇām kaṇḍūḥ naśyet daśa ahataḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe ekanavatyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe ekanavatyadhikaśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
hariḥ uvāca
citrakasya aṣṭa bhāgāḥ ca śūraṇasya ca ṣoḍaśa

original: śuṇṭhyā bhāgāśca catvāro maricānāṃ dvayaṃ tathā // GarP_1,192.1 //
analyzed: śuṇṭhyāḥ bhāgāḥ ca catvāraḥ maricānām dvayam tathā
tritayam pippalī mūlam viḍaṅgānām catuṣṭayam
aṣṭau muśalikā bhāgāḥ triphalāyāḥ catuṣṭayam
dviguṇena guḍena eṣām modakān iha kārayet
tad bhakṣaṇam ajīrṇam hi pāṇḍu rogaṃja kāmalam
atīsārān ca manda agnim plīhān ca eva nivārayet
prasāraṇī aśvagandhā ca bṛhatī kaṇṭakārikā

original: balā cātibalā rāsnā śvadaṃṣṭrā ca punarnavā /
analyzed: balā ca atibalā rāsnā śvadaṃṣṭrā ca punarnavā

original: eraṇḍaḥ śārivā parṇo guḍūcī kapikacchukā // GarP_1,192.5 //
analyzed: eraṇḍaḥ śārivā parṇaḥ guḍūcī kapikacchukā
eṣām daśa palān bhāgān kvāthayet salile male
tena pāda avaśeṣeṇa taila pātre vipācayet

original: ājaṃ vā yadi gavyaṃ kṣīraṃ dattvā caturguṇam /
analyzed: ājam vā yadi gavyam kṣīram dattvā caturguṇam
śatāvarīm saindhavam ca taila tulyam pradāpayet
dravyāṇi yāni peṣyāṇi tāni vakṣyāmi tat śṛṇu
śatapuṣpā devadāruḥ balā parṇaḥ vacā aguru
kuṣṭham māṃsī saindhavam ca palam ekam punarnavā
pāne nasye tathā abhyaṅge tailam etat pradāpayet
hṛd śūlam pārśva śūlam ca gaṇḍamālām ca nāśayet
apasmāram vātaraktam vapuṣmān ca pumān bhavet
garbham aśvatarī vindyāt kim punar mānuṣī hara
aśvānām vāta bhagnānām kuñjarāṇām nṛṇām tathā
tailam etat prayoktavyam sarva vāta vikāriṇām
hiṅgu tumburu śuṇṭhībhiḥ siddham tailam tu sārṣapam

original: etaddhi puraṇaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ karṇaśūlāpahaṃ param // GarP_1,192.12 //
analyzed: etat hi puraṇam śreṣṭham karṇa śūla apaham param
śuṣka mūlaka śuṇṭhīnām kṣāraḥ hiṅgula nāgaram
takram caturguṇam dadyāt tailam etat vipācayet
bādhiryam karṇa śūlañca pūya strāvan ca karṇayoḥ
krimayaḥ ca vinaśyanti tailasya asya prapūraṇāt
śuṣka mūlaka śuṇṭhīnām kṣāraḥ hiṅgula nāgaram
sauvarcalam yavakṣāram sāmudram saindhavam tathā

original: granthikaṃ viḍamustaṃ ca madhu śuktaṃ caturguṇam // GarP_1,192.16 //
analyzed: granthikam viḍa mustam ca madhu śuktam caturguṇam
mātuluṅga rasaḥ ca eva kadalī rasaḥ eva ca
tailam ebhiḥ vipaktavyam karṇa śūla apaham param
bādhiryam karṇa nādaḥ ca pūya strāvaḥ ca dāruṇam
pūraṇādasya tailasya krimayaḥ karṇayoḥ hara
sadyas vināśam āyānti śaśāṅka kṛta śekhara
kṣāratailam idam śreṣṭham mukha danta mala apaham
jātī kaṅkola pūgānām lavaṅgasya phalāni ca
agurūṇi ca kastūrī kuṣṭham tagara pādikā

original: gorocanā priyaṅguśca balā caiva tathā nakhī // GarP_1,192.21 //
analyzed: gorocanā priyaṅguḥ ca balā ca eva tathā nakhī

original: saralaṃ saptaparṇaṃ ca lākṣā cāmalakī tathā /
analyzed: saralam saptaparṇam ca lākṣā ca āmalakī tathā

original: tathā tu padmakaṃ caiva hyetaistailaṃ prasādhayet // GarP_1,192.22 //
analyzed: tathā tu padmakam ca eva hi etaiḥ tailam prasādhayet

original: gacchati strīśataṃ rudra bandhyāpi labhate sutam // GarP_1,192.23 //
analyzed: gacchati strī śatam rudra bandhyā api labhate sutam

original: yavānī citrakaṃ dhānyaṃ tryūṣaṇaṃ jīrakaṃ tathā /
analyzed: yavānī citrakam dhānyam tryūṣaṇam jīrakam tathā
sauvarcalam viḍagam ca pippalī mūla rājikam
ebhiḥ pacet raghṛta prastham jala prastha aṣṭa saṃyutam

original: tathār'śogulmaśvayathuṃ hanti vahniṃ karoti vai // GarP_1,192.25 //
analyzed: tathā arśaḥ gulma śvayathum hanti vahnim karoti vai

original: maricaṃ trivṛtaṃ kuṣṭhaṃ haritālaṃ manaḥ śilā /
devadāru haridre dve kuṣṭhaṃ māṃsī ca candanam // GarP_1,192.26 //
analyzed: devadāru haridre dve kuṣṭham māṃsī ca candanam
viśālā arka kṣīram śakṛt rasaḥ

original: eṣāñca kārṣiko bhāgo viṣasyārdhapalaṃ bhavett // GarP_1,192.27 //
analyzed: eṣām ca kārṣikaḥ bhāgaḥ viṣasya ardha palam
pacet

original: mṛtpātre lohapātre vā śanairmṛdvagninā pacet // GarP_1,192.28 //
analyzed: mṛd pātre loha pātre vā śanais mṛdu agninā pacet
pāmā vicarcikā ca eva dadruḥ visphocakāni ca
abhyaṅgena praṇaśyanti komala tvañca jāyate
prabhūtāni api śvitrāṇi tailena anena mardayet
cira utthitam api śvitram vinaṣṭam tad kṣaṇāt bhavet
ebhiḥ lepāt sayuḥ arujaḥ vraṇāḥ vistrāviṇaḥ śiva

original: śaṅkhapuṣpī vacā somo brāhmī brahmasuvarcalāḥ // GarP_1,192.32 //

analyzed: abhayā ca guḍūcī ca āṭarūṣaka vākucī
etaiḥ akṣa samaiḥ bhāgaiḥ ghṛta prastham vipācayet
etat brāhmīghṛtam nāma smṛti medhā karam param

original: agnimantho vacā vāsā pippalī madhu saindhavam /
analyzed: agnimanthaḥ vacā vāsā pippalī madhu saindhavam
sapta rātra prayogeṇa kinnaraiḥ iva gīyate

original: apāmārgaḥ guḍūcī ca vacā kuṣṭhaṃ śatāvarī /
analyzed: apāmārgaḥ guḍūcī ca vacā kuṣṭham śatāvarī
tribhiḥ dinaiḥ naram kuryāt grantha aṣṭaśata dhāriṇam
adbhiḥ vā payasā ājyena māsam ekam tu sevitā
vacā karyāt naram prājñam śruti dhāraṇa saṃyutam
vacāyāḥ tad kṣaṇam kuryāt mahā prajñā yutam naram
bhūnimba nimba triphalā parpaṭaiḥ ca śṛtam jalam
paṭolī mustakābhyām ca vāsakena ca nāśayet
visphoṭakāni raktam ca na atra kāryā vicāraṇā

original: katakasya phalaṃ śaṅkhaṃ saindhavaṃ tryūṣaṇaṃ vacā // GarP_1,192.40 //
analyzed: katakasya phalam śaṅkham saindhavam tryūṣaṇam vacā

original: phenī rasāñjanaṃ kṣaudraṃ viḍaṅgāni manaḥ śilā /
eṣāṃ vartirhanti kācaṃ timiraṃ paṭalaṃ tathā // GarP_1,192.41 //
analyzed: eṣām vartiḥ hanti kācam timiram paṭalam tathā
prastha dvayam māṣakasya kvāthaḥ ca droṇam ambhasām
catur bhāga avaśeṣeṇa taila prastham vipācayet
kāñjikasya āḍhakam dattvā piṣṭāni etāni dāpayet

original: punarnavā gokṣurakaṃ saindhavaṃ tryūṣaṇaṃ vacā // GarP_1,192.43 //

analyzed: lavaṇam suradāruḥ ca mañjiṣṭhā kaṇṭakārikā
nasyāt pānāt harati eva karṇa śūlam su dāruṇam
bādhiryam sarva rogān ca hi abhyaṅgāt ca maheśvara
pala dvayam saindhavam ca śuṇṭhī citraka pañcakam
sauvīra pañca prastham ca taila prastham pacet tatas
udumbaram vaṭam plakṣam jambu dvayam atha arjunam

original: pippalī ca kadambañca palāśaṃ lodhratindukam // GarP_1,192.47 //
analyzed: pippalī ca kadambam ca palāśam lodhra tindukam
madhūkam āmra sarjan ca badaram padma keśaram
śirīṣa bījaṅkatakam etat kvāthena sādhitam
tailam hanti vraṇān lepāt cira kāla bhavān api

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe dvinavatyadhika śatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe dvinavatyadhika śatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
hariḥ uvāca
palāṇḍu jīrake kuṣṭham aśvagandhā ajamodakam
vacā trikaṭukam ca eva lavaṇam cūrṇam uttamam
brāhmī rasaiḥ bhāvitam ca sarpiḥ madhu samanvitam

original: saptāhaṃ bhakṣitaṃ kuryānnirmalāñca matiṃ parām // GarP_1,193.2 //

hariḥ uvāca
avāpa japtvā ca indra tvam viṣṇudharma ākhya vidyayā
sarvān śatrūn vinirjitya tān ca vakṣye maheśvara
pādayoḥ jānunoḥ ūrvoḥ udare hṛdi atha urasi
mukhe śirasi anupūrvam oṅkāra ādīni vinyaset
namaḥ nārāyaṇāya iti viparyāsam atha api ca
kara nyāsam tatas kuryāt dvādakṣara vidyayā

original: nyaseddhṛdaya oṅkāraṃ manuṃ mūrdhni samastakam // GarP_1,196.4 //
analyzed: nyaset hṛdaye oṅkāram manum mūrdhni samastakam

original: oṃ viṣṇave iti imaṃ mantranyāsamudīrayet // GarP_1,196.5 //
analyzed: om viṣṇave iti imam mantra nyāsam udīrayet

original: aṭavyāṃ narasiṃhastu rāmo rakṣatu parvate // GarP_1,196.7 //

original: karmabandhācca kapilo datto rogācca rakṣatu // GarP_1,196.8 //

original: nārado 'nyārcanāddevaḥ kūrmo vai nairṛte sadā // GarP_1,196.9 //

original: madhuhā cāparāhne ca sāyaṃ rakṣatu mādhavaḥ /

hṛṣīkeśaḥ pradoṣe vyāt pratyūṣe vyāt janārdanaḥ

original: śaṅkhaḥ padmaṃ ca śatrubhyaḥ śārṅgaṃ vai garuḍastathā /
analyzed: śaṅkhaḥ padmam ca śatrubhyaḥ śārṅgam vai garuḍaḥ tathā

original: śeṣaḥ sarpasvarūpaśca sadā sarvatra pātu mām /

original: vidikṣu dikṣu ca sadā nārasiṃhaśca rakṣatu // GarP_1,196.15 //
analyzed: vidikṣu dikṣu ca sadā nārasiṃhaḥ ca rakṣatu

original: sa vaśī syādvipāpmā ca rogamukto divaṃ vrajet // GarP_1,196.16 //
analyzed: sa vaśī syāt vipāpmā ca roga muktaḥ divam vrajet

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe ṣaṇṇavatyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe ṣaṇṇavatyadhikaśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
dhanvantariḥ uvāca
gāruḍam saṃpravakṣyāmi garuḍena hi udīritam

pṛthivī apaḥ tathā tejaḥ vāyuḥ ākāśam eva ca

original: kṣityādiṣveva vargāśca hyete vai maṇḍalādhipāḥ // GarP_1,197.2 //
analyzed: kṣiti ādiṣu eva vargāḥ ca hi ete vai maṇḍala adhipāḥ

original: saṣaḍaṅgaḥ śivaḥ prokto hṛcchiraśca śikhā kramāt /
analyzed: sa ṣaṣ aṅgaḥ śivaḥ proktaḥ hṛd śiraḥ ca śikhā kramāt
kavacam netram astram syāt nyāsaḥ sva sthala saṃsthitiḥ
sarva siddhi pradasya ante kāla vahniḥ a dhaḥ nilaḥ
ṣaṣṭha svara samāyuktam ardhendu saṃyutam param
parāpara vibhinnāḥ ca śivasya ūrdhva adhas īritāḥ
repheṇa aṅgeṣu sarvatra nyāsam kuryāt yathāvidhi

original: hṛdi pāṇitale dehe karṇe netre karoti ca /
analyzed: hṛdi pāṇi tale dehe karṇe netre karoti ca
japāt tu sarva siddhiḥ syāt caturvaktra samāyutām
caturaśrām su vistāram pīta varṇām tu cintayet
pṛthivīm ca indra devatyām madhye varuṇa maṇḍalam
madhye padmam tathā āyuktam ardhacandram su śītalam
indranīla dyutim saumyam athavā āgneya maṇḍalam
trikoṇam svasthikaiḥ yuktam smaret
bhinnāñjana nibha ākāram sva vṛttam bindu bhūṣitam
kṣīra ūrmi sadṛśa ākāram śuddha sphaṭika varcasam
plāvayantam jagat sarvam vyoma amṛtam anuṃsmaret
vāsukiḥ śaṅkhapālaḥ ca sthitau pārthiva maṇḍale

original: karkoṭaḥ padmanābhaśca vāruṇe tau vyavasthitau // GarP_1,197.12 //
analyzed: karkoṭaḥ padmanābhaḥ ca vāruṇe tau vyavasthitau
āgneye ca api kulikaḥ takṣaḥ ca eva mahābjakau

original: vāyumaṇḍalasaṃsthau ca pañca bhūtāni vinyaset // GarP_1,197.13 //
analyzed: vāyu maṇḍala saṃsthau ca pañca bhūtāni vinyaset
aṅguṣṭha ādi kaniṣṭhā antam anuloma vilomataḥ

original: parvasandhiṣu ca nyasyā jayā ca vijayā tathā // GarP_1,197.14 //
analyzed: parva sandhiṣu ca nyasyā jayā ca vijayā tathā
āsya ādi sva pura sthāne nyasyāt śiva paṣ aṅgakam

original: kaniṣṭhādau hṛdādau ca śikhāyāṃ karayornyaset // GarP_1,197.15 //
analyzed: kaniṣṭhā ādau hṛd ādau ca śikhāyām karayoḥ nyaset
vyāpakam tu kramāt aṅguli parvasu

original: bhūtānāñca punarnyāsaḥ śivāṅgāni tathaiva ca // GarP_1,197.16 //
analyzed: bhūtānām ca punar nyāsaḥ śiva aṅgāni tathā eva ca
praṇava ādi namaḥ ca ante nāmnā eva ca samanvitaḥ
sarva mantreṣu kathitaḥ vidhiḥ sthāpana pūjane
ādya akṣaram tad nāmnaḥ ca mantraḥ yam parikīrtitaḥ
aṣṭānām nāga jātīnām mantraḥ sānnidhya kārakaḥ
om svāhā kramaśas ca eva pañcabhūta purogatam
eṣa sākṣāt bhavet tārkṣyaḥ sarva karma prasādhakaḥ

original: karanyāsaṃ svaraiḥ kṛtvā śarīre tu punarnyaset /
analyzed: karanyāsam svaraiḥ kṛtvā śarīre tu punar nyaset
jvalantam cintayet prāṇam ātma saṃśuddhi kārakam
bījam tu cintayet paścāt varṣa antam amṛta ātmakam

original: evañcāpyāyanaṃ kṛtvā mūrdhni sañcintya cātmanaḥ // GarP_1,197.21 //
analyzed: evam ca āpyāyanam kṛtvā mūrdhni sañcintya ca ātmanaḥ
pṛthivīm pādayoḥ dadyāt tapta kāñcana saprabhām
aśeṣa bhuvana ākīrṇām lokapāla samanvitām

original: etāṃ bhagavatīṃ pṛthvīṃ svadehe vinyased budhaḥ /
analyzed: etām bhagavatīm pṛthvīm sva dehe vinyaset budhaḥ
śyāma varṇa mayam dhyāyet pṛthivī dviguṇam bhavet
jvālā mālā ākulam dīptam ābrahma bhuvana antakam

original: nābhigrīvāntare nyasya trikoṇaṃ maṇḍalaṃ raveḥ // GarP_1,197.24 //
analyzed: nābhi grīvā antare nyasya trikoṇam maṇḍalam raveḥ
bhinnāñjana nibha ākāram nikhilam vyāpya saṃsthitam
ātma mūrti sthitam dhyāyet vāyavyam tīkṣṇa maṇḍalam
sikhā upari sthitam divyam śuddha sphaṭika varcasam
apramāṇa mahā vyoma vyāpakam ca amṛta upamam
bhūtanyāsam purā kṛtvā nāgānām ca yathākramam

original: lakārāntā binduyutā mantrā bhūtakrameṇa tu // GarP_1,197.27 //
analyzed: lakāra antāḥ bindu yutāḥ mantrāḥ bhūta krameṇa tu
śivabījam tatas dadyāt tatas dhyāyet ca maṇḍalam
krama ākhyātaḥ maṇḍalasya vicakṣaṇaḥ
tasya tat cintayet varṇam karma kāle vidhāna vid
pāda pakṣaiḥ tathā cañcat kṛṣṇa nāgaiḥ vibhūṣitam

original: tārkṣyaṃ dhyāyettato nityaṃ viṣe sthāvarajaṅgame // GarP_1,197.29 //
analyzed: tārkṣyam dhyāyet tatas nityam viṣe sthāvara jaṅgame
graha bhūta piśāce ca ḍākinī yakṣa rākṣase
nāgaiḥ viveṣṭitam kṛtvā sva dehe vinyaset śivam

original: dvidhā nyāsaḥ samākhyāto nāgānāṃ caiva bhūtayoḥ /
analyzed: dvidhā nyāsaḥ samākhyātaḥ nāgānām ca eva bhūtayoḥ

original: evaṃ dhyātvā karma kuryādātmatattvādikaṃ kramāt // GarP_1,197.31 //
analyzed: evam dhyātvā karma kuryāt ātma tattva ādikam kramāt

original: tritattvaṃ pratham dattvā sivatattvaṃ tataḥ param /
analyzed: tri tattvam pratham dattvā sivatattvam tatas param

original: yathā dehe tathā deve aṅgulīnāṃ ca parvasu // GarP_1,197.32 //
analyzed: yathā dehe tathā deve aṅgulīnām ca parvasu
dehe nyāsam purā kṛtvā hi anuloma vilomataḥ

original: kandaṃ nālaṃ tathā padmaṃ dharmaṃ jñānādimeva ca // GarP_1,197.33 //
analyzed: kandam nālam tathā padmam dharmam jñāna ādim eva ca
dvitīya svara sambhinnam varga antena tu pūjayet

original: śaumiti karṇikāmadhye mūrdhni repheṇa saṃyutam // GarP_1,197.34 //
analyzed: śaum iti karṇikā madhye mūrdhni repheṇa saṃyutam
a ka ca ṭa ta pa ya śāḥ vargāḥ pūrva ādike nyaset

original: patrāntakesarānte tu dvau dvau pūrvādikau tathā // GarP_1,197.35 //
analyzed: patra anta kesara ante tu dvau dvau pūrva ādikau tathā
keśare tu svarān nyasyāt īśa antān ṣoḍaśa arcayet

original: vāmādyāḥ śaktayaḥ proktāstritattvantu tato nyaset // GarP_1,197.36 //
analyzed: vāmā ādyāḥ śaktayaḥ proktāḥ tri tattvam tu tatas nyaset
āvāhayet tatas mardhni śivam aṅgam tatas param

original: karṇikāyāṃ nyaseddevaṃ sāṃgaṃ tatra puraḥ saram // GarP_1,197.37 //
analyzed: karṇikāyām nyaset devam sa aṃgam tatra puras saram
pṛtivī paścime patre āpaḥ ca uttara saṃsthitāḥ

original: tejastu dakṣiṇe patre vāyuṃ pūrveṇa pūjayet // GarP_1,197.38 //
analyzed: tejaḥ tu dakṣiṇe patre vāyum pūrveṇa pūjayet
sva bījam mūrti rūpan tu prāc uktam
yam vāyu mūlam nairṛtye rephaḥ tu anala saṃsthitaḥ

original: vaṃ ca tvīśe sadā pūjya oṃ hṛdisthañca pūjayet /
analyzed: vaṃ ca tvā īśe sadā pūjya om hṛdisthan ca pūjayet
tanmātrān bhūtamātrān tān bahis eva prapūjayet
śiva aṅgāni tatas paścāt dhyātvā saṃpūjayet tatas

original: āgneyyāṃ hṛdayaṃ pūjya śira īśānagocare // GarP_1,197.41 //
analyzed: āgneyyām hṛdayam pūjya śiraḥ īśāna gocare

original: nairṛtye tu śikhāṃ dadyādvāyavyāṃ kavacaṃ nyaset /
analyzed: nairṛtye tu śikhām dadyāt vāyavyām kavacam nyaset
bāhyatas dadyāt netram uttara saṃsthitam
patra agre karṇika agre tu bījāni paripūjayet
ananta ādi kulīra antāḥ aṣṭau nāgāḥ kramāt sthitāḥ
pūrva ādika krameṇa eva tu īśa paryantam eva ca

original: pūjayecca sadā mantrī vidhānena pṛthakpṛthak // GarP_1,197.44 //
analyzed: pūjayet ca sadā mantrī vidhānena pṛthak pṛthak
hṛdi padme vidhānena śilā ādau datta maṇḍale
etat kāryam samuddiṣṭam nitya naimittike ca
ātmānam cintayet nityam kāma rūpam manoharam
plāvayantam jagat sarvam sṛṣṭi saṃhāra kārakam
jvālā mālābhiḥ uddīptam ā brahma bhuvana antakam
daśa bāhum catur vaktram piṅga akṣam śūla pāṇinam
daṃṣṭrā karālam ati ugram trinetram śaśi śekharam
bhairavam tu smaret siddhyai garuḍam sarva karmasu
nāgānām nāśana arthāya garuḍam bhīma bhīṣaṇam

original: pādau pātālaṃ saṃsthau ca diśaḥ pakṣāstu saṃśritāḥ // GarP_1,197.49 //
analyzed: pādau pātālam saṃsthau ca diśaḥ pakṣāḥ tu saṃśritāḥ

original: sapta svargā urasi ca brahmāṇḍaṃ kaṇṭhamāśritam /
analyzed: sapta svargāḥ urasi ca brahmāṇḍam kaṇṭham āśritam
pūrva ādi īśāna paryantam śiraḥ tasya vicintayet
sadāśiva śikhā anta stham śakti tritayam eva ca
parātparam śivam sākṣāt tārkṣyam bhuvana nāyakam
tri netram ugra rūpam ca viṣa nāga kṣayaṅkaram

original: grasanaṃ bhīmavaktraṃ ca garuḍaṃ mantravigraham // GarP_1,197.52 //
analyzed: grasanam bhīma vaktram ca garuḍam mantra vigraham
kālāgnim iva dīptam ca cintayet sarva karmasu

original: evaṃ nyāsavidhiṃ kṛtvā yadyanmanasi cintayet // GarP_1,197.53 //
analyzed: evam nyāsa vidhim kṛtvā yat yat manasi cintayet
tat tat eva bhavet sādhyam naraḥ vai garuḍāyate
pretāḥ bhūtāḥ tathā yakṣāḥ nāgāḥ gandharva rākṣasāḥ
darśanāt tasya naśyanti jvarāḥ cāturthika ādayaḥ
dhanvantariḥ uvāca

original: evaṃ sa garuḍaṃ proce garuḍaḥ kaśyapāya ca /
analyzed: evam sa garuḍam proce garuḍaḥ kaśyapāya ca

original: maheśvaro yathā gaurīṃ prāha vidyāṃ tathā śṛṇu // GarP_1,197.55 //
analyzed: maheśvaraḥ yathā gaurīm prāha vidyām tathā śṛṇu

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe saptanavatyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe saptanavatyadhikaśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
bhairavaḥ uvāca
nityaklinnām atho vakṣye tripurām bhukti mukti dām

original: oṃ hrīṃ āgaccha devi aiṃ hrīṃ hrīṃ rekhākāraṇam /
analyzed: om hrīṃ āgaccha devi aim hrīṃ hrīṃ rekhākāraṇam

original: oṃ hrīṃ kledinī bhaṃ namaḥ madanakṣobhiṇā tathā /
analyzed: om hrīṃ kledinī bhaṃ namaḥ madana kṣobhiṇā tathā

original: ai yaṃ yaṃ krīṃ vā guṇarekhayā hrīṃ madanāntare ca /
analyzed: ai yaṃ yaṃ krīṃ vā guṇa rekhayā hrīṃ madana antare ca

original: aiṃ hrīṃ hrīṃ ca nirañjanā vāgati madanāntarekhe khanetrāvalīti ca /
analyzed: aim     ca nirañjanā madana anta rekhe kha netra āvaliḥ iti ca
vegavati mahāpreta āsanāya ca pūjayet

original: oṃ hrīṃ kraiṃ naiṃ kraiṃ nityaṃ madadrave krīṃ namaḥ /
analyzed: om hrīṃ kraiṃ naiṃ kraiṃ nityam mada drave krīṃ namaḥ
aim hrīṃ tripurāyai namaḥ

original: oṃ hrīṃ krīṃ paścimavaktraṃ oṃ aiṃ hrīṃ hrīṃ ca tathottaram /
analyzed: om hrīṃ krīṃ paścima vaktram om aim hrīṃ hrīṃ ca tathā uttaram
aim   dakṣiṇam ūrdhvam vaktram tu paścimam

original: oṃ hrīṃ pāśāya krīṃ aṅkuśāya aiṃ kapālāya namaḥ /
analyzed: om hrīṃ pāśāya krīṃ aṅkuśāya aim kapālāya namaḥ

original: ādyaṃ bhayaṃ aiṃ hrīṃ ca tathā śiraḥ tathā śikhāyai kavace /
analyzed: ādyam bhayam aim hrīṃ ca tathā śiraḥ tathā śikhāyai kavace
aim hrīṃ krīṃ astrāya phaṭ

original: pūrve kāmarūpāya asitāṅgāya bhairavāya namo brahmāṇyai /
analyzed: pūrve kāmarūpāya asita aṅgāya bhairavāya namaḥ brahmāṇyai

original: dakṣiṇe cai kandāya vai namaḥ rurubhaivāya māheśvaryā vā āvāhayet // GarP_1,198.2 //
analyzed: dakṣiṇe kandāya vai namaḥ māheśvaryā vā āvāhayet
tathā paścime caṇḍāya vai namaḥ

original: kaumāryai cottare colkāya krodhāya namaḥ vaiṣṇavyai // GarP_1,198.3 //
analyzed: kaumāryai ca uttare ca ulkāya krodhāya namaḥ vaiṣṇavyai
agni koṇe aghorāya unmattabhairavāya iti vārāhyai

original: rakṣaḥ koṇe sārāya kapāline bhairavāya māherndyai // GarP_1,198.4 //
analyzed: rakṣaḥ koṇe sārāya kapāline bhairavāya māherndyai
vāyu koṇe jālandharāya bhīṣaṇāya bhairavāya cāmuṇḍāyai
īśa koṇake vaṭukāya saṃhāran caṇḍikām ca prapūjayet
rati prīti kāmadevān pañcabāṇān yajet atha
dhyāna arcanāt japya homāt devī siddhā ca sarvadā
nityā ca tripurā vyādhim hanyāt jvālāmukhī kramāt

original: jvālāmukhīkramaṃ vakṣye sā pūjyā madhyataḥ śubhā // GarP_1,198.7 //
analyzed: jvālāmukhī kramam vakṣye sā pūjyā madhyatas śubhā
nityāruṇā madanāturā mahāmohā prakṛtī api

original: mahendrāṇī ca kalanākarṣiṇī bhāratī tathā // GarP_1,198.8 //
analyzed: mahendrāṇī ca kalanākarṣiṇī bhāratī tathā

original: brahmāṇī caiva māheśī kaumārī vaiṣṇavī tathā /
analyzed: brahmāṇī ca eva māheśī kaumārī vaiṣṇavī tathā

original: vārāhī caiva māhendrī cāmuṇḍā cāparājitā // GarP_1,198.9 //
analyzed: vārāhī ca eva māhendrī cāmuṇḍā ca aparājitā
vijayā ca ajitā ca eva mohinī tvaritā tathā
jvālāmukhī kramam ca arcet viṣa ādi haraṇam bhavet

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe aṣṭanavatyadhikaśatatamodhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe aṣṭanavatyadhikaśatatamaḥ adhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
bhairavaḥ uvāca
atha cūḍāmaṇim vakṣye śubha aśubha viśuddhaye

original: sūryaṃ devīṃ gaṇaṃ soma smṛtvā tu vilikhennaraḥ // GarP_1,199.1 //
analyzed: sūryam devīm gaṇam soma smṛtvā tu vilikhet naraḥ
tri rekhā go mūrtrikā ābhā athavā praśra vākyataḥ
diśa sthāna prasūtaḥ vā dhvaja ādīn gaṇayet kramāt

original: dhvajo dhūmo 'tha siṃhaśca śvā vṛṣaḥ kharadantinau /
analyzed: dhvajaḥ siṃhaḥ ca śvā vṛṣaḥ khara dantinau

original: dhvāṅkṣaśca aṣṭamo jñeyo nāma mantraiśca tānnyaset // GarP_1,199.3 //
analyzed: dhvāṅkṣaḥ ca aṣṭamaḥ jñeyaḥ nāma mantraiḥ ca tān nyaset
dhvaja sthāne dhvajam dṛṣṭvā rājya cintā dhana ādikam

original: dhvajasthāne sthito dhūmro dhātucintā ca lābhakṛt // GarP_1,199.4 //
analyzed: dhvaja sthāne sthitaḥ dhūmraḥ dhātu cintā ca lābha kṛt
dhvaja sthāne sthite siṃhe dhana lābha ādikam bhavet
sthite śunidhvaja sthāne dāsī cintā sukha ādikam

original: dhvajasthāne vṛṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā sthānacintā ca lābhakam /
analyzed: dhvaja sthāne vṛṣam dṛṣṭvā sthāna cintā ca lābhakam

original: dhvajasthāne kharaṃ dṛṣṭvā duḥ khakleśādikaṃ bhavet // GarP_1,199.6 //
analyzed: dhvaja sthāne kharam dṛṣṭvā duḥ kha kleśa ādikam bhavet
dhvaja sthāne gajam dṛṣṭvā sthāna cintā jaya ādikam

original: dhvajasthāne tathā dhvāṅkṣe kleśacintā dhanakṣayaḥ // GarP_1,199.7 //
analyzed: dhvaja sthāne tathā dhvāṅkṣe kleśa cintā dhana kṣayaḥ

original: dhūmrasthāne dhvajaṃ dṛṣṭvā pūrvaṃ duḥ khaṃ tato dhanam /
analyzed: dhūmra sthāne dhvajam dṛṣṭvā pūrvam duḥ kham tatas dhanam

original: dhūmre dhūmraṃ tathā dṛṣṭvā kaliduḥ khādikaṃ bhavet // GarP_1,199.8 //
analyzed: dhūmre dhūmram tathā dṛṣṭvā kha ādikam bhavet
dhūmra sthāne sthite siṃhe manaḥ cintā dhana ādikam

original: dhūmrasthāne śuni sthite jayalābhādikaṃ bhavet // GarP_1,199.9 //
analyzed: dhūmra sthāne śuni sthite jaya lābha ādikam bhavet
dhūmra sthāne vṛṣam dṛṣṭvā śvadhana ādikam

original: dhūmrasthāne kharaṃ dṛṣṭvā vyādhiścāpi dhanakṣayaḥ // GarP_1,199.10 //
analyzed: dhūmra sthāne kharam dṛṣṭvā vyādhiḥ ca api dhana kṣayaḥ
dhūmra sthāne gaje dṛṣṭe rājya lābha jaya ādikam
dhūmra sthāne sthite dhvāṅkṣe dhana rājya vināśanam
siṃha sthāne dhvajam dṛṣṭvā rājya lābha ādi nirdiśet
siṃha sthāne sthite dhūmre kanyā prāptiḥ dhana ādikam
siṃha sthāne sthite siṃhe jayaḥ mitra samāgamaḥ
kauleyake siṃha gate strī cintā grāma lābhakam
siṃha sthāne vṛṣam dṛṣṭvā gṛha kṣetra artha lābhakam

original: siṃhasthāne gajaṃ dṛṣṭvā grāmasvāmitvameva ca // GarP_1,199.14 //
analyzed: siṃha sthāne gajam dṛṣṭvā grāma svāmi tvam eva ca
siṃha sthāne sthite dhvāṅkṣe kanyā dhānya guṇa ādikam
śunaḥ sthāne dhvajam dṛṣṭvā sthāna cintā sukha ādikam

original: śunaḥ sthāne sthite dhūmre kalahaṃ kāryanāśanam // GarP_1,199.16 //
analyzed: śunaḥ sthāne sthite dhūmre kalaham kārya nāśanam
śunaḥ sthāna sthite siṃhe kārya asiddhiḥ bhaviṣyati

original: sthite śuni śunaḥ sthāne dhananāśo bhaviṣyati // GarP_1,199.17 //
analyzed: sthite śuni śunaḥ sthāne dhana nāśaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: śunaḥ sthāne vṛṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā rogī rogādvi mucyate /
analyzed: śunaḥ sthāne vṛṣam dṛṣṭvā rogī rogāt vi mucyate

original: śunaḥ sthāne kharaṃ dṛṣṭvā kalahasya bhayaṃ bhavet // GarP_1,199.18 //
analyzed: śunaḥ sthāne kharam dṛṣṭvā kalahasya bhayam bhavet
śunaḥ sthāne gajam dṛṣṭvā putra bhāryā samāgamaḥ

original: śvasthāne ca sthite dhvāṅkṣe pīḍāsyātkulanāśanam // GarP_1,199.19 //
analyzed: śva sthāne ca sthite dhvāṅkṣe pīḍā asyāt kula nāśanam
vṛṣa sthāne dhvajam dṛṣṭvā rāja pūjā sukha ādikam
vṛṣa sthāne sthite siṃhe saubhāgyam ca dhana ādikam

original: sthite śuni vṛṣasthāne balaśrīkāma īritaḥ // GarP_1,199.21 //
analyzed: sthite śuni vṛṣa sthāne bala śrī kāmaḥ īritaḥ
vṛṣa sthāne vṛṣam dṛṣṭvā kīrti tuṣṭi sukha ādikam

original: vṛṣasthāne kharaṃ dṛṣṭvā mahālābhādikaṃ bhavet // GarP_1,199.22 //
analyzed: vṛṣa sthāne kharam dṛṣṭvā mahā lābha ādikam bhavet
vṛṣa sthāne gajam dṛṣṭvā strī gaja ādi samāgamaḥ
vṛṣa sthāne sthite dhvāṅkṣe sthāna māna samāgamaḥ
khara sthāne dhvajam dṛṣṭvā roga śoka ādikam bhavet

original: kharasthāne sthite dhūmre taskarādibhayaṃ bhavet // GarP_1,199.24 //
analyzed: khara sthāne sthite dhūmre taskara ādi bhayam bhavet
sthite śuni khara sthāne santāpa dhana nāśanam
khara sthāne vṛṣam dṛṣṭvā sukham priya samāgamaḥ

original: kharasthāne kharaṃ dṛṣṭvā duḥ khīpīḍādi nirdiśet // GarP_1,199.26 //
analyzed: khara sthāne kharam dṛṣṭvā duḥ khī pīḍā ādi nirdiśet
khara sthāne gajam dṛṣṭvā sukha puttra ādikam bhavet

original: kharasthāne sthite dhvāṅkṣe kalaho vyādhireva ca // GarP_1,199.27 //
analyzed: khara sthāne sthite dhvāṅkṣe kalahaḥ vyādhiḥ eva ca
gaja sthāne dhvajam dṛṣṭvā strī jaya śrī sukha ādikam
gaja sthāne sthite dhūmre dhana dhānya samāgamaḥ
gaja sthāne sthite siṃhe jaya siddhi samāgamaḥ

original: sthite śuni gajasthāne ārogyaṃ sukhasampadaḥ // GarP_1,199.29 //
analyzed: sthite śuni gaja sthāne ārogyam sukha sampadaḥ
gaja sthāne vṛṣam dṛṣṭvā rājamāna dhana ādikam

original: gajasthāne kharaṃ dṛṣṭvā pūrvaṃ duḥ khaṃ tataḥ sukham // GarP_1,199.30 //
analyzed: gaja sthāne kharam dṛṣṭvā pūrvam duḥ kham tatas sukham
gaja sthāne gajam dṛṣṭvā kṣetra dhānya sukha ādikam
gaja sthāne sthite dhvāṅkṣe dhana dhānya samāgamaḥ
dhvāṅkṣa sthāne dhvajam dṛṣṭvā kārya nāśaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: dhvāṅkṣasthāne sthite dhūmre kaliduḥ khaṃ gamiṣyati // GarP_1,199.32 //
analyzed: dhvāṅkṣa sthāne sthite dhūmre kaliduḥ kham gamiṣyati

original: dhvāṅkṣasthāne sthite siṃhe vigraho duḥ khameva ca /
analyzed: dhvāṅkṣa sthāne sthite siṃhe vigrahaḥ duḥ kham eva ca
dhvāṅkṣa sthāne sthite śvāne gṛha bhaṅga bhaya ādikam
dhvāṅkṣa sthāne vṛṣam dṛṣṭvā sthāna bhraṃśa bhaya ādikam
dhvāṅkṣa sthāne kharam dṛṣṭvā dhana nāśa parājayau
dhvāṅkṣa sthāne gajam dṛṣṭvā dhana kīrti ādikam bhavet
dhvāṅkṣa sthāne sthite dhvāṅkṣe videśa gamana ādikam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe navanavatyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe navanavatyadhikaśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
bhairavaḥ uvāca
vakṣye vāyujayam devi jayā jayavideśakam
vāyu agni jala śakra ākhyam maṅgalānām catuṣṭayam
vāma dakṣiṇa saṃsthaḥ ca vāyuḥ ca bahulaḥ bhavet
ūrdhva vāhī bhavet agniḥ adhas tu varuṇaḥ bhavet
mahendraḥ madhya saṃsthaḥ tu śuklapakṣe tu vāmagaḥ
kṛṣṇa pakṣe dakṣiṇa gaḥ udayasya tri ahan tri aham
vahet pratipad ādye ca viparīte bhavet natiḥ
udayaḥ sūrya mārgeṇa candreṇa astamayaḥ yadi
vardhante guṇa saṃghātāḥ anyathā

original: saṃkrāntyaḥ ṣoḍaśaproktā divā rātrau varānane // GarP_1,200.5 //
analyzed: saṃkrāntyaḥ ṣoḍaśa proktāḥ divā rātrau varānane
yadā ca saṃkramet vāyuḥ ardha ardha prahare sthitaḥ
svāsthya hāniḥ tadā jñeyā vāyuḥ bhramati dehiṣu
dakṣiṇe ca puṭe vāyuḥ hitaḥ bhojana maithune
khaḍga hastaḥ jayet yuddhe ripūn kāma samanvitaḥ
vāmā iva gamanam śreṣṭham sarva kāryeṣu bhūṣitam

original: vāyurvahati tatrasthaḥ praśro bhūtasya śobhanaḥ // GarP_1,200.8 //
analyzed: vāyuḥ vahati tatrasthaḥ praśraḥ bhūtasya śobhanaḥ

original: māhendre vāruṇe vāte ko 'pi doṣo na jāyate /
analyzed: māhendre vāruṇe vāte kaḥ pi doṣaḥ na jāyate
anāvṛṣṭiḥ dakṣa vāhe vṛṣṭiḥ syāt vāma vāhake

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe dviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe dviśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
dhanvantariḥ uvāca
hayāyurvedam ākhyāsye hayam sarva artha lakṣaṇam
kākatuṇḍaḥ kṛṣṇa jihvaḥ vṛkṣa āsyaḥ ca uṣṇa tālukaḥ
karālaḥ hīna dantaḥ ca śṛṅgī virala dantakaḥ

original: ekāṇḍaścaiva jātāṇḍaḥ kañcukī dvikhurī stanī // GarP_1,201.2 //
analyzed: eka aṇḍaḥ ca eva jāta aṇḍaḥ kañcukī dvi khurī stanī
yama jaḥ vāmanaḥ ca eva mārjāraḥ kapi locanaḥ
etad doṣī hayaḥ tyājyaḥ śvas turuṣka jaḥ
madhyamaḥ pañca hastaḥ ca kanīyān ca tri hastakaḥ

original: asaṃhatā ye ca vāhā hrasvakarṇāstathaiva ca /
analyzed: asaṃhatāḥ ye ca vāhāḥ hrasva karṇāḥ tathā eva ca
śabala ābhāḥ prabhāveṣu na dīnāḥ cira jīvinaḥ
revanta pūjanāt homāt rakṣyāḥ ca
saralam nimba patrāṇi guggulam sarṣapān ghṛtam
tilam ca eva vacām higum badhnīyāt vājinaḥ gale
āgantu jam doṣa jantu vraṇam dvividham īritam
cira pākam vāta jantu śleṣma jam kṣipra pākakam
kaṇṭha dāha ātmakam pittāt śoṇitāt manda vedanam
āgantu jantu śastra ādyaiḥ duṣṭavraṇa viśodhanam
tila saktuka piṇḍikā dadhi yuktā sa saindhavā
paṭolam nimba patram ca vacā citrakam eva ca
cūrṇam ekatra kārayet
etad pānāt krimi śleṣma manda anila vināśanam

original: nimbapatraṃ paṭo lañca triphalā khadiraṃ tathā // GarP_1,201.12 //
analyzed: nimba patram paṭaḥ lañca triphalā khadiram tathā
kvāthayitvā tatas vā aham sṛta raktam vicakṣaṇaḥ
tri aham eva haya kuṣṭha upaśāntaye

original: savraṇeṣu ca kuṣṭheṣu tailaṃ sarṣapajaṃ hitam /
analyzed: sa vraṇeṣu ca kuṣṭheṣu tailam sarṣapa jam hitam
laśunādi kaṣāyaḥ ca pāna bhukti upaśāntaye
sadyas dadyāt tatra nasyam anyaiḥ vātaiḥ su saṃyutaiḥ
pala dvayam prathame hni ekaika pala vṛddhitaḥ
yāvat dināni pūrṇāni palāni aṣṭādaśa uttame
adhame ṣṭa palāni syuḥ madhyame syuḥ caturdaśa
śarad nidāghayoḥ na eva deyam na eva tu dāpayet
tailena vātike roge śarkarā ājya payaḥ nvitaiḥ

original: kaṭutailaiḥ kaphe vyoṣaiḥ pitte catriphalāmbubhiḥ // GarP_1,201.18 //
analyzed: kaṭutailaiḥ kaphe vyoṣaiḥ pitte ca triphalā ambubhiḥ
śāli ṣaṣṭika dugdha āśī hayaḥ jugupsitaḥ
pakva jambū nibhaḥ śvas na jugupsitaḥ
ardha praharaṇe dhurye guggulum prāśayet hayam

original: bhojayetpāyasaṃ dugdhaṃ satvaraṃ susthiro hayaḥ // GarP_1,201.20 //
analyzed: bhojayet pāyasam dugdham sa tvaram su sthiraḥ hayaḥ

original: vikāre bhojane dugdhaṃ śālyannaṃ vātale dadet /
analyzed: vikāre bhojane dugdham śāli annam vātale dadet
karṣa māṃsa rasaiḥ pitte madhu mudga rasa ājyakaiḥ
kaphe mudgān kulatthān vā kaṭu tiktān kaphe haye

original: bādhirye vyādhite grāse tridoṣādau tu gugguluḥ // GarP_1,201.22 //
analyzed: bādhirye vyādhite grāse tridoṣa ādau tu gugguluḥ
ghāsaiḥ dūrvā sarva roge prathame hni palam dadet
vivardhayet tatas karṣam eka ahni pala pañcakam

original: pāne ca bhojane caiva aśītipalakaṃ param /
analyzed: pāne ca bhojane ca eva aśīti palakam param
madhye ṣaṣṭiḥ ca adhameṣu catvāriṃśat ca bhogiṣu

original: mandāgnau śotharoge ca gavāṃ mūtreṇa yojitam // GarP_1,201.25 //
analyzed: manda agnau śotha roge ca gavām mūtreṇa yojitam

original: deyaṃ kṛśānāṃ puṣṭyarthaṃ māṃsairyuktaṃ ca bhojanam // GarP_1,201.26 //
analyzed: deyam kṛśānām puṣṭi artham māṃsaiḥ yuktam ca bhojanam
su piṣṭāyāḥ pradātavyam guḍūcyāḥ pala pañcakam

original: prabhāte ghṛtasaṃyuktaṃ śaradgīṣme ca vājinām // GarP_1,201.27 //
analyzed: prabhāte ghṛta saṃyuktam śarad gīṣme ca vājinām
roga ghnam puṣṭi dam ca api bala tejaḥ vivardhanam
tat eva aśvāya dātavyam kṣīra yuktam atha api vā
guḍūcī kalpa yogena śatāvarī aśvagandhayoḥ

original: catvāri trīṇi madhyasya jaghanyasya palāni hi // GarP_1,201.29 //
analyzed: catvāri trīṇi madhyasya jaghanyasya palāni hi
akasmāt yatra vāhānām eka rūpam yadā bhavet

original: mriyate ca yadā kṣipramupasargaṃ tamādiśet // GarP_1,201.30 //
analyzed: mriyate ca yadā kṣipram upasargam tam ādiśet
homa ādyaiḥ rakṣayā vipra bhojanaiḥ bali karmaṇā
śāntyā upasarga śāntiḥ syāt harītakyādi kalpataḥ
harītakī gavām mūtraiḥ tailena lavaṇa anvitā

original: ādau pañca tataḥ pañca vṛddhyā pūrṇaśatāvadhi /
analyzed: ādau pañca tatas pañca vṛddhyā pūrṇa śata avadhi

original: uttamā ca śataṃ mātrāstvaśītiḥ ṣaṣṭireva vā // GarP_1,201.32 //
analyzed: uttamā ca śatam mātrāḥ tu aśītiḥ ṣaṣṭiḥ eva vā
gajāyurvedam ākhyāsye uktāḥ kalpāḥ gaje hitāḥ
gaje caturguṇāḥ mātrāḥ tābhiḥ gaja ruj ardanaḥ
śamanam śānti karma ca
pūjayitvā surān viprān ratnaiḥ gām kapilām dadet
danti danta dvaye mālām nibandhīyāt upoṣitaḥ
mantreṇa mantritān vaidyaiḥ vacā siddhārthakān tathā
sūrya ādi śiva durgā śrī viṣṇu arcā rakṣayet gajam

original: baliṃ dadyācca bhūtebhyaḥ snāpayecca caturghaṭaiḥ // GarP_1,201.36 //
analyzed: balim dadyāt ca bhūtebhyaḥ snāpayet ca catur ghaṭaiḥ
bhojanam mantritam dadyāt bhasmanā uddhūnayet gajamam

original: bhūtarakṣā śubhā medhyā vāraṇaṃ rakṣayetsadā // GarP_1,201.37 //
analyzed: bhūta rakṣā śubhā medhyā vāraṇam rakṣayet sadā
triphalā pañcakole ca daśamūlam viḍaṅgakam
śatāvarī guḍūcī ca nimba vāsaka kiṃśukāḥ
āyurveda dvaya uktānām uktam saṃkṣepa sārataḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe gajāśvāyurvedanirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikādhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe gajāśvāyurvedanirūpaṇam nāma ekādhikadviśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
hariḥ uvāca
ekam punarnavā mūlam apāmārgasya vā śiva

original: sarasaṃ yoniniḥ kṣiptaṃ varāṅgasya vyathāṃ haret /
analyzed: sa rasam kṣiptam varāṅgasya vyathām haret
prasūti vedanām ca eva taruṇīnām vyathām haret
bhūmi kūṣmāṇḍa mūlam vai śāli cūrṇam atha api vā
sapta aham dugdha pītam syāt strīṇām bahu payaskaram
rudra indravāruṇī mulam lepāt strī stana vedanā

original: naśyeta ghṛtapakvā ca kāryāvaśyantu polikā // GarP_1,202.3 //
analyzed: naśyeta ghṛta pakvā ca
bhakṣitā sā maheśāna yoni śūlam vināśayet
pralepitā kāravella mūlena eva vinirgatā
yoniḥ praveśam āyāti na atra kāryā vicāraṇā
nīlī paṭola mūlāni sa ājyāni tila vāriṇā
piṣṭāni eṣām pralepaḥ vai jvālā gardabha rāganat

original: pāṭhāmūlaṃ rudra pītaṃ piṣṭaṃ taṇḍulavāriṇā // GarP_1,202.6 //

analyzed: pāpa roga haram syāt ca kuṣṭha pānam tathā eva ca
vā asya udakam ca sa madhu pītam antargatasya vai
pāpa rogasya santāpa nivṛktim kurute śiva

original: ghṛtatulyā rudra lākṣā pītā kṣīreṇa vai saha // GarP_1,202.8 //
analyzed: ghṛta tulyā rudra lākṣā pītā kṣīreṇa vai saha

original: pradaraṃ harate rogaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā /
analyzed: pradaram harate rogam na atra kāryā vicāraṇā

original: dvijayaṣṭī trikaṭukaṃ cūrṇaṃ pītaṃ harecchiva // GarP_1,202.9 //

analyzed: tila kvāthena saṃyuktam rakta gulmam striyāḥ hara
kusumasya nibaddhañca taruṇīnām maheśvara
raktotpalasya vai kandam śarkarā tila saṃyutam
pītam sa śarkaram strīṇām dhārayet garbha pātanam
rakta strāvasya nāśaḥ syāt śīta udaka niṣevaṇāt

original: pītantu kāñjika rudra kvathitaṃ śarapuṅkhayā // GarP_1,202.12 //
analyzed: kāñjika rudra kvathitam śarapuṅkhayā
hiṅguḥ traindhava saṃyuktam śīghram strīṇām prasūti kṛt

original: mātuluṅgasya vai mūlaṃ kaṭibaddhaṃ prasūtikṛt // GarP_1,202.13 //
analyzed: mātuluṅgasya vai mūlam kaṭi baddham prasūti kṛt
apāmārgasya vai mūle garbhavatyāḥ tu nāmataḥ

original: utpāṭyamāne sakale puttraḥ syādānyathā sutā // GarP_1,202.14 //
analyzed: utpāṭyamāne sakale puttraḥ syāt ānyathā sutā

original: apāmārgasya vai mūle nārīṇāṃ śirasi sthite /
analyzed: apāmārgasya vai mūle nārīṇām śirasi sthite

original: garbhaśūlaṃ vinaśyeta nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,202.15 //
analyzed: garbha śūlam vinaśyeta na atra kāryā vicāraṇā
karpūra madana phala madhukaiḥ pūritaḥ śiva

original: yoniḥ subhā syādvṛddhāyā yuvatyāḥ kiṃ punarhara // GarP_1,202.16 //
analyzed: yoniḥ subhā syāt vṛddhāyāḥ yuvatyāḥ kim punar hara
yasya bālasya tilakaḥ kṛtaḥ gaurocanā ākhyayā
śarkarā kuṣṭha pānam ca dattam sa syāt ca nirbhayaḥ
viṣa bhūta graha ādibhyaḥ vyādhibhyaḥ bālakaḥ śiva
śaṅkhanābhi vacā kuṣṭha lohānām dhāraṇam sadā
bālānām upasargebhyaḥ rudra rakṣā karam bhavet
sa viḍaṅgam pīta mātram naram kuryāt mahāmatim
māsa ekena mahādeva jarā maraṇa varjitaḥ

original: saptāhaṃ bhakṣitaṃ rudra jarāṃ nayati saṃkṣayam // GarP_1,202.21 //
analyzed: sapta aham bhakṣitam rudra jarām nayati saṃkṣayam

original: jagdhvā māsaṃ yuvā syācca naro vāgīśvarī bhavet // GarP_1,202.22 //
analyzed: jagdhvā māsam yuvā syāt ca naraḥ vāc īśvarī bhavet
śivā āmalaka cūrṇam vai madhunā udakena vā

original: balāni kuryānnāsāyāḥ pratyūṣe bhakṣitaṃ śiva // GarP_1,202.23 //
analyzed: balāni kuryāt nāsāyāḥ pratyūṣe bhakṣitam śiva
sākṣāt surabhi dehaḥ vai jīvet varṣa sahasrakam
māṣasya vidalāni ye vituṣāṇi maheśvara
ghṛta bhāvita śuṣkāṇi payasā sādhitāni vai
sa mādhu ājya payobhiḥ ca bhakṣayitvā ca kāmayet

original: strīṇāṃ śataṃ mahādeva tatkṣaṇānnātra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,202.26 //
analyzed: strīṇām śatam mahādeva tad kṣaṇāt na atra saṃśayaḥ
rasaḥ ca eraṇḍa tailena gandhakena śubhaḥ bhavet
trikāla udaka saṃghuṣṭaḥ bala kṛt bhakṣaṇāt bhavet
dugdham vituṣa māṣaiḥ ca śimbā bījaiḥ ca sādhitam
apāmārgasya tailena pītam strī śata kāma kṛt

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe nānāvidhoṣadhaprayogānirūpaṇaṃ nāma dvyuttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe nānāvidhoṣadhaprayogānirūpaṇam nāma dvyuttaradviśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
hariḥ uvāca

original: yā gaurdveṣṭiṃ svakaṃ vatsaṃ tasyā deyaṃ svakaṃ payaḥ /
analyzed: yā gauḥ dveṣṭim svakam vatsam tasyāḥ deyam svakam payaḥ

original: lavaṇena samāyuktaṃ tasyā vatsaḥ priyo bhavet // GarP_1,203.1 //
analyzed: lavaṇena samāyuktam tasyāḥ vatsaḥ priyaḥ bhavet

original: śuno 'sthi kaṇṭhabaddhaṃ hi mahiṣāṇāṃ gavā tathā /
analyzed: śunaḥ sthi kaṇṭha baddham hi mahiṣāṇām gavā tathā

original: kṛmijālaṃ pātayati sakalaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,203.2 //
analyzed: kṛmi jālam pātayati sakalam na atra saṃśayaḥ
gojaṅganā abhipātaḥ syāt guñjā mūlasya bhakṣaṇāt
varuṇa phalasya rasam kareṇa mathitam śiva
catuṣpāda dvipadayoḥ kṛmi jālam nipātayet
vraṇam ca śamayet rudra jayāyāḥ pūraṇāt tathā
gaja mūtrasya vai pānam go mahiṣī upasarga nud

original: kṣīre go-mahīṣasyaiva goḥ puṃsaśca hitaṃ bhavet // GarP_1,203.6 //
analyzed: kṣīre go mahīṣasya eva goḥ puṃsaḥ ca hitam bhavet
patram ca śarapuṅkhāyāḥ dattam sa lavaṇam śiva
vāri sphoṭam hayānām ca kesarāṇām vināśayet
ghṛta kumārī patram eva dattam sa lakṣaṇam hara
turaga makesarāṇām kaṇḍūn aṃśyet na saṃśayaḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe nānauṣadhaprayoganirūpaṇaṃ nāma tryuttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe nānauṣadhaprayoganirūpaṇam nāma tryuttaradviśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
sūtaḥ uvāca
evam dhanvantariḥ prāha suśrutāya ca vaidyakam

original: ata nāmāni vakṣyāmi oṣadhīnāṃ samāsataḥ // GarP_1,204.1 //
analyzed: atas nāmāni vakṣyāmi oṣadhīnām samāsatas
sthirā vidārigandhā ca śālapaṇī aśumatī api

original: lāṅgalī kalasī caiva kroṣṭupucchā guhā matā // GarP_1,204.2 //

analyzed: punarnavā atha parṣābhūḥ kaṭhilyā kāruṇā tathā
eraṇḍaḥ ca uruvūkaḥ syāt āmardaḥ vardhamānakaḥ

original: jhaṣā nāgabalā jñeyā śvadaṃṣṭrā gokṣuro mataḥ /

analyzed: śatāvarī varā bhīru pīvarī indīvarī varī

original: vyāghrī tu bṛhatī kṛṣṇā haṃsapādī madhustravā /
analyzed: vyāghrī tu bṛhatī kṛṣṇā haṃsapādī madhustravā

original: dhāmanī kaṇṭakārī syātkṣudrā siṃhī nidigdhikā // GarP_1,204.5 //

analyzed: mudga parṇaḥ kṣudra sahā māṣa parṇaḥ mahā sahā

original: tyajā parā ca mahā jñeyā daṇḍayonyaṅkasaṃjñayā /
analyzed: tyajā parā ca mahā jñeyā daṇḍa yoni aṅka saṃjñayā

original: nyagrodhastu vaṭo jñeyaḥ aśvatthaḥ kapilo mataḥ // GarP_1,204.7 //
analyzed: nyagrodhaḥ tu vaṭaḥ jñeyaḥ aśvatthaḥ kapilaḥ mataḥ

original: tṛtīyā jalajambūḥ syānnādeyī sā ca kīrtitā /
analyzed: tṛtīyā jalajambūḥ syāt nādeyī sā ca kīrtitā

original: kaṇā kṛṣṇopakuñcī ca śauṇḍī māgadhiketi ca // GarP_1,204.11 //
analyzed: kaṇā kṛṣṇā upakuñcī ca śauṇḍī māgadhikā iti ca

original: ūṣaṇaṃ maricaṃ jñeyaṃ śuṇṭhī viśvaṃ mahauṣadham // GarP_1,204.12 //

analyzed: vyoṣam kaṭutrayam vidyāt tryūṣaṇam tat ca kīrtyate

original: lāṅgalī halinī ca syāccheyasī gaja pippalī // GarP_1,204.13 //
analyzed: lāṅgalī halinī ca syāt śeyasī gaja pippalī

original: ṣaḍgranthogrā vacā jñeyā śvetā haimavatīti ca /
analyzed: ṣaḍgranthā ugrā vacā jñeyā śvetā haimavatī iti ca

original: kuṭajo vṛkṣakaḥ śakro vatsako girimāllikā // GarP_1,204.15 //
mustakto meghanāmā syātkauntī jñeyā hareṇukā // GarP_1,204.16 //
elā ca bahulā proktā sūkṣmailā ca tathā truṭiḥ /
analyzed: elā ca bahulā proktā sūkṣmailā ca tathā truṭiḥ

original: padmā bhārṅgo tathā kāñjī jñeyā brāhmaṇayaṣṭikā // GarP_1,204.17 //

analyzed: viḍaṅgam krimaśatruḥ syāt rāmaṭham hiṅguḥ ucyate

original: ajājī jīrakaṃ jñeyā kāravī copakuñcikā // GarP_1,204.19 //

analyzed: vijñeyā kaṭukā tiktā tathā kaṭukarohiṇī

original: tagaraṃ syānnataṃ vakraṃ cocaṃ tvacavarāṅgakam // GarP_1,204.20 //

analyzed: patrakam dala saṃjñābhiḥ cārakam taskara āhvayam

ayaḥ loham samuddiṣṭam yaugikaiḥ loha nāmabhiḥ
puram kuṭanaṭam vidyāt mahiṣākṣaḥ palaṅkaṣā

original: kāśmarī kaṭphalā jñeyā śrīparṇo ceti kīrtitā /
śallakī gajabhakṣyā ca patrī ca surabhī stravaḥ // GarP_1,204.24 //
analyzed: śallakī gajabhakṣyā ca patrī ca surabhī stravaḥ

original: pathyābhayā ca vijñeyā pūtanā ca harītakī // GarP_1,204.25 //

original: dhātakī tāmraparṇo syātsamaṅgā kuñjarā matā // GarP_1,204.27 //

analyzed: vidyāt raktam candanam ca dvitīyam raktacandanam

original: kākolī ca smṛtā vīrā vayasyā cārkapuṣpikā /

analyzed: mṛdvikā ca smṛtā drākṣā tathā gostanikā matā

original: suraṅgītagaraḥ snāyuḥ kalanāśā tu vāyasī // GarP_1,204.56 //

original: picukaṃ pitalaṃ cākṣaṃ biḍālapadakaṃ tathā // GarP_1,204.71 //

original: palaṃ bilvañca muṣṭiḥ syāddve pale prasṛtiṃ vadet /

original: nāmānyetāni ca hare vanyānāṃ bheṣajāṃ tathā /

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe caturattaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe caturattaradviśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
kumāraḥ uvāca
atha vyākaraṇam vakṣye kātyāyana samāsatas
