original: suptiṅantaṃ padaṃ khyātaṃ supaḥ sapta vibhaktayaḥ /
analyzed: sup tiṅ antam padam khyātam supaḥ sapta vibhaktayaḥ

original: svaujasaḥ prathamā proktā sā prātipadikātmake // GarP_1,205.2 //
analyzed: svaujasaḥ prathamā proktā sā prātipadika ātmake
sambodhane ca liṅga ādau ukte karmaṇi kartari
arthavat prātipadikam dhātu pratyaya varjitam

original: amauśaso dvitīyā syāttatkarma kriyate ca yat /
analyzed: amauśasaḥ dvitīyā syāt tat karma kriyate ca yat
dvitīyā karmaṇi proktā antara antareṇa saṃyute
ṭābhyām bhisaḥ tṛtīyā syāt karaṇe kartar īritā

original: yena kriyate karaṇaṃ tatkartā yaḥ karoti saḥ // GarP_1,205.5 //
analyzed: yena kriyate karaṇam tad kartā yaḥ karoti saḥ

original: yasmai ditsā dhārayate rocate sampradānakam // GarP_1,205.6 //
analyzed: yasmai ditsā dhārayate rocate sampradānakam

original: yato 'paiti samādatte upādatte bhayaṃ yataḥ // GarP_1,205.7 //
analyzed: yatas u paiti samādatte upādatte bhayam yatas

original: ṅayoḥ supo vai saptamī syātsā cādhikaraṇe bhavet // GarP_1,205.8 //
analyzed: ṅayoḥ supaḥ vai saptamī syāt sā ca adhikaraṇe bhavet
ādhāraḥ ca adhikaraṇam rakṣā arthānām prayogataḥ
īpsitam ca anīpsitam yat tat apādānakam smṛtam

ena yoge dvitīyā syāt karmapravacanīyakaiḥ

original: anureṣu sahārthe ca hīne 'nūpaśca kathyate // GarP_1,205.11 //
analyzed: anureṣu saha arthe ca hīne nūpaḥ ca kathyate
dvitīyā ca syāt ceṣṭāyām gati karmaṇi

original: aprāṇe hi vibhaktī dbe manyakarmaṇyanādare // GarP_1,205.12 //
analyzed: a prāṇe hi vibhaktī dbe manya karmaṇi an ādare
namaḥ svasti svadhā svāhā alam vaṣaṭ yogaḥ īritā
ca eva tādarthye tumun arthāt bhāva vācinaḥ
tṛtīyā saha yoge syāt kutsita iṅge viśeṣaṇe
kāle bhāve saptamī syāt etaiḥ yoge pi ṣaṣṭhī ati
svāmi īśvara adhipatibhiḥ sākṣi dāyāda prasūtaiḥ

original: nirdhāraṇe dve vibhakto ṣaṣṭhī hetuprayogake // GarP_1,205.15 //
analyzed: nirdhāraṇe dve vibhakto ṣaṣṭhī hetu prayogake
smṛti artha karmaṇi tathā karoteḥ pratiyatnake

original: hiṃsārthānāṃ prayoge ca kṛti karmaṇi kartari // GarP_1,205.16 //
analyzed: hiṃsā arthānām prayoge ca kṛti karmaṇi kartari
na kartṛ karmaṇoḥ ṣaṣṭhī niṣṭhayoḥ prātipadike

original: dvividhaṃ prātipadikaṃ nāma dhātustathaiva ca // GarP_1,205.17 //
analyzed: dvividham prātipadikam nāma dhātuḥ tathā eva ca

original: bhūvāndibhyastiṅo laḥ syāllakārā daśa vai smṛtāḥ /
analyzed: bhū vāndibhyaḥ tiṅaḥ laḥ syāt lakārāḥ daśa vai smṛtāḥ
prathamaḥ madhyaḥ
mip vas mas tu parasmai hi padānām ca ātmanepadam
prathamaḥ
ādeśāḥ iṭ bahi mahi dhātu taḥ tha ṇic ādi vat

original: nāmni prayujyamāne 'pi prathamaḥ puruṣo bhavet // GarP_1,205.20 //
analyzed: nāmni prayujyamāne pi prathamaḥ puruṣaḥ bhavet
madhyamaḥ yuṣmadi proktaḥ uttamaḥ

original: bhūvādyā dhātavaḥ proktāḥ sanādyantāstathā tataḥ // GarP_1,205.21 //
analyzed: bhū ādyāḥ dhātavaḥ proktāḥ san ādi antāḥ tathā tatas
laṭ ī r itaḥ vartamāne smena atīte ca dhātutaḥ
bhūte na adyatane laṅ vā loḍ ādi āśiṣi dhātutaḥ
vidhi ādau eva anumataḥ loṭ vācyaḥ mantraṇe bhavet
nimantraṇa adhīṣṭa saṃpraśre prārthaneṣu tathā āśiṣi

original: liṅatīte parokṣe syālliḍ bhūte ḷḍ bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: liṅ atīte parokṣe syāt liṭ bhūte ḷṭ bhaviṣyati
syāt an adyatane tadvat bhaviṣyati tu dhātutaḥ
dātoḥ ḷṅ kriyā atipattau liṅ arthe leṭ prakīrtitaḥ

original: kṛtastriṣvapi vartante bhāve karmaṇi kartari // GarP_1,205.25 //
analyzed: kṛtaḥ triṣu api vartante bhāve karmaṇi kartari
sadṛśāḥ tavyatāḥ ṇyat yadanīyāḥ ca tṛc ādayaḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vyākaraṇanirūpaṇaṃ nāma pañcottaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe vyākaraṇanirūpaṇam nāma pañcottaradviśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
sūtaḥ uvāca
siddha udāharaṇam vakṣye saṃhitā ādi puras saram

original: viprāḥ svasāgatā vīdaṃ suttamaṃ syātpitṝṣabhaḥ // GarP_1,206.1 //
analyzed: viprāḥ svasā āgatāḥ vi idam suttamam syāt pitṛ ṛṣabhaḥ
ḷkāraḥ viśrutā sā ivam lāṅgalīṣā manīpayā
gaṅgā udakam ṛṇa arṇam pra arṇam iti api
śītārtaḥ ca tavalkāraḥ saindrī saukāraḥ iti api

original: vadhvāsanañca pitrartho lanubandho naye jayet // GarP_1,206.3 //
analyzed: vadhvā āsanam ca pitṛ arthaḥ lanu bandhaḥ naye jayet

original: nāyako lavaṇaṃ gāvasta ete na ta īśvarāḥ /
analyzed: nāyakaḥ lavaṇam gāvaḥ te ete na te īśvarāḥ

original: devīgṛhamatho atra a avehi paṭū imau // GarP_1,206.4 //
analyzed: devī gṛham atho atra a avehi paṭū imau

original: amī aśvāḥ ṣaḍasyeti tanna vāk ṣaḍdalāni ca /
analyzed: amī aśvāḥ ṣaṭ asya iti tat na vāc ṣaṣ dalāni ca
tat caret tat lu na ati iti tat jalam tat śmaśānakam
sugan atra pacan atra bhavān chādayati iti ca
bhavāt jhanatkaraḥ ca eva bhavān tarati saṃsmṛtam
bhavān likhati tān cakre bhavān śete pi anīdṛśaḥ
bhavāṇḍīnam tu antarasi tvam karoṣi sadā arcanam
kaḥ caret kaṣṭa kāreṇa ka kuryāt ka phale sthitaḥ

original: kaḥśete caiva kaḥṣaṇḍaḥ kasko yāti ca gauravam // GarP_1,206.8 //
analyzed: kaḥ śete ca eva kaḥṣaṇḍaḥ kaskaḥ yāti ca gauravam

original: ka ihātra ka evāhurdevā āhuśca bho vraja /
analyzed: kaḥ iha atra kaḥ eva āhuḥ devāḥ āhuḥ ca bho vraja
sva bhūḥ viṣṇuḥ vrajati ca gīṣpatiḥ ca eva dhūrpatiḥ
asmān eṣa vrajet sa syāt ṛc sāma sa ca gacchati

original: kuṭīcchāyā tathā chāyā sandhayo 'nye tathedṛśāḥ // GarP_1,206.10 //
analyzed: kuṭī chāyā tathā chāyā sandhayaḥ nye tathā īdṛśāḥ

original: samāsāḥ ṣaṭ samākhyātāḥ sa dvijaḥ karmadhārayaḥ /
analyzed: samāsāḥ ṣaṭ samākhyātāḥ sa dvijaḥ karmadhārayaḥ

original: dvigustrivedī grāmaśca ayaṃ tatpuruṣaḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,206.11 //
analyzed: dviguḥ trivedī grāmaḥ ca ayam tatpuruṣaḥ smṛtaḥ
tad kṛtaḥ ca tad arthaḥ ca vṛka bhītiḥ ca yat dhanam
jñāna dakṣeṇa tattva jñaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ atha avyayī
bhāvaḥ dhiḥ tri yathoktam tu dvandvaḥ deva ṛṣi mānavāḥ

original: taddhitāḥ pāṇḍavaḥ śaivo brāhayaṃ ca brahmatādayaḥ // GarP_1,206.13 //
analyzed: tad hitāḥ pāṇḍavaḥ śaivaḥ brāhayam ca
deva agni sakhi pati aṃśu kroṣṭu svāyambhuvaḥ pitā
nā praśastāḥ carāḥ gauḥ glauḥ apa jantāḥ ca puṃsi api
ha l antaḥ ca aśvayuj kṣmābhuj marut kravyād mṛgāvidhaḥ

original: ātmā rājā yuvā panthāḥ pūṣabrahmahaṇau halī // GarP_1,206.15 //
analyzed: ātmā rājā yuvā panthāḥ pūṣa brahma haṇau halī
viś ve dhāḥ uśanā anaḍvān madhulih kāṣṭhataś tathā
bana vāri asthi vastūni jagat sāma ahanī tathā
karma sarpiḥ vapuḥ tejaḥ at jha l antāḥ napuṃsake

original: jāyā jarā nadī lakṣmīḥ śrīstrībhūmirvadhūrapi // GarP_1,206.17 //
analyzed: jāyā jarā nadī lakṣmīḥ śrī strī bhūmiḥ vadhūḥ api

original: bhrūḥ punarbhūstathā dhenuḥ svasā mātā ca nau striyaḥ /
analyzed: bhrūḥ punarbhūḥ tathā dhenuḥ svasā mātā ca nau striyaḥ
vāc sraj diś mud krudhaḥ prāyas yuvatiḥ kukubhaḥ tathā
prāvṛṣaḥ ca eva sumānaḥ uṣṇih astriyām
guṇa dravya kriyā yogāt strī liṅgān ca vadāmi te
śukla kīlāla pāḥ ca eva śuciḥ ca grāmaṇīḥ sudhīḥ

original: paṭuḥ kamalabhūḥ kartā sumato bahavaḥ sunauḥ // GarP_1,206.20 //
analyzed: paṭuḥ kamala bhūḥ kartā sumataḥ bahavaḥ su nauḥ
satyāḥ na agnyaḥ tathā puṃsaḥ hi abhakṣayata dīrghapād

original: sarvaviśvobha ye cobhau ekonyānyatarāṇi ca // GarP_1,206.21 //
analyzed: ye ca ubhau eka unya anyatarāṇi ca
ḍataraḥ ḍatamaḥ nemastvaḥ samaḥ tha simetarau
pūrvaḥ ca eva adharaḥ ca eva dakṣiṇaḥ ca uttara avarau
paras ca antaram api etat yat tyad kim adasaḥ tu idam
yuṣmad asmad tad prathama carama alpa tayā ardhakāḥ
tathā katipayaḥ dvau ca iti evam sarva ādayaḥ tathā
śṛṇoti ādyā juhotiḥ ca jahātiḥ ca dadhāti api
dīpyatiḥ stūyatiḥ ca eva puttrīyati dhanīyati

original: truṭyati mriyate caiva cicīṣati ninīṣati // GarP_1,206.25 //
analyzed: truṭyati mriyate ca eva cicīṣati ninīṣati
sarve tiṣṭhanti sarvasmai sarvasmāt sarvantaḥ gataḥ
sarveṣām ca eva sarvasmin evam viśva ādayaḥ tathā
pūrve pūrvāḥ ca pūrvasmāt pūrvasmin pūrvaḥ īritaḥ
sūtaḥ uvāca
siddha rūpam nāma mātreṇa darśitam
kātyāyanaḥ kumārāt tu śrutvā vistaram abravīt

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamān- ācāradṛ nāma ṣaḍuttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe nāma ṣaṣ uttara dviśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
sūtaḥ uvāca

original: vāsudevaṃ guruṃ natvā gaṇaṃ śambhuṃ sarasvatīm /
analyzed: vāsudevam gurum natvā gaṇam śambhum sarasvatīm
mātrā varṇa prabhedena chandaḥ vakṣye lpabuddhaye

original: sarvādimadhyāntagalau mnau bhyau jrau stau trikā gaṇāḥ /
analyzed: sarva ādi madhya anta galau m nau bhyau j rau s tau trikāḥ gaṇāḥ
āryā catuṣkala ādi anta sarva madhye catur gaṇāḥ
vyañjana antaḥ visarga antau dīrghaḥ yukta paraḥ guruḥ

original: sānusvāraśca pādānto vā ityukto dvimātrakaḥ // GarP_1,207.3 //
analyzed: sa anusvāraḥ ca pāda antaḥ vā iti uktaḥ dvi mātrakaḥ

original: yadā nāpi kramaṃ yoge laghutāpi kvacidguroḥ /
analyzed: yadā nā api kramam yoge laghu tā api kvacid guroḥ
śloka cāri ādi saṃjñā syāt yatiḥ viccheda saṃjñikā

original: jñeyaḥ pādaśca turyāṃśo yuk samaṃ viṣamantvayuk /
analyzed: jñeyaḥ pādaḥ ca turya aṃśaḥ yuj samam viṣama ntu ayuj
samam ardhasamam vṛttam viṣamam ca tṛtīyakam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe chandaḥ śāstrechandaḥsaṃjñāparibhāṣānirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptottaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe chandaḥ śāstrechandaḥsaṃjñāparibhāṣānirūpaṇam nāma saptottaradviśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
sūtaḥ uvāca

original: āryālakṣma tvaṣṭa gaṇāḥ sadā jo viṣame na hi /
analyzed: tvaṣṭa gaṇāḥ sadā viṣame na hi

original: ṣaṣṭhe jo nlau vāpi bhavet padaṃ ṣaṣṭhe dvitīyalāt // GarP_1,208.1 //
analyzed: ṣaṣṭhe jaḥ n lau vā api bhavet padam ṣaṣṭhe dvitīya lāt

original: āditaḥ saptame hrasvā dvitīyārdhe śare tataḥ /
analyzed: āditas saptame hrasvāḥ dvitīya ardhe śare tatas
trigaṇāṅghriḥ ca pathyā syāt vipulā vahni laṅghanāt
dvitīya ardhe sa jaghanā āryā jāteḥ ca lakṣaṇam
āryā prathama ardha lakṣma gītiḥ syāt ced dala dvaye
upagītiḥ dvitīya ardhāt udgītiḥ vyatyayāt bhavet
āryā gītiḥ ca anta guruḥ goti jāteḥ ca lakṣaṇam

original: ṣaṭ kalā viṣame cetsyuḥ same 'ṣṭau na nirantarāḥ /
analyzed: ṣaḍ kalāḥ viṣame ced syuḥ same ṣṭau na nirantarāḥ

original: samā parāśritā na syādvaitālīye ralau guruḥ // GarP_1,208.5 //
analyzed: samā para āśritā na syāt vaitālīye ra lau guruḥ
anteḥ yau pūrvavat idam aupacchandasikam matam
syāt āpātalikā jñeyā atho dakṣiṇāntikā

original: parāśrito dvitīyo laḥ pādeṣu nikhileṣvapi // GarP_1,208.7 //
analyzed: parāśritaḥ dvitīyaḥ laḥ pādeṣu nikhileṣu api
udīcya vṛttiḥ asame prācya vṛttiḥ tu yugmake
sa pañcamaḥ caturtha aṃśe yugapad tau pravṛttakam
cāruhāsinī ayugma aṅghrau vaitālīyasya saṃgrahaḥ
vaktram syātām caturtha ādi a gaṇaḥ bhavet
pathyā vaktram jena same viparīta ādiḥ anyathā
usame naḥ ca capalā vipulā laghu saptamā

original: nikhile vā saitavasya mrau ntau cābdhestatpūrvakau // GarP_1,208.11 //
analyzed: nikhile vā saitavasya m rau n tau ca abdheḥ tad pūrvakau
cala dhṛtiḥ mātrāsamakam ucyate
navamalaḥ tathā
viślokaḥ syāt tad catuṣka dviguṇāt vānavāsikā
bāṇa aṣṭa navakeṣu syāt laḥ citrā ṣoḍaśa ātmikā
sama mātrā samādiṣṭam padākulakam īritam
vṛtta mātrāḥ vinā varṇaiḥ lāḥ varṇāḥ gurubhiḥ vinā

original: guruvo lairdale nityaṃ pramāṇamiti niścitam // GarP_1,208.15 //
analyzed: nityam pramāṇam iti niścitam
aṣṭāviṃśātilāḥ prathama ardhe dvitīyake
triṃśat asyām śikhāḥ gantā khañjāta dvyatyayāt bhavet
ṣoḍaśa anaṅga krīḍāḥ gāḥ dvātriṃśat carame ca lāḥ

original: saptaviṃśātilā gantā dalayo rucirā dvayoḥ // GarP_1,208.17 //
analyzed: saptaviṃśā tilāḥ dalayoḥ rucirāḥ dvayoḥ

original: mātrāvṛttāni coktāni varṇavṛttāni vacmi vai // GarP_1,208.18 //
analyzed: mātrā vṛttāni ca uktāni varṇa vṛttāni vacmi vai

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe chandaḥ śāstre āryāvṛttādichandolakṣaṇanirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭottaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe chandaḥ śāstre āryāvṛttādichandolakṣaṇanirūpaṇam nāma aṣṭottaradviśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
sūtaḥ uvāca

original: śrīrukthā gena sā jñeyā utyukthā strī gurudvayam /
analyzed: śrīḥ ukthā sā jñeyā uti ukthā strī guru dvayam

original: mo nārī ro mṛgī madhyā magau kanyā pratiṣṭhayā // GarP_1,209.1 //
analyzed: nārī raḥ mṛgī madhyā magau kanyā pratiṣṭhayā

original: bho gau paṅktiḥ suprātiṣṭhā tanumadhyā tayau smṛtā /
analyzed: bho gau paṅktiḥ su prātiṣṭhā tanu madhyā smṛtā

original: nayābhyāṃ bālalalitā gāyatrīcchanda eva hi // GarP_1,209.2 //
analyzed: nayābhyām bāla lalitā gāyatrī chandaḥ eva hi
masagaiḥ madalekhā syāt uṣṇikchandaḥ smṛtam budhaiḥ

original: bhau gau citrapadā khyātā vidyunmālā mamau gagau // GarP_1,209.3 //
analyzed: bhau gau citrapadā khyātā vidyunmālā

original: māṇavakaṃ bhāttalagā mnau gau haṃsarutaṃ smṛtam /
analyzed: māṇavakam m nau gau haṃsarutam smṛtam
ābhyām anyat vitānam syāt anuṣṭubh chandaḥ īritam

original: ranasaiḥ syāddhalamukhī nau maḥ śiśubhṛtā bhavet /
analyzed: syāt halamukhī nau maḥ śiśubhṛtā bhavet

original: bṛhatīchanda ityuktaṃ smau jagau sa virājitam // GarP_1,209.5 //
analyzed: bṛhatī chandaḥ iti uktam smau jagau sa virājitam
paṇavam bhavet

original: rajābhyāñca ragābhyāñca rukmavatī bhamau sagau // GarP_1,209.6 //
analyzed: rajābhyām ca ragābhyām ca rukmavatī bha mau sa gau
mattā ma bha sa gaiḥ yuktā nara jā gaḥ manoramā
paṅkti chandaḥ samākhyātam jasatā go upasthitam

original: tau jo gāvindravajrā syājjatajgā gupapūrvikā // GarP_1,209.8 //
analyzed: tau jaḥ gauḥ indravajrā syāt jatajgā gupa pūrvikā
upajātayaḥ ni ādi antāḥ su mukhī na ja jāḥ lagau

original: bhabhabhā gau dodhakaṃ syācchālinī matatā gagau // GarP_1,209.9 //
analyzed: bha bha bhāḥ gau dodhakam syāt śālinī mata tā ga gau
abdhi lokaiḥ ca vicchedaḥ vāta ūrṃmaḥ mamatā gagau

original: śrīrbhatau nanagāḥ proktā pañcabhiḥ ṣaḍūbhireva ca // GarP_1,209.10 //
analyzed: na na gāḥ proktā pañcabhiḥ ca
no gaḥ bhramaravilāsitam udāhṛtam

original: rathoddhatār nau ralagāḥ svāgatā ranabhā gagau // GarP_1,209.11 //
analyzed: ratha uddhatāḥ nau ra lagāḥ svāgatāḥ ra na bhāḥ ga gau

original: vṛttā nanau sagau gaḥ syānnau ralau gaḥ samadrikā /
analyzed: vṛttā na nau sa gau gaḥ syāt nau ra lau gaḥ sa madrikā

original: rajarā lgau śyenikā syājjasatā gau śikhaṇḍitam /
analyzed: rajarā l gau śyenikā syāt jasatā gau śikhaṇḍitam
triṣṭubh chandaḥ samākhyātam piṅgalena mahātmanā

original: ranau bhasau candravartma vaṃśasthaṃ syājjatau jarau /
analyzed: ra nau bha sau candravartma vaṃśastham syāt ja tau ja rau
tatas jarau indravaṃśā vedasaiḥ toṭakam smṛtam

original: nbhau bhrau drutavilambitaṃ puṭaśca syānnanau mayau // GarP_1,209.13 //
analyzed: bhrau druta vilambitam puṭaḥ ca syāt na nau ma yau
vasu vedaiḥ ca viratiḥ mudita vadanā tu iyam

original: nanararaiḥ samākhyātā nayanā yastathā bhavet // GarP_1,209.14 //
analyzed: samākhyātāḥ nayanāḥ yaḥ tathā bhavet
sā tu kusuma vicitrā jala uddhata gatī rasaiḥ

original: jasau jasau ca pādeṣu catūraiḥ stragviṇī matā // GarP_1,209.15 //
analyzed: ca pādeṣu catūraiḥ stragviṇī matā
bhujaṅgaprayātam vṛttam catubhiḥ yaiḥ prakīrtitam

original: prayaṃvadā nabhajraiśca maṇimālā tayau tayau // GarP_1,209.16 //
analyzed: prayaṃvadā maṇimālā tayau tayau
guha vaktraiḥ ca sannidrā lalitā jarau

original: pramitākṣarā sajasasairujjvalā tu nanau bharau // GarP_1,209.17 //
analyzed: pramitā akṣarā sa ja sa saiḥ ujjvalā tu na nau bha rau
mamau yayau vaiśvadevī pañca aśvaiḥ ca yatiḥ bhavet
samau jaladhara mālā abdhi antyaiḥ yati bhavet

original: nau tatau gaḥ kṣamāvṛttaṃ turagaiśca rasairyatiḥ /
analyzed: nau tatau gaḥ kṣamā vṛttam turagaiḥ ca rasaiḥ yatiḥ

original: praharṣiṇī manau jrau gā vahnibhirdaśabhiryatiḥ // GarP_1,209.19 //
analyzed: praharṣiṇī manau jrau gāḥ vahnibhiḥ daśabhiḥ yatiḥ

original: jabhau sajau go rucirā caturbhiśca grahairyatiḥ /
analyzed: jabhau sajau goḥ rucirā caturbhiḥ ca grahaiḥ yatiḥ
matta mayūram matayāḥ sagau deva grahaiḥ yatiḥ

original: mañjubhāṣiṇī sajsā jgau sunandinī sajasā magau /
analyzed: mañjubhāṣiṇī sajsā jgau sunandinī sajasā magau

original: nanau tatau candrikā gaḥ saptabhiśca rasairyatiḥ // GarP_1,209.21 //
analyzed: nanau tatau candrikā gaḥ saptabhiḥ ca rasaiḥ yatiḥ
asambādhāḥ ma tanasāḥ ga gau bāṇa grahaiḥ yatiḥ

original: nanarāḥ so ladhuguruḥ svaraiḥ proktāparājitā // GarP_1,209.22 //
analyzed: na na rāḥ saḥ ladhu guruḥ svaraiḥ proktā aparājitā
na nau bha nau praharaṇa kalikā iyam la gau tathā

original: vasantatilakā siṃhonnatā tabhjā jagau guruḥ // GarP_1,209.23 //

analyzed: bhajau sanau gagau indu vadanā atha su keśaram

original: naranā ralagāḥ pāde śarkarī pratipāditā // GarP_1,209.24 //
analyzed: pāde śarkarī pratipāditā
caturdaśa laghuḥ syāt ca śreṣṭhā śaśi kalā sa gā
rasagrahayatiḥ sraksrāḥ vasuśailayatiḥ tathā
syāt maṇi guṇa nikaraḥ mālinī nanamā yayau

original: vasusvarayatiḥ syācca najau bhajrāḥ prabhadrakam // GarP_1,209.26 //
analyzed: vasu svara yatiḥ syāt ca na jau bhajrāḥ prabhadrakam
elā sa yau na nau yaḥ syāt citralekhā svara aṣṭakaiḥ

original: marau mayau yaśca bhavedukteyamati śarkarī // GarP_1,209.27 //
analyzed: marau mayau yaḥ ca bhavet uktā iyam ati śarkarī
svarāt kham vṛṣabha gaja jṛmbhitam bhra nanāḥ nagau
na ca bha ja rāḥ vāṇinī gaḥ piṅgalena aṣṭiḥ īritā
rasa rudraiḥ śikhariṇī yamau na sa bhalā guruḥ

original: vasugrayatiḥ pṛthvī jasau jasayalā guruḥ // GarP_1,209.29 //
analyzed: vasu grayatiḥ pṛthvī jasau jasa yalā guruḥ
daśa svaraiḥ vaṃśa patra patitam bhraun nabhāḥ lagau

original: ṣaḍvedāśvaiśca hariṇī nasamā rasalā guruḥ // GarP_1,209.30 //
analyzed: ṣaṣ veda aśvaiḥ ca hariṇī nasamā rasalā guruḥ
manda ākrānta abdhi ṣaṣ nagaiḥ ma bha nāḥ tata gāḥ guruḥ

original: nardaṭakaṃ najabhajā jalau go yatireva ca // GarP_1,209.31 //
analyzed: nardaṭakam naja bhajāḥ jalau gaḥ yatiḥ eva ca
sapta ṛtu abdhiḥ kokilakam atyaṣṭiḥ syāt ca pūrvavat

original: bhūtartvaśvaiḥ kusumitalatā mtau nyau yayau dhṛtiḥ // GarP_1,209.32 //
analyzed: bhūta ṛtu aśvaiḥ kusumita latā m tau nyau yayau dhṛtiḥ
rasa ṛtu aśvaiḥ yamau nsau rau megha visphūrjitāḥ ra gau
śārdūla vikrīḍitam maḥ sūrya śvaiḥ
chandaḥ hi atidhṛtiḥ proktam atas ūrdhvam kṛtiḥ bhavet

original: saptāśvartuḥ suvadanā bhrau manau yabhalā guruḥ // GarP_1,209.34 //
analyzed: sapta aśva ṛtuḥ su vadanā bhrau manau yabhalā guruḥ

original: vṛttaṃ rajau rajau pāde rajau go laḥ kṛtirbhavet /
analyzed: vṛttam rajau rajau pāde rajau gaḥ laḥ kṛtiḥ bhavet
tri saptakaiḥ snagdharā syāt prakṛtiḥ mnabhanaiḥ triyaiḥ

original: digarkairbhadrakaṃ bhrau nrau naranā go yathākṛtiḥ /
analyzed: diś arkaiḥ bhadrakam bhrau n rau nara nāḥ gaḥ yathā ākṛtiḥ

original: najau bhaśvāśvalalitaṃ jabhau jabhalagā bhavet // GarP_1,209.36 //
analyzed: na jau bha śva āśva lalitam ja bhau ja bha lagā bhavet
matta ākrīḍan ca aṣṭa bāṇa daśakaiḥ mau tanau nanau
nalau guruḥ ca vikṛtiḥ chinnā saṃkṛtiḥ ucyate
tanvī na sa bhāḥ bha na yāḥ gaṇāḥ
krauñcapadāḥ sabhau

original: nau nau go 'tikṛtiḥ proktā cchando hyutkṛtirucyate /
analyzed: nau nau go tikṛtiḥ proktā chandaḥ hi utkṛtiḥ ucyate
vasvīśa aśvaiḥ mamatanaiḥ syāt bhujaṅga vijṛmbhitam
na na rasaiḥ laga yuktaiḥ ca apavāha ākhyakam yatiḥ

original: guhaiḥ ṣaḍbhī rasairbāṇairmonāḥ ṣaṭsagagā gaṇāḥ // GarP_1,209.40 //
analyzed: guhaiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ rasaiḥ bāṇaiḥ monāḥ ṣaṣ saga gāḥ gaṇāḥ
caṇḍa vṛtti prapātaḥ sau daṇḍakaḥ nau tatas garaḥ
vyāla jīmūtaka ādayaḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe samavṛttalakṣaṇādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma navottaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe samavṛttalakṣaṇādinirūpaṇam nāma navottaradviśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
sūtaḥ uvāca
sa sa la gāḥ ca viṣame pāde yadi upacitrakam

original: same bhau bhagagāḥ syuśca drutamadhyā bhabhau bhagau // GarP_1,210.1 //
analyzed: same bhau bhaga gāḥ syuḥ ca druta madhyāḥ bha bhau bha gau

original: gaḥ pāde viṣame 'nyatra najau jyau ca gaṇau smṛtau // GarP_1,210.2 //
analyzed: gaḥ pāde viṣame ni atra na jau jyau ca gaṇau smṛtau

original: viṣame vegavatī sā gaḥ same bhau bho gagau gaṇāḥ /
analyzed: viṣame vegavatī sā gaḥ same bhau bho ga gau gaṇāḥ

original: pāde 'same tajau ro gaḥ same masau jagau garuḥ /
analyzed: pāde same ta jau raḥ gaḥ same ma sau ja gau ga ruḥ

original: bhavedbhadravirāṭ ketumatī tu viṣame sajau // GarP_1,210.3 //
analyzed: bhavet bhadra virāj ketumatī tu viṣame sajau

original: sagau same bhrau nagagā ākhyānakī tvathāsame /
analyzed: sa gau same bhrau naga gā ākhyānakī tu atha asame

original: tau jo gagau same pāde jatajā gurukadvayam // GarP_1,210.4 //
analyzed: tau jaḥ ga gau same pāde jata jāḥ guruka dvayam

original: tatau jagau same gaḥ syāt piṅgalena hyudāhṛtam // GarP_1,210.5 //
analyzed: tatau jagau same gaḥ syāt piṅgalena hi udāhṛtam

original: pāde 'tha viṣame caiva puṣpitāgrā nanau rayau /
analyzed: pāde viṣame ca eva puṣpita agrāḥ nanau rayau

original: same najau jarau gaśca vaitālīyaṃ vadanti hi /
analyzed: same na jau ja rau gaḥ ca vaitālīyam vadanti hi
vṛttam ca aparavaktra ākhyam aupacchandasikam param

original: vāṅmatī rajarā yaḥ syādayugme jarajā ragau // GarP_1,210.7 //
analyzed: vāṅmatī rajarā yaḥ syāt ayugme jarajāḥ ragau

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍer'ddhasamavṛttalakṣaṇādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma daśottaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācārakāṇḍerddhasamavṛttalakṣaṇādinirūpaṇam nāma daśottaradviśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
sūtaḥ uvāca
prathamaḥ ṣṭa akṣaraiḥ pādaḥ dvitīyaḥ dvādaśa akṣaraiḥ
tṛtīyaḥ ṣoḍaśa arṇaiḥ ca viṃśat varṇaiḥ caturthakaḥ
sāmānya lakṣaṇam pada catur ūrdhvābhiḥ adhasya hi
dvitīye ṣṭa akṣaraiḥ pāde kalikā prathamā irka je
syāt tṛtīye tha pūrvavat ca aṣṭa ka akṣare
proktā ca amṛtadhārā iyam catur aṣṭa akṣare sati
iti pada catur ūrdhva prakaraṇam

original: sajau salau ca prathame nasajā go dvitīyake /
analyzed: sa jau sa lau ca prathame na sa jāḥ gaḥ dvitīyake

original: tṛtīye bhanabhā gaśca caturthe sajasā jagau // GarP_1,211.4 //
analyzed: tṛtīye bha na bhāḥ gaḥ ca caturthe sa jasā jagau
pūrvavat syāt saurabhakam tṛtīye ghrau ra nau bha gau
lalita ca āt gatāvat syā tṛtīyā iṃghrau na nau sa sau
iti udgatā prakaraṇam
upasthita pracupitam prathame ghrau ma sau ja bhau

original: gau dvitīye sanajarā gastṛtīye nanau ca saḥ /
analyzed: gau dvitīye sana ja rāḥ gaḥ tṛtīye na nau ca saḥ

original: nau najau yaścaturthe syāccheṣa pādāśca pūrvavat // GarP_1,211.6 //
analyzed: nau na jau yaḥ caturthe syāt śeṣa pādāḥ ca pūrvavat

original: tṛtīrye 'ghrau viśeṣaśca vṛttaṃ syānnau sanau nasau // GarP_1,211.7 //
analyzed: tṛtīrye ghrau viśeṣaḥ ca vṛttam syāt nau sanau nasau
ārṣabham tajarāḥ pāde tṛtīye nyat ca pūrvavat
pūrvavat prathamam śeṣe śuddha virāj bhavet
iti upasthita pracupita prakaraṇam
viṣama akṣara pādam vā pañca ṣaṭka ādi yāvakam
na uktā gāthā iti

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe viṣamavṛttalakṣaṇādinirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikādaśottaradviśaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe viṣamavṛttalakṣaṇādinirūpaṇam nāma ekādaśottaradviśaśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
sūtaḥ uvāca
prastāraḥ ādya gaḥ thaḥ laḥ para tulyaḥ pūrva gaḥ

original: naṣṭamadhye sameṃ'ke laḥ same 'rdhe viṣame guruḥ // GarP_1,212.1 //
analyzed: naṣṭa madhye sama iṃke laḥ same ṛdhe viṣame guruḥ
pratiloma guṇam lādyam dvis uddiṣṭakaḥ eka nud

original: saṃkhyā dvirardhe rūpe tu śūnyaṃ śūnye dvirīritam /
analyzed: saṃkhyā dvis ardhe rūpe tu śūnyam śūnye dvis īritam
tāvat ardhe tat guṇitam dvis dvi ūnantu tat antataḥ

original: pare pūrṇaṃ pare pūrṇaṃ meruḥ prastārato bhavet // GarP_1,212.4 //
analyzed: pare pūrṇam pare pūrṇam meruḥ prastārataḥ bhavet
laga saṃkhyā vṛtta saṃkhyā ca ādya aṅgulam atha ūrdhvatas
saṃkhyā eva dviguṇa eka ūnāt chandaḥ sāraḥ yam īritaḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamān- ācā- chandolakṣaṇaṃ nāma dvādaśottaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe chandolakṣaṇam nāma dvādaśa uttara dviśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
sūtaḥ uvāca
hareḥ śrutvā abravīt brahmā yathā vyāsāya śaunaka

original: brāhmaṇādisamācāraṃ sarvadaṃ te tathā vade // GarP_1,213.1 //
analyzed: brāhmaṇa ādi samācāram sarva dam te tathā vade

original: śrutismṛtī tu vijñāya śrautaṃ karma samācaret /
analyzed: śruti smṛtī tu vijñāya śrautam karma samācaret

original: śrautaṃ karma na ceduktaṃ tadā smārtaṃ samācaret // GarP_1,213.2 //
analyzed: śrautam karma na ced uktam tadā smārtam samācaret
tatra api aśaktaḥ karaṇe sat ācāram caret vudhaḥ

original: śrutismṛtī ha viprāṇāṃ locane karmadarśane // GarP_1,213.3 //
analyzed: śruti smṛtī ha viprāṇām locane karma darśane
śruti uktaḥ paramaḥ dharmaḥ paraḥ
siṣṭa ācāreṇa saṃprāptaḥ trayaḥ dharmāḥ sanātanāḥ

original: satyaṃ dānaṃ dayālobho vidyejyā pūjanaṃ damaḥ /
analyzed: satyam dānam dayā alobhaḥ vidyā ijyā pūjanam damaḥ

original: aṣṭau tāni pavitrāṇi śiṣṭācārasya lakṣaṇam // GarP_1,213.5 //
analyzed: aṣṭau tāni pavitrāṇi śiṣṭa ācārasya lakṣaṇam
tejaḥ mayāni pūrveṣām śarīrāṇi indriyāṇi ca
na lipyate pātakena padma patram iva ambhasā
nivāsa mukhyāḥ varṇānām dharma ācārāḥ prakīrtitāḥ
satyam yajñaḥ tapaḥ dānam etat dharmasya lakṣaṇam
a dattasya an upādānam dānam adhyayanam japaḥ

original: vidyā vittaṃ tapaḥ śaucaṃ kule janma tvarogitā // GarP_1,213.8 //
analyzed: vidyā vittam tapaḥ śaucam kule janma tu arogi tā
saṃsāra ucchitti hetuḥ ca dharmāt eva pravartate

original: dharmātsukhaṃ ca jñānaṃ ca jñānānmokṣo 'dhigamyate // GarP_1,213.9 //
analyzed: dharmāt sukham ca jñānam ca jñānāt mokṣaḥ dhigamyate
ijyā adhyayana dānāni yathāśāstram sanātanaḥ
brahma kṣattriya vaiśyānām sāmānyaḥ dharmaḥ ucyate
yājana adhyayane śuddhe viśuddhāt ca pratigrahaḥ
vṛtti trayam idam prāhuḥ munayaḥ śreṣṭha varṇinaḥ
śastreṇa ājīvanam rājñaḥ bhūtānām ca abhirakṣaṇam

original: pāśupālyaṃ kṛṣiḥ paṇyaṃ vaiśyasyājīvanaṃ smṛtam // GarP_1,213.12 //
analyzed: pāśupālyam kṛṣiḥ paṇyam vaiśyasya ājīvanam smṛtam
śūdrasya dvija śuśrūṣā dvijānām anupūrvaśas
gurau vāsaḥ gni śuśrūṣā svādhyāyaḥ brahmacāriṇaḥ

original: triḥ snātā snāpitā bhaikṣyaṃ gurau prāṇāntikī sthitiḥ /
analyzed: tris snātā snāpitā bhaikṣyam gurau prāṇāntikī sthitiḥ

original: samekhalo jaṭī daṇḍī muṇḍī vā gurusaṃśrayaḥ // GarP_1,213.14 //
analyzed: sa mekhalaḥ jaṭī daṇḍī muṇḍī vā guru saṃśrayaḥ
agnihotra upacaraṇam jīvanam ca sva karmabhiḥ
dharma dāreṣu kalpeta parva varjam rati kriyāḥ
deva pitṛ atitibhyaḥ ca pūjā ādiṣu anukalpanam
śruti smṛti artha saṃsthānam dharmaḥ yam gṛhamedhinaḥ
jaṭi tvam agnihotra tvam bhū śayyā ajina dhāraṇam
vane vāsaḥ payaḥ mūla nīvāra phala vṛtti tā
pratiṣiddhāt nivṛttiḥ ca tris snānam vrata dhāri tā
devatā atithi pūjā ca dharmaḥ yam vanavāsinaḥ
sarva ārambha parityāgaḥ bhikṣā annam vṛkṣa mūla tā
niṣparigraha tā adrohaḥ sama tā sarva jantuṣu
priya apriya pariṣvaṅga isukha duḥ kha adhikāri tā
sarva aidriya samāhāraḥ dhāraṇā dhyāna nitya tā
bhāva saṃśuddhiḥ eti eṣa parivrāj dharmaḥ ucyate

original: ahiṃsā sūnṛtā vāṇī satyaśauce kṣamā dayā /
analyzed: ahiṃsā sūnṛtā vāṇī satya śauce kṣamā dayā

original: varṇināṃ liṅgināṃ caiva sāmānyo dharma ucyate // GarP_1,213.22 //
analyzed: varṇinām liṅginām ca eva sāmānyaḥ dharmaḥ ucyate
yathā ukta kāriṇaḥ sarve prayānti paramām gatim

original: ā bodhātsvapanaṃ yāvat gṛhidharmaṃ ca vacmi te // GarP_1,213.23 //
analyzed: ā bodhāt svapanam yāvat gṛhi dharmam ca vacmi te
brāhme muhūrte budhyeta dharma arthau ca anucintayet
kāya kleśān ca tad mūlān veda tattva artham eva ca
śarvarī ante samutthāya kṛta śaucaḥ samāhitaḥ
snātvā sandhyām upāsīta sarvakālam atandritaḥ
prātar sandhyām upā sīta danta dhāvana pūrvikām

original: ubhe mūtrapurīṣe ca divā kuryādudaṅmukhaḥ // GarP_1,213.26 //
analyzed: ubhe mūtra purīṣe ca divā kuryāt udak mukhaḥ

original: rātrau ca dakṣiṇe kuryādubhe sandhye yathā divā /
analyzed: rātrau ca dakṣiṇe kuryāt ubhe sandhye yathā divā

original: chāyāyāmandhakāre vā rātrau vāhani vā dvijaḥ // GarP_1,213.27 //
analyzed: chāyāyām andhakāre vā rātrau vā ahani vā dvijaḥ
yathā tu samukhaḥ kuryāt prāṇa bādhā bhayeṣu ca
gomaya aṅgāra valmīka phāla ākṛṣṭe śubhe
mārga upajīvya chāyāsu na mūtram ca purīṣakam
antar jalāt devagṛhāt valmīkāt mūṣika sthalāt
pareṣām śauca śiṣṭāt ca śmaśānāt ca mṛdam tyajet

original: ekāṃ liṅge mṛdaṃ dadyādvāma haste mṛdaṃ dvidhā // GarP_1,213.30 //
analyzed: ekām liṅge mṛdam dadyāt vāma haste mṛdam dvidhā
ubhayoḥ dve ca dātavye mūtra śaucam pracakṣate

original: ekāṃ liṅge gude tistrastathā vāmakare daśa // GarP_1,213.31 //
analyzed: ekām liṅge gude tistraḥ tathā vāma kare daśa
pañca pāde daśa ekasmin karayoḥ sapta mṛttikāḥ

original: ardhaprasṛtimātrā tu prathamā mṛttikā smṛtā // GarP_1,213.32 //
analyzed: ardha prasṛti mātrā tu prathamā mṛttikā smṛtā

original: dvitīyā ca tṛtīyā ca tadardhā parikīrtitā /
analyzed: dvitīyā ca tṛtīyā ca tad ardhā parikīrtitā

original: upaviṣṭastu viṇmūtraṃ kartuṃ yastu na vindati // GarP_1,213.33 //
analyzed: upaviṣṭaḥ tu viṣ mūtram kartum yaḥ tu na vindati

original: sa kuryādardhaśaucaṃ tu svasya śaucasya sarvadā /
analyzed: sa kuryāt ardha śaucam tu svasya śaucasya sarvadā

original: divā śaucasya rātryardhaṃ yadvā pādo vidhīyate // GarP_1,213.34 //
analyzed: divā śaucasya rātri ardham yat vā pādaḥ vidhīyate
svasthasya tu yathā uddiṣṭam ārtaḥ kuryāt yathābalam

original: vasā śukramasṛṅ majjā lālā viṇmūtrakarṇaviṭ // GarP_1,213.35 //
analyzed: vasā śukram asṛk majjā lālā viṣ mūtra karṇa viś
śleṣmā śradūṣikā svedaḥ dvādaśā ete nṛṇām malāḥ

original: manyeta yāvatā śuddhiṃ tāvacchaucaṃ samācaret // GarP_1,213.36 //
analyzed: manyeta yāvatā śuddhim tāvat śaucam samācaret
pramāṇam śauca saṃkhyāyāḥ na ādiṣṭaiḥ avaśiṣyate

original: śaucaṃ tu dvividhaṃ proktaṃ bāhyamābhyantaraṃ tathā // GarP_1,213.37 //
analyzed: śaucam tu dvividham proktam bāhyam ābhyantaram tathā
mṛd jalābhyām smṛtam bāhyam bhāva śuddhiḥ atha antaram

original: trirācāmedapaḥ pūrvaṃ dviḥ pramṛjyāttato mukham // GarP_1,213.38 //
analyzed: tris ācāmet apaḥ pūrvam dvis pramṛjyāt tatas mukham
saṃmṛjya aṅguṣṭha mūlena tribhiḥ āsyam upaspṛśet
aṅguṣṭhena pradeśinyā ghrāṇam paścāt anantaram

original: aṅguṣṭhānāmikābhyāṃ ca cakṣuḥ śrotre punaḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: aṅguṣṭha anāmikābhyām ca cakṣuḥ śrotre punar punar

original: kaniṣṭhāṅgaṣṭhayornābhiṃ hṛdayaṃ tu talena vai // GarP_1,213.40 //
analyzed: kaniṣṭhā aṅgaṣṭhayoḥ nābhim hṛdayam tu talena vai
sarvābhiḥ tu śiraḥ paścāt bāhū ca agreṇa saṃspṛśet

original: ṛco yajūṃṣi sāmāni triḥ paṭhanprīṇayetkramāt // GarP_1,213.41 //
analyzed: ṛcaḥ yajūṃṣi sāmāni tris paṭhan prīṇayet kramāt
atharva aṅgirasau pūrvam dvis pramārṣṭi atha tat sukham
itihāsa purāṇāni vedāṅgāni vedāṅgāni yathākramam

original: khaṃ mukhe nāsike vāyuṃ netre sūryaṃ śrutī (tīrdi) diśaḥ /
analyzed: kham mukhe nāsike vāyum netre sūryam śrutī tīrdi diśaḥ

original: prāṇagranthimatho nābhiṃ brahmāṇaṃ hṛdaye spṛśet // GarP_1,213.43 //
analyzed: prāṇagranthim atho nābhim brahmāṇam hṛdaye spṛśet
rudram mūrdhnā samālabhya prīṇāti atha śikhām ṛṣīn
bāhū yama indra varuṇa kubera vasudhā analān
abhyukṣya caraṇau viṣṇum indram viṣṇu kara dvayam
agniḥ vāyuḥ ca sūrya indu girayaḥ ṅguli parvasu
gaṅgā ādyāḥ saritaḥ tāsu yāḥ rekhāḥ kara madhya gāḥ

original: uṣaḥ kāle tu saṃprāpte śaucaṃ kṛtvā yathārthavat // GarP_1,213.46 //
analyzed: uṣaḥ kāle tu saṃprāpte śaucam kṛtvā yathārtha vat
tatas danta dhāvana pūrvakam

original: mukhe paryuṣite nityaṃ bhavatyaprayato naraḥ // GarP_1,213.47 //
analyzed: mukhe paryuṣite nityam bhavati aprayataḥ naraḥ
tasmāt sarva prayatnena kuryāt vai danta ghāvanam
kadamba bilva khadira karavīra vaṭa arjunāḥ
yūthī ca bṛhatī jātī karañja arka atimuktakāḥ
jambū madhūkā pāmārga śirīṣa udumbara asanāḥ
kṣīri kaṇṭaki vṛkṣa ādyāḥ praśastāḥ danta dhāvane
kaṭu tikta kaṣāyāḥ ca dhana ārogya sukha pradāḥ

original: prakṣālya bhuktvā ca śucau deśe tyaktvā tadācāmet /
analyzed: prakṣālya bhuktvā ca śucau deśe tyaktvā tat ācāmet

original: amāyāṃ ca tathā ṣaṣṭhyāṃ navamyāṃ pratipadyapi // GarP_1,213.51 //
analyzed: amāyām ca tathā ṣaṣṭhyām navamyām pratipadi api
varjayet dantakāṣṭham tu tathā eva arkasya vāsare

original: abhāve danta kāṣṭhasya niṣiddhāyāṃ tathā tithau // GarP_1,213.52 //
analyzed: abhāve danta kāṣṭhasya niṣiddhāyām tathā tithau
aṣām dvādaśa gaṇḍūṣaiḥ kurvīta mukha śodhanam

original: prātaḥ snānaṃ praśaṃsanti dṛṣṭādṛṣṭakaraṃ hitam // GarP_1,213.53 //
analyzed: prātar snānam praśaṃsanti dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa karam hitam

original: sarvamar hati śuddhātmā prātaḥ snāyī japādikam /
analyzed: śuddha ātmā prātar snāyī japa ādikam
atyanta malinaḥ kāyaḥ nava chidra samanvitaḥ

original: stravatyeṣa divā rātrau prātaḥ snānaṃ viśodhanam /
analyzed: stravati eṣa divā rātrau prātar snānam viśodhanam
manaḥ prasāda jananam rūpa saubhāgya vardhanam
śoka duḥ kha praśamanam gaṅgā snāna vat ācaret

original: adya haste tu nakṣatre daśamyāṃ jyeṣṭhake site // GarP_1,213.56 //
analyzed: adya haste tu nakṣatre daśamyām jyeṣṭhake site
daśapāpa harāyām ca a da tvā dāna kalmaṣam
viruddha ācaraṇam hiṃsā para dāra upasevanam
pāruṣya anṛta paiśunyam asambaddha abhibhāṣaṇam
para dravya abhidhānam ca manasā aniṣṭa cintanam
etat daśa agha ghāta artham gaṅgā snānam karomi aham
prātar saṃkṣepataḥ snānam vānaprastha gṛhasthayoḥ
yateḥ triṣavaṇam snānam brahmacāriṇaḥ
ācamya tīrtham āvāhya snāyāt smṛtvā avyayam harim

original: tisraḥ koṭyastu vijñeyā mandehā nāma rākṣasāḥ /
analyzed: tisraḥ koṭyaḥ tu vijñeyāḥ mandehāḥ nāma rākṣasāḥ
udayantam durātmānaḥ sūryam icchanti khāditum

original: sa hanti sūryaṃ sandhyāyāṃ nopāstiṃ kurute tu yaḥ /
analyzed: sa hanti sūryam sandhyāyām na upāstim kurute tu yaḥ
dahanti mantra pūtena toyena anala rūpiṇā

original: ahorātrasya yaḥ sandhiḥ sā sandhyā bhavatīti ha /
analyzed: ahar rātrasya yaḥ sandhiḥ sā sandhyā bhavati iti ha
dvi nāḍikā bhavet sandhyā yāvat bhavati darśanam
gandhyā karma avasāne tu svayam homaḥ vidhīyate

original: svayaṃ homaphalaṃ yattu tadanyena na jāyate // GarP_1,213.64 //
analyzed: svayam homa phalam yat tu tat anyena na jāyate
ṛtvij putraḥ guruḥ bhrātā viṭpatiḥ

original: ebhireva hutaṃ yattu taddhutaṃ svayameva hi // GarP_1,213.65 //
analyzed: ebhiḥ eva hutam yat tu tat hutam svayam eva hi
brahmā vai gārhapatya agniḥ dakṣaṇāgniḥ tri locanaḥ
viṣṇuḥ āhavanīya agniḥ kumāraḥ satyaḥ ucyate
kṛtvā homam yathākālam saurān mantrān japet tatas

original: samāhitātmā sāvitrīṃ praṇavaṃ ca yathoditam // GarP_1,213.67 //
analyzed: samāhita ātmā sāvitrīm praṇavam ca yathā uditam
praṇave nitya yuktasya vyāhṛtīṣu ca saptasu

original: tripadāyāṃ ca sāvitryāṃ na bhayaṃ vidyate kvacit // GarP_1,213.68 //
analyzed: tripadāyām ca sāvitryām na bhayam vidyate kvacid
gāyattrīm yaḥ japet nityam kalyam utthāya mānavaḥ

original: lipyate na sa pāpena padmapatramivāmbhasā // GarP_1,213.69 //
analyzed: lipyate na sa pāpena padma patram iva ambhasā
śveta varṇā samuddiṣṭā kauśaiya vasanā tathā
akṣa sūtra dharā devī padmāsana gatā śubhā
āvāhya yaju pānena vidhānataḥ
etat yajuḥ purā daivaiḥ dṛṣṭi darśana kāṅkṣibhiḥ
āditya maṇḍala antar sthām brahma loka sthitām api
tatra āvāhya japitvā atas namaskārāt visarjayet

original: pūrvāhna eva kurvīta devatānāṃ ca pūjanam /
analyzed: pūrvāhne eva kurvīta devatānām ca pūjanam

original: na viṣṇoḥ paramo devastasmāttaṃ pūjayetsadā // GarP_1,213.73 //
analyzed: na viṣṇoḥ paramaḥ devaḥ tasmāt tam pūjayet sadā
brahma viṣṇu śivān devān na pṛthak bhāvayet sudhīḥ
loke smin maṅgalāni aṣṭau brāhmaṇaḥ gauḥ hutāśanaḥ
hiraṇyam sarpiḥ ādityaḥ āpaḥ rājā tathā aṣṭamaḥ
etāni satatam paśyet arcayet ca pradakṣiṇam
vedasya adhyayanam pūrvam vicāraḥ abhyasanam japaḥ

original: taddānaṃ caiva śiṣyabhyo vedābhyāso hi pañcadhā // GarP_1,213.76 //
analyzed: tad dānam ca eva śiṣyabhyaḥ veda abhyāsaḥ hi pañcadhā
veda artham yajña śāstrāṇi dharma śāstrāṇi ca eva hi

original: mūlyena lekhayitvā yo dadyādyāti sa vaidikam // GarP_1,213.77 //
analyzed: mūlyena lekhayitvā yaḥ dadyāt yāti sa vaidikam
itihā sa purāṇāni likhitvā ayaḥ prayacchati
brahma dāna samam puṇyam prāpnoti dviguṇīkṛtam
mṛtīye ca tathā bhāge poṣya varga artha sādhanam

original: mātā pitā gururbhrātā prajā dīnāḥ samāśritāḥ // GarP_1,213.79 //
analyzed: mātā pitā guruḥ bhrātā prajāḥ dīnāḥ samāśritāḥ
tithiḥ ca agniḥ poṣya vargāḥ udāhṛtaḥ
bharaṇam poṣya vargasya praśastam svarga sādhanam
bharaṇam poṣya vargasya tasmāt yatnena kārayet
sa jīvati varaḥ ca ekaḥ bahubhiḥ yā upajīvyati
jīvantaḥ mṛtakāḥ tu anye puruṣāḥ sva udarambharāḥ
svakīya udara pūrtiḥ ca kukkurasya api vidyate
arthebhyaḥ pi vivṛddhebhyaḥ sambhūtebhyaḥ tatas tatas

original: kriyāḥ sarvāḥ pravartante parvatebhya ivāpagāḥ // GarP_1,213.83 //
analyzed: kriyāḥ sarvāḥ pravartante parvatebhyaḥ iva āpagāḥ
sarva ratna ākarā bhūmiḥ dhānyāni paśavaḥ striyaḥ
arthasya kārya yogi tvāt arthaḥ iti abhidhīyate
adroheṇa eva bhūtānām alpa droheṇa vā punar

original: yā vṛttistāṃ samāsthāya vipro jīvedanāpadi // GarP_1,213.85 //
analyzed: yā vṛttiḥ tām samāsthāya vipraḥ jīvet anāpadi

original: dhanaṃ tu trividhaṃ jñeyaṃ śuklaṃ śabalameva ca /
analyzed: dhanam tu trividham jñeyam śuklam śabalam eva ca

original: kṛṣṇaṃ ca tasya vijñeyo vibhāgaḥ saptadhā pṛthak // GarP_1,213.86 //
analyzed: kṛṣṇam ca tasya vijñeyaḥ vibhāgaḥ saptadhā pṛthak

original: kramāyattaṃ prītidattaṃ prāptaṃ ca saha bhāryayā /
analyzed: krama āyattam prītidattam prāptam ca saha bhāryayā

original: aviśeṣeṇa sarveṣāṃ varṇānāṃ trividhaṃ dhanam // GarP_1,213.87 //
analyzed: aviśeṣeṇa sarveṣām varṇānām trividham dhanam
vaiśeṣikam dhanam dṛṣṭam brāhmaṇasya tri lakṣaṇam
yājana adhyāpane nityam viśuddhaḥ ca ddhāt ca
pratigrahaḥ
trividham kṣatriyasya api prāhuḥ vaiśeṣikam dhanam

original: śuddhārthaṃ labdhakarajaṃ daṇḍāptaṃ jayajaṃ tathā // GarP_1,213.89 //
analyzed: śuddha artham labdha kara jam daṇḍa āptam jaya jam tathā
vaiśeṣikam dhanam dṛṣṭam vaiśyasya api vilakṣaṇam
kṛṣi gorakṣa vāṇijyam śūdrasya ebhyaḥ tu anugrahāt
kusīda kṛṣi vāṇijyam prakurvīta svayam param kṛtam

original: āpatkāle svayaṃ kurvannainasā yujyate dvijaḥ // GarP_1,213.91 //
analyzed: āpad kāle svayam kurvan na enasā yujyate dvijaḥ
bahavaḥ vartana upāyāḥ ṛṣibhiḥ parikīrtitāḥ
sarveṣām api ca eva eṣām kusīdam adhikam viduḥ
anāvṛṣṭyāḥ rāja bhayāt mūṣika ādyaiḥ upadravaiḥ

original: kṛṣyādike bhavedbādhā sā kusīde na vidyate // GarP_1,213.93 //
analyzed: kṛṣi ādike bhavet bādhā sā kusīde na vidyate

original: śuklapakṣe tathā kṛṣṇe rajanyāṃ divasepi vā /
analyzed: śukla pakṣe tathā kṛṣṇe rajanyām vā

original: uṣṇe varṣati śīte vā vardhanaṃ na nivartate // GarP_1,213.94 //
analyzed: uṣṇe varṣati śīte vā vardhanam na nivartate
deśam gatānām yā vṛddhiḥ nānā paṇya upajīvinām

original: kusīdaṃ kurvataḥ samyak saṃsthitasyaiva jāyate // GarP_1,213.95 //
analyzed: kusīdam kurvataḥ samyak saṃsthitasya eva jāyate
labdha lābhaḥ pitṝn devān brāhmaṇān ca eva pūjayet

original: te tṛptāstasya taddoṣaṃ śamayanti na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,213.96 //
analyzed: te tṛptāḥ tasya tad doṣam śamayanti na saṃśayaḥ
vaṇij kusīdam dadyāt yaḥ vastram
kṛṣīvalaḥ unna pāna ādi yāna śayyā āsanāni ca
rājabhyaḥ viṃśatim dattvā paśu svarṇa ādikam śatam
pādena asya ca yāvakyam kuryāt saṃcayam ātmavān
ardhena ca ātma bharaṇam nitya naimittika aṃnvitam
pādam ca iti artha yāmasya mūla bhūtam vivardhayet

original: vidyā śilpaṃ bhūtiḥ sevā gorakṣā vipaṇiḥ kṛṣiḥ /
analyzed: vidyā śilpam bhūtiḥ sevā gorakṣā vipaṇiḥ kṛṣiḥ

original: vṛttirbhaikṣyaṃ kusīdaṃ ca daśa jīvanahetavaḥ // GarP_1,213.100 //
analyzed: vṛttiḥ bhaikṣyam kusīdam ca daśa jīvana hetavaḥ
pratigraha arjitā vipre kṣatriye śastra nirjitā

original: vaiśye nyāyārjitāḥ svārthāḥ śūdre śuśrūṣayārjitāḥ // GarP_1,213.101 //
analyzed: vaiśye nyāya arjitāḥ sva arthāḥ śūdre śuśrūṣayā arjitāḥ
nadī bahu udakā śāka mṛd parṇāni samidh kuśāḥ
āgneyaḥ brahmaghoṣaḥ ca viprāṇām dhanam uttamam
a yācita upapanne tu na asti doṣaḥ pratigrahe
amṛtam tat viduḥ devāḥ tasmāt tat na eva varjayet
guru dravyān ca aujjihīrṣuḥ arciṣyande vata atithīn

original: sarvataḥ pratigṛhṇīyānna tuṣyettu svayaṃ tataḥ // GarP_1,213.104 //
analyzed: sarvatas pratigṛhṇīyāt na tuṣyet tu svayam tatas
sādhutaḥ pratigṛhṇīyāt atha vā a sādhutaḥ dvijaḥ
guṇavān alpa doṣaḥ ca nirguṇaḥ hi nimajjati
evam tu akṣa vṛttyā vā kṛtvā bharaṇam ātmanaḥ
kuryāt viśuddhim paratas prāyaścittam dvijottamaḥ

original: caturthe ca tathā bhāge snānārthaṃ mṛda māharet /
analyzed: caturthe ca tathā bhāge snāna artham mṛdam āharet
tila puṣpa kuśa ādīni snānam ca akṛtrime jale
mārjana ācamā avagāhāḥ ca aṣṭa snānam prakīrtitam
asnātaḥ tu pumān na arhe japa agni havana ādiṣu

original: prātaḥ snānaṃ tadarthaṃ tu nityasnānaṃ prakīrtitam // GarP_1,213.109 //
analyzed: prātar snānam tad artham tu nitya snānam prakīrtitam
cāṇḍāla śava viṣṭhā ādyān spṛṣṭvā snānam rajasvalām

original: snānārhastu yadā snāti snānaṃ naimittikaṃ hi tat // GarP_1,213.110 //
analyzed: snāna arhaḥ tu yadā snāti snānam naimittikam hi tat
tat hi kāmyam samuddiṣṭam na akāmaḥ tat prayojayet
japtu kāmaḥ pavitrāṇi arciṣyan devatā atithīn

original: snānaṃ samācaredyastu kriyāṅgaṃ tacca kīrtitam // GarP_1,213.112 //
analyzed: snānam samācaret yaḥ tu kriyā aṅgam tat ca kīrtitam
mala apakarṣaṇa arthāya pravṛttiḥ tatra na anyathā

original: saraḥ sudevakhāteṣu tīrtheṣu ca nadīṣu ca // GarP_1,213.113 //
analyzed: saraḥ sudeva khāteṣu tīrtheṣu ca nadīṣu ca
snānam eva kriyā yasmāt kriyā snānam atas param
adbhiḥ gātrāṇi śudhyanti tīrtha snānāt phalam labhet
mārjanāt majjanaiḥ mantraiḥ pāpam āśu praṇaśyati

original: nityaṃ naimittikaṃ cāpi kriyāṅgaṃ malakarṣaṇam // GarP_1,213.115 //
analyzed: nityam naimittikam ca api kriyā aṅgam mala karṣaṇam
tīrtha abhāve tu kartavyam uṣṇa udaka para udakaiḥ
bhūmiṣṭhāt uddhṛtam puṇyam tatas prastravaṇa udakam
sārasam puṇyam tasmāt na ādeyam ucyate

original: tīrthatoyaṃ tataḥ puṇyaṃ gāgaṃ puṇyaṃ tu sarvataḥ // GarP_1,213.117 //
analyzed: tīrtha toyam tatas puṇyam gāgam puṇyam tu sarvatas
gāgam payaḥ punāti āśu pāpam āmaraṇāntikam

original: gayāyāṃ ca kurukṣetre yattoyaṃ samupasthitam // GarP_1,213.118 //
analyzed: gayāyām ca kurukṣetre yat toyam samupasthitam
tasmāt tu gāṅgam aparam jānīyāt toyam uttamam

original: putrajanmani yogeṣu tathā saṃkramaṇe raveḥ // GarP_1,213.119 //
analyzed: putra janmani yogeṣu tathā saṃkramaṇe raveḥ

original: rāhośca darśane snānaṃ praśastaṃ niśi nānyathā /
analyzed: rāhoḥ ca darśane snānam praśastam niśi na anyathā
uṣasi uṣasi yat snānam sandhyāyām udite ravau
prājāpatyena tat tulyam mahāpātaka nāśanam

original: yatphalaṃ dvādaśābdāni prājāpatye kṛte bhavet // GarP_1,213.121 //
analyzed: yat phalam dvādaśa abdāni prājāpatye kṛte bhavet
prātar snāyī tat āpnoti varṣeṇa śraddhayā anvitaḥ
yaḥ icchet vipulān bhogān candra sūrya graha upamān

original: prātaḥ snāyī bhavennityaṃ māsau dvau māghaphālgunau /
analyzed: prātar snāyī bhavet nityam māsau dvau māgha phālgunau

original: yastu māghaṃ samāsādya prātaḥ snāyī haviṣyabhuk // GarP_1,213.123 //
analyzed: yaḥ tu māgham samāsādya prātar snāyī haviṣya bhuj
iti pāpam mahā ghoram māsāt eva vyapohati

original: mātaraṃ pitaraṃ vāpi bhrātaraṃ suhṛdaṃ gurum // GarP_1,213.124 //
analyzed: mātaram pitaram vā api bhrātaram suhṛdam gurum
yam uddiśya nimajjeta dvādaśa aṃśam labhet tu saḥ
tuṣyati āmalakaiḥ viṣṇuḥ ekādaśyā viśeṣataḥ
śrī kāmaḥ sarvadā snānam
santāpaḥ kīrtiḥ alpa āyuḥ dhanam nidhanam eva ca
ārogyam sarva kāma āptiḥ abhyaṅgāt bhāskara ādiṣu
upoṣitasya vratinaḥ kṛtta keśasya nāpitaiḥ
tāvat śrīḥ tiṣṭhati prītā yāvat tailam na saṃspṛśet
evam snātvā pitṝn devān manuṣyān tarpayet naraḥ
nābhi mātre jale sthitvā cintayet ūrja mānasaḥ

original: āgacchantu me pitara imaṃ gṛhṇantvapoñjalim // GarP_1,213.129 //
analyzed: āgacchantu me pitaraḥ imam gṛhṇantu apoñjalim
trīn trīn eva añjalīn dadyāt ākāśe dakṣiṇe tathā

original: vasitvā vasanaṃ śuṣkaṃ sthalasthā starṇabarhiṣi // GarP_1,213.130 //
analyzed: vasitvā vasanam śuṣkam sthala sthā starṇa barhiṣi
vidhi jñāḥ tarpaṇam kuryuḥ na pātre tu kadācana

original: yadapāṃ krūramāṃsāttu yadamedhyaṃ tu kiñcana // GarP_1,213.131 //
analyzed: yat apām krūra māṃsāt tu yat amedhyam tu kiñcana
aśāntam malinam yat ca tat sarvam apagacchatu

original: gṛhītvānena mantreṇa toyaṃ savyena pāṇinā // GarP_1,213.132 //
analyzed: gṛhītvā anena mantreṇa toyam savyena pāṇinā
prakṣipa uddiśi nairṛtyām rakṣaḥ upahataye tu tat
niṣiddha bhakṣaṇāt yat tu pāpāt yat ca pratigrahāt
duṣkṛtam yat ca me kiñcid bāc manaḥ kāya karmabhiḥ

original: punātu me tadindrastu varuṇaḥ sabṛhaspatiḥ // GarP_1,213.134 //
analyzed: punātu me tat indraḥ tu varuṇaḥ sa bṛhaspatiḥ
savitā ca bhagaḥ ca eva munayaḥ sanaka ādayaḥ
ā brahmastamba paryantam jagat tṛpyatu iti bruvan
kṣipet abañjalīn trīḥ tu kurvan saṃkṣepa tarpaṇam
surāṇām arcanam kuryāt brahmā dīnām amatsarī
brāhma vaiṣṇava raudraiḥ ca sāvitraiḥ maitra vāruṇaiḥ
tad liṅgaiḥ arcayet mantraiḥ sarva devān namasya ca
namaskāreṇa puṣpāṇi vinyaset tu pṛthak pṛthak
sarva deva mayam viṣṇum bhāskaram ca api atha arcayet
dadyāt puruṣasūktena yaḥ puṣpāṇi apaḥ eva vā

original: arcitaṃ syājjagādidaṃ tena sarvaṃ carācaram // GarP_1,213.139 //
analyzed: arcitam syāt jagāt idam tena sarvam carācaram
anyaiḥ ca tāntrikaiḥ mantraiḥ pūjayet ca janārdanam
ādau arghyam pradātavyam tatas paścāt vilepanam
tatas puṣpa añjalim dhūpam u pahāra phalāni ca
snānam antar jale ca eva mārjana ācamanam tathā
jala abhimantraṇam yat ca tīrthasya parikalpayet
aghamarṣaṇa sūktena tri vāram tu eva nityaśas
snāne caritam iti etat samuddiṣṭam mahātmabhiḥ
brahma kṣatra viśām ca eva mantravat snānam iṣyate
tūṣṇīm eva tu śūdrasya sa namaskārakam smṛtam
adhyāpanam brahmayajñaḥ pitṛ yajñaḥ tu tarpaṇam
homaḥ daivī baliḥ bhautaḥ na tithi pūjanam

original: gavā goṣṭhe daśaguṇaṃ agnyagāre śatādhikam // GarP_1,213.145 //
analyzed: gavā goṣṭhe daśaguṇam agnyagāre śata adhikam
siddha kṣetreṣu tīrtheṣu devatāyataneṣu ca
sahasra śata koṭīnām anantam viṣṇu sannidhau

original: pañcame ca tathā bhāge saṃvibhāgo yathārthataḥ /
analyzed: pañcame ca tathā bhāge saṃvibhāgaḥ yathārthataḥ
pitṛ de va manuṣyāṇām koṭīnām ca upadiśyate
brāhmaṇebhyaḥ pradāya agra yaḥ suhṛdbhiḥ saha aśnute

original: sa pretya labhate svargamannadānaṃ samācaran // GarP_1,213.148 //
analyzed: sa pretya labhate svargam anna dānam samācaran
pūrvam madhuram aśrīyāt lavaṇa amlau ca madhyatas
kaṭu tikta kaṣāyān ca payaḥ ca eva tathā antatas

original: śākaṃ ca rātrau bhūmiṣṭhamatyantaṃ ca vivarjayet /
analyzed: śākam ca rātrau bhūmiṣṭham atyantam ca vivarjayet
na ca eka rasa sevāyām prasajjeta kadācana
samṛtam brāhmaṇasya annam kṣatriya annam payaḥ smṛtam

original: vaiśyasya cānnamevānnaṃ śūdrānnaṃ rudhiraṃ smṛtam // GarP_1,213.151 //
analyzed: vaiśyasya ca annam eva annam śūdra annam rudhiram smṛtam
amāvāsī vaset atra eka hāyanam eva vā

original: tatra śrīścaiva lakṣmīśca vasate nātra saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: tatra śrīḥ ca eva lakṣmīḥ ca vasate na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: udare gārhapatyāgniḥ pṛṣṭhadeśe tu dakṣiṇaḥ // GarP_1,213.153 //
analyzed: udare gārhapatya agniḥ pṛṣṭha deśe tu dakṣiṇaḥ

original: āsye cāhavanīyo 'gniḥ satyaḥ parva ca mūrdhani /
analyzed: āsye ca āhavanīyaḥ gniḥ satyaḥ parva ca mūrdhani

original: yaḥ pañcāgnīnimānveda āhitāgniḥ sa ucyate // GarP_1,213.154 //
analyzed: yaḥ pañca agnīn imān veda āhitāgniḥ saḥ ucyate
somam ca vividham ca annam ucyate

original: prāṇo hyagnistathādityastribhoktā eka eva tu // GarP_1,213.155 //
analyzed: prāṇaḥ hi agniḥ tathā ādityaḥ tribhā uktā ekaḥ eva tu
annam balāya me bhūmeḥ apām agni anilasya ca
bhavati etat pariṇatau mama api avyāhatam sukham
hastena parimārjya atha kuryāt tāmbūla bhakṣaṇam
śravaṇam ca itihāsasya tat kuryāt su samāhitaḥ
itihāsa purāṇa ādyaiḥ

original: tataḥ sandhyāmupāsīta snātvā vai paścimāṃ naraḥ // GarP_1,213.158 //
analyzed: tatas sandhyām upāsīta snātvā vai paścimām naraḥ
etat vā divase proktam anuṣṭhānam mayā dvija
ācāram yaḥ paṭhet vidvān śṛṇuyāt sa divam vrajet

original: ācārādirdharmakartā keśavo hi smṛto dvija // GarP_1,213.159 //
analyzed: ācāra ādiḥ dharma kartā keśavaḥ hi smṛtaḥ dvija

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe pañcottaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe pañcottaradviśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
brahmā uvāca

original: atha snānavidhiṃ vakṣye snānamūlā kriyā yataḥ /
analyzed: atha snāna vidhim vakṣye snāna mūlā kriyā yatas

āharet snāna kāle ca prayataḥ śuciḥ
gandha udaka antam vivikte dhaṃ
sthāpayet tāni atha kṣitau

original: tridhā kṛtvā mṛdaṃ tāṃ tu gomayaṃ ca vicakṣaṇaḥ /
analyzed: tridhā kṛtvā mṛdam tām tu gomayam ca vicakṣaṇaḥ

original: adbhirmṛdbhiśca caraṇau prakṣālyātha karau tathā // GarP_1,214.3 //

upavītī baddha śikhaḥ samyak ācamya vāgyataḥ
urum rājā iti ṛcā toyam upasthāya pradakṣiṇam
āvartayet tat udakam ye te śatam iti tryṛcā

original: oṃ uruṃ hi rājā varuṇaścakāra sūryāya panthānamanveta vā /

pratidhātā ca vaktā
namaḥ gnyaruṇāyāḥ abhiṣṭutaḥ varuṇasya pāśaḥ
varuṇāya namaḥ

original: oṃ ye te śataṃ varuṇaye sahasraṃ yajñiyāḥ pāśā vitatā mahāntaḥ /
analyzed: om ye te śatam varuṇaye sahasram yajñiyāḥ pāśāḥ vitatāḥ mahāntaḥ

original: tebhirno adya savitota viṣṇurviśve muñcantu marutaḥ svarkāḥ svāhā /
analyzed: tebhiḥ naḥ adya savitā uta viṣṇuḥ viśve muñcantu marutaḥ su arkāḥ svāhā

original: sumitriyāna ityabañjalimākṛtyottareṇa toyaṃ paścādvirājya caiva viniḥ kṣipet /
analyzed: iti ap añjalim ākṛtya uttareṇa toyam paścāt virājya ca eva kṣipet

original: oṃ sumitriyā na āpa oṣadhayaḥ santu /
analyzed: om su mitriyāḥ naḥ āpaḥ oṣadhayaḥ santu

original: durmitriyāstasmai santu yo 'smāndveṣṭi yañca vayaṃ dviṣmaḥ // GarP_1,214.7 //
analyzed: durmitriyāḥ tasmai santu yaḥ smān dveṣṭi yam ca vayam dviṣmaḥ

original: prakṣālya hastā vācamya namaskṛtya jalaṃ tataḥ // GarP_1,214.8 //

original: oṃ idaṃ viṣṇurvicakrame tredhā nidhe padam samūḍhamasya pāṃsure /

mahāvyāhṛtibhiḥ paścāt ācāmet prayataḥ san

original: oṃ āpo asmānmātaraḥ śundhayantu ghṛtena no ghṛtaṣvaḥ punantu /
analyzed: om āpaḥ asmān mātaraḥ śundhayantu ghṛtena naḥ ghṛtaṣvaḥ punantu

original: viśvaṃ hi ripraṃ pravahanti devīrudidābhyaḥ śucirāpūta emi // GarP_1,214.11 //

tatas pātrāṇi nimajya unmajjya vai śanais

original: oṃ mānastoke tanaye mā na āyuṣi mā no goṣu mā no aśveṣu rīriṣaḥ /
analyzed: om māna stoke tanaye mā naḥ āyuṣi mā naḥ goṣu mā naḥ aśveṣu rīriṣaḥ

original: mā no vīrānrudrabhāmino 'badhīrhaviṣmantaḥ sadamitvā havāmahe // GarP_1,214.13 //
analyzed: mā naḥ vīrān rudra bhāminaḥ badhīḥ haviṣmantaḥ sadam itvā havāmahe

original: imaṃme varuṇe dvābhyāṃ tvannaḥ satvanna ityapi // GarP_1,214.14 //
analyzed: imam me varuṇe dvābhyām tvad naḥ satvan naḥ iti api

original: oṃ imaṃme varuṇa śrudhīhavamadyā ca mṛḍayatvā mavasyurācake // GarP_1,214.15 //
analyzed: om imam me varuṇa śrudhi havam adya ca mṛḍayatvā

original: oṃ tattvayāmi brahmaṇā vandamānastadāśāste yajamāno havirbhiḥ /

original: aheḍamāno varuṇeha bodhyuruśaṃ samāna āyuḥ pramoṣīḥ /
analyzed: a heḍamānaḥ varuṇa iha bodhi uruśam samānaḥ āyuḥ pramoṣīḥ

original: oṃ tvanno agne varuṇasya vidvāndevasya heḍo avayāsisīṣṭhāḥ /

yajiṣṭhaḥ vahnitamaḥ śośucānaḥ viśvā dveṣāṃsi pramumugdhi asmat svāhā

original: oṃ sa tvanno agnevamo bhavatī nediṣṭho asyā uṣasovyuṣṭau /
analyzed: om sa tvat naḥ agne vamaḥ bhavatī nediṣṭhaḥ asyāḥ uṣasaḥ vyuṣṭau

original: avayakṣvano varuṇaṃ rarāṇo vīhimṛḍīkaṃ suhavo na edhi /

original: oṃ āpo nauṣadhi hiṃsārdhamno rājastato varuṇo nomuñcā yadāharaghnyā iti varuṇeti śapārmahe tato varuṇa no muñca /

original: ādāvante ca kurvīta abhiṣekaṃ yathākramam // GarP_1,214.22 //

original: oṃ tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padaṃ sadā paśyanti sūrayaḥ /

divi iva cakṣuḥ ātatam

original: snātvaivaṃ vāsasī dhaute acchinne paridhāya ca /
analyzed: snātvā evam vāsasī dhaute acchinne paridhāya ca

original: prakṣālya ca mṛdādbhiśca hastau prakṣālya vai tadā // GarP_1,214.30 //

original: taccakṣurdeva iti ca haṃsaḥ śuciṣadityapi // GarP_1,214.33 //
analyzed: tat cakṣuḥ devaḥ iti ca haṃsaḥ śuciṣad iti api
etān japet ūrdhva bāhuḥ sūryam īkṣya samāhitaḥ

original: gāyattrīṃ ca tathā śaktyā upasthāya divākaram // GarP_1,214.34 //
analyzed: gāyattrīm ca tathā śaktyā upasthāya divākaram
vibhrāj iti anuvākena sūktena puruṣasya ca

original: śivasaṅkalpena ca tathā maṇḍalabrāhmaṇena ca // GarP_1,214.35 //
analyzed: śivasaṅkalpena ca tathā maṇḍalabrāhmaṇena ca
divākīrtyā tathā ca anyaiḥ sauraiḥ mantraiḥ ca śaktitaḥ
japa yajñaḥ tu kartavyaḥ sarva deva praṇītakaiḥ

original: savyaṃ kṛtvā trirācamya śriyaṃ medhāṃ dhṛtiṃ kṣitim // GarP_1,214.37 //
analyzed: savyam kṛtvā tris ācamya śriyam medhām dhṛtim kṣitim

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe sandhyāvidhinirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptadaśottaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe sandhyāvidhinirūpaṇam nāma saptadaśottaradviśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
brahmā uvāca
vyāsa śrāddham aham vakṣye bhukti mukti pradam nṛṇām
pūrvam nimantrayet viprān viśeṣāt brahmacāriṇaḥ
pradakṣiṇa upavītena devān vāma upavītinā
pitṝn nimantrayet pādau kṣālayet vākya mantrataḥ
om svāgatam bhavadbhiḥ iti

original: oṃ susvāgatāmiti tairukte oṃ viśvebhyo devebhya etatpādodakamarghyaṃ svāheti devabrāhmaṇapādayordevatīrthenābhugnakuśasahitajaladānam // GarP_1,218.3
analyzed: om su svāgatām iti taiḥ ukte om viśvebhyaḥ devebhyaḥ etat pāda udakam arghyam svāhā iti deva brāhmaṇa pādayoḥ devatīrthena ābhugna kuśa sahita jala dānam
tatas dakṣiṇa abhimukhena vāma upavītena amuka gotrebhyaḥ asmad pitṛ pitāmaha prapitāmahebhyaḥ
yathā nāma śarmabhyaḥ etat pāda udakam arghyam svadhā iti pitṛ ādi brāhmaṇa pādayoḥ pitṛtīrthena
ābhugna kuśa kusuma sahita jala dānam
evam mātāmaha ādibhyaḥ

original: etadācamanīyaṃ svāhā svadheti brāhmaṇahaste eṣavor'ghya iti brāhmaṇahaste puṣpadānam // GarP_1,218.5 //
analyzed: etat ācamanīyam svāhā svadhā iti brāhmaṇa haste iti brāhmaṇa haste puṣpa dānam

original: oṃ siddhamidamāsanam iha siddhamityabhidhāya oṃ bhūḥ oṃ bhuvaḥ oṃ svaḥ oṃ mahaḥ oṃ janaḥ oṃ tapaḥ oṃ satyamiti saptavyāhṛtibhiḥ pūrvamukhandevabrāhmaṇopaveśanam
analyzed: om siddham idam āsanam iha siddham iti abhidhāya om bhūḥ om bhuvaḥ om svar om mahaḥ om janaḥ om tapaḥ om satyam iti sapta vyāhṛtibhiḥ pūrva mukhan deva brāhmaṇa upaveśanam
uttara diś mukham pitṛ brāhma yoṇa upaveśanam

original: oṃ devatābhyaḥ pitṛbhyaśca mahāyogibhya eva ca /
analyzed: om devatābhyaḥ pitṛbhyaḥ ca mahāyogibhyaḥ eva ca

original: namaḥ svadhāyai svāhāyai nityameva bhavantute iti trirjapet // GarP_1,218.6 //
analyzed: namaḥ svadhāyai svāhāyai nityam eva bhavantu te iti tris japet

original: oṃ adyāsmindeśe amukamāse amukarāśiṅgate savitaryamukatithāvamukagotrāṇāmasmatpitṛpitāmahaprapitāmahānāṃ yathānāmaśarmaṇāṃ viśvedevapūrvakandṛśrāddhaṃ  #
analyzed: om adya asmin deśe amuka māse amuka rāśiṅgate savitari amuka tithau amuka gotrāṇām asmad pitṛ pitāmaha prapitāmahānām yathā nāma śarmaṇām viśvedeva pūrvakandṛ śrāddham
kariṣye

original: oṃ viśvebhyo devabhyaḥ svāhā oṃ viśvedevānāvāhayiṣye /
analyzed: om viśvebhyaḥ devabhyaḥ svāhā om viśvedevān āvāhayiṣye

original: āvāhayetyukte oṃ viśvedevāḥ sa āgata śṛṇutām imaṃ havam /
analyzed: āvāhaya iti ukte om viśvedevāḥ saḥ āgata śṛṇutām imam havam

original: edaṃ barhirniṣīdata oṃ viśvedevāḥ śṛṇutemaṃ ivaṃ me ye antarikṣe ya upadyaviṣṭa /
analyzed: ā idam barhiḥ niṣīdata om viśvedevāḥ śṛṇuta imam me ye antarikṣe yaḥ upadyaviṣṭa

original: ye agnijihvā uta vā yajatrā āsadyāsminbarhiṣi mādayadhvam /
analyzed: ye agni jihvāḥ uta vā yajatrāḥ āsadya asmin barhiṣi mādayadhvam

original: oṃ oṣadhayaḥ saṃvadante somena saha rājñā /
analyzed: om oṣadhayaḥ saṃvadante somena saha rājñā
yasmai kṛṇoti brāhmaṇaḥ tam rājan pārayāmasi
om āgacchantu mahābhāgāḥ viśvedevāḥ mahā balāḥ

original: ye atra vihitāḥ śrāddhe sāvadhānā bhavantu te /
analyzed: ye atra vihitāḥ śrāddhe sāvadhānāḥ bhavantu te

original: oṃ apahatāsurā rakṣāṃsi vediṣada iti tritriryavavikiraṇam // GarP_1,218.7 //
analyzed: om apahata asurāḥ rakṣāṃsi vediṣade iti tri tris yava vikiraṇam
om pātram aham kariṣye

original: oṃ karuṣvetyanujñātaḥ kṛtvā pātre pavitraniṣevaṇam // GarP_1,218.8 //
analyzed: om karuṣva iti anujñātaḥ kṛtvā pātre pavitra niṣevaṇam

original: oṃ śanno devīrabhiṣṭaya āpo bhavantu pītaye /
analyzed: om śat naḥ devīḥ abhiṣṭaye āpaḥ bhavantu pītaye
śaṃyos abhistravantu naḥ iti pātre jala dānam
om yavaḥ si yavaya asmad veṣaḥ yavaya arātīḥ iti yavadānam
gandha dvārām durādharṣām nitya puṣṭām karīṣiṇīm
īśvarīm sarva bhūtānām tāḥ tvā
mihā upahvaye śriyam iti gandha dānam

original: oṃ yā divyā āpaḥ payasā saṃbabhūvuryā antarikṣauta pārthavīryāḥ /
analyzed: om yāḥ divyāḥ āpaḥ payasā saṃbabhūvuḥ yāḥ pārtha vīryāḥ

original: hiraṇyavarṇā yajñiyāstāna āpaḥ śivāḥ śaṃ syonā suhavā bhavantu /
analyzed: hiraṇya varṇāḥ āstānaḥ āpaḥ śivāḥ śam syonā su havāḥ bhavantu

original: eṣor'gho nama iti brāhmaṇahaste jalaṃ dattvānenaiva pātreṇa pavitragrahaṇaṃ kṛtvā saṃstravaṃ pavitraṃ ca brāhmaṇapārśve dadyāt /
analyzed: eṣaḥ ṛghaḥ namaḥ iti brāhmaṇa haste jalam dattvā anena eva pātreṇa pavitra grahaṇam kṛtvā saṃstravam pavitram ca brāhmaṇa pārśve dadyāt

original: tataḥ prathamapātre saṃstravajalaṃ saṃsthāpya kuśopari ūrdhvamukhaṃ sthāpanaṃ kuryat /
analyzed: tatas prathama pātre saṃstrava jalam saṃsthāpya kuśa upari ūrdhva mukham sthāpanam kuryat
tad upari kuśa dānam

original: viśvebhyo devebhyaḥ etāni gandhapuṣpadhūpadīpavāso yugayajño pavītāni namaḥ /
analyzed: viśvebhyaḥ devebhyaḥ etāni gandha puṣpa dhūpa dīpa vāsaḥ yuga yajña upavītāni namaḥ
gandha ādi dānam acchidram astu
astu iti brāhmaṇa prativacanam

original: tataḥ pitṛpitāmahaprapitāmahānāṃ mātāmahapramātāmahavṛddhapramātāmahānāṃ sapatnīkānāṃ śrāddhamahaṃ kariṣye iti anujñāvacanam /
analyzed: tatas pitṛ pitāmaha prapitāmahānām mātāmaha pramātāmaha vṛddha pramātāmahānām sa patnīkānām śrāddham aham kariṣye iti anujñā vacanam
kuruṣva iti brāhmaṇaiḥ ukte
om devatābhyaḥ pitṛbhyaḥ ca iti tris japet

original: oṃ amukagotrebyo 'smatpitṛpitāmahebhyo yathānāmaśarmabhyaḥ sapatnīkebhyaḥ idamāsanaṃ svadhā iti brāhmaṇavāme āsanadānam /
analyzed: om smat pitṛ pitāmahebhyaḥ yathā nāma śarmabhyaḥ sa patnīkebhyaḥ idam āsanam svadhā iti brāhmaṇa vāme āsana dānam
om pitṝn āvāhayiṣye om
āvāhaya iti ukte om uśantaḥ tvā nidhīmahi uśantaḥ samidhīmahi
uśan nu śate āvaha pitṝn haviṣe uttave

original: oṃ āyantu naḥ pitaraḥ saumyāso 'gniṣvāttāḥ pathibhirdevayānaiḥ /
analyzed: om āyantu naḥ pitaraḥ saumyāsaḥ gniṣvāttāḥ pathibhiḥ deva yānaiḥ
asmin yajñe svadhayā madantaḥ dhibruvantu tevantu asmān iti āvāhanam

original: oṃ apahatā surā rakṣāṃsi vediṣadaḥ iti tilavikiraṇam /
analyzed: om apahatā surā rakṣāṃsi vediṣadaḥ iti tila vikiraṇam
sthāpita pātreṣu udaka dānam
om tilaḥ si soma devatyaḥ gosavaḥ deva nirmitaḥ

original: pratnamadbhiḥ pṛktaḥ svadhayā pitṝṃllokānprīṇīhi naḥ svāhā iti tiladānam // GarP_1,218.12 //
analyzed: pratnam adbhiḥ pṛktaḥ svadhayā pitṝn lokān prīṇīhi naḥ svāhā iti tila dānam

original: gandhapuṣpe hastābhyāṃ dattvā pitṛpātramutthāpya yā divyeti paṭhitvā amukagotrāsmatpitaḥ /
analyzed: gandha puṣpe hastābhyām dattvā pitṛpātram utthāpya yā divyā iti paṭhitvā amuka gotrā asmad pitar
amuka deva śarman
sapatnīka
eṣa te rghyaḥ svadhā

original: apavitraṃ pātraṃ gṛhītvā vāmapārśve dakṣiṇe kuśopari oṃ pitṛbhyaḥ sthānamasītyadhomukhapātrasthāpanam // GarP_1,218.13 //
analyzed: a pavitram pātram gṛhītvā vāma pārśve dakṣiṇe kuśa upari om pitṛbhyaḥ sthānam asi iti adhomukha pātra sthāpanam
om śundhantām lokāḥ pitṛ sadanāḥ pitṛ sadanam asi
adhomukha pāttra sparśanam

original: amukagotrebhyo 'smatpitṛpitāmaha prapitāmahebhyaḥ sapatnīkebhya etāni gandhapuṣpadhūpadīpavāsoguṇasottarīyayajñopavītāni vaḥ svadhā pitṛtīrthena  #
analyzed: amuka gotrebhyaḥ smat pitṛ pitāmaha prapitāmahebhyaḥ sa patnīkebhyaḥ etāni gandha puṣpa dhūpa dīpa vāsaḥ guṇa sa uttarīya yajñopavītāni vaḥ svadhā pitṛtīrthena
gandha ādi dānam
gandha ādi dānam akṣayyam astu
saṃkalpa siddhiḥ astu
brāhmaṇa vacanam
evam mātāmaha ādīnām anujñāpana ādi karma
om yā divyā iti bhūmi saṃmārjanam

original: tato ghṛtāktamannaṃ gṛhītvā dakṣiṇopavītī pitṛbrāhmaṇam oṃ agnau karaṇamahaṃ kariṣye /
analyzed: tatas ghṛta aktam annam gṛhītvā dakṣiṇa upavītī pitṛ brāhmaṇam om agnau karaṇam aham kariṣye

original: oṃ kuruṣveti tenokte oṃ agnaye kavyavāhanāya svāhā iti āhutidvayaṃ devabrāhmaṇahaste
analyzed: om kuruṣva iti tena ukte om agnaye kavyavāhanāya svāhā iti āhuti dvayam deva brāhmaṇa haste

original: dattvā avaśiṣṭānnaṃ piṇḍārthaṃ sthāpayitvā aparamardhaṃ pitrādipātre mātāmahādipātre
analyzed: dattvā avaśiṣṭa annam piṇḍa artham sthāpayitvā aparam ardham pitṛ ādi pātre mātāmaha ādi pātre
ca niḥ kṣipet

original: pātramudrādi nidhāya kuśaṃ dattvā adhomukhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ pātraṃ gṛhītvā oṃ pṛthivīte pātraṃ dyaurapidhānaṃ brāhmaṇasya mukhe amṛte amṛtaṃ  #
analyzed: pātra mudrā ādi nidhāya kuśam dattvā adhomukhābhyām pāṇibhyām pātram gṛhītvā om pṛthivi ite pātram dyauḥ apidhānam brāhmaṇasya mukhe amṛte amṛtam
juhomi svāhā pātra abhimantraṇam
idam viṣṇuḥ vicakrame tredhā nidadhe padam
samūḍham asya pāṃsure
viṣṇo havyam rakṣasva iti anna madhye adhomukha dvija aṅguṣṭha niveśanam
apahata iti tris yava vikiraṇam

original: oṃ nihanmi sarvaṃ yadamedhyavadbhaveddhatāśca sarve 'suradānavā mayā /
analyzed: om nihanmi sarvam yat amedhya vat bhavet hatāḥ ca sarve sura dānavāḥ mayā

original: rakṣāṃsi yakṣāḥ sapiśācasaṅghā hatā mayā yātudhānāśca sarve iti siddhārthavikiraṇam // GarP_1,218.16 //
analyzed: rakṣāṃsi yakṣāḥ sa piśāca saṅghāḥ hatāḥ mayā yātudhānāḥ ca sarve iti siddhārtha vikiraṇam

original: tato dhūrilocanasaṃjñakebhyodavebhya etadannaṃ saghṛtaṃ sapānīyaṃ savyañjanaṃ svāheti vārikuśādyairanusaṅkalpanam /
analyzed: tatas dhūrilocana saṃjñakebhyaḥ davebhyaḥ etat annam sa ghṛtam sa pānīyam sa vyañjanam svāhā iti vāri kuśa ādyaiḥ anusaṅkalpanam
om annam idam akṣayyam astu om saṃṅkalpa siddhiḥ astu

original: tato viparītopavītena savyañjanaṃ saghṛtamannaṃ pitrādi brāhmaṇapātre nidhāya tadupari
analyzed: tatas viparīta upavītena sa vyañjanam sa ghṛtam annam pitṛ ādi brāhmaṇa pātre nidhāya tad upari

original: bhūmisaṃlagnakuśaṃ dattvā oṃ pṛthivī te pātraṃ iti mantreṇa uttānābhyāṃ pātraṃ gṛhītvā
analyzed: bhūmi saṃlagna kuśam dattvā om pṛthivī te pātram iti mantreṇa uttānābhyām pātram gṛhītvā

original: oṃ idaṃ viṣṇorityannopari uttānaṃ dvijāṅguṣṭhaṃ niveśayet /
analyzed: om idam viṣṇoḥ iti anna upari uttānam dvija aṅguṣṭham niveśayet
om apahata iti tila vikiraṇam

original: bhūmipātitavāmajānuḥ amukagotrebhyaḥ asmatpitṛpitāmahebhyaḥ sapatnīkebhyaḥ etadannaṃ saghṛtaṃ sapānīyaṃ savyañjanaṃ pratiṣiddhavarjitaṃ svadhā
analyzed: bhūmi pātita vāma jānuḥ amuka gotrebhyaḥ asmad pitṛ pitāmahebhyaḥ sa patnīkebhyaḥ etat annam sa ghṛtam sa pānīyam sa vyañjanam pratiṣiddha varjitam svadhā

original: annaṃ saṅkalpya oṃ ūrjaṃ vahantīramṛtaṃ ghṛta payaḥ kīlālaṃ paristrutaṃ svadhāstu tarpayata me pitaram /
analyzed: annam saṅkalpya om ūrjam vahantīḥ amṛtam ghṛta payaḥ kīlālam paristrutam svadhā astu tarpayata me pitaram
dakṣiṇāmukha vari dhāra tyāgaḥ
om śrāddham idam acchidram astu om saṅkalpa siddhaḥ astu

original: oṃ bhūrbhuvaḥ svastatsaviturvareṇyaṃ bhargodevasya dhīmahi dhiyo yo naḥ pracodayāt
analyzed: om bhūḥ bhuvaḥ svar tat savituḥ vareṇyam bhargaḥ devasya dhīmahi dhiyaḥ yaḥ naḥ pracodayāt

original: iti visajayitvā oṃ madhuvātā ṛtāyate madhukṣarantu sindhavaḥ mādhvīrnaḥ santvoṣadhīrmadhunaktamutoṣaso
analyzed: iti visajayitvā om madhuvātāḥ ṛtāyate madhu kṣarantu sindhavaḥ mādhvīḥ naḥ santu oṣadhīḥ madhu naktam uta uṣasaḥ
madhut pārthivam rajaḥ

original: madhudyaurastu naḥ pitā madhumānno vanaspatiḥ madhumānastu sūryo mādhvīrgāvo bhavantu naḥ /
analyzed: madhu dyauḥ astu naḥ pitā madhumān naḥ vanaspatiḥ madhumān astu sūryaḥ mādhvīḥ gāvaḥ bhavantu naḥ

original: madhu madhu madhu iti japaḥ // GarP_1,218.19 //
analyzed: madhu madhu madhu iti japaḥ
yathāsukham vāgyatāḥ juṣadhvam iti brūyāt
buktavatsu sapta vyādha ādikam pitṛstotram japet
tat ca sapta vyādhāḥ daśārṇeṣu mṛgāḥ kālañjare girau

original: cakravākāḥ śarādvīpe haṃsāḥ sarasi mānase // GarP_1,218.20 //
analyzed: cakravākāḥ śarādvīpe haṃsāḥ sarasi mānase
te bhijātāḥ kurukṣetre brāhmaṇāḥ vedapāragāḥ
prasthitāḥ dūram adhvānam yūyam kim avasīdatha
tatas tṛpyasva dakṣiṇa abhimukhaḥ vāma upavītī tad utsṛṣṭa agratas

original: oṃ agnidagdhāśca ye jīvā ye 'pyadagdhāḥ kule mama /
analyzed: om agni dagdhāḥ ca ye jīvāḥ ye pi adagdhāḥ kule mama

original: bhūmau dattena tṛpyantu tṛptā yāntu parāṅgatim /
analyzed: bhūmau dattena tṛpyantu tṛptāḥ yāntu parāṅgatim

original: iti bhūmau kuśopari saghṛtamannaṃ jalaplutaṃ vikiret // GarP_1,218.22 //
analyzed: iti bhūmau kuśa upari sa ghṛtam annam jala plutam vikiret

original: tato brāhmaṇakrameṇa jalagaṇḍūṣaṃ dattvā pūrvavatsavyāhṛtikāṃ gāyattrīṃ madhuvātetitryṛcaṃ japtvā oṃ rucitaṃ bhavadbhiriti devabrāhmaṇapraśraḥ
analyzed: tatas brāhmaṇa krameṇa jala gaṇḍūṣam dattvā pūrvavat sa vyāhṛtikām gāyattrīm madhuvāta iti tryṛcam japtvā om rucitam bhavadbhiḥ iti deva brāhmaṇa praśraḥ
su rucitam iti tena ukte om śeṣam annam iti
iṣṭaiḥ saha bhojanam

original: pitrādibrāhmaṇaṃ vāmopavītena oṃ tṛptāḥ stha iti praśraḥ /
analyzed: pitṛ ādi brāhmaṇam vāma upavītena om tṛptāḥ stha iti

original: oṃ tṛptāḥ sma iti tenokte bhūmyabhyukṣaṇaṃ maṇḍalacatuṣkoṇaṃ ti lavikiraṇam // GarP_1,218.23 //
analyzed: om tṛptāḥ smaḥ iti tena ukte bhūmi abhyukṣaṇam maṇḍala catuṣkoṇam lavi kiraṇam
om amuka gotra
asmad pitar
amuka deva darśan
sapatnīka
etat te piṇḍāsanam svadhā

original: itthaṃ rekhāmadhye pitāmahāya khavyāhṛtikāṃ gāyattrīṃ madhuvāteti trarjapannannaṃ sājyaṃ piṇḍaṃ kṛtvā kuśopari amukagotra asmatpitaḥ /
analyzed: ittham rekhā madhye pitāmahāya kha vyāhṛtikām gāyattrīm madhuvāta iti trar japan annam sa ājyam piṇḍam kṛtvā kuśa upari amuka gotra asmad pitar
amuka deva śraman
sa patnīkaḥ eṣa piṇḍaḥ te svadhā
ittham rekhā madhye pitāmahāya

original: tataḥ savyāhṛtikāṃ gāyattrīṃ madhuvāteti trirjaṃpanpiṇḍavikiraṇaṃ piṇḍāntike /
analyzed: tatas sa vyāhṛtikām gāyattrīm madhuvāta iti tris jaṃpan piṇḍa vikiraṇam piṇḍa antike

original: oṃ lepabhujaḥ prīyantamiti staraṇkuśeṣu hastamārjanaṃ prakṣālitapiṇḍodakena oṃ amukagotra /
analyzed: om lepabhujaḥ prīyantam iti staraṇ kuśeṣu hasta mārjanam prakṣālita piṇḍa udakena om amuka gotra
asmad pitar

original: amukaśarman sapatnīka etatte jalamavanekṣva ye cātratvāmanujāśca tvāmanu tasmai tesvadheti pitṛpiṇḍasecanam /
analyzed: amuka śarman sa patnīkaḥ etat te jalam avanekṣva ye ca atra tvām anujāḥ ca tvām anu tasmai te svadhā iti pitṛ piṇḍa secanam

original: piṇḍapātramadhomukhaṃ kṛtvā baddhāñjaliḥ oṃ pitaro mādayadhvaṃ yathābhāgamāvṛṣāyadhvamiti japet /
analyzed: piṇḍa pātram adhomukham kṛtvā baddhāñjaliḥ om pitaraḥ mādayadhvam yathābhāgam āvṛṣāyadhvam iti japet

original: apaḥ spṛṣṭvā vāmena parāvṛttya udaṅmukhaḥ prāṇāṃstriḥ saṃyamya ṣaḍbhya ṛtubhyo namaḥ iti japaḥ // GarP_1,218.24 //
analyzed: apaḥ spṛṣṭvā vāmena parāvṛttya udak mukhaḥ prāṇān tris saṃyamya ṣaḍbhyaḥ ṛtubhyaḥ namaḥ iti japaḥ
vāmena eva parāvṛtya puṣpa dānam
akṣatam ca ariṣṭam ca astu me puṇyam śānti puṣṭi dṛ

original: dakṣiṇāmukhaḥ amī madantaḥ pitaro yathābhāgamāvṛṣāyiṣata iti japaḥ /
analyzed: dakṣiṇā mukhaḥ amī madantaḥ pitaraḥ yathābhāgam āvṛṣāyiṣata iti japaḥ

original: vāsaḥ śithilīkṛtvāñjaliṃ kṛtvā oṃ namo vaḥ pitaro namo vaḥ iti japaḥ /
analyzed: vāsaḥ śithilīkṛtvā añjalim kṛtvā om namaḥ vaḥ pitaraḥ namaḥ vaḥ iti japaḥ
gṛhān naḥ pitaraḥ datta iti gṛha vīkṣaṇam

original: tataḥ sadā vaḥ pitaro dveṣma iti vīkṣya etadvaḥ pitaro vāsa ityuccārya amukagotra etatte vāsaḥ svadhā iti sūtradānam /
analyzed: tatas sadā vaḥ pitaraḥ dveṣmaḥ iti vīkṣya etat vaḥ pitaraḥ vāsaḥ iti uccārya amuka gotraḥ etat te vāsaḥ svadhā iti sūtradānam

original: vāmena pāṇinā udakapātraṃ gṛhītvā ūrjaṃ vahantīramṛtaṃ ghṛtaṃ payaḥ ityādi piṇḍopari dhārātyāgaḥ // GarP_1,218.25 //
analyzed: vāmena pāṇinā udaka pātram gṛhītvā ūrjam vahantīḥ amṛtam ghṛtam payaḥ ityādi piṇḍa upari dhārā tyāgaḥ
pūrva sthāpita pātra śeṣa udakaiḥ pratyekam piṇḍa secanam piṇḍam āvāhya gandha ādi dānam piṇḍa upari

original: kuśapatrañca dattvā oṃ akṣannamīmadantahya va priyā adhūṣata astoṣatasvabhānavo viprā naviṣṭhayāmatī /
analyzed: kuśa patram ca dattvā om akṣan amīmadanta hya vaḥ priyāḥ adhūṣata astoṣata sva bhānavaḥ viprāḥ naviṣṭhayā amatī

original: yo jānvindra te harīti trirjapaḥ // GarP_1,218.26 //
analyzed: yaḥ jānū indra te harī iti tris japaḥ
om ittham mātāmaha ādi brāhmaṇānām ācamanam
om su su prokṣitam astu iti bhūmi abhyukṣaṇam kṛtvā

original: oṃ apāṃ madhye sthitā devāḥ sarvamapsu pratiṣṭhitam /
analyzed: om apām madhye sthitāḥ devāḥ sarvam apsu pratiṣṭhitam

original: brāhmaṇasya kare nyastāḥ śivā āpo bhavantu naḥ /
analyzed: brāhmaṇasya kare nyastāḥ śivāḥ āpaḥ bhavantu naḥ
śivāḥ āpaḥ santu iti brāhmaṇa haste jala dānam
lakṣmīḥ vasati puṣpeṣu lakṣmīḥ vasati puṣkare
lakṣmīḥ vasati goṣṭheṣu saumanasyam sadā astu te
saumanasyam astu iti puṣpa dānam

original: akṣataṃ cāstu me puṇyaṃ śāntiḥ puṣṭirdhṛtiśca me /
analyzed: akṣatam ca astu me puṇyam śāntiḥ puṣṭiḥ dhṛtiḥ ca me
yat yat śreyaskaram loke tat tat astu sadā mama
om akṣatam ca ariṣṭam ca astu iti yava taṇḍula dānam
amuka gotrāṇām asmad pitṛ pitāmaha prapitāmahānām sa patnīkānām idam anna pāna ādikam akṣayyam astu iti pitṛ ādi brāhmaṇa haste tila jala dānam
astu iti brāhmaṇaḥ vadet
etat mātāmaha ādīnām akṣayyam āśiṣaḥ

original: oṃ aghorāḥ pitaraḥ santu gotraṃ no vardhatāṃ--dātāro no 'bhivardhantāṃ vedāḥ santatireva ca /
analyzed: om aghorāḥ pitaraḥ santu gotram naḥ vardhatām dātāraḥ naḥ abhivardhantām vedāḥ santatiḥ eva ca

original: śraddhā ca no mā vyagamadbahudeyañca no 'stviti /
analyzed: śraddhā ca naḥ mā vyagamat bahudeyam ca naḥ stu iti
annañca naḥ bahu bhavet atithīn ca labhemahi

original: yācitāraśca naḥ santu mā ca yāciṣma kañcana /
analyzed: yācitāraḥ ca naḥ santu mā ca yāciṣma kañcana
etāḥ satya āśiṣaḥ santu
saumanasyam astu
astu iti ukte pradatta piṇḍa sthāne arghya artha pavitra mocanam

original: kuśapavitraṃ gṛhītvātena kuśena pitrādibrāhmaṇaṃ spṛṣṭvā svadhāṃ vācayiṣye-oṃ vācyatāṃ-oṃ pitṛpitāmahebhyo yathānāmaśarmabhyaḥ sapatnīkebhyaḥ  #
analyzed: kuśa pavitram gṛhītvā atena kuśena pitṛ ādi brāhmaṇam spṛṣṭvā svadhām vācayiṣye om vācyatām om pitṛ pitāmahebhyaḥ yathā nāma śarmabhyaḥ sa patnīkebhyaḥ
svadhā ucyatām

original: astusvadhā ityukte ūrjaṃ vahantīramṛtaṃ ghṛtamiti piṇḍopari vāridhārāṃ dadyāt // GarP_1,218.29 //
analyzed: astu svadhā iti ukte ūrjam vahantīḥ amṛtam ghṛtam iti piṇḍa upari vāri dhārām dadyāt

original: tataḥ oṃ viśvedevā asminyajñe prīyantā--devabrāhmaṇahaste yavodakadānam /
analyzed: tatas om viśvedevāḥ asmin yajñe prīyantā deva brāhmaṇa haste yava udaka dānam

original: oṃ prīyantāmiti tenokte oṃ devatābhya iti trirjapet // GarP_1,218.30 //
analyzed: om prīyantām iti tena ukte om devatābhyaḥ iti tris japet

original: adhomukhaḥ piṇḍapātrāṇi cālayitvā ācamya dakṣiṇopavītī pūrvābhimukhaḥ oṃ amukagotrāya
analyzed: adhomukhaḥ piṇḍa pātrāṇi cālayitvā ācamya dakṣiṇa upavītī pūrva abhimukhaḥ om amuka gotrāya
amuka deva śarmaṇe brāhmaṇāya sa patnīkāya śrāddha pratiṣṭhā artha dakṣiṇām etat rajatam tubhyam aham
sampradade iti dakṣiṇām dadyāt
iti devū brāhmaṇāya dakṣiṇā dānam

original: tataḥ pitṛbrāhmaṇe piṇḍāḥ sampannā iti praśraḥ /
analyzed: tatas pitṛ brāhmaṇe piṇḍāḥ sampannāḥ iti praśraḥ

original: susampannā iti piṇḍe kṣīradhārāṃ dattvā piṇḍacālanaṃ atithibrāhmaṇe piṇḍapātramuttānaṃ kṛtvā oṃ vāje vāje vata vājino no dhaneṣu viprā amṛtā  #
analyzed: su sampannāḥ iti piṇḍe kṣīra dhārām dattvā piṇḍa cālanam atithi brāhmaṇe piṇḍa pātram uttānam kṛtvā om vāje vāje vata vājinaḥ naḥ dhaneṣu viprāḥ amṛtā
ṛta jñāḥ

original: asyamadhvaḥ pibata mādayadhvaṃ tṛptā yāta pathibhirdevayānairiti piṇḍā divisarjanaṃ-āmāvājasya
analyzed: pibata mādayadhvam tṛptāḥ yāta pathibhiḥ deva yānaiḥ iti piṇḍāḥ di visarjanam ā amāvājasya

original: prasavo jagamyādeme dyāvāpṛthivī viśvarūpe āmāgantāṃ pitarā cāmā somo 'mṛtatvena gamyāt /
analyzed: prasavaḥ jagamyāt eme dyāvāpṛthivī viśva rūpe āmā āgantām pitarā ca āmā somaḥ mṛta tvena gamyāt
iti deva visarjanam
om abhigamyatām iti pitṛ brāhmaṇa visarjanam
brāhmaṇaiḥ an udgatasya nivartanam
go ādiṣu piṇḍa pratipādanam iti śeṣaḥ
ayam śrāddha vidhiḥ proktaḥ paṭhitaḥ pāpa nāśanaḥ

original: anena vidhinā śrāddhaṃ kṛtaṃ vai yatra kutracit // GarP_1,218.33 //
analyzed: anena vidhinā śrāddham kṛtam vai yatra kutracid
akṣayā syāt pitṝṇām ca svarga prāptiḥ dhruvā tathā

original: ityuktaṃ pārvaṇaṃ śrāddhaṃ pitṝṇāṃ brahmalokadam // GarP_1,218.34 //
analyzed: iti uktam pārvaṇam śrāddham pitṝṇām brahma loka dam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe pārvaṇaśrāddhakathanaṃ nāmāṣṭradaśādhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe pārvaṇaśrāddhakathanam nāma aṣṭradaśādhikadviśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
brahmā uvāca
nitya śrāddham pravakṣyāmi pūrvavat tat viśeṣavat

original: oṃ amukagotrāṇāmasmatpitṛpitāmahānāṃ amukaśarmaṇāṃ sapatnīkānāṃ śrāddhaṃ siddhānnena yuṣmāsvahaṃ kariṣye /
analyzed: om amuka gotrāṇām asmad pitṛ pitāmahānām amuka śarmaṇām sa patnīkānām śrāddham siddha annena yuṣmāsu aham kariṣye
āsana ādikam atra syāt viśvedevā vivarjitam
vṛddhiśrāddham pravakṣyāmi pūrvavat tad viśeṣakam

original: jātaputramukhadarśanādau vṛddhi śrāddhaṃ pūrvābhimukheṣu dakṣiṇopavītiṣu sayavabadarakuśairdevatīrthena namaskārāntena dakṣiṇopacāreṇa kartavyam
analyzed: jāta putra mukha darśana ādau vṛddhi śrāddham pūrva abhimukheṣu dakṣiṇa upavītiṣu sa yava badara kuśaiḥ deva tīrthena namaskāra antena dakṣiṇa upacāreṇa kartavyam
dakṣiṇa jānu gṛhītvā adya asmadīya amuka vṛddhau amuka gātrāṇām asmad prapitāmahī pitāmahī mātṝṇām amuka devīnām amuka gotrāṇām

original: śrāddhe kartavye vasusatyasaṃjñakānāṃ viśveṣāṃ devānāṃ śrāddhaṃ siddhānnenayuṣmāsu
analyzed: śrāddhe kartavye vasusatya saṃjñakānām viśveṣām devānām śrāddham siddha annena yuṣmāsu
mayā kartavyam iti deva brāhmaṇa āmantraṇam
om kariṣyasi iti tena uktaḥ ittham eva apara deva brāhmaṇa āmantraṇam

original: tataḥ amukavṛddhau amukagotrāyā matprapitāmahyā amukadevyā nāndīmukhyāḥ śrāddhaṃ siddhānnena yuṣmāsu mayā kartavyamiti prapitāmahībrāhmaṇāmantraṇam
analyzed: tatas amuka vṛddhau amuka gotrāyāḥ mad prapitāmahyāḥ amuka devyāḥ nāndīmukhyāḥ śrāddham siddha annena yuṣmāsu mayā kartavyam iti prapitāmahī brāhmaṇa āmantraṇam
kariṣyāmi iti tena ukte ittham eva pramātāmahī ādi brāhmāṇa mantraṇam
deva pitṛ sarva deva brāhmaṇam śrāddha karaṇa anujñāpanam

original: āsane oṃ viśvedevāsa āgata śṛṇutāma imaṃrṭha ivam /
analyzed: āsane om viśvedevāsaḥ āgata śṛṇutāma imaṃrṭhaḥ
tam barhiḥ niṣīdata

original: oṃ viśvedevāḥ śṛṇutemaṃ ivaṃ ye me antarikṣe ya udadyaviṣṭa /
analyzed: om viśvedevāḥ śṛṇuta imam ye me antarikṣe yaḥ

original: pe agnijihvā utavā yadatrā āsādyāsminbarhiṣi mādayadhvam /
analyzed: pe agni jihvāḥ utavāḥ yadatrāḥ āsādya asmin barhiṣi mādayadhvam
om āgacchantu iti viśvedeva āvāhanam gandha ādi dānam
acchidra avadhāraṇa vācanam
tatas prapitāmahī prabhṛtīnām anujñāpanam āsana dānam gandha ādi dānam ca acchidra avadhāraṇa vācanam
ittham pitāmahyāḥ mātuḥ
tatas prapitāmaha ādīnām anujñāpanam
āsanam āvāhanam gandha ādi dānam vṛddhapramātāmaha ādīnām anujñāpana ādi karaṇam

original: oṃ vasusatyasaṃjñakebhyo devebhya etadannaṃ saghṛtaṃ sapānīyaṃ savyañjanaṃ savadaraṃ sadadhi pratiṣiddhavarjitaṃ nama iti annasaṅkalpanam /
analyzed: om vasu satya saṃjñakebhyaḥ devebhyaḥ etat annam sa ghṛtam sa pānīyam sa vyañjanam sa vadaram sa dadhi pratiṣiddha varjitam namaḥ iti anna saṅkalpanam
om amuka gotre
mad pitāmaha muka devi nāndīmukhi
etat annam sa badaram sa dadhi namaḥ
evam mātāmaha prabhātāmahebhyaḥ
ekoddiṣṭam puras vaśyam tad viśeṣam vade śṛṇu
prathamam nimantraṇam pāda prakṣālanam āsanam

original: adya amukagotrasya matpituramukadevaśarmaṇaḥ pratisāṃvatsarikamekoddiṣṭaśrāddhaṃ siddhānnena yuṣmāsvahaṃ kariṣye /
analyzed: adya amuka gotrasya mad pituḥ amuka deva śarmaṇaḥ pratisāṃvatsarikam ekoddiṣṭa śrāddham siddha annena yuṣmāsu aham kariṣye
śrāddha karaṇa anujñāpanam āsanam gandha ādi dānam anna anukalpanam
japyam nivītī
uttara abhimukhībhūya atithiśrāddham kuryāt

original: tatasmṛptiṃ jñātvā dakṣiṇābhimukhīvāmopavītī ucchiṣṭasamīpe agnidagdhā iti annavikiraṇam /
analyzed: jñātvā dakṣiṇa abhimukhī vāma upavītī ucchiṣṭa samīpe agni dagdhā iti anna vikiraṇam

original: amukagotramatpitaramukadevaśarmannetatte jalamavanenikṣva ye cātra tvāmanuyāśca tvāmanutasmai te svadhā iti rekhopari vāridhārādānam /
analyzed: amuka gotramat pitar amuka deva śarman etat te jalam avanenikṣva ye ca atra tvām anu yāḥ ca tvām anu tasmai te svadhā iti rekhā upari vāri dhārā dānam
śeṣam pūrvavat

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe ekonaviṃśādhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe ekonaviṃśādhikadviśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
brahmā uvāca
sapiṇḍīkaraṇam vakṣye pūrṇe bde tad kṣaye hani
kṛtam samyak yathā kāle preta ādeḥ pitṛ loka dam
sapiṇḍīkaraṇam kuryāt aparāhne tu pūrvavat
pitāmaha ādi brāhmaṇa nimantraṇam
om purūrava ārdrava saṃjñakebhyaḥ devebhyaḥ etat āsanam namaḥ
vāma pārśve ca āsana dānam
āvāhanam
tatas pitāmaha prapitāmaha vṛddhaprapitāmahānām sa patnīkānām śrāddham aham kariṣye iti anujñā grahaṇam pātra traya karaṇam pātra upari

original: kuśaṃ dattvā pātrāntareṇa pidhāya acchidrāvadhāraṇāntaṃ parisamāpya tathaiva piturapi
analyzed: kuśam dattvā pātra antareṇa pidhāya acchidra avadhāraṇa antam parisamāpya tathā eva pituḥ api
sa patnīkasya preta pada anta nāmnā śrāddha karaṇa anujñāpanam deva pātra acchidra avadhāraṇam
tat parisamāpya pitāmaha prapitāmaha vṛddha prapitāmaha krameṇa pātrāṇām manāk cālanam

original: uddhāṭanaṃ kṛtvā--oṃ ye samānāḥ samanasaḥ pitaro yamarājye /
analyzed: uddhāṭanam kṛtvā om ye samānāḥ samanasaḥ pitaraḥ yama rājye

original: teṣāṃ lokaḥ svadhā namo yajño deveṣu kalpatām /
analyzed: teṣām lokaḥ svadhā namaḥ yajñaḥ deveṣu kalpatām

original: oṃ ye samānāḥ samanaso jīvā jīveṣu māmakāḥ /
analyzed: om ye samānāḥ samanasaḥ jīvāḥ jīveṣu māmakāḥ

original: teṣāṃ śrīrmayi kalpatāmasmin loke śataṃ samāḥ /
analyzed: teṣām śrīḥ mayi kalpatām asmin loke śatam samāḥ

original: etanmantradvayena pitṛpātrodakaṃ pitāmahaprapitāmahapātre vṛddhaprapitāmahapātraṃ parityajya pitāmahaprapitāmahayorudakaṃ pavitrañca pitṛpātre  #
analyzed: etad mantra dvayena pitṛpātra udakam pitāmaha prapitāmaha pātre vṛddha prapitāmaha pātram parityajya pitāmaha prapitāmahayoḥ udakam pavitram ca pitṛpātre
kṣipet
tatas pitṛ brāhmaṇa haste pātra stha pavitra dānam
pātra stha puṣpeṇa śirasaḥ kara pāda arcanam brāhmaṇa haste jala dānam hastābhyām

original: pātramutthāpya oṃ yā divyeti paṭhitvā oṃ amukagotra matpitāmaha amukadevaśarman sapatnīka
analyzed: pātram utthāpya om yā divyā iti paṭhitvā om amuka gotra mad pitāmaha amuka deva śarman sa patnīka
eṣa te arghyaḥ svadhā
pitṛpātreṇa eva pitāmaha brāhmaṇa haste stokam arghya udakam sa pavitram gṛhītvā a stokam udakam

original: piṇḍasecanārthaṃ pātrāntareṇa pidhāya pitṛbrāhmaṇavāmapārśva dakṣiṇāgrakuśopari pitṛbhyaḥ
analyzed: piṇḍa secana artham pātra antareṇa pidhāya pitṛ brāhmaṇa vāma pārśva dakṣiṇa agra kuśa upari pitṛbhyaḥ
stānam asi iti adhomukha pātra sthapanam
pitāmaha prapitāmaha vṛddha prapitāmahebhyaḥ gandha ādi dānam agnaukaraṇam
avaśiṣṭa annam prapitāmaha ādi pātre kṣipet
pitāmaha pātra abhimantraṇa paryanta krameṇa samāpya api brāhmaṇa pātra abhimantraṇam

original: aṅguṣṭhaniveśanaṃ tilavikaraṇaṃ kṛtvā amukagotra etatte annaṃ saghṛtaṃ sapānīyaṃ
analyzed: aṅguṣṭha niveśanam tila vikaraṇam kṛtvā amuka gotra etat te annam sa ghṛtam sa pānīyam

original: savyañjanaṃ pratiṣiddhavarjitaṃ ye cātra tvā manuyāśca tvāmanu tasmai te svadhā iti // GarP_1,220.5 //
analyzed: sa vyañjanam pratiṣiddha varjitam ye ca atra tvā manuyāḥ ca tvām anu tasmai te svadhā iti
tatas deva prabhṛtibhyaḥ apośānam dadyāt
atithi prāptau atidhiśrāddham kuryāt
asmin avasare vikiraṇam

original: pitāmāhadau praśraṃ kṛtvā pitṛbrāhmaṇam oṃ svaditaṃ bhavadbhiriti praśraḥ /
analyzed: pitāmaha hadau praśram kṛtvā pitṛ brāhmaṇam om svaditam bhavadbhiḥ iti praśraḥ

original: oṃ amukagotra matpitaḥ amukaśarman sapatnīka eṣa te piṇḍo ye cātratvāmanuyāśca tvāmanu tasmai svadheti piṇḍapātramacchidramastu /
analyzed: om amuka gotra mad pitar amuka śarman sa patnīkaḥ eṣa te piṇḍaḥ ye ca atra tvām anu yāḥ ca tvām anu tasmai svadhā iti piṇḍa pātram acchidram astu

original: tataḥ saṅkalpa siddhivācanaṃ samāpya piṇḍaṃ dvidhā kṛtvā ye samānāḥ sumanasa iti mantradvayaṃ paṭhitvā pitāmahavṛddhaprapitāmahapātreṣu kṣipet
