analyzed: tatas saṅkalpa siddhivācanam samāpya piṇḍam dvidhā kṛtvā ye samānāḥ sumanasaḥ iti mantra dvayam paṭhitvā pitāmaha vṛddha prapitāmaha pātreṣu kṣipet
piṇḍeṣu gandha ādikam dattvā piṇḍa cālanam
atithi brāhmaṇe svadita ādi praśraḥ
brāhmaṇānām ācamanam
bhukti krameṇa tāmbūla dānam

original: suprokṣitamastu śivā āpaḥ santu--vṛddhaprapitāmahakrameṇa brāhmaṇahaste jaladānam /
analyzed: su prokṣitam astu śivāḥ āpaḥ santu vṛddhaprapitāmaha krameṇa brāhmaṇa haste jala dānam
gotrasya akṣayyam astu pitṛ brāhmaṇa haste upatiṣṭatām iti sati jala dānam

original: aghorāḥ pitaraḥ santu astvityukte svadhāṃ vācayiṇya iti pitāmāhadibrāhmaṇānujñāpanam // GarP_1,220.7 //
analyzed: aghorāḥ pitaraḥ santu astu iti ukte svadhām vācayiṇyaḥ iti pitāmāhadi brāhmaṇa anujñāpanam

original: oṃ vācyatāṃ ityukte oṃ pitāmahādibhyaḥ svadhocyatām /
analyzed: om vācyatām iti ukte om pitāmaha ādibhyaḥ svadhā ucyatām
astu svadhā iti ukte pitṛ brāhmaṇa pitṛbhyaḥ svadhā ucyatām iti

original: astu svadhetyukte oṃ ūrjaṃ vahantīriti dakṣiṇābhimukhavāridhārātyāgaḥ /
analyzed: astu svadhā iti ukte om ūrjam vahantīḥ iti dakṣiṇa abhimukha vāri dhārā tyāgaḥ

original: oṃ viśvedevā asmin yajñe prīyantāmiti devabrāhmaṇahaste oṃ yavodakadānam /
analyzed: om viśvedevāḥ asmin yajñe prīyantām iti deva brāhmaṇa haste om yava udaka dānam
om devatābhyaḥ iti tris japaḥ

original: piṇḍapātrāṇi cālayitvā ācamya pitāmahādibhyo dakṣiṇāṃ dattvā tataḥ pitṛ brāhmaṇāya āśiṣo me pradīyantāmityāśīḥ prārthanam /
analyzed: piṇḍa pātrāṇi cālayitvā ācamya pitāmaha ādibhyaḥ dakṣiṇām dattvā tatas pitṛ brāhmaṇāya āśiṣaḥ me pradīyantām iti āśīḥ prārthanam

original: pratigṛhyatāmityukte dātāro no 'bhivardhantāmiti pātramuttānaṃ kṛtvā vāje vājedṛvisarjanam /
analyzed: pratigṛhyatām iti ukte dātāraḥ naḥ bhivardhantām iti pātram uttānam kṛtvā vāje vājedṛ visarjanam
abhiraṇyatām iti pitṛ brāhmaṇa visarjanam
sapiṇḍīkaraṇa śrāddham vyāsa proktam mayā tava

original: śrāddhaṃ viṣṇuḥ śrāddhakartā phalaṃ śrāddhādikaṃ hariḥ // GarP_1,220.10 //
iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe śrāddhānuṣṭhānaṃ nāmaviṃśādhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe śrāddhānuṣṭhānam nāma viṃśa adhika dviśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
brahāmā uvāca
dharma sāram aham vakṣye saṃkṣepāt śuṇu śaṅkara
bhukti mukti pradam sūkṣmam sarva pāpa vināśanam

original: śrutaṃ dharmaṃ balaṃ dhairyaṃ sukhamutsāhameva ca /
analyzed: śrutam dharmam balam dhairyam sukham utsāham eva ca

original: śoko harati vai nṝṇāṃ tasmācchokaṃ parityajet // GarP_1,221.2 //
analyzed: śokaḥ harati vai nṝṇām tasmāt śokam parityajet
karma dārāḥ karma lokāḥ karma sambandhi bāndhavāḥ

original: karmāṇi prerayantīha puruṣaṃ sukhaduḥ khayoḥ // GarP_1,221.3 //
analyzed: karmāṇi prerayanti iha puruṣam sukha duḥ khayoḥ
paraḥ dharmaḥ dānāt sarvam avāpyate

original: dānāḥtsvargaśca rājyañca dadyāddanaṃ tato naraḥ // GarP_1,221.4 //
analyzed: dānāt svargaḥ ca rājyam ca dadyāt danam tatas naraḥ
ekatas dānam eva āhuḥ samagra vara dakṣiṇam
ekatas bhaya bhītasya prāṇinaḥ prāṇa rakṣaṇam

original: tapasā brahmacaryeṇa yajñaiḥ snānena vā punaḥ /
analyzed: tapasā brahmacaryeṇa yajñaiḥ snānena vā punar

original: dharmasya nāśakā ye ca te vai nirayagāminaḥ // GarP_1,221.6 //
analyzed: dharmasya nāśakāḥ ye ca te vai niraya gāminaḥ
ye ca homa japa snāna devatā arcana tatparāḥ
satya kṣamā dayā yuktāḥ te narāḥ svarga gāminaḥ

original: na dātā sukhaduḥ khānāṃ na ca hartāsti kaścana /
analyzed: na dātā sukha duḥ khānām na ca hartā asti kaścana

original: bhuñjate svakṛtānyeva duḥ khāni ca sukhāni ca // GarP_1,221.8 //
analyzed: bhuñjate sva kṛtāni eva duḥ khāni ca sukhāni ca
dharma artham jīvitam yeṣām durgāṇi atitaranti te

original: santuṣṭaḥ ko na śaknoti phalamūlaiśca vartitum // GarP_1,221.9 //
analyzed: santuṣṭaḥ kaḥ na śaknoti phala mūlaiḥ ca vartitum
sarve eva hi saukhyena saṅkaṭāni avagāhate

original: idameva hi lobhasya kāryaṃ syā datiduṣkaram // GarP_1,221.10 //
analyzed: idam eva hi lobhasya kāryam syāḥ dati duṣkaram
lobhāt krodhaḥ prabhavati lobhāt drohaḥ pravartate

original: lobhānmohaśca māyā ca māno matsara eva ca // GarP_1,221.11 //
analyzed: lobhāt mohaḥ ca māyā ca mānaḥ matsaraḥ eva ca
rāga dveṣa anṛta krodha loma moha mada ujjhitaḥ

original: yaḥ sa śāntaḥ paraṃ lokaṃ yāti pāpavivarjitaḥ // GarP_1,221.12 //
analyzed: yaḥ sa śāntaḥ param lokam yāti pāpa vivarjitaḥ

original: devatā munayo nāgā gandharvā guhyakā hara /
analyzed: devatāḥ munayaḥ nāgāḥ gandharvāḥ guhyakāḥ hara

original: dhārmikaṃ pūjayantīha na dhanāḍhyaṃ na kāminam // GarP_1,221.13 //
analyzed: dhārmikam pūjayanti iha na dhana āḍhyam na kāminam
ananta bala vīryeṇa prajñayā pauruṣeṇa vā

original: alabhyaṃ labhate martyastatra kā parivedanā // GarP_1,221.14 //
analyzed: alabhyam labhate martyaḥ tatra kā parivedanā
sarvatra anitya buddhi tvam śreyaḥ param idam smṛtam
paśyan iva agratas mṛtyum yaḥ dharmam na ācaret naraḥ
ajāgala stanasya iva tasya janma nirarthakam
bhrūṇa hā brahma hā go ghnaḥ pitṛ hā gurutalpa gaḥ

original: bhūmiṃ sarvaguṇopetāṃ dattvā pāpaiḥ pramucyate // GarP_1,221.17 //
analyzed: bhūmim sarva guṇa upetām dattvā pāpaiḥ pramucyate

original: na godānātparaṃ dānaṃ kiñcidastīti me matiḥ /
analyzed: na go dānāt param dānam kiñcid asti iti me matiḥ

original: yā gaurnyāyārjitā dattā kṛtsnaṃ tārayate kulam // GarP_1,221.18 //
analyzed: yā gauḥ nyāya arjitā dattā kṛtsnam tārayate kulam
na anna dānāt param dānam kiñcid asti vṛṣadhvaja

original: annena dhāryate sarvaṃ carācaramidaṃ jagat // GarP_1,221.19 //
analyzed: annena dhāryate sarvam carācaram idam jagat
kanyā dānam vṛṣotsargaḥ tīrtha sevā śrutam tathā
hasti aśva ratha dānāni maṇi ratna vasundharāḥ
anna dānasya sarvāṇi kalām na arhanti ṣoḍaśīm

original: annātprāṇā balaṃ tejaścānnādvīryaṃ dhṛtiḥ smṛtiḥ // GarP_1,221.21 //
analyzed: annāt prāṇāḥ balam tejaḥ ca annāt vīryam dhṛtiḥ smṛtiḥ
kūpa vāpī taḍāga ādīn ārāmān ca eva kārayet
tri sapta kulam uddhṛtya viṣṇu loke mahīyate
sādhūnām darśanam puṇyam tīrthāt api viśiṣyate

original: kālena tīrthaṃ phalati sadyaḥ sādhusamāgamaḥ // GarP_1,221.23 //
analyzed: kālena tīrtham phalati sadyas sādhu samāgamaḥ
satyam damaḥ tapaḥ śaucam santoṣaḥ ca kṣamā ārjavam

original: jñānaṃ śamo dayā dānameṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ // GarP_1,221.24 //
analyzed: jñānam śamaḥ dayā dānam eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe dharmasārakathanaṃ nāmaikaviṃśādhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe dharmasārakathanam nāma ekaviṃśa adhika dviśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
brahmā uvāca
prāyaścitta ādi vakṣye ham naraka ogha vimardanam

original: makṣikā vipruṣo nārī bhuvi toyaṃ hutāśanaḥ /
analyzed: makṣikāḥ vipruṣaḥ nārī bhuvi toyam hutāśanaḥ
mārjāraḥ nakulaḥ ca eva śucīni etāni nityaśas
yaḥ śūdra ucchiṣṭa saṃspṛṣṭam pramādāt bhakṣayet dvijaḥ
ahar rātra uṣitaḥ bhūtvā pañcagavyena śudhyati
vipraḥ vipreṇa saṃspṛṣṭaḥ ucchiṣṭena kadācana

original: snānaṃ japyañca kartavyaṃ dinasyānte ca bhojanam // GarP_1,222.3 //
analyzed: snānam japyam ca kartavyam dinasya ante ca bhojanam
annam sa makṣikā keśam śudhyet vāntena tad kṣaṇāt

original: yaśca pāṇitale bhuṅkte aṅgulyā bāhunā ca yaḥ // GarP_1,222.4 //
analyzed: yaḥ ca pāṇi tale bhuṅkte aṅgulyā bāhunā ca yaḥ
ahorātreṇa śudhyeta pibet yadi na vāri uta
yat toyam vāma hastena madya vat
carma madhya gatam toyam aśuci syāt na tat pibet
antya jātiḥ avijñātaḥ nivaset yasya veśmani
cāndrāyaṇam parākam vā dvijātīnām viśodhanam
prājāpatyam tu śūdrasya paścāt jñāte tathā apare

original: yastatra bhuṅkte pakvānnaṃ kṛcchrārdhaṃ tasya dāpayet /
analyzed: yaḥ tatra bhuṅkte pakva annam kṛcchra ardham tasya dāpayet

original: teṣāmapi ca yo bhuṅkte kṛcchrapādo vidhīyate // GarP_1,222.8 //
analyzed: teṣām api ca yaḥ bhuṅkte kṛcchra pādaḥ vidhīyate
rajakānām ca śailū ṣa veṇu carma upajīvinām

original: etadannañca yo bhuṅkte dvijaścāndrāyaṇaṃ caret // GarP_1,222.9 //
analyzed: etat annam ca yaḥ bhuṅkte dvijaḥ cāndrāyaṇam caret
cāṇḍāla kūpa bhāṇḍeṣu ajñānāt ced pibet jalam
kuryāt sāntapanam vipraḥ tad ardham ca viśaḥ smṛtam
pādam śūdrasya dātavyam ajñānāt antyaveśmani
prāyaścittam trikṛcchram syāt parākamanti a jāgatau
antyaja ucchiṣṭa bhuj śudhyet dvijaḥ cāndrāyaṇena ca
cāṇḍāla annam yadā bhuṅkte pramādāt aindavat caret
kṣattra jātiḥ sāntapanam ṣaṣ dvi rātram pare tathā
tu caṇḍālaḥ pramādāt brāhmaṇaḥ yadi

original: phalaṃ bhakṣayate tatra ahorātreṇa śudhyati // GarP_1,222.13 //
analyzed: phalam bhakṣayate tatra ahorātreṇa śudhyati
bhuktvā upaviṣṭaḥ na ācāntaḥ caṇḍālam yadi saṃspṛśet

original: gāyattryaṣṭasahasrantu drupadāṃ vā śataṃ japet // GarP_1,222.14 //
analyzed: gāyatrī aṣṭa sahasram tu drupadām vā śatam japet
cāṇḍāla śvapacaiḥ vā api viṣ mūtre tu kṛte dvijāḥ
prāyaścittam tri rātram syāt parākaḥ ca antya jāgatau
akāmatas striyaḥ gatvā parākaḥ tatra sādhakaḥ
antya jāti prasūtasya prāyaścittam na vidyate
madya ādi duṣṭa bhāṇḍeṣu yādapaḥ pibati dvijaḥ
kṛcchra pādena śudhyet vai punar saṃskāra karmaṇā
ye pratyavasitāḥ viprāḥ vajra agni pavana ādiṣu
anna pāna ādi saṃgṛhya cikīrṣanti gṛha antaram
cārayet trīṇi kṛcchāṇi trīṇi cāndrāyaṇāni vai
jātakarma ādi saṃskāram vasiṣṭhaḥ muniḥ abravīt
prājāpatya ādibhiḥ draṣṭā strī śudhyet tu dvi bhojanāt
ucchiṣṭa ucchiṣṭa saṃspṛṣṭa aṃśunā śūdreṇa vā dvijaḥ
upoṣya rajanīm ekām pañcagavyena śudhyati

original: varṇabāhyena saṃspṛṣṭaḥ pañcarātreṇa vai tadā // GarP_1,222.21 //
analyzed: varṇa bāhyena saṃspṛṣṭaḥ pañca rātreṇa vai tadā
aduṣṭāḥ santatāḥ dhārāḥ vāta uddhūtāḥ ca reṇavaḥ

original: striyo bālāśca vṛddhāśca na duṣyanti kadācana // GarP_1,222.22 //
analyzed: striyaḥ bālāḥ ca vṛddhāḥ ca na duṣyanti kadācana

original: nityamāsyaṃ śuci strīṇāṃ śakuntaiḥ pātitaṃ phalam /
analyzed: nityam āsyam śuci strīṇām śakuntaiḥ pātitam phalam

original: prastrave ca śucirvatsaḥ śvā mṛgagrahaṇe śuciḥ // GarP_1,222.23 //
analyzed: prastrave ca śuciḥ vatsaḥ śvā mṛga grahaṇe śuciḥ

original: udake codakasthaṃ tu sthaleṣu sthalajaṃ śuci /
analyzed: udake ca udaka stham tu sthaleṣu sthala jam śuci

original: pādau sthāpyau ca tatraiva ācāntaḥ śucitāmiyāt // GarP_1,222.24 //
analyzed: pādau sthāpyau ca tatra eva ācāntaḥ śuci tām iyāt
śudhyet tat bhasmanā kāṃsyam surayā yat na lipyate

original: mūtreṇa surayā miśraṃ tapanaiḥ khalu śudhyati // GarP_1,222.25 //
analyzed: mūtreṇa surayā miśram tapanaiḥ khalu śudhyati
gavā āghrātāni kāṃsyāni śūdra ucchiṣṭāni yāni ca
kāka śvāpahatāni eva śudhyanti daśa bhasmanā
śūdra bhājana bhoktā yaḥ pañcagavyam tri upoṣitaḥ
ucchiṣṭam spṛśate vipraḥ śva sūdraḥ ca apara adhikaḥ
upoṣitaḥ pañcagavyāt śudhyet spṛṣṭvā rajasvalām
anudakeṣu deśeṣu cora vyāghra ākule pathi
kṛtvā dravya hastaḥ na duṣyati

original: bhūmauniḥ kṣaipya taddravyaṃ śaucaṃ kṛtvā samāhitaḥ // GarP_1,222.29 //
analyzed: bhūmauniḥ kṣaipya tat dravyam śaucam kṛtvā samāhitaḥ

original: āranālaṃ dadhi kṣīraṃ takrantu kṛsarañca yat /
analyzed: āranālam dadhi kṣīram takran tu kṛsaram ca yat

original: śūdrādapi ca tadgāhyaṃ māṃsaṃ madhu tathāntyajāt // GarP_1,222.30 //
analyzed: śūdrāt api ca tat gāhyam māṃsam madhu tathā antyajāt

original: gauḍīṃ paiṣṭīñca mādhvīkaṃ viprādiryaḥ surāṃ pibet /
analyzed: gauḍīm paiṣṭīm ca mādhvīkam vipra ādiḥ yaḥ surām pibet

original: surāṃ pibandvijaḥ śudhyedagnivarṇāṃ surāṃ piban // GarP_1,222.31 //
analyzed: surām piban dvijaḥ śudhyet agni varṇām surām piban

original: vipraḥ pañcaśataṃ japyaṃ gāyatryāḥ kṣatriyasya ca śataṃ vipraśca bhuktvānnaṃ pānapātreṇa sūtake // GarP_1,222.32 //
analyzed: vipraḥ pañcaśatam japyam gāyatryāḥ kṣatriyasya ca śatam vipraḥ ca bhuktvā annam pāna pātreṇa sūtake
śuciḥ vipraḥ daśa ahena kṣattriyaḥ dvādaśa ahataḥ

original: vaiśyaḥ pañcadaśāhana śūdro māsena śudhyati // GarP_1,222.33 //
analyzed: vaiśyaḥ śūdraḥ māsena śudhyati
rājñām yuddheṣu yajña ādau deśa antara gateṣu ca

original: bāle prete māsike ca sadyaḥ śaucaṃ vidhīyate // GarP_1,222.34 //
analyzed: bāle prete māsike ca sadyas śaucam vidhīyate
avivāhā tathā kanyā dvijaḥ mauñjī vivarjitaḥ

original: jatadantaśca bālaśca kumārī ca trivarṣikā // GarP_1,222.35 //
analyzed: jata dantaḥ ca bālaḥ ca kumārī ca tri varṣikā
teṣām śuddhiḥ tri rātreṇa garbha strāve tri rātribhiḥ
sūtāyām māsa tulyāḥ ca caturthe hni rajasvalā
durbhikṣe rāṣṭra saṃpate sūtake mṛtake api vā
niyamāḥ ca na duṣyanti dāna dharma parāḥ tathā
dakṣi kāle vivāha ādau deva dvija nimantrite
pūrva saṃkalpite vā api na āśaucam mṛta sūtake
prasūta patnī saṃsparśāt aśuciḥ syāt tathā dvijaḥ

original: agnayo yatra hūyante vedo vā yatra paṭhyate // GarP_1,222.39 //
analyzed: agnayaḥ yatra hūyante vedaḥ vā yatra paṭhyate

original: satataṃ vaiśvadevā di na teṣāṃ sūtakaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: satatam na teṣām sūtakam bhavet

original: aśuddhe ca gṛhe bhukte trirātrācchudhyati dvijaḥ // GarP_1,222.40 //
analyzed: a śuddhe ca gṛhe bhukte tri rātrāt śudhyati dvijaḥ

original: brāhmaṇī kṣatriyā vaiśyā śūdrā caiva rajasvalā /
analyzed: brāhmaṇī kṣatriyā vaiśyā śūdrā ca eva rajasvalā
anyonya sparśanāt tatra brāhmaṇī tu tri rātrataḥ

original: dvirātrataḥ kṣatriyā ca śuddhā vaiśyā hyupoṣitā /
analyzed: dvi rātrataḥ kṣatriyā ca śuddhā vaiśyā hi upoṣitā

original: śūdrā snānena śudhyettu droṇārthaṃ na visarjayet // GarP_1,222.42 //
analyzed: śūdrā snānena śudhyet tu droṇa artham na visarjayet
tantu annam tat tyajet

original: suvarṇādbhaiḥ samabhyukṣya hutāśe ca pratāpayet // GarP_1,222.43 //
analyzed: suvarṇa adbhaiḥ samabhyukṣya hutāśe ca pratāpayet

original: kūpe ca patitāndṛṣṭvā śvaśṛgālau ca markaṭam /
analyzed: kūpe ca patitān dṛṣṭvā śva śṛgālau ca markaṭam
tad kūpasya udakam pītvā śudhyet vipraḥ tribhiḥ dinaiḥ
kṣatriyaḥ har dvayena eva vaiśyaḥ vā ekāhataḥ param

original: asthi carma malaṃ vāpi mūṣikāṃ yadi kūpataḥ /
analyzed: asthi carma malam vā api mūṣikām yadi kūpataḥ

original: uddhṛtya codakaṃ pañca gavyācchuddhyettu śodhitam // GarP_1,222.45 //
analyzed: uddhṛtya ca udakam pañca gavyāt śuddhyet tu śodhitam
taḍāge puṣkariṇī ādau bhasma ādim pātayet tathā
ṣaṭ kumbhān apaḥ utddhṛya pañcagavyena śudhyati
strī rajaḥ patitam madhye triṃśat kumbhān samuddharet
agamyā gamanam kṛtvā madya go māṃsa bhakṣaṇam
śudhye cāndrāyaṇāt vipraḥ prājāpatyena bhūmipaḥ
vaiśyaḥ sāntapanāt śūdraḥ pañca ahobhiḥ viśudhyati
prāyaścitte kṛte dadyāt gavām brāhmaṇa bhojanam

original: krīḍāyāṃ śayanīyādau nīlīvastraṃ na duṣyati // GarP_1,222.49 //
analyzed: krīḍāyām śayanīya ādau nīlī vastram na duṣyati

original: nīlīvastraṃ na spṛśecca nīlī ca nirayaṃ brajet /
analyzed: nīlī vastram na spṛśet ca nīlī ca nirayam brajet

original: vrahmaghnaśca surāpaśca steyī ca gurutalpagaḥ // GarP_1,222.50 //
analyzed: vrahma ghnaḥ ca surāpaḥ ca steyī ca gurutalpa gaḥ

original: ṛkṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā viśudhyante tatsaṃyogī ca pañcamaḥ /
analyzed: ṛkṣam dṛṣṭvā viśudhyante tad saṃyogī ca pañcamaḥ
tatas dhenu śatam dadyāt brāhmaṇānām tu bhojanam

original: brahmahā dvādaśābdāni kuṭīṃ kṛtvā vane vaset /
analyzed: brahma hā dvādaśa abdāni kuṭīm kṛtvā vane vaset
nyasyet ātmānam agnau vā su samiddhe surāpakaḥ
steyī sarvam veda vide brāhmaṇāya upapādayet

original: vṛṣamekaṃ sahasraṃ gāṃ dadyācca gurutalpagaḥ // GarP_1,222.53 //
analyzed: vṛṣam ekam sahasram gām dadyāt ca gurutalpa gaḥ
kṛta pāpaḥ caret rodhe dvau pādau bandhayan paśoḥ
sarvakṛcchram nipāne syāt kāntāre gṛha dāhataḥ
kaṇṭha ābharaṇa doṣeṇa kṛcchra pādam mṛte gavi

original: asthibhaṅgaṃ gavāṃ kṛtvā śṛṅgabhaṅgamathāpi vā // GarP_1,222.55 //
analyzed: asthi bhaṅgam gavām kṛtvā śṛṅga bhaṅgam atha api vā

original: tvagbhedaṃ pucchanāśe vā māsārdhaṃ yāvakaṃ pibet /
analyzed: tvac bhedam puccha nāśe vā māsa ardham yāvakam pibet
sarvam hasti aśva śastra ādyaiḥ niścayam kṛcchram eva tu
ajñānāt prāśya viṣ mūtram surā saṃspṛṣṭam eva ca

original: punaḥ saṃskāramāyānti trayo varṇā dvijātayaḥ // GarP_1,222.57 //
analyzed: punar saṃskāram āyānti trayaḥ varṇāḥ dvijātayaḥ
vapanam mekhlā daṇḍaḥ bhaikṣya caryā vratāni ca
nivartante dvijātīnām punar saṃskāra karmaṇi
āma māṃsam ghṛtam kṣaudram snehaḥ ca kāla sambhavāḥ

original: antyabhāṇḍasthitāḥ sarve niṣkrāntāḥ śucayaḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,222.59 //
analyzed: antya bhāṇḍa sthitāḥ sarve niṣkrāntāḥ śucayaḥ smṛtāḥ
taila ādi ghṛta mādhvīkam paṇya dravyam dravaḥ tathā
eka bhaktam kramāt naktam eka eka aham a yācitam

original: upavāsaḥ pādakṛcchraṃ kṛcchārdhadviguṇaṃ hi yat // GarP_1,222.60 //
analyzed: upavāsaḥ pādakṛcchram kṛccha ardha dviguṇam hi yat
prājāpatyantu tat syāt ca sarva pātaka nāśanam
kṛcchram sapta upavāsaiḥ ca mahāsāntapanam smṛtam
tri aham uṣṇam pibet śāpaḥ tri aham uṣṇam payaḥ pibet
tryam uṣṇam pibet sarpiḥ taptakṛcchram agha apaham
dvādaśa aha upavāsena parākaḥ sarva pāpa hā

original: ekaikaṃ vardhayetpiṇḍaṃ śukle kṛṣṇe ca hrāsayet // GarP_1,222.63 //
analyzed: ekaikam vardhayet piṇḍam śukle kṛṣṇe ca hrāsayet
payaḥ kāñcana varṇāyāḥ śveta varṇam ca gomayam
go mūtram tāmra varṇāyāḥ nīla varṇa bhavam ghṛtam
dadhi syāt kṛṣṇa varṇāyāḥ darbha udaka samāyutam
go mūtra māṣakāṇi aṣṭau gomayasya catuṣṭayam

original: kṣīrasya dvādaśa proktā dadhnastu daśa ucyate /
analyzed: kṣīrasya dvādaśa proktāḥ dadhnaḥ tu daśa ucyate

original: ghṛtasya māṣakāḥ pañca pañcagavyaṃ malāpaham // GarP_1,222.66 //
analyzed: ghṛtasya māṣakāḥ pañca pañcagavyam mala apaham

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe prāyaścitakathanaṃ nāma dvāviṃśatyadhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe prāyaścitakathanam nāma dvāviṃśatyadhikadviśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: brahmovāca munibhiścaritā dharmā bhaktyā vyāsa mayoditāḥ /
analyzed: brahmā uvāca munibhiḥ caritāḥ dharmāḥ bhaktyā vyāsa mayā uditāḥ
yaiḥ viṣṇuḥ tuṣyate ca eva sūrya ādi paricāraṇāt

original: tarpaṇena ca homena sandhyāyā vandanena ca /
analyzed: tarpaṇena ca homena sandhyāyāḥ vandanena ca
prāpyate bhagavān viṣṇuḥ dharma kāma artha mokṣa daḥ

original: dharmo hi bhagavānviṣṇuḥ pūjī viṣṇostu tarpaṇam /
analyzed: dharmaḥ hi bhagavān viṣṇuḥ pūjī viṣṇoḥ tu tarpaṇam

original: homaḥ sandhyā tathā dhyānaṃ dhāraṇā sakalaṃ hariḥ // GarP_1,223.3 //
analyzed: homaḥ sandhyā tathā dhyānam dhāraṇā sakalam hariḥ
sūcaḥ uvāca

original: pralayaṃ jagato vakṣye tatsarvaṃ śṛṇu śaunaka /
analyzed: pralayam jagataḥ vakṣye tat sarvam śṛṇu śaunaka
caturyuga sahasram tu kalpa eka abja dinam smṛtam
kṛta tretā dvāpara ādi yuga avasthāḥ

original: kṛte dharmaścatuṣpācca satyaṃ dānaṃ tapo dayā // GarP_1,223.5 //
analyzed: kṛte dharmaḥ catuṣpād ca satyam dānam tapaḥ dayā
dharma pātā hariḥ ca iti santuṣṭāḥ jñāninaḥ narāḥ

original: caturvaṃṣarsahasrāṇi narā jīvanti vai tadā // GarP_1,223.6 //
analyzed: narāḥ jīvanti vai tadā
kṛtānte kṣattriyaiḥ viprāḥ viś śūdrāḥ ca jitāḥ dvijaiḥ

original: śūraścātibalo viṣṇū rakṣāṃsi ca jaghāna ha // GarP_1,223.7 //
analyzed: śūraḥ ca ati balaḥ viṣṇuḥ rakṣāṃsi ca jaghāna ha
tretā yuge tripād dharmaḥ satya dāna dayā ātmakaḥ
narāḥ yajña parāḥ tasmin tathā kṣatra udbhavam jagat
raktaḥ hariḥ naraiḥ pūjyaḥ narāḥ daśa śata āyuṣaḥ
tatra viṣṇuḥ bhomarathaḥ kṣatriyāḥ rākṣasān ahan
dvi pāda vigraḥ dharmaḥ pītān ca acyute gate

original: catuḥ śatāyuṣo lokā dvijakṣatrodbhavāḥ prajāḥ // GarP_1,223.10 //
analyzed: catuḥ śata āyuṣaḥ lokāḥ dvija kṣatra udbhavāḥ prajāḥ
tatra dṛṣṭvā alpabuddhīn ca viṣṇuḥ vyāsa sva rūpa dhṛk
tat ekam tu yajurvedam
caturdhā vyabhajat punar
śiṣyān adhyāpayāmāsa samastān tān nibodha me
ṛgvedam atha pailan sāmavedam ca jaiminim
atharvāṇam yajurvedam mahā munim
vaiśampāyanam aṅgantu purāṇam sūtam eva ca

original: aṣṭādaśapurāṇāni yair vedyo harireva hi // GarP_1,223.13 //
analyzed: aṣṭādaśa purāṇāni yaiḥ vedyaḥ hariḥ eva hi
sargaḥ ca pratisargaḥ ca vaṃśaḥ manvantarāṇi ca
vaṃśānucaritat ca eva purāṇam pañca lakṣaṇam
brāhmam pādmam vaiṣṇavam ca śaivam bhāgavatam tathā
bhaviṣyat nāradīyam ca skāndam liṅgam varāhakam
mārkaṇḍeyam tathā āgneyam brahmavaivartam eva ca
kaurmam mātsyam gāruḍam ca vāyavīyam anantaram
aṣṭādaśa samuddiṣṭam brahmāṇḍam iti saṃjñitam
anyāni upapurāṇāni munibhiḥ kathitāni tu
ādyam sanatkumāra uktam nārasiṃham atha aparam
tṛtīyam skāndam uddiṣṭam kumāreṇa tu bhāṣitam
caturtham śivadharma ākhyam syāt nandīśvara bhāṣitam
durvāsasā uktam āścaryam nārada uktam atas param
kāpilam vāmanam ca eva tathā eva uśanasā īritam
brahmāṇḍam vāruṇam ca atha kālikā āhvayam eva ca
māheśvaram tathā sāmbam evam sarva artha sañcayam
parāśara uktam aparam mārīcam bhārgava āhvayam
purāṇam dharma śāstrañca vedāḥ tu aṅgāni yat mune
nyāyaḥ śaunaka mīmāṃsā āyurveda arthaśāstrakam
gāndharvaḥ ca dhanurvedaḥ vidyāḥ hi aṣṭādaśa smṛtāḥ
dvāpara antena ca hariḥ guru bhāram apāharat
eka pāda sthite dharme kṛṣṇa tvañca acyute gate
janāḥ tadā durācārāḥ bhaviṣyanti ca nirdayāḥ

original: sattvaṃ rajastama iti dṛśyante puruṣe guṇāḥ /
analyzed: sattvam rajaḥ tamaḥ iti dṛśyante puruṣe guṇāḥ
kāla sañcoditāḥ te pi parivartante ātmani

original: prabhūtañca yadā sattvaṃ mano burdhondriyāṇi ca /
analyzed: prabhūtam ca yadā sattvam manaḥ burdhā indriyāṇi ca

original: tadā kṛtayugaṃ vidyājjñāne tapasi yadratiḥ // GarP_1,223.24 //
analyzed: tadā kṛta yugam vidyāt jñāne tapasi yat ratiḥ
yadā karmasu kāmyeṣu śaktiḥ yaśasi dehinām
tadā tretā rajaḥ bhūtiḥ iti jānīhi śaunaka
yadā lobhaḥ tu asantoṣaḥ mānaḥ dambhaḥ ca matsaraḥ
karmaṇām ca api kāmyānām dvāparam tat rajaḥ tamaḥ
yadā sadā anṛtam nandrā nidrā hiṃsā ādi sādhanam

original: śokamohau bhayaṃ dainyaṃ sa kalistamasi smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,223.27 //
analyzed: śoka mohau bhayam dainyam sa kaliḥ tamasi smṛtaḥ
yasmin janāḥ kāminaḥ syuḥ śaśvat kaṭuka bhāṣiṇaḥ
dasyu utkṛṣṭāḥ pāṣaṇḍa dūṣitāḥ
rājānaḥ ca prajā bhikṣāḥ śiśrodara parājitāḥ
avratāḥ śaucāḥ bhikṣavaḥ ca kuṭumbinaḥ
tapasvinaḥ ugrāma vāsāḥ nyāsinaḥ hi artha lolupāḥ
hrasva kāyāḥ mahā āhārāḥ caurāḥ te sādhavaḥ smṛtāḥ
tyakṣyanti bhṛtyāḥ ca patim tāpasaḥ tyakṣyati vratam
śūdrāḥ pratigrahiṣyanti vaiśyāḥ vrata parāyaṇaḥ

original: udvignāḥ santi ca janāḥ piśācasadṛśāḥ prajāḥ /
analyzed: udvignāḥ santi ca janāḥ piśāca sadṛśāḥ prajāḥ
anyāya bhojanena agni devatā atithi pūjanam

original: kariṣyenti kalau prāpte na ca pitryodakakriyām /
analyzed: kariṣyenti kalau prāpte na ca pitrya udakakriyām

original: strīparāśca janāḥ sarve śūdraprāyāśca śaunaka // GarP_1,223.33 //
analyzed: strī parāḥ ca janāḥ sarve śūdra prāyāḥ ca śaunaka
bahu prajā alpabhāgyāḥ ca bhaviṣyanti kalau striyaḥ

original: śiraḥ kaṇḍūyanaparā ājñāṃ bhetsyanti bhartsitāḥ // GarP_1,223.34 //
analyzed: śiraḥ kaṇḍūyana parāḥ ājñām bhetsyanti bhartsitāḥ
viṣṇum na pūjayiṣyanti pāṣaṇḍa upahatāḥ janāḥ
kaleḥ deṣa nidheḥ viprāḥ asti hi ekaḥ mahā guṇaḥ
kīrtanāt eva kṛṣṇasya mahābandham parityajet

original: kṛte yadyyāyato viṣṇuṃ tretāyāṃ japataḥ phalam // GarP_1,223.36 //
analyzed: kṛte viṣṇum tretāyām japataḥ phalam
dvāpare paricaryāyām kalau tad hari kīrtanāt

original: tasmāddhyeyo harirnityaṃ geyaḥ pūjyaśca śaunaka // GarP_1,223.37 //
analyzed: tasmāt dhyeyaḥ hariḥ nityam geyaḥ pūjyaḥ ca śaunaka

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe yugadharmakathanaṃ nāma trayoviṃśatyadhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe yugadharmakathanam nāma trayoviṃśatyadhikadviśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
sūtaḥ uvāca
caturyuga sahasra ante brāhmaḥ naimittikaḥ layaḥ
anāvṛṣṭiḥ ca kalpa ante jāyate śata vārṣikī

original: utiṣṭhanti tadā raudrā divi sapta divākarāḥ /
analyzed: utiṣṭhanti tadā raudrāḥ divi sapta divākarāḥ

original: te tu pītvā jalaṃ sarvaṃ śoṣayanti jagattrayam // GarP_1,224.2 //
analyzed: te tu pītvā jalam sarvam śoṣayanti jagattrayam
bhūḥ bhuvaḥ svar mahar lokam carācaram janaḥ tathā

original: viṣṇuśca rudro bhūtvāsau pātālāni dahatyadhaḥ // GarP_1,224.3 //
analyzed: viṣṇuḥ ca rudraḥ bhūtvā asau pātālāni dahati adhas
viṣṇuḥ dahet trilokam ci mukhāt meghān sṛjati alam

original: varṣante vai varṣaśataṃ nānāvarṇā mahāghanāḥ // GarP_1,224.4 //
analyzed: varṣante vai varṣa śatam nānā varṇāḥ mahā ghanāḥ
viṣṇuḥ ūpaḥ śatam vāti varṣāṇām vāyuḥ ūrjitaḥ
kārṇavī bhūte varṣe brahma sva rūpa dhṛk
śete nanta āsane viṣṇuḥ naṣṭe sthāvara jaṅgame
suptvā varṣa sahasram sa jagat bhūyas sṛjat hariḥ

original: atha prākṛtikaṃ vakṣye pralayaṃ śṛṇu śaunaka // GarP_1,224.6 //
analyzed: atha prākṛtikam vakṣye pralayam śṛṇu śaunaka
pūrṇe saṃvatsara śate saṃhṛtya sakalam jagat

original: brahmāṇaṃ nyasya dehe hi mukto yogabalairhariḥ // GarP_1,224.7 //
analyzed: brahmāṇam nyasya dehe hi muktaḥ yoga balaiḥ hariḥ

original: ye gatā brahmaṇaḥ sthānaṃ te 'pi yānti paraṃ padam /
analyzed: ye gatāḥ brahmaṇaḥ sthānam te pi yānti param padam
anāvṛṣṭi arka sampannāḥ āsan meghāḥ tathā dvija
śatam varṣāṇi varṣadbhiḥ medhaiḥ aṇḍam prapūryate
antargatena toyena bhinna maṇḍam jagatpateḥ

original: pūrṇe brahmāyuṣi gate bhidyate 'mbhasi līyate // GarP_1,224.9 //
analyzed: pūrṇe brahma āyuṣi gate bhidyate mbhasi līyate

original: evaṃ sā jagadādhārā toye corvo pralīyate /
analyzed: evam sā jagat ādhārā toye ca urvaḥ pralīyate

original: āpastejasi līyante tejo vāyau pralīyate // GarP_1,224.10 //
analyzed: āpaḥ tejasi līyante tejaḥ vāyau pralīyate

original: vāyuḥ khe khañca bhūtādau viśate ca tadā mahān /
analyzed: vāyuḥ khe bhūtādau viśate ca tadā mahān
mahān prapadyate vyaktam prakṛtiḥ puruṣe pare
śata varṣam hariḥ śete sṛjati atha dinagame
avyakta ādi krameṇa eva vyaktībhūtam carācaram

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe naimittikapralayonāma caturviṃśatyadhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe naimittikapralayaḥ nāma caturviṃśatyadhikadviśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
sūtaḥ uvāca
ādhyātmika ādi tāpān trīn jñātvā saṃsrā cakra vid
utpanna jñāna vairāgyaḥ prāpnoti ātyantikam layam
saṃsāra cakram vakṣye ham ādāv utkrānti kālataḥ

original: yadvinā puruṣārtho na līnaḥ syātparamātmani // GarP_1,225.2 //
analyzed: yat vinā puruṣa arthaḥ na līnaḥ syāt paramātmani
ūrdhva vāsī naraḥ tyaktvā deham anyat prapadyate
nīyate dvādaśa ahena yamasya yama pūruṣaiḥ
tatra yat vāndhavāḥ toyam prayacchanti tilaiḥ saha

original: yacca piṇḍaṃ prayacchanti yamaloke tadaśnute // GarP_1,225.4 //
analyzed: yat ca piṇḍam prayacchanti yama loke tat aśnute
gataḥ ca narakam pāpāt svargam yāti sva puṇyataḥ

original: pāpakṛdyāti narakaṃ puṇyakṛdyāti vai divam // GarP_1,225.5 //
analyzed: pāpa kṛt yāti narakam puṇya kṛt yāti vai divam
svargāt ca narakāt tyaktaḥ strīṇām garbhe bhavati api

original: nābhibhūtañca tasyaiva yāti bījadvayaṃ hi tat // GarP_1,225.6 //
analyzed: na abhibhūtam ca tasya eva yāti bīja dvayam hi tat
kalalam budbruda mayam tatas śoṇitam eva ca

original: peśyāḥ palasamo 'ṇḍaḥ syādaṅkuraṃ tata ucyate // GarP_1,225.7 //
analyzed: peśyāḥ pala samaḥ ṇḍaḥ syāt aṅkuram tatas ucyate
upāṅgāni aṅgulī netra nāsā āsya śravaṇāni ca
āvaham yāti ca aṅgebhyaḥ tat parantu nakha ādikam

original: tvaco romāṇi jāyante keśāścaiva tataḥ param /
analyzed: tvacaḥ romāṇi jāyante keśāḥ ca eva tatas param

original: naraścādhomukhaḥ sthitvā daśame ca saḥ jāyate // GarP_1,225.9 //
analyzed: naraḥ ca adhomukhaḥ sthitvā daśame ca saḥ jāyate
tatas tu vaiṣṇavī māyā vṛṇoti atyanta mohinī

original: bālatvaṃ tvatha kaumāraṃ yauvanaṃ vṛddhatāmapi // GarP_1,225.10 //
analyzed: bāla tvam tu atha kaumāram yauvanam vṛddha tām api
tatas ca maraṇam tad tad dharmām āpnoti mānavaḥ
evam saṃsāra cakre smin bhrāmyate ghaṭīyantra vat
narakāt pratimuktaḥ tu pāpa yoniṣu jāyate
patitāt pratigṛhya atha adhas yonim vrajet budhaḥ
narakāt pratimuktaḥ tu kṛmiḥ bhavati yācakaḥ

original: upādhyāyavyalīkaṃ tu kṛtvā śvā bhavati dvija // GarP_1,225.13 //
analyzed: upādhyāya vyalīkam tu kṛtvā śvā bhavati dvija
tad jāyām manasā vāñchan tat dravyam vā api asaṃśayam
gardabhaḥ jāyate jantuḥ mitrasya eva apamāna kṛt
pitarau pīḍayitvā tu kacchapa tvañca jāyate

original: bhurtuḥ piṇḍamupāśvasto vañjayitvā tameva yaḥ // GarP_1,225.15 //
analyzed: bhurtuḥ piṇḍam upāśvastaḥ vañjayitvā tam eva yaḥ
saḥ pi moha samāpannaḥ jāyate vānaraḥ mṛtaḥ
nyāsa apahartā narakāt vimuktaḥ jāyate kṛmiḥ
asūyakaḥ ca narakāt muktaḥ bhavati rākṣasaḥ

original: viśvāsahartā ca naro mīnayonau prajāyate // GarP_1,225.17 //
analyzed: viśvāsa hartā ca naraḥ mīna yonau prajāyate
yava dhānyāni saṃhṛtya jāyate mūṣakaḥ mṛtaḥ
para dāra abhimarśāt tu vṛkaḥ ghoraḥ bhijāyate
bhrātṛ bhāryā prasaṃgena kokilaḥ jāyate naraḥ
guru ādi bhāryā gamanāt śūkaraḥ jāyate naraḥ
yajña dāna vivāhānām vighna kartā bhavet kṛmiḥ
devatā pitṛ viprāṇām a dattvā yaḥ nnam aśnute
pramuktaḥ narakāt vā api vāyasaḥ san prajāyate
jyeṣṭha bhrātṛ apamānāt ca krauñca yonau prajāyate
śūdraḥ tu brāhmaṇīm gatvā kṛmi yonau prajāyate
tasyām apatyam utpādya kāṣṭha antar kaṭīkaḥ bhavet
kṛtaghnaḥ kṛmikaḥ kīṭaḥ pataṅgaḥ vṛścikaḥ tathā

original: aśastraṃ puruṣaṃ hartā naraḥ sañjāyate kharaḥ // GarP_1,225.23 //
analyzed: aśastram puruṣam hartā naraḥ sañjāyate kharaḥ

original: kṛmiḥ strīvadhakartā ca bālahantā ca jāyate /
analyzed: kṛmiḥ strī vadha kartā ca bāla hantā ca jāyate

original: bhojanañcorayitvā tu makṣikā jāyate naraḥ // GarP_1,225.24 //
analyzed: bhojanam corayitvā tu makṣikā jāyate naraḥ
hṛtvā ājyam ca eva mārjāraḥ tila hṛt ca eva mūṣakaḥ

original: ghṛtaṃ hṛtvā ca nakulaḥ kāko madbhuramāmiṣam // GarP_1,225.25 //
analyzed: ghṛtam hṛtvā ca nakulaḥ kākaḥ madbhuram āmiṣam

original: madhu hṛtvā naro daṃśa-pūpaṃ hṛtvā pipīlikaḥ /
analyzed: madhu hṛtvā naraḥ daṃśa pūpam hṛtvā pipīlikaḥ

original: apo hṛtvā tu pāpātmā vāyasaḥ samprajāyate // GarP_1,225.26 //
analyzed: apaḥ hṛtvā tu pāpa ātmā vāyasaḥ samprajāyate

original: hṛte kāṣṭhe ca hārītaḥ kapoto vā prajāyate /
analyzed: hṛte kāṣṭhe ca hārītaḥ kapotaḥ vā prajāyate

original: hṛtvā tu kāñcanaṃ bhāṇḍaṃ kṛmiyonau prajāyate // GarP_1,225.27 //
analyzed: hṛtvā tu kāñcanam bhāṇḍam kṛmi yonau prajāyate
kārpāsike hṛte krauñcaḥ vahri hartā bakaḥ tathā

original: mayūro varṇakaṃ hṛtvā śākapatrañca jāyate // GarP_1,225.28 //
analyzed: mayūraḥ varṇakam hṛtvā śāka patram ca jāyate
jīvañjīvaka tām yāti rakta vastu apahṛt naraḥ

original: chuchundariḥ śubhāngandhāñchaśaṃ hṛtvā śaśo bhavet // GarP_1,225.29 //
analyzed: chuchundariḥ śubhān gandhān śaśam hṛtvā śaśaḥ bhavet
ṣaṇḍāḥ kalā apaharaṇe kāṣṭha hṛt tṛṇa kīṭakaḥ
puṣpam hṛtvā daridraḥ tu paṅguḥ yācaka hṛt naraḥ
śāka hartā ca hārītaḥ toya hartā ca cātakaḥ
gṛha hṛt narakān gatvā raurava ādīn su dāruṇān
tṛṇa gulma latā vallī tvac hārī taru tām vrajet

original: eṣa eva kramo dṛṣṭo gosuvarṇādihāriṇām // GarP_1,225.32 //
analyzed: eṣaḥ eva kramaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ go suvarṇa ādi hāriṇām
vidyā apahārī mūkaḥ syāt gatvā ca narakān bahan

original: asamiddhe hute cāgnau mandāgniḥ khalu jāyate // GarP_1,225.33 //
analyzed: a samiddhe hute ca agnau manda agniḥ khalu jāyate
para nindā kṛtaghna tvam para sīma abhighātanam
naiṣṭhuryam nirghṛṇa tvañca para dāra upasevanam
para sva haraṇa āśaucam devatānām ca kutsanam

original: nikṛtya bandhanaṃ nṝṇāṃ kārpaṇyañca nṛṇāṃ vadhaḥ /
analyzed: nikṛtya bandhanam nṝṇām kārpaṇyam ca nṛṇām vadhaḥ
upalakṣaṇāt vijānīyāt muktānām narakāt anu

original: dayā bhūteṣu saṃvādaḥ paralokaṃ prati kriyā /
analyzed: dayā bhūteṣu saṃvādaḥ para lokam prati kriyā
satyam hita artha muktiḥ ca veda prāmāṇya darśanam
guru deva ṛṣi siddha ṛṣi sevanam sādhu saṃyamaḥ
satkriyā ṣvasanam maitrī svargasya lakṣaṇam viduḥ
aṣṭāṅga yoga vijñānāt prāpnoti ātyantikam phalam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe karmavipākādikathanaṃ nāma pañcaviṃśatyadhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe karmavipākādikathanam nāma pañcaviṃśatyadhikadviśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: sūta uvāca vakṣye sāṅgaṃ mahāyogaṃ bhuktimuktikaraṃ param /
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca vakṣye sa aṅgam mahā yogam bhukti mukti karam param
sarva pāpa praśamanam bhaktyā anupaṭhitam śṛṇu

original: mameti mūlaṃ duḥ khasya na mameti nivartanam /
analyzed: mama iti mūlam duḥkhasya na mama iti nivartanam
dattātreyaḥ hi alarkāya imam āha mahāmatiḥ
aham iti aṅkura utpannaḥ mama iti skandhavān mahān
gṛha kṣetrāṇi śākhāḥ ca yatra dāra abhipallavaḥ
dhana dhānye mahā patre
vidhivat sukha śānti artham jātaḥ jñāna mahā taruḥ
chinnaḥ vidyā kuṭhāreṇa te gatāḥ layam īśvare
prāpya brahma rasam pītam nīrajaskam akaṇṭakam
prāpnuvanti parāḥ prājñāḥ sukha nirvṛtim eva ca

original: mūrtendriyalayaṃ nūnaṃ na tvaṃ rājan na cāpyaham // GarP_1,226.6 //
analyzed: mūrta indriya layam nūnam na tvam rājan na ca api aham

original: na tanmātrādikaṃ vācā naivāntaḥ karaṇaṃ tathā /
analyzed: na tanmātra ādikam vācā na eva antar karaṇam tathā

original: kaṃ vā paśyasi rājendra pradhānamidamāvayoḥ // GarP_1,226.7 //
analyzed: kam vā paśyasi rāja indra pradhānam idam āvayoḥ
mṛtaḥ pare hni kṣetrajñaḥ saṃjātaḥ yam guṇa ātmakaḥ
ekatve pi pṛthagbhāvaḥ tathā kṣetra ātmanaḥ nṛpa
jñāna pūrva viyogaḥ sau jñāne naṣṭe ca yoginaḥ

original: sā muktirbrahmaṇā caikya manaikyaṃ prākṛtairguṇaiḥ // GarP_1,226.9 //
analyzed: sā muktiḥ brahmaṇā ca aikya manaikyam prākṛtaiḥ guṇaiḥ

original: tadgṛhaṃ yatra vasati tadbhojyaṃ yena jīvati /
analyzed: tad gṛham yatra vasati tat bhojyam yena jīvati

original: yanmuktaye tadevoktaṃ jñānājñāne na cānyathā // GarP_1,226.10 //
analyzed: yat muktaye tat eva uktam jñāna ajñāne na ca anyathā
upabhogena puṇyānām apuṇyānām ca pārthiva
kartavyānām ca nityānām kṣaya ntu akaraṇāt tathā
ahiṃsā satyam asteyam brahmacarya aparigrahau

original: yamāḥ pañcātha niyamāḥ śaucaṃ dvividhamīritam // GarP_1,226.12 //
analyzed: yamāḥ pañca atha niyamāḥ śaucam dvividham īritam
santoṣaḥ tapasā śāntiḥ vāsudeva arcanam damaḥ
pratyekam trividhaḥ saḥ pi pūra kumbhaka recakaiḥ

original: laghuryo daśamātrastu dviguṇaḥ sa tu madhyamaḥ // GarP_1,226.14 //
analyzed: laghuḥ yaḥ daśa mātraḥ tu dviguṇaḥ sa tu madhyamaḥ
triguṇābhiḥ tu mātrābhiḥ uttamaḥ saḥ udāhṛtaḥ
japa dhyāna yutau garbhaḥ viparītaḥ tu arbhakaḥ
prathame na jayet svapnam madhyamena ca vepathum
vipākam hi tṛtīyena jātān doṣāḥ tu anukramāt
āsana sthantu yuñjīta kṛtvā ca praṇavam hṛdī
pārṣṇibhyām liṅga vṛṣaṇau sparśan akāgra mānasaḥ
rajasā tamasaḥ vṛttim sattvena rajasaḥ tathā

original: nirudhya niścalo bhūtvā sthito yuñjīta yogavit // GarP_1,226.18 //
analyzed: nirudhya niścalaḥ bhūtvā sthitaḥ yuñjīta yoga vid
indriyāṇi indriyārthebhyaḥ prāṇa ādīn amnaḥ eva ca
nigṛhya samavāyena pratyāhāram upakramet

original: prāṇāyāmā daśāṣṭau ca dhāraṇā sā vidhīyate /
analyzed: prāṇāyāmāḥ daśa aṣṭau ca dhāraṇā sā vidhīyate

original: dve dhāraṇe smṛto yogo yogibhistattvadarśibhiḥ // GarP_1,226.20 //
analyzed: dve dhāraṇe smṛtaḥ yogaḥ yogibhiḥ tattva darśibhiḥ

original: prāṅnāḍyāṃ hṛdaye cātra tṛtīyā ca tathorasi /
analyzed: prāc nāḍyām hṛdaye ca atra tṛtīyā ca tathā urasi

original: kaṇṭhe mukhe nā sikāgre netre bhrūmadhyamūrdhasu // GarP_1,226.21 //
analyzed: kaṇṭhe mukhe nā sikā agre netre bhrū madhya mūrdhasu
kiñcid tasmāt parasmin ca dhāraṇā daśadhā smṛtā
daśa etāḥ dhāraṇāḥ prāpya prāpnoti akṣara rūpa tām
yathā agniḥ agnau saṃkṣiptaḥ tathā ātmā paramātmani
brahma rūpam mahā puṇyam om iti ekākṣaram japet
akāraḥ ca tathā ukāraḥ makāraḥ ca akṣara trayam
etāḥ tistraḥ tatas mātrāḥ sattva rājasa tāmasāḥ
nirguṇā yogi gamyā ādyā ardha mātrā parā sthitā
gāndhārī iti ca vijñeyā gāndhāra svara saṃśrayā
iti etat akṣaram brahma parama oṅkāra saṃjñitam
aham brahma param jyotiḥ sthūla deha vivarjitam
aham brahma param jyotiḥ jarā maraṇa varjitam

original: ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotiḥ pṛthivyā malavarjitam /
analyzed: aham brahma param jyotiḥ pṛthivyāḥ mala varjitam
aham brahma param jyotiḥ vāyu ākāśa vivarjitam
aham brahma param jyotiḥ sūkṣma deha vivarjitam
aham brahma param jyotiḥ sthāna asthāna vivarjitam
aham brahma param jyotiḥ gandha mātra vivarjitam

original: ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotiḥ śrotratvakparivarjitam // GarP_1,226.29 //
analyzed: aham brahma param jyotiḥ śrotra tvac parivarjitam
aham brahma param jyotiḥ jihvā ghrāṇa vivarjitam

original: ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotiḥ prāṇāpānavivarjitam // GarP_1,226.30 //
analyzed: aham brahma param jyotiḥ prāṇa apāna vivarjitam
aham brahma param jyotiḥ vyāna udāna vivarjitam
aham brahma param jyotiḥ ajñāna parivarjitam

original: ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotisturīyaṃ paramaṃ padam /
analyzed: aham brahma param jyotiḥ turīyam paramam padam
deha indriya manaḥ buddhi prāṇa ahaṅkāra varjitam

original: ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotirjñānarūpo vimuktaye // GarP_1,226.33 //
analyzed: aham brahma param jyotiḥ jñāna rūpaḥ vimuktaye
sūtaḥ uvāca

original: ityaṣṭāṅgo mayā yoga uktaḥ śaunaka muktidaḥ /
analyzed: iti aṣṭa aṅgaḥ mayā yogaḥ uktaḥ śaunaka mukti daḥ
nityanaimittikam gatvā layam prākṛta bandhanāḥ

original: utpadyante hi saṃsāre naikaṃ yātvā parātmanām /
analyzed: utpadyante hi saṃsāre na ekam yātvā parātmanām
vimucyate vimuktaḥ ca jñānāt ajñāna mohitaḥ

original: tato naṃ mriyate duḥ khī na rogī na ca vandhavān /
analyzed: tatas nam mriyate dus khī na rogī na ca vandhavān

original: na pāpairyujyate yogī narake na vipacyate // GarP_1,226.36 //
analyzed: na pāpaiḥ yujyate yogī narake na vipacyate

original: garbhavāse sa no duḥ khī sa syānnārāyaṇo 'vyayaḥ /
analyzed: garbha vāse sa naḥ duḥ khī sa syāt nārāyaṇaḥ vyayaḥ
bhaktyā tu ananyayā labhyaḥ bhagavān bhukti mukti daḥ
dhyānena pūjayā japyaiḥ samyak stotraiḥ yata vrataiḥ
yajñaiḥ dānaiḥ citta śuddhiḥ tayā jñānam ca labhyate
praṇava ādika mantraiḥ ca japyaiḥ muktim gatāḥ dvijāḥ

original: indro 'pi paramaṃ sthānaṃ gandharvāpsaraso varāḥ // GarP_1,226.39 //
analyzed: indraḥ u pi paramam sthānam gandharva apsarasaḥ varāḥ

original: prāptā devāśca devatvaṃ munitvaṃ munayo gatāḥ /
analyzed: prāptāḥ devāḥ ca deva tvam muni tvam munayaḥ gatāḥ
gandharva tvañca gandharvāḥ rāja tvañca nṛpa ādayaḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍeṣṭāṅgayogakathanaṃ nāma ṣaḍviṃśatyadhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍeṣṭāṅgayogakathanam nāma ṣaḍviṃśatyadhikadviśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
sūtaḥ uvāca
viṣṇu bhaktim pravakṣyāmi yayā sarvam avāpyate

original: yathā bhaktyā haristuṣyettathā nānyena kenacit // GarP_1,227.1 //
analyzed: yathā bhaktyā hariḥ tuṣyet tathā na anyena kenacid
mahataḥ śreyasaḥ mūlam prasavaḥ puṇya santateḥ

original: jīvitasya phalaṃ svādu niyataṃ smaraṇaṃ hareḥ // GarP_1,227.2 //
analyzed: jīvitasya phalam svādu niyatam smaraṇam hareḥ
tasmāt sevā budhaiḥ proktā bhakti sādhana bhūyasī
te bhaktāḥ lokanāthasya nāma karma ādi kīrtane
muñcanti aśrūṇi saṃharṣāt ye prahṛṣṭa nūruhāḥ
jagaddhātuḥ maheśasya divya ājñā caraṇāḥ vayam

original: iha nityakriyāḥ kuryuḥ snigdhā ye vaiṣṇavāstu te /
analyzed: iha nityakriyāḥ kuryuḥ snigdhāḥ ye vaiṣṇavāḥ tu te

original: brahmākṣaraṃ na śṛṇvanvai tayā bhagavateritam // GarP_1,227.5 //
analyzed: brahmākṣaram na śṛṇvan vai tayā bhagavatā īritam

original: praṇāmapūrvakaṃ bhaktyā yo vadedvaiṣṇavo hi saḥ /
analyzed: praṇāma pūrvakam bhaktyā yaḥ vadet vaiṣṇavaḥ hi saḥ
tad bhakta jana vātsalyam pūjanam ca anumodanam
tad kathā śravaṇe prītiḥ aśru netra aṅga vikriyāḥ

original: yena sarvātmanā viṣṇau bhaktyā bhāvo niveśitaḥ // GarP_1,227.7 //
analyzed: yena sarva ātmanā viṣṇau bhaktyā bhāvaḥ niveśitaḥ
viprebhyaḥ ca kṛtātma tvāt mahā bhāgavataḥ hi saḥ
viśva upakaraṇam nityam tad artham saṅga varjanam
svayam abhyarcanam ca eva yaḥ viṣṇuñca upajīvati
bhaktiḥ aṣṭavidhā hi eṣā vartate

original: sa viprendro muniḥ śrīmānsa yāti paramāṃ gatim // GarP_1,227.9 //
analyzed: sa vipra indraḥ muniḥ śrīmān sa yāti paramām gatim

original: tasmai deyaṃ tato grāhyaṃ sa ca pūjyo yathā hariḥ /
analyzed: tasmai deyam tatas grāhyam sa ca pūjyaḥ yathā hariḥ

original: smṛtaḥ saṃbhāṣito vāpi pūjito vā dvijottamaḥ /
analyzed: smṛtaḥ saṃbhāṣitaḥ vā api pūjitaḥ vā dvijottamaḥ
punāti bhagavat bhaktaḥ caṇḍālaḥ pi yadṛcchayā

original: dayāṃ kuru prapannāya tavāsmīti ca yo vadet /
analyzed: dayām kuru prapannāya tava asmi iti ca yaḥ vadet

original: abhayaṃ sarvabhūtebhyo dadyādetad vrataṃ hareḥ // GarP_1,227.11 //
analyzed: abhayam sarva bhūtebhyaḥ dadyāt etat vratam hareḥ
mantra jāpi sahasrebhyaḥ sarva vedānta pāragaḥ
sarva vedānta vid koṭyām viṣṇu bhaktaḥ viśiṣyate
ekāntinaḥ sva vapuṣā gacchanti paramam padam
ekāntena samaḥ viṣṇuḥ tasmāt eṣām parāyaṇaḥ
yasmāt ekāntinaḥ proktāḥ tat bhāgavata cetasaḥ
priyāṇām api sarveṣām devadevasya su priyaḥ
āpatsu api sadā bhasya bhaktiḥ avyabhicāriṇā
yā prītiḥ adhikā viṣṇoḥ viṣayeṣu anapāyinī
viṣṇum saṃsmarataḥ sā me hṛdayāt na upasarpati
dṛḍha bhaktaḥ pi veda ādi sarva śāstra artha pāragaḥ
yaḥ na sarveśvare bhaktaḥ tam vidyāt puruṣa adhamam
na adhīta veda śāstraḥ na kṛtaḥ dhvara sambhavaḥ

original: yo bhaktiṃ vahate viṣṇau tena sarvaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavet // GarP_1,227.17 //
analyzed: yaḥ bhaktim vahate viṣṇau tena sarvam kṛtam bhavet
yajvānaḥ kratu mukhyānām vedānām pāragāḥ api

original: na tāṃ yānti gatiṃ bhaktā yāṃ yānti munisattamāḥ // GarP_1,227.18 //
analyzed: na tām yānti gatim bhaktāḥ yām yānti muni sattamāḥ
yaḥ kaścid vaiṣṇavaḥ loke mithyā ācāraḥ api anāśramī
punāti sakalān lokān sahasrāṃśuḥ iva uditaḥ
ye nṛśaṃsāḥ durātmānaḥ pāpa ācara ratāḥ tathā

original: te 'pi yānti paraṃ sthānaṃ nārāyaṇaparāyaṇāḥ // GarP_1,227.20 //
analyzed: te pi yānti param sthānam nārāyaṇa parāyaṇāḥ
dṛḍhā janārdane bhaktiḥ yadā eva avyabhicāriṇī
tadā kiyat svarga sukham sā eva nirvāṇa hetukā
bhrāmyatām tatra saṃsāre narāṇām kurma durgame
hasta avalambane hi ekam yena tuṣyet janārdanaḥ
na śṛṇoti guṇān divyān devadevasya cakriṇaḥ

original: sa maro badhiro jñeyaḥ sarvadharmabahiṣkṛtaḥ // GarP_1,227.22 //
analyzed: sa maraḥ badhiraḥ jñeyaḥ sarva dharma bahiṣkṛtaḥ

original: nāmni saṃkīrtite viṣṇoryasya puṃso na jāyate /
analyzed: nāmni saṃkīrtite viṣṇoḥ yasya puṃsaḥ na jāyate
śarīram pulaka udbhāsi tat bhavet kuṇapa upamam
yasmin bhaktiḥ dvijaśreṣṭha muktiḥ api acirāt bhavet
niviṣṭa manasām puṃsām sarvathā vṛjina kṣayaḥ

original: svapuruṣamabhivīkṣya pāśahastaṃ vadati yamaḥ kila tasya karṇamūle /
analyzed: sva puruṣam abhivīkṣya pāśa hastam vadati yamaḥ kila tasya karṇa mūle
parihara madhusūdana prāpan an prabhuḥ aham anya nṛṇām na vaiṣṇavānām
api ced su durācāraḥ bhajate mām an anya bhāj

original: sādhureva sa mantavyaḥ samyagavyavasito hi saḥ // GarP_1,227.26 //
analyzed: sādhuḥ eva sa mantavyaḥ samyak avyavasitaḥ hi saḥ

original: kṣipraṃ bhavati dharmātmā śaśvacchāntiṃ sa gacchati /
analyzed: kṣipram bhavati dharma ātmā śaśvat śāntim sa gacchati

original: viprendra pratijānīhi viṣṇubhakto na naśyati // GarP_1,227.27 //
analyzed: vipra indra pratijānīhi viṣṇu bhaktaḥ na naśyati

original: dharmārthakāmaḥ kiṃ tasya muktistasya kare sthitā /
analyzed: dharma artha kāmaḥ kim tasya muktiḥ tasya kare sthitā

original: samastajagatāṃ mūlaṃ yasya bhaktiḥ sthirā harau // GarP_1,227.28 //
analyzed: samasta jagatām mūlam yasya bhaktiḥ sthirā harau
daivī hi eṣā guṇa mayī hareḥ māyā duratyayā

original: tameva ye prapadyante māyāmetāṃ taranti te // GarP_1,227.29 //
analyzed: tam eva ye prapadyante māyām etām taranti te
kim yajña ārādhane puṃsā śiṣyate harimedhasām
bhaktyā eva ārādhyate viṣṇuḥ na anyat tatra upakārakam
na dānaiḥ vividhaiḥ dattaiḥ puṣpaiḥ na eva anulepanaiḥ

original: toṣameti mahātmāsau yathā bhaktyā janārdanaḥ // GarP_1,227.31 //
analyzed: toṣam eti mahātmā asau yathā bhaktyā janārdanaḥ
saṃsāra viṣa vṛkṣasya dve phale hi amṛta upame
kadācid keśave bhaktiḥ tad bhaktaiḥ vā samāgamaḥ

original: patreṣu puṣpeṣu phaleṣu toyeṣvakaṣṭalabhyeṣu sadaiva satsu /
analyzed: patreṣu puṣpeṣu phaleṣu toyeṣu akaṣṭa labhyeṣu sadā eva satsu

original: bhaktyaikalabhye puruṣe purāṇe muktyaikalābhe kriyate prayatnaḥ // GarP_1,227.33 //
analyzed: bhaktyā eka labhye puruṣe purāṇe muktyā eka lābhe kriyate prayatnaḥ
āsphoṭayanti pitaraḥ pranṛtyanti pitāmā ahar

original: vaiṣṇavosmatkule jātaḥ sa naḥ santārayiṣyati // GarP_1,227.34 //
analyzed: vaiṣṇava usmad kule jātaḥ sa naḥ santārayiṣyati
ajñāninaḥ sukhare samadhikṣipantaḥ yat pāpinaḥ śiśupāla suyodhana ādyāḥ

original: muktiṃ gatāḥ smaraṇamātravidhūtapāpāḥ kaḥ saṃśayaḥ paramabhaktimatāṃ janānām // GarP_1,227.35 //
analyzed: muktim gatāḥ smaraṇa mātra vidhūta pāpāḥ kaḥ saṃśayaḥ parama bhaktimatām janānām
śaramam tam prapannāḥ ye dhyāna yoga vivarjitāḥ

original: te 'pi mṛtyumatikramya yānti tadvaiṣṇavaṃ padam // GarP_1,227.36 //
analyzed: te mṛtyum atikramya yānti tat vaiṣṇavam padam
bhava udbhava kleśa śataiḥ hataḥ tathā paribhraman indriya randhrakaiḥ hayaiḥ
niyamyatām mādhava
me manohayaḥ tvad aṅghri śaṅkau dṛḍha bhakti bandhane
viṣṇuḥ eva param brahma tri bhedam iha paṭhyate
veda siddhānta mārgeṣu tat na jānanti mohitāḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bhagavadbhaktivivaraṇaṃ nāma saptaviṃśatyadhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe bhagavadbhaktivivaraṇam nāma saptaviṃśatyadhikadviśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
sūtaḥ uvāca
mukti hetum anādi antam ajam avyayam akṣayam

original: yo namet sarvalokasya namasyo jāyate naraḥ // GarP_1,228.1 //
analyzed: yaḥ namet sarva lokasya namasyaḥ jāyate naraḥ
viṣṇum ānandam advaitam vijñānam sarvagam prabhum

original: praṇamāmi sadā bhaktyā cetasā hṛdayālayam // GarP_1,228.2 //
analyzed: praṇamāmi sadā bhaktyā cetasā hṛdaya ālayam
yaḥ ntar tiṣṭhan aśeṣasya paśyati īśaḥ śubha aśubham

original: taṃ sarvasākṣiṇaṃ viṣṇuṃ namasye parameśvaram // GarP_1,228.3 //
analyzed: tam sarva sākṣiṇam viṣṇum namasye parameśvaram
śaktena api namaskāraḥ prayuktaḥ cakrapāṇaye
saṃsāra tṛṇa vargāṇām udvejana karaḥ hi saḥ
kṛṣṇe sphurat jaladhara udara cāru kṛṣṇe loka adhikāra puruṣe parama prameye

original: eko hi bhāvaguṇamātradṛḍhapraṇāmaḥ sadyaḥ śvapākamapi sādhayituṃ saśaktaḥ // GarP_1,228.5 //
analyzed: ekaḥ hi bhāva guṇa mātra dṛḍha praṇāmaḥ sadyas śvapākam api sādhayitum sa śaktaḥ
praṇamya daṇḍa bat bhūmau namaskāreṇa yā urcayet

original: sa yāṃ gatimavāpnoti na tāṃ kratuśatairapi // GarP_1,228.6 //
analyzed: sa yām gatim avāpnoti na tām kratu śataiḥ api
durga saṃsāra kāntāra ākūpāre pi pradhāvatām

original: ekaḥ kṛṣṇe namaskāro muktyā tāṃstārayiṣyati // GarP_1,228.7 //
analyzed: ekaḥ kṛṣṇe namaskāraḥ muktyā tān tārayiṣyati

original: āsīno vā śayāno vātiṣṭhan vā yatra tatra vā /
analyzed: āsīnaḥ vā śayānaḥ vā a tiṣṭhan vā yatra tatra vā
namaḥ nārāyaṇāya iti mantra eka śaraṇaḥ bhavet
nārāyaṇa iti śabdaḥ sti vāc asti vaśa vartinī

original: tathāpi narake mūḍhāḥ patantīti kimadbhutam // GarP_1,228.9 //
analyzed: tathā api narake mūḍhāḥ patanti iti kim adbhutam

original: caturmukho vā yadi koṭivaktro bhavennaraḥ kopi viśuddhacetāḥ /
analyzed: caturmukhaḥ vā yadi koṭi vaktraḥ bhavet naraḥ kaḥ api viśuddha cetāḥ

original: sa vai guṇānāmayutaikadeśaṃ vadenna vā devavarasya viṣṇoḥ // GarP_1,228.10 //
analyzed: sa vai guṇānām ayuta eka deśam vadet na vā deva varasya viṣṇoḥ
vyāsa ādyāḥ munayaḥ sarve stuvantaḥ madhusūdanam
mati kṣayāt nivartante na govinda guṇa kṣayāt
avaśena api yad nāmni kīrtite sarva pātakaiḥ

original: pumān vimucyate sadyaḥ siṃhatrasto mṛgā yathā /
analyzed: pumān vimucyate sadyas siṃha trastaḥ mṛgāḥ yathā

original: baddhaḥ parikarastena mokṣāya gamanaṃ prati // GarP_1,228.12 //
analyzed: baddhaḥ parikaraḥ tena mokṣāya gamanam prati

original: svapne 'pi nāma spṛśato 'pi puṃsaḥ kṣayaṃ karotyakṣayapāparāśim /
analyzed: svapne pi nāma spṛśataḥ pi puṃsaḥ kṣayam karoti akṣaya pāpa rāśim

original: pratyakṣataḥ kiṃ punaratra puṃsā prakīrtite nāmni janārdanasya // GarP_1,228.13 //
analyzed: pratyakṣataḥ kim punar atra puṃsā prakīrtite nāmni janārdanasya
namaḥ kṛṣṇa acyuta ananta vāsudeva iti udīritam
yaiḥ bhāva bhāvitaiḥ vipra na te yama puram yayuḥ
kṣayaḥ bhavet yathā vahneḥ tamasaḥ bhāskara udaye
tathā eva kaluṣa oghasya nāma saṃkīrtanāt hareḥ
kva nāka pṛṣṭha gamanam punar āyāti na kṣayam
gacchatām dūram adhvānam kṛṣṇa mūrchita cetasām
pātheyam puṇḍarīkākṣa nāma saṃkīrtanam hareḥ

original: kṛṣṇeti vaiṣṇavaṃ kṣāntaṃ japtvā mukto bhavennaraḥ // GarP_1,228.17 //
analyzed: kṛṣṇa iti vaiṣṇavam kṣāntam japtvā muktaḥ bhavet naraḥ
dhyāyan kṛte japet mantraiḥ tretāyām dvāpara īrcayan

original: yadāpnoti tadāpnoti tadāpnoti kalau saṃsmṛtyakeśavam // GarP_1,228.18 //
analyzed: yat āpnoti tat āpnoti tat āpnoti kalau saṃsmṛtya keśavam
jihvā agre vartate yasya hariḥ iti akṣara dvayam

original: saṃsārasāgaraṃ tīrtvā sa gacchedvaiṣṇavaṃ padam // GarP_1,228.19 //
analyzed: saṃsāra sāgaram tīrtvā sa gacchet vaiṣṇavam padam
vijñāta duṣkṛti sahasra samāvṛtaḥ piśreyaḥ

original: spapnāntare na hi punaśca bhavaṃ sa paśyennārāyaṇastutikathāparamo manuṣyaḥ // GarP_1,228.20 //
analyzed: spapna antare na hi punar ca bhavam sa paśyet nārāyaṇa stuti kathā paramaḥ manuṣyaḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe viṣṇubhaktivivaraṇaṃ nāmāṣṭāviṃśatyuttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe viṣṇubhaktivivaraṇam nāma aṣṭāviṃśatyuttaradviśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
sūtaḥ uvāca
aśeṣa loka nāthasya sāram ārādhanam hareḥ

original: dadyātu puruṣasūkteṇa yaḥ puṣpāṇyapa eva ca // GarP_1,229.1 //
analyzed: dadyātu puruṣasūkteṇa yaḥ puṣpāṇi apaḥ eva ca
arcitam syāt jagat idam tena sarvam carācaram

original: yo na pūjayate viṣṇuṃ taṃ vidyādbrahmaghātakam // GarP_1,229.2 //
analyzed: yaḥ na pūjayate viṣṇum tam vidyāt brahma ghātakam
yatas pravṛttiḥ bhūtānām yena sarvam idam tatam

original: taṃ yo na dhyāyate viṣṇuṃ sa viṣṭhāyāṃ krimirbhavet // GarP_1,229.3 //
analyzed: tam yaḥ na dhyāyate viṣṇum sa viṣṭhāyām krimiḥ bhavet
narake pacyamānaḥ tu yamena paribhāṣitaḥ

original: kintvayā nārcito devaḥ keśavaḥ kleśanāśanaḥ // GarP_1,229.4 //
analyzed: kin tvayā nā arcitaḥ devaḥ keśavaḥ kleśa nāśanaḥ
udakena api abhāvena dravyāṇām arcitaḥ prabhuḥ

original: yo dadāti svakaṃ lokaṃ sa tvayā kiṃ na cārcitaḥ // GarP_1,229.5 //
analyzed: yaḥ dadāti svakam lokam sa tvayā kim na ca arcitaḥ

original: na tatkaroti sā mātā na pitā nāpi bāndhavaḥ /
analyzed: na tat karoti sā mātā na pitā na api bāndhavaḥ
yat karoti hṛṣīkeśaḥ santuṣṭaḥ śraddhayā arcitaḥ
varṇa āśrama ācāravatā puruṣeṇa paraḥ pumān
viṣṇuḥ ārādhyate panthā nā anyaḥ tad toṣa kārakaḥ
na dānaiḥ vividhaiḥ dattaiḥ na puṣpaiḥ na anulepanaiḥ

original: toṣameti mahātmāsau yathā bhaktyā janārdanaḥ // GarP_1,229.8 //
analyzed: toṣam eti mahātmā asau yathā bhaktyā janārdanaḥ
sampad aiśvarya māhātmyaiḥ santatyā na ca karmaṇā
vimuktaiḥ ca eka tā labhyā mūlam ārādhanam hareḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe viṣṇupūjānirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikonatriśaduttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe viṣṇupūjānirūpaṇam nāma ekonatriśaduttaradviśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
sūtaḥ uvāca

original: ālokya sarvaśāstrāṇi vicārya ca punaḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: ālokya sarva śāstrāṇi vicārya ca punar punar

original: idamekaṃ suniṣpannaṃ dhyeyo nārāyaṇaḥ sadā // GarP_1,230.1 //
analyzed: idam ekam su niṣpannam dhyeyaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ sadā

original: kiṃ tasya dānaiḥ kintīrthaiḥ kiṃ tapobhiḥ kimadhvaraiḥ /
analyzed: kim tasya dānaiḥ kim tīrthaiḥ kim tapobhiḥ kim adhvaraiḥ

original: yo nityaṃ dhyāyate devaṃ nārāyaṇamananyadhīḥ // GarP_1,230.2 //
analyzed: yaḥ nityam dhyāyate devam nārāyaṇam an anya dhīḥ
ṣaṣṭiḥ tīrtha sahasrāṇi ṣaṣṭiḥ tīrtha śatāni ca
nārāyaṇa praṇāmasya kalām na arhanti ṣoḍaśīm
prayaścittāni aśeṣāṇi tapaḥ karmāṇi yāni vai
viddhi teṣām aśeṣāṇām kṛṣṇa anusmaraṇam param
kṛta pāpe nuraktiḥ ca yasya puṃsaḥ prajāyate

original: prāyaścittantu tasyaikaṃ hareḥ saṃsmaraṇaṃ param // GarP_1,230.5 //
analyzed: prāyaścittam tu tasya ekam hareḥ saṃsmaraṇam param
muhūrtam api yaḥ dhyāyet nārāyaṇam atandritaḥ
saḥ u pi svargatim āpnoti kim punar tad parāyaṇaḥ
jāgrat svapna suṣupteṣu yoga sthasya ca yoginaḥ

original: yā kācinmanaso vṛttiḥ sā bhavatyacyutāśrayāt // GarP_1,230.7 //
analyzed: yā kācid manasaḥ vṛttiḥ sā bhavati acyuta āśrayāt
uttiṣṭhan nipatan viṣṇum pralapan viviśan tathā

original: bhuñjañjāgracca govindaṃ mādhavaṃ yaśca saṃsmaret // GarP_1,230.8 //
analyzed: bhuñjan jāgrat ca govindam mādhavam yaḥ ca saṃsmaret
sve sve karmaṇi abhirataḥ kuryāt cittam janārdane
eṣā śāstra anusāra uktiḥ kim anyaiḥ bahu bhāṣitaiḥ

original: dhyānameva paro dharmo dhyānameva paraṃ tapaḥ /
analyzed: dhyānam eva paraḥ dharmaḥ dhyānam eva param tapaḥ

original: dhyānameva paraṃ śaucaṃ tasmāddhyānaparo bhavet // GarP_1,230.10 //
analyzed: dhyānam eva param śaucam tasmāt dhyāna paraḥ bhavet

original: nāsti viṣṇoḥ paraṃ dhtheyaṃ tapo nānaśanātparam /
analyzed: na asti viṣṇoḥ param tapaḥ na anaśanāt param
tasmāt pradhānam atra uktam vāsudevasya cintanam

original: yaddurlabhaṃ paraṃ prāpyaṃ manaso yanna gocaram /
analyzed: yat durlabham param prāpyam manasaḥ yat na gocaram
tat api a prārthitam dhyātaḥ dadāti madhusūdanaḥ
pramādāt kurvatām karma pracyaveta adhvareṣu yat

original: smaraṇādeva tadviṣṇoḥ saṃpūrṇaṃ syāditi śrutiḥ // GarP_1,230.13 //
analyzed: smaraṇāt eva tat viṣṇoḥ saṃpūrṇam syāt iti śrutiḥ
dhyānena sadṛśaḥ nā asti śodhanam pāpa karmaṇām
āgāmi deha hetūnām dāhakaḥ yoga pāvakaḥ
viniṣpanna samādhiḥ tu muktim atrā eva janmani

original: prāpnoti yogī yogāgnidagdhakarmā ca yo 'cirāt // GarP_1,230.15 //
analyzed: prāpnoti yogī yoga agni dagdha karmā ca cirāt
yathā agniḥ udyata śikhaḥ kakṣam dahati vā anilaḥ

original: tathā cittasthite viṣṇau yoginā sarvakilbiṣam // GarP_1,230.16 //
analyzed: tathā citta sthite viṣṇau yoginā sarva kilbiṣam
yathā agni yogāt kanakam amalam saṃprajāyate

original: saṃpluṣṭo vāsudevena manuṣyāṇāṃ sadā malaḥ // GarP_1,230.17 //
analyzed: saṃpluṣṭaḥ vāsudevena manuṣyāṇām sadā malaḥ
gaṅgā snāna sahasreṣu puṣkara snāna koṭiṣu

original: yatpāpaṃ nilayayāti smṛte naśyati taddharau // GarP_1,230.18 //
analyzed: yat pāpam smṛte naśyati tat harau
prāṇāyāma sahasnaiḥ tu yat pāpam naśyati dhruvam
kṣaṇa mātreṇa tat pāpam hareḥ dhyānāt praṇaśyati
kali prabhāvāt duṣṭa uktiḥ pāṣaṇḍānām tathā uktayaḥ

original: na krāmenmānasaṃ tasya yasya cetasi keśavaḥ // GarP_1,230.20 //
analyzed: na krāmet mānasam tasya yasya cetasi keśavaḥ

original: sā tithistadahorātraṃ sa yogaḥ sa ca candramāḥ /
analyzed: sā tithiḥ tat ahorātram sa yogaḥ sa ca candramāḥ

original: lagnaṃ tadeva vikhyātaṃ yatra saṃsmaryate hariḥ // GarP_1,230.21 //
analyzed: lagnam tat eva vikhyātam yatra saṃsmaryate hariḥ
sā hāniḥ tat mahat chidram sā ca artha jaḍa mūka tā

original: canmuhūrtaṃ kṣaṇo vāpi vāsudevo na cintyate // GarP_1,230.22 //
analyzed: cat muhūrtam kṣaṇaḥ vā api vāsudevaḥ na cintyate

original: kalau kṛta yugaṃ tasya kalistasya kṛte yuge /
analyzed: kalau kṛta yugam tasya kaliḥ tasya kṛte yuge

original: hṛdi no yasya govindo yasya cetasi nācyutaḥ // GarP_1,230.23 //
analyzed: hṛdi naḥ yasya govindaḥ yasya cetasi na acyutaḥ
yasya agratas tathā pṛṣṭhe gacchataḥ tiṣṭhataḥ vā

original: govinde niyataṃ cetaḥ kṛtakṛtyaḥ sadaiva saḥ // GarP_1,230.24 //
analyzed: govinde niyatam cetaḥ kṛtakṛtyaḥ sadā eva saḥ
vāsudeve manaḥ yasya japa homa arcana ādiṣu
tasya antarāyaḥ maitreya vā iva indra tva ādikam phalam

original: asaṃtyajya ca gārhasthayaṃ sa taptvā ca mahattapaḥ /
analyzed: a saṃtyajya ca gārhasthayam sa taptvā ca mahat tapaḥ
chinatti pauruṣīm māyām keśava arpita mānasaḥ

original: kṣamāṃ kurvanti kruddheṣu dayāṃ mūrkheṣu mānavāḥ /
analyzed: kṣamām kurvanti kruddheṣu dayām mūrkheṣu mānavāḥ
mudan ca dharma śīleṣu govinde hṛdaya sthite
dhyāyet nārāyaṇam devam snāna dāna ādi karmasu
prāyaścitā iteṣu sarveṣu duṣkṛteṣu viśeṣataḥ
lābhaḥ teṣām jayaḥ teṣām kutas teṣām parābhavaḥ
yeṣām indīvara śyāmaḥ hṛdaya sthaḥ janārdanaḥ
kīṭa pakṣi gaṇānām ca harau saṃnyasta cetasām

original: ūrdhvā hyeva gatiścāsti kiṃ punarjñānināṃ nṛṇām // GarP_1,230.30 //
analyzed: ūrdhvā hi eva gatiḥ ca asti kim punar jñāninām nṛṇām
vāsudeva taru chāyā na ati śītā ati tāpa dā

original: narakadvāraśamanī sā kimarthaṃ na sevyate // GarP_1,230.31 //
analyzed: naraka dvāra śamanī sā kimartham na sevyate

original: na ca durvāsasaḥ śāpo rājyañcāpi śacīpateḥ /
analyzed: na ca durvāsasaḥ śāpaḥ rājyan ca api śacīpateḥ

original: hantuṃ samarthaṃ hi sakhe hṛtkṛte madhusūdane // GarP_1,230.32 //
analyzed: hantum samartham hi sakhe hṛd kṛte madhusūdane
vadataḥ tiṣṭhataḥ sva icchayā karma kurvataḥ

original: nāpayāti yadā cintā siddhāṃ manyeta dhāraṇām // GarP_1,230.33 //
analyzed: na apayāti yadā cintā siddhām manyeta dhāraṇām
dhyeyaḥ sadā savitṛ maṇḍala madhya vartaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ sarasija āsana sanniviṣṭaḥ

original: pratyahaṃ cārcanākāle tathā tvaṃ vaktumarhasi // GarP_1,234.2 //
analyzed: pratyaham ca arcanā kāle tathā tvam vaktum arhasi
te dhanyāḥ te su janmānaḥ te hi sarva sukha pradāḥ

original: saphalaṃ jīvitaṃ teṣāṃ ye stuvanti sadācyutam // GarP_1,234.3 //
analyzed: saphalam jīvitam teṣām ye stuvanti sadā acyutam
brahmā uvāca
mune stotram pravakṣyāmiḥ vāsudevasya mukti dam

analyzed: śṛṇu yena stutaḥ samyak pūjā kāle prasīdati
om namaḥ bhagavateḥ vāsudevāt ca namaḥ sarva apahāriṇe

original: namaḥ śivāya sūkṣmāya purāṇāya namonamaḥ // GarP_1,234.10 //
analyzed: namaḥ śivāya sūkṣmāya purāṇāya namaḥ namaḥ

original: jaya vedāntavidvedya jaya sarvada mādhava // GarP_1,234.20 //
analyzed: jaya vedānta vid vedya jaya sarva da mādhava

original: jaya sūkṣma cidāndana jaya cittanirañjana // GarP_1,234.21 //

tvam guruḥ tvam hare śiṣyaḥ tvam dīkṣā mantra maṇḍalam
tvam nyāsa mudrā samayāḥ tvam ca puṣpa ādi sādhanam
tvam ādhāraḥ tvam hi anantaḥ tvam kūrmaḥ tvam dharā ambujam
dharma jñāna ādayaḥ tvam hi vedi maṇḍala śaktayaḥ

original: tvaṃ prabho chalabhṛdrāmastvaṃ punaḥ sa kharāntakaḥ /
analyzed: tvam prabho chalabhṛt rāmaḥ tvam punar sa khara antakaḥ
tvam brahmarṣiḥ ca devaḥ tvam viṣṇuḥ satya parākramaḥ
tvam nṛsiṃhaḥ parānandaḥ varāhaḥ tvam dharādharaḥ

original: tvaṃ suparṇastathā cakraṃ tvaṃ gadā śaṅkha eva ca // GarP_1,234.26 //
analyzed: tvam suparṇaḥ tathā cakram tvam gadā śaṅkhaḥ eva ca

original: tvaṃ śrīḥ prabho tvaṃ muṣṭisatvaṃ tvaṃ mālā deva śāvatī /
analyzed: tvam śrīḥ prabho tvam muṣṭi satvam tvam mālā deva śāvatī

original: śrīvatsaḥ kaustubhastvaṃ hi śārṅgo tvaṃ ca tatheṣudhiḥ // GarP_1,234.27 //
analyzed: śrīvatsaḥ kaustubhaḥ tvam hi tvam ca tathā iṣudhiḥ

original: tvaṃ khaḍgacarmaṇā sārdhaṃ tvaṃ dikpālāstathā prabho /
analyzed: tvam khaḍga carmaṇā sārdham tvam dikpālāḥ tathā prabho

original: tvaṃ vedhāstvaṃ vidhātā ca tvaṃ yamastvaṃ hutāśanaḥ // GarP_1,234.28 //
analyzed: tvam vedhāḥ tvam vidhātā ca tvam yamaḥ tvam hutāśanaḥ
tvam dhaneśaḥ tvam īśānaḥ tvam indraḥ tvam apāṃpatiḥ

original: tvaṃ rakṣo 'dhipatiḥ sādhyastvaṃ vāyustvaṃ niśākaraḥ // GarP_1,234.29 //
analyzed: tvam rakṣaḥ dhipatiḥ sādhyaḥ tvam vāyuḥ tvam niśākaraḥ

original: ādityā vasavo rudrā aśvinau tvaṃ marudgaṇāḥ /
analyzed: ādityāḥ vasavaḥ rudrāḥ aśvinau tvam marut gaṇāḥ

original: tvaṃ daityā dānavā nāgāstvaṃ yakṣā rākṣasāḥ khagāḥ // GarP_1,234.30 //
analyzed: tvam daityāḥ dānavāḥ nāgāḥ tvam yakṣāḥ rākṣasāḥ khagāḥ
gandharva apya rasaḥ siddhāḥ pitaraḥ tvam mahā amarāḥ

original: bhūtāni viṣayastvaṃ hi tvamavyaktendriyāṇi ca // GarP_1,234.31 //
analyzed: bhūtāni viṣayaḥ tvam hi tvam avyakta indriyāṇi ca
manaḥ buddhiḥ ahaṅkāraḥ kṣetrajñaḥ tvam hṛdi īśvaraḥ
tvam yajñaḥ tvam vaṣaṭkāraḥ tvam oṅkāraḥ samidh kuśāḥ

original: tvaṃ vedī tvaṃ hare dīkṣā tvaṃ yūpastvaṃ hutāśanaḥ /
analyzed: tvam vedī tvam hare dīkṣā tvam yūpaḥ tvam hutāśanaḥ

original: tvaṃ patnī tvaṃ puroḍāśastvaṃ śālā strukca tvaṃ stuvaḥ // GarP_1,234.33 //
analyzed: tvam patnī tvam puroḍāśaḥ tvam śālā struc ca tvam stuvaḥ

original: grāvāṇaḥ sakalaṃ tvaṃ hi sadasyāstvaṃ sadākṣiṇaḥ /
analyzed: grāvāṇaḥ sakalam tvam hi sadasyāḥ tvam sa dākṣiṇaḥ

original: tvaṃ sūrpādistvaṃ ca brahmā musalolūkhale dhruvam // GarP_1,234.34 //
analyzed: tvam sūrpa ādiḥ tvam ca brahmā musala ulūkhale dhruvam

original: tvaṃ hotā yajamānastvaṃ tvaṃ dhānyaṃ paśuyājakaḥ /
analyzed: tvam hotā yajamānaḥ tvam tvam dhānyam paśu yājakaḥ
tvam adhvaryuḥ tvam udgātā tvam yajñaḥ puruṣottamaḥ
diś pātālam ahi vyoma dyauḥ tvam nakṣatra kārakaḥ
deva tiryak manuṣyeṣu jagat etat carācaram
yat kiñcid dṛśyate deva brahmāṇḍam akhilam jagat

original: tava rūpamidaṃ sarvaṃ dṛṣṭyarthaṃ saṃprakāśitam // GarP_1,234.37 //
analyzed: tava rūpam idam sarvam dṛṣṭi artham saṃprakāśitam
nāthayante param brahma daiveḥ api durāsadam
kaḥ tat jānāti vimalam yoga gamyam atīndriyam
akṣayam puruṣam nityam avyaktam ajam avyayam
pralaya utpatti rahitam sarva vyāpinam īśvaram
sarvajñam nirguṇam śuddham ānandam ajaram param
bodha rūpam dhruvam śāntam pūrṇam advaitam akṣayam
avatāreṣu yā mūrtiḥ vidūre deva dṛśyate
param bhāvam a jānantaḥ tvām bhajanti divaukasaḥ
katham tvām īdṛśam sūkṣmam śaknomi puruṣottama
arādhayitum īśāna manaḥ gamyam agocaram
iha yat maṇḍale nātha pūjyate vidhivat kramaiḥ
puṣpa dhūpa ādibhiḥ yatra tatra sarvāḥ vibhūtayaḥ
saṃkarṣaṇa ādi bhedena tava yat pūjitāḥ mayā

original: kṣantumarhasi tatsarvaṃ yatkṛtaṃ na kṛtaṃ mayā // GarP_1,234.44 //
analyzed: kṣantum arhasi tat sarvam yat kṛtam na kṛtam mayā

original: na śaknomi vibho samyakkartuṃ pūjāṃ yathoditām /
analyzed: na śaknomi vibho samyak kartum pūjām yathā uditām
yat kṛtam japa homa ādi asādhyam puruṣottama
viniṣpādayitum bhaktyā atas tvām kṣamayāmi aham

original: divā rātrau ca sandhyāyāṃ sarvāvasthāsu ceṣṭataḥ // GarP_1,234.46 //
analyzed: divā rātrau ca sandhyāyām sarva avasthāsu ceṣṭataḥ
acalā tu hare
bhaktiḥ tava aṅghri yugale mama
śarire na ṇa

original: tathā prītirna ca dharmādikeṣu ca // GarP_1,234.47 //
analyzed: tathā prītiḥ na ca dharma ādikeṣu ca
yathā tvayi jagannātha mama

original: kiṃ tena na kṛtaṃ karma svargamokṣādisādhanam // GarP_1,234.48 //
analyzed: kim tena na kṛtam karma svarga mokṣa ādi sādhanam

original: pūjāṃ kartuṃ tathā stotraṃ kaḥ śaknoti tavācyuta // GarP_1,234.49 //
analyzed: pūjām kartum tathā stotram kaḥ śaknoti tava acyuta

original: stutaṃ tu pūjitaṃ me 'dya tatkṣamasva namo 'stu te /
analyzed: stutam tu pūjitam me dya tat kṣamasva namaḥ stu te
iti cakradhāra stotram mayā samyak udāhṛtam

original: stauhi viṣṇuṃ mune bhaktyā yadīcchasi paraṃ padam // GarP_1,234.50 //
analyzed: stauhi viṣṇum mune bhaktyā yadi icchasi param padam

original: stotreṇānena yaḥ stauti pūjākāle jagadghurum // GarP_1,234.51 //
analyzed: stotreṇa anena yaḥ stauti pūjā kāle jagat ghurum

original: anyo 'pi yo japedbhaktyā trisandhyaṃ niyataḥ śuciḥ // GarP_1,234.52 //
analyzed: yaḥ japet bhaktyā trisandhyam niyataḥ śuciḥ
idam stotram mune sarva kāmam avāpnuyāt

original: putrārtho labhate putrānbaddho mucyate bandhanāt // GarP_1,234.53 //
analyzed: putra arthaḥ labhate putrān baddhaḥ mucyate bandhanāt

original: vidyārtho labhate vidyāṃ bhagyaṃ kīrti ca vindati // GarP_1,234.54 //
analyzed: vidyā arthaḥ labhate vidyām bhagyam kīrti ca vindati

original: sa dhanyaḥ sarvavitprājñaḥsa sādhuḥ sarvakarmakṛt // GarP_1,234.55 //
analyzed: sa dhanyaḥ sarva vid prājñaḥ sa sādhuḥ sarva karma kṛt

original: asaṃbhāṣyā hi te sarve sarvadharmabahiṣkṛtāḥ // GarP_1,234.56 //
analyzed: a saṃbhāṣyāḥ hi te sarve sarva dharma bahiṣkṛtāḥ

original: na śuddhaṃ vidyate tasya mano vākca durātmanaḥ // GarP_1,234.57 //
analyzed: na śuddham vidyate tasya manaḥ vāc ca durātmanaḥ
yasya sarva artha de viṣṇau bhaktiḥ na avyabhicāriṇī

prāpnoti puruṣaḥ samyak yat yat prārthayate phalam
karma kāma ādikam sarvam surottamaḥ
asura ādi vapuḥ siddhaiḥ deyate yasya na antaram

original: sakalamunibhirādyaścintyate yo hi śuddho nikhilahṛdi niviṣṭo vetti yaḥ sarvasākṣī /
analyzed: sakala munibhiḥ ādyaḥ cintyate yaḥ hi śuddhaḥ nikhila hṛdi niviṣṭaḥ vetti yaḥ sarva sākṣī

original: tamajamamṛtamīśaṃ vāsudevaṃ nato 'smi bhayamaraṇavihīnaṃ nityamānandarūpam // GarP_1,234.60 //
analyzed: tam ajam amṛtam īśam vāsudevam nataḥ smi bhaya maraṇa vihīnam nityam ānanda rūpam

original: nikhilabhuvana nāthaṃ śāśvataṃ suprasannaṃ tvativimalaviśuddhaṃ nirguṇaṃ bhavapuṣpaiḥ /
analyzed: nikhila bhuvana nātham śāśvatam su prasannam tu ati vimala viśuddham nirguṇam bhava puṣpaiḥ

original: sukhamuditasamastaṃ pūjayāmyātmabhāvaṃ viśatu hṛdayapadme sarvasākṣī cidātmā // GarP_1,234.61 //
analyzed: sukha mudita samastam pūjayāmi ātma bhāvam viśatu hṛdaya padme sarva sākṣī cidātmā

original: tasmādvicintyaḥ parameśvaro 'sau vimuktikāmena nareṇa samyak // GarP_1,234.62 //
analyzed: tasmāt vicintyaḥ parameśvaraḥ sau vimukti kāmena nareṇa samyak

original: sañcintya viṣṇuṃ paramadvitīyaṃ kastatra yogī na laṃya prayāti // GarP_1,234.63 //
analyzed: sañcintya viṣṇum parama dvitīyam kaḥ tatra yogī na prayāti

original: imaṃ stavaṃ yaḥ satataṃ manuṣyaḥ paṭhecca tadvatprayataḥ praśāntaḥ /
analyzed: imam stavam yaḥ satatam manuṣyaḥ paṭhet ca tadvat prayataḥ praśāntaḥ

original: sa dhūtapāpmā vitataprabhāvaḥ prayāti lokaṃ vitataṃ murāreḥ // GarP_1,234.64 //
analyzed: sa dhūta pāpmā vitata prabhāvaḥ prayāti lokam vitatam murāreḥ

original: yaḥ prārthayatyarthamaśeṣasaukhyaṃ dharmaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca tathaiva mokṣam /
analyzed: yaḥ prārthayati artham aśeṣa saukhyam dharmam ca kāmam ca tathā eva mokṣam

original: sa sarvamutsṛjya paraṃ purāṇaṃ prayāti viṣṇuṃ śaraṇaṃ vareṇyam // GarP_1,234.65 //
analyzed: sa sarvam utsṛjya param purāṇam prayāti viṣṇum śaraṇam vareṇyam

original: yo vāsudevaṃ vimalaṃ prapannaḥ sa mokṣamāpnoti vimuktasaṅgaḥ // GarP_1,234.66 //
analyzed: yaḥ vāsudevam vimalam prapannaḥ sa mokṣam āpnoti vimukta saṅgaḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe 'cyutastotraṃ nāma catustriṃśaduttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe cyutastotram nāma catustriṃśaduttaradviśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
sūtaḥ uvāca vedānta sāṅkhya siddhānta brahma jñānam vadāmi aham

original: ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotirviṣṇurityeva cintayan // GarP_1,235.1 //
analyzed: aham brahma param jyotiḥ viṣṇuḥ iti eva cintayan

original: sūrye hṛdvyomni vahnau ca jyotirekaṃ tridhā sthitam /
analyzed: sūrye hṛd vyomni vahnau ca jyotiḥ ekam tridhā sthitam

original: yathā sarpiḥ śīrasthaṃ gavāṃ na kurute balam // GarP_1,235.2 //
analyzed: yathā sarpiḥ śīra stham gavām na kurute balam

original: nirgataṃ karmasaṃyuktaṃ dattaṃ tāsāṃ mahā balam /
analyzed: nirgatam karma saṃyuktam dattam tāsām mahā balam

original: tathā viṣṇuḥ śarīrastho na karoti hitaṃ naṇām // GarP_1,235.3 //
analyzed: tathā viṣṇuḥ śarīra sthaḥ na karoti hitam
vinā ārādhanayā devaḥ sarva gaḥ parameśvaraḥ
ārurukṣu matīnām tu karma jñānam udāhṛtam
ārūḍha yogavṛkṣāṇām jñānam tyāgam param matam
jñātum icchati śabda ādīn rāgaḥ dveṣaḥ jāyate

original: lobho mohaḥ krodha etairyuktaḥ pāpaṃ naraścaret /
analyzed: lobhaḥ mohaḥ krodhaḥ etaiḥ yuktaḥ pāpam naraḥ caret
hastau upastham udaram vāc caturthaḥ catuṣṭayam

original: etatsusaṃyataṃ yasya sa vipraḥ kathyate budhaiḥ (dhaḥ) /
analyzed: etat su saṃyatam yasya sa vipraḥ kathyate budhaiḥ

original: paravittaṃ na gṛhṇāti na hiṃsāṃ kurute tathā // GarP_1,235.7 //
analyzed: para vittam na gṛhṇāti na hiṃsām kurute tathā
na akṣa krīḍā rataḥ yaḥ tu hastau tasya su saṃyatau
para strī varjana rataḥ tasya upastham su saṃyatam
a lolupam idam bhuṅkte jaṭharam tasya saṃyatam

original: satyaṃ hitaṃ mitaṃ brūte yasmādvāktasya saṃyatā // GarP_1,235.9 //
analyzed: satyam hitam mitam brūte yasmāt vāc tasya saṃyatā
yasya saṃyatāni etāni tasya kim tapasā adhvaraiḥ
aikyam yat buddhi manasoḥ indriyāṇām ca sarvadā
sa bījam vā api nirbojam dhyānam etat prakīrtitam

original: bhruvormadhye sthitāṃ buddhiṃ viṣayeṣu yunakti yaḥ // GarP_1,235.11 //
analyzed: bhruvoḥ madhye sthitām buddhim viṣayeṣu yunakti yaḥ
ha indriyāṇām uparame manasi hi avyavasthite
svapnān paśyati asau jīvaḥ bāhyān ābhyantarān atha
jīvaḥ jāgrat avasthāyām evam āhuḥ vipāścitaḥ

original: hṛdi sthitaḥ sa tamasā mohito na smaratyapi /
analyzed: hṛdi sthitaḥ sa tamasā mohitaḥ na smarati api

original: yadā tasya kuto veti suṣuptiriti kathyate // GarP_1,235.14 //
analyzed: yadā tasya kutas vā iti suṣuptiḥ iti kathyate

original: jāgrato yasya no tandrā na moho na bhramastathā /
analyzed: jāgrataḥ yasya no tandrā na mohaḥ na bhramaḥ tathā
utpadyate na jānāti śabda artha viṣayān vaśī
indriyāṇi samāhṛtya viṣayebhyaḥ manaḥ tathā

original: buddhyāhaṅkāramapi ca prakṛtyā buddhimeva ca // GarP_1,235.16 //
analyzed: buddhyā ahaṅkāram api ca prakṛtyā buddhim eva ca

original: saṃyamya prakṛtiṃ cāpi cicchaktyā kevale sthitaḥ /
analyzed: saṃyamya prakṛtim ca api cicchaktyā kevale sthitaḥ
paśyati ātmāni ca ātmānam ātmanā ātma prakāśakam
cit rūpam amṛtam śuddham niṣkriyam vyāpakam śivam
turīyāyām avasthāyām āsthitaḥ sau na saṃśayaḥ
śabda ādayaḥ guṇāḥ pañca sattva ādyāḥ ca guṇāḥ trayaḥ

original: puryaṣṭakasya padmasya patrāṇyaṣṭau ca tāni hi // GarP_1,235.19 //
analyzed: puryaṣṭakasya padmasya patrāṇi aṣṭau ca tāni hi
sāmya avasthā guṇa kṛtā prakṛtiḥ tatra karṇikā

original: karṇikāyāṃ sthito devo dehī cidrūpa eva hi // GarP_1,235.20 //
analyzed: karṇikāyām sthitaḥ devaḥ dehī cit rūpaḥ eva hi

steyam tasya an ācaraṇam asteyam dharma sādhanam
karmaṇā manasā vācā sarva avasthāsu sarvadā
sarvatra maithuna tyāgam brahmacaryam pracakṣate
dravyāṇām api anādānam āpatsu api tathā icchayā
a parigraham iti āhuḥ tam prayatnena varjayet
dvidhā śaucam mṛd jalābhyām bāhya bhāvāt atha antarāt
yadṛcchā lābhataḥ tuṣṭiḥ santoṣaḥ sukha lakṣaṇam
manasaḥ ca aindriyāṇām ca aikāgryam paramam tapaḥ
śarīra śoṣaṇam vā api kṛcchra cāndrāyaṇa ādibhiḥ
budhāḥ
sattva śuddhi karam puṃsām svādhyāyam paricakṣate
stuti smaraṇa pūjā ādi vāc manaḥ kāya karmabhiḥ
aniścalā harau bhaktiḥ etat īśvara cintanam

original: āsanaṃ svastikaṃ proktaṃ padmamardhāsanaṃ tathā // GarP_1,238.11 //
analyzed: āsanam svastikam proktam padmam ardhāsanam tathā

indriyāṇām vicaratām viṣayeṣu tu asatsu iva

original: padadvayārthau dvividhau vācyau lakṣyau smatau budhaiḥ // GarP_1,239.2 //

prāṇa piṇḍa ātmakaḥ sa dvitīya vibhāgakaḥ
pārokṣyeprekṣaṇaḥ hi atra bhāgaḥ lakṣyeta
tathā brahma padena eva prāṇa piṇḍa ātma kāraṇām
niṣṭhā parokṣa tā ca iti parityāgena vakṣyate
advaya ānanda caitanyam lakṣayitvā sthitasya ca

aham brahma asmi vākyāt ca svanubhūti phala arthakam

original: aikyajñānaṃ tu hi bhavedvedāntāddūrato dhruvam // GarP_1,239.9 //

nitya śuddha svabhāvakaḥ
paramātmā eva yat jāgrat svapna ādyaiḥ yaḥ tridhā mataḥ
antar karaṇa rāśeḥ ca eva antar karaṇaḥ sthitaḥ

phala kriyā kārakayoḥ jāgrat ādīn vadāmi aham
indriyaiḥ atha vijñānam jāgrat sthānam udīritam
